rgya mtsho'i chur 'jug pa/ /rtsal chen spyod pa'i brod tshul gyis/ /chags thogs med par la dor ba'o/ /bslab par bya ba'i mtha' yin no/ /spyod pa'i bslab pa
dam pa ni/ /goms par bya ba rab tu gces/ /ji ltar khyung chen mkha' lding pa/ /gshog pa'i rtsal gyis nam 'phang gcod/ /ngam grog chu klung mtha' yas kyang / /gshog rlabs
'og tu kun chud ltar/ /rnal 'byor mnyam nyid mkhar lding pa/ /theg pa'i spyod sgo mtha' yas kyang / /mnyam pa chen po'i don gyis ni/ /lta 'phang rlabs kyis thag bcad pa'o//
'di ni re dang dogs pa yi/ /the tshom gcod pa'i lta ba ste/ /don la sems kyi lta ba ste/ /bslab pa 'di dag goms pa gces/ /dper na rgya mtshor nor len mi/ /sprul dang chu srin
sbrang ma la/ /sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug bsngal kun/ /dka' ba nyams su blangs nas 'grub/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor bde tshol ba/ /rnam rtog bying rmugs phyir yang dgra/ /gzhom
par dka' ba'i las 'di dag /nyams su blangs na bde thob rnyed/ /'di ni ting 'dzin dam pa yi/ /nyams su blangs pa'i bslab pa ste/ /sems kyis goms par bya ba'i las/ /'dris
par bya ba rab tu gces/ /ji ltar mun pa dug dang rdzas/ /sman snang gser du bsgyur bas na/ /'gyur rtsi man ngag med pa'i mis/ /dka' ba'i las chen sna tshogs pas/ /sdug
bsngal spyad kyang mi 'grub ste/ /su zhig man ngag ldan pa'i mis/ /tshegs med gyi na'i tshul gyis ni/ /bsgyur bas sman snang gser 'gyur ltar/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i don
sgrub pa| |kun gzhi gnas 'gyur man ngag dang / /gang dag mi ldan pas kyang ni/ /dka' ba spyad kyang 'grub pa min/ /sems kyi gsang 'di sus
mthong ba/ /de dag man ngag ldan pa ste/ /'dod pa'i don mchog gang yin pa/ /de dag tshegs med kyi nas 'grub/ /don rnams sgrub par gang byed pa/ /man ngag can
gyis 'grub pa'i phyir/ /don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yi/ /bslab pa 'di dag rab tu gces/ /dper na kun tu rgyu ba'i mi/ /'dod pa'i yul du 'gro byed na/ /yul
gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang / /bgrod pa'i lam gnas gcig las med/ /de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong chos bstan kyang / /bkri
zhing drang ba'i tshig yin te/ /bsam pa'i yul ni gcig pa'o/ /don rnams gcig tu sdud pa yi/ /bslab par bya ba dam pa ste/ /nges par gcig las
med pa'i phyir/ /'di dag goms par bya ba yin/ /bslab pa 'di la goms gyur na/ /lobs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te/ /lobs pas lam la mkhas
par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi yon tan chen po yang / /rmad du byung ba thob par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags chen po'i khyad par ni/ /thams cad thams cad bya'o cog /
byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod pa'am/ /dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa ste/ /dper na nam mkhar rgya mtsho 'am/ /ji ltar me dpung rgyal po 'dra/ /de yang de yul che chung gis/ /khyad
par nyid kyis brlabs pa yi/ /rgyal po de yang khyad par gyis/ /dbang sgyur bya ba'i khams rnams la/ /che chung rim pa yod pa yin/ /rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar
snang / /thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang / /bab chod thad du 'jug pa ste/ /dper na glang chen chur 'jug pa/ /rab dang glang chen bab mi bab/ /de yang rtsal sgying
drag zhan gyis/ /la la thad du gcod pa la/ /la la bsegs su 'gro ba yin/ /la la chung zhig bshan thabs 'gro/ /de ltar rnal 'byor rgyu nyid na/ /'bras bu'i
don la bab chod kyang / /rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis/ /ji ltar nus tshad der snang phyir/ /sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang / /sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa
dang / /spyod dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dang / /dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang / /lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur rnams/ /thams cad gcig las med na yang / /
grangs dang dbye ba'i bye brag rnams/ /snod kyi rtsal dang sbyar nas ni/ /chos rnams kun gzhir gcig pa la/ /kun gzhi gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas/ /bye brag lam gyi
chos su snang / /gzhi nyid rgyu yi kun gzhi dang / /sbyor ba 'dun pa'i kun gzhi dang / /snang ba don gyi kun gzhi dang / /'gyur ba med pa'i kun
gzhi dang / /btsal med gnas pa'i kun gzhi lnga/ /skabs lnga dag tu gnas 'gyur bas/ /sa yi khyad par bgrod pa yin/ /de yang gnyis kyi chos 'di dag /kun
kyang yongs kyi rnal 'byor dang / /'gro don gsum gyis 'gro ba ste/ /dag don dang ni sgrub pa po/ /rig 'dzin zhes ni rdzogs pa yin/ /des na rtsal gyis khyad par
gyis| |dang po las kyi rnal 'byor la/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chung ngu rnams/ /rang rang rtsa ba bor nas ni/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /sogs pa'i rnal
'byor chen po'i tshul/ /spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa/ /sbal bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang / /btsal ba'i yul ni chad pa yin/ /nor bu las kyi 'phang dmas
pa| |rang skal 'tsho ba'i ched bor nas/ /rgyal po thabs kyis 'phang mtho ba'i/ /longs spyod che la dmigs bcas kyang / /de dag mi 'thob 'tsho bral bzhin/ /skal
ldan can gyi don 'di dag /skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'/ /sna tshogs gter gyi khang pa dag /rgyal po'i mdzod du gyur pas na/ /spyod sgo 'jug pa thams cad
kyang / /dka' thub phyi nang khyad par gyis/ /rin chen sna rgu'i rim pa dag /so so'i las thabs mthong man gyis/ /yul de gcig las med na yang / /yig tshang sgo rgu so sor spyod//
rgyal por gyur na de kun la/ /dbang sgyur byed pa'i bdag po yin/ /mi gnas chos kyi dbyings nyid dag /blta ba'i yul du gyur pa na/ /rig pa rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/ /blta
yul gcig las med na yang / /so sor 'jug sgo kun nas spyod/ /dbyings kyi rang bzhin gcig pa la/ /rtsal 'phang mthong man khyad par gyis/ /skas kyi gdang bu rtsib ltar//
sa dang theg pa'i khyad par du/ /mtho dman rim par snang ba yin/ /mnyam par gyur ba'i gzhi gcig la/ /mthun dang mi mthun don gyis ni/ /dper na khang pa sgo mang bzhin//
sa dang theg pa so so'i sgo/ /mi mthun so sor snang ba yin/ /so so'i theg pa'i sgo rnams la/ /'jug pa la sogs ma sbyangs kyang / /kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bcad pas/ /gcig ste
tha dad yongs kyis med/ /de ni ri dang lhun po 'am/ /kun tu rgyu dang gzhon nu ltar/ /mthong thos ston pa'i khyad par ni/ /don gyis de ltar yod pa yin/ /des na chos rnams thams cad
kyi| |rtsa ba'i sems 'di yin pas na/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i dpes mtshon te/ /kun gyi rtsa ba shes par bya/ /'di ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /lam gyi thabs la mkhas pa
ste| |lam stor lam btsal lam rnyed pas/ /nye lam bde rnyed grub pa 'o/ /rnyed pa'i lam nyid gang zhe na/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa yin
te| |sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa'i phyir/ /sa yi khyad par bshad par bya/ /'di yi gnas 'dzin spyod pa'i sa/ /rnam pa bcu phrag gcig gis rdzogs/ /'gyur dbang ma
nges sa 'di la/ /bcos ma phra men spyod pa dang / /tshul rtags 'dzin dang mos pa dang / /dge la 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor lnga/ /'jug ldog ltung dang bcas pa yis/ /kun
tu 'khor zhing ma nges pa'o/ /'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bya/ /bsten pa gzhi yis 'di la/ /dang po'i las can rnal 'byor dang //
bslab ba sbyong dang nges pa la/ /dag dang ma dag gis sbyong pa'o/ /bka' sdod las kyi dang po pa/ /gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bshad/ /gal chen sbyong ba'i sa 'di la//
gnas shing spyod pa'i sa yin te/ /rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor nyid/ /dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kun/ /gcod sbyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis/ /legs nyes
stobs chen byed pa 'o/ /bslab pa rgyun gyis 'di la/ /g.yo dang thob dang brtan pa'i drod/ /de bzhin rtags chen g.yo ba dang / /thob pa nyid dang brtan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor
rnam pa drug po dag /bslab pa'i gnas bcu mthar 'byin cing / /ji ltar zla ba yang gsal bzhin/ /bslab pa'i ye shes 'phel 'gyur te/ /don la mi skrag ngo mtshar skye//
dpyod sems 'jug pa'i shes pa des/ /ngan song mi log dgon par 'jug /bar chad dag kyang de la byung / /gsang sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang / /spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal
'byor dang / /mtshan ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor gsum/ /gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bshad/ /bsod nams gter gyis 'di la/ /spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor nyid/ /mos
pa dag cing 'dun pa'i gnas/ /rtsal can blo yi bsti gnas sa/ /bslab pa'i mtha' bcu spyir chib pa'o/ /bsten pas khyad par 'gro 'di la/ /dbugs chen phyin pa'i rnal
'byor dang / /rigs chen 'dzin dang mnyam rdzogs me/ /nges par spyod dang rtsal chen sbyong / /yul la 'jug dang rig par sbyor/ /bdun nyid rdzogs par 'gro ba ste/ /bslab
pa'i rgyu 'bras 'di bcu la/ /goms par byed pa'i tshul du sbyor/ /ngal bso ba la thams cad mthong / /mi ldogs la goms char med/ /'di dag sbyor ba gzhi gcig kyang / /
so so thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /sgrib la sa zhes rtsi byed cing / /ye shes re re 'char ba 'o/ /des na bslab pa'i mtha' gcig la/ /mi ldog la sogs rdzogs chen rnams/ /mnyam
pa la bzhag re re la/ /ye shes re re 'char ba ste/ /tha ma rang byung nyid kyis rdzogs/ /mthar phyin pa dang thob pa dang / /mi ldog rnams la
rim pa bzhin/ /rmi lam dag dang sgra brnyan dang / /mngon sum nges pa ci rigs par/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje gral sko ba/ /rdo rje rdo rje che ge mo/ /zhes ni nyid dang sa khams dang / /
zhing khams kun tu bsgrags byas nas/ /rnal 'byor lung rab ston pa 'o/ /dmigs pas 'bras bu skye 'di la/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /nges par 'byung
ba'i rnal 'byor gsum/ /rgyal ba'i thugs las rgyal skyes shing / /rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tshob pa/ /khyad par rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing / /ting nge 'dzin gyi
sbyor ba 'o/ /gnas pas mi 'gyur sa 'di la/ /tshogs chen 'dus dang rtsal chen rdzogs/ /gsum du rdzogs par shes bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma yin/ /'khor los
sgyur ba'i rgyal chen po/ /mthong ba'i gnas nas bcu drug pa/ /rdzogs pa'i gnas na longs pa 'o/ /bdal ba chos nyid sa 'di la/ /rol pa rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang / /
bde ba che dang thig ler rdzogs/ /gsum nyid du ni rdzogs pa la/ /yul don ye shes de sbyar ba/ /shes par byas pas thams cad rdzogs/ /sgyu ma'ang sgyu ma yin spyod
la| |rdzogs pa spyir chibs 'di ni/ /bcu yi tha ma dang po las/ /mthar rdzogs kun gyi thog yin te/ /klong yangs nam mkha'i snying po la/ /sprin med nyi ma'i 'bum gyi bdal//
cir snang ci yang ma yin pa/ /mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo la/ /ji ltar bltas rgya der snang ba/ /theg mchog spyi rgya'i rlabs kyis bcad/ /de yang lta ba'i khyad par gyis/ /bdag nyid
chen po'i rnal 'byor dang / /lhun gyis grub dang klong yangs chub/ /gsum rdzogs rang byung bdal bya 'o/ /'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bgrod
par bya| |gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /don gyi rjes ni tshol 'dod na/ /tshig 'ga' thos pa tsam gyis ni/ /chog pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig /khyed kun rnal
'byor yin mod kyi/ /yang dag don la rnal mi 'byor/ /spyod par 'gyur bar byed mod kyi/ /yang dag don du yong ma gyur/ /chags sdang las la zhen mod kyi/ /dam pa'i
don la yong ma zhen/ /longs spyod rgya cher byed mod kyi/ /chos nyid don gyi ro mtshor/ /bdag med phyogs bral zer mod kyi/ /nyon mongs lnga dang yong ma bral/ /brtul
zhugs rtog pa chom mod kyang / /gzung 'dzin rtog pa yong ma chom/ /de bas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /thos pa tshig gi sgron ma yis/ /yang dag don gyi gser btsal
na| |rtog 'dod spre'u 'di bzung nas kyang / /rkun mo byi la btags byas te/ /gse khung skar khung kun dgag cing / /khang stong phang phung
bshig nas ni/ /rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye na/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas yin/ /yang dag don gyi lam tshol na/ /rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya/ /rtog pa rags
pa'i ri bo dang / /mtshan ma rgyu ba tshor ba dang / /byung tshor skyon lnga bsal bar bya/ /rtog pa la yang gnyis yod de/ /rags dang phra bar snang ba yin/ /de bzhin mtshan ma che
chung gnyis/ /rgyu ba ring po thung du gnyis/ /de bzhin tshor ba gsal mi gsal/ /byung tshor gnyis su snang ba yang / /myur ba dang ni bul ba 'o/ /'di ni don la sgrib pa yi//
rtog pa chen po'i gegs chen yin/ /ci phyir don de mi mthong phyir/ /mun pa dang ni 'khrigs pa dang / /kun tu 'thibs dang sprin phung dang / /na bun lta bur bsgribs pa yis/ /
yang dag mi gsal mthong mi 'gyur/ /'di yang bye brag gnyis gnyis te/ /mun pa mun nag chen po dang / /kun nas 'thibs pa lta bu dang / /kun tu 'khrigs dang bsgribs
pa dang / /'thibs pa chen po chung ngu gnyis/ /sprin chen 'thibs dang 'al 'ol dang / /na bun gtams dang ban bun gyis/ /gnas ngan gsum dang mi'i gnas dang / /
'dod khams bzhi yi lha gnas dang / /gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med khams/ /nyan thos rang rgyal gnas su ltung / /ltung bar 'gyur ba'i skyon chen ni/ /mtshan
ma'i g.yeng ba rnam drug yin/ /rang bzhin yul la g.yeng ba dang / /de bzhin phyi rol g.yeng ba dang / /nang mtshan ma yi g.yeng ba dang / /yid la byed dang gnas ngan
len| |'di dag rab tu bsal bar bya/ /bsal nas don la mnyam bzhag tshe/ /mnyam pa'i don la sgrib pa'i skyon/ /rnam pa lnga 'byung 'di lta ste/ /byung tshor dbang gis
g.yeng ba dang / /bying rmugs dbang gis 'thibs pa dang / /'dzin chags dbang gis 'gog pa dang / /ther zug dbang gis rtog pa dang / /phyal pa'i dbang gis med pa ste//
'di ni mnyam pa'i skyon yin no/ /skyon chen de dag glan pa'i chos/ /sems kyi lon 'di rgyal bas bshad/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rnam par mi rtog don tshol
na| |gcig pu dben pa'i sa bzung ste/ /tshad ma gsum dang ldan pa'i blos/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rjes bcad pa/ /yod med sngon thog ga las byung / /brtags pas rtog pa
rtas las byung / /rtog pa sgyu mar rab shes na/ /rtog pa'i ri bo zhi bar 'gyur/ /des ni gnas ngan gsum mi ltung / /rtog pa gang las byung zhe na/ /mtshan ma'i chos las byung
ba yin| |mtshan ma sgyu mar rab shes na/ /mtshan ma'i chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur/ /des ni 'dod khams tha mar min/ /mtshan ma gang
las byung zhe na/ /dran pa rgyu ba dag las byung / /dran pa skyon du shes gyur na/ /rgyu ba'i skyon rnams sel bar byed/ /mthu des 'dod khams gnyis par min/ /rgyu ba gang
las byung zhe na/ /tshor ba dag las byung ba yin/ /dag cing skye bar bya ba med/ /tshor ba sgyu mar shes gyur na/ /skyon gyi tshor ba sel bar byed/ /'dod khams gsum
par ltung mi 'gyur/ /tshor ba gang las byung zhe na/ /byung tshor phyi nang dag las byung / /dag cing skye bar bya ba med/ /de nyid skyon du shes gyur na/ /de ltar shes pa'i mthu
yis ni| |'dod khams bzhi par mi ltung ngo / /byung tshor gang las byung zhe na/ /sems kyi chos las byung ba ste/ /sems nyid sgyu mar rab shes na/ /sems kyi chos
rnams zhi bar 'gyur/ /phung po gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la/ /sems nyid smig rgyu lta bu yin/ /yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das/ /de ltar shes pa'i rnal
'byor pa/ /'dod khams lnga par ltung mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid yod pa'i dngos po 'am/ /med ces bya bar mi lta bar/ /mu stegs can du ltung mi 'gyur/ /bying
rmugs can du ma gyur pas/ /'du shes med par ltung mi 'gyur/ /'du shes rjes su ma 'brangs par/ /sems can gnas su de mi 'khor/ /kun gzhi'i don la goms
pas ni| |nyan thos gnas su de mi ltung / /stong zhing zhi bar mi byed pas/ /rang rgyal lta bar de mi ltung / /rnam dag stong par mi byed pas/ /byang chub spyod par ltung ma yin//
mnyam nyid stong pa'i don dag la/ /so so tha dad mi 'byed pas/ /sa yi rim par mi ltung zhing / /rim gyis spyang zhing 'phar ba med/ /yang dag don gyi rang bzhin ni/ /ci
la mi gnas mi len cing / /ci yang mi mthong thos pa med/ /cir yang mi byed byed dang bral/ /ci yang thos pa rdul tsam med/ /cir yang snang ba med pa de/ /de ni snang ba
dam pa yin/ /bsam du med pa'i chos nyid ni/ /bsam du med pas de bzhin gzhag /rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid la/ /sems kyi gyin da skad cig mas/ /mi g.yo rgyun
du dran par bya/ /de ltar don la mnyam bzhag na/ /rtags kyi tshor ba 'di ltar 'byung / /drod dang rtags dang cho 'phrul dang / /mngon shes dang ni ye shes 'byung / /drod ni
g.yo dang thob pa dang / /rtags ni byung dang brtan pa dang / /cho 'phrul byung dang rdzogs pa dang / /rig pa phra mo thams cad gsal/ /des ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin/ /
dper na mun pa sangs pa dang / /snang ba byung dang nam mkha' dang / /kun tu mthong dang thams cad gsal/ /de ltar shes pa'i mthu yis ni/ /
bag chags mun pa kun bsal te/ /ji ltar rlung gis sprin phyags ltar/ /skad cig tsam gyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /sgrib pa'i phung po 'phyag par 'gyur/ /ji ltar mar mes
mun bsal na/ /mun nyid snang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ /skad cig ma yi don rig pas/ /sngon nas bsags pa'i mun pa sel/ /de ltar rig pa'i skyes bu ni/ /don la
rig pa'i sgo bye zhing / /chos kyi mig dang de ldan pas/ /mthong thos tshig le'u tshig bzhir bsdebs/ /sa pa yin pas don la spyod/ /chos kyi mig dang mi ldan na/ /mu
mtha' yas pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /don gyi tha snyad ci brjod kyang / /nor ma nor gyi don mi dpog /tshig phyir blo 'brangs dmu rgod de/ /bslab pa'i sa dang lam pa yin//
tshig don 'bum phrag ci brjod kyang / /gzhan la ston par ma byed cig /bstan na rdo rje bka' rkun de/ /dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur/ /gang dag tshul 'chos mkhan
dag gi /don la blo shed ma bye bar/ /tshig dang yi ges khrid nas ni/ /mi shes bzhin du chos bstan na/ /sems can thams cad srog 'phrog pas/ /mi shes chos
ston de bas lci/ /de bas mnyam pa'i don 'di la/ /bstun te gcig car 'jug shes na/ /bsgom pa'i yun ni ring thung dang / /las 'phro yod dang med pa dang / /nam grub snyam
pa'i khar ma lus/ /mnyam pa'i don la mnyam bzhag na/ /de ma thag tu rig pa 'char/ /mnyam pa'i don las ma g.yos na/ /gzugs khams gnas su de mi ltung / /mnyam
pa nyid la ma chags na/ /gzugs med khams su ltung mi 'gyur/ /mnyam nyid mngon du gyur pas na/ /nyan thos gnas su de mi ltung / /ci yang med pa'i don mthong na/ /sangs rgyas
zhes ni de la bya/ /des na ting 'dzin khyad par 'di/ /rnal 'byor can gyis 'dris par bsgom/ /thams cad mi rtog skye med cing / /rtog pa'i mtha' spangs nam mkha'i dbyings/ /
ji bzhin mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid/ /mtshan ma'i rtog pa yul las 'das/ /yul med nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/ /snying rje chen po'i byang chub sems/ /nyi ma stong gi dkyil
'khor shar/ /mtshan ma'i chos rnams kun la khyab/ /nyi ma 'bar ba snying po las/ /'od zer yig 'bru'i mchog tu gsal/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i yi ge a/ /ci yang
'gyur ba'i rang bzhin las/ /sprul pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad 'byung / /de yang rtsal gyi khyad par las/ /dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang / /thos dang mthong ba la sogs te//
sems kyi yul dang nam mkha'i dbyings/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas par/ /rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur yi ge /yan lag yi ge so so yi/ /
rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig bcas/ /'phro 'du tshad kyang phyag rgya yi/ /tshom bu'i grangs kyang de bzhin no/ /'di ni dang po'i 'jug rim ste/ /mthar gyis 'dris shing goms byed
pa'o| |yi ge'i ye shes las bskrun te/ /don byed pa dang phyag rgyar bskyed/ /rgya mtsho gnon dang nam mkha'i skas/ /rlung bcing ba dang rgyun bzlog dang / /sreg pa'i bskal pa
gzhi la ba dang / /nyi zla zhon dang 'jig rten 'phang / /sa la 'dzul dang ri rab 'degs/ /stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul dang / /gzhig dang spar ba la sogs
te| |bsam bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /goms pa las su rung ba yi/ /rnal 'byor rtsal chen sbyong bar zad/ /bzlas pa'i mthar phyin grub pa dang / /bcing pa yongs su
rdzogs pa dang / /bsam pa las su rung ba dang / /don mthong ba dang tshig grub pa/ /bya ba yongs su dag pa dang / /don gcig yul la so sor snang / /des na ting 'dzin khyad
par yang / /dbyings nyid gcig la sgom mod kyi/ /rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/ /bsam pa'i yul ni sna tshogs te/ /dang po'i sa la gnas pa yi/ /brtsam pa las
kyi rnal 'byor pa/ /'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug pa/ /shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang dmas pas/ /ting 'dzin rtsal yang chung ba ste/ /don
la mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ /rang gis mos pa'i lha bsgoms na/ /lha yi sa bon gang yin pa/ /kha dog tshon gyis phyi nas ni/ /sna yi dbugs la rgyu byas te/ /dbugs kyi
yul du gyur tshod du/ /zung bsgril phar 'phrog gsal ba las/ /'phro 'du'i gnas su bskyed par bya/ /rang gi chag tshad dang sbyar ba'i/ /sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/ /
gnyis pa'i sa la gnas pa yi/ /bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor la/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi po/ /ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni/ /sa bon rang bzhin yi
ge la| |'od zer 'bar bar bcas pa de/ /dri byung yul ni tshun chad du/ /'phro 'du gsal bar bskyed pa las/ /rang gi chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'i/ /sku yi khyon yang de
tsam mo| |gsum pa'i sa la gnas pa yi/ /rnal 'byor lung gi bka' bsgo la/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam gsum pa/ /dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar 'dod/ /lha
yis bon gang yin pa/ /rang bzhin yi ger bsgyur byas te/ /'od zer 'bar dang bcas pa yi/ /thos pa'i yul ni tshun chad du/ /'phro 'du gsal bar byas pa las/ /rang
gi chag tshad bzhi bsgyur tsam/ /sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rim pa bzhin/ /lha yi khyad par gang yin pa/ /yi ge'i
rim pa bzhin byas nas/ /'phro 'du'i tshad kyang de bzhin te/ /rim pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang / /'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang / /sems kyis lcogs tshad tshun chad du//
sku yi khyon gyi khyad par yang / /chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pas/ /sku yi khyon gyis gang bar bsgom/ /gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /yi ge'i rjes su
don dpags na/ /yi ges don rnams ston par 'gyur/ /ci phyir don nyid yi ger snang / /dbyings las a byung a las ni/ /yi ge'i tshogs byung sna tshogs 'phros/ /sa ni
rang bzhin yi ge ste/ /rten dang bral bas rgyu rkyen med/ /kun la khyab pas nam mkha' 'dra/ /ya ni chos nyid cho 'phrul te/ /chos nyid zab mo'i ngang las ni/ /cho 'phrul yi
ge a byung bas/ /as ni chos nyid mtshon par byed/ /a las yig 'bru'i tshogs 'phros te/ /tshig tshogs bstan pa rgya mtshor grags/ /yi ge'i sgra skad kun bzung
ste| |sna tshogs yi ge'i skad du bsgyur/ /yig 'bru'i yan lag mang po rnams/ /rang bzhin a yi ngang du 'dus/ /thugs kyi klong nas a byung bas/ /a yi 'od zer 'phro
'du las/ /mgur gyi gsang bar shar ba las/ /gsung sgra yi ge lngar 'phros pa/ /a ka kha ga g+ha nga / de nas a yi 'od zer de/ /ljags kyi zla gam pad+mor 'phros/ /ljags kyi
mthil du 'khyil ba las/ /'od zer yig 'bru lngar shar ba/ /tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ de nas a yi 'od zer de/ /ljags kyi rtse la 'phros pa las/ /'od zer yig 'bru bcur shar ba/ /
Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ de nas a yi 'od zer de/ /zhal gyi sgo nas 'phros pa las/ /cho 'phrul yi ge lngar shar ba/ /pa pha ba b+ha ma/ de nas a yi 'od zer de/ /phyi rol
yul du 'phros pa las/ /cho 'phrul yi ge sna tshogs 'phros/ /ya war la/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ i I u U ai ai o au aM aH/ a las cho 'phrul 'od 'phros pas/ /yi
ge'i phreng ba tshogs byung ste/ /yi ge'i yan lag ye shes la/ /sangs rgyas sku yi sa bon byung / /dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/ /sku dang gsung thugs sprul pa'i tshogs/
phyag rgya sna tshogs mdzes par snang / /des na yi ge'i rang bzhin ni/ /rgyal ba'i sku nyid yin par bshad/ /a ni thugs kyi sa bon te/ /ka la sogs pa dang po lnga/ /mgur gyi gsang
ba'i rang bzhin yin/ /gnyis pa tsa la sogs pa lnga/ /zla gam ljags kyi rang bzhin yin/ /gsum pa Ta la sogs pa bcu/ /ljags kyi rtse mo'i rang bzhin yin/ /bzhi pa
pa la sogs pa lnga/ /zhal gyi sgros las byung bar bshad/ /lnga pa ya la sogs pa yi/ /bcu tshan gnyis kyi yi ge dag /sku las 'phros
par rab tu bshad/ /zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od zer las/ /sgrib pa sreg pa'i yig 'bru hwa/ /gsang ba'i mkha' yi 'od zer las/ /cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i yig 'bru
k+Sha| |sku yi khrun tshad lte ba las/ /'dod pa 'byung ba'i yig 'bru hwa/ /thugs kar 'khyil ba'i dpal be'u las/ /mtshan ma dag pa'i yig 'bru sha /phyag gi 'khor lo'i
'od zer las/ /cho 'phrul ston pa'i yig 'bru shu/ /skyes bu chen po'i dpung pa las/ /rtog pa 'joms pa'i yig 'bru la/ /skyes bu chen po'i sta zur las/ /'dod chags
sreg pa'i yi ge ra/ /skyes bu chen po'i dku skabs las/ /gti mug sel ba'i yi ge wa/ /skyes bu chen po'i byin pa las/ /'khor ba gnon pa'i yig 'brum/ /skyes bu
chen po'i spyan gnyis las/ /rang bzhin yi ge i gnyis shar/ /skyes bu chen po'i snyan gnyis las/ /rang bzhin yi ge u gnyis shar/ /skyes bu chen po'i shangs
gnyis las/ /rang bzhin yi ge e gnyis shar/ /skyes bu chen po'i tshems gnyis las/ /rang bzhin yi ge o gnyis shar/ /skyes bu chen po'i spyi gtsug nas/ /rgyal
ba'i sa bon aM du shar/ /des na yig 'bru'i yan lag kun/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku gsung thugs/ /oM ni sku yi rang bzhin te/ /AHni thugs kyi mtshan nyid do/ /yi ge'i
phreng ba mang po kun/ /gsung brjod gsung gi rang bzhin no/ /AHni chos sku'i rang bzhin te/ /oM ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /yig 'bru 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams/ /sprul pa
'dren pa'i sku zhes bshad/ /a ni chos kyi dbyings yin te/ /oM ni rig pa'i ye shes yin/ /yig 'bru 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams/ /chos dang chos nyid rang bzhin yin/ /a ni
brjod pa'i rgyu yin te/ /oM ni tshig tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /tshig gi tshogs nyid yi ge yin/ /yi ge ring ba'i tshig gi mdzod/ /yi ge 'od zer 'bar 'phros pas/ /chos dang chos
ma yin pa rnams/ /ngag gi dbang po kha phye ste/ /don dang tshig tu rgyas par 'gyur/ /sgra skad kun gyis bsdus pa'i tshogs/ /yig 'bru phreng ba'i ngang du rdzogs/ /tshig dang yig
'bru thams cad kun/ /oM gyi rang bzhin ngang du rdzogs/ /oM gyi cho 'phrul thams cad kun/ /a yi rang bzhin dbyings su zhu/ /a ni yig 'bru kun gyi gter/ /a ni chos kyi dbyings
su thim| |des na rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje de/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis khyad par gyis/ /cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang snang / /sa dang nam mkha' me dang
rlung / /chu la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /'dul ba'i 'gro ba de rnams la/ /sa dang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i/ /chu dang rlung gi ngo bor
snang / /gang dag sku yis 'dul ba'i tshe/ /sku dang gzugs brnyan ring bsrel dang / /rten la sogs pa tha dad par/ /'jig rten kun tu ston par 'gyur/ /gsung gis
'dul ba'i dus byung na/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu la/ /sogs pa'i sgra skad sna tshogs dang / /yi ge'i gzugs su bstan nas ni/ /'khor ba'i khams su snang
bar byed/ /ci'i phyir zhen yi ge ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin yin pas na/ /thabs kyi bye
brag sna tshogs kyis/ /thams cad grol bar mdzad pa 'o/ /de bzhin yi ge'i tshogs 'di yang / /yan lag sbyor sdud sna tshogs kyis/ /thams cad tshig tu go bar byed//
yi ge rang bzhin ye shes ni/ /so so'i don rnams bshad par bya/ /a ni ma skyes ye shes yin/ /rang bzhin thams cad stong par ston/ /ka ni bya ba'i ye shes de/ /lam
gyis thams cad grol bar ston/ /kha ni khyab par byed pa'i sgo/ /mi dmigs thams cad grol bar ston/ /ga ni don du gyur ba'i sgo/ /yul med thams cad grol bar ston//
g+ha ni gnas pa'i sgo yin te/ /gcig tu ma nges grol bar ston/ /nga ni 'dzin pa med pa'i sgo/ /'dzin bral thams cad grol bar ston/ /tsa ni 'gag pa med pa'i sgo/ /cir yang
snang bas thams cad 'grol/ /tsha ni 'da' ba med pa'i sgo/ /'bral ba med pas thams cad 'grol/ /dza ni ma byung ba yi sgo/ /mi gnas pas ni thams cad grol/ /dz+ha ni rnyog
ma bral ba'i sgo/ /dri ma dag pas thams cad grol/ /nya ni spyod dang bral ba'i sgo/ /bya ba med pas thams cad grol/ /Ta ni nga rgyal med pa'i sgo/ /ri bo med pas thams
cad grol/ /Tha ni sgyu rtsal med pa'i sgo/ /byed pa med pas thams cad grol/ /Da ni 'dres pa med pa'i sgo/ /rtsod pa med pas thams cad grol/ /D+ha ni slu ba med pa'i sgo/ /sgyu
ma thams cad grol bar byed/ /Na ni yul dang bral ba'i sgo/ /'dzin pa med pas thams cad grol/ /ta ni tha snyad med pa'i sgo/ /brjod pa med pas thams cad grol/ /
tha ni rten dang bral ba'i sgo/ /gnas pa med pas thams cad grol/ /da ni stong dang bral ba'i sgo/ /len pa med pas thams cad grol/ /d+ha ni rang bzhin med pa'i sgo/ /mtshan
nyid med pas thams cad grol/ /na ni yul dang bral ba'i sgo/ /'dzin pa med pas thams cad grol/ /pa ni nges par 'byung ba'i sgo/ /'gag pa med pas thams cad
grol| |pha ni dngos po med pa'i sgo/ /ci yang med pas thams cad grol/ /ba ni brjod pa med pa'i sgo/ /brjod pa med pas thams cad
grol| |b+ha ni rdul dang bral ba'i sgo/ /rtog pa med pas thams cad grol/ /ma ni chags pa med pa'i sgo/ /rtog pa med pas thams cad grol/ /ya ni chags pa med
pa'i sgo| |gos pa med pas thams cad grol/ /wa ni rgyu rkyen med pa'i sgo/ /'bras bu med pas thams cad grol/ /ra ni rkyen dang bral ba'i sgo/ /dor ba med pas thams
cad grol/ /la ni blang ba med pa'i sgo/ /yon tan med pas thams cad grol/ /sha ni spros pa med pa'i sgo/ /zhi bas thams cad grol bar byed/ /Sha ni khur dang bral
ba'i sgo| |lci ba med pas thams cad grol/ /sa ni yang dag gsang ba'i sgo/ /nges pas thams cad grol ba dang / /ha ni rgyu dang bral ba'i sgo/ /rkyen dang bral bas grol
bar byed/ /a ni khams dang bral ba'i sgo/ /mtshan nyid med pas grol bar byed/ /i ni mthong ba med pa'i sgo/ /gzugs dang bral bas thams cad grol/ /u ni
thos pa med pa'i sgo/ /sgra dang bral bas thams cad grol/ /e ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo/ /dri dang bral bas grol bar byed/ /o ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo/ /rig dang bral
bas thams cad grol/ /aM ni cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i sgo/ /cir yang snang bas thams cad grol/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos/ /yod
mthong snang grags chos thams cad/ /yi ge'i tshogs su mngon sangs rgyas/ /yi ger ma gyur gang yang med/ /chos nyid snying po'i
nyi ma la| |'od zer yig 'bru'i tshogs su 'bar/ /chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu la/ /yig 'bru sna tshogs phra bkod pa/ /dus gsum
rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /nyi ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer las/ /'od kyis 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'bar/ /yi ge hUM gi 'od 'phros pas/ /
rdo rje snying po'i sa bon zhes/ /rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du grags/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer rin chen las/ /yig 'bru 'od kyi swa 'phros pas/ /rin chen
snying po'i sa bon zhes/ /rin chen rigs kyi zhing du grags/ /nyi ma pad+mo 'bar 'phros pas/ /cho 'phrul yi ge'i aM du 'bar/ /pad+ma rigs kyi
zhing du grags/ /sna tshogs nyi ma'i 'od 'phros pas/ /cho 'phrul yi ge har gsal bas/ /sna tshogs snying po'i sa bon te/ /las kyi rigs kyi zhing du grags/ /dus gsum rgyal
ba thams cad kyi/ /thugs ni rdo rje ye shes yin/ /ye shes dam pas sprul pa yi/ /rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la/ /rdo rje rigs zhes bya bar
bshad| |yon tan ye shes rin chen yin/ /rin chen de las sprul pa yi/ /rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la/ /drin chen rigs zhes bya bar bshad/ /gsung gi ye shes
pad+ma ste| |pad+mo ye shes las sprul pa'i/ /rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la/ /pad+ma rigs kyi zhing du grags/ /'phrin las bya ba sna tshogs te/ /sna tshogs ye shes sprul pa
yi| |rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la/ /las kyi rigs zhes bya bar bshad/ /sku ni ma bcos de bzhin nyid/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la/ /sprul pa rgyal ba dpag med
la| |de bzhin rigs zhes bya bar bshad/ /de bas rigs kyi gtan tshigs ni/ /ma bcos sku ni de bzhin nyid/ /mi 'gyur rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs/ /yon tan kun
'byung rin chen rigs/ /chags med gsung gi pad+mo'i rigs/ /bya ba byed pa las kyi rigs/ /sku yi sprul pa thams cad ni/ /de bzhin rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin/ /
thugs las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /rdo rje rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin/ /yon tan yul gyi sangs rgyas rnams/ /rin chen rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin/ /gsung
las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /pad+ma rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin/ /mdzad pa sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /'phrin las rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin/ /ci phyir rigs zhes
bya zhen| |dang po de las byung ba dang / /bar du de yi bya ba byed/ /tha mar de yi rgyu 'dzin phyir/ /de phyir rigs zhes grags pa yin/ /dper na me dang chu dag dang / /nam mkha'
dang ni sa dag la/ /gnas pa'i sems can mtha' dag kun/ /gnas rgyud nyid kyi ming 'dzin te/ /me la gnas pa'i sems can la/ /me yi yi dwags ma zhes zer/ /chu la
gnas pa'i sems can la/ /chu srin twa ra na zhes zer/ /ci'i phyir lnga zhes bya zhe na/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang / /mdzad pa 'phrin
las nyid dang lnga/ /rig pa lnga dang lnga nyid du/ /thams cad kun tu gsal bar snang / /des na lnga zhes nges par bshad/ /ci'i phyir zhe na sangs rgyas kun/ /lnga po de las ma
gtogs pa/ /gzhan las byung zhing gzhan na med/ /sangs rgyas mtshan gyi khyad par yang / /mtshan med pa las mtshan btags pa/ /thams cad lnga po nyid las btags/
mtshan gyi bye brag thams cad kun/ /tha snyad tsam du gdags par zad/ /rigs med pa las rigs smos pa/ /'dul ba'i dbang du lngar snang yang / /dran pa'i don de dngos gzhi
med| |ci yang med las ci snang ba/ /mkha' la 'ja' tshon byung ba 'dra/ /chos kun nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes/ /gsang ba mchog
gi bdag por bshad/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa yin/ /sangs rgyas med cing sems can med/ /'khor ba med cing chos nyid med/ /dmigs pa med
de mi dmigs med/ /de ltar shes pa mkhas pa yin/ /rig dang ma rig tshul gcig ste/ /de ltar shes pa rgyal ba yin/ /sems can rang bzhin sangs
rgyas nyid/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sems can de/ /sems can sangs rgyas gcig pa yin/ /de ltar shes pa'i rgyal ba'i sras/ /byang chub phyir ni gang ma
brnyes| |ma brnyes gang yang de ma brnyes/ /brnyes pa med pa'i don mthong na/ /de ni brnyes pa'i mchog yin no/ /gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /
lam gyi ngo bo tshol 'dod na/ /lam gyi rtags nyid dpes mtshon te/ /lam gyi don la goms par bya/ /mi gnas mig ldan sgron ma yis/ /lam gyi rgyu la mkhas
par bya| |bag chags rtogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams/ /sna tshogs dngos por snang mod kyang / /nam mkha' dag la smig rgyu 'dra/ /de yang gtan tshigs nges pa
yi| |dpe yis mtshon te rtogs bya na/ /mkha' la sprin phung 'ja' tshon dang / /char la sogs pa'i rgyun snang yang / /nam mkha'i cho 'phrul gcig tu zad/ /rtag tu de ltar
snang ba min/ /dper na sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yang / /slu zhing 'drid pa cir snang yang / /sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa snang bar zad/ /rtag tu de ltar snang ba bzhin/ /dper na rdo yi
dngos po yang / /sra zhing mkhregs pa'i dngos po yang / /btags sam phye mar byas nas kyang / /rlung gi mthu yis gtor byas na/ /de la rang bzhin ga la yod/ /dper
na me yi rang bzhin dag /tshang tshing sbar sbur kun bsreg cing / /'bar 'phro snang gsal mched byed na/ /chu yi mthu yis brlag 'gyur na/ /de la rang bzhin ga la yod/ /
dper na rdzas kyi dngos po yang / /me yi mthu yis bsreg 'gyur na/ /de la rang bzhin ga la yod/ /shes pas zin pa'i sems can rnams/ /gzugs dang dran pa sna tshogs
kyi| |dbang po la sogs mdzes gyur kyang / /phung po mi rtag shi 'phos na/ /dngos po brtan par mi 'gyur te/ /gzugs rnams so sor zhig nas ni/ /rus pa dag kyang mi snang
ste| |zhig dang rul la sogs pa yis/ /tha mar ci yang mi snang 'gyur/ /ri bo chen po la sogs pa/ /dngos po brtan g.yo'i 'jig rten rnams/ /bsreg pa'i bskal pa
la sogs pa/ /bskal pa gsum gyis brlags byas na/ /de la rang bzhin ga la yod/ /des na dngos po'i chos rnams kun/ /dngos
por brtags pa ma yin pas/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med par shes/ /'di ni rnal 'byor lam gyi mchog /'dus pa'i tshogs rnams goms par gyis/ /zhes sems
dpa'i rdo rje smra ba'i seng+ges rnal 'byor mchog gi lam gsungs pa'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug
pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de'i byin gyis rlabs las zhing khams thams cad g.yos par gyur te/ don yongs su rdzogs pa'i snga ltas byung bar gyur to/ /'khor
der 'dus par gyur pa rnams la la ni/ nyi zla'i steng na gnas shing chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la lding bar gyur to/ /la la ni/ ri rab rgyang mar 'phen/ la la ni/
stong gsum chen po'i khams 'phen par gyur to/ /la la ni/ chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong bar gyur to/ /la la ni/ seng+ge'i khri la 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas
sems dpa'i rdo rje cho 'phrul gyi ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis shin tu ngo mtshar che bar gyur nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de la rnal 'byor gyis phyag
lus kun tu sa la brdabs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems dpa' chen po/ cho 'phrul rgya cher gda' ba 'di don ji lta bu lags/ rtags ci lta bu lags/ bdag
cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las/ smra ba'i seng+ge chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ 'di dag ni/ don yongs su
rdzogs pa'i ltas chen po yin te/ snga ltas kyi mtshan ma 'di dang sbyar na/ 'dus pa chen po rnams sa nas sar shin tu 'phar zhing yang dag nges pa'i don mthong ba'i
snga ltas yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa las/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ sa non pa'i snga ltas ni/ ji lta bu lags/ don mthong
ba'i snga ltas ni/ /ji lta bu lags/ bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las/ sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i
tshogs| legs so/ /khyod kyis zhus pa'i don rgya cher bshad par bya'o/ /rna ba lhogs la gus par nyon cig /sgrub pa don gyi rnal 'byor pa/ /rnal 'byor don
la sbyor ba'i tshe/ /spyad pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis/ /khams dang sa ni gar 'gro ba/ /mdo don tshul lngas lung bstan no/ /nges
ba'i snga ltas byung ba yi/ /'bras bu don gyi khyad par yang / /cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston par nus/ /de nas yang dag bden pa 'thob/ /nges pa'i snga ltas rnam pa
lnga| |rgyu yi dus na 'byung ba ni/ /tshig gi brjod pa 'di lta ste/ /blo rtsal las kyi khyad par yang / /snang ba lus kyi snga ltas dang / /ngo mtshar rdzas rnyed tshul rtags
dang / /mtshan ma pra yi rmi ltas dang / /'dun pa mang po'i snga ltas kyis/ /'bras bu gang dang gang 'grub pa/ /mtshan ma gsal bar rgyud las 'byung / /dper na
me yi snga ltas ni/ /du ba'i mtshan ma rgyas par 'byung / /du ba gar byung gnas de na/ /me nyid yod par nges pa yin/ /de bzhin chu yi snga ltas kyang / /rlangs
dang sngabs dang srog chags 'byung / /de na chu nyid yod par nges/ /rlung gi ltas kyang 'di lta ste/ /sprin rnams rgyug cing dum bur 'chad/ /des na rlung chen 'byung
bar nges/ /rtsi ma tshal lo ma gang byung ba/ /de na gser khung yod pa ltar/ /snga ltas mtshan ma 'di dag gis/ /'bras bu mthon dman gar 'gyur pa/ /rgyu la
mkhas par byas nas ni/ /mtshan ma ci byung de la sbyar/ /bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi/ /srog la bab kyang mi lta bar/ /rnal 'byor yul la 'jug pa dang / /ting
'dzin rig pa'i rtsal sprugs pa/ /gnyen po kun bsten sa sbyangs nas/ /rnal 'byor sa la brtson par bya/ /'dis ni gdon mi za ba dang / /la la the tshom mi skye zhing / /ma
nges la zhugs the tshom med/ /dper na 'jig rten byis pa dag /yun ring ma la skyo ba ltar/ /snga ltas byung ba'i sgra thos na/ /shin tu brod pas mdun bsu ltar/ /ltas
chen byung ba'i brod tshul gyi/ /shin tu brtson pas bde thob 'gyur/ /de bas snga ltas mtshan ma rnams/ /shes nas brtson par 'bad pa'i rigs/ /blo rtsal las kyi
khyad par gyis/ /ting 'dzin drod kyi snga ltas 'byung / /yang dag bden pa'i don bstan na/ /mi skrag mi dang dga' ba skye/ /yang dag don la nges bltas na/ /'khor ba'i
chos la skyo ba skye/ /yang dag don la 'dris pa dang / /rnam grangs chos la dad mi 'gyur/ /yang dag don nyid mthong ba dang / /tshig la dga' ba mi skye zhing / /don nyid
nye bar 'dzin par byed/ /don mthong ba dang ye shes skye/ /ye shes skyes par gyur pa dang / /dngos por snang ba thams cad kun/ /sgyu ma bzhin du shes par 'gyur/ /
sgyu ma tsam du shes pa la/ /brten nas chos nyid don bltas na/ /snang ba med pa'i don nyid ni/ /snang ba med par mthong bar 'gyur/ /
snang med srid pa mthong ba'i tshe/ /cho 'phrul rgyu ba thams cad 'byung / /de nyid bden pa'i snga ltas so/ /de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /rdul phran 'dra ba'i mtshan
ma 'byung / /de ni g.yo ba'i snga ltas so/ /de nas smig rgyu lta bur 'byung / /dang po'i drod ces bya bar bshad/ /de nas mtsho yi rlabs ltar 'byung / /bar gyi drod
ces bya bar bshad/ /de nas rlung chen lta bur yang / /thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /tha ma'i drod ces bya bar bshad/ /de nas yig 'bru'i drod
spros pas/ /char chen 'bab pa lta bur 'byung / /de ni thob pa'i drod ces bya/ /de nas mkha' la sprin lding bzhin/ /ting 'dzin rtsa 'phang mtho bar 'gyur/ /de ni
shin tu brtan pa'i drod/ /de nas ta la gcig tsam du/ /bdag gi lus ni dbang med par/ /mkha' la 'phar zhing 'phags par rtsol/ /'di ni shin tu gsal
ba'i drod/ /de nas sa chen g.yo ba ltar/ /shin tu yam yom mar mer 'byung / /'di ni dang po'i rtags zhes bya/ /de nas ting 'dzin rtsal sbyangs na/ /ji ltar
dmigs pa der 'grub ste/ /me yi skye mched der bsgoms na/ /me yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur/ /chu yi skye mched der bsgoms na/ /chu yi skye mched nyid du 'gyur/ /
rlung gi skye mched der bsgoms na/ /rlung gi skye mched nyid du 'gyur/ /yig 'bru'i skye mched der bsgoms na/ /yig 'bru gang ltar gsal bar 'gyur/ /de ltar rdzas
kyi skye mched du/ /gang ltar bsgoms pa de ltar 'gyur/ /de ni rtags chen thob pa yin/ /blo yi ting 'dzin rtsal rdzogs na/ /ngag gi bden pa'i rtsal 'byung ste/ /sreg
pa'i me chen mthong ba na/ /zhi bar gyur cig byas pa yis/ /de nyid du ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /chu rlung gnod pa'i rgyun byung na/ /chad par gyur cig brjod pa yis/ /de nyid du
ni 'chad par 'gyur/ /rlung chen gnod pa'i rgyun byung na/ /zhi bar gyur cig brjod pa yis/ /de nyid du ni chad par 'gyur/ /nad pa'i tshogs ni mthong ba na/ /gang nan
ba'i dmigs der ni/ /sel gol gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang / /nad rnams zhi bar gyur ces brjod/ /nad kyi tshogs rnams zhi bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin ngag gis
brjod byas pa/ /thams cad ma lus grub par 'gyur/ /ngag gi bden pa'i rtsal rdzogs na/ /lus kyi drod la rtsal 'byung ste/ /gnyid kyi rtog pa choms pa dang / /lus
kyi bzod pa thob pa ni/ /'di ni dang po'i drod yin no/ /kham gyi zas dang bral ba dang / /mdangs dang dbang po gsal gyur pa/ /'di
ni gnyis pa'i drod ces bya/ /shing bal lta bur yang ba dang / /khams bde mi bde mi 'byung zhing / /nad kyi tshogs dang bral gyur pa/ /'di ni drod chen bstan pa
yin| |kham kyi zas la ma bsten yang / /dbang po gzi mdangs shin tu gsal/ /'di ni ting 'dzin ro tshor rtags/ /gzhan yang lus kyi snga ltas ni/ /mnyam
pa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /khru gang tsam du 'phar ba dang / /ta la gang tsam bar du 'gro/ /'di yang ltas chen rtags yin no/ /gzhan yang snang ba'i nam
mkha' la/ /gom pas bgrod de 'gro ba dang / /chu la mi 'bying sa la 'dzul/ /me yis mi 'tshig rlung bcings pa/ /'di yang snga ltas chen po yin/ /lus kyi bden
pa'i rtsal rdzogs na/ /mthu yi rtsal yang 'byung ba ste/ /mthu yi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab/ /gal te dgos sam 'dod pa na/ /sa 'am rdo 'am bye ma dag /gser
dang dngul la sogs par bsgyur/ /skams dag la chu 'byin cing / /sol ba dag la ljon shing 'byung / /de la sogs pa'i dgos pa rnams/ /ji ltar 'dod pa de
ltar 'grub/ /spyod pa'i mthu dang rtsal rdzogs na/ /'byor ba'i yon tan rdzogs 'gyur te/ /yid du 'ong ba'i nor 'byung zhing / /'dod pas bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ /
rdzas kyi mchog tu gyur pa yi/ /ngo mtshar can du rnyed par 'gyur/ /de dag rung ba'i snga ltas so/ /'gro gang 'du ba'i snga ltas kyang / /kun gyis bkur zhing dga' ba dang //
kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /thams cad 'dul zhing thams cad la/ /dbang sgyur byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /de dag snga ltas chen po yin/ /mtshan ma pra yi
rmi ltas kyang / /shing tu rgya cher 'byung ba ste/ /rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis/ /bag chags byang ba'i snga ltas kyang / /rtag par gcer bur 'byung ba dang / /khrus
chen rtag tu byed pa dang / /dri ma'i tshogs rnams dag pa dang / /chu bo dag la rgal ba dang / /mtsho chu dag la brkyal ba dang / /char gyi rgyun gyis 'khru ba dang / /gzhan
gyis bum pa gang ba'i chus/ /bdag gis lus la ldugs pa dang / /me dpung chen pos bsreg pa dang / /shin tu mthon po'i rtse dag las/ /rlung gis shin tu g.yeng
zhing 'thor/ /'di dag bag chags byang ba'i ltas/ /'jigs dang bral ba'i snga ltas ni/ /g.yul 'gyed pa las slar log dang / /nad las thar te sos pa dang //
btson ra dag las thar pa dang / /gshed ma'i lag nas shor ba dang / /gcan gzan nang nas bros pa dang / /dug nad dag las sos
pa dang / /bcings pa dag las grol ba dang / /thag pa bcad par gyur pa rnams/ /mtshan ma bzang po'i snga ltas yin/ /sa rnams thob pa'i snga ltas ni/ /khri rkang
dag la 'dzeg pa dang / /phal pa'i skas la 'dzeg pa dang / /ljon shing dag la 'dzeg pa dang / /gyen du shin tu 'gro ba dang / /ri bo'i rtse la 'dzeg pa dang / /rin
chen skas la 'dzeg pa dang / /mchod rten dag la 'dzeg pa dang / /nam mkha'i skas la 'dzeg pa rnams/ /'di dag don gyi snga ltas yin/ /sa rnams non
pa'i snga ltas kyang / /khri mthon steng na 'dug pa dang / /glang po che la zhon pa dang / /seng+ge dag la zhon pa dang / /khyung chen lding la zhon pa dang / /mchod rten kha la
phyin pa dang / /ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang / /nam mkha'i dbyings na 'dug pa dang / /lus la sprin phung 'byung ba dang / /zla ba'i steng na 'dug pa dang / /nyi ma'i
steng na 'dug pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor sa la gnas pa'i rtags/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi snga ltas ni/ /rgyal po'i bka' la btags pa dang / /bka' yi dbang
por bskos pa dang / /gzhan la dbang sgyur byed pa dang / /'jig rten skos la 'bebs pa dang / /gzhan gyi sde pa dbang sdud dang / /g.yul chen dag las rgyal ba dang //
bdag nyid rgyal por gyur pa dang / /mgo la me tog skyes pa rnams/ /rgyal po'i sras su gyur pa'i ltas/ /chos la dbang thob snga ltas ni/ /glegs bam zab mo rnyed pa dang //
de bzhin 'dri ba mang po dang / /de dag la ni dpyod pa dang / /gzhan la 'chad cing ston pa dang / /don nyid gtan la 'bebs pa dang / /me long dag la lta ba dang / /
shel gyi bum pa gang ba la/ /blta zhing brtags te 'thung ba dang / /rin che nor bu thu ba dang / /'khor lo lag tu babs pa dang / /nyi zla lag pas zin pa dang / /ri rab
klad la bskor ba rnams/ /chos la dbang thob snga ltas so/ /bden pa mthong ba'i snga ltas kyang / /sngon ma mthong gi yul mthong dang / /stong gsum rgya cher mthong ba
dang / /gling rnams gzhan du phyin pa dang / /ri rab kha la phyin pa dang / /nam mkha' rgya cher mthong ba dang / /rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin pa dang / /lag na sgron me thogs
ba dang / /nyi ma'i snying po lta ba dang / /snang srid dpyod pa byed pa rnams/ /chos la dbang thob ltas chen yin/ /lung bstan thob pa'i snga ltas ni/ /rol mo'i sgra rnams
thos pa dang / /'brug gi sgra ni grags pa dang / /seng+ge'i nga ro grags pa dang / /chos kyi sgra yi gtam thos dang / /gzugs brnyan zhal
ni 'dzum pa dang / /sangs rgyas gsung thos sku mi mthong / /lha mo glu dbyangs sgrog pa dang / /gzhal yas dag la sgra 'byung dang / /grogs po grogs po zhes brjod
cing / /chos kyi bgro ba byed pa rnams/ /lung bstan 'byung ba'i snga ltas so/ /de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams/ /ltas chen kun tu snang ba dang / /gang zag las
kyi dang po rnams/ /rig 'dzin so so'i sa pa ni/ /'gyur ba'i snga ltas bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor las kyi dang po la/ /ltas chen 'di dag gang byung yang / /'khor
ba'i 'du 'dzi kun bsal nas/ /don la rtog cing sa rnams sbyong / /des ni don la reg par 'gyur/ /don la reg pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /rig 'dzin rdo rjer
lhun gyis grub/ /rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa dang / /sa la rtsal chen sbyong ba'i tshe/ /rtsal gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung / /nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba dang / /ri rab
rked nas gsor ba dang / /'jig rten rgyang mar 'phangs pa dang / /sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba la/ /sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kun/ /khyad par rtsal gyis
ston par nus/ /de la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi na cho 'phrul yin/ /rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni/ /'dul ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la/ /so so'i
skad dang chos mthun par/ /'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogs su/ /so so'i skad du ston par nus/ /de dag rjes su bstan pa yin/ /chos kyi sgo rnams snang ba yi/ /nges
pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/ /ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/ /'jig rten khams rnams g.yos nas kyang / /thams cad ngo mtshar skye 'gyur te/ /sems kyi
bsam pa rangs byas nas/ /so so dga' ba'i ro myong 'gyur/ /chos rnams snang ba'i cho 'phrul yin/ /kun nas kun tu brjod pa ni/ /gsang ba'i yi ge'i phreng ba las//
rdzu 'phrul chos kyi sgra sgrog pas/ /mthong yod snang grags chos rnams kun/ /kun kyang sngags kyi sgrar grags pas/ /sngags su ma gyur gang yang med/ /des na
rtsal gyi khyad par la/ /sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung / /zhes smra ba'i seng+ge chen po sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa
kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig
gsang ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa'i rnal
'byor chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa' chen po/ khyod nyid ni/ dam tshig chen po'i bdag nyid du bdag cag rnams
kyis mthong ngo / /de skad ces gsol pa dang / sems dpa' chen po des bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ chos thams cad kyi srog ni/ dam
tshig yin par shes par gyis shig /de nas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems dpa' chen po/ dam
tshig mchog gi gsang ba rnams bdag cag rnams thos par 'tshal/ thos nas kyang rtogs par 'tshal/ rtogs nas kyang de la gnas par 'tshal na/ sems
dpa' chen pos rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ dam tshig
rnams 'di lta ste/ shin tu gsal ba'i dam tshig ni/ /snod ma yin par gyur pa las/ /phyi nang gsang ba gsum dag tu/ /spa ba'i thabs su spyad nas kyang / /gsang
ba'i chos rnams gsang bar bya/ /bstan pa'i gnas min snod ngan dag /rnam pa bzhis bsdus bye brag rnams/ /ma 'ongs rnal 'byor bcud can gyis/ /shes nas
spang bar bya phyir bshad/ /'jig rten pa dang theg dman dang / /mu stegs log lta'i lta la dga'/ /dad med blo zhan g.yeng rmugs shing / /bslab nyan mi brtson byol
song mtshungs/ /dad log dam nyams don las gol/ /byang chub thag pa gting nas chad/ /sems kyi myu gu'i rtsa tshig pa/ /ngan 'gro'i 'dam du kha sbub yin/ /snod
med kha sbub de dag la/ /gsang ba smra bar bya ba min/ /smras na de nyid kha sbub 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i tshig rnams khar smra yang / /gab pa gsang ba'i don mi shes/ /skyon
can spa lo sgrog rnams la/ /gsang ba'i don rnams lhag par smra/ /bsnyen sgrub gsang ba'i tshigs rnams la/ /sgra la nyan kyang don mi gnyer/ /snying po'i don
gsang mi thub pa/ /bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yin/ /gsang don mi thub snod ngan la/ /gsang ba smra bar gang byed pa/ /de dang snod med snod ngan gnyis/ /'khor
ba'i khams su zag par mnyam/ /lta dang dam tshig sgrub pa yi/ /dam pa'i mdzod gsum smra shes kyang / /goms pa'i mthu med gnas ma gyur/ /ngan rgyu phrag dog
ser snas gdungs/ /bya med chos la blo gtod cing / /spyod rtsing dmar la gdeng med par/ /rnal 'byor spyod la lta dman zhes/ /zer ba
pham 'gyur 'khor bar 'pho/ /snod ngan 'khor bar 'bo ba la/ /gsang ba'i don rnams smra byed pa/ /gsang ba nyams pa'i dbang gis ni/ /nyams pa de dang de
'drar 'gyur/ /zla ngan nyams sod can lan 'dren/ /kha gsag lce gnyis sgyur byed cing / /sems la nyon mongs lnga bcangs te/ /rku dang sgyu spyod rdzun la dga'/ /tshe
gcig grags pa ched phyir du/ /gang zag phyir 'brang tshig 'ga' la/ /mnyan te brjod 'dod tshul 'chos pa/ /log smra dug can tha ram ltung / /dug can ltung
ba'i snod de la/ /gsang ba'i dmigs rnams smra ba ni/ /rnal 'byor nyams pa chen po ste/ /'khor ba'i tha mar de ltung 'gyur/ /'di ltar pham 'gyur snod ngan
la| |gsang ba gsang chen la sogs pa'i/ /don dang rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /bstan kyang pham ltung gegs su 'gyur/ /de bas bstan par bya ba min/ /gal te
bstan par gyur na ni/ /ston smra nyan byed de dag rnams/ /mthong yun phung byed gnyis skrag 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor mkhas gsal don ldan la/ /rnal 'byor
mi shes gang dag gis/ /dregs pa'i dbang gis phrag dog gi /sems kyi rnam grangs ci skyed pa/ /de snyed bskal pa'i grangs mnyam par/ /'bras bu mi bzad myong bar
'gyur/ /gal te las kyi 'phro len na/ /de snyed bskal par bzod 'jug dgos/ /mkhas gsal don ldan gyis kyang ni/ /gong ma bzhin du ngan bsams na/ /de yang
gnas ngan len pa ste/ /mkhas pa de la skyo mi nus/ /rnal 'byor don ldan tshul mthun la/ /ngan pa'i tshig gis sems dkrugs shing / /sgro skur rku dang brlang btab na/ /
dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur/ /zhar las byung ba'i rnam smin yang / /ji ltar rgyu mthun de 'drar 'gyur/ /skal pa dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rtsa nyams skyo can rang
bzhin ni/ /ngan sems khro gtum ldan pa dang / /mi zad phra men las spyod byed/ /gang dag mi shes ngang tshul can/ /byis pa'i rang bzhin blo zhan pas/ /shin tu dman
pa'i lta sems kyis/ /tshul bcos mkhan la bkur bar byed/ /gang dag dam tshig yon tan ldan/ /byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod/ /tshul shes don gyi
gzhung rnams srong / /de dag la ni 'dun pa med/ /dam tshig spre'u ltar spyod bzhin du/ /byang chub snying po thob pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo / /
'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong / /rgyal po 'bras gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /lam ston skyon sel mkhas pa la/ /kha cig dregs dang
phrag dog gis/ /khro spong thabs kyis smod par byed/ /de ni 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste/ /nam yang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung / /mi shes pa yi rnal 'byor pa/ /yang dag
don dang ldan pa'i mi/ /rjes su 'gro bar mi byed cing / /longs spyod 'du 'dzi gang ldan pa'i/ /rjes su 'gro zhing de la 'dud/ /de ni log pa'i lam pa yin/ /rnal 'byor
ltang dang byang chub khe/ /'ban thag chad par blo mi 'byung / /zang zing nor dang g.yo sprul khe/ /chung yang ci 'grub srog dang bsngo/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
can| |bum snod nang gi gsal ba ltar/ /shes rab mdzod kyi gter ldan yang / /srog chags rkun mo'i sder mo ltar/ /khong nas gab sbas don ston la/ /blun po
rnams kyis cir mi mthong / /dper na 'di 'drar tshul gcig ste/ /lus la gter 'chang mi dang ni/ /blun por gyur pa'i mi dag gnas/ /'grogs kyang gnyis
mtshungs khyad med 'dra/ /ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod byed cing / /ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med/ /yang dag bsngags pa rjod byed cing / /yang dag don du gnyer ba
med| |dam tshig bsngags pa rjod byed cing / /dam tshig don du gnyer ba med/ /ji ltar 'gro gang la la dag /nor bu rin chen 'di 'dra ste/ /'dod pa'i yon tan kun 'byung
zhes| |rin chen dag gi yon tan brjod/ /de la 'gro gang gzhan dag gis/ /de ltar 'dod pa 'byung gyur na/ /de ltar cung zad yod dam zhes/ /dris kyang med pas slar smras
pa| |gang zhig dgos pa skong ba yi/ /yon tan cung zad smos par zad/ /de nyid bdag la med ces smra/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pas/ /bslab par bya ba'i chos bral
la| |chos nyid bsngags pa rjod byed kyang / /de dag la ni chos nyid med/ /de las spyod pa'i log spyod rnams/ /dam tshig can gyis spang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor chos 'dzin
gang dag gis/ /rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sred can/ /gsang ba 'jigs pa'i dgrar mthong nas/ /de dag sdig pa mthong ba ltar/ /skrod cing chad pas gcod byed
pa| |skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras/ /dper na blon po gang dag gis/ /nyes byas khrims dang 'gal gyur na/ /'gal bar mi gtong khrims dang sbyor/ /bka' yi yo srong
blon po de/ /rgyal po'i thugs 'dzin dam pa zhes/ /kun tu rgya cher grags par 'gyur/ /ldum rar dug gi sdong skyes na/ /bdag pos dug tu shes ma thag /rtsad nas phyung
ste med par byed/ /ci phyir ldum zas de dag las/ /dug 'phel gyur na 'chi phyir ro/ /de bzhin nyams 'gyur dug can de/ /brtul
zhugs can gyi rnal 'byor des/ /gnas sam lo yis spyugs te spang / /gang dag mi spong mgon byed pa/ /de dag gsang ba'i dam sri yin/ /don la rnal 'byor gang zhig gis/ /
tha tshig zab mor bcas rnams las/ /srung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo bzhin/ /rtsa ba yan lag bcas rnams la/ /gal te ma tshor zhig gyur nas/ /rnam smin
yod kyang rtsa mi nyams/ /ji ltar glang po e ne ya/ /shi nas ro ru gyur mod kyang / /gi'u waM rtsis ni don byed ltar/ /rnal 'byor nyams de ror gyur yang / /gzhan
gyis bkur ba'i gnas yin zhing / /de yi don byed nus pa yin/ /de ltar mod kyang 'di kun rnams/ /rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya/ /ci phyir 'o ma nyung ngu zhig /rul
bas 'o ma kun rul bzhin/ /rnal 'byor nyams gyur gcig gis ni/ /rnal 'byor can kun ma rungs 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal byed pa yi/ /log pa'i
rnal 'byor thams cad kun/ /don la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad bsgrims te spang bar bya/ /gal te ma spangs log spyad na/ /'khor ba'i
g.yul ni rgyal 'gyur te/ /bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu chung 'gyur/ /kun kyang dge sbyong don chung zhes/ /yang dag don las yid byung zhing / /log pa'i chos
la spro bar byed/ /kun kyang log pa'i las spyad pas/ /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung / /des ni sgro skur gnyis su 'gyur/ /bka' yi chad pa gang yin pa/ /
ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis/ /nam yang gnod pa yong mi mdzad/ /de yi 'khor na gnas pa yi/ /gang dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams/ /rnal 'byor log
par spyod rnams kyi/ /skyon mthong tsam na chad pas gcod/ /thams cad ngan 'gror spyi'u tshugs ltung / /sgrub pa'i snod mchog gcig yod de/ /'di dang mi
mthun kun rdzogs pa'i/ /rgyud mnyen don ldan ngang tshul bzang / /ci la chags med gtong ldan sems/ /shes rab rnam grol lde mig gis/ /gti mug tha ram blo
phye nas| |chos kyi snying po'i mig ldan pas/ /rtag chad phrad mthong dbu ma'i yul/ /ma nor lam du 'jug shes pas/ /sdong po stong chen rab dul ba'o/ /tha tshig
lung las byung ba bzhin/ /gzhung srong thub par byed pa de/ /rgyal ba'i sras po yin pas na/ /de la gsang sgo dbye bar bya/ /ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar/ /de
bzhin yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /yid 'ong 'dod dang bde pa 'byung / /rig 'dzin rgyal ba kun yum mo/ /de bzhin dam tshig thub pa
ltar| |gnas par byed pa'i rten yang yin/ /dam tshig kun gyi srog yid nye/ /dam tshig kun gyi nor mchog go /dam tshig 'di ni 'jigs pa'i
skyabs/ /dam tshig bgrod pa lam gyi mchog /dam tshig chu bo sgrol ba'i gru/ /dam tshig dngos grub dam pa yin/ /dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin te/ /
dam tshig long ba'i mig bu yin/ /ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar/ /gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms pa yin/ /'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed/ /des
na dam tshig rgyun bzhin bsrung / /mdor na bdag gi sgo gsum po/ /dag pa gsum gyi mtha' bzung nas/ /lha dang grogs dang slob dpon dang / /bdag nyid
dag pa ma khrel ba'i/ /tshul gsum mi gnod dam bcas gsum/ /yongs su ma nyams mdo bzhi po/ /mthar phyin rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas/ /mdo
don dran pa la bgrang bsngo/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dam tshig ni/ /dam tshig kun gyi thog mar 'gro/ /wa dang cang shes gyi ling dang / /blang dor mi 'bral
khro chen bdag /shin tu glang chen smyos 'dra'i sems/ /dpa' rtul stag mchog rngam zhing gtum/ /mkha' lding khyung chen lhag mi lta/ /gtum thung don chen sdong
gcig pa/ /yid thub mi ldog rgya mtsho'i gser/ /gti mug lkug pa'i blo tshol ldan/ /ri bo mi 'gyur brtan pa che/ /mkha' ltar yangs dog kun dang bral/ /gnam
lcags lce yi drag shul can/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bdag /zon bag khu 'phrig kha rog sems/ /nges pa'i nga rgyal glang tshul ldan/ /zla bral seng+ge ri dwags
rgyal| |ra 'jam bya ltar chags 'grogs blo/ /g.yo ldan lcag chen sgyu ma'i rgya/ /gtsang sme med par kun spyod cing / /thogs med gsod spyod ce spyang kha/ /che ba'i nga
rgyal stag mchog blo/ /kun 'dzem blo ldan nam mkha' lding / /sa thub bag len rgyal 'khor skyong / /rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni/ /bcu gnyis dang ni
gsum blor ldan/ /goms nas nyams su len byed pa/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba'i bka' ba yin/ /dal ba'i rgyud ldan tha tshig can/ /sku dang gsung thugs
rdo rje yi| |srung dang brjod dang gsang ba dang / /yan lag spyad pa'i dam tshig dang / /yid 'ong dang du blang ba dang / /brtul zhugs zab mor spyod pa dang / /rnal 'byor
rnal 'byor thams cad kyi/ /mi 'dor mi spong sbyar ba yi/ /rig ldan shes par bya ba dang / /thob cing grub par bya ba yin/ /re re la
yang lnga lnga ste/ /rtsa ba dang ni yan lag las/ /bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad ldan pa/ /spyad par bya ba'i nor mchog yin/ /rnal 'byor byang chub sems rgyud
la| |nges par brtags te spyod pa'i bu/ /zab mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi/ /blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan/ /'di ni sngar 'gro tha tshig ste/ /zab mo sgrub
pa'i sngon logs su/ /rdo rje tha tshig drag po 'o/ /gcan 'phrang lam rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/ /spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams/ /nges pa'i don gyis bsrungs
byas nas/ /de ni dbyig gi snod chen yin/ /de ltar spyi yi sdom pa la/ /gnas nas dus kyi skabs 'di ru/ /bsrung bya thub par bya ba ni/ mi shigs pa ni seng+ge
ste| |gcan gzan rgyal po yin pas so/ /za ma tog ni 'dod pa'i gter/ /dug spyo ba ni der mi rigs/ /rin chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag /de ni 'breg pa'i
rigs ma yin/ /gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag /mkhas pas btung bar bya ba min/ /pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru kha ma bye/ /zla zer ma yin kha mi dbye/ /ma brtags bu ga rdol can gyi snod/ /kha
mi dbye zhing bcud mi blug /don dang mi ldan bcos ma'i rtags/ /bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min/ /shel dkar rin chen sgo nga dag /'dam rdzab khung du bsrub mi
bya| |seng+ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag /dug can snod du blug pa min/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /bsreg par bya ba yong ma yin/ /khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang
ba| |de dag gcag par bya ba min/ /gnam lcags me yi dur mo dag /brdab par bya ba ma yin no/ /stag gzig 'drol bas las byas pa'i/ /las kyi lhag ma
bsdu mi bya/ /rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi/ /de dag gzhig par bya ba min/ /rdo rje ra ba'i go tshags ni/ /bsdam bya bral bar bya ba min/ /bud shing sreg pa'i
sgron ma dag /g.yeng ba'i rlung gis bskyod mi bya/ /rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag /'ol dkar gcad par bya ba min/ /rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya dag /nam zhar dbyi
bar mi bya 'o/ /rdo rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar/ /rmang nas bzlog par mi bya 'o/ /gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba dag /rgyal mtshan rtse las dpog mi bya/ /rnal 'byor
las kyi khyad par can/ /skal can rnams kyi dam tshig ste/ /skal par ldan pa'i nor mchog yin/ /rgyun du spyad pa'i nor mchog ni/ /rdo rje las ni thun tshags dag /
rdo rje go phur trom chen gyis/ /srog la bar chad byed pa'i dgra/ /nyon mongs 'thibs pa de gzhom bya/ /snyom las le lo'i dpung
bskyed pa/ /thug thub ra chod nga rgyal gzhi/ /dregs byed dbang po myos pa'i bcud/ /dpa' byed rkyen yang bsdam par bya/ /rdo rje gsang tshig ma gtogs pa/ /'dres
pa gang zag byis pa'i tshig /zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing / /thams cad rdo rje gsang bas bya'o/ /ji ltar gsod pa'i mi rnams dag /gshed ma'i mis ni gsod
pa'i tshe/ /thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa bzhin/ /le lo'i dgra bcom brtson par 'bad/ /rnal 'byor sgrib pa'i gegs bsal ba/ /dka' thub sdom pa'i
mdud pa can/ /'dod dang longs spyod mi mthun dang / /spyi mthun nang du mi gcig pa/ /phyi nang can dang gnod byed dang / 'dod myos bying rmugs brkam pa
dang / /dad med rtsa nyams 'phyar g.yeng can/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te spang bar bya'o/ /de ni rnal 'byor gegs yin te/ /dngos grub chu bo gcod par byed//
rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa la/ /bar du gnod pa'i bdud lnga 'byung / /rnam rtog 'phrig pa'i bdud nyid dang / /de bzhin btang snyoms le lo'i bdud/ /longs
spyod 'du 'dzi g.yeng ba'i bdud/ /tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon po'i bdud/ /khro gtum ngan thung 'khrug pa'i bdud/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bdud lnga po/ /yang dag don la
sgrib pa ste/ /gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis/ /zhi ba chen po'i ngang du bzlog /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dgra bzhi po/ /thabs la mkhas pas gdul bar bya/ /rdo rje
brnag pa gsang 'phel bas/ /ngag gi dbang po nyams gyur te/ /kha na ma thos phog par 'gyur/ /de dag bcas dkar 'gyur ba'i dgra/ /lta dman spyod rtsing 'chol
pa yis/ /bka' yi gzhung por log par spyad/ /nor bas bar chad 'byung ba'i dgra/ /dam gtsor spyod pa'i las rnams yin/ /'da' dka' rdo rje mchog gsum
po| |btang snyoms phyal bar shor ba ni/ /rtsa ba rul ba'i ljon shing bzhin/ /bka' chad chen po 'bab pa'i gnas/ /brtsams pa las la sbyor ba'i tshe/ /'bad pa'i rtsa
shugs chung ba yis/ /don rnams grub pa ma yin te/ /'bras bur mi 'gyur 'phrog pa'i dgra/ /rnal 'byor chen por spyod pa la/ /'dod pa'i nor mchog 'phrog pa'i
dgra| |thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu yis/ /skyon gyi dgra bzhi spang bar bya/ /srid gsum bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag /sangs rgyas zhing du rtogs pa ni/ /sa rnam
gcig car sbyangs pa ste/ /zhing rnams dag pa'i mchog yin no/ /khams gsum mchod pa'i rgyu 'di dag /yo byad chen po'i mchog
yin te| |rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa'i rgyu/ /rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa 'o/ /'khor ba dur khrod gnas 'di dag /bde ba chen po'i gnas yin te/ /ma nor ma
bcos chos kyi dbyings/ /btsal med lhun gyis grub pa la/ /dug lnga rgyu ba'i rtsa ba dag /ye shes lnga yi rtsa ba ste/ /kun shes kun rig gsal ba 'o/ /rang rig
ye shes rang las byung / /rnal 'byor chos mig ldan pa yis/ /nges pa'i don du 'di ltar blta'o/ /'di ni rgyun gyi dam tshig ste/ /brjod du med pa srung ba 'o/ /
srung ba thub par bya ba la/ /dam tshig rtsal gyi khyad par ni/ /gang dag rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ /blo la nges pa'i lung du bstan/ /'dod pas chags dang 'joms
pa dang / /gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog rnams/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste/ /don dang ldan pa'i skyes pus spyad/ /sbyor dang sgrol bar byed pa dang / /ma byin
len dang ngag sprul byed/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig spyod pa'i mchog /spyad par bya ba'i las yin no/ /rgyal ba sems can thams cad dang / /dngos por brtags
pa thams cad kyang / /don gyi ngang du gcig pa ste/ /de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag /mtshan ma'i chos rnams thams cad ni/ /mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du gsal/ /
theg pa 'og ma'i khyad par rnams/ /kun kyang rang rig blo la gsal/ /yon tan ci 'byung mi brjod cing / /'og ma rnams la mi smod cing / /thams cad mnyam
pa'i dam tshig ste/ /'di ltar shes na tshogs mchog rdzogs/ /gzugs rnams rnam par snang ba mdzad/ /tshig rnams brjod pa snang mtha' yas/ /rnam rtog
kun tu sems rdo rje/ /rig dang tshor ba rin chen 'byung / /yid g.yo byed pa don kun rdzogs/ /stan 'gan rang bzhin sbyor ba'i gnas/ /zhing bcu dag dang
ldan pa na/ /bde ba chen po'i longs spyod de/ /thogs med 'phrin las rnam bzhir rdzogs/ /phyi yi yul dang nang gi sems/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gnas/ /de
la sgrib dang mi sgrib ces/ /mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs/ /thams cad mnyam nyid dbyings gyur pas/ /phung po lnga don ye shes lnga/ /sku gsung thugs kyi
dbang phyug ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin/ /yul dang ye shes rang bzhin las/ /gzhan gyi rang bzhin med pas na/ /mtshan ma'i rnam pa cir snang yang / /
de la chad pa'i gnas med do/ /dam tshig dam pa gang zhe na/ /rtogs pa dam pa dam tshig ste/ /rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa/ /de ni
dam tshig chen po 'o/ /thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul las/ /dngos su spyad pa thams cad bya/ /de ni dam tshig chen po yin//
snod du gyur pa yum gyi dbyings/ /bcud rnams rgyal ba yab kyi mkha'/ /'byung 'jug rig pas longs spyod de/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tha tshig yin/ /srid pa'i sems
can thams cad dang / /thar pa chos kyi rnam grangs kun/ /so sor thams cad snang ba ste/ /kun kyang mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal/ /spyod pa'i las dang rtog pa dang / /
mtshan mar gyur pa thams cad kyang / /sems kyi phyi nang spyod yul de/ /brtags na longs spyod tshogs su 'gyur/ /ma skyes stong pa sku yi rgya/ /rang bzhin smon med
gsung gi don/ /mtshan med yid las 'das pa'i thugs/ /rnam gsum bde chen sangs rgyas so/ /mnyam pa'i lta bas dbang bsgyur na/ /'khor ba thams cad
dbyings la snang / /las kun rdzogs pa'i mchog yin te/ /gzhan du 'phrin las lus pa med/ /sdug bsngal byang chub chen po ste/ /'khor ba ye nas mya
ngan 'das/ /sgrib pa rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /nyon mongs kun kyang byang chub don/ /snang ba med pa'i don mthong dang / /sa dang sa yi rim par ni/ /'di dang 'di
zhes gzung du med/ /'di ni snang med thob pa'i gnas/ /sku dang gsung thugs mi g.yo ba'i/ /ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang la gnas/ /ji ltar bsgyur yang chos nyid
pas| |chad pa'i gnas zhes brjod dang bral/ /med dang phyal ba gcig pa dang / /lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dam tshig che/ /'di zhes ris su chad med pa/ /'di ni
srung ba'i dam tshig go /spyad dang spyod par bya med pas/ /srid dang mu stegs 'jig rten pa'i/ /spyod par snang ba thams cad kun/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad
spyod do| |ma spangs lhun grub dbyer med pas/ /dbyings las gzhan na blta yul med/ /'di ni lta ba'i dam tshig go /sa chu me rlung snod bcud bcas/ /kun kyang rang
bzhin chos nyid do/ /chos nyid don la gzhan med pa/ /rang byung ye shes gsal ba 'o/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /ma btsal rang la yod pa yin/ /'dod
pa 'byung ba'i longs spyod de/ /bde chen longs spyod tshogs yin no/ /ngan song mtho ris thams cad dang / /'phags lam 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun/ /
rang bzhin so sor mi dmigs te/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rang bzhin yin/ /spyod dang gzugs rigs thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya chen
po'i rang bzhin te/ /sku gsung thugs tshig rgya cher ston/ /don rig thugs kyi rang bzhin no/ /ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba/ /mi gnas pa la chags pa med/ /don
gyi khyad par rtogs chud na/ /kun tu bzang po'i mchog gi sa'o/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzogs te/ /thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi don/ /bdag nyid chen
por thams cad rdzogs/ /lhun rdzogs bde ba chen po yi/ /khyab pa chen por kun bdal bas/ /sgrib pa kun byang tshogs kun rdzogs/ /rnam grol bcings pa
kun dang bral/ /lhun grub bde ba'i gnas chen yin/ /zhes smra ba'i seng+ge chen pos gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo
las| dam tshig gsang ba mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad brdas mtshon pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa'
chen po/ chos thams cad ni/ bdag cag rnams kyis brda rig pa tsam gyi ngo bor mthong ngo / /de nas sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i
tshogs/ chos thams cad ni/ brda dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa tsam du shes par gyis shig /btags pa'i chos thams cad ni/ phyi nang gang du yang mi gnas
te| |chos thams cad la ming gi gzhi med cing btags pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba yin no/ /brda zhes bya ba ni/ sbas pa btags pa'i tha snyad yin no/ sbas pa'i
chos rnams gsang ba'i phyir/ /thams cad sba zhing brgyud par bya/ /'di ltar brda yi sbyor ba la/ /rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis/ /de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor
rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen pos brda'i chos rnams rgya cher bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis kyang chos thams cad/ /brda yi don gyi brgyud
par bgyi/ /brda zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu/ /sbas pa'i chos ni gang dang gang / /mi bstan gsang ba gang gang lags/ /de skad gsol pa dang / smra ba'i seng+ges bka'
stsal pa| |nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ /brda zhes bya ba sbas pa'i tshig /sbas te gsang ba'i chos rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa yin/ /mi bstan
gzhan la gsang ba ni/ /mu stegs la sogs sde pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa 'phya ba las/ /shin tu blan zhing sba ba'i phyir/ /sbas
pa'i brda yis bstan par bya/ /brda yi yon tan chen po ni/ /grangs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab na/ /mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi yod de/ /gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin
dang / /rnal 'byor rig pa'i spyod yul dang / /sbas bas grub thag nye ba dang / /gsang ba'i dam tshig mi nyams shing / /brda la dga' ba'i ma srid rnams/ /nye zhing
gdung pa'i thabs su 'gyur/ /de bas sbas pa'i brda rnams ni/ /tshig gis mtshon te brjod par bya/ /a la la hoH/a ti pu hoHpra ti pu hoH/mahA go ru sang kra
ma| gu ya de bi sa ma ya/ ma hA tsan+d+ra/ ma hA pur sha /gu ya/ b+ha ga /mahA badzra/ sa ma ya hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ra ho ya haM/ ra ga ya me/ sa ma ya dzaHlhan/ oM AMHhUM/ sa
ma ya| sa ma ya/ e h+ye hi/ e h+ye hi/ ha he ha/ ha he ha/ ma taM kha/ ma taM kha/ ka ru k+Sha/ ka ru k+Sha/ k+ShaM pa ri/ k+ShaM pa ri/ ra ho haM/ ra ho haM/ sa ma ya hi/ a la
stoM| a la stoM/ kha kha le/ kha kha le/ sha da pa/ sha da pa/ kha raM khA ri/ kha raM khA ri/ kha le b+h+yo/ khe le ha b+h+yo/ kha ka kha/ kha ka kha/ kha h+yi ha he/ rak+Sha khA hi/ rak+Sha khA hi/
ha ha he raM/ gu h+ya/ gu h+ya/ sa ma/ sa ma/ ma le mu le/ ta le du le/ ma tsa me tsa/ gu h+ya sid ti/ pa ra ma/ pa ra ma/ shi ri ho/ shi ri ho/ ma ma kha ka traM/ e

e e e| hriM hriM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /kha kha le le/ karma ma ti b+h+yo/ rak+Sha kra ma b+h+yo/ /rak+Sha kra ma b+h+yo/ /kar+m+ma le/ kar+m+ma le/ k+Shu ti sha ne/ k+Shu ti sha ne/ rak+Sha karma/ rak+Sha karma/ kro d+ha
k+ShaM| khA hi b+h+yo/ khA hi b+h+yo/ tsa le yaM/ tsa le yaM/ pra tsa le/ pra tsa le/ gur pa yaM/ gur pa yaM/ bi gur ti/ bi gur ti/ ma mo \u0f85 haM/ ma mo \u0f85 haM/ dag brda dam tshig

gi phyag rgya'o/ /bya g+h+ri tsarma/ byA g+h+ri tsarma/ ba yaM k+ShaM ga ri/ ba yaM k+ShaM ga ri/ ba bya dz+nyo ba ba ti/ na ra ha sa/ na ra ha sa/ ban+d+ha ka pA la/ ban+d+ha ka pA la/ tsarma na ga truM/ tsarma na ga truM//
rA ga ra gta tsa/ rA ga ra k+ta tsa/ ru d+hi ra ma ta/ ru d+hi ra ma ta/ ka ru ga tsa/ ka ru ga tsa/ ba bya ba ti/ ba bya ba ti/ gaM gro Na/ gaM gro Na/ thar pa ta/ thar pa ta/ dpa'
byed kha| dpa' byed kha/ zla ba rgyas dang rdzogs pa dang / /zla ba dkar dang zla phrom mchog /tshe 'dzin kun gyi gtso mo dang / /'jam po thar pa chen po dang / /gal
zhes bya ba'i ro mchog dang / /gzi brjid chen po'i dri zhim dang / /bran mo dang ni g.yog 'chang ma/ /'jam dpal rnon po'i ka tar dang / /mA tha ya/ mA tha ya/
par pa ti/ par pa ti/ rwa tha ma/ rwa tha ma/ kha tam nya/ kha tam nya/ rwa ti hUM/ rwa ti hUM/ shi nyam tha/ shi nyam tha/ ka ram
tha| ka ram tha/ shag ti kha/ shag ti kha/ yo ga tsarbA na/ sgra brda dam tshig phyag gi rgya'o/ /lag gi phyag rgya chen po ni/ /gar thabs g.yas g.yon bskor
nas kyang / /se gol brdabs pa 'dren pa'i brda/ /bskor nas thal sbyar phyag rgya'i brda/ /shin tu bskor nas spyi bor dgrol/ /'di ni mchod pa bzhes
pa'i brda/ /bskor nas snying gar bcangs pa ni/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje bstan pa'i brda/ /gar bskor shin tu gnyis bstab pa/ /mchod pa stob par byed pa'i brda/ /
gar bskor dbang mo'i spyi bor gzhag /sbyor ba'i don la 'jug pa'i brda/ /thabs kyis spyi bor gzhag pa dang / /shes rab dbang mos snying gar ro/ /thabs kyis
gsang ba g.yas bcug na/ /shes rab thos byed gsang ba yin/ /thabs kyis na sa g.yas bteg na/ /shes rab na sa g.yon bteg pa'o/ /thabs kyis rdo
rje phyag rgya bstan/ /shes rab pad+mo'i phyag rgya bstan/ /thabs kyis smin ma g.yas bskyod na/ /shes rab smin ma g.yon bteg bya/ /thabs kyis phyag g.yon
brkyang ba dang / /shes rab g.yas kyis 'khyud tshul bstan/ /phyag rgya gar bskor thal brdabs shing / /dbang mo lce la reg pa ni/ /tshogs mchod dus la bab pa'i
brda| |lag gnyis bskor nas dbang mo 'thor/ /de nas dbang mo lce la reg /dza gad 'brim pa'i brda thabs so/ /ma hA ging chen karma dang / /rdo rje drod kyi rtags 'dzin
la| |sogs pa'i brda yi dam tshig rnams/ /rnal 'byor can gyis spyad na 'grub/ /lus brda dam tshig phyag rgya 'o/ /zhes smra ba'i seng+ges gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal
po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ rnal 'byor brda'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnal 'byor
rol pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis gsol
pa| smra ba'i seng+ge chen po/ /chos thams cad ni/ rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo / /zhes gsol pa dang / smra ba'i seng+ges bka'
stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ rdo rje tshogs yin par shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa'i
tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ rdo rje lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bdag cag rnams la
rgya cher bshad du gsol/ sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ /rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi
thugs dam ste/ /rnal 'byor kun gyis spyod pa'i lam/ /sa mchog bgrod pa'i lam 'di dag /'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya/ /brtsam pa las kyi dang po
pa| |rdo rje tshogs la 'jug pa na/ /khyad par rim pa ji bzhin du/ /las mchog 'di yi rang bzhin gyis/ /ji bzhin rim par sbyangs nas kyang / /sa rab mchog tu
bgrod pa la/ /thabs mchog lnga yis bgrod bya ste/ /rdo rje tshogs dang bsnyen pa dang / /nye ba dang ni sgrub pa dang / /sgrub pa chen por sbyar bar bya/ /ji ltar grangs
dang dus chen dang / /mtshan ma byung bar bcas rnams las/ /gab pa'i sba thabs de sbyar nas/ /sus mi rig pa'i thabs chen bya/ /de dag gsang ba'i bdag po
yin| |gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i byis pa dag /'jig rten rdul las grangs nas kyang / /'gyur dbang ma nges sar bzhag ste/ /ci phyir dang bo yin pas na/ /byis pa
blo shed ma bye bas/ /bzang ngan bde sdug mi shes shing / /bstan dang gsang ba'i dmigs mi phyed/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bka' sgo 'dir/ /gsang sgo mi dbye skrag par
'gyur| |rang bzhin ngang tshul ma rtogs pa'i/ /so so'i skye bo byis pa las/ /snod med snod byas bdud nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor 'tsho ba'i srog gcod cing / /ma nges ldog
'jug bcas pa yis/ /gsang ni bcas dkar 'gyur phyir ro/ /des na 'di yi spyod pa yang / /ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar/ /de nas smra ba'i seng+ge de thabs kyi
rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa dang / smra ba'i seng+ge
chen po| chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ thabs kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo / /sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i
tshogs| 'di dag ni/ brgyud de sbas pa'i tshogs yin par shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor tshogs ldan lha/ /thabs chen phyag rgya sbas tshogs lnga/ /rdo rje 'dzin sogs
bcu drug dang / /bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/ /bri bya yang na bsam pa 'am/ /brjod dam bsngos sam mtshan ma la/ /'jig rten dbang po'i chos lugs kyis/ /
mos pa la bskyed dran bya ste/ /rang bzhin yul nas phab nas ni/ /phyag bya la sogs mchod pa yis/ /rdo rje sman dang rtsir sbyar
ba'i| |yo byad chen po la sogs pas/ /rdo rje thabs kyis tshogs la dbul/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor glu blangs te/ /mnyes byas las grub grangs rdzogs nas/ /mchod
dang dam skong 'dod pa bya/ /snod du rung ba'i slob ma dag /dpa' mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis/ /'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol/ /rdo rje tha tshig rnam lnga
yis| |bslab pa'i gnyer rnams ci rigs par/ /rtsal gyi rim par byin nas ni/ /rdo rje gal chen mna' 'dor ro/ /de nas sgrub pa che chud rnams/ /ji ltar
'dod pas nan tan gyis/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bkar bya'o/ /mi nus la sogs mi gnang ba'i/ /dam tshig dag gis nan chags bya/ /rmongs pa gsang phyir sems
bskyed de/ /ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur/ /shes nas mig la shes bya'i yul/ /thams cad rim gyis bstan par bya/ /drod can 'khyil ba'i blo ldan
la| |rnal 'byor na spar mdzod sgo dbye/ /rtsing po 'gros kyis dmu rgod la/ /gcan 'phrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams bstan/ /rdo rje lung gi tshad can la/ /ji ltar
nus pa de dbang bskur/ /btsal med mi nus yul can la/ /phan pa 'ba' zhig bsngags pa yin/ /gnas 'dir yod dang med pa dang / /'od mi bsub cing ljid
mi dbab/ /rdo rje blo yi yul can la/ /rtsal chen sbyongs zhes gdams par bya/ /rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du/ /rdo rje don gyi ltang chen bsher/ /rtsal dang rim
pa khyad par dbye/ /so so rigs kyi phyag rgya dag /spyi 'am yang na re re 'o/ /de nas smra ba'i seng+ge de shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ shes rab
tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du gda' bar bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo / /de skad ces gsol ba dang / sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen
po'i tshogs/ chos thams cad ni/ shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par shes par gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad shes rab
gyi rang bzhin las byung zhing / shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gsal lo/ /de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab gzungs kyi
rang bzhin bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal
pa| 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs/ /shes rab gzungs kyi rang bzhin ni/ /rgya cher bshad kyi shes par gyis/ /ji ltar thabs kyis tshogs sbyar ltar/ /
gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa/ /lha mo'i tshogs su sbyar nas kyang / /gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa/ /thabs kyi
phyag rgya mtshan mar sbas/ /rdo rje mnyam pa'i gzungs rnams la/ /mnyam pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /bro gar glu tshig la sogs pas/ /rig 'dzin rnal 'byor
ma rnams bsgrub/ /ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad thabs dang shes rab phan tshun dra bar 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang / 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
ni| thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel ba'i rang bzhin can du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo / /zhes gsol to/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ chos thams cad ni/ thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel ba ste/ gnyis su med par shes par
gyis shig /de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dra bar 'brel ba'i don bshad du gsol/
sems dpa' chen po bka' stsal pa/ 'brel ba'i don ni 'di lta ste/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /phan tshun 'brel ba'i tshul du snang / /chos
kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las/ /sprul pa bye ba cir yang snang / /gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mchog yin te/ /rtsal dang ldan
pa'i gsang sgo ba/ /'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya/ /gsang 'di chud pa'i bu rnams la/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' 'di bsgrag /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa
'di| |rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas/ /lnga nyid zung du 'khril ba ni/ /g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril 'khyud sbyar/ /g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang / /rang rang
mtshan ma 'bar ba 'o/ /g.yon gyi sgra snyan dril bu dang / /rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la/ /'byo zhing 'dud pa'i mdangs ldan pas/ /chags shing
g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te/ kha dog lnga yi 'od 'bar
bas| |bcu drug chas ni sgeg pa rnams/ /rim gyis bskyed dang gcig car bskyed/ /dbang po'i rim par sbyar bar bya/ /gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang / /
gnas nas gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /phyag rgya rgyal po rgyal mor bcas/ /brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khril 'khyud sbyor/ /sa dang nam mkha'i spyan rdo rje/ /byams dang rdo rje
kun bzang dpal/ /nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni/ /gzhi gnyis dag gis mnyes sbyor ba/ /bsam bya la sogs de bzhin no/ /rdo rje sgo dang bcas pa ni/ /rdo rje 'khril 'khyud
gsang ba'i tshogs/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod che sbyar bas/ /mnyes nas skong phyir rim bzhin dbul/ /gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis/ /gsang ba'i don
rnams sgrub par byed/ /ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje kun tu 'brel ba'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings su bdag cag rnams
kyis mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ dra ba'i dbyings su shes par gyis shig /chos thams cad ni/ thugs kyi rig pa
las byung la/ thugs kyi rang bzhin ni/ rdo rje kho na yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje dra ba chen po'i tshogs bdag
