bzhi'i dbyibs ldan la/ /mig ri 'phra bshad 'khyil bag chags/ /dkar dmar mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ljon pa dag gi rigs smos pa/ /sdong po yal
ga mang po'i dkyil/ /shin tu 'dab rgyas yal gar legs/ /mthon mthing sgra yi rang bzhin no/ /byang chub sems 'drar lcang lor bshad/ /stod smad kun tu phra
la legs/ /srid du ring zhing ldem bag can/ /lcug phran zhes bya'i mtshan ma ni/ /bcu gnyis nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /rdo rje'i mtshon gyis ma phog cing / /mu la rak+tar
ldan pa la/ /phra zhing bshad la gzangs su ring / /ban glang sor mo gru bzhi la/ /kham la mig 'bur smin tshogs che/ /skra kham ma la so che zhing / /sna ring 'gram
snyongs ring ba yin/ /ri mo can gyi bud med ni/ /nag mo grwa gsum rtsing mgo ma/ /khro gnyer can la gel bag chags/ /sdong gcig yan lag gtan med pa 'o/ /
skye ba'i rgyu med bkra mi shis/ /mi reg yal ga mes tshig yin/ /spyir ni de ltar bstan mod kyang / /gang dag dad ldan brtul zhugs can/ /yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong
rnams| |dad pa chags shing lus 'bul na/ /thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya/ /rnam rtog spong len gang byed pa/ /de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas/ /rmad du
gsang ba'i mchod pa la/ /gsang ba'i phyag tshang gang byed pa/ /las kyi sgrib pa kun bsal te/ /man ngag gsang ba'i dmigs bu 'thob/ /de ltar brtags pa'i
yum de la/ /dri spos tsan+dan la sogs pa/ /a ga ru dang sbyar ba'i chu/ /khrus kyi cho gas dag par bya/ /dri zhim la sogs sna tshogs
kyis| |lus la byug pa sna tshogs bya/ /de nas nang gi khrus chen yang / /shin tu dag par bya ba ni/ /rdzas kyi chu dang rdzas sbyar bas/ /nang gi rdzas rnams dag par
bya| |bur shing snying po la sogs pa/ /ro yi mchog tu gyur pa kun/ /rtsi 'am bcud dang sbyar nas kyang / /nang gi rdzas rnams sbyar bar bya/ /rdzas kyi cho ga rdzogs pa
dang / /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /mi dmigs chos la blo sbyang phyir/ /rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi don/ /rgya cher shin tu bshad par bya/ /phung po sgyu mar
snang bas na/ /sems la rang bzhin med par nges/ /snang srid nam mkhar gcig pas na/ /'khor ba sgyu ma yin par nges/ /kun gzhi chos kyi mdzod yin pas/ /
sangs rgyas gzhan na med par nges/ /byams la dang ma chags pas na/ /sdang la sems mi 'khrug par nges/ /gnas la nges pa med pas na/ /sa rnams bgrod
pa med par nges/ /sems la skye shi med pas na/ /'pho 'gyur dag la nyam mi nga / /des na thams cad sgyu mar snang / /sgyu ma rang bzhin med shes pas/ /thams
cad chos nyid snying po yin/ /mtshan ma rtog pa'i dri ma dag /chos nyid chu bo des bkrus na/ /'dzin pa'i dri ma dag par 'gyur/ /de nas rgyan gyi cho ga ni/ /rdzas kyi yo
byad yin pas na/ /rlob cing 'phur pa'i chos gos dang / /rin chen prog dang rna char bcas/ /'jo sgeg mgul rgyan la sogs pa/ /dpung rgyan do shal se mo do/ /
nor bu rin chen la sogs brgyan/ /rkad gdub lag gdub la sogs pa/ /gser dang dngul la sogs pas brgyan/ /rol mo sgra dbyangs sna tshogs pa'i/ /mchod
rdzas sna tshogs thogs par bya/ /de nas 'dren pa'i cho ga ni/ /gsang ba'i tshig gis bsre ba na/ /rdo rje lce yi dam tshig gis/ /tshig gi brdas ni mtshon par bya/ /sa
ma ya ho zhes brjod na/ /sa ma ya stoM zhes kyang bsre/ /ra ga ya mi zhes brjod na/ /ra ho haM zhes brjod par bya/ /ti pa su ki zhes brjod na/ /gan de tsi ta zhes pas
mtshon| |a ti pu ho zhes brjod na/ /pra ti pu ho zhes pas mtshon/ /g.yas kyi smin ma bskyod byas na/ /g.yon gyi smin mas mtshon par bya/ /na sa g.yas kyis
mtshon byas na/ /de bzhin na sa g.yon gyis mtshon/ /gtsug tor gtsug tu mtshon byas na/ /de bzhin dpal be'u ling+gar mtshon/ /rdo rje ling+ga 'od 'phro na/ /pad+ma ze
'bru 'bar 'phro 'khyil/ /zhes pa'i tshig gi don rnams bsre/ /skul ba'i cho ga khyad par yang / /don gyis 'di ltar bskul
bar rigs/ /shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od la bskul/ /skul ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /mchod pa'i yo byad dbul
bar bya| |de nas sangs rgyas thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngang du gsal bar gyur to/ /shes rab nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gsal bar gyur
to| |de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis 'di skad ces bskul to/ /mi g.yo mchog gi rgyal po dgongs su gsol/ /rnam par mi rtog shin tu dri med sku/ /'od zer mdangs
ldan zla ba rgyas 'dra'i zhal/ /dgyes pa rol pa'i don la bzhengs su gsol/ /de skad ces bskul ba dang / zla ba'i 'od zer las 'di skad ces bskul lo/ /
yid 'ong 'byor ldan rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings/ /shes rab zab mo'i rnam dag pad+ma'i mdangs/ /sgyu 'phrul rabs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog ma/ /yid 'ong
'byor ldan cho 'phrul sna tshogs bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yo byad kyi tshogs thams cad shin tu 'bul ba zhes bya ba'i cho 'phrul byung ste nyi ma'i 'od zer las sgra byung ba/
pad+ma'i ze 'bru 'bar ba 'di/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags na/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje cho 'phrul las/ /byang chub char sprin dbab tu gsol/ /zla ba'i 'od
zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra phyung ba/ e ma yid kyi dga' bde mo/ /gdung ba'i snying phreng shes rab gzungs/ /pad+ma'i ga 'u 'khyil ba la/ /bde ba'i rdo rje byang chub 'bar//
zhes sgra byung bas/ phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur to/ /de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'khor ba thams cad thugs rjes yongs su bzung ba
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thabs mchog zla ba zhes bya ba las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo / /'dod pa'i dbang po thams cad ni/ /chags
pa'i 'gying ba'i gtso mo yin/ /chags pa'i rnam par sbyad ba'i phyir/ /'dod pa gnas su drang bar bya/ /zhes phyung bas/ 'khor ba thams cad thugs rje chen po'i
lhung bzed kyis bzung ngo / /de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de sgrib pa sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje 'bar
ba'i ling+ga la/ /a yi ye shes 'od 'phros pas/ /chags pa'i sgrib pa'i bud shing rnams/ /me yi ye shes kyis sbyangs so/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des b+ha ga
byin gyis rlob pa la snyoms par zhugs nas gsungs pa/ 'khor bar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /b+ha ga'i snying por rab gsal
ba| |yum gyi lus kyi yan lag rnams/ /yum lnga'i rang bzhin nyid du gsal/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des chags pa thams cad
gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /chos nyid nam mkhar rtogs gyur na/ /sbyor sgrol mang po ci byas kyang //
chags sdang drang ba'i thabs yin te/ /rdul cha tsam yang snang ba med/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad la
dgyes pa'i rol pa la zhugs par gyur te mi dmigs pa'i bde ba la ci yang mi g.yo bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems kyi char chen po pad+ma'i snying po rgyun mi
'chad par 'bab par gyur to/ /'khor ba thams cad ni/ rgyal ba'i sras por bskyed/ rgyal ba 'gog pa ni/ byang chub sems kyis brlan par mdzad cing
srid pa'i myu gu mngon par bskyed/ rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ling lod phyad par byung ngo / /rig 'dzin gyi sems
dpa' thams cad ni/ shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyangs nas chos kyi sku'i nang du brlan par gyur to/ /de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'gro ba thams cad la dbang bskur pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/ /'khor ba'i sems can rgyu las byung / /'khor ba'i sems can rgyun
chad na| |sangs rgyas rgyun yang 'chad par 'gyur/ /'khor ba chos nyid rang bzhin du/ /shes nas smra bar gang byed pa/ /rig pa'i ye shes rang dbang de/ /chos
kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i sras/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des chos thams cad grub pa smon lam gyi sgo nas 'jug par mkhyen nas smon
gnas chen po'i lam 'di gsungs so/ /'gro drug rgyal ba'i sras po 'di/ /ma rtogs log par 'khyams pa rnams/ /rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed nas ni/ /'khor
ba'i rgyun rnams gcad par bya/ /nyi zla'i nang du bzhag nas ni/ /bcu drug sa la rdzogs par 'gyur/ /des na rigs ldan mtshan bzang la/ /don dang ldan pa'i mkhas
pa yis| |sbyor ba'i yan lag kun rdzogs nas/ /yum gyi mkha' dbyings zla gam la/ /grub pa'i gzhal yas khang du bskyed/ /rtsibs brgyad zla gam dgur
gsal la/ /byang chub sems las phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /lha dgu gsal pa'i ye shes bskyed/ /des ni thams cad rdzogs par
'gyur| |zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ gsang sbyor sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //
de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mi 'gyur ba gtan 'pho ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /
rnal 'byor rig 'dzin gang zhig rnams/ /mi 'pho bar ni gnas 'dod pa/ /lo gcig gam ni zla gcig gam/ /de bzhin zhag gi rnam grangs kyang / /bco
lnga'am yang na bdun bar du/ /tho rangs thun tha'i dang po'i tshe/ /rig 'dzin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas te/ /shar phyogs nam mkhas
bsdus pa yi/ /lha klu gnod sbyin 'jig rten bcas/ /thams cad khong du bsdus nas kyang / /dbugs de slar la mi dbyung bar/ /rang gi khong du bstim par bya/ /
tha mar sna yi nang du bsre/ /de ltar mang por bsgrubs pa dang / /dpal che gzi brjid thams cad 'thob/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje
snying po des rten pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /gang zhig rten la gnas 'dod pa/ /mtshan ma bzang po'i gnas
mchog tu/ /thams cad 'byor bar byas nas ni/ /sa las byas pa'i stegs bu bsham/ /dbus kyi pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /zla gam dmar po sgo bzhir ldan/ /mtha'
ma rdo rje ra bas bskor/ /dpal ldan tshe yi phyag rgya dgod/ /rin chen lugs kyi bum pa la/ /tshe rdzas rgyas par byas nas ni/ /mtshan ldan snod kyis kha dag ba bya/ /rdo rje
gzungs kyis brtags nas ni/ /tshe tshad med par mnga' gsol la/ /dbus su de bzhin gzhag par bya/ /rin chen bum pa bzhi rnams la/ /gsang ba'i bu mo bzhi
bkod gzhag /ya mtshan byung ba'i bum pa la/ /rigs bzhi sangs rgyas yab yum dang / /so so'i 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams/ /thabs dang shes rab bsdebs
nas ni| |phyogs phyogs gnas su tshom bur bri/ /sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi rnams gzhag /sems kyi phyag rgya kun bkod nas/ /nyi zla ga 'ur A yu ni/ /'khyil 'bar
'tsher zhing gsal bar bya/ /A yu byang chub sems su zhu/ /rgyal mtshan mchog ldan rin chen gter/ /dbang bskur dpal ldan mdzod ldan ma/ /gsang ba'i bu mo
tshe gter 'dzin/ /A yu yum bzhi'i thugs kang 'phros/ /de bzhin tshom bu rim par brgyud/ /rdo rje tshe mchog kun bsdus nas/ /dkar
dmar 'od kyis bdag la bstim/ /de nas rdo rje tshe phreng bzlas/ /nub phyogs tshe yi dbyings mchog gis/ /pad+ma dbang gi zhing khams su/ /byams ldan ye shes
tshe dpag med/ /thugs kyi dpal be'u chen po ni/ /gnyis gsal 'od kyi ga 'u na/ /byang chub sems kyi A yu 'bar/ /dmar gsal 'bar ba'i tshe mchog
de| |rig 'dzin rnal 'byor rnams la 'phro/ /'phros pa dgu lung dam pa yis/ /tsi ta'i dbugs la bkrag tu bslan/ /tshe nyams rgyu drug kun spangs nas/ /gzi
byin skye ba'i rgyu lnga bsgom/ /byang chub sems kyi A yu de/ /skye med dbyings su sbas nas kyang / /phyag rgya'i tha mar bdun gyis bshad/ /dang po sku gsung thugs
kyi rgya| |gnyis pa gnon pa'i rgya gram 'bar/ /gsum pa rta mchog dpal gyi rgya/ /bzhi pa rin chen dpal be'u ste/ /lnga ba gser gyi gu h+ya'o/ /drug ba zla gam
dmar po la/ /bdun pa nyi zla ga 'ur 'bar/ /tshe yi ngo bo rgyud gsum po/ /srog gi ngo bor gzhal yas khang / /le brgan 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /A yu
dmar po 'od 'phro ba/ /'chi ba med pa'i srog btsugs te/ /'gyur ba med pa'i g.yung drung yin/ /chos nyid dbyings su tshe spas pas/ /dus gsum rgyal ba dgrar
langs kyang / /de la gzung zhing bstan du med/ /de nas ci bde spyad par bya/ /rdo rje tshe sgrub pa'o/ /de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de rdo rje khro bo tshe kun tu 'phrog pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /gnas 'gyur maN+Dal 'bar byas la/ /ye shes khro bo 'bar ba yi/ /thugs kyi dpal
be'u'i 'od zer las/ /dbang gi lha mo mang po 'phros/ /za ma tog dang bcas pa yi/ /lcags kyu dkar dmar lag na thogs/ /de yis 'gro drug thams cad kyi/ /tshe
dang gzi byin thams cad 'phrog /za ma tog tu bsdus nas kyang / /tshe yi rig 'dzin rnams la bstim/ /ji ltar 'dod pa gong ltar sbyar/ /rdo rje gzi mdangs 'phrog pa
zhes bya ba'i mdo'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ rdo rje tshe sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas
sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas dur khrod gsang ba
mchog gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 'di rgya cher bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor
dam pa 'di/ /'khor ba thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor can la bshad par bya/ /nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ /sgrub pa'i gnas mchog
dam pa dag /skyon yon gnyis kyi bye brag las/ /nges par brtags te shes pa las/ /blang dor gnyis su sbyar bar bya/ /ri bo chen po 'dus pa'i rtse/ /gangs
dkar shel gyi 'dab che ni/ /seng phrug 'khra ba'i gnas yin te/ /thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i dkyil/ /dgon pa
chen po'i phug chen ni/ /gcan chen 'khra ba'i gnas yin te/ /mngon spyod chen po sgrub pa'i gnas/ /dur khrod ngam grog bshung ba'i gnas/ /sum mdo
grog gle rtsub pa'i ri/ /dur gcan 'khra ba'i gnas yin te/ /chags pa sgrub pa'i gnas yin no/ /nags tshal dra bas gtibs pa'i nang / /shin tu btsan
zhing 'jigs pa'i ngogs/ /stag gzig 'khra ba'i gnas yin te/ /'dod pa sgrub pa'i gnas su shis/ /chu mdo chu 'jigs rgya mtsho'i gling / /chu yi ra
bas kun bskor ba/ /chu gcan 'khra ba'i gnas yin pas/ /bya ba med pa'i las la bya'o/ /der ni yo byad phun sum tshogs/ /ci 'dod bltas te ma thogs par//
kha na ma tho bcas dang bral/ /'byor pas nan tan mchog bskyed pa/ /khams las gyur pa'i nad chen rnams/ /bcun gyi mchog gis bzlog bya'i phyir/ /rtsi'am
bcud dam thar pa rnams/ /nyer rdzogs su ni gzhag par bya/ /'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad/ /dug las gyur pa'i nad rnams kyis/ /rkyen gyis bar chad 'byung
srid phyir/ /sman dang mkhas pas bcas te sbyar/ /ka pA la dang lcang lor bcas/ /ga 'u chung la sogs pa'i rdzas/ /phyag rgya che dang ldan byas la/ /dngos grub
'byung ba'i rten du bya/ /sgrub mchog gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /skyo ba'i yid rnams bsang phyir dang / /gti mug mun pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /dung dang khar rnga rdza
rnga dang / /cang te'u pi waM ko ki la/ /snyan par rdzogs pa'i rdzas rnams kun/ /sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rol mo ste/ /nyer rdzogs su ni 'byor bar bya/ /shin tu gtams
pas tshogs chen ni/ /bla ma rdo rje 'khor lo rgyal/ /gsang ba sbyor ba'i dus chen du/ /grub chen sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /snying rje byams dang dga' snyoms dang //
gdung ba'i byang chub sems bskyed do/ /de yang shes dang shes bya yi/ /rtsal chen kun tu rdzogs pa ni/ /rdo rje snying po 'bru mchog dag /
shin tu gtams pas tshogs pa ni/ /bla ma rdo rje 'khor lo rgyal/ /yon tan mchog gi gter gyur cing / /srid pas zhus kyang zad mi shes/ /rkyen thub dbang lung
rdzogs par gzung / /rdo rje kun gyi gzugs 'dzin pa/ /kun sdud kun 'byung 'khrug med cing / /nam mkha'i khyon ltar kun la khyab/ /ma ltar byams pa'i yum
mchog gzung / /rgyud sbyangs brtul zhugs mchog 'chang zhing / /thogs med the tshom som nyi bral/ /'dzin chags med cing blang dor med/ /brtan ldan
gzungs thub rdo rje ging / /rdo rje drod kyi dus 'dzin cing / /tshig gi 'phen sdud skabs su sbyor/ /yon tan rlabs kyis 'phang bcad de/ /legs nyes dmigs
su gal 'dzugs so/ /rdo rje tshig gi gdangs skad can/ /rdo rje mthong ba rnam par dag /ngag gi dbang phyug tshig la mkhas/ /las kyi phreng ba rdzogs byed pa//
'di ltar sbyar ba'i dus chen yang / /nges par brtags te mdo gzung ba/ /rig byed dag gi yan lag las/ /shes par bya ste legs sbyar ba/ /bkra
shis lha yi nyi ma dang / /'byor dang dus tshigs bzang po rnams/ /'jig rten mtshan ma'i rtog pa ste/ /brtags na bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung / /dus cha bzhi yi
dang po ni/ /mchog nyid mngon spyod ro langs yin/ /dbyar tshe ston sman shis pa ste/ /zhi dang rgyas pa de bzhin sbyar/ /dbang du bsdus pa'ang dbang yin te/ /bam chen
gsang ba'i dus su bshad/ /nor 'dod rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyang / /cha bzhir khyab par sbyar bya 'o/ /sgrub pa chen po'i rdzas mchog dag /gal te dus la bab
gyur na| |dus 'di dngos grub dus chen te/ /dus 'di mkhas pas yong mi bcag /rnal 'byor las kyi dang po rnams/ /ci ste 'dod pa'i mtshan ma dag /yid
'ong 'byung zhing rtags rnyed pa/ /dam tshig gzungs 'du dus chen yin/ /sbyangs pas rtsal gyis mthar phyin cing / /shes blo'i yon tan tshogs rgyas pa/ /'di
dag tshad la bab pa ste/ /dus kyi mchog 'di nye bar brtag /'di ltar rgyu bzhi 'byor pa las/ /'bras bu'i dngos por grub pa ste/ /gru dang mnyan pa mkhas pa la//
brten pas rin chen lon pa 'dra/ /ji srid gnas pa'i rgya mtsho rnams/ /rang bzhin med pa kun gcig pa'i/ /bdag med tshogs bral lhun gyis grub/ /gcig
las rnam grangs ngang gis med/ /tha snyad dag par yongs chud na/ /nges pa'i don chen de nyid de/ /thams cad dag par 'gyur
ba 'o| |bdag dang gzhan du mi gnyis pas/ /bdag nyid bdag gi rang bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya gzhan na med/ /bdag nyid lhun grub dbang phyug che/ /
gang 'dod pa yi dngos po dag /ji lta ba bzhin 'grub 'gyur te/ /rdza mkhan 'phang lo srub pa ltar/ /gang ltar dmigs pa de ltar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i
khams su gzi che zhing / /'byung chen lnga la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /ngo mtshar rtsal gyi khyad par dag /gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin/ /de ltar brtson pa'i
sgrub pa dag /rdzas dang yo byad la sogs te/ /shes dang yon tan phun sum tshogs/ /gzhan du reg las med pa ni/ /thams cad tshang bar rdzogs pas
na| |phun sum tshogs zhes de la bya/ /gsang chen sgrub pa'i las 'di dag /'khor ba'i las dang mthun spyad cing / /nyon mongs lnga ltar spyod snang yang / /
'od kyis mun pa snang 'gyur ltar/ /skyon gyi yon tan chen po la/ /g.yo mtshang dngos grub chen por 'gyur/ /de ltar 'khor ba'i rka bzlog pas/ /mi gnas
ye shes rgya mtshor 'khyil/ /gnas rab brtag pa'i gal chen yang / /nam mkha' 'khor lo rdo rje dang / /rin chen zur brgyad pad+ma'i dbyings/ /rgya gram la
sogs 'dra bar brtag /sa gzhi yang ni de bzhin te/ /ri bo brtsegs dang bzur ba dang / /de bzhin sgreng dang gtams pa'i tshul/ /'dra bar mkhas pas brtag
par bya| |de yang rigs kyi khyad par ni/ /lnga la sogs pa so so yi/ /gnas gnas dag tu rtogs nas ni/ /nor bu rin chen de bsgrub bya/ /skyon gyi gnas dag
spang ba ni/ /gshin rje gdug pa'i mdung rtse dang / /ma mo rngam pa'i spar shad dang / /srin mo dus pa'i mchi rjes dang / /gnod sbyin khro bo'i rbab shul dang / /
'byung po kun gyi 'jol la sogs/ /gnas kyi skyon rnams dgra dang kun/ /mkhas pas nges par spang bar bya/ /kha na ma thor bcas pa dang / /nyams pa
las byung nyen dang bral/ /ma dag pa yi yo byad rnams/ /gdug can spang du 'ongs pa ltar/ /wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yi/ /bskal bas bshugs
te spang bar bya/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam/ /bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung ba dag /dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba yi/ /yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas
ni| |rtsod pa nye bar zhi bya'i phyir/ /snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sgrub pa brnag pa mthar dbyung phyir/ /rgyal po rten dang
'khor bcas la/ /bden pas bsgo ba'am yang bslad ba/ /dgongs shig thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha/ /lha klu gnod sbyin sde dpung bcas/ /gangs ri rtse dang
rin chen ri/ /kun dga' ldum ra skyed mos tshal/ /mtsho rdzing lu ma 'bab chu'i gnas/ /'jig rten 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /gang dag bdag por
gyur pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bdag nyid kyis/ /sa 'di lhun gyis grub bya'i phyir/ /'dzam gling grub pa'i sa slong na/ /'khor dang bcas pa 'dir
'khor la/ /rin chen gter gyi sa gzhi bslang / /zhes pas rin chen sna tshogs kyis/ /sa la gnas pas de mgu bya/ /des ni bdag gis de 'gyur zhing / /nyes
pa de dang bral ba yin/ /byang chub spyod pa g.yo ba dang / /bsod nams dga' ba skyed pa la/ /shes ldan rdzu 'phrul can gyi bu/ /ma skrag phrag
dog yong ma skye/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi sgrub ba po/ /bdud 'dul phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i tshe/ /ru dra tshogs kyi rgol ba la/ /skyes bu las kyi don bgrangs te/ /
don gyi dbang po'i phyir sbran pa/ /rgyal ba dbang phyug thams cad kyis/ /don mchog yang dag mdzad pa'i tshe/ /skyes bu rtsal gyi khyad par las/ /'di tshe dpang
mkhyen dmigs 'byed ma/ /sngon tshe dpal chen gar dbang gis/ /ru dra sde bzhi bsgral nas ni/ /gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyas mdzad nas/ /'gro drug thugs rjes
bsgral ba ltar/ /rnal 'byor sa la sbyor tshe 'dir/ /lha mos mkhyen par mdzad nas kyang / /bde chen sa la bgrod pa'i tshe/ /ru dra'i rgol ba 'byung ba 'am/ /
spyan ldan khyod kyis dpang mdzod cig /sgrub pa'i las mchog khyad par gyis/ /brtsam par bya ba'i las rnams kun/ /mtshan mas mtshan ma gzhom pa'i
phyir| |ro lnga'i mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /dge bar gyur na der gnas bya/ /gal te shis par ma gyur na/ /skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /mnan nam spo
ba'i las kyis sbyar/ /der ni bsod nams gter ldan phyir/ /rin chen lnga la sogs pa'i rdzas/ /sa gzhi gter chen rgyas par bya/ /bkra shis mchog tu bsngags
pa yin| |sa zhag spos chen rnam lnga'i khu/ /bsres bas kun tu gru bzhi ni/ /maN+Dal rgyas pa'i dbyibs 'dra la/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags ldan pas/ /mtshan
ma'i dngos po kun sbyangs te/ /rgyal ba zhugs pa'i rten du bya/ /rdo rje byin rlabs 'byung gnas dang / /gnas rnams shin tu brtan
bya'i phyir/ /mchog gi sbyor ba dag pa yis/ /sa gzhi gzung zhing byin gyis brlab/ /de dang der ni sa sbyangs te/ /thig gis yul bcad skabs dag tu/ /
rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i pho brang der/ /rdo rje drag po'i ging chen gyis/ /lce bag nag po'i dud pas bdug /rgyun mi 'chad du byas nas ni/ /khro bo drag po'i sngags
zlos shing / /rdo rje khro bo'i stabs kyis bskor/ /shes rab yul gyi 'jo tshul gyi/ /rnam gnyis rdzas kyi 'de gu dag /srin bal ye 'u sbyar ba yis/ /kun
tu zla ba'i thig le bya/ /rdo rje rgyal po 'phags rnams kyis/ /so so'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i rgya/ /so so'i stang stabs sbyar nas kyang / /de dag gnas su byin
gyis rlob/ /gsang ba'i don la zhugs bya'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i las kyi sngon logs su/ /bstan pa skyong ba'i mgon po la/ /sbyin mchod srung ba'i las
chen bcol/ /gzhal yas gnas kyi phyi rol tu/ /mgon po gnas pa'i rten gzhi dag /rin chen 'bras sam 'byung khungs sam/ /shing ngam pa so de
dag las/ /lugs sam phyag rgya'i gzugs byas te/ /mgon po bzhi ru mnga' gsol te/ /gnas kyi sgo srung so bar bya/ /ri rab gling bzhi'i phyogs phyogs
nas| |rdo rje gsang bdag dbang gi mthus/ /'jig rten skyong pa'i tha tshig can/ /mthu chen mgon po sde bzhi rnams/ /so so'i bgegs ris 'dul la mkhas//
chos skyong longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi mthar phyin pas/ /rigs bzhi kha dog so sor gsal/ /rang rtags lha yi mtshan ma thogs/ /
phyi 'khor skyong ba'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdag cag rnal 'byor rtsal sbyong gis/ /rang rang 'khor rnams thub par mdzod/ /sgrub pa'i rtsal 'di mthar dbyung zhing //
rkyen gyi bar chad bsal ba dang / /gsang ba'i man ngag sbyang ba'i phyir/ /'jug srid dam sri gnon par bya/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu/ /rnal 'byor
gsang ba'i gnas dag tu/ /dngos grub chu la rdul 'jug cing / /khro bo hUM chen kun 'dus nas/ /gsod cing gnon pa'i las bya ste/ /ri rab chen po rmad du
gtang / /ya ma rA dza'i zas su sbyin/ /chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru brdzangs/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas mnan/ /bdun rgyud rigs ni brlags gyur nas/ /
nam yang ldang bar mi nus te/ /byang chub sems ni skyes na gtang / /badzra muSh+Ti baM/ ma ma ba shaM ku ru nan/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha/ de ltar
drag po'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgo nas phyi rol bar khang du/ /mkha' 'dra'i khung bu byas nas ni/ /dug dang rtsub pa'i phye ma dang / /khrag sna tshogs dang mi ro
yis| |shin tu bsub cing gnon par bya/ /de nas rdo rje nang dag tu/ /seng+ge'i lta bas bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje gom pas phyogs nas ni/ /khro mig 'bar
bas phyir bltas te/ /'gyid bag tshul du brjid pa yis/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje spar nas ni/ /phyi nang rdul chen bsal bar bya/ /hUM/ stong gsum
stong gi 'jig rten na/ /skye 'gro rtsi shing nags tshal dang / /yod mthong snang grags ji snyed pa/ /kun kyang 'bar ba khrag 'thung ste/ /rngam chen gtum
thung she dag 'bar/ /dur khrod dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rak+Sha yak+Sha he ru ka/ /rak+ta kro d+hi dz+wa la kha/ /ha la ha la tiSh+Tha phaT/ /ces pas khro bo rol pa yi//
stabs dang ma mo'i rngam tshul dang / /phra men lhags pa'i rngam stabs kyis/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje dkrigs pa'i phreng ba dang / /
tho ba lcags kyu 'bar ba dang / /'khor lo ral gri la sogs rdzas/ /kun gyi phyag rgya mtshan mas bskor/ /de las 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang / /mig les
'bar ba'i me mched pas/ /me 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'dis/ /dmigs sam dngos su sbyar nas kyang / /'bar ba drag po'i yi ge las/ /sreg pa'i
dpal chen gur du gtams/ /hUM raM rdo rje me yi ri/ /lhun po 'bar ba'i rtse brgyad la/ /'bar ba'i lha brgyad bsgyel nas kyang / /dbang chen rdo rje bka' sdod
gnas| |shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba yi/ /gtum chen ha la rngam pa'i gzugs/ /lha chen khyab 'jug pags bshus nas/ /zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i na
bza' bsnams/ /gshin rje ma traM 'bar ba yi/ /ro dbyug chen po phyag na 'phyar/ /phra men dgu khri mang po dag /'bar ba'i tshogs ni gtibs thag bcad//
gang la cis 'dul der ston pa'i/ /tsi ta 'bar ba'i me phreng gis/ /do shal mgur chu phreng bas sbrengs/ /bskal ba'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong / /srid
pa'i rtse mor 'khyil zhing 'phro/ /nam mkha'i khams kun me dpung gtibs/ /rdo rje 'khor lo me lce 'phro/ /dur khrod dgon pa'i sa phyogs dag /me yi ri bo
'bar ba la/ /me yi yi dwags ma dag las/ /gang yang gnas par mi phod pa/ /steng gi me lce 'bar ba ni/ /'og gi phyogs su
'phro zhing 'khrug /'og gi me lce 'bar ba yang / /gyen du 'khyil zhing steng du thal/ /me lce dgu phreng 'bar ba dag /'ur chem 'chad pas 'thab cing 'khrug/
dur khrod me ni smug cing 'bar/ /zhe sdang 'joms pas mthing nag 'tshub/ /nga rgyal sreg pas ser nag 'phro/ /'dod chags mnyam pas dmar nag 'phro/ /
phrag dog sreg pas ljang nag 'khyil/ /gti mug sel bas smug nag 'khyil/ /'bar chen klong gi 'khor los gtams/ /dz+wa la maN+Dal ha la ha la raM/ /
me'i ri lag chu'i phyag rgya yis/ /gnas sam dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/ /chos nyid bdal ba'i nam mkha' la/ /ye shes lnga yi 'byung chen brtsegs//
kun gzhi bdal ba'i nam mkha' la/ /skyed ma'i 'byung chen rnam lnga brtsegs/ /bruM las rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal/ /mtha' dang dbus med kun tu
khyab| |ta la'i bskyed cing gser tsong dril/ /zla gam dam po dbang gi rgya/ /bruM khaM traM kha la ti bruM/ /zhes pas rnam lnga'i byug pa yis/ /gtor zhing kun tu
byug par bya'o/ /sgrub mchog skyong ba'i rnal 'byor rnams/ /rdo rje tshig gis btab nas ni/ /rgyal sras rig 'dzin bka' 'khor lo/ /'bras bur red phyir
byin gyis rlob/ /rdo rje rgyal dbang chen po das/ /sgrib pa sreg pa'i yi ge ni/ /phreng bar byas te gnas su 'phro/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste/ /rig
'dzin pho mo'i mtshan mas gdab/ /rnam lnga'i byug pas kun la gtor/ /rtags kyi phyag rgya lag tu sbyin/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i lugs su spyad/ /'jig
rten spyod tshul thams cad ni/ /sgyu ma yin phyir shin tu yang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod tshul dag /ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar spyad/ /e ma dur khrod gsang
ba yi| |rmad byung zhing khams dga' tshal 'dir/ /skal ldan dbang phyug rgyal ba'i sras/ /'dus pas tshegs pa'i rig 'dzin rnams/ /e ma ho dga'
mchog bde chen grogs/ /dam tshig srog gi lu gu rgyud/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis/ /sprul pa'i gshog sprugs gra rgyas pa'i/ /tshogs gnyis
rtsal gyis rlabs spar nas/ /chos nyid mkha' la lding bar rigs/ /a yaM dza laM khaM lhan/ de ring phan chad rgyal ba'i sras/ /dbang phyug yin pas ci bder
spyod| |rnal 'byor longs spyod bskyed pa dang / /dug rnams bdud rtsir 'gyur ba yi/ /maM las skyes pa'i ye shes kyis/ /
zangs kyi dngos po 'ju 'dul bya/ /dam rdzas yo byad longs spyod rnams/ /gong nas cha gsum so so nas/ /shan ma 'dres par sta gon bya/ /phyi yi
cha la 'jug pa yi/ /mchod sbyin spel ba'i yo byad bya/ /de gnyis gnyis pa'i cha dag las/ /mjug gi rgyal chos longs spyod bya/ /rmad byung nang
gi cha dag ni/ /thams cad gcig tu byas nas ni/ /ras sam shing khyon dag tu ni/ /bsdus te sgrub pa'i rdzas kyis dgab/ /dbyug pa chen pos de la
gtor| |lce phog nag po'i dud pas bdug /rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya dang / /'bar ba'i lta bas brjid par bya/ /tsham ngam chen po'i stabs kyis bskor/ /sna
tshogs bsur gyi dri chen gdon/ /de nas rgyal po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /yo byad de dag bdud rtsi lnga/ /dam rdzas so sor bsdus nas ni/ /de la 'bru lnga'i
'phro 'du las/ /zhu nas phyag mtshan rnam lngar 'bar/ /dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen por zhu/ /shes rab lha mo rig 'dzin ma/ /bzhi 'am yang na
rnam pa brgyad/ /rdzas sam yo byad rang bzhin pas/ /zas mchog gar gyis spyir blangs te/ /longs spyod spel ba'i dbyangs 'dis bstan/ /bdag cag
rig 'dzin shes rab ma/ /rgyal sras lha yi dngos grub 'dzin/ /dgyes pas tshim pa'i longs spyod dag /ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu'am/ /dpag
bsam shing ljon 'dod 'jo'i ba/ /ma rmos lo tog rgyas pa ltar/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod chen po dag /nam mkha'i khams su gtibs nas kyang //
rdo rje dgyes tshogs kun 'dus nas/ /skal ldan rnams kyis rab sprul cig /rdo rje gar gyi dbang bsgyur nas/ /sgeg pas lha mo 'jo tshul dag /'dud
cing sdod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /rol mo'i tshogs kyis dga' ba bskyed/ /oM shrI badzra lA s+ye hUM hUM/ badzra mA le trAM trAM/ badzra girti hrIHhrIHbadzra nirti aHaHrdo rje karma'i thabs
mchog gis/ /rdo rje glu 'dis gzi byin skyed/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi longs spyod 'di/ /rtsi mchog bcud kyi snying po ste/ /gzi mdangs rgyas par byed pa'i mchog /
bkrag 'dzin gzugs mchog dran pa'i dpal/ /rdo rje can gyi byin stobs kyis/ /skal pa can gyi zas su bya/ /skal med rnams kyi dug tu 'gyur/ /dper
na sbrul la 'o ma bzhin/ /sa ma ya dzaHku su tsa ma ma/ smug zil lha mo mnyen gsal ma/ /rlan rnams bdud rtsir sgyur
byed ma| |bdud rtsi chu rgyun dngos grub 'dzin/ /rang gnyer las skal chu rgyun 'bebs/ /shing lo 'dab las bdud rtsi sgyur/ /'bru thog sna tshogs dngos grub
'dzin| |rang gnyer las skal 'bras bur skyed/ /lha mo sra brtan dbang sgyur ma/ /khu ba bcud las bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi zhun chen dngos grub 'dzin//
rang gnyer las skal brtan par byed/ /rdo rje lha mo shel mdog ma/ /nyi zer bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma/ /gsal ba mdangs kyi dngos grub 'dzin/ /rang gnyer las
skal gzi byin skyed/ /lha mo khro gnyer sngo bsangs ma/ /dur khrod rdzas las bdud rtsir sgyur/ /sha chen sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin/ /rang gnyen las skal
byin 'bebs ma/ /rtse yi lha mo blo gros ma/ /rtsi thog bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma/ /rtswa mchog kun gyi dngos grub 'dzin/ /rang gnyer las skal tshim byed ma/ /sman
gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun/ /dug rnams bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma/ /bdud rtsi sman gyi dngos grub 'dzin/ /rang gnyer las skal 'di kun yang / /rdo rje glu yis brten
nas ni| |rnal 'byor chen po'i yo byad du/ /rol mos dga' ston longs spyod bya/ /de nas las kyi gnas skabs 'dir/ /phyi nang mthun 'jug bka' sdod
pa'i| |gshin rje chos kyi phyag rgya yis/ /bran gyi bya bar dbang bsdus nas/ /phyi mtshams srung bar dbang bskur te/ /'bur ram lugs sam ri mo 'am/ /
ci 'dra bar ni byas nas kyang / /phyi khyams sgo yi phyi rol du/ /ma he khri la bzhag nas ni/ /mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mgu byas la/ /de tshe 'di yis bsko bar bya/ /
gsang chen lhun grub pho brang nas/ /las kyi gshin rje'i pho brang nas/ /bcom ldan chos rjes bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin rig 'dzin sgrub pa pos/ /bka' gsang
gzhung tshan 'di sgrub cing / /yang dag don la des 'jug na/ /'di dag nor bu rin chen te/ /'di la rtod cing bar gcod pa/ /lha srin sde brgyad 'byung po kun/ /
khyod kyi 'khor dang g.yog yin te/ /rnam par smin pa'i chos shod la/ /gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pas/ /bla med 'bras bur ma gyur tsher/ /sa 'di yan
chad ma gtang bar/ /dpal chen mi pham bka' ma 'da'/ /bdag cag ye nas gnyis med de/ /de tsam don gyi dbyings su gcig/ phyi rol skyong ba'i mu ran
la| |rdo rje yal dam thub par mdzod/ /badzra ya ma rA dza sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes pas gshin rje mnas bsgags te/ /gal te
'das na kho bdag 'tshig /brtsam par bya ba'i las chen po/ /dngos grub 'byung bar byed pa'i rten/ /phyag rgya che dang gzugs mchog gi /stegs bu legs
par sbyangs na 'grub/ /mtshon pas khrid par byed pa yi/ /rdul tshon 'dus byas rgyu rnams la/ /brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor bshad bgyi ba/ /so sor brtags te bshad bgyi ba/
brtan zhing ngos 'jam khung bu la/ /'bor khung khod snyoms 'phang mtho ba'i/ /kha dog lnga yi gzugs byas nas/ /des ni mtshan ma'i dngos grub ster/ /shing shun ras sam
dur khrod kyi/ /zhing chen ras la kha dog lngas/ /phyag rgya 'bar ba'i gzugs bris na/ /de yang mtshan ma 'byung pa'i rten/ /rdo dang shel rdo la sogs pa/ /
dung ngam ba so'i rgyu las ni/ /mkhas pas 'bur du dod byas nas/ /mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du 'gyur/ /gser dngul rin chen la sogs pa/ /zangs lcags
khar ba'i rgyu dag las/ /mkhan gyis blugs te ma nyams na/ /de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur/ /blak+Sha byang chub shing la sogs/ /rgyud shing yal ga
mnyan pa las/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs de legs sbyar na/ /de yang rten du mkhas pas bshad/ /mnyen cing sbyin pa'i mchog rnams la/ /bzhin dang 'dril
khugs legs sbyar te/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs byas na/ /de yang brten pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams la/ /yi ge'am yang na
mtshan rtags sam/ /ming ngam thig ler rdzas la bri/ /bsgrubs na mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur/ /de las re zhig 'dir bshad de/ /stegs bu la brten
mtshan ma dag /bsgrub pa'i don du brtag bzung ba/ /brtsam pa'i thabs ni 'di lta ste/ /gong du smos pa'i rgyu rnams la/ /stegs bu mdzes shing mnyam
byas te| |kun tu gru bzhi cha mnyam la/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /me long lta bur snying por bya/ /snang byung yang dag byin brlabs can/ /ye shes rang
byung grub pa'i rdzas/ /bka' gsang rmad byung pho brang du/ /dur khrod rdzas lngas skyang nul bya/ /rdo rje srad bu'i thig gdab pa/ /cho ga rnam par bshad bgyi ba/ /
gsang ba'i lcang lo 'khril mang dang / /rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs pa/ /ring thung maN+Dal 'khor khyud la/ /'jur mdud can du ma gyur pa'i/ /sum sgril
snyoms par tshad ldan la/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gsal/ /rgyu de byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs/ /thabs dang shes rab
'brel ba yi/ /yi ge gnyis kyi 'phro 'du las/ /dkar dmar 'od kyi gser phreng 'phro/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs kyis de/ /byang chub sems 'dren 'khal
ba'i yum/ /nges par brtags te 'dir bzung ba/ /mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum/ /smin dkyus ring la lag sor phra/ /tshigs mig zlum la phra
bar bshad/ /kha nas ut+pal ngad ldang zhing / /lus la ga pur tsan+dan dri/ /yid 'ong mtshan ldan rked skabs phyed/ /skra 'jam mthon mthing g.yas su
'khyil| |so dkar tshags dam dkar dmar phyed/ /mig gi dkyus ring smin dkyus legs/ /zar ma'i me tog rgyas 'dra'i spyan/ /dpral ba'i dbyes phye skra
mtshams 'khyug /sna bzang mdog gsal pad+ma'i rigs/ /lus drang ske ring sems ma'i tshul/ /nu ma'i dkyil mtho zla rgyas 'dra/ /sha dkar tshogs dam
'khril bag chags/ /khong dal 'gro na gom pa 'jam/ /skad ni ngang pa gzhon nu sgrog /cir yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshul ldan/ /skyes bu bla mas yum
du gzung / /gzungs mar byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /yum gyi phung po gnas lngar ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga/ /'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang //
sangs rgyas byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/ /bde gshegs yum lnga'i sku mchog gsal/ /rdo rje yab la'ang de bzhin te/ /de ltar gsal bar gyur pa
dang / /yum gyi mkha' la me ri bsgom/ /gsang ba dbugs kyi zla gam la/ /byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du bya/ /gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba
bzhin| |yum gyi mkha' la de bzhin no/ /de nas rdo rje tshig 'di yis/ /lus kyi yum la nges par bsgo/ /shes rab lha mo gsang ba'i yum/ /'dod
rkur sgyur ba'i 'phrul me che/ /chags pa'i tshul gyis thabs la 'dud/ /g.yon du 'khril cing g.yas su 'khyud/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis zla gam sbyor//
gsang ba'i byang chub sems 'dren pa/ /khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i sras/ /rang bzhin chos kyi mtshan ldan ma/ /rdo rje las kyi yum yin gyi/ /gsang ba'i las
rnams kun byos shig /lag pa 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i tshogs bkod de/ /gsang ba'i byang chub dkar dmar 'di/ /thig le
yi ge'i ngo bor gdab /las kyi rdo rje 'bar ba yi/ /rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya yis/ /byang chub sems kyi thig 'di drongs/ /rdo rje gsang
ba'i las 'di drongs/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di gyis/ /oM tsan+d+ra d+ha ra hrI zhes pa'i/ /gsang ba'i thabs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdzas mchog 'bar ba'i thig
le yis| |gnas lnga dag gi gzhal yas su/ /gsang ba'i thabs kyi thig le bya/ /srad bu'i sbyor ba de rdzogs nas/ /gol sgrib rtag chad skyon bral
ba'i| |che chung ya yo med pa yi/ /rdo rje dbu ma'i thig 'di dgye/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas su/ /mi dmigs bdal ba'i maN+Dal la/ /ye shes lnga
yi thig 'phros pas/ /bde chen rnam thar phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /kun gzhi nam mkha'i gzhal yas su/ /nyon mongs rtog pa'i maN+Dal la/ /ye shes
'od zer thig 'phros pas/ /phyag rgya rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /mkha' dbyings gsang ba'i gzhal yas su/ /zla gam pad+ma'i maN+Dal la/ /byang chub
sems kyi thig 'phros pas/ /ye shes sems dpa' gsal ba'i tshogs/ /bkra shis dben pa'i gzhal yas su/ /mtshan ma rten gyi maN+Dal la/
rdo rje srad bu'i thig 'phros pas/ /cho 'phrul gzugs brnyan phyag rgya 'bar/ /stong gsum gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rmad byung rdo rje'i thig 'gyed na/ /gsang
ba'i dam la gnas pa yi/ /'byung po skye bo gdol pa can/ /rdo rje rtsal gyi hUM ring las/ /rdo rje mtshon cha'i bu yug 'tshub/ /phyogs mtshams bla 'og khro
bos gtams/ /'bar ba gsang ba'i mtshams bzung ste/ /phyi rol sde pa'i 'grul rnams gcad/ /rdo rje mtshon cha 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /sreg dang 'joms
pa'i drag shul can/ /rdo rje lce yis 'dir gdeg bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i gzhal yas su/ /rdo rje dpal be'u 'od kyi thig /me long ye shes rang bzhin can/ /rnal
'byor can gyis gdab par bya/ /de bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i zhal/ /pad+ma zla ba'i 'khor lo yi/ /dpag med nam mkha'i gzhal yas su/ /rigs kyi
dpal be'u 'od kyi thig /ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor can gyis gdab par bya/ /rdo rje mkha' la 'khro lo bskor/ /thabs dang shes rab
zung ya bzhis/ /so so'i phyag tu gnas nas ni/ /nam mkha' dbus kyis nying po la/ /srad bu bzhi yi rgya gram bre/ /de nas rdo rje brtan ba'i sa/ /dbus kyi pho
brang dgu pa ni/ /rdo rje srad bu'i thig chen gyis/ /phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams kun/ /che chung med par snyoms par bya/ /
'dir ni rdo rje mu khyud bdun/ /'byung ba'i rim pa drug bar du/ /'khor lo drug brtsegs snying por 'bar/ /gru chad rtsibs mtshan me ri 'phro/ /mu khyud
tshar gsum 'bar ba'i phreng / /bar khyams bzhis mdzes phyi khyams dang / /lngar gsal sgo dgu shar du brtsegs/ /pho brang de yi gnas gnas su//
phyag rgya'i tshul rnams 'byung ba ni/ /mu khyud mtha' zad yan chad du/ /yab yum drug cu rtsa bzhi yi/ /cho 'phrul dam tshig tshad med pa/ /rol pa 'jigs
byed 'jigs byed che/ /ka tsa li la sogs par bri/ /de bzhin za byed yab yum bzhi/ /las kyi lha ste he ru ka/ /'khor lo mtha' ma'i rtsibs la dgod/ /
gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dag /gru chad phyi dang nang la dgram/ /hUM chen bcu yi yab yum dag /shin tu mdzes par dang po la'o/ /de nyid la ni ma
brgyad dang / /ging chen bco brgyad rgyas par dgod/ /gnyis pa'i khyams la mkha' 'gro brgyad/ /shugs 'gro brgyad kyang de bzhin no/ /gsum pa'i
khyams la phra men brgyad/ /de bzhin 'bar ma brgyad rnams bri/ /bzhi pa'i khyams la phor thogs brgyad/ /de bzhin srin mo gzhong thogs brgyad/ /kun tu mdzes
par bri bar bya/ /lnga pa'i khyams ni tha ma la/ /rdo rje slas dang bran mo dang / /pho nya la sogs rgyas par dgram/ /de yang tshul du dgod pa ni/ /gong ma dag ni rgyu
rnams las/ /ka tsa li la sogs pa dang / /ji ltar 'byor pa de ltar bri/ /mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang / /rmad du byung ba'i rdzas mchog dang / /rdo rje
gsang ba'i rim gyis dkod/ /rdo rje gsang sgo phye nas ni/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs nas/ /rang bzhin yul nas phab nas ni/ /bsgrub pa'i dkyil
'khor der rdzogs bya/ /'dir yang don gyi khyad par gyis/ /rig 'dzin che ba'i sa sbar ba/ /shar gyi gdan gyi khyad par la/ /rdo rje seng+ges btegs 'khor lo/ /
zla ba nyi ma g.yas g.yon gyi/ /zhabs rten tshul gyi maN+Dal ni/ /rdo rje rgyal po yab yum bzhugs/ /lho yi gdan gyi khyad par la/ /glang chen rdo rjes btegs
'khor lo/ /pad+ma g.yas g.yon zhabs brten tshul/ /rdo rje rgyal ba yab yum bzhugs/ /byang gi gdan gyi khyad par la/ /pad+ma rdo rje btegs rgya gram/ /rdo rje
karma yab yum bzhugs/ /nub bam phyogs sam mtshams gzhan du/ /gzhi rnams gcig tu gyur pa la/ /maN+Dal rgyun ma
chad pa la/ /rdo rjes gtams shing sbrel byas nas/ /pad+ma phyogs gcig cher 'bar ba/ /kha dog 'bar ba'i 'od kyis dkrigs/ /rtsal 'phang che chung khyad
par gyis/ /skal dang ldan nam mi ldan pa'i/ /la la dag la zla ba ni/ /rangs pa'i gdan gyi mtshan ma la/ /de yang rtsal 'phang che chung la/ /la la rtse
gsum rdo rjes mtshan/ /la la rdo rje phyed mas mtshan/ /la la ma rangs zla gam kha/ /nang du bstan pas mtshan par bya'o/ /la la rtses 'bigs rnam
par mtshan/ /la la pad+ma brtsegs pas mtshan/ /la la dag la mtshan ma med/ /la las gdan de mi non te/ /nar ma gang zag mi yi rdzas/ /so
so'i bde ba'i thabs su sbyar/ /kun tu bde bar sbyar ba'i phyir/ /pi par stan zhes grags pa ste/ /kun tu khyab par lus bder sbyar/ /rmad byung bsgrub
pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /'jug dang dngos grub stsol ba dang / /dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya/ /'dod par bya ba sgrub pa dang / /gtor ma la sogs rdzas
kyi rnams/ /cha gsum dag la bgos nas kyang / /gcig ni sbyin sreg las mchog bya/ /gcig la rnal 'byor longs spyod gter/ /gcig ni mkha' 'gro'i
'khor tshogs bskyang / /gnas su bkra shis la sogs kyis/ /sgrub pa rdzogs pas mthar dbyung ngo / /dur khrod gsang mchog dbyings nyid la/ /dkyil 'khor
dgu brtsegs dpal gyi rgya/ /ye shes dgu yi khong gseng gsal/ /me ri 'od kyi thig thag gcad/ /'khor lo tshogs chen bsgrub pa'i sa/ /rnal 'byor rtsal
mchog can gyi gnas/ /sgrub pa rtsa yi dkyil 'khor te/ /dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi mdo/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i
mdo las/ /tshogs chen 'dus pa'i sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ rig 'dzin thams cad nges par 'grub par 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin thams cad
kun rdzogs nas/ /rigs kyi khyad par 'di dag dbye/ /so so'i rigs su bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje can la dpal be'u ni/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'bar ba 'o//
de bzhin rin chen rin chen te/ /pad+ma dmar po 'od kyi dkyil/ /las ni kun tu rgya gram 'bar/ /de bzhin rin chen 'khor lo 'bar/ /
so so'i rigs rnams gtsor gzhag ste/ /'khor ni de bzhin mi 'gyur ba/ /rnam par bkod de legs sbyar nas/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa/ /sgrub dang
sgrub chen rdzogs par bsgrub/ /ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni/ /so so'i rigs ni gang yin pa/ /ting 'dzin bye brag mang po la/ /yid kyi sbyor ba gsal bar
bya| |nges ni rig 'dzin gang 'dod pa/ /gsal bar nges par 'grub pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/
rdo rje rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen
po'i tshogs/ chos thams cad ni/ blang dor med par rig par bya'o/ /chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin la/ /bzang ngan rtog pa'i tshig dang bral/ /bdag dang
gzhan du dbyer med de/ /gtsang ngam mi gtsang gnyis su med/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i rig 'dzin mi'i thod pa can mang po
dag rnam par 'dzin pa rnal 'byor gyi gral nas langs te/ a la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po brjod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa la bdag cag shin tu gnas par 'tshal na/ bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs so/ /zhes gsol
pa las| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi'i thod pa can rnams/ rang rang ji ltar dga' ba'i dam tshig rnams spobs pa skyed la phul cig
ces gsungs pa las/ 'dod chags kyi rig 'dzin bram ze mi'i thod pa can rdo rje thal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi dam tshig ni/ 'di lta ste/ ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /bud med thams cad thams cad la/ /
'dod pa'i chags pa ci spyad kyang / /yang dag rig ni mi gos so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas rig 'dzin rak+Sha mi'i thod pa can zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi dam tshig 'di lta ste/ /sems can thams cad bsad nas kyang / /zag pa mi gtsang snyigs ma dang / /mi sha la sogs
thams cad kun/ /zos na dam tshig mchog lags te/ /mthu dang gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi dam tshig de lag
so| |zhes gsol to/ /de nas yang gnod sbyin rig 'dzin yak+Sha mi'i thod pa can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi
dam tshig 'di lta ste/ /mi yi bdag po thams cad la/ /'dod pa thams cad 'phrog pa dang / /gser la sogs pa brku spyad kyang / /yang dag rig ni
mi gos te/ /'dod pa grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /bdag gi dam tshig de lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas yang mu stegs rig 'dzin 'od srung
ral pa can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi dam tshig ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi yi mgo bo bcad nas kyang / /
bzang dang ngan ni bye brag rnams/ /rig pas brtags te shes byas nas/ /bzang ba'i rtags can bsten bya ste/ /dkar po ra ri lcang lo can/ /'di dag
rtag tu su 'chang ba/ /'dod pa thams cad 'grub pa ste/ /rgol ba thams cad 'joms par nus/ /yid bzhin nor bu ci 'dra bar/ /de yi yon tan
'di las byung / /bdag gi dam tshig de lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas yang bram ze sha la dga' ba dang / sha za mo'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi dam tshig ni/ 'di lta ste/ ba glang khyi sha rta sha dang / /mi sha glang chen sha la sogs/ /sha rnams
'dra bar gtsang sme med/ /zos na yon tan sna tshogs 'grub/ /bdag gi dam tshig de lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas yang srin mo'i rig 'dzin khrag 'phrog
ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi dam tshig ni/ 'di lta ste/ /srog chags sems can thams cad kyi/ /bsad
pa'i khrag ni dron mo dag /'thungs na gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi dam tshig de lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo la sogs
pa bud med kyi tshogs thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig 'di lta ste/ bro gar glu tshig chen po ni/ /thams cad bsten
pa'i mchog lags te/ /bro yi 'jo tshul stabs chen dang / /glu yi snyan dngags don bsgrags nas/ /yid kyi dbang po thams cad 'phrog/ bsten pa'i thabs
kyis 'khrig spyod pa/ /'di ni dga' ba'i dam tshig ste/ /bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lags/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas rig
'dzin de kun gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyi spyi'i dam tshig ni/ 'di lta ste/ dkar nag las ni ci spyad kyang //
rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / /rab 'bring tha dad bye brag med/ /de bzhin 'di la bde sdug gam/ /dge dang mi dge'i rtsod pa med/ /rnon po'i mtshon gyis
gcad du med/ /ci phyir rnam pa bdun stong pas/ /thogs pa med pa'i don phyir ro/ /srog kyang gcad cing gsad du med/ /ci phyir rdzas 'di 'jigs pas so/ /sdig
pa chen po'i las rnams kun/ /bdag gis byas sam gzhan byed bcug /gal te gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /sems can de la sbyin byin dang / /de bzhin gang+gA'i bye snyed
kyi| |sems can thams cad bsad pa gnyis/ /yang dag rig la tha dad med/ /nam mkha' dag la rdul dang chus/ /ji ltar mi chags pa bzhin no/ /gang zhig
khrel dang 'dzem ldan na/ /dogs pa'i rtog pa de bzung bas/ /dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur/ /chags pa'i spyod pa la sogs kyis/ /lus rnams gdung
bar byed pa yi/ /sems can de ni 'du shes chung / /zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /e ma ho thod pa can
gyi tshogs/ /khyed kyis smras pa'i tshig 'di rnams/ /mdud pas bcings pa'i tshig yin te/ /khur dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag yang dag ces smra ba/ /
yang dag nyid kyi mdud pa ste/ /mdud pa bkrol ba ma byas na/ /tha mar phyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /chags pa'i las rnams sbyor ba dag /chags pa'i dbang gis der
sbyor na| |de dag de yi grong khyer du/ /gnas 'gyur de yi sems can yin/ /'du shes sgyur ba'i las chen dag /sdang ba'i dbang gis sems shor nas/ /shan pa gsod
pa'i rig 'dzin du/ /ltung 'gyur sdig pa'i ri bo yin/ /rgyal ba rnams ni gtsang ba na/ /gang che bder gshegs rgyal ba'i zhal/ /mi gcang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /
yongs su bstabs par gyur na ko/ /de tshe las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /thar med nad kyis bzung nas ni/ /'dam du bying bar mi 'gyur ram/ /sha dang khrag la sogs pa'i zas//
dku ba'i rngad zas chen po ste/ /gang gis zos pa'i lus rnams la/ /'byung po dri za kun 'dus nas/ /dri snom ro dang bcud rnams 'byin/ /des ni gzi mdangs yal 'gyur
na| |ci phyir ci ste de rnams bza'/ /sems nyid rin chen yod bzhin du/ /gzhan gyi rin chen spyod byed pa/ /log pas log pa len
pa'i chos/ /'di dag mdud pa dam po yin/ /dkar nag las la khyad med ces/ /thams cad khra bos spyod pa ni/ /rigs med rigs chad log pa'i las/ /'bras
bu log pa'i khams su 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mnyes bya'i las rnams la/ /yan lag tshig tu ma dag na/ /nyes byas las kyi rgyu des ni/ /gang gi dus
rnams thams cad du/ /dbang po'i yan lag ma tshang zhing / /dran pa'i snying po nyams par 'gyur/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /bder gshegs
rgyal ba sgom zlos pa/ /cho 'phrul khro tshul bstan pa ltar/ /mtshan ma nyid du der go na/ /las kyi srin po'i rig 'dzin yin/ /rgyan dang cha lugs thams cad
kun| |mtshan ma nyid du brtags gyur na/ /ci la'ang rtog cing chags pa yi/ /'dzin pa'i phur pa chen por 'gyur/ /a dang hUM la sogs pa yi/ /rgyu yi yi ge
thams cad kun/ /mtshan ma nyid du der brtags na/ /tsan+dan sbrul gdug la sogs par/ /ltung 'gyur rtog pa'i gegs chen yin/ /khrag la sogs pa'i rdzas
chen lnga| |de nyid dngos por de brtags na/ /'byung po khrag gi dri snom pa'i/ /lus len rigs ni 'dzin pa yi/ /ma bdun rngam pa'i cha lugs su/ /gang zhig rtog par der go na//
srin mo mi sdug sha za mo/ /lang+ka'i yul du de dag 'khor/ /mtshan ma'i bla thabs mgo brnyan can/ /der btsan der bzung dmigs pas ni/ /sho gam gnas kyi gcan chen
rigs| |'dzin cing gnas der rtog par 'gyur/ /las kyi dbang btsan bran mo'i tshogs/ /de 'dra nyid du de brtags na/ /gnod sbyin chen mo'i tshogs su 'gyur/ /gzhan
gyi tshe la 'tshe ba yin/ /des na mdud pa chen po 'di/ /khur du bshal ba'i gdongs yin te/ /'tshal pas lta ba'i mig long ste/ /sems kyi nor bu rin chen de/ /rtag
chad khams su stor bar 'gyur/ /de lta'i skyon chen spang bar gyis/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/ thod pa can gyi tshogs rnams rtog pa'i 'du shes kyis zin
cing rang rang gi spyod pa la skyo ba skyes par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma ho/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyi
dam tshig ni/ log pa'i dka' thub tu 'gyur ba lags na/ 'di dag yang dag pa'i dka' thub tu gnas par 'tshal na/ chos thams cad ni/ sgyu ma lta bu ste/
cir yang 'gyur ba lags so/ /gsang sngags chen po'i sgo ni/ bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu ste/ bdag cag rnams kyis
rtog pa so sor ji ltar mos pa ltar bshad du gsol/ zhes zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgyes pa chen po'i bzhad pa mdzad nas rigs kyi bu
rnams ni/ de ltar zhu ba legs kyi/ shin tu nyon cig /khyed rnams kyi spyod pa mi dgag par ji ltar dga' ba'i bsam pa so sor rabs par bya ste/ 'jig
rten mtshan ma'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams gsang sngags kyi dka' thub chen por bya'o/ /rang rang gi spyod pa ma bkag par sgo gsum lhug
par spyod cig /de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /e ma ho thod pa can gyi tshogs/ /bud med bud med thams cad kun/ /skyed
par byed pa'i rten yin te/ /'bras bu smin pa'i zhing yang yin/ /bsgral zhing gdon pa'i gnas yin te/ /shes rab dga' ba'i yul yin no/ /'di la sems
gsum gnas pa ste/ /ye nas dag pa chos nyid sems/ /mkha' dang sbyor ba byang chub sems/ /snying rjes sgrol ba gsum sbyar te/ /chos nyid gsang ba nyi shar khyab//
snying rjes sgrol ba gsum gyis sbyar/ /ting 'dzin byin brlabs ye shes kyis/ /chos nyid dur khrod mkha' la bsgral/ /bsgral ba'i rgyu mchog man chad nas/ /shel
chen car la sogs pa/ /de la rgyu drug sa bon gdab/ /rang bzhin ye nas de gzhom bya/ /khyad par 'das pa'i yi ge lnga/ /gnas bkod 'phros pas mtha' yas
bkang / /thams cad stongs shing zad byas nas/ /'dus pa'i yi ge lnga ru gsal/ /de las phyag mtshan ye shes lnga/ /mi gnas ye shes ngang du thim/ /sgrib pa'i phung
por smin pa de/ /rdo rje rol pa'i rngam tshogs kyis/ /'jo tshul stabs kyis sbyar bar bya/ /kha T+wAM la sogs sngags bcas pas/ /bsgyel te ma rig sgo dbye bya/ /rnam
shes dbugs kyi sgrom drangs la/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i rlung sgrom du/ /bsdus te rdo rje dbugs can la/ /hU byas sgril ma de la bslan/ /gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil
'khor du/ /tshon gang 'od du bstim par bya/ /yu ti a haM gis sbar te/ /gsal na de dang mnyam du gsal/ /rdo rje tshe la bslan par bya/ /rdo rje rlung gis dbugs
sbar te| |thugs las rlung sgrom lam du sbar/ /nam mkha' chos kyi gzhal yas su/ /nyi ma'i steng du hUM du gsal/ /ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba/ /nyi zla ga
'u'i bar du gsal/ /a yang phaT kyis bskyod 'phangs pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar 'phros/ /ye shes sems dpar gsal ba
la| |dngos por snang bar 'dzin dang bral/ /g.yo 'gul 'phar 'phrig ma chad par/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur te/ /rigs kyi lha dang snying po sbyin/ /rdo rje gdung pa'i
glu blangs te/ /man ngag gnas kyi smon lam gdab/ /bzhi tshal dag tu byas nas ni/ /sman gyis bstabs te phung por btsal/ /'khor ba'i phung po de bsdus la//
rdo rje stabs dang klu yis sbyang / /gnas gnas dag tu bsngo bar bya/ /phung po mchod pa'i rdzas su bstim/ /rdo rje pra yi las rnams gdab/ /des ni mnyes dang
skong pa dang / /rdo rje las rnams 'grub pa yin/ /rnal 'byor las kyi dbang phyug che/ /mtho gtsang shes rab gangs rum nas/ /rig pa'i sder mo spar shad
can| |nga rgyal dregs pa'i glang po 'joms/ /rnal 'byor rtsal rgyas seng phrug rnams/ /rdo rje rtsal chen 'di sbyangs pas/ /rnal 'byor lha mchog gshegs
pa'i rten/ /dngos grub 'byung ba'i rin po che/ /mthu stobs skye ba'i thabs chen po/ /byin rlabs phebs pa'i dbang mchog 'dis/ /rgyal ba'i dngos grub man
chad nas| |mkha' 'gro'i cho 'phrul thams cad dang / /dregs pa ma rungs sde pa rnams/ /thams cad dbang du 'gyur nges na/ /'byung po gzhan lta smos ci dgos//
'khor ba'i skam gling chen po la/ /rigs drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /rgyud drug 'das pa'i rnam shes srog /dus gsum mtshon gyis bsad pas na//
rtag chad mthar shi'i ro gling nas/ /gti mug bam chen ro blangs nas/ /bdud rtsi sman chen ye shes kyis/ /rtag chad mtha' las ro blangs shing / /byang chub sems
su gsal ba'i phyir/ /ro yi rdzas rnams btsal bar bya/ /khro tshogs rngam par bdag byas te/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig nang nas/ /mthing nag hUM gi seng chen ni/ /
'khor ba'i ro gling khams su spro/ /bsgral ba'i dur khrod mtha' dag kun/ /ye shes rol pa'i zhing du blta/ /khro bo gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis/ /tsham ngam chen
po'i rngam tshul gyis/ /dpa' bo rdo rje'i 'dzur 'gros sbyar/ /thabs chen bco brgyad stabs kyis sbyar/ /'jo tshul thabs kyis 'gro stabs kyis/ /'dzem tshul lta
zhing rnam par rtsen/ /sgra skad bsgyur zhing he hes sgrog /'thab cing rtsod pas rnam par rngam/ /'bri chugs lta zhing 'drog tshul spyod/ /g.yas su lta zhing g.yon du
'gyur| |yid ma ches te phyir yang lta/ /sdang mig logs kyis khyab par blta/ /rdo rje 'gros su rgyug cing 'gro/ /ha ha ru lu'i rngam sgra
sgrog /so so'i brda skad 'byin byed cing / /bstod pa'i tshul gyis mchod zhing rgyug /yid bzhin gter chen kha phye nas/ /'dod 'byung rin chen phung po de/ /
'khor ba'i rnam smin dpyis phyung nas/ /rnam gsum dug chen gtan sprugs nas/ /thugs rje rngam pa'i kha long kha/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs chen gyis/ /
dngos grub lo tog phral nas kyang / /rdo rje bzhin phyogs ma nor bar/ /shel phur gnyis kyis gsang nas bzung / /nges par gshin pa'i gzhi ma la/ /cung zhig
brtod de nye 'khor bsgyur/ /bzhin phyogs gang bltas legs nyes brtag /phyi yi bzang ngan de nyid ni/ /nang du nges par gsal ba yin/ /nyes pa'i mtshan
byung mkhas pas mnan/ /gal te dri bas gleng slong na/ /de yi the tshom gsal ba dag /dngos por spyod la zhugs rnams kyis/ /mtshan mar rtog pa 'di dag
rnams| |'jigs byed bka' la btags pa yi/ /'dod chags bdag po nga la gsol/ /ji skad smras pa de bshad kyi/ /mtshan ma'i rdzas rnams rtogs par
gyis| |'jig rten mgon khyod bdag la gson/ /bdag cag spyod pa gsol bar bgyi/ /snod kyi mtshan nyid bzang ngan gyis/ /nyes dang legs pa 'di las byung / /skyon
gyi mtshan ma bdun pa ste/ /kha sbub pa dang gdan las bskyod/ /rgyud mi 'phel dang mtshams su gas/ /bar chad 'byung dang bgegs ldang ba/ /mtshan ma ngan pa
'byung ba 'o/ /'di dag mkhas pas yongs mi 'chang / /legs pa'i rgyu ni bcu gcig ste/ /gsum gyi dngos grub thob pa dang / /rig 'dzin lam 'gro nam mkhar
'phur| |khams gsum dbang bsdu rdo rje spyan/ /pha rol g.yul zlog zil gyis gnon/ /mthu dang byin rlabs tshe 'phel dang / /mtshan ma gsal po 'byung ba dang / /
slob ma chu yi rgyud 'phel dang / /dmigs pa'i bsam pa 'grub pa dang / /phyi mar sangs rgyas myur ba dang / /dngos grub rnam gsum thob pa ste/ /smon lam bzhin
du 'grub pa 'o/ /de yang bye brag 'di lta ste/ /phyed du 'gyur na thob thang yin/ /sum cha tsam la btang snyoms so/ /de yang so so'i mtshan rtags su/ /brtag cing
ming du brjod bya ba/ /dkar po spros med chos kyi sku/ /lcang lo kun rdzogs longs spyod ldan/ /ma 'ongs sprul pa mdzad pa'i rgyun/ /'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs pa'i/ /rnal
'byor sa la 'gro ba'i rigs/ /bder gshegs dus gsum 'byung ba'i rtags/ /rin chen gter gyi ga'u 'di/ /thabs kyi rgyal po dpal
gyi dkor/ /pho brang rtags/ ldan snod bcud rdzogs/ /'phrul zhal yid bzhin 'dod zho'i ba/ /rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i mchog /ngo mtshar thog thog rkan sgra can/ /
rmad byung gsang ba'i rang sgra dag /rig 'dzin rtsal can kun la sgrog /nga ni skyes mchog rtsal can gyi/ /rmad byung sgrub pa'i rdzas yin pas/ /su zhig dngos grub gang
'dod pa/ /the tshom med par dus 'dir longs/ /gang dag bka' ltar mi byed cing / /su zhig dam la mi gnas par/ /nga yi gzugs mthong tsam gyis 'tshig /sgra
thos tsam gyis brlag par 'gyur/ /zhes pa'i sgra byung cho 'phrul ni/ /rgyal ba'i gzhal yas kun las sgrog /'di dag don dang ldan par spyod/ /'di ltar grags
pas nges don ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis shes bya ba/ /thams cad dpal ldan lcang lo can/ /la la bkra shis mtshan ldan te/ /de bzhin paM tsa ku la yin/ /la la
dpyad kyi na sha yin/ /de bzhin mi 'gyur sra mkhregs yin/ /ma hA ke sa dpal dang ldan/ /ye shes lnga ldan zhes ni bya/ /A yu pA la tshe yi mchog /la la me le
de byi brtan/ /la la de bzhin kha swa kha/ /kha hu pa yi dpal dang ldan/ /bkra shis don 'byung de lta'o/ /bde gshegs mtshan ldan rdzogs pa yin/ /gtsug phud dge
gtsug dpal dang ldan/ /dz+nyA na mUrti de bzhin no/ /la la dz+nyA na kuN+Da li/ /de bzhin khro bo kuN+Da li/ /e ka dza Ti mtshan ldan pa/ /a bi mu ka rdzogs pa'o/ /'dod pa
brtan zhing bde ba skye/ /gnyis med don ldan thob pa'o/ /bu tra mang 'phel lcug phran rgyas/ /rdo rje bse phor mtshan rdzogs nas/ /shel phor gsang ba'i don 'byung
ba| |sku gsung lhun grub ka pA la/ /thams cad re ba yid bzhin skong / /de bzhin yon tan rdzogs kun rdzogs/ /bkra shis mtshan ni kun ldan pa/ /de bzhin mi
'gyur g.yung drung brtan/ /mi shigs mdzod yin kun 'byung ba'o/ /cho 'phrul rtags 'byin dam pa 'byung / /srid pa yongs sgrol las kyi mchog /khams gsum
dbang sdud khyad par ldan/ /drug gsum gtan sprugs las mchog can/ /mtshan ma'i spros bral nges pa'i don/ /rigs drug mdog drug dbyibs drug dang / /yon
tan skyon rnams sbyar bar bya/ /mang dang nyung ba'i gsang ba ni/ /bcas dgar 'phel dang mgon mi 'byung / /rjes 'dra la sogs skyon rnams spang / /dug gsum
stong mdzad rgyal ba'i bka'/ /sku gsum smin pa'i g.yung drung rtags/ /sba thabs gsang ba'i man ngag 'di/ /skal ldan rnal
'byor rnams kyi ste/ /skal med kun gyi rtog pa'i bdud/ /ming tsam 'dzin la ga la brtan/ /mkhas pas brtag cing bzang po brten/ /dngos grub 'byung
ba'i dus chen yang / /gcig dang gsum ni rab tu bshad/ /de bzhin lnga bdun 'bring du grags/ /dgu ni dngos grub tha ma ste/ /bcu gcig phan chad
yal bar bshad/ /de bas rnal 'byor rtsal chen gyis/ /nges par brtson de brtag par rigs/ /'dod chags bdag pos de skad bshad/ /mtshan ma yin
phyir der nges pa/ /mtshan ma can dang mthun bya'i phyir/ /thabs kyis de dang mthun spyod la/ /yang dag don la kha lo sgyur/ /de dag rnam par spyad pa dang / /
'gro drug shin tu g.yeng ba can/ /yid rnams drangs te brten byas nas/ /thabs kyi don la sbyar ba'i tshig /rgyu drug 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la/ /glu bro gar
gyi rol pa yis/ /srid gsum zil gnon dbang sdud pa/ /'jig rten mthun 'jug spyad par bya/ /dper na 'jig rten khams dag na/ /'gro bas 'gro ba
'dul byed pa/ /de dga'i las la de zhugs te/ /de dang bsam pa mthun spyad pas/ /de dang 'dris nas de dga' byas/ /de nas de yi drod lon nas/ /de yi 'du shes
sgyur ba'i tshig /de snga bdag gi grogs khyod kyi/ /las la zhugs pa shin tu nor/ /'dir nyes las kyis bsags pa bgrang / /nyes kyang bdag gis khyod dag
bya/ /de ni bdag dga'i las 'di la/ /grogs khyod shin tu 'jug dgos so/ /byas pas de yi snga sems de/ /zin pas gcig gi phye sems kyang / /'dzin
cing de dga'i las la 'jug /spyod pa'i las kyang 'di lta ste/ /rgyu drug 'dus pa'i phung po la/ /ngan song gnas 'joms rdo rje'i brtags/ /ye shes thabs kyis
snyan pa'i glu/ /rmad byung gsang chen sgrog pa'i tshig /nyon mongs lnga yi sa gzhi la/ /yi ge ye shes snga gsal bas/ /'bar ba khrag 'thung sprin phung bzhin//
khyu mchog lnga yi stobs kyis rol/ /seng+ge nga ro rngam pa'i glu/ /rdo rje don rab sgrog pa'i tshig /rmad byung rol pa'i don byung ba/ /e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan che/ /dgyes
pas rol pa'i byin rlabs las/ /rgyud drug rtsad gcod ngo mtshar che/ /mnyam pa chen po'i nam mkha' las/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i me byung bas/ /'khor
ba'i khrag gi rgya mtsho bskams/ /sdug bsngal dbyings su zad mdzad do/ /mi gnas klong nas cho 'phrul pa/ /gtum rngam 'khrug
pa'i ngo bor 'bar/ /khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sprin 'phros pas/ /srid gsum khrag mtsho rngo nas bskams/ /dpa' bo tsham ngam gyad kyi stabs/ /srin po ma grangs
khros pa'i glu/ /theg chen rmad byung gsang ba'i tshig /chags pa'i rtod phur gting nas phyung / /mkha' bzhi dbyings kyi bde klong nas/ /tshom bu 'bum gyi cho 'phrul
'phros| |dgyes mchog rol pa'i 'phrin las las/ /la la shes rab thabs la rol/ /la la thugs rje las la rol/ /la la gdul bya'i yul la
rol| |la la ye shes dbyings la rol/ /thabs kyi rgyal po rtogs pa'i dbang / /che ba lung gi khyad par las/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor/ /rdo rje pad+ma
rol pa'i stabs/ /chags med mkha' la gsal ba'i tshig /dus gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i glu/ /'jig rten rim gyis sbyang ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten
khams su rol pa byung / /'jig rten drug gi snying la rol/ /bdag po gtso bo zil mnan nas/ /'khor ni snyan pa'i tshig gis bsten/ /'khor ba'i lam
lnga rgyud bcad nas/ /rnam thar nam mkha'i ngang du bslan/ /gar mchog glog ltar 'gyur ba yi/ /rmad byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /yi ge 'bar ba'i cho 'phrul
'phros| |'phro 'du skar ltar 'khrugs pa las/ /khams gsum bud shing thal bar brlags/ /rdo rje bu yug skar mda'i stabs/ /rdo rje 'brug chen ldir ba'i
glu| |don grub rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig /gdug pa'i dpung rnams rnam par 'joms/ /rdo rje sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bas/ /thabs kyi byang chub sems sprin
spros| |dbang sdud chags pa'i khyad par las/ /'jig rten bu mo drug dang rol/ /seng+ge rnam par rol pa'i stabs/ /rdo rje khyung skad 'gyur ba'i glu/ /chags pa
rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshig /rdo rje rol pa'i don chen po/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /mtshon cha 'bar ba'i yig 'bru 'phros/ /rgyu drug ngo bo rtsad
nas gcod/ /dug lnga'i phung po rnam par spros/ /ye shes rno dbal mtshon chen po/ /chos nyid bdal ba'i klong nas 'phro/ /thabs mchog dbyig gi rtsal shugs
las| |'bar ba'i mtshon cha char ltar 'bab/ /yi ge ye shes mtshon cha'i char/ /rdo rje lce yi shugs kyis dbab/ /rin chen gter gyi longs spyod rnams/ /
rtog pa'i ri bo gzhom pa dang / /dug gsum phung po gzhig pa'i phyir/ /'khor lo lcags kyu la sogs pa/ /rten dang gsang chen
til mchog dang / /dwangs ma la sogs sgo kun rnams/ /so so'i cha ru phye nas ni/ /thugs rjes nyon mongs sbyong ba yi/ /so so gnyer gyi rang skal du/ /phyag rgya
so so'i skabs su gdab/ /de ltar rdzogs par gyur pa dang / /maN+Dal kun gyi tshad 'dra la/ /dbus su thig bzhi le tshe dgu/ /mtha' bskor 'khor lo'i rtsibs
brgyad bya/ /de la sgo bzhi sgo khyud bya/ /mtha' zad bskal pa'i me ri bri/ /dbus su dkar dmar kha sprod bri/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du khaM brgyad bri/ /'khor
lo'i bar mtshams mu khyud la/ /nang du bltas pa'i khaM brgyad gsal/ /rtsibs la nang du lta ba brgyad/ /mu khyud brgyad la phyir lta brgyad/ /gru chad bzhi la nang du
lta| |thig le rnam bzhi bri bar bya/ /phyi rim bar khyams de dag la/ /thig le nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ /phyi ru lta ba bri bar bya/ /bskal pa chen po'i me khyams la/ /
thig le phyir lta bcu gsal yi/ /de la phyag rgya rim par dgod/ /maN+Dal sgo ru bam chen gcig /glu bro gar gyis rnam sbyangs te/ /dbus su bzhag ste shar
du bstan/ /de yi phung po gzhal yas khang / /b+h+ruM las bskyed de gsal bar bya/ /de ru phyag rgya'i tshogs chen bsgom/ /rdzas kyi gnas rnams so so la/ /rigs kyi
lha rnams rim par dgod/ /de nas rdo rje bsnyen pa bya/ /byin phebs rtags lung mgu ba na/ /bam de byang shar mtshams su bsgral/ /rdzas rnams so sor bsngos nas
kyang / /phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su/ /ma nor bar yang dgod de sbyar/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i snod dgu la/ /rmad du byung ba dgu bkod de/ /'bar ba chen
po'i gnas gnas su/ /brjid pa'i tshul du gsal bar bsgom/ /phyag rgya gzhan yang rdzogs par dgod/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dbang chen zla
gam skar tshogs bkram/ /rdo rje mi phyed dgur 'bar ba/ /che ba dgu yi khyad par las/ /dpal chen dgu ni sku la rdzogs/ /yum chen dgu ni dbyings la rol/ /
dpal be'u dgu ni thugs la 'bar/ /'byung chen dgu ni klong du 'khyil/ /khu byug dgu ni rang skad rdzogs/ /b+han+d+ha dgu ni dpal dang ldan/ /zla gam dgu ni yum
gyi dbyings/ /thig le dgu ni byang chub sems/ /nyi zla dgu ni 'od 'phro 'bar/ /de ltar dgu dgur gsal ba yi/ /dgu klong b+ha ga gcig gi ngang / /dgu bkag
gcig phye thig le'i don/ /thams cad 'byor pa rgyas byas la/ /bam dgu phan chad sman du sbyar/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub blangs te spyad/ /
ces bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ rmad byung rdzas kyi le'u ste bcu
bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ chos thams cad ni/ mngon
sum du shes shing rig par bya'o/ /mngon sum gang zhe na/ dran pa mngon du bzhag pa'i yul la mi gnas pa'i chos thams cad dang / phyis 'byung ba'i
chos thams cad dang / sngon du byung ba'i chos thams cad mngon sum mar rig pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon sum mar shes pa ni/ ye shes chen po'i
rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang ji lta zhe na/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du dran pa mngon du bzhag na/ mngon du gyur pa'i chos nyid phyin ci ma log par
shes pa yin no/ /chos nyid phyin ci ma log par mngon du gyur na/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po nyid de yin no/ /de bas na/ mngon par shes pa rnams
dran pa mngon sum mar yid la byos shig /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / mngon shes rig pa'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ mngon par shes pa ni/ bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig bshad du gsol zhes
zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig 'dzin chen po rnams/ ye shes chen po'i rgyu mngon par shes pa ni/ rnam par lngar rig par
bya'o| |mig gi dbang po thams cad las/ /zhib tu btags pa'i phye mar bya/ /bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas nas/ /mthong ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas na/ /thams
cad ma lus mthong bar 'gyur/ /'di ni mig gi mngon shes so/ /rdo rje lce yis brjod pa'i tshig /dus sam rgyun du brjod par bya'o/ /badzra tsak+Shu gar+b+ha bid+yA hUM/ rna
ba'i dbang po thams cad kyang / /btags sam phye mar byas nas ni/ /bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te/ /thos pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas na/ /sgra yi bye brag thams
cad thos/ /'di ni rna ba'i mngon shes so/ /rdo rje tshig tu brtag pa ni/ /badzra gar+b+ha sta ma si ho/ sna yi dbang po thams cad kun/ /bskams sam phye mar byas nas ni//
bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te/ /dri sna tshogs dang bsres pa las/ /tshor ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas na/ /sna yi mngon shes thob par
'gyur| |rdo rje tshig tu gzung ba ni/ /badzra na ma si taM hUM/ lce yi dbang po thams cad kun/ /bskams sam phye mar phyas nas ni/ /bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te//
ro yi mchog la sogs pa las/ /ro yi snying po 'bum bzlas te/ /smra byed lce yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /stegs bu khru gang gru bzhi la/ /dbus su gsang ba'i rdo
rje bri| |mtha' ma lce yi pad+mas bskor/ /lce la tshig gi 'od zer 'phro/ /smra ba'i sgrub pas 'di rdzogs na/ /smra ba'i dbang po kha dbye zhing / /ro rnams thams cad
shes par 'gyur/ /'di ni lce yi mngon shes yon/ /rdo rje tshig tu brtag pa ni/ /badzra pA sha sid+yA hUM/ snying gi dbang po thams cad kun/ /bskams sam phye
mar byas nas kyang / /snying po mchog dang sbyar byas shing / /dran pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas shing / /dpal be'u tsi ta'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /dran pa'i rten gyis
yongs bskor te/ /snying gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang / /dbang po thams cad gsal ba dang / /thams cad ma lus shes par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi sems ni
shes pa'i mchog /badzra tsit+ta sid+yA hUM/ lus kyi dbang po thams cad kun/ /btags sam phye mar byas nas ni/ /sra mkhregs bcud ngang sbyar byas te/ /reg
bya'i snying po 'bum bzlas na/ /lus kyi mngon shes thob par 'gyur/ /mngon shes 'di dag kun rdzogs na/ /mi gnas ye shes chen po'i rgyu/ /phra mo'ang nan
tan mchog tu bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ mngon shes rig pa'i sgrub lugs kyi le'u
ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ mchog chen po'i sgrub lugs
ni| 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /don la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /las kyi stegs bu chag phyed pa/ /me ris bskor te 'bar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi
maN+Dal ni/ /sum brtsegs byas pa'i dbus zla gam/ /brgyad kyis mdzes par bya ba'o/ /phyi mtha' thod pa'i phreng bas bskor/ /de mtha' me dpung 'bar bas
bskor| |de yi phyi mtha' dmar chen rgyas/ /zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar/ /zla gam brgyad la gnas bdag brgyad/ /mthing nag ya tha me rir 'bar/ /de
'og thod pa tshar gsum dang / /sgo khyams dur khrod rdzas kyis bskor/ /sgo brtsegs sgo khyud tha ma bran/ /thams cad gang yin de
ltar sbyar/ /phun sum tshogs par gyur pa na/ /rnam bzhi las kyi maN+Dal brtsam/ /'jigs byed bskal pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /za byed 'bar ba'i phyag
rgya yis| |thar pa tsa ra bsgral ba'i phyir/ /drod ldan man ngag 'chang ba des/ /mchog gi byin brlabs gzhag par bya/ /dag pa gsum gyis gzhung bsrangs
nas| |gnas mchog dben pa'i ri bo rtse/ /rna nyan phra gsag can dang bral/ /'du 'dzi 'gro 'ong chad pa dang / /gsang chen spyod pa'i gnas su shis/ /rnam
bzhi las kyi rtags nyung na'ang / /gcig gnyis ldan na 'bring du bshad/ /sgrub pa'i rgyal po gdeng ldan pa/ /shin tu brjid cing sran tshugs pa'i/ /khu
'phrig rtog bral brtul zhugs can/ /las kyi phreng ba lhag chad med/ /dri zhim dag pa'i sman dag gis/ /phyi bkru shi ne da hu las/ /nang yang dag pa chen
por bya| |tshad mar sbyar ba'i bka' dang ni/ /ldan nas dus btab shin tu brtsam/ /de yang brtag pa'i gal che ni/ /bkra shis mdzes dang ldan 'gyur ba/ /bong
tshod lo ni dar la bab/ /rigs lnga'i mtshan dang ldan pa la/ /bsgral ba'i rdzas su rung ba dang / /yid 'ong 'byor ldan btsal nas ni/ /bsgrub pa'i rdzas su bya ba
de| |de 'dra'i mtshan rtags yod pa ni/ /ma sbyangs sa la slebs pa'o/ /sgrub pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni/ /da hu man+das dbang po bsgyur/ /rdo rje phra mkhan phab
nas ni| |snang srid thams cad dri ba'am/ /legs nyes thams cad dri bar bya/ /dbang po sgo lnga'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i thig le gdab/ /
rnam shes 'byung ba'i sgo lnga ru/ /so so 'byung ba'i rdzas rnams gdab/ /so so rigs kyi phyag rgyas gdab/ /phyag rgya bkod de nyon mongs bsgral/ /bsgral sbyar
thams cad sbyangs nas ni/ /mchod dang mnyes dang dam skong dang / /dngos grub rnam gsum gang thob blang / /thob nas thams cad ci bder spyad/ /ces gsungs
so| |de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ bar du gcod pa thams cad zlog pa'i sgrub pa chen po ni/ 'di
ltar rig par bya'o/ /gong ma bzhin du las brtsams nas/ /thar pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni/ /rus pa rdo rje thal bar bsgrub/ /rus pa'i tshogs ni thams cad kun/ /
bsregs dang lce pog nag por sbyar/ /khyab 'jug ga'u kha sbyar du/ /bcug ste 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang / /drag po sngags
kyis bsgrubs byas nas/ /grub na rnal 'byor don ldan gyi/ /bar chad zlog pa'i gnyen por sbyar/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun
'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ rdo rje thal chen gyi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces
gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ pra thams cad ni/ 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /maN+Dal gru bzhi pa gcig la/ /zla gam sgo gcig rdo rjes bskor/ /
mtha' khyud sgo bzhi ldan par bri/ /rgyu mchog dbang po phyed ldan shis/ /phyi yi khrus rnams byas nas ni/ /shar du kha bstan dbus su gzhag /lce la gzungs
thag sna lngas gdags/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis bskor bar bya/ /phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par dgram/ /de yi khong du gzhal yas bskyed/ /rim par brtsegs
pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /'bar ba'i 'byung chen 'bar ba lnga/ /don gyi lha mo lnga ru gsal/ /kun gzhi kun tu bzang mor gsal/ /de yi thugs kyi khong thag tu//
thig le zla ba nya rgyas la/ /ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang pa/ /thugs kar nor bu rin chen 'bar/ /dbus su nyi ma'i ga'u la/ /dpal be'u yungs 'bru'i bum pa
la| |hUM dmar til 'brur gnas pa ni/ /bde chen byang chub sems zhes bya/ /rdo rje gsang thag rgyun mi gcad/ /rdo rje kha bra gdab par bya/ /de nas mtshan ma byung
gyur na| |dngos grub blangs te de bsgral la/ /bskams te bdud rtsi rtsa bar bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo
las| mchog phran thabs kyi sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /
'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ thams cad ni/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma ni/ dngos por snang yang rang bzhin med pa yin
te| rang bzhin med pa'i don ni/ chos nyid rdo rje yin no/ /de bas na/ sgyu ma'i chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i lha
ma yin gyi tshogs bdag sgyu ma mkhan zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni/ sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul la
gnas shing sgyu ma ched du bgyid lags kyi/ bdag cag rnams kyi don ched du sgyu ma'i chos thams cad bshad du gsol zhes gsol pa
las| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshogs bdag chen po/ sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni/ 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /chos rnams thams cad sgyu
mar snang / /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /stong pa'i don rnams gang yin pa/ /mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don/ /stong pa nyid la sgyu ma yi/ /cho 'phrul bye ba
mang po 'byung / /de bzhin sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul yang / /gyin da tsam gyi rgyu rkyen las/ /cho 'phrul gzugs ni tha dad snang / /snang yang dngos por ma grub ste/ /'gyur
'jig med pas rdo rje'i don/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyang / /rde'u dang shing bu'i rgyu dag las/ /sman dang sngags kyis rkyen sbyar nas/ /'bras bu sgyu ma'i cho
'phrul 'byung / /sgyu ma'i gsang chig sbyor ba ni/ /sgyu ma'i bdag pos 'di skad bshad/ /sgyu la 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la/ /she'u re'u sman gyis btab nas ni//
gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba bya/ /she 'u re 'u i na ya/ /a mo kha a 'gus sa 'gus/ /chag shing dag gis brdabs byas na/ /ji ltar 'dod pa sna tshogs bya/ /
bsdu bar 'dod na slar bzlog bya/ /des na sgyu ma'i g.yeng ba can/ /drang ba'i thabs kyis dkri bar bya/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/
sgyu ma rdo rje sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/
chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'dod na/ 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun ldan byas/ /stegs bu kun tu gru bzhi la/ /mu khyud gcig tu
bskor nas ni/ /zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs su sbyar/ /sgo bzhi gru chad bzhir ldan bya/ /dbyibs kyi thig le zlum po la/ /rdo rje dang ni nyi mas bskor/ /dbus su b+han+d+ha
dpal ldan la/ /dpal chen yab yum sbyar la gzhag /tshal bu brgyad la gnas brgyad sbyar/ /lte ba bskor te rim par gzhag /thig le shar gyi sgo gang du/ /rdo rje
rnal 'byor gsang ming dang / /dngos grub gsol bya bris la gzhag /mchod pa'i khyams su gyur pa la/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du
mdzes par dgram/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor de dag rnams/ /rdo rje lhag pa'i rtags kyis mtshan/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas/ /spyan drangs mchod pa kun
bsags te/ /'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang / /dbang bskur las rnams kun rdzogs nas/ /rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dang / /
cha gsum drag po sbyin sreg bya/ /bar ma mi zad gter du sba/ /byang chub sems kyi chu bo dang / /chos nyid nam mkha'i dbyings chen dang / /b+ha ga yum gyis
gzhi la| |shin tu sba ba'i tshul du sbyar/ /cha gcig gzhal yas shar sgo nas/ /bcu gsum gcal bar stegs bu bya/ /der ni gnas bdun gtso rnams
kyang / /de bzhin bcu gsum lan re la/ /gnas kyi mgron ni ma sring rnams/ /bdun cu bar du kun rdzogs bya/ /tha mar maN+Dal zla gam la/ /nus na mkha'
'gro nam mkha'i hom/ /rdzogs bya ma lus de mgu bya/ /lhag mar gyur pa kun rdzogs bya/ /snyigs mar gyur pa thams cad kyang / /sba 'am bsreg gam chu
klung 'dor/ /rdo rje gnas chen de bsrungs te/ /gnas ni sba phyir su dag gsang / /mi rig phyir na mtshan ma dag /rang rang gnas su sleb par bya/ /gang dag 'du
tshe'ang de bzhin no/ /'di ni thig le gcig pa yi/ /sgrub lugs yin par rgyal bas bshad/ /'di dag sgrub pa'i skyes bu ni/ /zla ba'i 'khor lo la gnas
nas| |nyi ma'i 'khor lo thogs nas ni/ /yang dag chos kyi dbyings nyid la/ /dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang sems dpa'i rdo rje
des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /'di yang rim gyis gong ma ltar/ /thams cad tshul bzhin sbyar byas nas/ /phyi ru kun tu gru bzhi
la| |thig le zla ba gcig tu bya/ /de la srad bu bzhi bsnol bas/ /le'u tshe dgu ru gyur par bya/ /phyi rol mu khyud thod pas bskor/ /gru bzhi gru chad rab mdzes brgyan/ /
de yi mtha' zad khyams gcig la/ /sgo gdong sgrub pa po la lta/ /dbus su thig le dkar dmar la/ /kha sbyor bar dag rdo rjes 'brel/ /der ni dpal chen yab
yum bzhugs/ /phyi mtshams le'u tshe de brgyad la/ /zla gam brkyang ba brgyad byas te/ /ye shes gnas kyi ma brgyad dgod/ /phyi rol sgo gcig khyams de la/ /sgrub
pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes par dgram/ /bsam bya sgrub pa la sogs kun/ /thams cad de bzhin 'dir sbyar bya/ /'di ltar grub pa'i skyes bu gang / /chos kyi rgyal por
gyur pa ste/ /thams cad kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /skyes bu chen por de 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des cho 'phrul thams cad la
dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /'di yang thams cad de 'drar sbyar/ /kun tu gru bzhir
ldan 'gyur ba/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag tu bya/ /gru chang bzhi yi phyi rol du/ /sgo bzhi dag dang ldan par bya/ /phyi khyams dmar nag me ri klong / /shin tu
brjid cing 'jigs par bri/ /thig le dbus kyi snying po la/ /zla gam 'bar bas mtshan par bya/ /rtsibs mchog brgyad la zla gam ni/ /nang du lta bde brgyad
dri| |rtsibs mtshan brgyad la'ang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje sgo ma bzhi rnams te/ /phyag rgya rim par bkram byas nas/ /sgrub pa'i las rnams kun rdzogs bya'o/ /de
ltar grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las/ /'das pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad las/ /dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /zhes
gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ thig le sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de
nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor rnams/ dregs pa can gyi tshogs thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar
'dod na/ 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /'di ni byas la sogs pa'i las/ /'di ltar sbyor dang phun sum tshogs/ /thabs la mkhas dang yo byad dang / /ji ltar rig par 'dir
bsdu bya| |de nas maN+Dal 'dra gcig la/ /dur khrod mgo ma yang du bya/ /zur bzhi maN+Dal bzhi byas la/ /bzhi las de bzhis chags res bstod/ /de nyid ma tang bzugs
su bya| |snying ga man chad dbus su bsnol/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'og tu gzhug /'khor lo 'dar ba'i thig btab ste/ /dpal chen lnga yi phyag rgya bya/ /khyams
gnyis dag gis mdzes pa la/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgod/ /sgo bzhir rdo rje sgo ba bzhi/ /yan lag sprul pa'i mgo brnyan gnas/ /phyi khyams rdo rje me
ri bya| |de yi phyi rol phreng chen gtams/ /skam dang ra ri rlon pas bskor/ /de yi phyi rol me gur 'tshub/ /bskal pa'i bu yug bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sgo khyud sgo gang
du| |gu gu thul dang zar tshags/ /zhing dang sbrul kyi chun po bri/ /de nas b+han+d+ha dpal ldan la/ /rdo rje dpal gyi yi ge dag /bris la kha sbyar sgrub ste gzhag /ga'u
chung la ral pa can/ /brgyad bris 'byung ba'i gnas su gzhag /las byed brgya dang bcu gnyis la/ /las byed bcu gnyis bris la 'god/ /thar pa gnas kyi
dkyil 'khor du/ /gdol pa 'byung po nga rgyal can/ /chags sdang rnams kyis bslad pa'i rgyu/ /de yi dug gsum bshig pa'i phyir//
don gyi sgrub pa chen po bshad/ /ru tra lnga yi tshogs chen te/ /ting 'dzin ye shes lngas bcom nas/ /rdo rje drod kyis rnam par sbyar/ /mdo yis la stabs gcig
tu'o| |bgegs kyi bgegs te bgegs chen po/ /dug lnga rtog pa nyid las skyes/ /phyed dang gsum gyi dur khrod nas/ /gzhi rtsa ngag dang lus sems so/ /brjid
ldan dpal chen dur khrod bdag /bdag rtog rtog 'joms ting 'dzin gyis/ /srid gsum ru tra dur khrod du/ /tshogs bdag chen po de brgyad bya/ /ma rig mun
khang sgo phyed nas/ /glang chen smon pa de bzung nas/ /gzung 'dzin dam po'i rtod thag gcad/ /dug gsum rnam rtog rtod phur dbyung / /ngan song 'dam nas
drangs nas ni/ /nyon mongs dpung rgod de btul nas/ /ye shes thabs kyis rnam sbyangs te/ /nam mkha'i klong du dmigs med par/ /bde chen mchod pa'i
