tshogs chen dag /ro mchog lnga dang mnyam sbyar bas/ /chos kyi longs spyod rgyas par sbyar/ /mnyam nyid bde ba'i snying rje yis/ /dregs pa chen po gzhom pa dang //
'khor ba'i dra ba gcad pa'i phyir/ /khro tshogs 'bar ba'i sprin 'phros pas/ /gtum thung rngam pa mgyogs pa tshogs/ /phyag brnyan char chen phab nas ni/ /
'khor ba'i tha ba spangs nas ni/ /bde ba chen po'i zhing bzlog ste/ /byang chub myu gu bskyed nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lo tog bskyed/ /
dur khrod chen po'i bzhin phyogs ni/ /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bting / /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bting / /nga ni dur khrod dbang phyug che/ /sangs rgyas sku
ste ye shes yin/ /thugs rje rnon po'i dmag tshogs la/ /ye shes rnon po'i mtshon cha yis/ /lo tog 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod do/ /gru bzhi kha bzhir rdo rje yi/
dbyibs 'dra'i thab ni brtsigs nas kyang / /snying gar 'khor lo'i thab tu bya/ /rigs kyi yam shing lnga brtsigs te/ /hom lnga 'brel pa'i las chen brtsig /thab chen
lnga yi hom khung du/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yam shing la/ /ye shes chen po'i me klong du/ /nyon mongs lnga yi bsregs sbyangs rdzogs/ /bya bar sbyor ba
mtha' dag kun/ /ji ltar 'byor cing 'tsham par 'os/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ dregs pa
can gnon pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so//
'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho zad par byed pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i don 'di ni/ 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /'di yang
de 'drar kun sbyar nas/ /'khor khang can gyi gzhal yas su/ /khru gang gru bzhi'i tshad de la/ /bzhi ni 'khor khang khyams de dag /phyogs bzhi dag tu brtsam
par bya| |dri zhim tsan+dan 'de gu gtang / /dri spos tshom bu rin chen 'phro/ /sbyin mchog rgyas par de bsham bya/ /lha yi dge bsnyen rnam pa bzhi/ /phyogs
mtshams srung ba'i las rnams bsgo/ /khyams kyi nang rim phyogs mtshams su/ /chag phyed pa yi stegs bu bcu/ /bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar bris
la| |sna tshogs rgyu las byas pa yi/ /mthun pa'i gzugs bcu dbang bskur te/ /khro bo gar gyi nang mtshams bcad/ /de nas ma traM gnon par bya/ /dregs
pa ru tra sdig can 'di/ /nam yang bsgral ba'i zhing yin te/ /dzaHhUM baM ho ma hA shrI he ru ka ma trang ru dra ha ha pra be sha phaT/ kha T+wAM phyag rgyas bskyel nas ni/ /ma
rig mun pa'i sgo phye nas/ /rnam shes a ru byin brlabs te/ /gsang chen thugs kyi klong du bstim/ /sbubs ni gzhal yas 'bar bar bya/ /stegs bu ma traM
gzugs 'dra la/ /'gyel thabs bzhin phyogs ci 'drar bya/ /kha dog sngo skya gan rkyal thabs/ /che chung tshad med gnas kyis sbyar/ /de yi snying gar bang rim
gsum| |dang por dmar po gru bzhi brtsig /gnyis pa mthing nag gru gsum bya/ /gsum pa smug nag zla gam bya/ /yan lag bzhi dang mgo mtshan drug /
gsang sgo gnyis te brgyad dag la/ /stegs bu chag phyed gru bzhi brgyad/ /de yi mtha' rim yongs zad du/ /zla gam gsal ba'i maN+Dal bya/ /de dag me klong
'bar bar bskor/ /ya thog zla gam steng dag tu/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mchog bzhugs/ /mthing nag gru gsum me dpung bri/ /gru bzhi'i dmar po bang
rim la/ /rigs bzhi lha mchog dpal ldan gzhag /yan lag mgo mtshan g.yas g.yon brgyad/ /dbang phyug gnas kyi bdag mo brgyad/ /bri bya yang
na mtshan ma gzhag /tshigs chen brgyad la yul bdag brgyad/ /ji ltar 'os pa de ltar bya'o/ /sgo bzhir gsang ba sgo mar gzhag /mtha' zad yongs kyi zla gam
la| |bud med nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhag /ming ngam mtshan ma brten te gzhag /de yi kha la thab tu brtsig /pad+ma dpal be'u dbyings
'dra thab/ /mkhas pas yam shing brtsam par bya/ /bya ba'i bya ba thams cad kun/ /gong du sbyor ba de ltar sbyor/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje
bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ 'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas yang sems
dpa'i rdo rje des dug gsum thugs su dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dug gsum dbang du sgyur pa yang / /
'di ltar khong du chud par bya/ /dug gsum rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /sku gsum nyid kyi ngo bo ste/ /gzhan nas btsal ba ci yang med/ /de ltar shes par 'gyur
ba dang / /kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar bsgyur/ /thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar la/ /stegs bu 'dom gang ba zhig la/ /phyir dmar po rgyas par bya/ /de nas
mthing nag gru gsum brtsig /de nas dmar nag zla gam bya/ /zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar/ /dbang phyug gnas brgyad zla gam mtha'/ /bar rim bar
la dur khrod 'bar/ /mtha' mar dmar po gru bzhi la/ /sgo bzhi sgo srung bcas par bya/ /de yi mtha' ma me ris bskor/ /khro bcu 'bar ba'i rtags rnams dgod/ /
sgrub dang 'jug dang dbang bskur rnams/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyin par bya/ /des ni thams cad rdzogs pa yin/ /dug gsum thams cad zil gyis gnon/ /zhes
gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ dug gsum dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis
pa'o|| //de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des bud med thams cad dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /'dus
pa chen po'i tshogs/ chags pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'dod na/ 'di ltar bya'o/ /bud med chags pa'i rang bzhin te/ /chags pa khrag khrig rgya mtsho
yin| |las kyi 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bying / /chags las rnam grol 'gog pa ste/ /chags pa de nyid khrag ces bya/ /
khrag gi rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ /bud med khrag gi rgya mtsho rnams/ /'tsho ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor bsgyur/ /de ltar shes par gyur pa dang / /kun rdzob tshul du
'di ltar sbyar/ /las gyi brtsam pa phun sum tshogs/ /rim pa bzhin du brtsams nas kyang / /maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /
'khor lo bzhi yi thig tu gdab/ /mu khyud phyi rim gru chad bzhi/ /de nas sgo khyams dmar por bya/ /kun gyi phyi rim lag chu hwa'i/ /me ri 'bar bas gtib
thag gcad/ /dbus su shar lta zla gam bri/ /b+han+d+ha dpal ldan yab yum dgod/ /'khor lo bzhi la rigs bzhir ldan/ /bar khyams gnyis la
gnas yul rnams/ /zla gam thig ler ldan par bya/ /sgo khyams sgo bzhi zla gam bcas/ /phyi khyams lag chu hwa yi me/ /me yi khro bo thig ler bcas/ /
dur khrod rgyan gyis kun brgyan bya/ /ting 'dzin rdzogs dang dngos grub dang / /'jug pa dbang bskur dngos grub rnams/ /gnas gsung la sogs rdzogs
par bya| |zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ 'khor lo dbang sgyur gyi sgrub lugs kyi
le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/
chos thams cad ni/ bdud rtsi sman gyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad kyi don rtogs na ni/ 'tsho ba chos nyid
kyi rtsi yin/ ma rtogs na ni/ 'chi ba 'khor ba'i dug yin/ de bas na chos 'di dag thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de ltar shes nas kun
rdzob tu 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o/ /ji bzhin 'byung ldan bde sbyar nas/ /ma traM khog pa'i snying ga ru/ /'dom gang tshad dang mthun pa la/ /rtsibs brgyad 'bar
ba'i 'khor lor gdab/ /me yi 'od kyis bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yi/ /mtha' ma sgo khyud 'bar bar bya/ /dbus su rin chen zur brgyad bya/ /der
ni phyag rgya 'bar ba dgon/ /lang+ka bsgral ba'i gnas mchog 'dir/ /ral pa can gyi tshogs 'dus te/ /rak+Sha 'joms pa'i mthu chen kun/ /srid pa gsum ril
'dir sgrol ba'o/ /dus bzhi mchod pa'i dam rdzas kyis/ /de dag ji ltar rigs par mchod/ /dus bzhi bcud smin snying po yis/ /dngos grub chen po'i rdzas su
bya| |phyogs bzhi dbus kyi rdzas chen rnams/ /rmad du byung ba'i ral pa can/ /'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur mdzad/ /'byung ba lnga yi cho 'phrul sgrub/ /dbyar chu ston
me dgun sa ste/ /dbyid rlung nam mkha' gsang bar sbyar/ /cho 'phrul de la dbang thob nas/ /de dag ral pa can la bsgrub/ /ting 'dzin
rnam pa lnga gsal bas/ /'byung lnga las byung sha rigs lnga/ /khyi sha ba lang rta sha dang / /bya dang ri dwags sna tshogs ni/ /rdzu 'phrul shugs su sgrub pa'i rdzas/ /sgrub
pa'i rdzas chen 'byung chen lnga/ /'jig rten kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /de ltar rdzas rnams 'byor pa dang / /ting 'dzin sgom dang sgrub pa dang / /thams cad gong
dang mthun sbyar nas/ /'jug dang dngos grub dbang chen rnams/ /ci rigs par ni bde bar sbyar/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi rang byung dkyil 'khor zhes
bya ba'i mdo bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gzhan yang bdud rtsi chen po
ni| |gong ma bzhin du legs sbyar nas/ /maN+Dal tshad dang mthun pa la/ /pad+ma dmar po 'od kyi mkha'/ /phyi rim zla gam dmar po bzhi/ /rdo rje 'bar bas mdzes
par bskor/ /me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni/ /zla gam mtha' zad bri bar bya/ /rin chen ge sar phreng bas ni/ /pad+ma'i lce la bskor bar bya/ /sgo bzhi rin chen 'bar
bas bya| |phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lha bkod na/ /dbus su gser phor sul med la/ /dung chen 'khor ba can gyis sbyar/ /shar du shel phor sul 'greng la/ /rin
chen mdzod spu gsal bar sbyar/ /lho ru rin chen sul mang la/ /rin chen lo 'dab rgyas pas sbyar/ /nub tu rgya phor zla gam la/ /bzhin mtshams rin chen 'bur
gnyis sbyar/ /byang du bse phor rgya gram la/ /gtsug tor rin chen 'bur bzhi rgyas/ /rtsa ba lnga ni phyogs phyogs sbyar/ /sgo lnga'i gtso bo rigs su sbyar/ /dbus nas
shar lho nub byang du/ /ka ko la dang bu rus ka /dzA ti pha la kha dri zhim/ /lce po dkar zhes rim par sbyar/ /de bzhin gong gi rim pa bzhin/ /a ru ra dang ga pur dang / /gur
gum pad+ma li ga bur/ /de na ra sa ya na rnams/ /thams cad rigs dang kha dog dang / /las dang mthun par sbyar bar bya/ /sa bon lnga ni rim par sbyar/ /dpal dang
ldan pa'i snod nang du/ /yab yum snying po rim bzhin bya/ /dbus dang pad+ma lce la dgod/ /gnas yul la sogs mdzes par gzhag /dur khrod rdzas dang bkra shis
rdzas| |'byor pa'i yo byad thams cad bsham/ /de nas byin phab dngos grub gsol/ /thams cad rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /dam pa de nyid gsang tshon gyi/ /rigs
brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig gis/ /thams cad sbyang ba'i mchog tu bya/ /de nas khrol bu sbyang ba na/ /gsal bsngo bsdu dang dbye
ba dang / /khrus bya ba dang bshags pa dang / /yon tan brjod dang byin dbab bya/ /de nas skad cig thang gcig gam/ /zhag gcig dag gis sbyar bar bya/ /rtags
dag byung na der 'byongs pa'o/ /phye ma'i mchog tu sbyar ba ni/ /snod kyi sman rnams shes rab mas/ /bsdus te btag pa'i cho ga yang / /yum gyis
bzung zhing yab kyis btag /rig 'dzin rtsal can dbab cing drang / /so so las kyi sngags brjod cing / /gtan gtun thabs dang shes rab ste/ /sman nyid
byang chub sems su sbyar/ /rdo rje glu 'di lha mos blang / /kun tu bzang mo'i gzhal yas su/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa na/ /'khor ba bdud rtsi sman du
sbyar| |ye shes lnga ru gsal pa las/ /'bras bu sku gsung thugs su rdzogs/ /'chi med bdud rtsis gcong rnying sbyang / /mtshan ma btag phyir bcal nas
ni| |rdo rje dpal ldan kha sbyor blugs/ /kha dog rigs lnga'i ras kyis dkri/ /rdo rje dbang gi rgya yis gdab/ /rdo rje sngags kyis gzungs kyis gdags/ /
dpal chen sku lngar mnga' gsol te/ /ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya/ /maN+Dal dag tu dgod par bya/ /kun gyis bskor zhing dngos grub dbab/ /rtsi dang sman gyi bdag po
dang / /rtags dang rig 'dzin phra mo dag /rol mo cha byad mang pos bsten/ /sgrub pa 'bru mchog gtams pas dgang / /bkra shis gos kyis rgyas par klubs/ /
gzungs thag gnyer can rigs su dbul/ /ting 'dzin me yis rnam par sbyang / /rtags chen lnga ni gang byung yang / /myur te dngos grub blang bar bya'o/ /bdud rtsi
sgra las drangs nas ni/ /dpal ldan pad+ma ldan pa ru/ /thams cad bdud rtsir sa ma ya/ /mkha' klong yangs par bde chen rdzogs/ /rang nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil
'khor rdzogs/ /gzhan nas bsgrub pa ci yang med/ /'jug pa la sogs thams cad kyang / /tshul bzhin du ni rgyas par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi phye ma'i
sgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /thams cad de 'drar sbyar
nas kyang / /maN+Dal 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /phyag rgya'i lha rnams rdzogs byas nas/ /sman sbyang btags btsags btsal nas kyang / /sbrang chang 'o mas gong
bur bya| |bse phor mtshan ldan nang du gzhag /legs par kha sbyar ras kyis dkri/ /gong ma bzhin du kun sbyar nas/ /dngos grub
mchog rnams bdag gis bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi ri lu'i cho ga rnam par bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /
'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /skyo ma'i cho ga 'di lta ste/ /thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas/ /mtshan ma gsal po byung ba dang / /phye ma chu tshags nang nas
dbyung / /phye ma'i mchog tu gyur pa dang / /phye ma'i rgyal mo de dag ni/ /bse phor kha sbyar nang du blugs/ /rgyas btab byin rlabs dbang bskur nas/ /bzlas brjod
'phro 'du rgyun mi chad/ /sbrang chang rgya chang bu ram chang / /rgun chang 'o ma la sogs pa/ /bcud kyi khu ba thams cad sbyar/ /rin chen ga'u mtshan ldan du/ /blugs
te kha sbyar rgyas btab nas/ /'phro 'du bzlas brjod gong ma bzhin/ /byas te mtshan ma byung ba dang / /dngos grub chen po blang bar bya/ /phye ma'i sgrub rdzas de dag ni//
cha lnga dag tu bgos nas kyang / /rnal 'byor so so'i cha rnams las/ /ci ran tsam gyis cha gcig dang / /sbyar chang cha lngar bgos pa nas/ /rnal 'byor so so'i cha
rnams las/ /sbyar te dngos grub rten du bya/ /zla ba gcig tu thos pas ni/ /ba spu rangs shing gnyer ma rangs/ /zla ba gnyis su zos byas na/ /gzi mdangs thams cad
'bar bar 'gyur/ /zla ba gsum gyi phan yon gyis/ /nad kyi bskal pa dag las thar/ /zla bzhi phan chad gang zag gi /zas dang ma 'dres brtson bsgrubs na/ /
gzhan gyi nad rnams 'joms par nus/ /drug dang bdun dang brgyad rnams la/ /bdud rtsi bcud kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /dgu dang bcu la zag pa zad/ /bcu gcig
rig 'dzin nam mkhar 'phur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi skyo ma'i sgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /
'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin rtsal lnga'i zas/ /lde gu'i cho ga chen po ni/ /'di ltar khong du chud par bya/ /sbrang rtsi bu ram rgun 'brum rnams/ /lo
yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang / /kha dog mtshan ldan dmar po'i ba/ /lo yi 'tsho bar gzung zhing bsrel/ /sman gyi rgyal mo rab mnye bas/ /rgyun du gsos pa'i 'o ma de/ /
rig 'dzin zas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi rgyal mo rab mnye ba/ /phye ma'i mchog tu byas nas kyang / /lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar byas te/ /sus mi mthong ba'i sa phyogs
su/ /bsgrub rdzas de dag bkram nas kyang / /bdud rtsi sgrub pa de bzhin bya/ /dus bab pa yi tshod rnams la/ /bsgrub rdzas de dag thams cad
kyang / /ba yi 'o mas lde gur sbyar/ /cha res bskyed cing bza' bar bya/ /zos pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'gro/ /zhes gsungs
so| |bdud rtsi lde gu'i sgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /'di
yang gong ma ltar byas te/ /de dang mi mthun bsgrub rdzas rnams/ /bdud rtsir 'gyur ba'i sman rnams kun/ /thams cad thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /til chen la
sogs zhun gyi mchog /thams cad bsdus shing sbyar byas nas/ /gnas kyang gong ma bzhin btsal te/ /bdud rtsi bkram nas bsgrub par bya/ /'phro 'du bzlas
brjod rgyun mi gcad/ /grub pa'i rdzas su gyur pa dang / /sman rnams phye mar btags par bya/ /de dag phye mar gyur pa dang / /zhun chen dag dang sbyar bar bya/ /
sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /dngos grub mchog ni blang bar bya/ /gzhan nam gzhan gyi sde pa dang / /lo yis bshugs te 'phrad mi bya/ /'tsho ba bdud rtsi
zhun gyis sbyar/ /bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtags chen ni/ /ba spu langs dang gzi mdangs 'bar/ /kham gyi zas bral bde bar 'tsho/ /shes rab gsal zhing thogs pa
med| |zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'gro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi zhun chen gyi sgrub pa bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces
gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rlon pa'i rdzas la sman bsgrub na/ /thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas/ /maN+Dal thig le lnga pa la/ /bkra
shis dpal ldan lnga bzhag nas/ /gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga/ /rlon par bkod nas yi ger sbyang / /ting 'dzin bzlas pa'i me sbar bas/ /dang po ro 'byung
bskoms pa dang / /de nas btags btsags gong ma bzhin/ /sbyar nas rigs kyis bsnyen pas sbyang / /des ni mtshan ma byung ba dang / /de bzhin gong ltar cir
bder spyad/ /ces gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi rlon sbyor gyi sgrub pa bshad pa'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ bdud rtsi sman
gyi sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje chen po des sgrub pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang chen thugs kyi sgrub pa
zhes bya ba 'di bshad do/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad ni/ dbyings su shes par bya ba ste/ 'khor ba'i chos thams
cad ni| dbyings su 'dus la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni/ ye shes su 'dus so/ /de gnyis su med pa ni/ chos nyid byang chub sems kyi
bde ba chen por 'dus par shes par gyis shig /de bas na/ chos thams cad ni/ thugs ye shes kyi rang bzhin du 'dus te/ gnyis su med do/ /de
ltar na| kun rdzob tu 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ /gnyis su med pa'i don la 'jug par bya'o/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dam pa'i don gyi chos
rnams kun/ /thams cad rang gi sems la rdzogs/ /kun rdzob chos rnams gang yin pa/ /lus dang ngag la rdzogs par bshad/ /des na chos rnams
thams cad kyang / /rtsa ba rang la rdzogs pa ste/ /'di dag sgrub pa'i thabs mchog kyang / /rnam par rtog pa'i rdul bsal nas/ /sgrub pa'i rgyal po
yab yum gnyis/ /don la mkhas par byas nas ni/ /so so'i thugs la thig le dag /zla gam dkar dmar gdab par bya/ /de yi rdzas mchog chen po
yang / /thabs kyi ga pur chen po dang / /shes rab gsang ba'i tsan+dan gnyis/ /dkar dmar zla gam chen por bya/ /yab kyi thugs kar dkar po la/ /thig le
kha ni mar lta ba'o/ /yum gyi thugs kar dmar po la/ /thig le kha ni yar lta ba'o/ /yab kyi thig le'i dbus su ni/ /dpal be'u dbus su nyi ma bri/ /dbus
su oM gsal nang du hUM/ /yum gyi thig le'i dbus su ni/ /pad+ma dbus su zla ba bri/ /dbus su a gsal nang du hUM/ /de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na/ /kun
tu bzang po yab yum du/ /gnyis su med par bsgyur bar bya/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang / /ngang las byung ba'i bdud rtsi yis/ /gsang ba gnyis
kyi mchod pa bya/ /rang las byung ba'i dngos grub dag /rang nyid la ni bstim par bya/ /'di ltar sgrub pa gtsor byed na/ /bdud rtsi'i yo byad thams cad dang / /
bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa rnams/ /lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang / /bsnyen sgrub yan lag rnam bzhi las/ /bsnyen pa dag gi dus su ni/ /gang zag mi yi
zas la brten/ /de yang lo yi skad cig gam/ /gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du sbyar/ /lo yi skad cig bar du ni/ /bdud rtsi yod byad rnams la brten/ /de nas
lo yi skad cig ni/ /gcig gam gnyis kyi bar dag tu/ /rang las byung ba'i rdzas rnam lngas/ /'phags pa mchod cing rang gis
bza'| |des ni drod la gnas par 'gyur/ /drod thob gyur pa phan chad ni/ /lo yi skad cig thang gcig gis/ /ting 'dzin zas kyi ro rnyed nas/ /kham gyi zas
dang bral bar 'gyur/ /drod chen rnam gsum rdzogs nas ni/ /rtags chen dag ni thob par 'gyur/ /rtags kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba ni/ /rin chen phung po
'dod pa na/ /sa rdo la sogs byas na 'grub/ /chu dang mkha' la 'gro 'dod na/ /brtsams pas mi 'bying thogs med 'gro/ /me yi phung po 'jil 'dod
na| |sdigs pa'i mdzub mo 'phyar nas kyang / /bden pa'i bsgo ba byas pas 'grub/ /de la sogs pa thams cad nus/ /rtags thob phan chad sangs rgyas
yin| |zhes gsungs so/ /gsang chen thugs kyi sgrub pa bshad pa'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i rgyud las/ bka'
gsang chen 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de rdo rje me klong 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad ma'i rang bzhin du snang bar mthong ngo / /de nas 'khor
rnams kyis shin tu bstod pa/ /e ma'o sems dpa' che ba che/ /ting 'dzin chen po snang ba che/ /cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che/ /thabs mchog khyod la phyag
'tshal lo/ /chos kun me klong bzhin du snang / /me nyid ye shes gsal ba'i klong / /'bar 'phro gsal bar gyur pas ni/ /mun bsal dngos po thams cad
bsregs/ /bde chen dbyings su kun rdzogs par/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis mdzad pa lags/ /thugs rje chen po a la la/ /don grub chen po a la la/ /sgeg pa
chen po a la la/ /'jigs byed chen po a la la/ /dgyes pa chen po a la la/ /dregs pa chen po a la la/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis sbyin rlabs kyis/ /bdag
cag rnams la bshad pa shod/ /me yi rang bzhin chen po dag /bdag cag rnams la bshad par gsol/ /zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ sems dpa'i
rdo rjes dgyes te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag /bshad kyi khyed rnams gus par nyon/ /rdo rje me
yi las mchog 'das/ /rnal 'byor thabs su bde sbyar bas/ /rgyal ba kun mnyes kun sreg skong / /don grub las kyi mchog tu
bshad| |skye med rnam dag hom khung du/ /chos can skye ba'i yam shing la/ /spros med byang chub ye shes mes/ /mtshan ma'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs
thim| |rnam dag b+ha ga'i hom khung du/ /chags pa'i yam shing spungs pa la/ /bde chen byang chub me sbar te/ /'khor ba'i dngos po bsregs sbyangs
thim| |dpal chen zhal gyi hom khu 'du/ /nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la/ /ye shes lnga yi me sbar te/ /gzung 'dzin rdzas rnams bsregs sbyangs
thim| |snang srid nam mkha'i hom khung du/ /'byung ba bzhi yi yam shing la/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi me sbar te/ /snang srid dngos po bsregs sbyangs
thim| |las bzhi so so'i khyad par gyis/ /phyogs dang kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas/ /ji ltar yin pa de ltar sbyar/ /shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar/ /
mthing ga nag po thal mdog sbyar/ /zlum po pad+ma le'u tshe zhi/ /'khor lo gru bzhi zur brgyad rgyas/ /zla gam gru chad gzhu dbyibs dbang / /gru gsum b+ha ga kha
mngon sbyor/ /sum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes/ /las kyi yam shing rdzas kyis rgyas/ /ye shes rdo rje'i las rgyud ldan/ /bla ma gsum gyis thabs
mchog sbyar/ /dag pa'i mtha' 'dzin nyes mchog 'dzin/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro gar/ /mchod pa gsang ba dus tshigs sbyor/ /rdo rje lam gyi smon lam
sbyor| |gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas/ /bshar gdab zhi ba'i lha rgyud dang / /rgyas dang dbang bshar rgyud bshar bas/ /lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /de
bzhin rgyud dang 'byor par bya/ /rigs kyi lha rgyud lha rnams ni/ /so so'i rigs su bshar gdab ste/ /klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du/ /dam rdzas
bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis/ /sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg byar 'os/ /bsreg rdzas skye ba'i chos yin te/ /skye bar snang ba'i chos thams cad/ /'dir ni dngos po
bzhin snang ste/ /chos can rkyen dang 'byung gnas dang / /rang bzhin nyid las cho 'phrul ni/ /skye ba nyid du 'dod pa yin/ /'di ni skye ba'i chos can te/ /rang byung
bsreg rdzas rang zhir thim/ /nyon mongs lnga yi dam rngas dag /ye shes lnga yi klong du dbul/ /phung po lnga yi dam rdzas rnams/ /thabs mchog yab lnga'i sku la
bstim| |'byung lngas bsdus pa'i bsreg rdzas rnams/ /shes rab yum lnga'i klong du bstabs/ /rnam shes brgyad kyi bsreg rdzas
rnams| |ye shes gnas kyi ma brgyad do/ /yul gyi g.yeng ba rnam pa brgyad/ /dmigs med dbyings kyi bye brag brgyad/ /skye bzhi las kyi bsreg rdzas rnams//
rnam thar sgo bzhi'i klong du thim/ /thabs mchog la sogs rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ /so so'i yon tan thams cad dag /rdo rje glu yis brjod nas kyang / /de dag
mnyes pa'i mchod pa brtsam/ /mchod pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / /sgrib byang ma byang don chen rnams/ /grub dang ma grub don rnams ni/ /me la mkhas
pas brtag par bya/ /me sgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis/ /'bar tshul gnyis dang dbyibs rnam drug /de dag yongs su shes par bya/ /gal te mtshan ma mi
sdug na| |bkra mi shis pa'i rtags yin pas/ /bsreg sbyang chen po rgyas par bya/ /de nas 'dod pa'i rtags byung na/ /me la 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams//
rnam gsum gang ltar grub pa blang / /ro yi rdzas rnams bsregs sbyangs nas/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang / /shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis/ /ro la
byug cing bkru bar bya/ /bdud rtsi zhun chen khu ba yis/ /ras la byugs pas ro dkris te/ /ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba kun bkod
nas| |phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab par bya/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gang dag ni/ /gzhung yin pa yi phyag rgya rnams/ /du 'byung ba dang mnyam pa yi/ /sdong bu'i
grangs kyang de ltar bya/ /sdong bu re la lha rnams kyis/ /ma nor rtsa ba'i snying po dag /ras chen dag la bris te gdags/ /ro yi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang / /ro yi phyi
shul thams cad la/ /'khor ba'i bag chags kun bkod de/ /ras sam shing shun shog shog la/ /'khor ba'i sa bon thams cad dgod/ /nyon mongs lnga
dang dug gsum bcas/ /skye ba'i lam lnga rgyud drug rnams/ /ming ngam gzugs su byas nas ni/ /gnas gnas dag tu dgod par bya/ /khams dang skye mched
phung po lnga/ /gzugs 'dzin ming du bcas pa rnams/ /brda yi tshul du bris nas ni/ /ro rnams khyad par dgod par bya/ /de nas ro yi phung po de/ /rten nam glegs
sam stegs bu yi/ /steng du mkhas pas gzhag par bya/ /thabs kyi cho ga brtsam pa ni/ /maN+Dal 'khor khyud tsam zhig la/ /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang yin
pa'i| |phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i pho brang dag /thig gis yul bcad so sor bya/ /de yi steng du shing brtsigs pa/ /dbyibs ni gru bzhi
gtams pa la/ /zur bzhi ka pa bzhis brtan bya/ /sum brtsegs yang thog bar khang bcas/ /mtha' ma shing gis brdzang bar bya/ /bar khang dag gi glegs ma
la| |ro yi bzhin phyogs shar du bstan/ /ro yi steng gi khang pa la/ /ras sam shog shog la bris pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod/ /ro
khang glo skar bzhi phye la/ /thugs rje gzungs thag bzhis btags nas/ /phyogs bzhi bla ma bzhi la dbul/ /shing gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /shing gi phyi
mtha' stegs bu la/ /phyag rgya'i lha rnams rim par dgod/ /stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang / /rdo rje las kyi bskos gdab pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la/ /
'khor ba sreg pa'i mnga' gsol te/ /ting nge 'dzin ye shes rtse gcig pas/ /me yi 'du 'phro rgyun du bya/ /rdo rje las kyi karma la/ /las rnams rdzogs pa'i
mnga' gsol te/ /las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par bya/ /rdo rje chen po'i bla ma zhig /ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas/ /las kyi bsags pa bgrang zhing bshags//
rdo rje skabs sbyor bla ma yis/ /bdud rtsi skabs kyi mchod pa sbreng / /rdo rje bro gar glu tshig gis/ /skabs kyi glu gar mchod pa dag /rol mos drangs te dbul
bar bya/ /rdo rje gnas kyi smon lam ni/ /skabs dang las kyi mjug tu gdab/ /rdo rje las kyi stangs 'dzin pas/ /rtsa brgyad las kyis grangs bzung ste/ /dkar
byung bla ma'i phyag tu dbul/ /ro yi las ngan ltangs 'dzin pas/ /grangs med grangs su bzung nas ni/ /mtshan ma nag po'i byang bu dag /ye shes me yi klong
du bsreg/ /me yis sbyor ba'i cho ga bya/ /me yi lha ni gang yin pa/ /me yi sangs rgyas snang mtha' yas/ /me yi lha mo gos dkar mo/ /rgyal ba kun gyi
'od mchog ste/ /'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing / /thams cad kun gyi drod bdag yin/ /srid gsum sreg par zhal gyis bzhes/ /'khor ba'i sreg pa'i
'phrin las la/ /thugs dam dbang gis yong mi 'da'/ /me yi cho ga thams cad ni/ /yum chen dkar mo nyid la bsgo/ /de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas/ /ro
yi sgrib pa byang ma byang / /me yi dngos grub thob mi thob/ /me la mkhas pas gong bzhin brtag /mtshan ma mi sdug byung ba na/ /sreg sbyang cho ga rgya cher bya/ /
gal te mgu na dngos grub thob/ /ro yi thal ba chen po la/ /btags nas thal ba'i bdud rtsir bsgrub/ /des ni bsod nams chen
po ni| |dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ rdo rje me'i cho ga sgrub
pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i
rdo rje sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs so// //sarba ta thA ga ta mahA shrI he ru badzra tsaN+Da/ sarba duSh+TAM saM shrI he ru kaM ta ka ha na pa tsa hUM hUM/ sa sa sa sa sa
ma ya sa nu ne sa nor ba ra badzra gar+b+ha/ rat+na gar+b+ha/ pad+ma gar+b+ha/ karma gar+b+ha/ mai tri gar+b+ha/ ka ru Na gar+b+ha/ lo ka gar+b+ha/ bi du ma gar+b+ha/ yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ bi shwa/ te
shwa| ke shwa/ pa shwa/ bi shwa/ traka shwa/ hri shwa/ ka shwa/ wa ka shwa/ ru d+hi/ rak+ti/ khA hi/ sa hA/ sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ sa sa sa sa sa sa

sa| sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/ rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/ rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/ rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/

kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ muM muM muM muM muM muM muM muM/ muM muM muM muM muM muM muM/ muM muM muM muM muM muM muM/
muM muM muM muM muM muM muM/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ gau ri/ tsau ri/ pra mo ha/ be tA li/ g+hasma ri/ puk+ka si/ /sma shA ni/ tsaN+Da
li| ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ sid+ha/ byA g+h+r-i/ sr-i la/ shwa na/ kr-i ta/ kang ka/ kha kha/ u lu/ mu mu mu mu mu mu mu mu/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ he he he he he he
he he| ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ Ar+ya te da tsa da tsa/ wa shaM hUM/ lo ka baM/ b+hasmi ya ti hoHba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/

dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ maN maN maN maN maN/ Da Da Da Da Da/ la
la la la la/ e gar+b+ha/ yaM karma/ ra rak+ta/ baM snik+ta/ raM dza la keM ru d+hi/ bruM dz+nyA na/ baM ban+d+ha/ ha ka pA la/ dz+nyA na pa ra ba raM/ bud+d+ha kA ya/ mahA wAka/ badzra tsit+ta/
dzaHhUM baM ho/ /e h+ye hi/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo dzaHdzaH/ badzra sa ma ya mu dra hUM AHbadzra shrI he ru ka/ tiSh+Tha sa ma ya lhan/ ma hA shrI he ru ka ha ha haM/ sa ma ya hoHphaT/ badzra
A ral+li phaT/ a ti bu hoHpra ti bu hoHi daM puSh+pa d+hu pa/ ba liM ti dza hoHkha raM khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta/ ru d+hi smik+ta/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ tsit+ta/ ba su ta/ go ro tsa na/
DA ki nI/ yo gI nI/ ma hA tsit+ta/ kha raM khA hi/ kha kha le/ sha ta ba khA hi/ a la la ho/ sa ma yo ho/ /i dan den ra ka na/ u tsi ra sa ma ya phaT/ badzra sa ma
ya A be sha AHAHzhes gsungs pas las kyi 'bar ba'i cho ga zhes thams cad shin tu 'bar zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun
'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ rdo rje las gang sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des sgyur ba phyag rgya'i le'u
'di rgya cher gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi lag gnyis la/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i ling+gar ni/ /a dang pad+ma gnyis gsal te/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis
med sbyar/ /mnyam pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa la/ /me yi steng du a nyid gzhag /bya ba thams cad bral ba'i rgya/ /a dang ma yi 'bru bcu rnams/ /'phro 'du bya
zhing kun tu bsgyur/ /g.yas su 'khyil zhing g.yon du 'khyud/ /'di ni cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgya/ /a dang ma yi 'bru rnam bcu/ /so sor bcangs te myu gur bya//
shin tu bstod de kun tu bsgyur/ /'di ni snying por gyur pa'i rgyu/ /ma yis sbyin pa gtong tshul la/ /a yis thams cad skyob byed pa/ /'di ni tshad med chen po'o/ /
kun la snyoms pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /ma nyid khrag 'phrog pa yi snod/ /a nyid so phreng mche bar sbyar/ /'di ni thams cad rol pa yi/ /'jigs tshul ston
pa'i phyag rgya yi/ /a dang ma gnyis rting sbyar te/ /so phreng mche ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /shin tu kha gal ba yi tshul/ /'di ni 'jigs byed chen po'i rgya/ /ma yis bzung ste 'then nas ni/ /a yis gdengs
shing 'joms byed pa/ /'joms byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin/ /ma dang a yis mgo mjug nas/ /bzung ba'i tshul du byas nas ni/ /kha yis 'drad cing 'then byed pa/ /za byed chen po'i phyag rgya
yin/ /a dang ma yi shes rab las/ /g.yas g.yon chul gyis bsgyur byas te/ /so so ji ltar yin thabs sbyar/ /gnas dang yul gyi gtan tshigs su/ /bsgyur ba gar gyi phyag rgyar
bshad/ /dpa' bo gdan la bzhengs nas ni/ /phyogs mtshams kun tu bltas byas nas/ /shin tu 'gying zhing brjid par byed/ /a dang ma yi 'bru rnams ni/ /so sor brdabs nas dkur brten
bya| |'gying ba'i tshul gyis spyad byas nas/ /stag gi stabs kyis kun tu bskor/ /de nas rmun bya stabs kyis ni/ /gong ma bzhin du bskor bar bya/ /de bzhin rus sbal gzig dang
stag /spyang ki seng+ge dom stabs dang / /phag chen dred kyi stabs kyis ni/ /thams cad thams cad bskor bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dab chags thams cad kyis/ /'jo tshul stabs rnams rdzogs
byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ sgyur ba phyag rgya'i
le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /hUM 'byung ba chen po nam mkha'
ni| |'byung ba chen po lnga yi mdzod/ /nam mkha'i las ni 'dod pa 'byung / /'dod pa'i mchod pa 'byung gyur cig /zla rgyas la sogs snying po mchog /maM sa la
sogs rnam lnga'i rdzas/ /me tog la sogs tsan+dan phreng / /sna tshogs mchod pa 'byung gyur cig /mi mo rnams kyi reg bya mchog /'khril 'khyud sgyur ba'i
gzungs chen ma/ /dbang po sbyor ba'i dgyes mchod de/ /bde ba'i mchod pas tshim gyur cig /rdo rje rol pas tshogs mchog 'di/ /mchod sprin kun du rgyas gyur cig/
dug gsum brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di/ /sku gsung thugs kyi klong du bstabs/ /dug lnga rol pa'i tshogs mchog 'di/ /ye shes lnga yi nang du thim/ /gzung 'dzin rtog
pa'i mtshan ma 'di/ /dbyings dang ye shes klong du thim/ /'khor ba mtshan ma'i chos can 'di/ /chos nyid dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /phung po tshogs kyi yan lag 'di/
rnam grol phung po lnga ru thim/ /'byung chen rgyu yi mtshan ma 'di/ /mkha' klong 'bar ba lnga ru thim/ /rol pa chen po mchod sbyin la/ /
rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams rol/ /bla med bstan 'gran mchod pa 'di/ /sngon chad rgyal bas bgrod pa'i lam/ /dug gsum gting nas gsod pa'i
thabs| |sngon gyi thugs dam bzhin du bzhes/ /'chi med bdud rtsi g.yung drung chu/ /ro yi khams rnams slong bar byed/ /dug gi phung po 'joms byed pa/ /rtsi
mchog sman gyi mchod par bzhes/ /zhes mchod pa'i tshogs rnams ling long phyad par byung bas rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs longs spyod des mnyes par gyur
to| |rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas
sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje glu'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni rdo rje rnal 'byor rnams/ /bsnyen par snang ba'i dbang thob nas/ /bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru
brgyad spro/ /yi ge glu yi rgyan yin te/ /glu yi yi ge bcu drug las/ /yi ge yan lag bsgyur bsdebs nas/ /glu yi bye phrag bsam mi khyab/ /dang por glu yi
don byung ba/ /oM gyis glu rnams rab tu 'dren/ /oM yang a yi cho 'phrul te/ /a ni chos kyi yi ge yin/ /a las oM byung rgyal ba'i thugs/ /rgyal ba chos kyi dbyings
las byung / /a las aM byung gsung gi mchog /gsung las glu yi yan lag 'byung / /dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cur grags/ /glu yi yon tan bsam mi khyab//
sngon gyi rgyal ba glu yis grub/ /rig 'dzin rdo rje glu yis 'dren/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug glu yis 'grub/ /bstan pa rgya mtsho glu yis spel/ /srid pa'i bu mo glu yis
brten| |bdud dang srin po glu yis 'dul/ /dngos grub rgya mtsho glu yis 'bebs/ /chos nyid dbyings kyi klong dkyil nas/ /dpal be'u nyi ma dgu shar bas/ /
rnam thar sgo bzhi rab gsal yang / /ma rig mun nag 'thibs pa yis/ /bsgribs par rig pa'i sgo mo dbye/ /'khor ba'i mun nag klong rum na/ /byang chub sems
kyi zla shar bas/ /mun gsal rnam thar sgo bzhir snang / /rin chen 'bar ba'i nyi ma rnams/ /dpal chen thugs las 'od shar bas/ /bag chags sprin mthongs
bye ba ru| |rnal 'byor thugs kar zer bab pas/ /mun bsal rig pa'i sgo phye ste/ /rnal 'byor don la 'jug par bya/ /rig pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /
ru lu'i 'od zer sgo phye nas/ /spros pas cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung / /srid pa gsum gyi bye brag phyed/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting
nas skem/ /nyon mongs rgyu drug gnas nas sgrol/ /dug gsum rtsa ba rtsad nas gcod/ /bdud dang srin po gdug pa 'dul/ /byin rlabs dngos grub char
ltar 'bebs/ /ji ltar dbang po'i sgo phye nas/ /'dzum mdangs gsal bar 'byung ba ltar/ /dpal be'u thugs kyi sgo phye bas/ /ru lu'i 'od zer yig 'bru
shar| |mthing nag ser nag dmar nag ljang / /smug nag 'bar ba'i yig 'bru rnams/ /yi ge rigs kyi phreng bar drang / /rgyangs kyis bskul dang dkar
gyis dbab/ /bsten gos nye bar gyur pa la/ /'jim gos mngon sum gsal bar bya/ /'bir kwas gnyis su med pa la/ /'dren kos yi ge'i phreng ba dang / /
de nyid la ni glu drug ste/ /sha ta ba dang gar ta ba/ /cang ka de'u dang pang ka de'u/ /breng nge ba dang dung nge ba/ /glu yi yan lag sum brgyas ni/ /rgyal ba mnyes
pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /glu yi rgyal po 'di drug gis/ /don grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sha ta ba yi glu blangs pas/ /gdug byed thams cad spa
yang bkong / /gar ta ba yi glu blangs pas/ /gnod byed thams cad rdul du rlog /cang ka de'u yi glu blangs pas/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor me ltar mchod/ /pang ka
de'u yi glu blangs pas/ /drag po gtum po lhan ner 'gyur/ /brang nge ba yi glu blangs pas/ /sprul pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad 'gyed/ /dung nge ba yi glu blangs
pas| |srid pa'i bu mo dbang du sdud/ /yi ge 'bru dgu'i rang bzhin la/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs/ /de bzhin 'khor lo mu khyud bcas/ /
khyams dang sgo khyud gsal ba'o/ /srid pa mthong yod snang grags kyang / /thams cad sngags kyi tshig tu rdzogs/ /yi ge rgyal ba kun dang 'brel/ /'khor
lo'i sa la nye ba'o/ /yi ges dmigs pa thams cad 'grub/ /chags med lhun grub don po che/ /rnam bzhi las kyi khyad par yang / /bya ba med par
don du 'gyur/ /yi ge gsang ba'i 'phro 'du yis/ /rgyal ba dpa' bo thams cad mnyes/ /de kun yi ges rnam sprul yang / /rang bzhin dngos med chos kyi
dbyings/ /yig 'bru 'bar ba'i cho 'phrul las/ /dam pa'i ngo mtshar sna tshogs 'byung / /de bzhin sgrib pa'i bud shing sreg /gti mug mun sel ye shes 'bar//
rig pa'i nyi ma gsal bar 'bebs/ /bdag nyid dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs/ /tsit+ta dpal be'u zur brgyad 'bar/ /rin chen yi ge 'bru brgyad gsal/ /dpal
chen rin chen 'bar ba'i thugs/ /dpal be'u smug po zur brgyad las/ /gser gyi nyi ma dgu shar ba/ /'od zer ru lu yig 'bru brgyad/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i rlung sgrom du/ /shin tu 'bar 'phro
'khrugs byas te/ /spros pas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi /na sa g.yas su drang bar bya/ /go ro tsa na'i gzhal yas su/ /sran zlum tsam gyi rgya khyon la/ /gser
gyi nyi ma ga'u dgu/ /shar ba'i dkyil na yig 'bru dgu/ /gsal ba'i 'od kyi gzhal yas khang / /dngos po'i bag chags kun bsregs te/ /sems ni
gser chu zhun ma bzhin/ /ltem la 'tshor zhing 'ong 'bar ba/ /rtsal las gyur ba'i zla dkyil 'khor/ /nyi ma steng na dpal be'u 'bar/ /de la ru lu 'phro
zhing 'du/ /dpal be'u tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /yig 'bru 'bar ba'i ga 'ur gsal/ /pad+mo 'bar ba'i ga'u 'di/ /yi ge phreng ba 'khyil ba'i gnas//
dper na me tog 'bar ba las/ /bcud len bung bas bcud blangs te/ /rtsi yi bur bu gsog pa ltar/ /dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /rin
chen 'od kyi me tog 'bar/ /ru lu'i yig 'bru bcud kyis rgyas/ /rnal 'byor sems las byas pa yi/ /bcud 'byin bung ba mang po 'phro/ /phar lding yi ge'i bcud
phyung nas/ /tshur lding sems kyi ga 'ur bstims/ /dang po shel gyi kha dog la/ /shin tu gsal zhing 'tsher 'bar ba/ /gnas dgu dag tu zla ba yi/ /thig le dkyil
kyi dpal be'u la/ /'bru bkog gsal bar gyur pa dang / /shel gyi bung ba mang po dag /khyung chen lding ba'i bong tshod tsam/ /phar lding bcud phyung tshur gsibs
pas| |yig 'bru ye shes me 'bar bas/ /bag chags bud shing phung po bsregs/ /phar spros thugs rjes sa la bskul/ /ji ltar nyi zer tsha tsha ltar/ /rgyun mi
'chad par rtse gcig 'bar/ /bar du byi ru'i kha dog la/ /gong ma bzhin du bkod gsal la/ /byi ru bung ba mang po dang / /gong ma bzhin du 'phur lding pas/ /
bcud phyung bstim zhing slar la 'phro/ /ji ltar me mgal 'khor tshul du/ /dpal be'u smug po'i klong du bstim/ /kun gyi tha mar bsdu ba ni/ /bkod pa'i
gong ma thams cad kun/ /mthing nag 'bar ba bsgyur nas ni/ /khyung chen gzan la 'jums tshod tsam/ /hUM sgra 'byin cing phan tshun lding / /ru lu bcud
'byin dngos grub rlob/ /dran pa'i dkyil nas dza phyung ste/ /lcags kyu 'bar ba ga 'ur bcas/ /dpal be'u'i dkyil na spungs pa
yis| |ru lu rin chen phung po dag /bsdus shing drangs te gnas su bstim/ /'bab pa'i shugs sam byin rlabs ni/ /mtsho la ser chen 'dril ltar ro/ /
'di ltar yi ger sbyar ba'i tshe/ /rnal 'byor nyag gcig ma yin gyi/ /lha mchog dbyings nas zhugs pa yang / /chos nyid dang du mi dmigs kyang / /
rnal 'byor mchog gis bskul ba'i tshe/ /thugs rje chags pa'i mdangs phyung nas/ /srog rtsol dran rig gsung gsung ltar/ /mgur chu yan lag
'gul 'gul ltar/ /rdo rje yi ger 'bru 'bar ltar/ /gug skyed klad kor tsheg par phyin/ /ra ri khal khol sgrib med par/ /ye shes don la mkhyen rig
rgyas| |de lta mod kyang 'dul dbang gyis/ /rgyal ba bskul ba'i sa la gzhes/ /rnal 'byor gso ba'i cho ga byed/ /lha dang gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ /bzlas
brjod grangs dang bsnyen pa dang / /sbyor bas don la nye bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar stor ba'i dus dag na/ /byin rlabs phebs sam nye ba yi/ /rtags sam drod
dam mtshan ma ni/ /rnal 'byor nyid dang bsgrub rdzas dang / /yod mthong sgra thos kun la 'byung / /lus kyi drod dang rmi lam dang / /sems kyi rtags su gsal ba dang / /
dbugs dag la yang nges par 'byung / /shing bal lta bur yang ba dang / /mi bde'i gnod pa bral ba yin/ /rigs la ting 'dzin gsal ba dag /rmi lam du yang
mos par 'gyur/ /dang zhing dga' la mgu ba skye/ /gdung ba'i byang chub sems skyes shing / /ngo mtshar skyes pa de nyid do/ /'gyur ba'i dbugs la dbang thob
ste| |dgag dang dbyung ba ji lta ba'o/ /rdzas ni 'bar dang 'phar ba dang / /dri dang 'od 'byung ro mchog skye/ /mi zad mang du 'phel ba dang / /mngar 'jam dang zhing
ro mchog rnyed/ /lto la mi gnod mgrin la min/ /zos na bzhin 'gyur lus brtas 'gyur/ /sil snyan yid 'ong sgra snyan gzugs/ /dri zhim 'byung ba de lta'o/ /
rdo rje pra rnams bzang ba na/ /rtags dang mtshan ma phebs pa ste/ /smyur te dngos grub blang bar bya'o/ /bde dang ga 'u'i phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje bum pa'i 'phro 'du yis/ /
dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la dbab/ /yab yum sbyor ba'i lhag sems dag /ma phebs pa yi bar du dag /shes rab gsal ba'i lha mo bzhis/ /ha sta me long
ban+d+ha dang / /zhing chen phreng ba la sogs dang / /kha dog lnga yi dar g.yab kyis/ /g.yab cing rig 'dzin mang po 'bod/ /rol
mo cha byad mang po dag /rdo rje gar dang snyan pa'i glu/ /srid pa'i ma mo kun rten cing / /byin rlabs chen po dbab par bya/ /phebs ma thag tu dngos grub bstim//
'di ni rdo rje glu 'khor ro/ /ye shes rgyan gyi las yin no/ /zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig
pa'i mdo las/ rdo rje glu'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa zhes
bya ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir/ /gang dag 'jug par byed pa yi/ /rnal
'byor rigs kyi bu rnams kun/ /snod du gyur pa kun bsdus nas/ /byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed de/ /tshig 'di brjod de gnas par bya'o/ /e ma
bde mchog dga' tshal 'dir/ /bdag cag kun tu 'jug par 'tshal/ /dga' ba byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /gsang ba'i don 'di spyad par bgyi/ /de
skad gsol te zhus pa dang / /gsang ba mchog gi bdag po yis/ /rgyud sbyangs rgyud drug las sgo gcad/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor kun/ /dkyil 'khor chen po
gsal bton te/ /phyag rgya dbang dang bcas pa yi/ /'khor ba'i rgyud rnams sbyang bar bya/ /'jug pa de yi gnas lnga ru/ /rgyud drug sa bon bskyed nas kyang / /hUM lnga
dag gis mnan par bya/ /bcug pa de yi spyi bor ni/ /pa yi ye shes la bskrun pa/ /pad+ma kha bzhi lte ba la/ /mi dang lha yi sa bon dgod/ /shar lho nub dang
byang dag tu/ /lha min dud 'gro yi dwags dang / /dmyal ba rnams kyi sa bon gdab/ /hUM gis lam sgo gcad par bya/ /lag gnyis mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan//
sor mo gsum sbyar dpral bar bsnol/ /lha dang lha min gnas dag tu/ /mi gtong zlog pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis bsnol nas mchan khung bsdam/ /mi
yi khams nas zlog pa'i rgya/ /khu tshur bcangs te 'bru bsgrengs nas/ /g.yon gyi steng du mnan pa 'di/ /byol song gnas nas zlog pa'i rgya/ /thal mo mnyam
sbyar gung rtse sprad/ /gung mo rgyab tu srin lag bsnol/ /mgul nas mdzub mos 'khyud pa ni/ /yi dwags khams las zlog pa'i rgya/ /g.yon thog g.yas kyi rgyab
sbyar te| |srin lag gung mdzub gcig nas gcig /'khyud pa dmyal ba'i sgo gcod rgya/ /lag gi phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /ngag gi
rdo rje rgya brjod pa/ /kye ma ru tra kro d+ha kyi hUM/ hri sa ma pa tsa hUM/ hri sa ba dza hUM/ 'di ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang / /sgrib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor sbyor
ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor mchog gi lha/ /'gro drug 'dren pa'i dpal mdzad pa/ /rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams mgon khyod la skyabs su mchi'o//
de skad gsol ba btab pa dang / /rnal 'byor chen po'i zhabs nyid la/ /'jug pa de yi spyi bos gtugs/ /sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsang
mchog gsung las byung / /srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pa/ /dbang bskur snang ba chen po sbyin/ /A ti ho sta hri da khaM/ /de nas snod du gyur pa dang / /gsang ba'i
mig ni dbye bar bya/ /me tog phog pa'i lha yang sbyin/ /de nas dam tshig chen po bsgrag /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /dam tshig 'di las gang 'das pa/ /
rgyal ba thams cad bslus pa yin/ /khrag 'thung kha 'bar ma yi tshogs/ /khros nas snying khrag thogs pas 'thung / /badzra sa ma ya i dan the na ra kan/ ba ra
hri da ya na ma ba sti nA na/ sa ma ya rak+Sha sid+d+hi bad+yi badzra a mr-i to da kaM/ rdo rje tha tshig chu blud nas/ /rdo rje gal chen mna' dor ro/ /rdo rje dam tshig sdom pa rnams/ /thams
cad thams cad dbog par bya/ /slob pa'i gnyer yang dbog par bya/ /kye rig 'dzin rdo rje bu mchog khyed/ /rnal 'byor rgyal ba'i sras kyi yin/ /gzhan yang
gsang ba ma smra zhig /gal te smras na dmyal bar 'tshig /khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo/ /rgyal ba'i sras po gdung rgyud 'jin/ /gsang ba mchog gi ming sbyin gyi/ /zhing
khams kun tu bde bar spyod/ /des ni sangs rgyas zhing du skye/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ rdo rje rnal
'byor 'jug ba'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rjes yongs su rdzogs pa dbang gi le'u 'di
gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pas/ /bla ma'i sa la gnas pa ni/ /gsang mchog sum cu rtsa drug yin/ /
phyi yi dbang dang nang gi dbang / /sgrub pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang / /bcu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum dang / /rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de la
dang po sbyin pa'i dbang 'di yin te/ oM hUM sa hri ha/ kun gyis 'da' bar dka' ba yi/ /tshig btsan yul la dbang sgyur ba/ /rgyal po
bka' rtags phyag rgya'i dbang / /sku lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /rigs rnams so so'i rgyud 'dzin cing / /rtags kyi mtshan ma chen po ni/ /sbyor
ba chen po'i phyag mtshan te/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rdzogs par 'gyur/ /shes rab gzungs kyi gsang mchog ni/ /don dang ldan par gyur pa yin/ /mtha'
gnyis dag tu mi gtong ba'i/ /gzungs ma'i rgyal mo chen mo yin/ /gnyis med yongs su rdzogs pa na/ /thams cad bde ba chen po'i ngang / /byang chub
sems dang don du 'brel/ /shes rab chen po rdzogs pa'i dbang / /bkra shis chen po bum ba ni/ /bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i pho brang ste/ /dkyil 'khor
rdzogs par gyur pa yi/ /dbang chen de la sbyin par bya/ /gsang ba'i bstan pa rgyas nas ni/ /yun ring gnas par 'gyur ba yis/ /bkra shis rdzas kyi dbang
mchog kyang / /gnang ba chen po sbyin par bya/ /don rnams grub par 'gyur ba yi/ /'dod rgur re skong rin po che/ /rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun gyis/ /rgyal
po mchog tu dbang bskur ro/ /rin chen pad+ma seng+ge'i khri/ /bla mar gyur pa'i gdan mchog de/ /khyad par chen por gyur pa'i dbang / /khri chen dag la gzhag par
bya| |cod pan me tog phreng la sogs/ /dbang mchog brjid pa'i rgyan gyis klubs/ /dbu rgyan do shal se mo do/ /dpung rgyan rkang gdub lag gdub rnams/ /
dbang thob rgyal pos de la sbyin/ /dbang thob mdzes pas brjid pa'i rgyal po de/ /dbang phyug yin pas de la kun phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal po zhes
par ni| |kun gyis sgra chen 'bod cing bsgrag par bya/ /gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs khyud ldan pa zhig /rgyal po de yi lag tu bskur nas ni/ /'jig rten kun la
kha lo sgyur ba yi/ /dbang mchog rgyal po 'di yang sbyin par bya/ /phyi 'khor skyong ba'i rgyal por gyur phan chad/ /bla med mchog gi rtags dang ldan 'gyur bas//
gsang sgo phye nas nang du gzhug par bya/ /shin tu gsang ba'i rdzas dang ldan gyur na/ /gsang sgo gang las 'dod pa'i don rnams zhu/ /gnang chen po yi rtags
su byin gyis brlab/ /gsang ba'i don la nyan cing bslab pa'i dbang / /dbang thob skal can de la sbyin par bya/ /bdud rtsi chu 'dis rna ba'i gsang sgo dbye/ /sarba
ta thA ga ta sta ma ti ho/ /glegs bam zab mo la sogs thams cad rnams/ /rigs kyi bu mchog de la sbyin par bya/ /des na 'gro
ba'i don byed nus pas na/ /las rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sgrub pa'i rtags/ /rdo rje rgya gram la sogs rnam bzhi'i rdzas/ /bu mchog de la thabs kyis sbyin par
bya| |gzhan gyi re 'dod skong ba'i bu mchog de/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs rgyud du byung ba bzhin/ /rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyud du byung bas na/ /tan+t+ra la sogs dam pa'i mdzod
gsum sbyin/ /des ni slob ma'i tshogs kun skyong nus phyir/ /bstan pa sgrog pa'i sa la gnas bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje rgyal po dpal gyi dbang mchog 'di/ /theg chen
dgu yi rtags dang bcas te sbyin/ /de ni bla med rgyal por 'gyur bas na/ /sa rnams non pa'i rtags mchog gdan khri'i dbang / /lha chen la sogs zhing chen
nyi zlar bcas/ /khyu mchog seng+ge ma he gzig dang stag /gtum pa'i dom gyis spar te sbyin par bya/ /rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rnam pa bdun/ /skye la dbang
sgyur rgyal po mnyes pa'i gzungs/ /pha rol dpung 'joms srid thub 'dzin pa dang / /bdag gzhan don sgrub rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan/ /dgos 'dod yid bzhin
skong ba'i rin po che/ /rgyal po de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya/ /de ni rgyal pa'i mchog sras yin pas na/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya/ /ras sam
'bur ram lugs su blugs pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan de yi spyi bor gzhag /ye shes chen po'i don dang de ldan pas/ /ye shes lnga yi rtags
mchog phyag rgya yis/ /gnas lngar gtugs te thugs kyi dbang mchog sbyin/ /oM mahA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA A daR+sha ta dz+nyA na

badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA sa man dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA pra t+ya prek+Sha Na dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA kr-i t+yA nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA
na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog de yin pas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang mchog 'di/ /rdo rje can la

sbyin par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma

ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ dbang mchog thob pa'i bu mchog de/ /
don rnams grub par bkra shis phyir/ /bdud 'dul bkra shis rdzas mchog rnams/ /rtags kyis brgyan te sbyin par bya/ /don
rnams grub pa'i bu mchog de/ /rdo rje dbang mchog thob pa na/ /zhing khams kun tu grags pa yi/ /rtsal gyi thig le rdo rje sbyin/ /nang du 'jug pa'i dbang
thob nas/ /de dag kun la spyod sgrub pa'i/ /dbang mchog dam pa sbyin par bya/ /skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid la/ /sems kyi dbang bskur thob pa yi/ /shes
rab chen po rig pa'i dbang / /sems lon don gyi gtan tshigs sbyin/ /bya ba'i mtshan ma kun bral zhing / /btsal med gnas pa'i byang chub sems/ /
snying rje chen po'i bde mchog gis/ /khams gsum kun la dbang sgyur sbyin/ /sbyin gsum 'gro ba'i don rnams kun/ /thams cad rdzogs par nus pa
yi| |rtags kyi dbang mchog dam pa ni/ /thong gshol 'bar ba sbyin par byed/ /dug gsum gting nas sprug pa yi/ /rtags chen ga 'u rnam pa gsum/ /
dmar chen dag gis bkang nas kyang / /dbang chen thob de'i lag tu sbyin/ /srid gsum sgrol bar bya ba yi/ /dbang mchog chen po sbyin pa'i phyir/ /ka
tar la sogs mtshon cha rnams/ /dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin/ /'khor ba'i chos la spyir spyad kyang / /skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /rtags kyi phyag rgya chen po
ni| |rnam dag rdzas kyi pad+ma sbyin/ /las rnams rdzogs par gyur pa yi/ /dbang mchog thob pa'i rtags chen ni/ /sti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dag /dbang thob de yi
lag tu sbyin/ /yum dang gnyis med 'khril ba yi/ /chos nyid don dang gnyis med rtags/ /sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chun po 'di/ /dbang thob de yi lag tu
sbyin| |gsang ba sbyor ba'i shes rab ma/ /dri med rnam dag lha mo zhig /mtshan ldan shin tu brgyan byas la/ /dbang thob de la sbyin par bya/ /dbang thob rgyal
po chen po de/ /kun gyi bdag po yin pas na/ /rol mo dri dang zhal zas dang / /'dod yon lnga la sogs pa dang / /nye ba'i longs spyod rgyan rnams kun/ /thams
cad thams cad sbyin par bya/ /sgrub pa'i las la dbang thob phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad sgrub pa dang / /rdo rje tshe dang sman la
sogs| |sgrub pa ma lus sgrubs shig ces/ /bsgrub rdzas thams cad sbyin par bya/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dbang thob de gnyis gcig pa'i
phyir| |rig 'dzin rdo rje rtsal gyi dbang / /rdo rje ming ni sbyin par bya/ /bsgrub pa'i dbang dang rdzas mchog dang / gsang ba'i bdag po
yin pas na/ /gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya/ /dga' ba byang chub sems chen po/ /kun tu tshim par byed pa yi/ /dkar dmar lhag pa'i byang
chub sems/ /dbang thob de yi lce la gzhag /btsal mod byang chub sems chen po/ /shes rab chen po'i rtsal gyis ni/ /chos sku sgyu mar dbang
bsgyur nas/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i dbang yin pas/ /rdzas dang tshig dang gang zag dang / /kun rdzob dbang de ma thob kyang / /chos la sems kyi dbang
thob na| |rgyal ba'i rig 'dzin thams cad dang / /srid gsum dbang can thams cad kun/ /de la dbang thob bskur bar 'gyur/ /dbang gi tshad ni 'di
lta ste| |dad ldan sri zhur ldan pa la/ /gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang chen bskur/ /rnam bzhi las kyi don tshang na/ /las rnams byed pa'i dbang thob bo/ /
lta ba'i dmigs bus chos mthong na/ /rgyal 'theb 'chad pa'i dbang thob bo/ /rkyen thub tshad ma gsum ldan na/ /bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dbang / /dam
pa mdzod gsum thams cad la/ /phyogs med par ni 'chad shes nas/ /rab 'byams rgyal po'i dbang thob bo/ /dad med blo zhan rdzob pa che/ /tshul 'chos
mkhan la ras gcod byed/ /de ni dbang gis 'tshig par bshad/ /gsang med brjed ngas dbang mi 'chags/ /dad med g.yel rmugs dbang mi dgos/ /
snod med bcud bral kun stongs pa/ /des ni dbang thob ma yin no/ /snod ldan bcud rdzogs dbang thob na/ /dbang mchog thob pa'i rgyud ces bshad/ /ces
gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ rdo rje dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de
nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang / sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo dang bcas pa chos thams
cad kyi me long yin par rig nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis shin tu ngam zhing ngo mtshar skyes nas bstod pa shin tu dga' ba chen po'i glu 'di
blangs so/ /e ma hoH/ nyes bcom legs ldan mtshan zhi mtha' las 'das/ /dpag med byams snyoms don gyis bdag gzhan dpal/ /don dam gsang
sbas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khyil/ /rdo rje che mchog dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /'dzin pa mi rtog sha rus khrag la rol/ /thugs
kyi gdung thag 'khor ba'i tha la rje/ /yul med ma skyes mtshan ma'i g.yul las rgyal/ /bde mchog rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shes rab
chen po nam mkha'i nyi mar gsal/ /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dbyings su 'char/ /dpa' rtul myur ba'i shugs kyis 'gro drug sgrol/ /rtog 'joms
ye shes rdo rje cho 'phrul 'phro/ /dam pa'i don gsungs gnyis med ston pa'i sku/ /smra ba'i seng+ge khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen gter ldan 'dod rgur
kun skong zhing / /lung dang rigs pa gtan tshigs kun gyi mdzod/ /brda can yang dag len pa'i me long gsal/ /rdo rje kun 'dus 'jigs byed rgyal
ba'i rgyud/ /chos kyi me long 'di la bdag cag 'dud/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ ngo mtshar bstod pa'i le'u
ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
shrI gu h+ya gar+b+ha ta twa bi ni sh+tsa ya/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus
bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha
mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che
'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes
rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad dang so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig
pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil ba/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad
par du gyur pa/ spags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i
rgyan dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyi phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung
la mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab par klubs pa/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi
rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa/ kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng+ge'i khri dang / stobs glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri
dang / dbang rma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa'i nam mkha' lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa
med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du zhal thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa/ bsam
gyis mi khyab pa/ thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun tu snang ba/ thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs
kyis skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum
dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun
kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / le brgan dang / ljang khu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang / sra ba'i dbyings
dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro ba'i dbyings dang / bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med par chos kyi dbyings kun tu
mtha' yas par khyab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong dang /
byang chub chen po'i rdo rje thos pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang / btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang / mnyan par
bya ba dang / bsnam par bya ba dang / myong bar bya ba'i tshogs dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje
thos byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang / btsun mo 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / 'byung ba dang / ma byon
pa'i tshogs dang / 'joms pa chen po reg pa dang / 'joms pa chen po reg byed dang / 'joms pa chen po reg bya dang / 'joms pa chen po reg shes
dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / bdag tu ma yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs
brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / /e e e ma'o/ /de
bzhin nyid dbyings nyid dbang sgyur/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i ngang / /rang snang ba nyid ting nge 'dzin/ /gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam par dag /gsal ba ni
sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las sel med pa'i yon tan yid bzhin rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do/ /zhes
gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa
po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rje btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to/ /zhugs pas
phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs
pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o rdo rje phung po yan lag ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/ /skye mched khams rnams mang po
kun| |byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI/ /me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /
srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing / /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin/ /sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i
chos| |sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mnyes so/ /zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to/ /de nas
btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /kye ma phyogs bcu'i stong khams
ye nas dben/ /srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing / /snyigs ma lnga yid bde ldan gnas/ /phung po lnga nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thams cad mchog gi snying po
bas| |gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos mi btsal/ /nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos/ /btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do/ /zhes brjod pas/ thams cad ye nas
sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su
bskyed pa 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /skye ba med las thams cad skye/ /skyes pa nyid na skye
ba med| |e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag /'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med//
e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /gnas pa med las thams cad gnas/ /gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med/ /e ma ngo
mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs/ /dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med/ /e ma
ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong / /'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med/ /ces brjod pas/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang mnyes pas khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun
mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/ /sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang / /ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu
gsang / /gzhan du min la shin tu gsang / /zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo
nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las 'gro ba lnga'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la
thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma bder gshegs snying po las/ /
rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul/ /sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang / /gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa/ /bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin/ /sus
kyang ma bcings bcings med de/ /bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin/ /rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis/ /nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa dor/ /bcings med rnam
par grol med pa'i/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/ /bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad/ /ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa
nyid la ched du gleng ngo / /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u
ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub
pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las thon to/ /thon nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang / yan man gyi 'jig rten
drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re re thub pa bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de/ /
bltams pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka' thub mdzad pa dang / bltams pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka' ba byung ba dang / bskor ba dang / cho 'phrul
chen po ston pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs par ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu mkhyen pa
dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis thams cad du gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho gas kun tu don spyod pa dang /
zag pa med pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po drug dang / kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu thugs bsam
gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grangs med
pa phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to/ /thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
kyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag
brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang / 'dzin
pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / 'dzin pa 'khrul pa las 'dogs pa dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / las dang las
kyi 'bras bus mi gos/ gos par mi 'gyur/ gos su med par ston pa'i mthar thug go /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa
'di brjod do/ /ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos/ /ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis/ /phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor/ /mi mthun bde sdug
myong bar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med/ /yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su/ /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de/ /rnam dag dbyings nyid
tshul gcig go /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/ /log par rtog pa tsam nyid las/ /phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin/ /log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de//
gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/ /log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyu nyid kyang / /gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma/ /rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul/ /nyid la dbang sgyur/
nyid spyod phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun/ /rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog /theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas//
yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na/ /rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'/ /chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/ /ma rig
smin mdzad 'dul ba'i phyir/ /byung nas mya ngan 'da' bar ston/ /'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang / /dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang / /sku dang gsung dang
thugs kyi rgyud/ /phyogs bcu rnams su rab grags pa/ /gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te/ /rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di/ /sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi//
'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs/ /chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam/ /ston pas don dang mthun phyogs su/ /ming dang tshig tu btags nas bstan//
ston min tshig la dngos po med/ /ces ched du brjod do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku
dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / /a ho/ /srid rtsa nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog
las 'phros/ /rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang / /gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa/ /log rtog nyid las gzhan du g.yo
ba ci yang med/ /stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs/ /dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang sgyur/ /ngo mtshar sku gsung thugs dang
yon tan 'phrin las zhing khams las/ /gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin/ /zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas/ thub pa drug gi sprul
pa grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi
g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /a/ rab tu
brtan gyur a dkar las/ /shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas/ /bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan/ /de las
ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun/ /spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no/ /'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi/ /brtan byung ye shes rgyu yin no/ /a A/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha
dza dz+ha nya| Ta Tha Ta D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+ShaH/ i I/ u U/ e A+ai/ o au/ /'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten
drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /rab tu g.yos/ /kun tu rab tu g.yos nas chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to/ /
hoH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /a ni stong dang mi stong gi /dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin/ /thams
cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun/ /yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas/ /a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i/ /ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis/ /sgra yi ming gis thams cad
bsdus| |mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges/ /e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi/ /'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming / /ming rnams
ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /sna tshogs don chen smra zhing ston/ /dngos med yi ge'i rang bzhin sems/ /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang / /dbyibs
dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis/ /rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi/ /ye shes sems dpa' sku gsung thugs/ /
dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid/ /yi ge mgo nas k+ShaHla rdzogs/ /sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge ste/ /yi ge'i dngos po yod ma yin/ /dmigs med de nyid
sna tshogs pa'i/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che/ /sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi/ /ngo mtshar 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa/ /dbyings la dbyings kyis
bris pa ste/ /yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod/ /mgo ni ma nor lam yin te/ /tsheg ni shes rab ming du smra/ /shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod/ /a ni skye
med de bzhin nyid/ /A ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid/ /Tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid/ /Ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid/ /Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid/ /D+ha ni sgyu
'phrul snang bdag nyid/ /Na ni sgyu 'phrul kun du nyid/ /tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid/ /ta ni dra bas bstan pa nyid/ /da ni dra bas lhan ni nyid/ /d+ha ni dra bas
'khril ba nyid/ /na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur/ /ka ni spyan gyis thugs kyi mchog /kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog /ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog /g+ha ni ljags
kyi thugs kyi mchog /nga ni thugs gyi 'jigs byed pa'o/ /tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog /tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog /dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog /dz+ha ni ljags
kyi sku yi mchog /nya ni sku yang 'jigs byed pa'o/ /pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog /pha ni snyan gyi gsung gi mchog /ba ni shangs kyi gsung gi mchog /b+ha ni
ljags kyi gsung gyi mchog /ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed/ /ya ni skye ba rnam par dag /wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin/ /ra ni 'jigs pa dag pa ste/ /la
ni stong pa dag pa'o/ /sha ni rtag pa med pa ste/ /Sha ni ched pa'ang yod ma yin/ /sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa/ /ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid/ /k+Sha ni ye shes thugs
kyi thugs/ /i ni rdul snyed lha rnams su/ /I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin/ /u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su/ /U ni rdul snyed byol song rnams/ /e ni rdul snyed yi
dwags su/ /ai ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams/ /oM ni thams cad 'jig par byed/ /au ni thams cad zhig pa yin/ /yi ge
'khor lo tshogs chen 'di/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phreng bas bsdus/ /zhes brjod do/ /a hoHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang
gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo /
a hoHthabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo/ /'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis//
'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam/ /'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin/ /hoHrdo rje
gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge'i 'khor lor gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
las| yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas yi ge 'khor lo sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam
par 'phro ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin/ /sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te/ /yi ge yid bzhin rin
chen sprin/ /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor
thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang / /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing / /longs spyod 'byung pa ngan song sbyong / /cir yang
gzhan du 'gyur ba 'grub/ /nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing / /'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang / /chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te/ /'jig rten khams
'di 'dor ba dang / /thams cad stongs shing ltung bar 'gyur/ /dgug dang btang dang bcing dang grol/ /gso dang bsad dang pham ngang rgyal/ /ting 'dzin 'di
yis byed par 'gyur/ /de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i/ /ming tshig gzugs sogs yid bzhin gyis/ /mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du/ /'gyur bas
gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul/ /ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams/ /ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan/ /'grub
'gyur mi ldan med cing brlag /dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni/ /zad pa'i dus
med yid bzhin mdzod/ /'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste/ /dngos po med las dngos po sprin/ /sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur/ /dngos
rnams nyid na dngos med par/ /rtog pa'i dbang sgyu ting 'dzin yin/ /gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa/ /de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes/ /de phyir dngos
dang dngos med pa/ /'jigs bas dmigs med shes par gyis/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /pho mo ma yin ma ning min/ /mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min/ /kha dog ma yin dbyings
ma yin| |gnas su ma yin gang yang min/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/ /thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam
yas| |tha dad med la tha dad pa'i/ /nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol/ /'jig med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog /
gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gtul nas su/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rab bstan na/ /dngos grub ya mtshan chen
por 'gyur/ /zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ sgyu 'phrul sgrub
pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid chen po thams
cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /ye shes phyogs
bzhi dbus brtags te/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ /rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por
spyod/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi myu khyud bcas/ /gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams ldan/ /kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan/ /rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin/ /
dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan/ /seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung / /nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la/ /nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/ /gdan la rdzogs
dang sems dpa'i tshul/ /'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang / /g.yas na mthong thos snom pa dang / /myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/ /gru chad la ni
mthong byed dang / /thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas/ /bar khyams la ni thub
drug dang / /mdun dang rgyab na byed pa dang / /bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan/ /sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/ /rdo
rje 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar/ /ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/ /mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin/ /mthing ga dkar
po ser le brgan/ /ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/ /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can/ /gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin 'bar/ /'od
zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste/ /mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub//
sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni/ /de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang / /yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang / /'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ /mthun
byas sku ni sna tshogs ston/ /stong nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul/ /tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med/ /ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i/ /de tshe
ma mthun sna tshogs la/ /so so 'dra bar snang ba ni/ /de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang / /las 'phro'i dbang gis so sor snang / /dper na me long chu zla bzhin/ /de tshe
'gro drug thams cad las/ /sdig sbong gzugs su rnam par bstan/ /dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs/ /rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i gzugs/ /
gzhan yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin/ /'og min bla med gnas mchog tu/ /sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la/ /de
bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste/ /sku yis chos rnams mjal bar ston/ /me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du/ /dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel/ /'khor
gyis de bzhin sku bltas na/ /byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med/ /ma long bzhin du sku la snang / /de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byang / /bla med byang chub yang
dag 'thob/ /chos sku dpag med brjod du med/ /longs spyod zad med rin chen gter/ /sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad
rdzogs| |spyod yul kun tu maN+Da la/ /tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol/ /thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog /de la sogs te bsam yas mchog /
skye shi med pa g.yung drung sku/ /nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas/ /zad mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rig pa'i sku//
thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/ /de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs/ /zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed cig gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje
las phyung ngo / /a ho/ /dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang //
mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings/ /ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'phro spros pa med/ /ho/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig
tu'o// ||gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ dkyil 'khor sbros pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /bruM bi swa bi shud+d+he/ hUM badzra
d+h+rika /oM dzi na dzika /swAM rat+na d+h+rika /AM A ro lika /haM pradz+nyA d+h+rika /ma d+hA te shwa ri/ lAM de Sha ra ti/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badzra ra ti/ k+ShIM hi rA dza ya/

traM a gar+b+ha ya/ hriM ha hUM pad+ma ba dA ma/ dz+hiM ku ru pa Ni hri/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM ma l+ye sa ma ya hoH/ hrI gI ti rA gau \u0f85haM/ aM na rte rA ga yA mye/ mai d+hA ra Ne swA hA/ thi
li sa raM b+ha ya swA hA/ hUM swa rA dzA ya swA hA/ muM shri aM raM ga ya swA hA/ dzeHd+hu pa pra bi sa/ hUM puSh+pa a bi sa/ baM dI pa su khI ni/ hoHgan+d+ha tsit+taM/ hUM ya mAn+ta krita phaT/

hUM pad+mAn+ta krita phaT/ hUM pra dz+nyAn+ta krita phaT/ hUM bi g+ha nAn+ta krita/ oM mahA badzra d+ha raM ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa lA nI hUM phaT/ oM ma hA rat+na d+ha raM ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa lA nI hUM

phaT| oM mahA pad+ma d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM mahA kar+m+ma d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta oM a a a badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta

AHoM mu ne hrIM swA hA/ oM mu ne hUM swAhA/ oM mu ne sruM swAhA/ oM mu ne graM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ya swAhA/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan mahA kA ru Ni ka dri sh+ya hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/
dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /oM AMHhUM swAhA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ pa pa pa pa pa/ dza dza dza dza dza/ pa pa pa pa pa/ sa sa sa sa sa/ pa pa pa pa pa/ ma
ma ma ma ma/ pa pa pa pa pa/ ya ya ya ya ya/ pa pa pa pa pa/ oM AMHhUM swAhA/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che/ /de nyid
du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hoH/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /zhes brjod pas
gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab par grags so/ /rab tu grags so/ /kun tu grags so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang / bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do/ /de nas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen po'i ye shes dang / byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sgyu
