'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA pra t+yA bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badzra

swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA kri t+ya a nuSh+ThA na badz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA kA ya badzra swa b+hA

pa at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA
ga Na badzra swa b+hA ga at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ zhes brjod pas tham par 'gyur/ /gsal bar 'gyur/ 'bar bar gyur
to| |e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung / /sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/ /sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung / /
gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab/ /sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags/ /thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya'i mchog /
rgyud mchog sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba/ /thams cad pad+ma'i ngang gyur na/ /grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra/ /ji skad brjod kyang
gsung mchog yin/ /theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang / /log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad/ /byang chub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus/ /bsdus nyid phyogs bcur
rnam par grags/ /grags nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs/ /gsung ba nyid na brjod du med/ /brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra/ /
kun la grags shing so sor 'jal/ /dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs bzhin/ /gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go /'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po
yin| |theg pa mthon man thams cad kyang / /de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te/ /gdul bya'i thabs su so sor thos/ /ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod
kyang / /de bzhin nyid las gsung ba med/ /yi ge med dang rig ba'i gsung / /ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang / /thugs rje gsung gi byin rlabs kyis//
'gro kun sna tshogs so sor gsal/ /gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog /de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don rnams/ /de bzhin ngang las ma g.yos kyang / /
dper na brag ca'i sgra bzhin no/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dang / gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bdun
pa'o|| //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yan lag thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis
rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ /gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi/ /snying po phyag
rgya 'da' dka'o/ /mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge /rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge /lnga gnyis zung du sbrad pa las/ /sbyar pas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /oM
dang muM gnyis rtse sbyar te/ /'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar
bkan| |hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/
muM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi spas nas thugs kar dkan/ /oM
bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /lam
bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /swa bsgreng
rtse mor rin chen 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas
thugs kar bkan/ /maM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas
thugs kar bkan/ /aM bsgreng rtse mor pad+ma 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas
thugs kar bkan/ /phyAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas
thugs kar bkan/ /hA bsgreng rtse mor ra la gri 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas
thugs kar bkan/ /taM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /ut+pal klu shing la
sogs mtshan/ /rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar/ /pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen snye/ /gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang / /pi wang
gar mkhan mchog nyid de/ /me tog phreng dang spos mchog dang / /mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i/ /las la 'khril zhing chos la brtan/ /dbu rnams 'byor zhing
'dud pa'i tshul/ /gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /sgo bzhi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /nre mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon/ /thod
sprul chen pos gnod pa dang / /rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon/ /lcags kyu zhags pa spo Ta ho/ /sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang / /'dud tshul 'khril ba gong
ma bzhin/ /thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no/ /sreg par dang ni pi wang dang / /go cha po ti rin chen sgrom/ /me dang chu ni rab tu
bstan| |yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings/ /kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro/ /yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+mo'i dkyil/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna
tshogs te/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam/ /yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na/ /ma
bskyod ma bsgul thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas/ /yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
gsum 'phror 'gyur/ /de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gi /rgyal ba rgyal mchog de bzhin du/ /bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar//
de la sogs te bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su/ /'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston/ /theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang / /phyin
ci log rnams thams cad dang / /zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la/ /so sor mthun par kun tu ston/ /dper na gar mkhan nyid dra ba/ /lus las ma
bkod sna tshogs ston/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med/ /gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro/ /bskyed dang spro
ba'ang de bzhin nyid/ /mdor na bsgul bskyod thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas/ /gnas gnyis mi gnas gnas ma yin/ /de skad dag
mchog nyid kyis bshad/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ yan lag dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs nas phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /shin tu phra ba'i
dam tshig mchog /phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya/ /'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga/ /snying po
lnga dang sman lnga dang / /bdud rtsi lnga ni rab bsnyams la/ /rig pas thig ni gdab par bya/ /lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas//
gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi/ /bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya/ /sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la/ /tsa na'i 'bru tsam pad+ma'i gdan/ /yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge la//
phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri/ /bcos bu ras ni sna tshogs dang / /rgyan phreng bro ba'i btung bas bskor/ /glu tshig bro gar rol mo yi/ /sprin dpung tshogs kyis
rab tu mchod/ /yum dang 'jom sems ma yis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod/ /dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan par/ /zhal du gyur pa'i ma
bos la| |bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te/ /shin tu phra ba sbyangs pa yis/ /
bsam yas dag la'ang de bzhin bya/ /rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ /sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis/ /phyogs
bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing / /mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi/ /sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi/ /mdzes pas bris shing spras
pa dang / kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar/ /dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil/ /rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang / /rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon
pa'i tshal/ /glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra/ /bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs/ /do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/ /bza' dang btung ba'i mchog
rnams dang / /rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi/ /lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis/ /bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams
bkang nas/ /dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul/ /skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis/ /rim gyis yang na gcig car du/ /chos kyi dbyings
dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ /gsal ldan ma'am byin brlabs la/ /stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du/ /
dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod/ /mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog /bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
ma lus mnyes/ /srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la/ /dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs
pa yi| |sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang / /khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur/ /lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad/ /gang na'ang mi
gnas mi dmigs pa/ /mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom/ /kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /de nas slob ma
gzhug par bya/ /de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/ /bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul/ /
dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin/ /nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos/ /nyes pa thams cad dag par
'gyur| |dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas/ /phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang / /rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya/ /snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung //
yang na thal mor rab bsnol nas/ /phyag rgya chen po'i 'phang du ni/ /dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du bya/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya/ /yang na sa gzhi
rab bsnyams la/ /dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya/ /yang na lus gang tshad du ste/ /yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad/ /phur bu
srad bu tshon phye dang / /gos rgyan mdzes pa'i yid 'ong grogs/ /thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya/ /yang na khru ni
bcu drug dang / /nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga bya/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod/ /yang na rgyang grags
dpag tshad tsam/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom/ /ma mthong rmongs pa brtan phyir tshon/ /kha
dog nyi shu rtsa lnga yang / /lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye/ /ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog /yi ge'am brda 'am
snying po'am/ /phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par/ /byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che/ /'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam/ /sa la sogs
la phyag rgya byas/ /rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs nas/ /smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/ /phyogs dus dkyil
'khor bdag nyid che/ /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drangs nas/ /rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /'jug
pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /nye bar gyur ba'i dam tshig mchog /
dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi/ /rin po che dang 'byung ba kun/ /de dag rdzas yod ma yin te/ /rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin/ /ngo mtshar cho
'phrul rmad po che/ /gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te/ /thabs la brtan pa'i shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu yi ngag du byung / /shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid//
thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir/ /ye shes la ni ye shes rol/ /ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog /rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang / /byin rlabs ston
pa'ang de bzhin te/ /bya byed nus pa'i gzi byin gyis/ /sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog /cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing / /yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan/ /sngags kyi
yan lag lnga rdzogs pas/ /ma nyams 'dug la rab brtson pas/ /zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang bsgyur rigs
kyi dam pa 'grub/ /de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis/ /sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni/ /ye shes thig le nyid snang ba/ /bsam gyis
mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas pa'i/ /rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang //
'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun/ /mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang / /rgya chen gsung las don
'byung ba/ /mthun pa'i shes rab snang ba 'o/ /gcig dang du mar bral ba yi/ /mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te//
rang byung ye shes gnas med snang / /log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing / /ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/ /thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas
na| |'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang / /bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na/ /stangs dbyal gnyis sam yang na lnga/ /byas te dad ldan rab bzhugs na/ /'dod
pa'i yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur/ /skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de/ /gnyer na nye bar 'byung ba yin/ /ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges/ /dad med nyams na
phung bar 'gyur/ /zhes ched du brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya
las| |bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun/ /rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mor bsgyil/ /rtsa nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor bsgyur/ /nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas
su| |gsal ba thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /traM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog las/ /
gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya/ /gsang ba'i don nyid rtag pa las/ /gzhan du smra bar bya ba yin/ /gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le
ngo bo nyid/ /yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim/ /oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sku/
rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /hUM gi phyag
rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyi/ /las rnams ma lus
kun gyis shig /pho nya mang po'i 'du 'phro kun/ /khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin/ /smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /
hrI yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /oM chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis/ /dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byas/ /rab
'bring tha ma'i blo can la/ /mthun pa'i gsang bsgrags gzhan du min/ /bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /
hUM oM swa aM ha rnams las/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che/ /dkyil
'khor kun gyi byed pa po/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod/ /slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing / /dbang rnams thob par ma byas par/ /nyan pa
la sogs pa brtson pa rnams/ /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ /dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang / go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang / /gdugs dang bum
pa bza' btung dang / /snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na/ /dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras/ /ngan song thams cad med pa dang / /tshe ring bde skyid phun sum tshogs//
mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
do| |rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul/ /byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par/ /rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis/ /thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che//
yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun/ /rnam smin oM du shes par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /
gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs/ /rnam smin muM du shes par bya/ /yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /gos rgyan
bza' btung glu dang tshig /bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung gis/ /hUM du shes pas rab spyad na/ /ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes/ /lha mo klu mo rigs
ngan mo| |dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po/ /sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po/ /yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil
'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la/ /dgyes mnyam tshogs kyi sbyin pas bstim/ /sgrub pa nyi zla'i dkyil
'khor de/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce yis blangs/ /mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs/ /yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /zhing 'gyur mchog
dang mchog phran rnams/ /nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag /rang rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom/ /hUM du gyur pas rnam par dag /dbyings su thim nas phyag
rgyar 'bar/ /skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phros pas brjid/ /gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom/ /ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs/ /ye shes skye med de bzhin
nyid| |sgyu mar snang ba mi g.yor tshul/ /sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang / /rdul cha tsam yang gos pa med/ /snod bcud rgyu rnams dag rtogs shing / /mnyam
gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i zhing / /byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas/ /yan lag ma nyams yo byad
ldan| |cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yis/ /rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/ /lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis//
tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la/ /khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu/ /'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom/ /de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs/ /pad+ma'i rigs te sku
gsung thugs/ /khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/ /rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso/ /thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi
mchog /khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu gcig dang lha rnams bsgoms/ /khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang / /pho nya phyag nyan bka' nyan tshogs/ /ci bgyi
la sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ /dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed/ /rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni/ /mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas
shing / /spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa/ /thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'o/ /rdo rje rigs su thams cad dkyil/ /'od 'phro 'bar bar rab tu bsgom/ /
chags med tshul du bstim par bya/ /gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che/ /yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de/ /thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /ting
'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /dkyil
'khor ma lus 'bar bar 'grub/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ /rdo rje rigs su skye ba'i gnas/ /sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni/ /
thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phro/ /gnyis
su med par bstim par bya/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub/ /rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom/ /
sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom/ /so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal/ /gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang / /
ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas/ /dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya/ /le lo sgyid snyoms med pa yis/ /the tshom med par bsgrubs byas na/ /dkyil 'khor
thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa thob/ /sgrub pa'i zhag dang chos grangs ni/ /rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bshad/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i
tshig tu 'o/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo / /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te rgyan bkong pa'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bro gar phyag
rgya'i 'du 'phro yis/ /'dzum lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis/ /chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya
yis| |'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub/ /bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis/ /thams
cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzugs/ /'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen/ /nus mthu can du gang gyur pa/ /rig 'dzin
rgyal ba'i zhing du grags/ /mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi/ /skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyang / /khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin/ /pha rol phyin pa kun tu rdzogs/
thabs dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog /shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pa/ /sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum/ /rgyu 'bras khyad par
lhun gyis rdzogs/ /mkha' dkyil dag pa'i dbyings nyi zla/ /ye shes rgyal po stangs dbyal bsgom/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas kun/ /ma
lus par ni sgom par 'gyur/ /dus bzhi'i phyogs bcu gang nas kyang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ /
sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma tshol cig /dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub bar 'gyur/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang / /
skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med/ /ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ tshogs
sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung
thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam
tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /tsa/ ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog /
phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /tsha/ 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang / /wa/ rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni/ /yi ge sgra rtags ming tshogs
las| |brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te/ /khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/ /ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor
gyi| |dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /gsang
ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs/ /dbang po yul
dus rig pa rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis/ /thugs kyi ye shes lngas bltas shing / /snying po thig le mnyam
sbyor ba| |bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis/ /ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bul/ /zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba'i/ /rol
mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog /gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /phyogs bcu dus
bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs/ /ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba'i/ /dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin/ /dkyil
'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
mnyam sbyor las/ /thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung / /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mchog /sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol
ba yis| |bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thos bsam sgom pa mnyam sbyor gyis/ /rang byung kun
ngom lhun gyis grub/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog /gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas
dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis/ /phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi/ /nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur/ /
bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi/ /'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te/ /'jig rten drug
gi phyogs bcu na/ /'das dang da ltar byung ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /brnyes nas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs/ /'byung dang ma 'ongs thams
cad kun/ /'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi/ /'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /
'di las gsang ba'i nges don med/ /btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so/ /kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog /thos bsam sgom la rab sbyangs pa'i/ /shes
rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung / /snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan/ /lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin/ /gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya/ /rmongs la
'phyar bas gal te sbyin/ /dus min par ni srog zad nas/ /bsregs dang sgrebs par yun ring gnas/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs
pa nyid la ched du brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs
pa yi| |ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che/ /bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs/ /snang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs hoHoM rdo rje bsod nams thig
le che| |rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po thig le che hoHoM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che/ /yon tan
'phrin las kun tu rdzogs/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang / /'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che hoHoM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings//
mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro/ /mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim/ /sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po hoHoM phyogs bcur 'jig rten rdul
snyed du| |rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ /sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis/ /skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub hoHoM thams cad ma lus
sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che hoHzhes ched du bsgrags so/ /gsang
ba pa'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang / brtags pa la mngon
par zhen pas yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs
pas srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so/ /de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang /
'di bas shin tu grang yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug
bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang / shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad du 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis
su nyams su myong ngo / /de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang / yi dwags ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po
rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su gyur pa dang / /yod med par yang gyur cing shin
tu ring cing bskams pa dang / lus dang / yan lag dang / dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so/ /de nas las kyi sgrib
pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dwags srin po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus
gcig la mgo brgya pa dang / mgo sna tshogs pa dang / lus brgya la mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang /
yan lag sna tshogs pa dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / 'khor rab tu mang po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang /
'jigs pa'i nga ro sgra skad sna tshogs pa sgrog pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / kha rlangs kyis thams cad skye bung zhes byed pa dang / rab
tu 'jigs pa'i rlung nag dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs bcu kun tu khams 'khrug par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs
par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i rigs dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / lha'i ris dang / tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'od gsal dang /
dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus so/ /de sngon brten pa'i stobs kyis thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur to/ /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bkod pa sgyu 'phrul dra bas 'jig rten drug gis phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid
chen po bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i
rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba chen po rnam par spros pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi
dbyings las khro mo dbang phyug ma chen mo mngon du phyung ste/ hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis/ /pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas ni/ /gnyis su med par dgyes
pa'i 'khril bas thim nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hUM hUM hUM bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la hUM hUM phaT ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten
drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas khyab par gyur to/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam/ /phyogs bcu'i
rdul phra mo snyed thon bar gyur pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos so/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur
'ur ro| |chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /kun tu rab tu shig shig go /gtor gtor/
rab tu gtor gtor/ kun tu rab tu gtor gtor ro/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang / gzi brjid che ba
dang / mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rgyal rab tu brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po shin tu rngam pas kyi bung
zhes byed pa 'bar ba chen po'i khrag 'thung / sku smug nag cir yang 'gyur pa/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs
'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng / 'bar
ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung gi
tshogs thams cad de dag kyang la la ni/ dpal khrag 'thung chen por gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te lho phyogs su bzhugs/
la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te nub phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las su gyur te byang phyogs su bzhugs so/ /de dag
kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang / rngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
gshin rje la sogs pa khyo shug gis gdan byas pa la bzhugs so/ /btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so sor sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /rigs lnga'i he ru ka las
gcig tu bstim ste bsdus nas/ gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan te/ de nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum po'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po
sna tshogs pa bstan nas mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros glang po'i gtum tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer cing shin
tu gdug pa'i sems kyis khros nas rngam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas
thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas rngam pa'i skad kyis/ hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs
pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs chen po de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nang khrol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcang gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs
nas rus pa kun 'chos so/ /de nas hUM hUM hUM b+h+yo e a ra li dza dza zhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas par yungs
'bru gcig tsam gyi nang du chud par bsdus so/ /de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ /dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo
thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo/ /srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon
nu ma dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung
myos pa dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog mo dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed ma dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byad mo dang /
sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa bran
dang yang bran dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog dang / 'khor zhing gi rdul rnyed bsdus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen
pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed chen por snang bar byas nas de dag kun dgyes par rol pa'i dkyil 'khor sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM AMHhUM badzra pra be sha a la la hoHzhes brjod pas
'byung mo'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du
bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang / dmar mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / gsod byed mo
dang / nag mo chen mo dang / dmar ser chen mo dang / sngo nag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dmar mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo rnams 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan
'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / za ba mo dang / srin mo rnams 'khril lo/ /bcom
ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+ma chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos ma dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung
mo rnams 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las kyi sku la me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byad mo dang / sna chad mo
dang / chu lha mo rnams 'khril lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis hUM zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i dkyil
'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu bcum par gyur to/ /de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes pas byang chub sems kyis sprin dag las dkar mo'i tshogs dang / rkun
mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs dang / thal bed ma'i tshogs dang / sbos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo'i tshogs dang / rme sha can gyi tshogs dang / ma
tshogs ma'i sogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du bcas nas thon to/ /thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor
bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rang rang gi lag cha dang bcas nas 'khod do/ /de nas shin tu dgyes te he he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen po'i tshogs dang / stag
gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / kang+ka'i gdong chen mo'i
tshogs dang / dur bya'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / 'ug pa'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du byas nas thon par
gyur to| |thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol shar gyi phyogs nas 'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do/ /de nas shin tu dgyes pas
phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus pa khyab par byas nas phaT ces brjod pas/ rdo rje srid 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdong ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig
rten ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas thon par gyur to/ /thon nas
kyang 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so/ /de nas dgyes pa'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags
pas thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad khong rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par bkye'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen
po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po bdud rtsi chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang /
thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /oM badzra mahA a mr-i ta mahA kro d+ha aM aM aM zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan
'das khro bo chen po de dag gi snam nas bton nas mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtsho chen por chung pa las/ snam nas khro bo u tsusma kro d+ha phyung nas
'dam khu kun 'thungs pas dran pa slar rnyed de/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/ phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad
brgya| sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo / /de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po dregs pa'i dbang phyug
thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul lo/ /de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing rab tu bred cing
zhus pa'i nga ros smras pa'i tshig /'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/ /mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing / /snying
yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cing / /rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang / /dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog /ces 'bangs su mchi bar mnas bor
nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go/ /thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang / ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams/
dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol/ /dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol/ /bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa
'di| |ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang / /gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar/ /g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i/ /sems kyis blangs te spyi bo yi/ /gtsug tu
bzhag ste bkur bar bya/ /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub/ /gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga
'dir| |smras pa bzhin du ma bgyis na/ /bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying / /bkas gtubs dum bur rul bar 'chi/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas de dag
gi chung ma'i tshogs dang / sring mo dang / ma dang / bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dkyil 'khor du yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig
tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kun/ /dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi/ /dpa' bo chen po bdag cag rnams/ /las kyi dngos grub
stsal du gsol/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gis dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi
rol du bkod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo
khrag 'thung chen po btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dag gis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM sarba

ta thA ga ta mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na mahA shrI he ru

ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+mo mahA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma mahA shrI he ru ka mahA

tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ta thA ga ta mahA kro d+hi shwa ri sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ oM mahA badzra d+ha ra mahA kwo d+hi shwa rI dz+wa li ni hUM phaT/ oM mahA sur+ya

rat+na mahA kro d+hi shwa rI bi d+ha ma hUM phaT/ oM hri sha ta sa ma ta pad+ma oM mahA sA ra swa ta mahA pad+ma mahA kro d+hi shwa rI khaM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha karma mahA kro d+hi shwa rI bi sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra gI
rI ya go rI ha/ badzra tsau ri ha/ badzra bra mo ha ha/ badzra be ta lI ha/ badzra tsaN+Da li ha/ badzra puk+ki si ha/ badzra g+hasma re ha/ badzra sma sha ni ha/ badzra srad+hi mu khI he/ badzra byA
g+h+ra mu khA hi/ badzra sr-ig la mu khI he/ badzra shwa na mu khI he/ badzra grid+d+ha mu khI he/ badzra kang+ka mu khI he/ badzra ka ka mu khI he/ badzra u lu ka mu khI he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza

te ra dzaHbadzra a mu ka hUM/ badzra lo ke paM/ badzra b+hasmi sa ma la ba to hoH b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo
b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ e ha hi a na ya/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ /thugs rje khro
dpal rngam pa'i tshogs/ /'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho/ /badzra kro d+ha sa
ma ya phaT/ a li u li ta li ta ba li daM Sh+taM/ gau na rau tri kha raM yo gi nI khA hi hoH/ /hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo/ /zhes brjod pas 'jig rten khams phyogs bcu thams
cad kun tshig /rab tu tshig /kun tu rab tu tshig go /'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar/ thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs
kyis gang / rab tu gang / kun tu rab tu gang bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro bo'i tshogs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor
spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod
pa 'di brjod do/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsi bas bzhi pa/ /gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis
kyis mdzes/ /thod sbrul la sogs nyi mas brjid/ /'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang pos 'khrug /khyu mchog ma he gzigs dang stag /gtum pa dom gyi sbar ba
yis| |dbang phyug lha chen la sogs gzung / /smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang / /dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
bgrad| |ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon/ /rngam pa'i sgra skad 'jigs par sgrog /sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlar bcas/ /stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas/ /
rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang / /ral gri sgra sta gshol la sogs/ /rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams/ /btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'khril/ /gnas
dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / /sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes shing / /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes/ /rang gi stan dang lag
cha dang / /ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas/ /zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar gyur to/ /
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de
nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di ched du brjod do/ /de la mchod sbyin dam pa 'di/ /thog mar bdag nyid rtogs
goms bsgral/ /de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/ /blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje/ /gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya/ /'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor
bas| |bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya/ /mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul/ /bza' 'du bca' dang btung
dang bgo/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi/ /bde gshegs yon
tan rmad po che/ /gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te/ /lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/ /rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya chen par rdzogs
gyur cig /gsal ba yid gnyis med pa na/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur/ /zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu
thams cad khyab par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ mchod sbyin dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan
'das dgyes pa chen pos sngag 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po 'di brjod do/ /bla med theg pa rab nges na/ /nyen mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang / /byas la mi sogs
tshogs 'gyur te/ /tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs/ /bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dang / /ji snyed sdom pa bsam
yas pa| |ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing / /sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul/ /srog med srog gcod gcad du med/ /srog
kyang skyes bu'i log rtog tsam/ /bden pa gnyis kar dbyer med pas/ /'phrul dga' tshul te tha dad med/ /gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir/ /blang med thams cad
nyid kyi dbyings/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu la/ /ming dang tshig tu brtags pa rdzun/ /rdzun nyid la ni rdzun spyod pa/ /rdzun zhas brtags tsam yod ma yin/ /ma chags pa
la chags pa dang / /chags pa nyid la chags pa med/ /de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin/ /shin tu chags pa chen po yin/ /bla med mi spang bla ma bkur/ /sngags dang
phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /yang dag lam du zhugs la byams/ /gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya/ /'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te/ /bsgrub
dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog /gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo / /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen/ /dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor
ro| |yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste/ /ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad/ /bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga/ /rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur/ /mi
spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni/ /yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' 'o/ /mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yin/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na/ /mnyam rdzogs
chen po thob 'gyur bas/ /'das nas sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dag /gso la nye bar mi brtson dang / /skad cig yud tsam smra mi
byed| |nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang / /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /sgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur/ /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i/ /'bras
bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung / /dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag
nyid yin/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni/ /gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum/ /yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la/ /gcig la'ang bcu phrag gnyis su dbye//
dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa/ /rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyid sgo/ /gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun
bzang gi /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/ /sgrub byed dam pa ma lus 'grub/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa de/ /'jig
rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur/ /dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis/ /sras dang sbun dgongs byin gyis rlob/ /bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs/ /'jigs
med kun tu bzang por sbyor/ /ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs/ /ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa/ /ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis grub/ /nyams na bskangs pas
rdzogs pa dang / /de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog /ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i
snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos
lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
do| |e ma tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la/ /khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang
'jig /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas pa bya/ /bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gdab/ /rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul/ /e yi tshog
kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lug gu rgyud du sprel bsdams nas/ /bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur g.yo/ /myos nas gal te 'tshig par 'gyur/ /baM gyi tshogs
kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba'i gzi chen lhun chen la/ /chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am
zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas pa byas/ /rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab/ /chags pa'i tshogs la thim par 'bul/ /baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil
'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /'gugs 'gyur rdo rje'ang phyi bzhin 'brang / /ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur/ /ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil
'khor mchog /'bar ba'i 'du 'phro gzi byin la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga
la| |mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya/ /yon tan yid bzhin gter tu brtag /nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab/ /rdo rje gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur/ /mi
yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /gzi byin 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen 'phro/ /yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur/ /ya yi
tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /gtum po rngam po lhan ner 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas
lnga la| |gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag /lhan ner gsal ba'i phur bas gdab/ /'bar ba lhan ne'i tshogs su dbul/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du
lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams/ /'bar ba lhan ne'i byin gyis khyab/ /thams cad g.yo ba med par byed/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /lhag ma'i mchod
sbyin 'dod pa sbyin/ /rang gi dam tshig rang bsgrags na/ /gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo/ /sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum dgab can/ /thams
cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /dbang dang byin rlabs rmad po che/ /lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas/ /'khor rnams dbang
phyug slas su byas/ /so so'i las rnams bskos pa de/ /ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa/ /ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung / /dam bcas bzhin du ma
byas na| |ji ltar rang gi mnas bor ba'i/ /sdom byas de las 'da' ma byed/ /sdom byas de las 'das gyur na/ /mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun/ /yak+Sha
khro bos gtubs par 'gyur/ /de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gi /ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos/ /las de sngon du ma byas na/ /rang gis khas blangs
mnas bor bzhin/ /rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro/ /rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i/ /las rnams yongs su bya ba dang / /'khor rnams
bu gcig bzhin du skyong / /phra men ma yang dngos grub thob/ /bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /khro bo sgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo
'di yin no/ /khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen po yis/ /thams cad thams cad ci 'dod par/ /thams cad thams cad byed
pa yin| |mdzod lha chen po la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni/ /thams cad kun la za bar byed/ /rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/ /'du bar 'dod na
'du bar byed/ /'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed/ /sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni/ /lhan ner 'dod na lhan ner byed/ /rmugs
par 'dod na rmugs par byed/ /seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la za bar byed/ /rdul cha tsam yang med par
byed| |bzhad gdong chen po la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la 'byin par byed/ /kun la rab tu nyams par byed/ /slas
dang byi mo bran mo yis/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /rbad cing gtang bar bya ba ste/ /thams cad thams cad byed pa yin/ /ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal/ /
gdong gcig ma dang me reg drug /dang ba'i dga' bas chags pa dang / /khros pas ka li rab tu bya/ /zhes brjod pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin
gshegs pa nyid kyis spyod bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste
nyi shu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu
rngam pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangs so/ /hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/ /'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba
bzhin| |mche ba zangs yag za byed che hoH/ hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/ /gtum chem ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad/ /a a ha la'i gad rgyangs
che| |dbyug pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che hoH/ hUM khor bo shes rab 'od po che/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal/ /'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu
'joms/ /sna tshogs ye shes thig le che hoH/ hUM khro bo'i rgyal po srin chen po/ /khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs/ /dkyil 'khor yid
bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/ /sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le hoHhUM bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po/ /bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/ /'jigs
pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa/ /'jigs byed chen po thig le che hoH/ rdo rje brag ste sra pa po/ /rdo rje chu ste sdud pa po/ /rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che/ /
rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che hoHzhes ched du glu 'di blangs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang
bzhin 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi/ /rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin/ /sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang / /
gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam/ /ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams kun/ /don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /phyag
rgya gsang chen nges pa 'di/ /rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa/ /de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /gsang ba 'di las gzhan
mi mnga'/ /sgro dang skur ba zhi ba yi/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na/ /nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung / /de ni nges par lung bstan te/ /sras ni thugs las skyes pa
yin| |sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas/ /zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings
sku gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/ /'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u ste/
stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i
le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog go /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ mnyes pa
dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra satwa mA yA dza la gu h+ya sarba A daR+sha nA ma tan+t+ra /
bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ oM rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM mi
bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /aM snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag /kun gyis
dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas/ /dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas/ /rgyal ba kun la bstod bskor nas/ /spyan sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol/ /
e ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung / /rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste/ /cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud/ /dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba/ /'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang / /dam
tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang / /sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud/ /ma lus gtan la 'bebs pa 'di/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags/ /sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de/ /
dra ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan/ /lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid/ /gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad/ /gsang ba zhes ni ji lta bu/ /snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir/ /de kho nyid ces
ji ltar brjod/ /nges pa zhes pa ci yi phyir/ /mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs/ /mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o/ /thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi/ /ston pa zhes ni ci yi
phyir| |gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu/ /dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu/ /mi bskyod pa ni ji ltar bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gang gi
phyir| |snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir/ /don yod grub pa ji lta bu/ /spyan dang nam mkha'i dbyings ma dang / /gos dkar mo dang mA ma kI/ /sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi
phyir| |sa yi snying po ci yi phyir/ /nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang / /phyag na rdo rje gang phyir brjod/ /sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci/ /byams dang sgrib sel kun
bzang dang / /'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir/ /dus bzhi bdug spos me tog dang / /mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod/ /rnam rgyal
gshin rje gshed po dang / /rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ci/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod/ /yid dang chos
bzang gnyis kyi phyir/ /gtso bos bdag la nges par gsungs/ /gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /nang dang gsang ba'i gleng gzhi las/ /ston pa bstan pa
gnas dang 'khor/ /dus dang sdud pa ji ltar brjod/ /grags pa thun mong gleng gzhi las/ /ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar/ /bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu/ /
skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol/ /'di ni gleng gzhi'i dri ba tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /gleng bslang gnyis su ci phyir 'gyur/ /
gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing / /thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /sems lnga ye shes lnga yi rim/ /gang dang 'brel
pa bshad du gsol/ /'di ni gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes shing / /phun sum tshogs
pa chos kyi rje/ /gzi brjid phung po phun sum tshogs/ /blta bya gang la ci yi phyir/ /gang gis rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ /rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci/ /rtogs
pa'i sgo ni de ru gsungs/ /gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci/ /'di ni lta ba'i dra ba 'o/ /thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir/ /shes rab tshogs dang thugs rje dang / /
rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang / /'brel dang rig 'dzin spyod pa ci/ /gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad/ /de yi 'bras bu gang phyir 'gyur/ /gang du de dang mi
ldan pa'i/ /sbyar ba'i skyon nyid bdag la gsungs/ /'di ni spyod pa'i khyad par gyi dri ba'o/ /thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi/ /rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub gyi/ /dkyil
'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir/ /de nyid phyi nang gsang ba dang / /'dul thabs gnyis su ji ltar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rim gsum gang / /lhag pa ting
'dzin zhes bya ba/ /gnyis la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang / /phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa ci/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji lta bu/ /gang phyir gzugs brnyan
zhes brjod cing / /gang gi gzugs brnyan gang la snang / /phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te/ /gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu/ /gnyis
dang gsum dang drug bstan cing / /don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems/ /phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyor/ /tshogs kyi dkyil
'khor gnyis ci zhig /gang gis gang du gang tshogs nas/ /ji ltar spyad pas ci zhig 'grub/ /'di dag bstan pa'i dgongs pa ci/ /gnas skabs gang dang
'brel bar 'gyur/ /yan lag rtsa ba gang dang 'brel/ /dkyil dang 'khor du ji ltar brtag /gsungs shig skyes bu mchog chen po/ /gang dang nges pa ma rnyed
par| |kun gyi spyod par ma gyur pa/ /legs par gsungs shig rgyal mchog che/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi dri ba dris pa'o/ /gang gis gang la gang dag tu/ /
ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs/ /bdag gis ji ltar shes par bgyi/ /gang dang gang du ji ltar 'brel/ /skyon dang yon tan ji lta bu/ /'bras bu rim
pa bshad du gsol/ /'di ni 'jug pa'i cho ga du/ /las kyi rim pa ji lta bu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /thabs
dang shes rab gnyis med pas/ /bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ /'di ni/ dbang gi don mtha' dag la dri ba dris pa'o/ /gang la gang gis brten pa yi/ /
dam tshig ces pa ci yi phyir/ /rtsa ba dam tshig du zhig bstan/ /gang phyir rtsa bar brjod par bya/ /yan lag du zhig bstan pa gsungs/ /'di dag lam dang bsnyen sgrub
dang / /gang zag gang don ji ltar 'brel/ /bsrungs dang 'das pa'i skyon yon ci/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i ji ltar gsungs/ /lta dang spyod dang sgrub pa dang / /shes bya
ting 'dzin dam tshig tu/ /grub dang mi spong bsrung ci zhig /rgyal mchog skyes bus bshad du gsol/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /mchod dang mchog gyur ma
yin pa'i/ /bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu/ /gang gis gang du ji ltar bsgrub/ /dgug dang bcing dang gso dang gsad/ /dbye dang bskrad dang pham rgyal ci/ /gter
dang mig rnon rkang mgyogs dang / /rig 'dzin go 'phang ji ltar bsgrub/ /rgyal ba mchog gis bshad du gsol/ /'di sgrub pa'i dri ba dris pa'o/ /'phrin las
rim pa gang ci zhig /gang gis gang du brtsam par bya/ /thab dang rdzas dang phur bu ci/ /ting 'dzin 'dug stangs ho ma khung ci/ /gdul bya rim pa gang ci zhig /khyad
par rim pa ji ltar bshad/ /'bras bu yon tan ji ltar 'gyur/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal mchog gtso/ /the tshom legs par chod par mdzod/ /'di
ni| 'phrin las kyi dri ba dris pa'o/ /rmad byung skyes bu gang zhig gis/ /dang po lam tshul ji lta bu/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i lam ci phyir/ /
stong pa'i rnal 'byor snying rje che/ /phyag rgya gcig dang spros bcas ci/ /rnam smin dbang sgyur phyag rgya dang / /lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid ci/ /mthar phyin rnam
pa du zhig gsungs/ /phyi nang gsang ba mthar phyin pa'i/ /'bras bu bdag gzhan don nyid ci/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i don ji ltar/ /gang dag rtog pa'i rgyal po de/ /sgyu
'phrul dra ba bla na med/ /kun las 'bras bu thugs chud pa/ /cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'i rgyud/ /skal ngan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i/ /gsang ba gsang chen
mdo sde dang / /'dul ba chos kyi phung po dag /nam mkha' mtha' thug bshad pa kun/ /gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros pas/ /ji snyed bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i
lam| |ma lus kun gyi snying po 'di/ /theg pa dman dang ma sbyangs dang / /rigs chad dbang dang man ngag bral/ /ji ltar bltas kyang mi snang ba/ /skyes bu mchog
gi spyod yul las/ /rdul snyed sbyangs pa'i gang zag la/ /gsang phyir gsang ba'i thabs dag gis/ /dngos grub mtha' yas grub phyir bstan/ /phyi nang snod
bcud ma lus pa'i/ /rten dang rten par bcas pa'i chos/ /ji ltar grags dang grags gyur pa'i/ /thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig kyang / /rkyen stobs nus pa so sor
snang | |khyad par rim par gang gnas pa/ /rang bzhin gdul bya bder gshegs dang / /'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang / /ma bcos dang la tha dad med/ /rang snang
las kyis tha dad pa'i/ /bye brag rnam par bstan pa kun/ /de bzhin nyid la dgod bya'i phyir/ /rgyal mchog bde chen yongs gang bas/ /dri ba'i don 'di lung bstan
cing | |thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur pa'i/ /gsang ba'i don la dgod du gsol/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud las/ dri ba rtsa
ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bshad pa rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so// // de nas/ gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje 'chang / /skyes bu mtshan dpe rab ldan
cing | |dpag med rgyal bas rab bskor zhing / /rang byung dag pa'i gzhal yas na/ /thabs dang shes rab 'khril sbyor zhing / /kun kyang de dang mthun pa ste/ /'dzum
zhing steg pas sos 'debs shing / /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bka' stsal pa/ /dpag med rgyal bas gsungs pa dang / /gsung dang gsung 'gyur thugs kyi rgyud/ /
thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /cho ga rgyas par dris pa'i mchog /nyon cig de ni sems dpa'
bshad| |chos rnams ma lus gnyis med pa'i/ /rang rig byang chub sems nyid de/ /tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /rang
bzhin mtha' thug med pa'i chos/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis/ /thugs su chud cing mngon rtogs pa/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpar bshad//
rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu'i don/ /nus pa'i rim pa stsal snang ba/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i don/ /sgyu 'phrul zhes ni bzhir bshad do/ /
tha dad mi las tha dad pa'i/ /ngo bo thabs dang bstan nyid dang / /byin rlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa ni/ /drang ba'i don zhes bshad pa yin/ /ma brjod grags
pa'i bstan pa nyid/ /sgro skur med dang zhal nas gsungs/ /dri ma med pa'i lung nyid de/ /las dang ye shes spyi nyid dang / /rdzogs pas rdzogs phyir lung nyid
de| |bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni/ /thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas/ /gcig dang dum mi gnas kyang / /so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud/ /'di ston
'dis ston 'di phyir ston/ /don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas/ /lung gi spyi zhes bshad pa yin/ /gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid de//
rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo dang / /thabs dang 'bras bur gyur pa nyid/ /gsang ba'i don du 'di brjod do/ /ngang gis dman dang ma sbyangs dang / /dpang dab dam tshig
bral ba dang / /rang brtags bsgribs pa sa'i khyad par/ /de dang de yi dbang gis na/ /ro myong bral phyir gsang bar bshad/ /rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi/ /chos
rnams thig le chen po'i don/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/ /ma lus ro gcig dbyer med pa/ /ji snyed theg pa'i khyad par dang / /bstan pa'i bye brag gnas
pa rnams/ /'dir 'dus thabs 'dis mtshon pa dang / /rtsa bar gyur pa kho na yin/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /byang chub sems nyid bde ba che/ /rang
byung ye shes thog mtha' med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid de/ /rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rab snang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab che ba rnams/ /'di las ston pas
snying po ste/ /snying po dang ni 'od bzhin no/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu bcud 'dus pas/ /snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems/ /mtha' dbus
yongs su ma chad pa/ /dngos po gsum gyis khyab gyur pa/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med
pa'i| |de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig /bdag dang gzhan don nus ba rdzogs/ /'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do/ /gang phyir dngos gnyis tha dad par/ /log par
brtags pa'i snang ba rnams/ /mun la snang dang gser 'gyur ltar/ /ro gcig thabs kyis de kho na/ /de phyir de kho na zhes brjod/ /dngos po sna tshogs
dbyer med pa'i/ /tha dad don min don gcig min/ /de nyid gsang ba'i nges pa ni/ /gzhi dang lam dang ngo bo dang / /nges pas nges pa gsum du bstan/ /gang
du theg pa bzhi gsungs pa/ /'gro ba 'dren phyir ma nges pa/ /ro gcig theg par nges gnas pa/ /nges pa'i theg pa bla na med/ /rang bzhin ma bcos rang byung
las| |bya byed ngang gis bral ba yi/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul/ /rang snang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o/ /rang bzhin mtha' dbus med pa las/ /rgyu rkyen
las kyis so sor 'khrul/ /de nyid byang chub sems nyid de/ /mtha' dbus med par mnyam par gnas/ /de ltar so sor snang ba'i rgyud/ /nam mkha'
dang ris phye ba ltar/ /rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi/ /lam gnyis 'brel par mngon bsgoms pas/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /bde chen thig le mngon
snang ba| |'jug dang grol ba'i lam nyid de/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam du brjod/ /rang bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yis/ /dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel pa
yis| |rig pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas/ /khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin/ /thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems/ /chos kun rang gi ngo bo nyid/ /zab mo bstan pa
ci yi lung / /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud/ /bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas/ /shes rab sbyangs dang snying rje ldan/ /dad
dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang / /cho gas dag par sbyangs pa yis/ /dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di/ /ngo bo nyid dang byin rlabs
dang | |mtshon dang rdo rjer grub pa ste/ /rdo rje theg pa bde ba che/ /rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang / /phyin ci log dang mi mos dang / /dbang dang dam tshig med pa la//
gsang phyir gsang ba'i theg par gsungs/ /thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis/ /snod dang bral ba'i slob ma la/ /gsang ba'i snying po bstan gyur na/ /bdag
dang gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing / /sreg dang bsgribs par yun ring gnas/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po
las| mtshan gyi don gyi bshad pa dang po'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i don/ /thun mong ma yin 'khor
dag la| |phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang / /dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'brel ba yis/ /byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur nas/ /thun
mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /nyon mongs lta dang shes bya rnams/ /skad cig yud la gsal byas te/ /thun mong khyad par gsal ba yi/ /lam gnyis nges
par ston pas na/ /ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba/ /'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang / /mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs
phyir ro/ /thabs dang lam gyi khyad par gyis/ /kun bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid/ /gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi/ /'og min gnas mchog chen po
der| |yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas/ /skal med skye bo gdul ba'i phyir/ /sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bzhugs pa'i
gnas| |gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa/ /'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa/ /'og min 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad
pa'i| |yon tan khyad par spags pa na/ /gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la/ /bcu gsum sa yi dbang phyug ldan/ /rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang / /til 'bru'i tshul
du rab tu bzhugs/ /chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i/ /rang bzhin don gyi 'og min ni/ /rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir/ /'das
dang da ltar ma byon pa'i/ /rgyal ba kun gyi rten pa'i gnas/ /de dag nye bar mtshan pa yi/ /yid dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i/ /bsgoms dang bris dang byas la
sogs| |de dang 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang / /rgyal ba sngags dang byin rlabs kyis/ /der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i//
bsod nams ye shes khyad par can/ /bsags pa sna tshogs las byung ba'i/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa chen po ni/ /gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi/ /'og
min chen po'i gnas mchog na/ /rigs bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku/ /gcig dang ma rnam spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te/ /gdod nas theg
mchog mdzod nyid phyir/ /sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la/ /skad cig gcig gis spangs par mdzad/ /chos rnams sna tshogs
ji snyed pa/ /dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum/ /khyad par spags dang tshad med dang / /ye shes bzhi phyir 'khor lo bstan/ /chos dbyings 'du 'bral med
pa'i phyir/ /yu khyud zlum por kun nas bskor/ /sku gsung thugs dang byin rlabs dang / /thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyings
su bstan/ /rab byung ye shes mtha' bral bas/ /phyogs bcur 'gro 'ong mi gnas pa'i/ /tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir/ /gzhi rtsa tshad med 'khor
lor bstan/ /gdod nas byin brlabs ngo bo'i phyir/ /ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid de/ /'gro ba re 'dod skong ba'i phyir/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i
gzhal yas khang / /sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'i/ /chos kun ngo bor rang gnas te/ /bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir/ /phyi dang nang
bral sgrib pa med/ /thun mong la brten thabs kyi 'bras/ /ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid/ /gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas/ /glo 'bur bzhi ni
lhag par mdzes/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /gdul bya'i rim pa mtho dman kun/ /stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug /de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir
shar| |thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis/ /'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas/ /rta babs rgyu 'bras bcu drug bstan//
zhen dang spong ba'i lam bral bas/ /'dod yon ye shes lnga rol te/ /bdag mchod kun mnyes las byung bas/ /'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan//
thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /ma chags thabs dang ldan pa dang / /che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pas/ /nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/ /las dang thugs rje smon lam
gyis| |byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che/ /smon lam dbang gis de dag tu/ /thos pa rgya mtsho gsog phyir gnas/ /de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang / /ngo bo dus bzhi
mnyam pa'i dus/ /dus kyi mtha' la mngon rtogs pas/ /thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan/ /de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba yis/ /bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa//
'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag /lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad/ /dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs phyir/ /'khor gyi nang na skal mchog ldan/ /gsang ba'i
rdo rje 'chang bsdus nas/ /'dul ba'i 'khor lo bstan par mdzad/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/ /sku gsum sku gsum thugs nges
pa'i| |de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis/ /gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs gyur pa'i/ /thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang / /pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa/ /
zhing khams yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan/ /gang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas/ /las dang spyod
pa dka' thub dang / /srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas/ /de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis/ /ji snyed sku gsung thugs
snang ba| |mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis/ /sna bar snang phyir snang mdzad mchog /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ni/ /tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste/ /yon
tan rin chen ltar 'byung bas/ /rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa yin/ /dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi sgo/ /dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis/ /don brtags
gsung dang yi ge'i sgo/ /mtha' yas snang phyir mtha' yas mchog /dpag med thugs rjes mdzad pa yi/ /'gro 'ong med pa'i thugs rje yis/ /'gro ba skyob
pa'i don mdzad pas/ /don grub ces ni rnam par bstan/ /rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang / /tha mal lnga nyid gnas dag cing / /de las thabs des mngon byas pas/ /
der dbang bsgyur de nyid snang ba/ /rgyal po nyid du brjod pa yin/ /steng 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'i/ /sbyor dang 'ju 'dul rlung gi rim/ /gang de thabs las
mngon gyur pa'i/ /bde ba'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang ni 'du byed dang / /rnam shes zag med bde ba'i ros/ /dbang sgyur ye shes rgyal por bshad/ /
gang phyir snang dang bsgoms dang bris/ /phyag rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /sngo dang ljang dang rim ldan pa'o/ /rgyal ba kun gyi
bde skyed cing / /spyod dang de las 'byung ba'i yum/ /thams cad de las skyed pa lnga/ /tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang / /dbang sgyur rgyal mo lnga rang bzhin/ /sra dang
gsher dang drod dang bskyod/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis gang phye ba/ /steng 'og thabs las mngon gyur pa/ /yul dang shes rab dbyer med cing / /thugs rjes
shes rab 'brel pa yis/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis med gzigs pa spyan gyi mchog /zag med stong pa'i klong chen gyis/ /skyed dang sdud dang gnas
pa'i phyir/ /mtha' dbus bral ba'i de bzhin nyid/ /nam mkha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod pa'o/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i//
las dang lta ba nyon mongs dang / /shes bya'i dri ma mtha' yas pa/ /rtogs pas sbyong zhing sreg pas na/ /gos dkar ma ru brjod pa yin/ /gang phyir las dang ting
'dzin dang / /ye shes thugs rje bar med chus/ /gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas/ /chu ni mA ma kI ru bshad/ /gang phyir rtogs dang thabs dag dang / /ting 'dzin
thabs kyi rlung ngag gis/ /bgrod pa med pa'i zhing khams su/ /sgrol bas sgrol ma nyid du bshad/ /snying po rang byung ye shes nyid/ /kun brten gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir/ /
byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la/ /sa yi snying por brjod pa yin/ /rang byung snying po byang chub sems/ /nam mkha' lta bur bsam brjod med/ /mtha' dbus sgro skur gang
'das pa/ /de ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid/ /gang phyir thugs rje dpag med pas/ /'gro ba chu bo rgal gyi bar/ /skyo ba med par gzigs pas na/ /spyan ras gzigs
dbang pad+ma'i gtso/ /rtogs dang dbyer med rdo rje yis/ /mtha' yi bdag rtogs mtshan ma dag /'joms pas phyag na rdo rje ste/ /thun mong nyid dang khyad par gyis/ /
gsang ba'i rnam par shes par ni/ /thun mong yul dang khyad par ni/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las/ /mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis/ /lha yi bzhir ni mngon
snang ba| |byang chub sems dang bde ba dang / /thabs kyi bde bas rab sgegs pas/ /lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad/ /grol dang ma grol 'khor ba yi/ /phyi nang sgra yi bye brag
kun| |brag ca lta bur brjod mdzad pas/ /bar chad med pas phreng ba ma/ /tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa/ /dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid/ /dbyangs nyid tshim zhing yid
bde bas/ /de nyid rdo rje gI rta ma/ /ro yis khyab cing gar sgyur ltar/ /bde ba chen po bzhi yi gar/ /khyab dang mdzes dang tshim pa dang / /mi gnas bgrol bas gar mkhan ma/ /
rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang / /yid kyi phreng ba bde ba'i phyir/ /lha mo bzhi yi rang bzhin no/ /ma rtogs 'gro ba mtha' yas la/ /rang bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis/ /yongs
la phan 'dogs skyob pa ni/ /'di ni byams pa zhes bya 'o/ /rtogs goms mthar phyin khyad par gyis/ /las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim/ /sel ba 'di ni sgrib sel lo/ /
thabs dang shes rab gnas rtogs na/ /gang phyir spong len mi gnas bas/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/ /dbye ba med pas kun tu bzang / /bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa kun//
zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis/ /lta ba'i dra ba gcod pas na/ /zag med shes rab 'jam dpal sku/ /dbang po yi ge thig ler bcas/ /gnas
dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis/ /mngon du snang phyir brjod pa yin/ /dus bzhi rim pa gnyis brgyad de/ /de nyid dgrol dang brod skyed dang / /spyod yul dag phyir brjod pa
ni| |dri dang bde bas ngam tshim zhing / /yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri/ /phyi nang khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /me tog thig ler bder bkod pas/ /rdo rje me tog bla na med//
phyi nang sems la gnas bcas pa'i/ /mun pa bsal phyir shes rab dang / /ye shes snang ba bla na med/ /rdo rje gsal ba'i mar me ma/ /phyi nang dkyil 'khor ma lus
la| |rang byung ting 'dzin bde ba yis/ /thams cad khyab par gnas pa'i phyir/ /khyab byed rdo rje dri chab ma/ /de bzhin nyid la dgongs pa yis/ /'khor ba'i chos rnams ma
lus pa| |byang chub snying po tshar bcad pas/ /rnam par rgyal ba zhes su brjod/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes 'di/ /gnyis 'dzin rtog pa'i gnyen po ste/ /
rtogs goms de yis 'joms pas na/ /ya mAn+ta krid gshin rje gshed/ /gang phyir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul las/ /'joms
dang sgrol bar mdzad pas na/ /rta mgrin rgyal po de bshad do/ /'khor ba'i bdud rtsi dug lnga la/ /ye shes lnga ru gsal goms pas/ /gnyis med rtsi ru gang 'khyil ba/ /sgrib zad
bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bshad/ /gang du lus dang bcas pa yi/ /dbang po yul dang rnam shes reg /rang rgyud gcad pa'i ye shes nyid/ /sgo ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/ /rang rgyud rtag chad
zlog pa dang / /gzungs dang lha dang bde ba dang / /thig le rig par bcas pa nyid/ /gang phyir gnas nas dgug pa dang / /gang du'ang 'gro bar mi nus pa dang / /de las 'da' bar dka'
ba dang / /bstims nas bde bas dril bu ma/ /gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdams pa dang / /gnyis su med pas bde chen po/ /rang lus snang srid brtan g.yo la/ /rtogs dang goms
pa'i tshul gyis sbyar/ /de dag ma lus dran byed pa/ /rig pa'i rgyal po kun dbyer med/ /kun gzhi rdo rje mi phyed pa/ /kun tu bzang por de bshad do/ /ma lus 'dus byas ma
byas chos/ /ma lus zad med khyab pa'i dbyings/ /rtogs dang shes dang gang gyur pa/ /kun tu bzang mor de bshad do/ /mi shigs thig le bde chen po/ /ye shes lnga ldan
dwangs ma'i bcud/ /rang byung lus can kun gnas pa/ /ston pa po yi gsung can nyid/ /d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas/ /'od bzhi e tshogs tshul du ni/ /lus sbas pa yi tshul
dag gis/ /lus can kun la khyab par gnas/ /rang byung thugs kyi bde ba nyid/ /rgyu ba bral ba'i snying po ste/ /bar ma ar+tha byang chub
sems| |nam mkha'i ye shes thugs kyi klong / /ma na ma ta dran rtog yid/ /rnam shes rgyu ba'i dran rtog rnams/ /ye shes nam mkhar gsal 'dod pa/ /dran rtog rig
pa 'khor du gnas/ /zag med rnam shes bsam mi khyab/ /ma lus nam mkha'i ye shes su/ /bde chen rig pa'i mi rtog par/ /bsdus te nyams la gnas par
mdzad| |bde ba chen po ma skyes pa/ /nam mkha' lta bur mi phyed pa/ /nam mkha'i ye shes dbyer med sku/ /dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas/ /'di zhes nye bar bstan
pa ni| |e sogs bzhi yi tshul gnas te/ /phyi nang bar khyams gdong bar bcas/ /gsang ba'i 'og min rgyan rdzogs pa'o/ /thig le baM dbyibs spros pa med/ /brjod
med bstan pa gsung mdzad cing / /byin brlabs bde chen mi rtog pa/ /'khor la snang bar mdzad pa'o/ /ma ni ma nu ma ta ste/ /sdom byed dran rtog yid kyi dngos/ /las
can rnam shes de dag gis/ /gsal bar go bar 'khor du brjod/ /chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /thig le bcu drug sems lnga'i dngos/ /mi rtog lhan cig skyes pa'i
don| |byin brlabs mngon sum tshul gyis gsal/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /thig le zag med skyes pa'i dus/ /bsam med lhan cig skyes pa'i tshe/ /bde ba
chen po'i dus su 'dod/ /shes pa rten dang brten par bcas/ /thabs kyi rim pa la brten nas/ /rlung gis bsdus pa'i don gyis ni/ /rang rig thabs kyi rgyal por gsal/ /
gang dang gang la gang du ni/ /gang gis gang tshe gang gsungs pa/ /brjod 'byung rtsa bar de gyur pas/ /gleng gzhi zhes ni bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /
dbyer med ye shes gcig gi dang / /rdo rje 'chang chen kun bzang las/ /sna tshogs sku ni rnam par 'phrul/ /de tshe rgyal ba thams cad kyang / /lha la rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /lha
min ston pa phrag dog rje/ /mi la thub pa'i dbang po ste/ /byol song sgra yis 'dul mdzad pa/ /yi dwags drag pos gdung ba sel/ /dmyal ba sdug bsngal chos kyi rgyal/ /
gdul ba'i sprul sku ngo bor shar/ /la la lha las 'pho ba dang / /la lar lhums zhugs bltams pa dang / /dka' thub bdud btul sangs rgyas nas/ /'khor lo bskor te
mya ngan 'das/ /gnas la nges pa yod min te/ /dmyal ba yi dwags byol song dang / /mi dang lha dang lha min te/ /so so'i gnas te gang yin pa/ /'gro ba 'dul phyir ston
pa'i gnas/ /lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang / /lha min yi dwags dud 'gro dang / /dmyal ba so so'i 'gro ris dag /rang rang mos dang las
dbang gis/ /'dul tshul tha dad dbang gis 'khod/ /rang rang mos pas phrad pa'i tshe/ /rang rang brda' skad tha dad pas/ /rtogs dang grol bar gang gyur pa/ /rang rang /
ji bzhin ston pa'i dus/ /bstan pa'i theg pa sna tshogs te/ /rang rang zhen pa mtha' yas phyir/ /tshul dang mos pa'i dbang gis na/ /theg pa sna tshogs tshul du
snang / /theg gcig mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul/ /gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/ /dgu dang brgyad khri la sogs pa/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul gyis snang / /sku dang
gsung thugs las dag gis/ /'dul dbang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de tshe 'gro ba so so yang / /rang gi gzhi rtsa don rig nas//
rim pa lnga 'am thabs gcig gis/ /rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sa la gnas/ /rang rang cha 'dzin sprul pa'i lus/ /sar gnas 'khor gyi dang po yis/ /de dag
zhus pa'i rim gsungs pa/ /blo dang tshig dang yi ger bsdus/ /rgyud ces bya ba rgyun du grags/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam
dang / /sgrub pa 'phrin las lam rim ni/ /phyi dang nang dang sbas pa ste/ /rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byed pa/ /thabs kyi rgyud ni gsum du gsungs/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi
mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa dang / /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /bskyed rdzogs thabs rim gang bstan pa/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bar 'dus pa ste/ /de
ltar grags pa'i chos rnams kun/ /rtog pa'i cho ga kun bshad pa'i/ /rgyud chen rgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog /thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba//
dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gang zag thabs ni thun mong du/ /blo yi yul du gang gyur pa/ /de ni thun mong yul nyid de/ /gang zag
thabs dang ston pa nyid/ /de yi spyod yul ma gyur cing / /thabs chen gsang ba dang ldan pa/ /de ni thun mong ma yin pa'o/ /de nyid skye bo 'khor gnyis don/ /rnam gnyis tshul
