du snang bar mdzad/ /phung po khams dang skye mched nyid/ /rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa' dang / /sems ma nyid du lhun gyis grub/ /gsang yul dbang po rnam shes
reg /ma lus 'joms phyir khro bo ste/ /rtags sogs mtshan ma las skyes phyir/ /yum ste las kyis mi gnas bshad/ /yid chos
bzang po bzang mo nyid/ /chags sogs nyon mongs drug po nyid/ /thub pa sprul pa drug tu bshad/ /de nyid phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi/ /phung po 'byung ba rnam shes
yul| |dbang po dus dang lus chos bzhi/ /mtshan ma nyon mongs yum nyid de/ /de nyid sems phyir ma skyes pas/ /lhag pa'i bden gnyis 'brel pa las/ /byang chub
sems lnga rnam par 'phrul/ /dngos po snang grags chos thams cad/ /skye ba med dang 'gag med dang / /gnas pa med dang dmigs med dang / /'gro 'ong med pa nyid du
snang / /bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang / /gzhan phyir de dag ma rtogs pas/ /rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang / /shin tu gab sbas gsang ba'i don/ /de
nyid legs par bshad pa'i don/ /ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba la/ /ma rig log rtog rkyen dbang gis/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ngo bor snang / /de nyid bde
gshegs snying po de/ /dngos med dngos po'i snying po can/ /'gro ba rnams ni smin bya'i phyir/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las/ /sprul ba rnams ni rnam bar
'phrul| |sku dang gsung thugs sna tshogs kyi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang / /ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gcig/
yab dang yum dang gnyis med dang / /gang la gang gis gleng bslang ba/ /brda dang dgongs pa'i tshig gis te/ /bstan pa'i tshogs ni snang bar 'gyur/ /'phen pa chung
gi sbyor ba yis/ /thabs des yum la gang bskul bas/ /gnyis med 'brel pa'i chags pa'i 'od/ /sa ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs/ /bde chen lha ru gsal
byas shing / /nam mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas/ /bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro/ /skye dang dga' dang gnas pa dang / /'gro 'ong nyid las shes par 'gyur//
gang gis gang la gang bslangs pas/ /gang rkyen dbang gis de dag las/ /ye shes gsal bar gang snang bas/ /snang srid lus dang dngos por bcas/ /nam
mkha'i ye shes cir yang snang / /nang gi gleng bslang thabs chen yin/ /gang phyir thabs kyis shes rab la/ /chags pa'i glu dang sbyor bas bskul/ /shes rab
thabs la lan bskul ba'ang / /sha da pa yi glu gar dang / /sngags sbyor ba yi rim pa yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis mngon sbyar bas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis
med pa'i/ /rgyu ba rlung gi sbyor ba yis/ /dgug dang bkug pa'i thabs nyid de/ /dbab dang gzung dang bskyil ba dang / /zlog dang gzung dang
sbyar ba yis/ /bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen po/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /mthar thug rim pa las byung ba'i/ /kun kyang sems lngar snang ba ste/ /thabs
las byung ba'i thig le dang / /shes rab gsang ba'i thig le dang / /gnyis med bde ba las byung ba'i/ /sems lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes
rab mnyam sbyor zhing / /sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba/ /bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te/ /sku gsung thugs dang ye shes
lngas| |thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel ba yis/ /'gro ba kun la rgyas btab pa'o/ /snod bcud bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas/ /g.yo
ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin/ /skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang / /skyes nas mthar phyin ye shes lnga/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ /ji lta ba
bzhin rnam par gnas/ /'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs so sor gnas/ /gang zag blo dang
'tsham par bstan/ /rten dang brten can las byung ba'i/ /rang byung bde chen me rtog pa/ /lus med lus la gnas pa yi/ /khyab pa gnyis med gang ba'i tshul/ /gang
phyir zag med bde ba yi/ /ting 'dzin bde ba khyad par can/ /rang bzhin brtags dang snang ba dang / /byin rlob nus pa'i lha yis ni/ /phyi nang snod bcud sku gsung thugs/ /
ma lus sbyor ba gsum las byung / /rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag /rim par bsten dang sbyor ba dang / /'phen dang sdud pa rlung gis te/ /dwangs mar ye shes rlung gis
'jug /steng dang 'og las byung ba yi/ /bde ba'i thig le rim pa dag /dwangs snyigs rlung gi khyad par gyis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nyid/ /rkyen gyis nus pa
phrad pa ltar/ /rgyu gcig nus pa so sor snang / /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /lam ni rtsa dang thig le dang / /rlung ni phyi nang dwangs snyigs dang / /lam dang rgyu ba'i tshul
las byung / /gang phyir med dang nus pa med/ /stongs dang log pa'i nus mthu yis/ /rang lus 'jig dang sdug bsngal zhing / /dbang po ma tshang dman par gyur/ /gang phyir
thun mong thun mong min/ /sems lnga ye shes lnga bstan pa/ /rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du/ /gzungs ma rigs la rten bcas pa'i/ /sems lnga yun ring thung
bcas pas/ /bdag gzhan chos rnams ma lus pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te/ /dngos bo ma yin dngos med min/ /bdag gzhan
gnyis ka gnyis med min/ /rang byung bde chen sgyu ma nyid/ /rdo rje brtan po rang snang ba/ /ye shes sgyu ma lhun gyis grub/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba
me long gi rgyud chen po las/ gleng bslang ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /kun gyi shes bya yul
bshad pa/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /gcig dang tha dad kun bral ba'i/ /mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /sgro skur kun bral mnyam pa
las| |rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par las/ /sna tshogs chos ni rnam par 'phrul/ /gzhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i/ /mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /dngos
med dngos po yul 'das la/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /ngo bo sna tshogs rang snang ba/ /gnyis med thabs chen rdo rje nyid/ /e ma'o gnyis med bde chen las/ /
sna tshogs gnas dang longs spyod dang / /rigs dang kha dog tshe tshad dang / /bde sdug dbang po bye brag dang / /rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul/ /sgyu ma chu zla 'ja'
tshon ltar/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas/ /las dang rkyen gyis gang snang ba/ /rang rang zhen pa'i tha dad kyis/ /dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'i/ /rtog pa'i nus ba sna
tshogs mthong / /rang bzhin gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings/ /lhan cig skyes dang kun brtags pa'i/ /ma mthong log zhen brtas pa yis/ /'khrul 'khor log pa'i stobs su
snang / /'khor ba ma gsal dag pa yi/ /zhing dang spyod yul longs spyod dang / /ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdzu 'phrul dang / /mngon shes ye shes dpag med pa'i/ /sna tshogs
sku dang gsung thugs dang / /yon tan 'phrin las rang snang ba/ /bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub pa'i don/ /sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar/ /ma bsags lhun gyis grub
pa'i sku| |sna tshogs kun dang dbyer med pa'i/ /kun la yid bzhin mthun par snang / /kun kyang rang byung byang chub sems/ /bden pa dbyer med don du snang / /gang phyir
nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar/ /gang la de ltar snang ba las/ /yang dag gcig tu gzung du med/ /ma bcos rang byung zhi ba nyid/ /rnam par dag pa'i snying po ste/ /'khor ba
nyid na mya ngan 'das/ /rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su mkhyen/ /sgro dang skur ba kun bral ba'i/ /thams cad rang snang snying po las/ /sna tshogs ma lus rnam par 'phrul//
dngos dang dngos po med min zhing / /gang la de nyid yul 'das pa/ /nam mkha' lta bur dpag med ba/ /phyogs ris mtha' dbus rgya
dpag med/ /gang gis gang la khyab pa ltar/ /mkha' sogs rdul bral 'byung ba'i bcud/ /zag pa med pa'i snying po nyid/ /lus can kun gyi dbang po dang / /dngas
mar 'brel bar gang snang yang / /mthong ba log pa'i stobs kyis sgyur/ /bdag gzhan med pa'i rang snang yin/ /ma lus thams cad dbyer med pa'i/ /thabs dang
shes rab bcud lnga'i rgyun/ /longs spyod thabs su bcas pa nyid/ /'gro ba kun la khyab par gnas/ /gang yang thabs dang shes rab kyi/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
rang bzhin nyid/ /rang bzhin dbyer med byang chub sems/ /bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /'das dang da ltar ma byon gyi/ /rgyal ba rig 'dzin mtha' yas
dang / /ma lus kun gyis rtogs bya ba/ /phyogs med khyab pa'i ngo bor gnas/ /gang snang ma lus de bzhin nyid/ /ma bcos ma byas zhi ba ste/ /gcig
dang du ma las 'das pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ /mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar/ /ma lus gnas pa de dag kyang / /rtogs pa'i khyad
par dbang po yi/ /mthong tshul dag dang ma dag gis/ /rang bzhin yul dang ma gyur pas/ /phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa'i/ /dbang dang man ngag 'brel ba yis/ /de nyid
mthong rtogs don phyir bshad/ /gang phyir rdo rje slob dpon nyid/ /yon tan yongs rdzogs nus pa can/ /dad ldan brtson 'grus brtul shugs can/ /shes rab khyad par
gang ldan la/ /dbang dang dam tshig man ngag dang / /rgyu rkyen 'brel ba'i nus pa yi/ /bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pa/ /thabs kyi phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i
gsang chen snying po nyid/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste/ /phyi nang bdag gzhan ma lus pa/ /thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid/ /thabs bral kun la rgyas btab
pas| |mun pa'i tshogs su gyur pa yin/ /mun snang dug dang gser 'gyur rtsi/ /thabs mkhas rang bzhin nges 'gyur ltar/ /gang de'i lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis/ /de ma thag
tu de bzhin 'gyur/ /dbyer med nam mkha'i rang bzhin du/ /kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas la sogs/ /ma lus tha dad med pa ltar/ /thabs mkhas ma lus de bzhin 'gyur//
tha mal pa dang log pa dang / /dka' thub can dang rkyen rtogs dang / /phyi nang can dang tha dad can/ /gtsang sme can dang phyogs rtogs nyid/ /mnyam nyid lta las gang 'das
pa| |ngo bo nyid dang thabs dag dang / /dbang po la sogs log pa yis/ /de nyid gnod pa'i stobs su 'gyur/ /gang la gang gis zin pa'i
nad| |thabs dang brtson 'grus legs pa yis/ /de ltar brtson pa'i khyad par gyis/ /de nyid ma spangs rnam par dag /gang phyir de nyid nges pa las/ /rtogs dang ma rtogs
khyad par gyis/ /tha dad chos su gang snang ba/ /dngos la da ltar gnas pa min/ /rdo rje skye med shes rab ste/ /me long thabs nyid sna tshogs snang / /gnyis med 'brel
ba'i mnyam pa nyid/ /ma lus dbyer med dam par bshad/ /de nas rtogs sgo bshad bya ba/ /gang la gang gi don med pas/ /lta dang spyod dang lam 'bras dag /'di
nyid don gnyer gzhan med pa'o/ /gang gis de dag de don du/ /tshig dang sngags rdzas dka' thub kyis/ /gang bstan de yi byin rlabs kyis/ /bdag gzhan phan par
gang 'dod pa'o/ /gang las gyur pa de zhig pas/ /lus sems 'byung ba'i bag la gnas/ /phyin chad phan gnod chos med pas/ /dka' thub 'bad rtsol mi dgos
so/ /gang phyir byed pa'i rgyu bzhi dag /mnyes dang dag pas bde bya'i phyir/ /las dang dka' thub drag shul gyis/ /grol zhing thar bar 'dod par snang / /bde bzhi bcu drug
tha dad lam/ /khams gsum mthong sgom song tshul gyis/ /rang don zag pa kun bral nas/ /rang don thar pa mya ngan 'das/ /rkyen rtog bag chags sad pa yis/ /'byung
med bcu gnyis rang brtags nas/ /ma rig 'khrul 'khor rgyu 'bras zad/ /yid bzhin bde ba mchog gi sa/ /tha dad med pa'i rig pa'i sems/ /bden rdzun khyad par
cir bltas pas/ /gsal la mi rtog snying po nyid/ /bdag gzhan nus pa'i stobs su snang / /chos rnams sgyu ma mig yor dang / /brag ca chu zla 'dra ba yi/ /de nyid mtha'
dbus bral ba ni/ /bden gnyis 'brel pa dbu ma'i tshul/ /rdo rje dam pa gsum bkod de/ /dngos po sgyu ma las grol nas/ /dag pa'i brten 'brel la brten nas/ /ye
shes sgyu ma mngon sum shar/ /gang phyir las dang bya ba dang / /khrus dang gtsang sbra la brten nas/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthu stobs kyis/ /sgo gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
sa| |de dag las mthun khyad par nyid/ /de kho na nyid bzhi rtogs nas/ /las dang ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i sa la gnas/ /ting 'dzin rig pa
gtsor byas nas/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bsam pa yis/ /cha lugs ji bzhin mngon bsgyur te/ /goms pas bdag gzhan don grub pa'o/ /thabs dang grol ba'i khyad
par gyis/ /dbang po yul dang rnam shes dang / /snang srid phyi nang snod bcud kyi/ /spyod yul ji ltar 'gyur ba kun/ /thabs dang shes rab
dbyer med pa'i/ /gsang ba'i thabs kyis rgyas btab pas/ /ma lus rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ /snang srid dpa' bo thabs chen de/ /rang bzhin dbyer med dag pa yi/ /sna
tshogs 'phrul pa rang snang bas/ /ma lus gnyis med ye shes yin/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /thabs dang rig pa gang zin pa/ /gzhan gyis dor
ba'i 'khor ba'i chos/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor 'gyur/ /ma lus gcig dang tha bral ba'i/ /ji ltar mthun pa'i snying po la/ /so so'i don ltar mi gnas pas/ /
bskyed ba lta dang gzhal yas dang / /rdzogs pa nam mkha'i ye shes dang / /dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ru/ /snang ba rkyen gyis bsgyur ba ltar/ /ma lus de yi ngo bor
'gyur| |de dag bltas pa'i khyad par gyis/ /rang re'i mos dang bsam pa dang / /nus pa'i rim pa cir snang yang / /nam mkha' dang ba'i rang bzhin las/ /nyi zla gza'
skar sprin khu rlangs/ /rang byung rang dwangs 'gyur med ltar/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /dngos dbang don las ma g.yos pas/ /de dag de ltar nyid gnang
bas| |de nyid nam mkha'i khongs su 'du/ /de nas bstan tshigs bshad par bya/ /ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la/ /byang chub snying pos kun khyab pas/ /kun gyis mthong
goms bya dgos pas/ /so so thun mong gtan tshigs dang / /thun mong ma yin la sogs pa/ /rgya mtsho klong dang chu bo ltar/ /ma lus 'dul shing 'byung ba yin/ /thun
mong bzhi sogs gang yin pa/ /log lta phyogs 'dzin dgag pa dang / /dngos dbang thabs dang 'brel mtshon phyir/ /thun mong gtan tshigs brjod pa yin/ /gang phyir
gtan tshigs thams cad kyis/ /rang las 'phrul phyir me long nyid/ /ma lus gcig dang tha dad min/ /gang gi mtha' las yongs grol te/ /dbus su gsung med
gtan la phebs/ /gcig dang du ma bral ba'o/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu ste/ /thabs de gdod nas dag pa gsum/ /ma lus rang snang rtogs pa nyid/ /mtshan nyid de
yi mtshan nyid do/ /rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul/ /byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa/ /ma lus rtogs pa bzhir shar te/ /de nyid rtogs pa bzhir snang ngo / /
ma skyes ngang las gang snang ba/ /chu dang rlabs bzhin gcig pas na/ /de dang der gcig dbyer med pas/ /dngos po lo rgyus nyid kyis shes/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das
pa yi| |rtsa ba chags sdang lnga nyid de/ /gzhi rtsam bcos skad cig ma/ /de nyid rang spyir gang snang ba/ /rtogs pas spyi dang rang mtshan
shes/ /snod bcud rgyud rnams mtha' yas dang / /mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis/ /dngos po snang grags chos rnams kun/ /ma bcos de bzhin
nyid du gnas/ /ma lus snying po thig le dang / /lnga bdag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rgyu/ /sa ya bcu gsum rtsa yan lag /ro dang gnas skabs kun las grol/ /dang
po gnas dang gnyis pa gnyis/ /gsum pa ma lus khyab byed pa/ /nyams su myong byed gtan tshigs so/ /thig le gnas dang yig 'bru dang / /de yi
byin rlabs 'dres pa yis/ /bde ba chen po mngon du snang / /chu las chu bo tha dad de/ /rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs dang / /lam dang zhing sa'i 'bras bu ltar/ /
thabs kyi khyad par snang ba yin/ /dwangs ma lnga las gang byung ba/ /ji snyed lus sems rtsa thig le/ /khams lnga'i ro dang bcud snang ba/ /ye shes chen por
gtogs pa yin/ /gsum dngos brgyad sogs kha dog grangs/ /gnas pa gang yin de snod de/ /so so'i bcud kyi khyad par las/ /byang chub sems nyid
gsal bar snang / /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i/ /bden bzhi dbyer med drangs ma nyid/ /ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang / /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
pa'i| |thig le gcig dang du ma nyid/ /bral ba'i ye shes chen po nyid/ /gcig dang du ma las grol ba'o/ /bcud 'dus thig le gnyis ro rgyu/ /rlung dang gdams ngag
rkyen ldan pas/ /'bras bu lhan cig skyes par snang / /rang la gnas pa thabs kyis gsal/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i ro/ /rtsa yig bcas pa bcud 'dus
pas| |thabs dang rlung gi gdams pa yis/ /ma lus lhan skyes mngon sum gsal/ /bde dang stong nyid mi phyed pa'i/ /rang rig bde chen ma skyes gzugs/ /ma lus
'od dang rnam pa ltar/ /dbyer med tshul du rang snang ba'o/ /bde ba skyed pa'i rtog pa lnga/ /rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa nyid/ /ma lus ye shes chen po nyid/ /ye shes lnga
yis rgyas btab pa'o/ /dbang po snod bcud bcas pa yis/ /yab yum 'brel bar bcas pa'i bcud/ /sems lnga'i rgyud du rang snang ba/ /mnyam pa bzhi yi tshul
du gsal/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i/ /phyi nang gsang ba mthar thug pa'i/ /gtan tshigs mtha' yas bshad pa ste/ /rdo rje me long bshad pa'i rgyud/ /gang
gis rtogs pa de nyid ni/ /ma lus rang snang sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rang snang ba/ /zag med rang byung ngang las 'char/ /
chos rnams 'bras bur lhun rdzogs pa'i/ /bdag dang gzhan don lhun rdzogs pa/ /ma bcos ji bzhin ngang bzhag las/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung / /
gang dag gang la gang brten pas/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu nyid/ /ma bcos sgyu ma lhun grub nyid/ /dus bzhi phyogs bcu ma lus bar/ /lhun grub 'bras
bur rang snang ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las/ /lta ba ma lus ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /spyod pa'i khyad par ma lus pa/ /'di dag bshad par bya ba ste/ /rang bzhin thabs dang
mngon gyur pas/ /spyod pa ma lus bstan pa yin/ /e ma'o rang rig snying po las/ /bde sdug gnas dang longs spyod dang / /tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa/ /la
lar mngon par chags pa ste/ /la lar drag shul zhe sdang spyod/ /la lar ri bos non pa nyid/ /la lar ldongs pa'i mun pa nyid/ /la lar phrag dog snang ba
yin| |la lar ser sna 'thab rtsod de/ /la lar 'chal dang bya ba btang / /rtsol dang mi rtsol la sogs pa/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas rnyed/ /chos dbyings mtha'
yas mu med pa'i/ /nam mkha' dbyings ni mtha' yas par/ /spyod pa'i khyad par de nyid do/ /rang byung thabs kyi spyod pa nyid/ /ji ltar bsam zhing brtags pa
ltar| |rang bzhin dbye ba med pa'i phyir/ /sgo gsum byed spyod bsam mi khyab/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /ma lus sangs rgyas gnas gyur kyang /
ma rtogs thabs dang bral ba'i phyir/ /bde sdug sna tshogs bsam mi khyab/ /thabs chen dag dang ldan pa la/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal phrag
dog chen po dag /byang chub lam du bde bar bshad/ /thabs dang bya ba sna tshogs kyis/ /mdzad spyod dka' ba sna tshogs pa/ /mi dang lha las thar ba med/ /dper
na dug dang ldan pa la/ /thabs kyi khyad par ji bzhin du/ /rtogs pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du/ /bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rgyun/ /rang bzhin gnyis med dag pa
las| |brtags pa'i bye brag khyad par gyis/ /mi mthun bde sdug sna tshogs myong / /ma bcos dbyings las g.yos pa med/ /gang dag thun mong ngo dag las/ /
las dang bya ba'i sgo nas ni/ /spyad dang spyod dang spyod 'gyur phyir/ /'di skad spyod pas spyod par gsungs/ /rang bzhin rgyal ba'i spyod pa yis/ /chu
dang rlabs ltar khyab gyur kyang / /spong len bya ba sna tshogs las/ /spyod ba thabs kyis zin pa med/ /gang phyir thabs dang shes rab dang / /sgra dang rtogs pa sna tshogs
kyis| |thun mong yul du ma gyur pa/ /thun mong ma yin thabs spyod de/ /la lar thun mong nyid du ste/ /thar pa dang ni ma thar pa/ /kun tu rgyu dang mu stegs dang / /bud
med dang ni ma rabs dang / /rgyal po dpa' bo dka' thub can/ /byis pa la sogs tha dad de/ /la lar dgod dang drag po dang / /gshe dang 'jigs dang zhi ba dang / /la
lar de bzhin chags chen po/ /g.yo sgyu spyod dang g.yem par ston/ /zhi dang sku dang phrag dog spyod/ /'dod dang longs spyod gzir ba dang / /glu bro gar dang 'jo sgeg
dang / /de bzhin 'jigs dang sdigs pa dang / /ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe/ /zhing khams rdzu 'phrul spyod pa dang / /ngo mtshar che 'phrul du ma dag /gang dang gang
gis mdzad pa dag/ skye bo ma lus 'dul pa'i phyir/ /mdzad pa mtha' yas rnam par ston/ /zhi la tshangs dang khrol khro/ /thar ba na chung mdzed dang rol/ /gdung
dang rmongs dang sdug bsngal ba/ /rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'i/ /sku yi rol pa mtha' yas ston/ /byin gyis brlabs dang rang snang dang / /brda dang rig pa ting 'dzin
dang / /tshig tu chags sdang rmongs pa dang / /shin tu rgyal dang phrag dog dang / /'jam dang dal dang snyan mi snyan/ /rtsub dang drag dang spom phra dang / /ring thung rol mo lha
klu dang / /mi dang mi min 'byung po'i sgra/ /khyim bdag dbang chen legs dpon dang / /chags can gtum po la sogs pa'i/ /sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa/ /dag
dang ma dag tshul gyis ni/ /gsung gi rol pa mtha' yas snang / /la lar byams dang sdang ba dang / /g.yeng dang mi g.yeng rmongs dang ri/ /sdud dang mi sdud yal ba
dang / /grol dang ma grol rno rtul dang / /ma rig ye shes la sogs pa/ /thugs kyi rol ba mtha' yas pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang / /mtha' yas
dbyer med dam pa nyid/ /lung dang rigs pa man ngag gis/ /tshad ma dag gis gang bcal ba/ /shes bya khong du chud par 'gyur/ /de nas chos rnams ma lus pa/ /bdag
gzhan phyi nang dbyer med pa'i/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang / /mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid/ da/ran dang shes bzhin brtan po yis/ /dus gsum rgya
mtsho gting lta bur/ /mi g.yo gsal ba'i ngang gyur nas/ /sgo gsum mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /dang po rtogs pa'i spyod pa ste/ /de
bzhin nyid la gsal brtan te/ /stong pa shes rab spyod par bshad/ /de nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa/ /rang byung byang chub sems nyid phyir/ /gang snang rang rgyud
dngos med de/ /sgyu ma mig yor brag ca dang / /rmig rgyu chu bur la sogs pa/ /gong ma'i stobs dang 'di nyid stobs/ /mnyam par sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /
gang la ma bltas mngon byas dang / /ting 'dzin rim pa gnyis med pas/ /kun la snying rje'i spyod pa dag /dam pa 'di ni spyad par bya/ /rang bzhin ched du
dmigs pa dang / /khyab dang shugs las gang byung ba'i/ /snying rje'i spyod par rnam par spyad/ /de nas sgyu ma lta bu nyid/ /rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis/ /
cir yang bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir/ /rig pa dbu mar gang gsal ba/ /nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan du 'bar/ /sa bon gang las thabs cho gas/ /'phro 'du zhu
nas mngon gyur pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bor snang / /de nyid gcig dang lnga gsum gyis/ /brtan 'bar mdzes par gsal gyur te/ /mdun dang gzhan du skabs
dag sbyor| |gcig dang nges med rim pa dang / /'khor lo zhes bya bzhi ru gyur/ /gang gis gang de ma brtan par/ /'phro 'du bsgoms pa don med de/ /skyon bral gsal
brtan 'dris pa yis/ /gang bsgoms gsal par mngon du 'gyur/ /tha mal zhen rtog zlog pa dang / /lam gyi 'drel bar bya ba dang / /dngos grub 'bras la myur
'jug pas/ /rtags kyi lha ni bsgom par bya/ /de ltar brtan 'gyur gsal ba la/ /bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa'i/ /sgo gsum sku gsung thugs gsal
bas| |thun mong spyod pa rnam bcad la/ /sgo gsum mnyam gzhag rjes thob med/ /gang gis de ltar gsal bya'i phyir/ /phyogs gcig spyod pa brtsam par bya/ /
de nas rtsa ba goms pa dang / /bslab bya khyad par mthar phyin ltar/ /gang de rim par brtan 'phel phyir/ /yan lag spros pa rnam par bsgom/ /lhag pa bcu gcig
dgur ldan pa'i/ /gcig las rgyas bsdus phye ba yis/ /'khor lo'i rtsa ba lha dag kyang / /yab yum gnas dgod gsal bar bsgom/ /de dag lhag pa'i lha
dgu dag /yan lag tshul du spros te bsgom/ /'dul ba gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /mdzes pa'i tshul dang gdug pa 'dul/ /lha dang zhal phyag dbu grangs
kyang / /rtsa ba yan lag spros tshul gyis/ /dkyil 'khor grangs dang gang sbyar ba'i/ /rim bar spros shing bsgom par bya/ /grangs
dang grangs med tshul dag gis/ /dpag tshad rgyad grags mkha' dbyings su/ /zhi dang khro la sogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs sna tshogs bsgom/ /dang po'i
bar dang tha ma'i bar/ /rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal brtan nas/ /sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu rim par bsgom par bya/ /dgon pa'i rim pa 'am
nags tshal dang / /chu 'gram ri rtse dur khrod dang / /skyon bral yon tan rdzogs pa ste/ /dgra dang phyogs mtshams skyon med pa'i/ /brtag pa'i rim pa ldan pa
yis| |shes dang 'thad pa'i sa phyogs su/ /gzhal yas rim brtsegs mdzes ldan pa/ /rgyan dang bcas pa ldan byas la/ /ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i shes
rab thabs/ /mi ldan gong ma'i 'od kyis sbyang / /bdag dang gzhan gyi nus pa yis/ /mnyam nas tshogs la 'jug par bya/ /yo byad lnga ldan thogs med
bar| |cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin brtsam/ /bro glu gar dang ting 'dzin bcas/ /bar chad med par bsgrub par bya/ /gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs par/ /sgyu ma'i lus
de ma brtan na/ /yid kyis rdo rje gsum gsal las/ /rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin de/ /phyin chad 'jigs bral khyung bzhin no/ /da bas 'brel ba'i spyod ldan na/ /dbang
sgyur zag med sa thob ste/ /brgya dang stong sogs 'jigs bral zhing / /gling dang 'jig rten brgya stong du/ /'dul ba'i cho 'phrul mtha' yas snang / /'jig pa med cing
mi ldog pa/ /dpa' bo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gzhan don spyod pa'i khyad par dag /'dul ba'i dbang ni sna tshogs kyis/ /rnam par brtse ba sna tshogs spro/ /'di
ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /shes rab phyi yi spyod pa ste/ /cho ga rgyas par bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /nang du 'jug pa'i rim pa yi/ /spyod pa'i
khyad par cho ga dag /de nas rim pa 'di dag bshad/ /lus can 'gro ba thams cad la/ /tsa kra bzhi dang sku gsung thugs/ /spor dang 'bar ma 'khyil ba dang / /'brel
dang ma 'brel khug pa dang / /'dzin dang 'dzag dang gnas pa dang / /de bzhin khyab dang 'khrul ba'i rtsa/ /gang du rgyu dang gnas 'dzin pas/ /rtsa zhes de la mngon bshad
de/ /de dag rgyu dang lam 'bras dang / /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/ /bde ba chen po skyed par byed/ /gong dang 'og gi rang bzhin las/ /spyi dang khyad par kha sbyor
'byung / /sa bon khyab byed 'khor lo yis/ /thams cad khyab cing 'dzag pa'i rtsa/ /dwangs snyigs rlung dang 'brel ba yis/ /gang de
pho mo'i bcud rkyen gyis/ /zag dang zag med bde ba skyed/ /lus kun khyab par gnas pa nyid/ /dwangs ma thur gyi rlung dang 'grogs/ /gang na sgra sbyor 'khor lo can/ /
des kyang kun khyab rgyu ba can/ /'khrul la la 'khor bas 'khor lo ste/ /gsung gi 'khor lo ngag gi rten/ /rdzogs dang ma rdzogs gang mi gsal/ /sgra sbyor dag
dang ma dag gyur/ /bde dang snyan dang mi snyan ngang / /bya dang dri za bung ba dang / /chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs byed/ /mdog dmar lus khyab klu la sogs/ /u
tha'i rlung dang 'grogs te gnas/ /d+harma tsakra srog gi rten/ /ma lus bzhi rtsa kun gyi srog /rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dang ldan/ /dwangs ma lnga 'dus kun gyi gtso/ /
phyi rim rin chen sul mang 'dra/ /mi shigs thig le bde chen po/ /rin chen phung po zam tog /sna tshogs ye shes lnga yi bdag /thung ngu a yi rang bzhin can/ /
srog gi rlung dang 'grogs te gnas/ /phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad da/ /chos nyid ye shes yon tan dang / /rang rgyud bzhi la yan lag brgyad/ /thun mong phyi yi rim
pa yin| |'di la rtsa gsum rim pa ste/ /zag pa'i rtsa dang mngon shes rtsa/ /chos nyid rim pa gsum du gnas/ /rlung yang gcig gam gnyis yin te/ /de las bye brag
dpag med pa'o/ /gnas pa dang ni rgyu ba'i rlung / /gnas pa srog dang ye shes te/ /rgyu ba bzhi ni mngon par brjod/ /phyi nang can dang gyen thur can/ /re re'ang dwangs
snyigs khyad par gyis/ /rim pa brgyad du mngon snang yin/ /gnyid dang 'gro ba'i sa bon gyis/ /chags sdang dran rtog kun gyi gzhi/ /gang du gnas dang gnas ma
yin| |rgyu zhing 'pho ba rlung gis te/ /bde dang sdug bsngal ji snyed pa/ /myong zhing skyed par byed pa yin/ /'di ni gnas dang mi gnas kyis/ /srog dbang dran pa dbang
bsgyur bas/ /gnas dang 'pho ba pha rol dag /gnas pa srog gi rlung can no/ /gang du 'khrul pa mdzad pa ni/ /ma lus 'gyed cing spro ba yi/ /gyen thur 'dzeg cing
'gengs 'byung ba'i/ /sgo gnyis lus kun khyab pa'i rtsa/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi snying po can/ /phyi rim bzhi yi rgyun du 'khyil/ /dbus nas 'khyil ba thig le'i rtsa/ /
'phen pa bde ba'i rlung dang 'grogs/ /gang du'ang 'khrul cing sprul pa'i phyir/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo shes rab nyid/ /de 'og gru gsum 'bar ba'i rtsa/ /gyen du
'bar dang thur du 'phro/ /'od kyis 'bar ba'i sa bon can/ /rtse mo'i 'og nas reg pa'i khams/ /gtum mo lte 'og 'bar ba'i rtsa/ /
skyes bu chags pa slong ba ltar/ /'di dag bde ba skyed pa ste/ /gnas sa tshad dang bcas par gnas/ /de 'og g.yo ba rlung gi rten/ /'gyed dang 'jum pa'i
las can nyid/ /de dang de gnyis gang ldan pas/ /lus kyi dwangs snyigs 'dis 'byed pa/ /bye brag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rtsa/ /'dus pas sku gsung thugs
yin te| |lte ba thur du 'dzag pa'i rtsa/ /rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i bde ba'i gnad/ /rgyu ba rlung ni thig le'i rten/ /'gyed cing 'dud pa g.yas g.yon te/ /bcu
drug 'dus pa'i srog rtse gong / /rtsa gsum mgrin par 'dus pa ni/ /sgra sbyor 'khor lo ngag gi gnad/ /de nas dwangs pa'i thig le la/ /ma lus 'dus
pa'i tshul du gnas/ /rig pa'i rtsa la bcud 'dus pa'i/ /thogs med gsal ba'i mngon shes 'byung / /phyi rol zag pa'i rtsa nyid la/ /bde ba chen po'i
bcud 'dus pa/ /bde chen nyams nyid skye bar 'gyur/ /chos nyid thig le mi g.yo ba/ /dwangs ma 'dus pa'i bcud thim pas/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan pa
yi| |zag med ye shes bde ba che/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni rgya che ba/ /thog mtha' med par khyab par 'gyur/ /'di nyid rtogs dang ma rtogs las/ /'khor dang mya ngan
'das pa yi/ /spyod pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /thabs kyi khyad par phyag rgya lnga/ /bskyod pa rlung dang 'bar ba me/ /thig le chu dang 'dzin pas/ /bde chen
nam mkha'i phyag rgyar gsal/ /bde bas bde ba'i don mthong bas/ /rtsa dang thig le rlung dag dang / /bde ba rang rig ma skyes pa/ /de nyid bde chen mi rtog pa/ /rang rgyud
bral bas zag pa med/ /rang rgyud med pa'i bde ba nyid/ /dwangs ma'i thig les kun khyab pas/ /phyi nang dbang por bcas pa yis/ /bde ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'char/ /
ma lus bde ba chen po nyid/ /de la de yis rgyas btab pas/ /bde ba mi rtog lhan cig skyes/ /phyag rgya gcig tu gsal bar gnas/ /gang du 'khor lo rtsa bcud
ldan| |sa bon yi ge bde ba dang / /khams lnga ye shes ro ldan zhing / /stong dang bde ba'i thig le 'dres/ /rtag tu dran par gnas pa nyid/ /re re'ang de ltar gnas
pa'i phyir/ /'khor lo rtsa bcud thig ler bcas/ /lha dang ye shes sku gsung thugs/ /rang lus snang ba snod bcud kun/ /spros bcas phyag rgya'i grangs su
gsal| |bcud lnga ye shes kho na'i phyir/ /dwangs snyigs dbyer med thig le'i don/ /so so'i kha dog dbyibs tshul dang / /spas
pa'i sku gsung thugs dag la/ /dbyer med gsal ba'i rig pa yis/ /ma lus bde chen mngon sum gsal/ /de nas bde ba chen po nyid/ /gar thabs rlung gis
dbang bsgyur nas/ /ma lus bde ba'i rig pa 'char/ /gtsang dang 'dzin pa bral gyur nas/ /bshung ba lnga dang 'dod pa lnga/ /thig le bcud dang dwangs mar bcas/ /
thig le chen por 'dres pas na/ /mi 'gyur 'chi med tshe la gnas/ /rang rig bde ba chen po nyid/ /thog ma tha ma med par gnas/ /thig le rgyu ba rlung dang bcas/ /
zag med dwangs ma'i snying por thim/ /mngon shes lnga ldan zag pa med/ /dwangs ma'i snying por lam mthar phyin/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /'khor dang mya ngan
'das pa dag /thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i/ /bden gnyis nyi zla'i khyad par las/ /ma lus thams cad gsal bar gnas/ /gang du thabs dang bral ba
yi| |gnas dang bde sdug btang snyoms dang / /longs spyod che dang kha dog dang / /bdag dang bdag gir zhen byas pa'i/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg dang dran
pa sna tshogs kyis/ /zhen dang bcings pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rang bzhin bzhi ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /de las tha mal 'khor ba'i lam/ /thog ma med pas lus gnas
pa'i| |bde chen nam mkha'i snying po nyid/ /lus gnyis rtsa bcud ma lus pa/ pas dang shes rab sku gsung thugs/ /srin bu 'khyug pa'i yi ge ltar/ /dbang po
gnyis dang 'brel te gnas/ /thabs dang man ngag ldan pa yis/ /rgyal rigs rje'u dang bram ze dang / /dmangs rigs tshogs ma gar mkhan ma/ /rdol ma nyo
tshong ma nyid dang / /ma dang sgyug mo sring mo dang / /mthar sgeg lus 'tshong ma la sogs/ /dngos grub skye ba'i zhing du bshad/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug dang / /
bco brgyad bcud ldan rab yin te/ /nyi shu la sogs 'bring du bshad/ /rtsa lnga tha ma'i tshad yin te/ /gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs/ /las dang bya ba ma
lus pa| |cho ga'i sbyor ba rab tu brtsam/ /gnas pa 'byung ba'i bcud bzhi la/ /'byung bzhi gsal rkyen gang phrad pas/ /nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las/ /
lhan cig skyes pa gsum gcig las/ /nyams su ye shes lnga shar ba/ /ma lus bde ba chen por 'gyur/ /gnas bzhi rtsa bcud thig le las/ /thabs dang
shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /phyag rgya bzhir ldan mnyam sbyor bas/ /dwangs snyigs rlung gis ngos bzung nas/ /dngos po lhan cig
skyes pa dag /bdag po gdung can sbyar ba yi/ /'phro 'du btang dang bzung ba dang / /bzlog pas nyi zla dbyer med myong / /dang po 'jug pa la sogs nas/ /rdo rje
'chang chen gsang bdag par/ /lam lnga sems lnga mthar phyin pas/ /stobs kyi khyad par gsal bar 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /
'og min nam mkha'i shar sgo nas/ /nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la/ /dus tshod gza' yis gang bzung ba/ /nyin mtshan med pa'i ye shes nyid/ /'phen pa rlung
gi sbyor bas 'byung / /rnal 'byor rig pas snang ba yi/ /khyab pa nam mkha'i 'jig rten na/ /bde chen mdzes pa'i me tog la/ /bcud kyis khyad par gang
gnas pa| |thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi/ /shel dang byi ru'i bung bsdus nas/ /rnal 'byor bcud kyis rgyas gyur nas/ /bcu gsum sa la lhun gyis
grub| |'khyud pa'i gar thabs las byung ba'i/ /bde ba chen po mi rtog pa/ /skad cig cha las byung ba yi/ /zag med ye shes snying po ste/ /ma lus dwangs ma'i
blo snang ba/ /zhen bral stong rtog mi gnas pa/ /dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ste/ /ma lus khyab par gnas pa yin/ /'du shes zad pa'i rang bzhin te/ /skye dang 'grib
pa'i thig le nyid/ /bco lnga rdzogs pa'i tha ma nyid/ /sbyor ba kun zad stong pa'i ngang / /de nyid byin brlabs las gyur pa/ /phyogs dus snod bcud ngo bo nyid/ /thig
le rdul bral zhen pa med/ /sgyu ma gzugs brnyan brag ca sogs/ /ma lus bde chen rang bzhin du/ /thun mong dran rtog rang 'gags nas/ /bde chen sgyu ma mngon
sum snang / /bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs/ /bcud lnga zhu ba'i ye shes ro/ /thams cad rtse gcig dran pa nyid/ /dbyer med thabs dang shes rab ste/ /dran pa
gcig tu myong ba nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis/ /sa ya bcu gsum grangs med pa'i/ /thig le bde ba nyid snang ba/ /rang rang ma 'dres thig le la/ /
sku gsung thugs dang dran pa dang / /ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab ste/ /ma lus thig le'i tshogs su snang / /rang byung bde chen rig pa'i lha/ /gcig dang grangs
las 'das pa yang / /nyi zla gnyis kyi gdan la bzhugs/ /khyab pa thig le'i gur nang na/ /bzhugs nas bdag po rten bdag can/ /rtsa bcud 'brel ba'i rgyan dang
bcas| |dka' ba gsum dang pho brang bzhi/ /lde mig gnyis la 'byed pa bzhi/ /sgo bzhi phye bas gzhal yas khang / /lha dang bcas
pa mngon du 'gyur/ /dgon pa dur khrod ldan pa yi/ /gsang ba'i 'og min 'bar ba nyid/ /rim pa phyi nad bar ldan par/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng nas/ /dus gsum
thig ler ro gcig pa'o/ /bde chen gnyis su med par bzhugs/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /tshom bu'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te/ /thun mong dam
tshig ting 'dzin dang / /byang chub shes rab snying rje lnga/ /gzhan du thabs dang shes rab dang / /spyad dang glu gar rgyan dang bcas/ /ma spangs rol par longs
spyad pas/ /ye shes nyi zla rgyun 'char ba/ /rlung sems ye shes bcas pa nyid/ /rgyu ba med pa'i zag pa bral/ /nam mkha'i mthar thug par nyid du/ /zag med
bde ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /de nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor te/ /bde chen mngon du gang bar snang / /de dag lam la zhugs pa yi/ /phyi nang gsang ba ma lus pa'i//
spyod pa'i khyad par thams cad kun/ /'dir ni rgyas par bstan pa yin/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/ /phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa/ /skabs la bab
pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gang yang rung bas spyod par bya/ /dang po rtogs nas mthar thug pa'i/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i lam spyod la/ /spyad bya yul zhes gang 'dod de/ /thams
cad blang dor med par spyad/ /thabs kyi lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis/ /pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin nam/ /mun snang gser 'gyur thabs bzhin du/ /thabs la mkhas pas spyad
par bya| |skyes mchog thabs dang ldan pa yis/ /zhing dang spyod yul dag pa la/ /chags bral bde bar gang spyod pas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi longs spyod la/ /
bde ba chen por longs spyod cing / /lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /gang dag thabs dang mi ldan zhing / /don med lam la ma 'brel bar/ /sgra dang tshig
la brten pa yis/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa gang brtsams pa/ /gang bsgrubs snang bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /nus med g.yul du zhugs pa ltar/ /bdag gzhan gnyis
ka brlag pa dang / /mthong ba'i chos la sdug bsngal zhing / /ngan 'gro log pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi
rgyud chen po las/ spyod pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga ba'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang //
lhag gnyis ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang / /byang chub sems dang tshogs nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor don ni bshad par bya/ /gang phyir
dbang yul rnam shes kun/ /gzhan snang tha dad ma yin pa'i/ /ma lus rang rig byang chub sems/ /ma bcos rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /ma lus kun gyi snying po
ste| |phyogs bcu 'das dang ma byon pa'i/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yin/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /sna tshogs
rang bzhin dbyer med pa/ /de nyid rang bzhin chos sku yin/ /de nyid 'jig rten brtan g.yo ste/ /ji ltar snang grags thams cad kun/ /nges pa'i rang bzhin bzhi
bcu gnyis/ /rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs skur bshad/ /de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /kun tu sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las bsam
yas mchog /rang bzhin sprul sku bsam mi khyab/ /ji snyed 'gro ba ma lus kyi/ /lus can snying la gang gnas pa'i/ /rang byung zag med ye shes gzugs/ /
mi shigs thig le bde chen po/ /nam mkha' lta bur kun khyab pa/ /mi gnas chos sku'i rang bzhin yin/ /de nyid rtsa ba'i rang bzhin las/ /ma lus snod
bcud rang bzhin can/ /rtog pa ma lus dkyil 'khor te/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /de nyid thig le phra rags par/ /snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi
khyab| |de yis de 'dul snang ba'i rgyu/ /sprul pa rang bzhin zhes bshad do/ /gang 'dir phung po 'byung ba dang / /rnam shes dbang po yul dus dang / /nyon mongs rtag
chad yid chos bcas/ /gang la mngon par mi snang yang / /rang bzhin ma bcos dkyil 'khor te/ /kun la khyab par snang ba yin/ /rang snying dwangs ma lngar ldan
pas| |dwangs ma'i phung po 'byung ba dang / /dbang po yul du bcas pa yi/ /rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid/ /sku gsung thugs su rang snang ba/ /ma lus kun
la rgyas btab bo/ /bcud 'dus thig le chen po nyid/ /nyi zla 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul dag gis/ /
thabs kyis mngon du gyur na yang / /gnyis med thig le bde pa'i ro/ /'gro ba kun la rang bzhin snang / /de dag yab yum sku gsung thugs/ /rtsa bcud thig ler
bcas pa nyid/ /'du 'bral med par ye gnas pa'o/ /gang phyir rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /zag med ye shes rang snang ba/ /dpag med yon tan rgya mtsho nyid/ /ye shes
'og min pho brang ste/ /zag med yon tan rgyan ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i pho brang dbus/ /mi 'jigs phung po'i gdan steng na/ /
bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo bskor/ /bka' sdod skyes bu mdun na gnas/ /gzhan yang rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las//
rang rang rigs lnga gang gyur pa'i/ /rnam par dbu dang ye shes phyag /so so'i bzhugs tshul ldan pa yis/ /mdun rgyab phyogs bcur 'khod pa nyid/ /yab
yum 'brel pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /rang byung ma bsgribs ye shes phyir/ /zag med tshogs gnyis las byung ba'i/ /nam mkha'i khams dang rgya mnyam
pa'i| |'jig rten grangs med rdul dang bcas/ /bkod pa phun sum tshogs par gnas/ /gad de zag med ye shes kyi/ /phyag dang zhal dang thabs ldan pas//
zhal mthong rigs la dbang bsgyur bas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur/ /rgyal ba de dag ma lus pa'i/ /gsung mchog brjod du med pa nyid/ /nam mkha'i
dbyings kyis mthar thug pa/ /brda dang don dang byin rlabs dang / /gsang ba la sogs ci rigs par/ /dam pa'i chos sgra rgya mtsho sgrog /zag med ye shes
rgya mtsho yi/ /byin rlabs cho 'phrul mngon shar ba/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ i au/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ aM aHka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa cha dza dz+ha nya/ ta
tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha /'di dag rab tu phyung ba yis/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i/ /nam mkha'i
dbyings dang rgya mtsho dang / /'khor ra yug dang lhun po dang / /'bab chu lteng ka mtshe'u bcas/ /de na gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ /rang rang longs spyod bde sdug bcas//
phyi nang snod bcud bcas pa rnams/ /ma lus g.yo zhing ldeg par byed/ /sgra bo che yang sgrog par byed/ /de dag sbyangs nas me gnas par/ /gsung gi ngo bor
byin brlabs te/ /de dag stong nyid la thim pas/ /ma lus stong pa nyid du 'gyur/ /a ni stong dang mi stong gi /dbu ma dmigs su'ang yod ma yin/ /ji snyed
snang grags chos rnams kun/ /yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas/ /gang phyir de yi rang bzhin yang / /rang bzhin cho 'phrul ting 'dzin dang / /gsang ba bris bar gang
snang ba| |rig pa'i khyad par snang ba yin/ /rtsa ba dang ni rgyan zhes dang / /lha yi yi ge mngon snang ba/ /rang bzhin sku gsung thugs nyid de/ /khyab pa'i tshul gyis
ma lus snang / /gang du thugs rje byin rlabs dang / /ting 'dzin rig pa'i cho 'phrul te/ /rang rang khyad par mngon snang yin/ /'di
dag rang bzhin sna tshogs pa/ /gang du ji ltar gnas pa kun/ /yi ger ma gyur med par gnas/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i
gsang ba'i thugs/ /mthar thug med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin/ /zag med rgyas pas kun khyab can/ /shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa/ /gcig dang du
ma med tshul gyis/ /ye shes ma bsgribs gsal ba yis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ltar gsal mkhyen pa/ /dus gsum chos dang 'gro ba dang / /zhing khams
rgyal ba dpag med dang / /ri dang rgya mtsho rdul bcas pa/ /snga phyi ma bsgribs da lta nyid/ /me long lta bu'i mngon du snang / /dpal ldan nam mkha'i dkyil
'khor du/ /ye shes lnga yis kun khyab can/ /kun mkhyen stobs bcu mtha' thug med/ /nam mkha'i dbang phyug bde chen po/ /mngon shes rgya mtsho
pha rol byon/ /shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun/ /sad dang sangs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag /bde ba chen po sgyu ma
nyid| |rang byung thugs las gzhan pa min/ /'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/ /gdul bya gang gi don dag tu/ /sna tshogs mngon
bar 'phrul ba yin/ /gang du khro gtum gdug ldan pa'i/ /srid gsum dregs pa'i bdag po dag /thugs rjes khros pas gdul ba'i phyir/ /khro bo'i de bzhin
gshegs par mdzad/ /sku ni ri rab lta bu nyid/ /zhabs dang phyag ni rdul snyed de/ /gang de gdul ba'i khyad par gyis/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi
dang / /dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag la sogs/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig dbu la sogs/ /de bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba'i/ /phyag zhabs zhal yang de bskyed de/ /mtshon
cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa des/ /ji snyed phyogs bcu 'jig rten du/ /cho 'phrul bzhi la sogs pa yi/ /mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis/ /dregs pa che
dang dbang phyug dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug brgya byin dang / /dri za gshin rje gnod sbyin bcas/ /gdug pa'i nga rgyal rgyu 'bras can/ /rgyu 'bras rtsad nas bcad
pa'i phyir/ /ma lus pa dag ma btang bar/ /nga rgyal khro gtum zhum pa yis/ /ji skad smras kyang rang rang gi /nyon mongs rgya mtsho ma bskams par/ /thugs rje
zhe la mnan tshul gyis/ /de dag mngon du brdul bar mdzad/ /la lar dpal chen khrag 'thung nyid/ /la lar rdo rje khrag 'thung
nyid| |la lar rin chen khrag 'thung ste/ /la lar pad+ma de bzhin gshegs/ /la lar sna tshogs las su bcas/ /rang rang btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril/ /
rigs kyi mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ /mdog dang cha lugs de bzhin te/ /de bzhin sras dang bka' nyan dang / /pho nya yang sprul la sogs pa/ /rdo rje ba spu
bu ga nas/ /pho nya bye ba drug cu dag /phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkye ste/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa yi/ /gdug pa'i tshogs ni de dag kun/ /ma
lus dus gcig btul nas ni/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod/ /de dag gsung yang sna tshogs te/ /sprul pa 'gyed pas gsung gcig tu/ /khams
gsum sgra yis gang bar mdzad/ /hUM hUM hUM bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la ha la hUM phaT/ phaT phaT phaT/ trata trata trata/ kro Ta kro Ta kro Ta/

ha la ha la ha la/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Thi tiSh+Thi tiSh+Thi/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da ha da ha da ha/ gri h+Na gri h+Na gri h+Na/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ gardza gardza gardza/
hUM hUM hUM| b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ phaT dz+wa la raM/ zhes ba'i sgra yis thams cad gang / /ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug par/ /ri dang gling dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /'khor yug stong
gsum 'jig rten bcas/ /ma lus g.yo zhing sgras bkang ste/ /gdug pa'i tshogs de 'khor bcas pa/ /gang gi dbang du ma btang bar/ /gdug pa dus gcig btul
bar mdzad/ /de tshe de yi 'khor g.yog kyang / /zhum pas smras shing gsol btab nas/ /rang snying phul nas dam mnos te/ /smod btsugs
rang gi lam la bzhag /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang / /la lar gti mug rmugs par mdzad/ /la lar chags la chags chen po/ /
la lar g.yem la g.yem par ston/ /sdang la drag shul spyod pa ste/ /nga rgyal can la ri bos gnon/ /zhi las slong dang zhi ba nyid/ /gsal
dang zhe la gnon pa dang / /chags khro dang ni sdang khro dang / /rmongs khro gnon khro la sogs pas/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /rang gi mkhyen pa'i
ye shes kyis/ /gdul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs su/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /thugs kyi sprul pa snang bar mdzad/ /gang phyir spros
med goms pa nyid/ /de nyid ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor te/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/ /ji snyed phyogs bcur gnas pa
kun| |rang rig rgyal por gnas pa nyid/ /'di nyid pho mo ma ning dang / /mtshan med la sogs gang yang min/ /dngos dang dngos med
las 'das pa'i/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /rig pa skye ba med pa'i ngang / /'di nyid gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /oM
d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ skyes dang ma skyes la sogs pa'i/ /tha snyad ming la mi gnas shing / /blo yi sbyor ba las 'das pas/ /'di ni de
bzhin nyid ces bshad/ /'di la rim pa med pa ste/ /skyes bu mchog gi yul du gsungs/ /ma lus rang rig rdo rje nyid/ /khyab pa'i tshul
gyis nam mkha' ste/ /rnam dag rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /dam pa'i ting 'dzin chen po nyid/ /gang gis ma lus mngon gsal nas/ /
phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun/ /goms nas spos med de bzhin nyid/ /de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid/ /mi shigs thig le dwangs
ma'i bdag /bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyis su med/ /rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ye shes
lnga yi ri dang bcas/ /bde chen skye ba med pa'i don/ /zag med khyab pa mngon du smin/ /ye shes nas mkha'i gzugs can nyid/ /phyi nang
med pa'i rang byung ste/ /gsal dang bde ba'i rang bzhin can/ /thabs dang thig les dbang bsgyur nas/ /lus can kun la gsal bar
skye| |gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dwangs ma nyid/ /rten can brten par bcas pa nyid/ /rang byung thig le bde ba nyid/ /phyogs cha med par gsal
khyab pas/ /bde ba chen po'i lus su 'gyur/ /rang byung snying po dwangs ma'i lus/ /'byung ba zag med snying por thim/ /thig le spros pa med pa
ste| /thams cad ma lus khyab par snang / /rang lus rtsa bcud phyi nang kun/ /snyigs ma dwangs mar smin byas te/ /dwangs ma ye shes
snying por gsal/ /de nyid rgyu ba med pa yi/ /rang byung thig le spros pa med/ /dwangs ma zag med stobs las snang / /gang phyir skyes dang
sprul pa dang / /brtags pa'i gzungs ma las byung ba/ /dbang po gnyis ni bsrubs pa las/ /skad cig
bcu drug mtha' yi tshe/ /nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las/ /dngos po lhan cig skyes pa gsal/ /sems lnga rdzogs pa'i snying po
nyid| |brjod med rang snang bstan pa nyid/ /ma lus sku gsung thugs gnas pa/ /'khyud pa'i gar gsum bsdam pa yis/ /gnas
dang 'byung ba ma lus pa/ /rang rig ye shes gzugs su snang / /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /byang chub sems kyi thig
le ste| |rten dang brten par bcas pa nyid/ /rang nyid gsal bar byin brlabs nas/ /ji ltar snang srid chos thams cad/ /lhan
cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal/ /ma lus bde ba chen po'i rigs/ /dam pa'i sbyor ba snang bar 'gyur/ /'di ni phyi nang gsang
ba yi| |ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad/ /gang phyir mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor bas/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'i/ /
rang rig skye med de bzhin nyid/ /ma bcos rang rig 'od gsal ba/ /de bzhin nyid de dang por bsgom/ /de nas snying rje nam mkha' ltar/ /
gsal la stong pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom/ /yang na sgyu ma brag ca dang / /chu zla'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /de nas rang nyid yi ge nyid/ /
gsal la brtan zhing goms pa yis/ /ma dag pa ni sbyangs byas te/ /dag pa'i mkha' lnga bsam par bya/ /e yaM baM su laM/ sa chu
me rlung nam mkha' dag /rig pa rang snang tshul du bsgom/ /de dbus rin chen khang ba dag /mdzes pa'i tshul dang ldan pa ste/ /rtsibs
bzhi 'khor lo lte bar bcas/ /mu khyud zlum po thog mtha' med/ /gru chad glo 'bur bar khyams dang / /sgo bzhi rta babs them skas dang / /
lnga brtsegs pha gu dra phyed dang / /'dod yon ka ba za ra tshags/ /mi sgrib gsal ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /mi 'jigs la sogs lnga dbus gdan/ /
nyi zla pad+ma la sogs pa/ /lnga dang gsum dang bzhi gcig go /rim pa 'tsham pa'i gdan steng du/ /sa bon cho ga las byung ba/ /gtso gzungs
mthing ga rdo rje 'dzin/ /'khril sbyor 'dzum pa'i byin rlabs te/ /dbang bskur cho ga lnga ldan pas/ /
sbyor bskul sras bskyed so sor dgod/ /chos dbyings dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin/ /mnyam nyid rin chen ser po lho/ /sor
rtog pad+ma dmar po nub/ /bya grub ral gri ljang khu byang / /btsun mo rigs mthun dril 'dzin 'khyil/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs mtshan
shar lho nas/ /sa snying dkar po myu gu 'dzin/ /sgeg mo dung mdog me long 'khril/ /nam snying sngon po ral gri 'dzin/ /phreng
'dzin mA le nam mkha'i mdog /spyan ras le brgan pad+ma dkar/ /gI ti pi wang dmar mo mdog /rdor 'dzin ljang khu
las kyi rigs/ /phyag gnyis brkyang nas gar mdzad ljang / /gru chad bzhi la rim pa bzhin/ /byams pa dkar ser klu shing
'dzin| |sgrib sel dmar ser glegs bam bsnams/ /kun bzang dmar ljang rin chen snye/ /'jam dpal dkar ljang ut+pal bsnams//
btsun mo rigs dang mthun pa ste/ /spos dang mar me me tog dri/ /'khril zhing 'dud pa tshul bzhin bzhugs/ /sgo bzhir rim pa ji bzhin du/ /stobs chen
gshin rje gshed po dang / /rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzhi/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcag sgrog dril/ /mthing nag ser nag dmar nag dang / /ljang nag rdo rje
thod dbyug dang / /thod sprul rdo rje rgya gram dang / /yum yang so so'i phyag mtshan bcas/ /sgo bzhir rngam tshul 'khril sbyor bzhugs/ /khyams kyi mdun dang rgyab
tu ni| |kun bzang yab yum nam mkha'i mdog /phyag rgya ma nges sna tshogs te/ /mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro ba'i steng / /rdo rje dril bu mtshan pa 'o/ /thub drug
dkar ser mthing ga dang / /dmar nag ser nag dud ka ste/ /phyogs bzhi steng 'og shar nub tshul/ /pi wang go cha seg par bsgom/ /po ti me chur shes par bya/ /
mi bskyod byed po la sogs pa/ /rdo rje 'chang bas rnam par brgyan/ /gzhan dag rang rang gis yin te/ /ya mAn+ta krita rtag pa'o/ /thub drug kun bzang brgyan pa nyid/ /
sku gsung thugs 'bar byin rlabs ldan/ /rdo rje 'phro 'du snying por ldan/ /cho ga'i rim pa shes par bya/ /dwangs ma bcud ldan ye shes nyid/ /ma bcos de bzhin
nyid yin te/ /ye shes nam mkha'i ngang dang 'brel/ /kun la khyab pa'i snying rje yis/ /khyab byed bde ba'i snying po nyid/ /tha mal
rtog pa gang dag nas/ /bde ba chen por byin gyis rlobs/ /'byung lnga dwangs ma'i snying po nyid/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te/ /d+harma tsakra chos kyi dbyings//
mi shigs thig le kun gyi gnas/ /nus pa'i khyad par phra rags bzhi/ /thig le'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang / /'du shes 'du byed rnam shes nyid/ /ye
shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid/ /rgyal po lnga ru bshad pa yin/ /'byung lnga dwangs mar bcas pa ni/ /dgyes pa bskyed phyir btsun mo ste/ /mig sogs bde
ba'i rnam shes dang / /de yi ngo bo yul bcas ni/ /gnas pa rtsa bcud thig ler bcas/ /nang gi sems dpa' yab yum nyid/ /so so'i rtsa bcud
gnas pa'i rten/ /dbang po dus bzhir bcas pa nyid/ /phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni/ /gnas dang dus kyis phye phyir ro/ /gang de dwangs mas bskyed
pa yis| |lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad bcas/ /sgo bzhi yab yum shes par bya/ /bde chen yid chos rang rig nyid/ /kun bzang ro yi bde ba nyid/ /nyon
mongs drug gi yul rnams su/ /sprul pa'i thig ler rang shar pa'o/ /'dul ba bzhi yis don mdzad pa/ /sprul pa'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab/ /kun kyang dwangs
ma'i rang bzhin las/ /ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa/ /gnas dang ngo bo lngas brgyan pa/ /ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab pa'o/ /sa bon sku ste yi ge gsung / /bde thugs
sku gsung dkyil 'khor ldan/ /'phro 'du rtsa ba'i thig ler bcas/ /ma lus kun la 'di gnas pas/ /yan lag nyid du 'di shes bya/ /stong nyid rdo rje la sogs
pa| |sngon byas rang rgyud med pa yi/ /rigs rtags gzungs ma blang bar bya/ /rang rgyud sgo gsum dag byas pa/ /lha yi rnal 'byor lus su bya/ /rdo rje snying po ge
sar nyid/ /sra ba sa dang gsher ba chu/ /drod me bskyod pa rlung nyid de/ /bde ba'i dwangs ma nam mkha' nyid/ /bruM dbyings b+ha ga bde ba'i gnas/ /sna tshogs 'dus
pa'i gzhal yas khang / /nyi zla pad+ma nus pa'i gdan/ /che ba'i yon tan rdzogs par ldan/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro/ /lnga phung 'byung lnga dag pa yi/ /
rang bzhin de dang mnyam sbyar bas/ /ye shes phra rags gnyis su med/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi/ /dbang po yul dus rnam shes bcas/ /rang rang
bde bar skyes pa'i lha/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob nas/ /
thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis/ /brtags pa rang gi rtog pa zlog /dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la/ /bzlog bya ngas kyang ma dmigs so/ /bde ba'i thig
le sa bon la/ /thabs bzhi rlung gi gar thabs kyis/ /dga' ba'i tshad ldan nus pa bcas/ /dngos 'di lhan cig skyes par brtan/ /bde ba'i phyag rgya chen
po ni| |phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/ /bde ba chen por ro gcig phyir/ /ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas/ /bcud 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni/ /yon
tan kun gyi ngo bo bas/ /che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas/ /de nas rgyal pa rdo rje 'chang / /rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal po yis/ /
ma lus lhag pa'i lhar brlab phyir/ /gsung gi snying po brjod par mdzad/ /bruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ hUM badzra d+h+r-i ka /oM dzi na dzika /swaM rat+na d+h+r-i ka /oM A ro l-ika/

haM pra dz+nyA d+h+rika /muM d+hA ti shwa ri/ laM dwe Sha ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ byaM rA ga ra ti/ taM badzra ra ti/ k+ShaM ha rA dza ya/ traM a gar+b+ha ya/ hrI ha hUM pad+ma ba da ya/ dz+hiM ku ru pa na

hri| hUM lA s+yai sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /traM mA lai sa ma ya ho/ hrI gI ti ra go haM/ a nri t+yai rA ga ya mi/ me d+ha ra na swAhA/ th+l+hiM ni sa raM b+ha ya swAhA/ hUM swa ra dza ya swAhA/ muM shrI a raM

ga ya swAhA/ dza d+hu pe pra be sha /hUM puSh+pe a be sha /baM dwi pa su ki ni/ ho gan+d+ha tsit+ta/ hUM ya mAn+ta krita dza phaT/ hUM beg+ha nAn+ta krita hUM phaT/ hUM pad+mA na ta krita baM phaT/ hUM

pra dz+nyA n+ti krata ho phaT/ oM mahA badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM mahA rat+na d+ha ra mahA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM mahA pad+ma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la
ni phaT/ oM ma hA karma d+ha ra mahA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta hUM/ a a a badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta oM/ oM mu ne kriM swAhA/ oM mu ne hUM druM swAhA/ oM mu ne sruM
swAhA| oM mu ne praM swAhA/ oM mu ne shaM swAhA/ oM mu ne ye swAhA/ oM e ha hi b+ha ga wA na/ mahA ka ru NI ka tri sha ho/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM AHhUM swAhA/
ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM AHhUM swAhA/ oM sgyu 'phrul dra ba gnyis med pa'i/ /gsang ba zab mo sku
gsung thugs/ /gdod nas bdag dang dbyer med pa'i/ /da ltar nyid du dbyer med shog /oM badzras ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra sa ma ya ho/ /dzaHhUM
baM hoH/ /zhes brjod pas/ sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mdzes pa dag /gnyis med ro gcig 'dres nas kyang / /stong gsum
dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur/ /oM AHhUM swAhA/ muM maM laM paM taM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ trAM trAM trAM trAM/ d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri/ AHAHAHAH/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/
hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHrab ldan pas/ /gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/ /'brel pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / /rdo rje khro bo khro mo dang / /sgo bzhi
rab 'jam la sogs pa/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas par snang bar mdzad/ /'khor lo nyis brtsegs rtsibs su bcas/ /khyams dang sgor bcas lha yi rim//
rang rang phyag mtshan gdan dang bcas/ /bzhugs thabs tshul bzhin gnas pa'o/ /de nas rgyal ba de dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la/ /dbang
bskur byin brlab bya ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i sngags ni gsung bar mdzad/ /oM mahA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA a daR+sha dz+nyA na badzra

swA b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA pra t+yA be k+Sha NA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA sa man+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA kri ta a nu Sh+ThA na badzra
swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta

mahA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA a nu rA ga badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/
zhes brjod ye shes sku gsung thugs/ /rtse gcig thim par gsal bar 'gyur/ /tsit+ta 'og min 'bar ba'i gnas/ /rin chen 'bar ba rdzogs pa'i mdzod/ /
mi shigs thig le za ma tog /rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /tsit+ta'i khams lnga'i snying po la/ /bde ba'i thig le phra rags nyid/ /ye shes lnga yi
bdag nyid du/ /gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por brjod/ /gang de dwangs ma ye shes lnga/ /gang du mi phyed rdo rje gsal/ /dug lnga ye shes bskyed pa dang / /
btsun mo dga' bde'i ngo bor brjod/ /khams lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes nyid/ /rang byung ye shes bde ba'i thugs/ /rnam shes bzhir bcas thig le nyid/ /
thugs kyi sems dpa' nyid du bshad/ /de yis gang la dbang bsgyur ba'i/ /yul bzhi thig le bde ba'i bcud/ /sgyu ma'i bde bar gang 'char ba/ /
yul bzhi rim par bshad pa ste/ /dbang bsgyur gnyis med gang yin pas/ /yab yum 'brel ba'i ngo bor bshad/ /rtsa
bcud thig ler bcas pa'i rten/ /so so'i nus par bcas pa nyid/ /gang la de dbang de yi phyir/ /'di ni phyi yi rim par bshad/ /gang la khams
lnga'i bde ba yis/ /mnyes dang thig le bkod pa dang / /nam mkha'i ye shes gsal ba dang / /de nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te/ /zag med bde
ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mnyes par mdzad/ /dgug dang bcing dang mnyes dang gsal/ /thabs lam bcud du 'brel
bar gsungs/ /gang de thabs chen gsal byas pas/ /lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs/ /bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba/ /ma lus 'joms la
khro bo'o| |bcud las 'das pa'i hUM gsum nyid/ /byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /yul gsum bral bas chos kyi dbyings/ /ma lus rnam dag kun
tu bzang / /dwangs snyigs snying por 'brel pa yis/ /nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas pas/ /thig le btul nas bstan pa 'chang / /sprul pa'i sku ru bshad
pa yin| |kun kyang ye shes lnga yi ro/ /khyab par gnas pas rgyas btab cing / /snang srid bde chen sku gsung thugs/ /dran pa rtag tu gsal bzung ba'o/ /
de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /gsang rtse sna tshogs 'dus pa'i dbus/ /phyi nang rim pa'i dbu rtse can/ /ngo bo byin rlabs 'phags pa ste/ /yon tan byin
rlabs kun gyi gnas/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma'i rang bzhin du/ /rdo rje gnyis med thig ler blta/ /nyi zla zil ba'i thig le nyid/ /phan tshun 'dres pa rlung gis
phye| |gsang ba'i khams lngas ye shes rol/ /snyigs ma'i phung po lnga dag nas/ /dwangs ma lnga yi rang bzhin gsal/ /rgyal po de bzhin gshegs par
gsal| |gsang ba'i 'byung ba lngar bstan pa/ /dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes/ /rigs mchog yum gyi phyag rgya lnga/ /snyigs ma bral ba'i dus
na blta| |thig le thugs kyi bde ba rnams/ /rang rang thig le bde bar gsal/ /ye shes rnam shes dwangs ma rnams/ /bde ba chen po gsal bar shes/ /dam
tshig bde ba'i chas kyis sgeg /sgo gsum 'brel cing thig ler chags/ /gang du bde ba'i sgra bsgrags te/ /bskyod cing 'phro ba'i gar gyis mnyes/ /thugs
gang thig le brten pa'i gnas/ /gang yul bde bar dbang byed pa'i/ /rten dang bcas pa'i bde ba yis/ /rang rang thig le
skyed par byed/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /thugs dang thig ler bcas pa nyid/ /dgug 'dzin 'khyud cing gnas pa dang / /thig le
rlung dang bstod smad bsdams/ /bskyod dang 'bebs pa'i thabs yin te/ /tshim dang thig le dor ba dang / /ye shes gsal bas bde sems rgyas/ /rim
pa ji bzhin gsal bar brtags/ /gsang yul dbang po reg pa dang / /rnam shes gang yin ta krid de/ /bde ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas/ /rtag chad
mtshan ma bdag med pa/ /sgo ma'i rang bzhin gsang ba'i sngags/ /shes skyob don phyir gsang ba'i sngags/ /shes pa gsum 'das sgrib zad pa/ /rang
rig byed pa yid ces bya/ /rgyun gsum zad pa'i chos dbyings nyid/ /rtogs bya kun tu bzang mor bshad/ /'khor ba'i sa bon nyon mongs bcas/ /
zil pa'i thig sngon lam bzhin du/ /thabs sbyor thig le'i 'phro 'du yis/ /gsang ba'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston/ /sa bon thig le ma skyes gzugs
bstan pa rim pa gsum du bstan/ /'dod pa'i yan lag sum brgya dang / /drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pas/ /tha mal zhen pa rang grol nas/ /rdo rje ze'u 'bru
'brel bskyod pas/ /rang 'bar thig le gzugs su chags/ /yab yum lnga phyi thabs kyis gzung / /nyi ma zla ba shar ba'i 'od/ /rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis//
'khor ba'i mun pa kun bsal nas/ /ma lus lhan cig skyes par gsal/ /de nyid gsang bar shes par bya/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /bzhi
bcu rtsa lngar gnas pa yi/ /thugs kyi rang bzhin snying po nyid/ /rang rang mtshon pa'i rtags yin te/ /rgyas dang bsdus pa'ang de bzhin du/ /rdo rje 'khor lo ral
gri 'bar/ /dril bu pad+ma rin po che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rim bshad pa'o/ /gzhan gang gnas su rdo rje shes/ /dang po thugs dang g.yon 'khyud pa'o/ /rin chen myu
gu ral gri 'bar/ /pad+ma dkar po rdo rje che/ /ut+pal klu shing po ti ste/ /gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang / /pi wang gar sgyur pog me dang / /byug ba so so rim
shes bya| |nri mgo rdo rje thod rgya gram/ /lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta ho/ /'od 'phro mnyam bzhag rdo rje thal/ /ye shes rtse lnga chos khams dril/ /thugs la brtan
pa nyid du gsungs/ /thub chen nges par phyag gnyis shes/ /seg par go mtshon pi wang brdab/ /sgrom stob po ti chos 'chad
tshul| |me dpung bum par shes par bya/ /gzhan yang mthun pa skabs kyis brtag /mi mthun khyad par rgyas par bstan/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /rgya
gram dril bu brgyad shes bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' se gol/ /rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan so/ /pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri lce/ /rgya gram khu tshur go cha mche/ /
gzhan yang skabs dang mthun pa ste/ /rang rang don nyid rtse gcig pa'i/ /thugs kyi rtags su shes par bya/ /dwangs ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas/ /gcod
dang ma phyed dga' ba dang / /ma gos bde ba bskyed pa nyid/ /rnam par mi rtog rim par shes/ /yon tan bskyed dang tha mal gcod/ /de bzhin ma
gos ye shes nyid/ /so so yon tan cha las byung / /rang rang rtsa bcud thig le'i dbyibs/ /so so nyid ltar rang gnas te/ /bde ba'i thig le nyid
du shes| |rang byung dwangs ma'i thig le nyid/ /'brel ba'i tshul gyis kun snang ba/ /khu ba rtsa yi dbyibs gzugs nyid/ /rang rang las dang rtog pa
dang / /snying po phyag mtshan dbyibs bzhin pas/ /bde chen thugs su gsal brtan pa/ /thugs kyi dus su shes par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
pa'i| |thig le gsal ba'i rang bzhin las/ /thugs mtshan che ba'i ye shes nyid/ /dpag tu med par rang snang ba/ /bde ba chen po'i thig le'i 'od/ /ma
lus de der snang ba nyid/ /ma lus gnyis med thig le yi/ /bde ba chen po'i ye shes lnga/ /de las phye bas mtshon pa'i sgo/ /thugs kyi rang rtags bsam
mi khyab| |bde ba thugs las gzhan ma yin/ /gang phyir dkyil 'khor 'di dag kyang / /thun mong gnas su bsgoms pa dang / /mi shigs thig le'i snying po
las| |sku gsung thugs nyid gsal bar bya/ /don dam thig le pad rtse la/ /rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar bya/ /de nas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir/ /'bar
ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bshad/ /cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin gyis/ /rang snying rgyu yi sa bon hUM/ /dag pas rim pas gsal ba la/ /rang rgyud 'byung lnga
nyon mongs lnga/ /rang byung lnga ru snang ba'i phyir/ /'byung ba lnga nyid bsgom par bya/ /e yaMHraM suM keM raM/ so so las rnams byas nas ni/ /nam mkha' gru gsum
zla gam rlung / /khrag gi dpa' klong 'khrug pa dang / /gti mug ro dang nga rgyal ri/ /zhe sdang me nyid bsgom par bya/ /mdog kyang
rim par shes bya ste/ /las dang rang bzhin shes bzhin brtag /bruM las dur khrod gzhal yas khang / /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng dang / /bar khyams
gnyis ni sgo dang bcas/ /thod phreng sbrul gyi za ra tshags/ /zhing gi gdul dang ka ba ste/ /sprin nag dur khrod rgyan dang bcas/ /khro mo bdud rtsi lha mo dang //
thod pa lnga gsum rtsig pa can/ /nyi zla'i rgyan can bsam byas la/ /dregs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang / /dri za gshin rje bzhon par bcas/ /de bzhin
gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /cho ga las byung rim pa yis/ /gnyis med gsal bas de brtan phyir/ /dbang bskur byin
brlab rim bzhin bya/ /sbyor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis/ /gdug pa ma lus btul nas ni/ /rang rang rim pa gsal gyur nas/ /hUM gis phyogs phyogs
gdan la bzhugs/ /ha brgyad sa bon las byung ba/ /dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs/ /rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma/ /spos mo dang ni gtum
mo dang / /sme sha can dang ma tshogs ma'i/ /so so'i cha lugs rngam thon nas/ /sprul pa bzhi po la thim zhing / /rang rang las mdzad snying po sgrog /'dus te phyogs
phyogs gnas par bya/ /he brgyad sa bon las byung ba/ /stag dang seng+ge wa dang khyi/ /bya rgod kang+ka 'ug pa dang / /pho rog la sogs phra men rnams/ /'phro 'du
las dang phyogs mdog mtshan/ /rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin bsam/ /phaT bzhis rta dang phag gdong dang / /sbrul dang spre'u gdong rim pa bzhin/ /las dang
sku mdog phyag mtshan yang / /rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin/ /de dag 'khor lo dbus dang lnga/ /yab yum phyag rgya 'brel bar gnas/ /rtsibs mtshan
gru chad bzhi dag la/ /gnas kyi ma mo dgod par bya/ /bar khyams dang por phra men brgyad/ /phyogs mtshams rim par dgod par bya/ /sgo bzhir sgo ba
rngam tshul gnas/ /bar khyams tha ma dag la ni/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul nyid/ /rim pa bzhin du 'god
par bya| |rin chen thod pa'i dbu rgyan dag /gnas skabs dag tu 'tsham par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te/ /yan lag dkyil 'khor nyid du
bshad| |gang phyir nam mkha'i ye shes nyid/ /spros med dam pa nyid du 'dod/ /bde ba'i thig les kun khyab la/ /chos nyid snying
rje kun tu snang / /thig le rang snying sa bon rgyu/ /zag pa med pa'i snying po yin/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po can/ /thig le gong 'og kun dang 'brel/ /
gnas pa khong stong tshul dag gis/ /ma lus kun la khyab pa yin/ /dz+haM sgo g.yo ba'i sa sgo can/ /bskyod dang las kyis khyab byed pa/ /lus khyab gnas
dang las dag ni/ /khyad par so sor snang ba yin/ /de steng ti la ka'i rang bzhin/ /'bar ma brgyad dang ldan pa nyid/ /zhu dang 'bar ba'i las byed pa/ /drag
mo zhes kyang 'dod pa yin/ /thig le sgo nas 'dzag pa'i bcud/ /gsher dang 'dzag pa'i baM snying can/ /sdang dang 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin can/ /lus
can gnas pa gsal bar bya/ /gang la gang brten de yi rten/ /thig le rtsar bcas bde ba'i rten/ /de nyid bskyed dang gnas gyur pa/ /brten pas
sa yid dkyil 'khor nyid/ /'khor lo gzhal las rang bzhin te/ /rim pa gong 'og 'brel pa can/ /lus la gnas pas dur khrod de/ /kha dog rtsa
dang bcud bsdus pa'i/ /rgyan dang gdan du ldan pa yin/ /gang la brten pa'i thig le nyid/ /gnyis med bde ba chen po'i lha/ /sa bon yi ge bde ba yis//
sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa nyid/ /gcig kyang khams lnga'i bde ba'i ngos/ /ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /lus la thig le chen po gnas/ /
gnas dang bcud dang bde ba nyid/ /thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi/ /nam mkha'i ye shes dpag tu med/ /'jug pa bzhi dang rim pa brgyad/ /thig le
gcig gis khyad par 'phags/ /nyon mongs zad pas zad byed de/ /dwangs ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar nyid/ /yul dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin las/ /'bar
ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang / /gnas kyi thig le bde ba can/ /dur khrod ma brgyad gsang ba ste/ /gnyis med phra men nyid du bshad/ /thig le thabs
dang bcas pa nyid/ /dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i sgo dang 'brel/ /snying po thig le nyid du sbyor/ /gang dang lhan cig skyes pa las/ /bde ba chen po skye ba
med| |ma lus bde ba chen po nyid/ /khyab pa rgya yongs ma chad pa'o/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i bde ba'i ro/ /sa yang bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha'/ /rang byung
khyab pa chen po'i gzugs/ /kun 'dus thig le chen por gsal/ /rnam thar gsum ldan e yi gzugs/ /bde ba bskyod dang thig le
bskul| |'phro dang sdud dang bsdams pa'i rlung / /rdo rje pad+ma 'dus pa'i sa/ /rten dang bral ba bde ba'i sa/ /shu kra'i thig le gang gsher ba/ /gsang ba chu yi rang bzhin
yin| |de dag phyag rgyas gang sbyar bas/ /bde ba'i drod ni rang 'bar skye/ /bruM las gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang / /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma rtog /sna tshogs
'dus pa'i snying po can/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min te/ /yon tan rdzogs pa'i dngos gzhi can/ /dga' bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo dang ldan/ /'bab 'dzeg thig
le'i skas dang ldan/ /bde ba nyi zla rgyal la bzhugs/ /thig le 'dres pa bde ba'i ro/ /nyi zla 'brel ba bde ba'i lha/ /mthung dang rngubs pa'i thabs chen gyis/ /'khor
ba'i sa bon zad ces pas/ /za byed khro bor de bshad pa'o/ /dpag med thig le'i rang bzhin gang / /sa ya bcu gsum pho brang na/ /bde ba chen po ye shes
gzugs/ /sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig bzhugs/ /'du shes gsum ldan byin brlabs te/ /gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas/ /dbang thob rnams la rgyas
btab bo/ /gsang ba thig le chen po ni/ /rang byung bde ba chen po nyid/ /rnam rtog rgyu ba chad pa yi/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i bar na gnas/ /'og sgo snying po pad+ma ni/ /rgyal ba kun gyi
dkyil 'khor te/ /gsang ba sku gsung thugs nyid du/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gnas/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid/ /gnyis med bcud du gyur pa ni/ /
de yi bde ba chen po nyid/ /khyab pa'i tshul gyis gang bar bzhugs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho lhan cig skyes/ /gsang ba'i thig le bde ba'i ro/ /nyi zla 'dres pa'i tshul gyis
snang / /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad/ /de nas rgyal ba thams cad kun/ /gdul bya bsam pa'i khyad par gyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs
par| |rdo rje khro bor snang gyur te/ /bskyed cing gdug pa 'dul ba yi/ /drag po lha yi sngags dag dang / /de yi gzhal yas snang bar mdzad/ /bruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ dz+nyA na
kA pa la rat+na pany+tsa hUM| mahA de ba s+thi ra baM/ sUr+ya tsan+d+ra maN+Da la hUM/ de steng so so'i sku nyid dag /gsal ba'i rim pa dgod par bya/ /oM bud+d+ha mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da

sarba duSh+Tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan ta ka ha na da hA pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan
ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan ta kaha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma mahA shrI he ru ka ma hA
tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA kro d+hi shwa ri sarba duSh+Tan hUM phaT/ oM mahA badzra d+ha ra kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT /
oM mahA sUR+Ya rat+na mahA kro d+hi shwa ri bi da ma hUM phaT/ oM shrI sha ta sa men pad+ma mahA kro d+hi shwa ri kha hi hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha mahA kro d+hi shwa ri bi shwa hUM phaT/ oM badzra

gau ri ha/ badzra tsau ri ha/ badzra pra mo hA ha/ badzra be ta li ha/ badzra puk+ka si ha/ badzra g+hasma ri ha/ badzra sme sha ni ha/ badzra tsaN+Da li ha/ badzra si ha mu khI he/ badzra bya g+h+ra mu khI he/ badzra sring+gA

la mu khI he/ badzra sho na mu khI he/ badzra gr-i D+ha mu khI he/ badzra kaM ka mu khI he/ badzra kA ka mu khI he/ badzra u lu ka mu khI he/ badzra AR+YA ta dza teng dza/ badzra a mo khA hUM/ badzra lo ka baM/

badzra b+ha smi sa ma ya ba to hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ badzra ma nu rak+Sha si/ badzra h+ma Ni/ badzra rau tri/ badzra bai Sh+Na be/

badzra kau mA rI/ badzra in+d+ra ya/ badzra sU ra ye/ badzra ping+gi le/ badzra sau me/ badzra a mr-i tA/ badzra daN+Da nI/ badzra rAk+Sha si/ badzra bak+Sha si/ badzra ra ti haM/ badzra ru d+hi ro ma t+yaM/ badzra

e ka dza raM/ badzra na mo ha raM/ badzra sid+d+ha kaM /badzra bA ya be/ badzra ma hA mA ra Ni/ badzra ag+ma ye/ badzra bA rA hi/ badzra tsa muN+DI/ badzra pU ta nA/ badzra bA ru Ni/ badzra mahA ka la/ badzra
tsa ka lA/ badzra kum+b+ha kar+NA/ badzra lam+bo d+ha ra/ ru lu ru lu hUM/ e h+ye hi A na ya/ dza hUM baM hoHraM/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ /thugs
rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs/ /'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha
sa ma ya hoH/ /i li u li tA li ta pA li/ daMSh+TA g+ho na rau tri/ kha raM yo gi ni khA hi hoH/ /hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo raM/ gsang sngags drag po mthu yis ni/ /phyogs bcu tshig cing
rab tu tshig /kun tu rab tu tshig par 'gyur/ /'bar ba rab 'byams kun tu 'bar/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor khro tshogs kyis/ /gang zhig rab gang kun tu gang //
'khrugs dang rab 'khrugs kun tu 'khrugs/ /'thor zhing rab 'thor kun tu 'thor/ /'gul zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang la yi/ /sgra
bo che yang sgrog par byed/ /phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa/ /thul zhing brgyal nas myos gyur te/ /de dag bde bas bslangs byas te/ /bde ba chen po dgyes pa'i
gar| |phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' thug par/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs kyis byed/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rang bzhin las//
thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgyur/ /gdod nas thig le'i rang bzhin nyid/ /ma bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid/ /ma lus thig ler rgyas btab pa/ /nam
mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid/ /ma lus bde ba'i thig le nyid/ /khyab pa chen po'i rang bzhin te/ /mtha' dbus bral ba bde ba che/ /snying rje chen por brjod
pa yin| |kun gyi rgyu ni thig le ste/ /ma lus sa bon rtsa ba nyid/ /mi shigs snying ga'i pho brang nyid/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang / /nam mkha' lta
bu'i mtshan nyid de/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas so/ /nyon mongs gdug pa'i gdan khri nyid/ /gdul bya thub pa nyid du bstan/ /phung po nyon mongs lnga
dag pa| |rgyal po lnga yi rang bzhin te/ /rang snying dwangs mar bcas pa nyid/ /dbang phyug lnga ru brjod pa nyid/ /rnam shes yul du bcas pa nyid/ /rten dang brten
par bcas pa yi/ /bde ba phra men bcu drug nyid/ /phyi lta nang lta dkyil 'khor nyid/ /dgug dang 'dzin dang thig les bsdams/ /thig le'i rang bzhin gnyis
su med| |dbu ma'i thig le bcas pa'i lam/ /dbang phyug nam mkha'i dbang mo tshogs/ /dbab pa nye ba'i tshul bzung nas/ /thig le dbab pa'i thabs bzhi yis/ /phab
pas rang rgyud dngos po sreg /dran 'byung rig pa'i 'phro 'du tshogs/ /bde ba chen po'i don la 'jug /gnyis med thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar/ /sku gsung thugs
su kun gsal bas/ /gnyis med thim pas shes par mdzad/ /rang bzhin bde ba'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /rig pa nyams myong dbyings la thim/ /dran rtog 'byung
ba nyon mongs kun/ /tshig pa gsum du shes par bya/ /ye shes bde ba chen po nyid/ /'bar ba gsum du shes par bya/ /byang chub sems kyi bde ba yis/ /ma lus
gang zhig khyab par gyur/ /thig le gong 'og steng 'og nyid/ /thig le gong ma nyid 'og tu/ /'og ma nyid ni steng du 'bar/ /gcig gnyis lus kun khyab par
'thor| |lus dang rtsar bcas 'gul ba dang / /ldeg cing 'bar ba'i bde bas gang / /bde bsad dbang bsgyur tshim pa'i sgra/ /ma lus khyab par sgrog par
byed| |sku gsung thugs kyi b+ha ga nyid/ /bde ba chen po'i nam mkha'i dbyings/ /'byung bzhi rdo rje pad+ma nyid/ /reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba nyid/ /re dogs rgyu ba chad pa
nyid| |de bzhin nyid du blta bar bya/ /thig le 'dres pa'i bde ba yis/ /sa yang bcu gsum khyab pa'i yid/ /ma lus mkha'
ltar dri med pa'i/ /rang byung phyogs med kun tu snang / /thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis/ /'byung bzhi rim pa'i dwangs ma ste/ /sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags/
b+ha ga pad+ma'i snying po nyid/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bzhugs gnas bde ba chen po'i rten/ /sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod/ /phung po lnga dang nyon
mongs lnga/ /ye shes lnga yis zil gyis mnan/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni/ /bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid/ /thig le
phrad pa'i dus nyid na/ /ye shes lnga yi ro dang ldan/ /gdul bya 'joms pa'i khro bo lnga/ /'byung lnga dbang phyug rnam par bstan/ /myong dang yul bcas rnam shes
yul| |phra men nyid du shes par bya/ /phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sbyor ba bzhi/ /sgor bcas nyid du shes par bya/ /sgal tshigs 'jug pa'i thig le nyid/ /dbang phyug
bde bar shes par bya/ /gnyis ka phyogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /bde ba chen po spyan drangs pas/ /rtog pa bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jug /rim pa gnyis
med brda 'jal mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi thig le nyid/ /gnyis su med par thim par mdzad/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug pho mo kun/ /bde ba chen po mnyes par gyur/ /
sangs rgyas gang tshe snying po la/ /ma lus bde ba'i rang bzhin ldan/ /thig le gnyis med bde ba'i ro/ /ye shes lnga ldan zag pa med/ /phyi nang gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /
ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te/ /nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las/ /lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar 'gyur/ /sa ya bcu gsum gnyis 'dus pa'i/ /thig le rdo rje'i
rang bzhin nyid/ /gnyis med 'khril ba zhes bya ste/ /rang rig bde ba chen por thim/ /sangs rgyas rin chen de yi dbyig /kha sbyor snying po za ma tog /sku gsung thugs
kyi pho brang las/ /ma lus thig le gnas par mdzad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang ni/ /bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid de/ /rdo rje snying po rtsa dang 'brel/ /gnyis med
bde ba'i thig ler gnas/ /gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud yid de/ /gsang ba yon tan rdzogs pa'i mdzod/ /snying po'i lam la gnas
par bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i snying po la/ /rdo rje zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /gnyis med thig les gang ba yi/ /bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'char/ /brten nas 'byung ba'i rten
can nyid/ /gang la gang gis mnyam sbyor bas/ /thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi/ /bde ba chen po 'bar bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo
rje khrag 'thung nyid/ /rang rang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /gdul bya'i ngo la dgongs mdzad de/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad/ /rdo rje rdo rje dril bu
dang / /'jig rten 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs/ /de bzhin 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs/ /de bzhin 'khor lo dgra sta dang / /kha T+wAM rab tu 'khrol ba
'o| |nor bu rin chen rgyu zhags dang / /rdo rje dgra sta rab tu rdeb/ /chags mchog pad+ma chen po dang / /dril bu rnga yi sgra sgrog pa'o/ /las ni ral gri gshol chen
dang / /'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa ste/ /bar ma rdo rje dung mar 'khrug /sti ra chen po rab rdeb pa'o/ /btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo yang / /'khril bas pad+ma
rak+ta stob/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni/ /byis dbyug mda' gzhu rgyal mtshan dang / /byis snying rdo rje za rdeg tshul/ /byis snying dung dmar byis rgyu dang / /mgo
lus 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas/ /steng 'og phyi nang bsnol ba dang / /byis ldag khog pa dral zhing lta/ /rgyu mgo zhing khur rgyu gri dang / /rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa 'o/ /
lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu 'khrol bas slong bar byed/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes/ /rang gi stan
dang lag cha dang / /ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas/ /kun kyang mdzes pa'i rgyan dang bcas/ /zhal 'dzum steg mig 'khril tshul can/ /dbu skra ral pa lcang lo bcings//
sha da ba yi glu len cing / /dmar la rdul ldem chags pa'i tshul/ /snam zheng che la rked pa phra/ /nu 'bur stod smad bye zhing 'gying / /dmar la klan zhing 'dud tshul can//
gus dang steg pa'i ngang tshul 'chang / /so so'i gdan la 'khod pa ni/ /srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang / /tshangs ma dmar ser pad+ma bsnams/ /lha chen dkar ljang
tri shU la| |gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang / /gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phel/ /brgya byin dkar mo in+d+ra gdengs/ /rdo rje ser mo tsan+dan 'thung / /bdud rtsi
dmar mo pad+ma bsnams/ /zla ba dkar mo puN+Da rI/ /be con ljang nag dbyug tho 'phyar/ /srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'thung / /za ba ljang nag ba su 'dren/ /dga' ba dmar mo
ka tar 'chang / /stobs chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma/ /rdo rje ser mo spu gri gcod/ /'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs/ /nor srung dkar mo bum pa 'dzin/ /
rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar/ /gsod byed dkar mo ral gri so/ /me mo dmar mo gsal shing 'chang / /phag mo nag mo che zhags
can| |rgan byad dmar mo zhing chung za/ /sna tshogs dkar mo thod khrag 'thung / /chu lha dmar ser sbrul zhags 'dzin/ /rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin/ /rdo rje ser
mo ra mgo zhags/ /rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom/ /rdo rje ljang nag dril 'khrol 'gying / /so so brjid pa'i stabs ldan pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad
bya ste| |rnam par spro ba'i rgyas pa'i phyir/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang / /yon tan 'phrin las khro bo'i phyir/ /lnga bcu brgyad ldan bye brag lnga/ /sngags
dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang / /sku mdog bzhugs tshul rim pa dag /rigs rnams ji ltar 'gyur ba brtag/ de ltar bsam dang dres pa dang / /brjod dang mos
pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar 'tsham par bsgom par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes chen pos/ /rngam pa'i zhal gdams spyan zlog cing / /mche gtsigs
phyogs bcur gom pa yis/ /'jigs pa'i stang stabs gar mdzad sa/ /'jigs byed bcu ni rnam par 'phrul/ /oM oM oM oM oM oM oM oM oM oM/ ba ba ba ba ba ba

ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ hUM kA ra bi dza ya/ nI la daN+Da/ ya mAn+ta ka /Ar+ya a tsa la/ ha ya grI ba/ a
ba rI dzi ta/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ trai lokya pi dza ya/ ma hA ba la/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ 'di dag sngon du phyung ba yis
ri bo sa gzhi 'gul byed cing / /rgya mtsho ma lus 'khrug pa dang / /sngags kyi sgra chen grags par 'gyur/ /hUM mdzad rnam rgyal dbyug sngon can/ /gshed po gzhan
'joms rta mgrin dang / /mi g.yo bdud rtsi khams gsum rgyal/ /stobs chen khro bo 'di dag gis/ /rang rang bgegs kun rnam par gzir/ /ma lus 'jigs shing

'joms par mdzad/ /gardza gardza/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM
hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang / /blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bskal pa'i me ri nang rol du/ /bri 'am
