bsam mam dmigs bya ba/ /mthing ga dkar po mthing nag dang / /ljang sngon dmar nag dud ka ljang / /dkar ljang dud dmar mdog tu snang / /khro mo lus dang gri
mar gnas/ /'khor lo ni mgo rdo rje stir/ /drang srong 'bar bar bcas pa dang / /gshin rje'i rkang bzung zhing dbyug 'phyar/ /ral gri
gdan brel stir dbyug gshog /ba dan brgyad thogs be ra nyid/ /rin chen nri mgo gsum gyi dbyug /rdo rje rtse gsum nri mgo dang / /thong gshol gtun shing
g.yas g.yon thogs/ /yang na zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ /blo ldan rnam par bsams nas ni/ /bgegs dang gdug pa rnam par 'jig /pho brang 'khor dang rnam
par bsgom/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rang lus rten dang brten pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal bar brtag /lte ba snying ste sku gsung thugs/ /thig
gis cha chen cha chung bcas/ /gnas bzhi dngas ma 'byung ba ste/ /khog pa dur khrod gzhal yas khang / /ka ba gdung dang rta babs dang / /bla bre rdo rje ra ba dang / /
'khor lo dra ba dra phyed dang / /nyi zla skar khung rdzing bu dang / /skyed shing g.yas g.yon 'khor lo brtsegs/ /cod pan nyi zla pad+mar bcas/ /rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i
gzhal yas khang / /rang byung tsit+ta'i 'khor lo na/ /thig le ye shes lnga bdag nyid/ /ma lus thig le 'dus pa'i ros/ /cho 'phrul bstan pa'i gdug pa
'dul| |so sor 'khor lo dgod pa yi/ /ting 'dzin rdzogs pa'i tshul du bsgom/ /'byung bzhi dwangs ma yum nyid de/ /bde ba'i dwangs ma nam mkha'i khams/ /thabs dang
shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /rang bzhin khams lnga'i rang bzhin bcud/ /zla ba nyi ma gnas pa yi/ /shrA ri tsit+ta'i thig le la/ /nang gi gdug pa 'joms pa dang / /
spyod yul bde bar bsgyur ba dang / /thig le so sor dgod par nus/ /phye bas rim pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /bsdus pas thig le chen po nyid/ /thig le ye shes lngar ldan
pa| |thabs nyid dwangs ma yum du bshad/ /rnam shes thig le nyams myong nyid/ /tha mal 'joms pas khro mor snang / /gnas kyi thig le rtsar bcas pa/ /phra
men nyid du shes par bya/ /gnas bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo nyid de/ /sgal tshigs la brten bde ba'i bcud/ /'phro zhing sdud pa dbang phyug ma/ /gnas brten bcu yi thig
le la| |'joms pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed/ /nyams myong skye dang rnam pa med/ /spyod yul dag pas mang du bshad/ /zla ba nyi ma la brten te/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi lam brgyud de/ /thig le g.yo dang 'bar ba dang / /re dogs med par rnam par dran/ /bde ba'i yan lag bzhi ru 'gyur/ /'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya
bzhis| |rdo rje snying po'i pad+mar 'brel/ /bskyod pa rlung dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /nyi ma zla ba dus gcig 'char/ /de nyid kun tu khyab pa
las| |ma lus lhan cig skyes par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po gnyis med pa/ /kha sbyar srub po'i thabs las skyes/ /thabs las byung ba'i gsang thig le//
ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud kyi ro/ /rten las rten can nyams myong ba/ /lhag pa'i ye shes thabs las skyes/ /chos dbyings la sogs ye shes lnga/ /thugs
nyid mtshon phyir mtshan ma ste/ /gang la rten dang 'bar dang 'dzag /bde ba'i rlung dang nam mkha'i khams/ /de bzhin btsun mo dgyes skyed pa/ /mi phyed gnyis
med lhan cig pa/ /gang de thabs las byung ba yi/ /dngos gnyis yum dang dbang po'i tshogs/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le nyid/ /ma lus bde bar rang
snang ba| |gnyis med 'dus pa'i stobs las byung / /gnas yul phyag rgya'i thig ler bstan/ /dgug dang 'khyud dang bsdams dang 'bebs/ /ye shes 'jug
pa'i sgo yin te/ /sgal tshigs brgyud pa'i thig le'i rgyun/ /dbang phyug mar ni shes par bya/ /ba spu thig le 'brel ba nyid/ /phra mo bsam mi khyab snang ba/ /grangs
las 'das pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /bsam byas nam mkha'i zhing du sbyar/ /sku bzhi las byung gsang thig le/ /khams gsum bcud 'bus bde chen po/ /yungs kar lhun
med brten pa las/ /ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang / /thig le bde chen thabs sbyor ba/ /thob dang goms pa'i rang bzhin las/ /zhen pa'i 'du shes bral 'gyur
bas/ /rang dbang med pa'i rtags 'byung ste/ /sbar zhing mnan pa'i cho ga bya/ /snang dang rig pa sna tshogs chos/ /bde ba chen po'i thig ler brtan/ /nyi ma'i snying po
lta ba ltar/ /bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don/ /ma lus bde chen rgyan du snang / /de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /
ji snyed ma lus chos bstan pa/ /rang byung ye shes chen po ste/ /de nyid dngos po sna tshogs mchog /ji snyed brtan g.yo snang ba'i chos/ /chen po rags pa gnas pa'i
chos/ /ma lus kun la mthun snang ba/ /rang byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /de dag gnod rnam ma skyes pa'i/ /rdo rje shes rab stong nyid de/ /gang yang dngos min ngo bo nyid/ /
shes rab yum gyi rang bzhin no/ /ji snyed nam mkha'i mthar thug pa/ /rang byung byang chub sems kyi gzugs/ /ma lus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ /dpag med mthun par
snang ba ste/ /me long dang ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang 'brel ba bzhin/ /ma lus rigs pa'i thig le las/ /
ma lus sku yi dkyil 'khor snang / /ji snyed rab 'byams ma lus pa'i/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang / /zin dang ma zin gnyis ka'i sgra/ /nges pa dang ni ma
nges pa'i/ /'khrul dang ma 'khrul sna tshogs pa/ /brjod dang bsam dang 'phrul pa dang / /byin rlabs mtha' yas rang snang ba/ /byang chub sems kyi gsung mchog ste//
nam mkha'i sgra dang brag ca ltar/ /rang rgyud med pa'i rig pa nyid/ /bsam pa mtha' yas ji snyed pa/ /ma lus gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rang rgyud brtan po min
par gnas/ /gang du nam mkha' mtha' klas par/ /bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar/ /nam mkha'i char dang chu bur dang / /sprin dang chu rlabs phung po ltar/ /
ye shes bde dang sdug bsngal dang / /nges dang ma nges dam pa dang / /dman dang chags dang chags bral dang / /zin dang zhen dang ma zhen dang / /rnam pa rnam
med brtags pa'i chos/ /dran rtog rig pa gang yang rung / /ma lus rig pa rang snang ba/ /snga ma dran pa'i rnam pa 'am/ /rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams myong ltar/ /sna
tshogs snang yang rang rgyud min/ /gang yang rang rgyud kun bral ba'i/ /ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa rnams/ /rang rgyud med pas gzugs brnyan te/ /thabs dang shes
rab gnyis med pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rang byung ye shes skye 'gag med/ /ma lus mi phyed rdo rje'i gzugs/ /rnam pa mthar thug med
pa nyid/ |yon tan lhun grub rang snang bas/ /de yi brnyan pa rang bzhin 'char/ /mtha' bral rang byung dkyil 'khor ni/ /cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir/ /yang
dag brtag par mi gnas pas/ /ma lus gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor shar/ /bde chen rang byung lhun grub nyid/ /yon tan rdzogs pa'i nor bu ltar/ /dpag med
chos su snang ba'i phyir/ /bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan te/ /skye bo dag dang ma dag pa'i/ /gdul bya mtho dman rig pa la/ /rig spyad spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /dang
po nas bzung mthar thug par/ /rang rang bsam bde bzhin du/ /de dag ngo la de ltar snang / /gzugs brnyan phyi yi rim pa ste/ /thun mong yul du gyur phyir ro/ /ma
lus tha dad med pa yi/ /phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs pa'i lus/ /bcud ldan bde ba mdzad pa'i gnas/ /mi shigs thig le kun gyi dngos/ /rang nyid bde ba chen po'i
gzugs/ /dwangs snyigs 'brel ba'i nus mthu las/ /zag pa yod dang med pa yi/ /dngos po gnyis kyi chos su snang / /rgyu yi thig
le'i rang bzhin la/ /nus pa'i khyad par so so yis/ /'byung ba dang ni yum nyid dang / /bde ba chen po la sogs pa/ /thig le nus pa'i stobs las snang / /ma lus
'khor lo'i snying po nyid/ /thig le 'bar ba bde ba'i gzugs/ /rtsa yig bye brag bcas pa ni/ /bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ba/ /ma lus rten can dkyil
'khor nyid/ /ma lus snod bcud kun tu snang / /thabs chen gsang ba'i rim pa nyid/ /khams bzhi la brten thig le nyid/ /g.yo dang 'dzag cing gnas dang
thim/ /bye brag gsum las brgyud pa yis/ /gru dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la/ /zhugs dang 'thung ba'i spyod yul lam/ /me long dang ba'i ri bo yi/ /rtser phyin ma
lus bltas pa ltar/ /bde chen gzugs brnyan nyid du snang / /rim pa bzhi yi thig le nyid/ /bde ba'i 'du byed gang bskul ba/ /gnas bzhi'i thig le'i bye
brag gsal/ /mu tig phreng ba brgyus pa ltar/ /'dzag dang 'bar ba'i thig le nyid/ /til 'bru 'bras bu smin pa ltar/ /ma lus til gyi phung po ltar/ /thig
le'i lus su gnas pa yin/ /nyams myong gsal bar 'bar ba'i tshe/ /'dar dang rdul dang pa spu ldang / /'phar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i gar/ /rnam par rol ba'i
chogs su snang / /snang srid bde ba chen po nyid/ /tha mal nub cing brtan gyur na/ /thig le nam mkha'i stobs kyis sbyang / /rtse gcig nam mkha'i mthong stobs kyis/ /
thig le stong par thim pa na/ /ye shes nam mkha'i gzungs su nges/ /snang srid snod bcud ma lus kun/ /bde chen rig pa'i gzugs brnyan du/ /rgya mtsho mjings
nas bltas pa ltar/ /ma lus de ltar snang ba yin/ /rig pas nyams su myong ba dang / /spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad/ /rang byung bde ba chen po nyid/ /gsang
ba'i gang zag gdul ba dang / /gsang ba'i nyams myong mngon bstan phyir/ /thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi/ /cho ga'i bya ba kun ldan cing / /dbang bskur byin
brlabs sbyangs pa dang / /brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu dang / /drug cu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa yis/ /chu skyes snying po rdo rje can/ /nyi ma me shel 'od 'byung ba/ /rang byung
rlung gi phyag rgyas bskyod/ /nor bu chu 'dzag rang dbang med/ /ma lus rig pa'i thig ler bsdus/ /rgyu ba'i rlung ni chad pa na/ /rig pa stong pa'i thig ler thim/ /a ta
la rten thig le'i rim/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin las/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das par snang / /gsang ba'i thig le la brten pas//
ma lus bde chen 'khor los bsgyur/ /lus kyi thig le dang por te/ /de nas rig pa'i thig le yin/ /de nas ye shes thig le nyid/ /tha ma chos nyid thig
ler thim/ /de nas dus gsum 'du 'bral med/ /bde chen nam mkha'i khams nyid de/ /zab cing rgyu ba med pa yi/ /rang rgyud zhen chags kun bral ba'i/ /bde
ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan shar/ /ma rtogs khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan te/ /rtog par nyams myong gzugs brnyan nyid/ /mthar phyin ye shes gzugs brnyan
'di| |dman dang yan lag ma tshang dang / /dbang dang man ngag med pa dang / /dka' thub can dang ma smen dang / /skal med yal ba'i yul min pas/ /gsang
ba'i gsang chen dam pa nyid/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid/ /tha mal brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ /cho ga rgyas
par bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'dod kyang / /ji bzhin mngon du ma gyur la/ /lhag par 'di yis rtogs gyur pas/ /lhag pa zhes ni bstan
pa yin/ /gang gis gang la gang mtshon pas/ /lhag par mtshon pa nye ba dang / /gang la brten te gang bsgrubs pa/ /lhag par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir/ /'dis ni
lhag pa nyid du brjod/ /gang las gang de thabs 'di yis/ /mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /thabs dang gang gis mngon ston
cing | |dngos gzhi nyi ma yin pa'i phyir/ /gzugs brnyan nyid du bstan pa yin/ /gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis/ /de nyid 'dra bar snang ba ltar/ /ma mthong
mos pa'i gdul bya la/ /de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid de/ /dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan no/ /rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /dpag med ye shes lhun rdzogs
pa'i| |ye shes rang byung lnga yi gzugs/ /zag med gdul bya'i ngo la snang / /de yi yon tan gzugs brnyan gyis/ /zag bcas mos pa'i gang zag la/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi rnam pa nyid/ /'dra bar mtshon phyir gzugs brnyan no/ /gang phyir chos dbyings ngo bo la/ /tha dad dbye ba mi gnas kyang / /mos dang drag po'i dbang gyur te//
gang gis gang de mi 'dul bas/ /thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i phyir/ /longs spyod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan/ /zhen pa can dang nga rgyal can/ /thabs dang drag
pos tshar gcad phyir/ /de ltar so sor 'tsham pa ste/ /lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis su bshad/ /gang du bkra shis yid 'ong ba'i//
steng 'og phyogs bzhi bar mtshams dag /legs pas yid 'od bar chad med/ /phyi nang ri bo dgon pa'i mchog /rang gis gzhi legs brtags la/ /pra dang
nyams kyi ltas brtags la/ /ma dag mtshan ngan spangs byas la/ /dag cing nyams dga' blang bar bya/ /sa gzhi byin brlabs bkra shis pa/ /gal te rtsod pa zhi
bya'i phyir/ /snang dang mi snang bdag po la/ /mgu bas bar chad med par bslang / /gang de dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ /cho ga'i yan lag kun brtsams te/ /mchod dang
mnyes pas tshim byas la/ /sa gzhi bdag gi dbang du bya/ /thun mod skyon bsal dag byas nas/ /mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing / /dngos grub myur zhing
nyams dga' ba'i/ /phyi nang dag pa chen por sbyang / /rang bzhin byin brlabs kun gyi dngos/ /gdod nas ma bcos gnas pa la/ /lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med
pas| |lha dang gzhal yas ngo bor brlag /gang de'i bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /sprul ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal btab la/ /rdo rje khro bo'i 'khor lo spro/ /hUM
bzhi sngags dang bcas pas bsrung / /de dag legs par gzung ba'i phyir/ /ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad de/ /las kyi bya ba kun rdzogs nas/ /rgyal ba kun la
gsol btab la/ /'dod pa'i don rnams grub pa'i bang / /dngos grub gter du ming gis gzung / /gang phyir bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /ma dag pa dang ngan pa dag/
rtogs dang ting 'dzin cho ga yis/ /mnyam pas re dogs med par gnas/ /dkyil 'khor phyi nang bshad pa bzhin/ /tshad ni rjes su mthun pa ste/ /thugs kyi dkyil
'khor dam pa ste/ /yang na sor bzhi tshad du ste/ /yang na mdzub gang tshad du bya/ /yang na lus gang tshad du ste/ /yang na lus ni gsum bzhi nyid/ /yang na bco brgyad
nyid du'am/ /nyi shu lnga yi tshad du bya/ /yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad de/ /rang gi rig pa rjes mthun par/ /nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i tshad/ /tshad dang
ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ /yid 'ong byug bdug nyi shu lngas/ /mdzes shing legs par byas nas ni/ /gang dang 'brel ba'i cho ga brtsam/ /gzhan du longs spyod
ma byas pa'i/ /ras bal dur khrod rgyu las byas/ /gsar zhing grims la 'jur mdud med/ /byin rlabs lnga dang sku gsung thugs/ /thim pas ye shes thig skud de/ /rig
pas thig ni gdab par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /gsang ba'i 'phro 'du de bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor yid 'ong po
brang sa| |ma nor gsal bas thig tu bshad/ /gang gis gang mtshon de bzhin te/ /kha dog lnga dang phung po dang / /khams dang skye mched rnam shes sogs/ /ye
shes dkyil 'khor mtshon phyir ro/ /rtogs pas 'khor ba'i rgya dral phyir/ /tshon zhes kyang ni brjod pa nyid/ /ma mthong rmongs la ston phyir tshon/ /kha dog
nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am/ /lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya/ /pad+ma in+d+ra nI la nyid/ /rin chen lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /mkhas pas 'byor
ldan ci bder bri/ /yang na 'bras dang sA lu la/ /kha dog bsgyur bas de bzhin no/ /dman dang 'byor pa chung ba yis/ /'byung khungs lnga yis bri bar bya/ /thabs
dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /rgyal ba bcu nyid thim pa yis/ /ye shes rin chen phyi nang med/ /dag pa'i ngo bor blta bar bya/ /oM AHhUM swAhA/ sarba pany+tsa
rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ 'bru bcu spung zhing 'bun pa yi/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /zhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /ye shes rin chen rtsig pa
ste| |dra ba dra phyed rta babs dang / /rdo rje zla phyed 'dod yon dang / /rin chen sa gzhi skyed shing dang / /rdzing bu dril bu g.yer kas spras/ /rtag tu bri zhing bsgom par bya/ /
gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thod pa sna lnga sna gsum dang / /thod skam rtsig pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /tshangs dang lha dbang la brten pa/ /mchog chen brgyad
ni yin par 'dod/ /lhag ma rnams kyis thog phub ste/ /gza' brgyad nyi zla'i glo skar ldan/ /sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng ba nyid/ /dra ba dra phyed rnam par spras/ /phyi nang
rgyu 'bras gdug pa dag /gdul bya'i rta babs bzhir bshad de/ /sor phreng thod pa'i phreng ba dang / /dbang po nyi zla'i phreng bas spras/ /khro mo sha lnga bdud rtsi dang / /dur khrod
'dod yon ldan pa 'o/ /dur khrod sa gzhi khrag dang bcas/ /skyes bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad/ /rak+ta'i mtsho brgyad rab rlabs 'khyil/ /thod tshal brgyus
pa dur khrod rlung / /'jigs pa'i sgra dang me 'od ldan/ /zhing 'phen phyogs mtshams brgyad dang bcas/ /lha chen thod pa spubs steng na/ /tsit+ta'i tog las 'od
zer 'phro/ /he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /ma lus bri zhing bsgom par bya/ /ma lus 'gro ba'i re skong bas/ /rin chen phreng dang rgyan du ldan/ /mi 'jigs stobs sogs
kun ldan pas/ /stobs ldan theg par gnas pa yin/ /spyod pa skyon gyis ma gos pas/ /pad+ma 'bar bar mdzes par snang / /thabs
dang shes rab gnyis med pas/ /nyi zla mdzes pa'i gdan la bzhugs/ /bde chen don las mi 'da' bas/ /'khril sbyor dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /sku
gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs/ /yongs rdzogs sku yi rgyan du gnas/ /lam dang byang chub yan lag rnams/ /rdzogs phyir phreng ba la sogs tshul/ /
thugs rje 'khor ba mi gtong bas/ /chu srin klu phrug bzung ba bzhin/ /thugs rje bar chad mi mnga' bas/ /'brel ba bar chad med par gnas/ /brtson 'grus 'khor
pa spong ba'i phyir/ /ri dwags dag ni mnyan par gnas/ /zag med spyan gyis kun gzigs pas/ /dge sdig spyan gyis gzigs par bstan/ /ma lus zil
gnon stobs rdzogs phyir/ /bya khyung dag ni gnas par bstan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas shing / /nyon mongs tshad pa'i gdung sel bas/ /thugs rje
gdugs kyi 'khor lo bstan/ /ma lus gcig tu 'dus pas na/ /tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan/ /lha rnams so
so'i rnam pa ni/ /sku mdog sna tshogs bzhugs tshul dang / /gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyan du bcas/ /pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams/ /de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa
dang / /gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul nyid kyis/ /gtso 'khor phyi nang lta tshul gyis/ /bzhugs thabs rim pa so sor bstan/ /rang rang snying po gang yin pa/ /kha dog
so sor phye nas ni/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa yi/ /rim pa bzhin du gsal bar bya/ /rang rang thugs mtshan gang yin pa/ /kha dog dbyibs dang
bcas pa nyid/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/ /rim pa ji bzhin dgod par bya/ /gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yang / /dung chen ras chen la
sogs pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo nyid/ /rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod/ /de bzhin nyid la dmigs med de/ /stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid/ /
gang la rtog dpyod mi gnas pa/ /chos dbyings de bzhin nyid du bsgom/ /bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid/ /ye nas khyab kyang ma rtogs pas/ /phyogs med
snying rje nam mkha' ltar/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya/ /rang byung ye shes rnam pas ni/ /yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las/ /zhen 'dzin sbyangs nas
yig 'bru yi/ /'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rim gyis bskyed/ /bruM gyis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas/ /gzhal yas khang ltar yin par bsgom//
rnam pa'i gang yin de dag dang / /rang rig sa bon gnyis med las/ /'dres pas gang yin gtso bo nyid/ /bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas/ /'khor
yang mi phyed 'dres par bsgom/ /yongs rdzogs smin cing brtas pa la/ /dzaHhUM baM hos gnyis med de/ /'dod pa mthar thug bar du bsam/ /las kyi bya ba kun
zin nas/ /thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang / /kun bzang mchod pa la sogs pa/ /lha mo brgyad dang bcu drug gis/ /mchod pa'i rim pa brtsam par bya/ /rin
chen rnam lnga rta glang dang / /'bru dang bang mdzod khang khyim dang / /bu dang chung ma bran khol dang / /gnas ngang zhing dang na bza' dang / /rgyan phreng bza' btung longs
spyod dang / /rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang / /mtshe'u dang khron pa lu ma dang / /ri dang de'u dang skyed mos tshal/ /khor yug dang lhun po dang / /skye bo mang bo bro
glu dang / /nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi/ /mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par mchod/ /dpa' bo sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga/ /bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang / /sna tshogs
dri dang byug pa mchog /dag cing legs par 'bul bar bya/ /thar pa la sogs zhing gi mchog /dngos dang lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis/ /bsgrub bya ma lus kun bsgral te/ /
rdo rje zhing du bskyed par bya/ /lha mo mi mo rig pa mo/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin/ /dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba chen po rol mo yis/ /phyi nang nam mkha'i
khams bkang ste/ /rin chen lha mo yo byad dang / /reg pa nyams myong bde ba yis/ /rgyal sras zhing gi rdul snyed la/ /gnyis med dag pa'i tshul gyis mchod/ /rol
mo glu dbyangs bcas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya/ /rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa yis/ /mtshan ma legs par snang ba na/ /sbyang dang byin brlabs
dbang bskur dang / /mchod dang bstan pa'i cho ga dag /rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs bzhi ru/ /rnam bzhi las kyi me thab la/ /dus
bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis/ /lha bzhi tshul gyis mchod par bya/ /de nas gnang thob dbang phyug nyid/ /dkyil 'khor zhugs shing nus ldan nas/ /thugs rjes
'khor ba bsgral ba'i phyir/ /skal ldan slob ma gzhug par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che/ /mngon du mthong zhugs
bsod nams gang / /'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin no/ /gang du sku gsung thugs ldan pa/ /gang du mos pas spro bskyed phyir/ /rgyal ba kun
kyang 'phrul mdzad de/ /sgo gsum byin gyis rlob par mdzad/ /rnal 'byor cho ga rdzogs pas kyang / /gdul bya zhi dang bro ba la/ /so so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir//
sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa dag /bris dang brdung dang blugs pa dag /so so'i gnas su legs par dgram/ /ma lus sku gsung thugs dkyil 'khor/ /'di
las ma gtogs lha gzhan med/ /gang du dbang dang 'brel ba ni/ /bco lnga'i rim pas byin brlabs phyir/ /bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /yab yum
bco brgyad gnas par bya/ /bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil 'khor la/ /bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya/ /nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la/ /rgyas pa'i cho ga rim
par dgod/ /'di dag lugs dang 'bur dang bzo/ /bri dang bsgom pa dag kyang rung / /'di ni phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni//
thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /sor bzhi mdzub gang la brten te/ /phyi rol rnam pa'i rjes 'brang min/ /mthong dang brtan dang goms pa ni/ /rim pa bzhin
du gsal bas 'byung / /brgyud pa lam gyi rim pa yis/ /mthar phyin nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /dbang bskur thabs kyi rim pa yis/ /byin brlabs man ngag
yid ches bya/ /'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te/ /de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang / /thun mong tshogs la sbyar ba'i phyir/ /'byung lnga rgyu dang bdag nyid dang / /
mkha' dag byin brlabs so sor gdon/ /rang gi cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsod nams tshogs zhes bya bar bshad/ /gzhan
yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas/ /gang 'dod mngon du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /'chi med tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang / /mtshan ma pra yi dkyil 'khor dang / /dug 'joms
bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang / /cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa/ /gang bsgrub don phyir gang bshad pa/ /de nyid bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /las bzhi lha yi rnal
'byor gyis/ /rigs dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi la/ /thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can/ /'phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad/ /slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan
pas| |rdo rje lus su brtan bya'i phyir/ /rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa/ /sku gsung thugs su mngon gsal ba/ /rnal 'byor skal ldan spyod yul te/ /tshogs
kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mtshan ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /mthong bya don la sgrib pas
na| |de dag sbyang ba'i cho ga bshad/ /tha mal zhen pas brtags pa'i don/ /lhag pa'i bden gnyis rtogs bsgoms pas/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/ /sku
gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg dkyil 'khor lha yi mtshan ma dag /rnam pa ji snyed gnas pa dag /rang rig rnam par 'phrul pa nyid/ /mtshan ma thig le'i ngang du sbyang / /thig le rim pa'i
snang tshul te/ /phyi nang med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dngos dang dngos med kun sbyangs te/ /rang rig byang chub sems kyi me/ /phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la
sdud| |rnal 'byor las rung goms pa yis/ /gzhan don rtsom pa'i don byed na/ /dang por nyes byas gsum sbyang phyir/ /rnam gsum khrus kyi rim pa brtsam/
gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /bar chad bgegs dang dbral byas la/ /bkug bcings bstim la rnal du gzhag /bsrung dang byug bdug rgyan
gyis brgyan/ /'khor ba'i sa bon kun bkod de/ /las kyi cho ga thim pa dang / /dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du rim pa yis/ /'khor ba'i sa bon sbyang bar bya/ /de tshe
sdong bu gnas bkod de/ /sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi/ /snying po tshang par gdags pa dang / /gsol btab gnang byin sras su bskyed/ /'jug dang dbang bskur las
rdzogs nas/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te/ /las bzhi me yi las byas nas/ /rtog tshogs lha gsum dbyer med pa'i/ /rang rang gnas su dag pa la/ /sbyin
sreg glu bro gar gyis mchod/ /las kyi bya ba kun zin nas/ /thig le chen po'i ngang la bsdu/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /
ma lus byang chub sems nyid de/ /de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad dang / /dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun/ /tha dad dbye ba mi
gnas te/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rang byung mtho dman med pa yi/ /sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid/ /ma lus gzhi rtsa snying po ste/ /rang
byung byang chub sems la 'dus/ /de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba/ /dngos po ma yin dngos med min/ /gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med min/ /mtha' dbus cha shas
kun bral ba'i/ /zab cing yangs la rgya che ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ /rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pas/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems/ /
e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /skyes pa nyid las
skye ba med/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag /'gag pa nyid ni 'gag
pa med| |e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /gnas pa med las thams cad gnas/ /gnas pa nyid la gnas pa
med| |e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs/ /dmigs pa nyid na
dmigs pa med/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong / /'gro 'ong nyid la 'gro
'ong med/ /ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems/ /dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin du/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid/ /g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas pa yis/ /phyi
nang snod bcud ma lus pa/ /rang byung sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang / /bsam dang dmigs dang goms pa yi/ /sku
gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang / /lha dang lha min gsang ba dang / /sha za 'byung po mi 'am ci/ /grul bum yi dwags klu rnams dang / /rgyu ba'i srog chags ma
lus dang / /rtsi shing gel pa 'bras bu dang / /phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa/ /ma bcos don gyi lha nyid de/ /byang chub sems su khyad par med/ /lha zhes gzhan
du bstan pa yang / /tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zab/ /byang chub sems la gnyis med par/ /rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu bstan/ /snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin
gang / /gnas pa'i don dang ma phrad pas/ /ma lus snying rje'i gnas gyur pa/ /snying rje byang chub sems yin te/ /mi 'gal don du rab sbyor ba/ /kun rdzob byang
chub sems su rjod/ /ji snyed rnam par bcas pa'i chos/ /ma lus mtha' yas bstan pa kun/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te/ /nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji
bzhin du/ /sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med/ /de dag ji ltar gnas kyang rung / /byang chub sems las gzhan min yang / /thun mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad//
rang lus phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rang byung 'khor la drug gnas pa/ /g.yo ba yang gis bskyod byed pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi lus la gnas/ /'phen dang
sdud pa'i rang bzhin can/ /snyigs ma'i dus su'ang bde ba 'char/ /smin pa gru gsum smad na gnas/ /rnam thar sku gsum rtsa
mdud can/ /'bar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gnas/ /rang lus bde chen smin byed pa/ /de la gang rten bde ba'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gab tshe la//
thung du a snying lte bar gnas/ /'khrul zhing 'dzag dang gnas pa'i rtsa/ /rdo rje dbu ma'i lam dang 'brel/ /khyab cing rgyas pa'i snying po can/ /sum cu gnyis
gnyis rtsa yig ldan/ /d+harmA tsakra snying po'i gnas/ /rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad kyi dngos/ /dwangs snyigs shes pa brgyad kyi rten/ /rgyu ba bzhi yis shes
par bya| |dwangs ma 'dus pa'i thig le nyid/ /a la brten pa'i hUM gis sdud/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /bde ba mngon shes chos nyid la/ /rim
pas mthar phyin 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcu drug sgra sbyor thig le can/ /'dab ma A li ldan pa yis/ /ma lus sgra skad bdag nyid can/ /khyab pa gsung gi bdag
nyid can/ /sde tshan bcu dang ldan pa nyid/ /'byung 'jug gnas pa'i lam yin te/ /thabs dang shes rab bskul ba yis/ /bde ba 'byung 'gyur the tshom med//
sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor na/ /thig le de yi mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /ma lus 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cing / /lus can kun la khyab par gnas/ /kun gyi dngos
yin kun gyi gtso/ /ma lus kun 'dus gnyis su med/ /spyi gtsug 'dus pa'i snying po nas/ /rkang mthil gsang ba'i gnas yan chad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi
ka bas gzung / /snod bcud rgyud rnams rang bzhin bcud/ /dwangs snyigs 'dres pa thabs kyis 'byed/ /g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin/ /skad cig rim
pa skye 'gyur ba/ /khams lnga 'dus pa'i ri yi stobs/ /sems lnga rim pas shes par 'gyur/ /'di nyid gsum du bshad pa ste/ /skabs kyi rim pas sbyar ba nyid/ /
rtsa dang thig le bde ba yis/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul du bshad/ /de nas rgyal rigs rje rigs dang / /bram ze gdol pa gar mkhan ma/ /yid 'ong na tshod dar la
bab| |nus dang chags pa che ba dang / /bka' blo bde zhing yid mi 'khrug /lus ran sha mdangs dkar dmar phyed/ /skad snyan dran pas yid 'phrog ma/ /bco brgyad
bcu drug bcu bzhi dang / /bcu gnyis ldan pa'i bu mo la/ /sbyor ba tshang zhing rtags byung nas/ /tha mal spangs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa ya bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa'i/ /
gsang dbang 'dus pa'i khams lnga las/ /gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel ltar/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /nyi ma
zla ba rtse phrad pa'i/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i rtse 'khor lo/ /'byung 'jug gnas pa rlung dang 'grogs/ /ldang bas tha mal shes pa 'gag /g.yo bas nyams nyid
rtsa gcig pa/ /smon pas yid gcig 'dres pa ste/ /'jug pa dzaHhUM baM hoHste/ /shes pa bde bar 'jug pa nyid/ /gnas pas yun ring gnas pa ste/ /mthar
phyin 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis/ /brjod bral thig le'i bstan pa 'char/ /tha mal zhen pa nub gyur nas/ /zhen pa ldog cing rig pa thim/ /rnam shes brgyal
ba la sogs 'byung / /yid 'ong gzi ldan phyag rgya ma/ /mthong bas lus sems bde ba dang / /phrad pas sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur/ /'dres pas bde
ba brtan po 'byung / /thabs dang ldan pas spyad gyur na/ /skal bar sbyangs pas mi 'byongs pa'i/ /rnam rtog zhen pa log gyur nas/ /da lta bde ba chen por smin//
thob pa brtan 'dod rnal 'byor pas/ /mthong dang thos dang lhan cig gnas/ /'khyud dang 'phrad dang spyad pa yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes skye/ /dbang
dang mi ldan skal ngan dang / /dman pas mi rtogs yul min pas/ /gsang ba zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rim pa'i ting 'dzin
mthar phyin nas/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs ldan pa'i/ /tshom bu gsum par ldan pa yi/ /sum cu'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /gang du rgyas pa'i dbang gyur la//
rigs lnga ye shes lngar ldan cing / /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/ /bdun cu'i rim pa bsgom par bya/ /mos chung gsang bar spyod 'dod pas/ /tshom bu
gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ /bcu 'am yang na bco brgyad pa'i/ /tshom bu tha ma bsgom par bya/ /'dir ni dkyil 'khor kun 'dus pa'i/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo
bsgom par bya/ /gang du gdug pa 'dul ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor rim pa de bzhin te/ /rim pa bsgyur ba'i khro bo ni/ /rim pa ma 'dres tsam du bsgom/ /rnal 'byor
yo byad tshogs pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin spyod tshogs pa/ /ma lus tshogs pas tshogs zhes bya/ /dang por dad dang brtson 'grus dang / /dam tshig
lta sogs sngon song zhing / /rim bzhin ting 'dzin mthar phyin pas/ /nus pa yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /skal ldan drod tshad mnyam pa'am/ /mi ldan 'phro 'du
sbyangs pas 'grub/ /rab tu dben zhing yid 'ong ba/ /ri rtse gsang 'dabs chu gling ngam/ /dur khrod ri bor nags 'dabs te/ /skye bo
'dus dang rnam bral zhing / /bar chad bral ba'i sa phyogs der/ /rnal 'byor rgyal po lta bu'i phyir/ /rin chen yid 'ong mdzes brgyan pa'i/ /'khor khang phyi
nang bar ldan pa/ /'chags sar bcas par brtsam par bya/ /rnal 'byor pho mo grangs mnyam pa/ /lta spyod ting 'dzin dam tshig tshang / /bro gar 'dus 'phro yo
byad dang / /glu tshig sgra yi yo byad dang / /bza' dang btung ba'i yo byad dang / /rgyan dang bgo ba'i yo byad dang / /A li kA li mnyam sbyar zhing / /nyi zla brtsegs
pa'i ngo bor bzhugs/ /lha dang mi dang yo byad dang / /gnas dang spyod pa kun tshogs pas/ /de dag tshogs su bshad pa yin/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel
gyur nas/ /yab yum gsal ba'i ting 'dzin la/ /mtha' thug med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/ /nam mkha'i char bzhin kun bkug la/ /yab yum gnyis med
'dres pa la/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs rgyan btags te/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang / /bza' btung lnga la lnga rol zhing / /'od kyis ma lus tshim pa dang / /
'gro mang bde ba thob par bya/ /bro lnga gar lnga stabs tshig lnga/ /bro gar rtse 'jo brjod pa yis/ /rigs kyi 'od zer 'phro 'dur gsal/ /'gro ba'i phyi nang mun bsal te/ /
rig 'dzin sa nas sa ru sbyang / /glu lnga chig lnga rigs lnga yis/ /phyogs phyogs bltas te brjod pa ni/ /'gro ba kun gyis bde thob cing / /chos kyi dung chen sgra
yang sgrog /phyi nang rgyan gyi yo byad ni/ /rin chen ze'u prog rna cha dang / gdub rkang gdub mgul to dang / /na bza' rgyan gyis gang brgyan pas/ /yid 'ong ting
'dzin gsal ba dang / /'gro bas blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ /rlung dang nus pa'i stobs ldan zhing / /sgo gsum bag chags zad 'gyur te/ /byin rlabs rlung la
dbang thob pas/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyar ba/ /bcu drug rdzogs pa'i dus sbyar bas/ /bdag po gdung can phrang pa'i tshe/ /nyi zla dus gcig shar ba'i tshe/ /thun mong
thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /spyod yul nus pa kun bzlog nas/ /mthong lam rang gi mtshan nyid skye/ /zla ba'am zla phyed dus mtshams sogs/ /bde chen nyams myong
rgyun mi 'chad/ /mthong ba'i don la mnyam bzhag pas/ /brtan zhing nges pas gdeng du gyur/ /sku ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bde chen zag med ting nge 'dzin/ /bskal
pa brgya phrag stong du yang / /bde ba chen po rgyun mi 'chad/ /sprul pa'i longs spyod mdzad pa yis/ /'jig rten khams mang 'gro ba dang //
de tshe 'gro ba'i dbyings su sbyor/ /rdo rje lus thob de phyin chad/ /skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung yin/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang sgyur rigs kyi
dam pa 'grub/ /de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis/ /ye shes thig le de nyid la/ /ye shes thig le nyid snang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /gang
zag rim par 'jug pa rnams/ /dang por dngos don mthong ba yis/ /tshe 'dis sa la bgrod bya zhing / /bsam byas lhun grub nyid thob phyir/ /lta spyod ting 'dzin
rim 'brel bas/ /bar chad med pa'i lam la 'bad/ /gnas skabs rim pa ji snyed kyang / /tha mal pa dang log spyod dang / /mos pa la sogs yul min te//
nus dang grub pa thob pa yis/ /gsang ba lam dang 'brel par bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po lnga la gnas/ /rim nas rim par brtan gyur te/ /gsal ldan me
g.yo thob pa la/ /nyam pa med pa'i stobs ldan pas/ /pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te/ /spyod pa so so gnas pa yis/ /rtsa ba spros bcas rnal 'byor te/ /sgrub
pa dus kyi tshogs la gnas/ /yan lag tshogs kyi spyod par gsungs/ /gang phyir dkyil 'khor nges bstan pa/ /rang rig mtha' dbus med pa dkyil/ /ye shes
bzhi 'phros 'khor lo'i tshul/ /'jig rten 'das pa dkyil nyid de/ /'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du bshad/ /rig pa'i don nyid dkyil nyid de/ /cho 'phrul rang byung
'khor du gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de/ /rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang / /khro bo khro mo 'khor du bshad/ /lha yi ting 'dzin dkyil nyid de/ /spyod pa
yo byad 'khor du bshad/ /gang la gang gis rgyas btab pa/ /goms dang rtas pa'i dbang gis na/ /ji ltar snang grags chos thams cad/ /de dang de yi ngo bor
'gyur| |rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor ma lus par bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas
gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dbang bskur cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /thabs kyi sa la sbyor byed pa'i/ /rtog pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gsang chen po//
ma lus pa yi rgya mtsho nyid/ /rgyal ba kun gyi spyi gzugs te/ /'khor tshogs ye shes rgya mtsho la/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lhan cig tu/ /ye shes lha mo la
brten nas/ /ye shes chen po'i dbang bskur bas/ /gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang chen 'gyur/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dbang phyug gis/ /dang po
nas bzung bcu pa'i bar/ /ting 'dzin 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rig pa'i lha mo la brten nas/ /ting 'dzin chu bos dbang bskur bas/ /sa dang ye shes
zhing khams dang / /rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i rim par 'phel/ /mthong lam rdo rje sku thob pas/ /nges 'byed nyams ldan rnal 'byor la/ /rig pa nyams kyi dkyil
'khor du/ /rig pa rtsal gyis gzungs brten nas/ /zag med rdo rje sku la sbyor/ /rig pa brtan thob rnal 'byor pas/ /las dang skal ldan rnal 'byor la/ /
lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor du/ /rig ma'i phyag rgya mdzes ma la/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs brten byas nas/ /cho ga thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing //
brgyud pa dbang gi man ngag gis/ /sbyor ba nyams len rnal 'byor thob/ /ye shes rgya mtsho blo ldan zhing / /thugs rje rgya mtshos 'gro ba skyob/ /dam tshig
dbang dang rig pa drod/ /rim par brgyud pa'i dbang thob cing / /dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang / /rkyen thub sa bon gzi brjid che/ /las dang bya ba ma rmongs
shing / /ma yengs brtson 'grus bar chad med/ /ri dwags rgyal po seng+ge ltar/ /gzi chen gzhan gyi nyam nga med/ /byin brlabs 'dus pa'i nus pa can/ /tshig
dang bden pa'i byin rlabs 'grub/ /de yis dbang bskur cho ga brtsam/ /dad dang dam tshig ldan pa dang / /snying rje che la slob la brtson/ /brtson 'grus shes rab phun
sum tshogs/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /thos bsam sgom la rab gnas pa'i/ /'gyur med brtan pa'i bsam pa yis/ /tha mal bsam pa spangs byas
te| |bla ma la ni de bzhin gshegs/ /'dul dbang thabs mkhas bsam par bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas nges kyang ni/ /snying rjes nad pa bzhin bsam zhing / /skyon dang
mnar dang slu sems spang / /rang rang nus pa ldan pa dang / /bdag gzhan don nus brtson 'grus ldan/ /brtul zhugs gsum dang rab ldan zhing / /dngos grub
don du gnyer ba yi/ /gsang chen rigs su nges pa dang / /gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur na/ /dbang dang man ngag sbyin par bya/ /ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa
mod| |ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i tshul/ /tsan+dan dri bsung ldan pa'i ri/ /bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi/ /ri bo dgon pa
yon tan gnas/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i dgon pa der/ /rnyed dang der ni gnas par bya/ /sa bcu mthar phyin gang zag la/ /zhing khams
mtha' thug med gnas su/ /rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ /ye shes lha mo la brten te/ /skad cig ye shes dbang bskur bas/ /bco brgyad yon tan lhun
grub pa| |skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs te/ /pad+ma spyan gyi sa la gnas/ /yi ge 'khor lo sa la smin/ /bdag gzhan 'byed pa med pa yi/ /bde chen phyogs ris
med par dgongs/ /'phel 'grib med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ /gzhan don yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ /sa thob goms brtan skyes bu la/ /ting 'dzin rig pa'i pho
brang du| |rgyal tshab skyes bu mtha' dag gis/ /rig pa'i lha mo na so med/ /rig bral ting 'dzin stobs las grub/ /de la slob mas nges bstan nas/ /ji
ltar chu la ji bzhin du/ /ting 'dzin byin rlabs dbang bskur bas/ /rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni/ /nyams myong dbang du rang shar te/ /thob dang brtan dang goms
pa yis/ /'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu/ /'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs te/ /skad cig nyid la rag las pas/ /rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyal
por bshad/ /lam zhugs rigs phyed rtags thob la/ /slob dpon mthar nye lam gnas pas/ /rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs par/ /rdo rje thig tshad sbyor brjod
pas| |phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs/ /sna tshogs rig pas dbang bsgyur ba'i/ /sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil
'khor du/ /stobs ldan bu mo la brten te/ /thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje tshe la dbang thob cing / /cho 'phrul mngon shes ldan par 'gyur/ /dang po yon
tan kun ldan pa'i/ /rigs su nges pa'i bu mchog ste/ /dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa yi/ /mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rigs can la/ /drod ldan gnang zhing dbang thob
pa| |rgyal po lta bu bla ma yis/ /lhag pa gzugs brnyan byin ldan du/ /dad mos brtson 'grus 'jug pa yi/ /mi ldog dang brtan tshul gyis bzhugs/ /dbu rgyan
cod pan phreng ba dang / /gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang / /go cha phyag rgya rgyal mtshan dang / /snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba/ /rang bzhin ngo bos gnas tshul
na| |rdzas thabs ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas/ /nus pa'i byin rlabs mngon shar nas/ /theg chen rdo rje rigs su 'gyur/ /de nas skal ldan slob ma des/ /tha mal 'du
shes kun bzlog ste/ /rang rang lhar bcas gsal ba la/ /nus pa'i tshad dang nyams sbyar nas/ /nyan pa'i dbang dang sgom pa dang / /'chang
dang 'phrin las byed pa dang / /rdo rje rgyal po slob dpon dbang / /rang bzhin ngo bos gnas pa la/ /ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang / /'bras dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur
bas| |mi nus pa thob pa'i tshad/ /mi nus pa la bskur ba min/ /tshad ldan rnams la rim par bskur/ /rig ma las kyi phyag rgya mo/ /bcu drug bco brgyad
ldan pa yi/ /dri zhim yon tan ldan pa la/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bcud 'dus pa'i/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rtsa 'khor lo/ /ye shes
lnga yi ro ldan pa/ /thabs dang shes rab snod kyi mchog /thabs gsum tshul gyis rtser bstims pas/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kun/ /yungs kar
tshad tsam rdo rje sems/ /rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las/ /gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te/ /rtsa bcud thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /mar me 'od ltar gsal gyur
pas| |bde chen nyams dang rtags thob pa/ /de ltar nyid 'byung the tshom med/ /rdo rje'i nyi ma rab ldan pa'i/ /bcu bzhi bcu drug rab lon pa/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i
yon tan nyid/ /byin rlabs rig ma lha mor byas/ /chags pa skyed pa'i thabs rnams nyid/ /blo dang ldan pas mngon sum bya/ /de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas/ /bla mas
gnyis med gtad bya'i phyir/ /byin rlabs sbyor ba byas nas yang / /gnyis ka'i srin lag bzung nas ni/ /slob ma 'di la legs gtad la/ /gsang ba'i gnang ba
sbyin par bya/ /skyes bu 'di bzung bzang ba yin/ /de ring phan chad bu mchog khyod/ /sgo gsum lha ru mnyam sbyor bas/ /tha mal dman pa'i lta ba spang / /bde ba
chen po nyams myong bas/ /dka' thub theg pa'i lta ba spang / /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /bde ba'i nyams myong brtan par byos/ /brtan pa bar chad med pa
bsgom| |rdo rje 'chang gis la 'gro/ /de bas skal ldan rigs bzang kye/ /gtan du 'bar bar ma byed cig /sbyor ba'i thabs dang ting 'dzin dang / /rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang
thob pas/ /thig le'i las la thogs pa med/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid/ /sa yang bcu gsum gnyis
ldan pa| |nyams myong brten cing gnyis med sbyar/ /rlung gis brten pa'i thig le nyid/ /ro gcig dus mnyam tshul byung ba/ /drag pa ma yin dal ba min/ /dgongs
pa nyams dang zhen chags min/ /A li kA li zhu ba'i sems/ /sangs rgyas phreng ba gnyis su med/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab bskyod cing / /'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya
las| |nyi zla rtse phrad 'byor pa na/ /byed pa rlung gi thig le gzung / /rgyu ba gcad cing thig le mnan/ /shes pa nam mkha'i ngang la gtad/ /dbang po shes rab che chung gis/ /lan
gsum brtan par gyur pa'am/ /ma thob bar du sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje zla 'od mdzes ldan ma/ /dman dang rigs ngan rnam par spangs/ /rdo rje dbang pos ma phog cing / /gzhan dbang
longs spyod ma byas pa/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bco lnga'ang rung / /thabs dang zas dang spyod lam gyis/ /bsnyen pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya/ /rdo rje lce dang srin lag dang / /srin lag bcos
ma la sogs pa/ /thabs dang byug pa'i yan lag gis/ /gsang ba'i pho brang rgyas par bya/ /'khor ba zil gnon rtsa rnyed nas/ /bdag po dung can rnam par sbyar/ /thig le myur bul rtags
byung nas/ /rgyu ba rlung gi tshad du zung / /nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la/ /'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen po/ /myong bas chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob/ /gal te rtsa dang bral pa na/ /phaT
dang ldan na 'phro bar 'gyur/ /dwangs rlung mnyam pas zin par 'gyur/ /bzlog pa 'dren pa'i hUM gis shes/ /sdud pa'i hUM gis bsdams gnas pa/ /thig
les lus la khyab par byed/ /dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste/ /gnyis pas nus pa skyed pa yin/ /gsum pas nyams myong skyed pa yin/ /bzhi pas de nyid brtan
par byed/ /lnga pas brtan pas nyams blangs pas/ /mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'grub/ /rdo rje slob dpon gnang thob ba/ /nus ldan rab gnas cho ga brtsam/ /
de nas slob ma tshul bzhin gzhug /sgo gsum nyes pa kun bral ba'i/ /sdom pa'i dam tshig phog byas la/ /dbang bskur rim pa sbyin par bya/ /dbang gi nyams
myong brtan bya'i phyir/ /gdams ngag rjes mthun sbyin par bya/ /gdams ngag nyams brtan lam rim ste/ /lam mthar phyin pa 'bras bu nyid/ /drod mthar phyin dang
sa brgyad dang / /grags chen sangs rgyas sa dag la/ /rang rig rtags dang thugs rje yis/ /'dren stobs mkha' 'gro gsum du snang / /mkha' dang sgra dang gzugs
can gyi| |pad+ma can zhes grags pa yi/ /sbyor dang glu dbyangs snang ba dang / /gzugs tsam brtan pas grol bar 'gyur/ /dbang bskur rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /ma bcos
rdo rje dbyings dkyil 'khor/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yan lag ste/ /sgrub dang gdug pa gdul phyir yin/ /dang la rtsa ba'i dbang thob nas/ /phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
dbang thob bya/ /gdul bya mos pa'i dbang brtsan la/ /thun mong tsam du nges pa med/ /dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag /rdo rje sems
dpa'i dbang bskur yin/ /bzhi pa dang ni lnga pa nyid/ /he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa'i/ /ma nor lam ston slob dpon
la| |mnyes dang bkur bar mi byed cing / /rang rang nus shing 'jug pa la/ /dbang bskur gnang ba ma byin par/ /gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang / /sgom
dang sgrub pa la sogs pas/ /bskal pa bye ba dpag med du/ /'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ /dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni dam pa kun
brnyas pas/ /nad dang sdug sngal mang po dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe/ /de nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /byin rlabs ldan pa'i bla ma
yis| |dad brtson brtul zhugs rab ldan pa'i/ /rigs nges skyes bu mchog nyid la/ /thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na/ /rgyal ba dang ni mkha'
'gro dang / /rig 'dzin grub pa pho mo yis/ /tshe 'dir bsam pa kun skong zhing / /byin rlabs dbang dang dngos grub kyi/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por
'gyur| |gang gis gang la dbang bskur bas/ /tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang / /bde chen lam la mngon zhugs pas/ /dngos grub gang la thogs med de/ /las rnams
gang brtsam 'grub pa dang / /'dod pa'i don la rol pa yis/ /sa bcu rim pa mthar phyin nas/ /pad+ma spyan gyi sa thob ste/ /yi ge 'khor los la gnas/ /sku gsung
thugs dang yon tan las/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun grub pa/ /dbang gi 'bras bu rang las shar/ /thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na/ /bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /brtson
pas 'bras bu tshol byed pa/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu stong par 'gyur/ /gang phyir slob dpon slob ma dang / /dkyil 'khor rim pa ji bzhin du/ /las dang ting 'dzin byin
rlabs kyis/ /'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen po/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam chen po/ /
ma lus cho ga rgya chen po/ /dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi /'jug pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du/ /gsang ba kun la shes par bya/ /rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis/ /cha byad gus ldan
mdzes pa yis/ /me tog ldan pas 'khor lo nyid/ /mngon byas sku gsung bskul pa yis/ /dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
du| |gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /rdo rje slob ma byin brlab phyir/ /slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya/ /de nas slob ma 'jug
bya ste| |khrus byas dri zhim gos bzang gon/ /dad dang gus ldan rin chen bcas/ /gus bcas snyan pa'i tshig gis ni/ /lus dbul dag pa'i sems kyis
gnas| |bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bar chad sbyor bsal srung ba bya/ /cho ga gang yin lhar bskyed la/ /mtshan ma rdzogs par nan tan bya/ /rgyal ba kun
gyi dam tshig lnga/ /'bru gsum sku gsung thugs ldan sbyin/ /snying gar rdo rje brtan byas la/ /dam tshig legs par dbog par bya/ /tsan+dan dkar dmar byin
brlabs chu/ /lan gsum blud la snod dor ro/ /de nas rang gis dam bsgrags te/ /gsang ba'i don la nges par bya/ /rang rang 'brel pa'i lha nyid la/ /rin chen dor
te brtag par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la/ /bstims la dbyer med gnas pa la/ /rtag tu byin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir/ /legs par
brtan pa'i cho ga bya/ /mi shes rab rib bsal byas la/ /'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya/ /de nas lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dag pa rim gyis brtan par bya/ /
de nas bla ma sangs rgyas la/ /ma lus ci yod dbul bar bya/ /byin brlabs cho ga dag pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor mchod dang bsgom pa dang / /zhugs pa'i yon tan bsam
mi khyab| |rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /des na rigs su nges pa yis/ /dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan/ /rtsa ba yan lag kun thob nas/ /rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur
ro| |de nas bla ma'i bka' mnos la/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba ma lus
pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dam tshig bla na med/ /sdom pa brtan po dam bcas pa/ /'di dag legs par
bshad par bya/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /'das dang ma byon dus gsum du/ /rgyal khrims tha tshig bkas bcad ltar/ /rim pas dmod bor bkas
bcad pa'i/ /byin brlabs rang bzhin 'da' dka' ba/ /kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad/ /gang phyir dam pas byin brlabs pa'i/ /dam tshig chen po 'di nyid la/ /
'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dang / /rig 'dzin rnams dang mkha' 'gro dang / /lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang / /klu dang mi min 'byung
po'i tshogs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha chen kyang / /dam pa 'das pas 'tshig par 'gyur/ /dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di/ /rgyal
ba kun gyi dgongs pa la/ /sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams/ /log par spyad pas tshig par 'gyur/ /dam pa rnams kyis bkas bcad cing / /byin brlabs
dmod por rang bzhin 'grub/ /dam pa 'di las gang 'da' ba/ /rdo rje can yang 'tshig par 'gyur/ /dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la/ /dbang dang byin
rlabs thob pa yis/ /dam pa'i tshul bzhin nges spyad na/ /mi mthun phyogs rnams 'tshig par 'gyur/ /de phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis/ /dam tshig ces
ni rnam par bsgrags/ /bla na med pa'i dam tshig ni/ /ma lus rang rig byang chub sems/ /mtha' dbus 'gro 'ong las grol ba/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid
de| |gang gis don rtogs gnas gyur pa/ /don dam byang chub sems su brjod/ /ma skyes byang chub sems nyid ni/ /skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid snang ba/ /rang lus
rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /ma lus der snang ngo bo gcig /rang lhar sgo gsum gsal rtogs pa/ /kun rdzob byang chub sems su bshad/ /gsang ba bshad
dang dbang bskur dang / /man ngag lung dang nyams chag skong / /mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa/ /dngos grub ster zhing grog byed pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa'i
phyir| |skad cig gdung ba nyams mi bya/ /rang gi lha dang gnyis med nas/ /phyag rgya bzhir gsal rnal 'byor pas/ /rang gi sgo gsum ma nyams par/ /chu bo lta bur bar
chad med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /theg chen gsang ba nyid yin pas/ /snod med dman sogs log pa la/ /gsang bcu la sogs brjod mi bya/ /dang por
gsang bar sgrog gcig pas/ /byang chub snying por mi 'bral bas/ /rang srog rang gis gcod kyang bla/ /brtse gdung dam tshig bral mi bya/ /lam dang sgrub pa'i rtsa ba dang / /
dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba dang / /'di dag nyams na kun nyams pas/ /rtsa ba zhes su bstan pa yin/ /yan lag thun mong dam tshig dang / /thun mong min par bshad par
bya| |dang por gsang ba'i lung thob nas/ /nus pa mngon du snang bar du/ /bdag dang gzhan gyir thun mong gi /'gal dang sgro skur kun 'das shing / /kun dang bsam pa
dga' byed pa/ /thun mong dam las mi dag la ba/ /thun mong dam tshig yin par bshad/ /thun mong ma yin gang zag gis/ /thabs chen thun mong ma yin pa/ /nyon mongs lnga
dang spyod pa lnga/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang shes pa lnga/ /grub pa lnga yi chos rnams nyid/ /skyes bu rigs phyed spyod yul te/ /thun mong rnal 'byor
yun min pas/ /thun mong ma yin zhes su bshad/ /dang po nas bzung rtags thob bar/ /rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi/ /lus sems ma yengs rtse gcig pas/ /
rnam pa dang bcas dang du blang / /sa thob goms dang mthar phyin par/ /ting 'dzin don la gnas pa'i tshe/ /'gal ba'i sgo gsum mi 'byung bas/ /ting 'dzin rgyun
gyi dam tshig la/ /rnam pa'i dam tshig ma lus 'dus/ /don las langs tshe snying rje dang / /rtsa ba yan lag shugs ldan yin/ /sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa na/ /
'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig ste/ /rgya mtsho rlan bzhin thob spangs med/ /srung byed ye shes dam tshig ste/ /dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /bsnyen pa rtags dang ldan bar
du| |spyi yi dam tshig bsrung bya zhing / /sgrub pa gang yin 'grub pa na/ /khyad par rang rang rtog pa yi/ /dam tshig med par 'grub mi 'gyur/ /gang zag gang la dga'
pa la| |dam tshig dka' thub sgo nas ni/ /gsang ba'i don la dgod bya'i phyir/ /dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas bstan/ /dang po las can rnal 'byor la/ /rtsa ba thun mong
dam tshig bstan/ /bstan nas nyams ldan gang zag la/ /thun mong min pa'i dam tshig bstan/ /rtogs pa'i 'jigs med gang zag la/ /'da' nyams med pa'i
dam tshig bstan/ /sa thob goms mthar phyin pa la/ /ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig bstan/ /dngos grub rtogs pa kun dang 'brel/ /dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa 'di/ /thob nas dam par gang bsrungs pa/ /yon tan chung yang 'grub par bshad/ /mchog dang thun
mong la sogs pa/ /dngos grub rtog pa ma lus pa/ /cho ga gang dang ting 'dzin gang / /sgrub pa gang dang gang yang rung / /ma nyams tshul du rab brtson pas/ /myur du
'grub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid brlag par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan nyid/ /dam tshig rdo rje las byung bas/ /
dam pa 'di la gang bstan pas/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gyur/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs dang yan lag gi /bsrung bya dka' thub
dam pa 'di/ /kun gyis 'da' ba ma yin zhing / /gnas pa dam pa nyid yin te/ /las dang skal pa dman pa dang / /rigs dman le lo che ba dang / /rang bzhin
ngan pa'i gang zag gis/ /blun po gang zhig 'da' byed cing / /dngos grub gnyis la rgyab phyogs nas/ /dam pa rnams la smod byed pa/ /sangs
rgyas kun la nyes byas pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas ni/ /bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang rig 'dzin dang / /kha 'bar gtum 'khrug
rngam pa'i chogs/ /de ma thag tu srog bcad nas/ /dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'jig par gyur na ni/ /'jig rten gang du skye 'gyur zhing / /ji srid
nam mkha' 'jig pa 'am/ /phyi yi rgya mtsho zad pa'i tshe/ /thar te gzhan du nam yang min/ /dam pa'i bla ma spong ba dang / /rdo rje mched la 'khu ba dang / /byang chub sems nyid
mi dran zhing / /sngags dang phyag rgya yal ba dang / /snod min gsang ba bshad pa dang / /gsang ba'i don la skur ba ni/ /'dir yang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing / /skad
cig 'gags pas de ma thag /bar ma'i lus dang bral gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur/ /gang du rtsa ba yan lag bcas/ /bsrung dang dbog par bya ba'i
chos| |thun mong dbang dang 'brel bcas pa'i/ /thun mong spyi yi yul gyur pa/ /de ni thun mong bsrung bya ste/ /'di ni phyi yi dam tshig go /thabs dang shes rab sbyar ba'i
sems| |thig le'i sems lnga'i lam gyi rim/ /rig pa ma lus gsal ba'i tshe/ /thig le gnyis med nyams su byung / /bde ba'i thig le'i bcud bsgyur bas/ /tshogs
drug rang snang thig le'i grogs/ /ma lus thig les byin brlabs pas/ /thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal/ /thig le rig pa khar dbyung min/ /'khor lo kha
sbyor bde ba yis/ /tha mal bde bar dbang por bsgyur/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs spyod thabs kyis myong / /tha mal zhen pa rnam par bzlog /thabs ldan don la gsang ba'i don/ /
rang snying 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lnga/ /'char dang nub pa'i rim pa yis/ /thabs chen gsang ba'i thig le ltar/ /shes nas spang du med par gnas/ /rang byung gnas pa'i
bcud lnga ni/ /rang lus rten pa'i don snang ba/ /khyab par rgyu ba'i tshul dag gis/ /dwangs snyigs gnyis kyi tshul du gnas/ /rang lus rtogs dwangs snyigs dang / /kha
dog yan lag nyid lag gis/ /bde ba'i ye shes lngar shes dang / /bde ba chen po nyid du gsungs/ /khams lnga bcud las skyes pa yi/ /ma lus thig le'i rang
bzhin te/ /ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pas/ /rgyal ba lnga ru yang dag gsungs/ /thabs dang shes rab rdo rje dril/ /nyi zla rim pa'i 'od gsal ba/ /sems lngas mkha' la
gsal ba'i tshe/ /rten can rten dang gnyis med pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes snang / /ma zin rdo rje lce yis blang / /gnyis kyi rtog pa
ma lus pa/ /bde chen ro gcig byin gyis brlabs/ /skad cig 'bral med bde ba'i sems/ /dus gsum mi 'bral brtan par gnas/ /rlung dang thig le'i bzlas
pa yis/ /thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal/ /bde chen thabs dang nyams kyis te/ /brjod dang tshig gis phebs pa min/ /gnyis sbyor prad pa'i bde ba
yis| |tha mal zad dang bde chen sbyor/ /gang gis sbyin par mi nus pa/ /da ltar nus pa rang gis myong / /gzhan gyi brdzun pa'i don 'di ni/ /thabs kyis bde bar
mngon du bstan/ /tha mal zhen pa spang ba'i phyir/ /kha na ma tho bag tsha bral/ /skyes dang nus dang gnas pa'i tshe/ /rang bzhin lnga ni shugs kyis grub/ /rang gi rtsa bcud so
so las/ /bdud rtsi bral ba med par gnas/ /'byung lnga dbang po gzugs sogs bcas/ /thabs ldan sbyor ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ /bde chen lhan cig skyes bar
shes| |nyi zla rlung gis zin pa yi/ /mtshan ma bral ba ngo bo las/ /zhen pa med pa'i thabs chen pos/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las/ /ye shes lnga yi ros
gang bas/ /ma lus rgyal ba lnga ru grub/ /'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi/ /rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yin/ /dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas pa/ /shin tu bsdus pa rnam pa
gnyis| |'bring du rtsa ba lnga nyid dang / /yan lag bcu ru shes par bya/ /shin tu rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni/ /spyir ni sum brgya drug cu ste/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid dang / /
nyid kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / /dus bzhi rgyal mchog nyid dang ni/ /sgrub med mnyam par rdzogs pa nyid/ /lhun grub bde gnas dam tshig dang / /rnam dag byang chub
gzung 'dzin bral/ /rtogs nas don 'dzin dam tshig dang / /sems la gnas bcas dam tshig dang / /ye nas ma bcos dam tshig dang / /'dus byas rnam dag dam
tshig dang / /chos rnams dbyer med dam tshig dang / /thams cad 'jigs med dam tshig dang / /g.yung drung tshe 'phel dam tshig dang / /thams cad bsrung du med pa ste/ /'di
dag lta ba'i dam tshig yin/ /thams cad sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang / /ma lus bsgral ba'i dam tshig dang / /ma byin len pa'i dam tshig dang / /brdzun du smra ba'i dam
tshig dang / /thams cad spyod pa'i dam tshig dang / /dam rdzas spyod pa'i dam tshig ste/ /'di dag spyod pa'i dam tshig yin/ /bsgrub pa'i dam tshig rnam gsum ni/ /rdo rje
skye gnas dam tshig dang / /'dren byed gnas stobs dam tshig dang / /lam la ston byed dam tshig dang / /rab tu rtogs byed dam tshig
dang / /sgyur byed byang chub dam tshig dang / /thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig dang / /rig 'dzin gnas stobs dam tshig dang / /bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i dam tshig yin/ /
yum gyur dbyings phyug dam tshig dang / /thabs nyid shes rab sbyor dam tshig /shes rab thabs su sbyor de bzhin/ /glang po brjid gnon dam tshig dang / /thams
cad mi chung dam tshig dang / /thams cad srung ba'i dam tshig dang / /ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste/ /sgrub pa thabs kyi dam tshig yin/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa'i
dam tshig dang / /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang / /tshogs kyi 'phrin las dam tshig dang / /phra men tshim byed dam tshig ste/ /sgrub pa'i 'phrin las dam tshig
yin/ /yang dag don ston dam tshig dang / /gsung mchog mtha' yas dam tshig dang / /thams cad skad 'jal dam tshig dang / /yi ge med 'jal dam tshig
dang / /stong gsum kun grags dam tshig dang / /ye shes gsung mchog dam tshig dang / /bsam yas rdo rje gsung dam tshig /mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/ /
bdag gis shes bya'i dam tshig yin/ /shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig bzhi/ /nam mkha' snang byed dam tshig dang / /rten byed sa yi dam tshig dang / /sreg byed me yi
dam tshig dang / /'khru byed chu yi dam tshig dang / /g.yeng byed chen po'i dam tshig ste/ /shes rab lnga yi dam tshig dang / /phung po lnga yi dam tshig ni/ /thabs mchog
lnga yi dam tshig yin/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan dam tshig dang / /sgra ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang / /dri ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang / /ro ltar shes pa'i dam tshig
dang / /reg ltar shes pa'i dam tshig ni/ /gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yin/ /kha dog lnga yi dam tshig dang / /phyogs lnga yi ni dam tshig dang / /dbang lnga yi ni
dam tshig ste/ /gsum po spyir khyab dam tshig yin/ /bde ba'i ngang nyid dam tshig dang / /lhun grub ye shes dam tshig dang / /mi 'jigs rgyal mchog dam tshig dang //
mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dam tshig dang / /phyogs dus dbyer med dam tshig dang / /nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang / /chos la skyon med dam tshig dang / /brjod
med spros med dam tshig dang / /phyogs dus gnyis med dam tshig dang / /gnyis med byang chub sems dam tshig /'dus ma byas pa'i dam tshig dang / /thams cad rgyas
'debs dam tshig dang / /thams cad mi 'gog dam tshig ste/ /ngo bo nyid 'dzin dam tshig yin/ /grub par bya ba lnga bstan pa/ /chas
kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig dang / /rin chen 'byung ba'i dam tshig dang / /pad+ma chags med dam tshig dang / /don rnams grub pa'i dam tshig dang / /'jigs byed rdo rje dam
tshig dang / /de bzhin sku nyid dam tshig dang / /thams cad 'byor ldan dam tshig ste/ /sku yi dam tshig bdun du bshad/ /yang dag don ston la sogs pa/ /gsung
gi dam tshig brgyad po nyid/ /rang la rdzogs par shes bya ste/ /'bras bu'i srung bas bsgrub bya yin/ /rang rig dbang sgyur dam tshig dang / /tshe mchog rnam dag dam
tshig dang / /rang bzhin 'od gsal dam tshig dang / /byang chub sdom byed dam tshig dang / /thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig drug /thugs kyi dam tshig nyid du bshad/ /
byang chub zhing bkod dam tshig dang / /ye shes bzhugs gnas dam tshig dang / /gzhal yas khang bstan dam tshig dang / /sna tshogs kun sgyur dam tshig dang / /zad
med gter ldan dam tshig dang / /sgrub pa zad med dam tshig dang / /zad med gter chen dam tshig ni/ /yon tan dam tshig bdun du bshad/ /thams cad byin rlob
dam tshig dang / /bdud sde tshar gcod dam tshig dang / /sems can don byed dam tshig ni/ /'phrin las dam tshig gsum du bshad/ /spong ba rdo rje dam tshig dang / /chags
pa'i ye shes dam tshig dang / /gti mug chen po'i dam tshig dang / /phrag dog chen po'i dam tshig dang / /nga rgyal bde mchog dam tshig dang / /nyon mongs lnga yi dam tshig
ste| |mi spong ba yi dam tshig yin/ /gtan du ma yengs srung ba ni/ /mnyam pa lnga yi dam tshig dang / /bden pa dbyer med dam tshig dang / /sku gsung thugs sbyor dam
tshig dang / /lam lnga rdzogs pa'i dam tshig dang / /thams cad bde sbyor dam tshig dang / /rdo rje log 'joms dam tshig dang / /'khor ba zil gnon dam tshig dang / /ma
bcos lhun grub dam tshig dang / /thig le bde sbyor dam tshig ni/ /lta ba rgyun srung dam tshig yin/ /ting 'dzin rgyun sgom dam tshig dang / /bcing ba phyag rgya'i dam
tshig dang / /bzlas pa sgra snyan dam tshig dang / /sgo gsum mnyam pa'i dam tshig dang / /shes rab bde sbyor dam tshig ni/ /ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig yin/ /tha snyad
zil gnon dam tshig dang / /spyod lam bde 'byor dam tshig dang / /rig pa thod rgal dam tshig dang / /ma bcos gnas dag dam tshig dang / /rang byung gnas bral dang
tshig ste/ /gcig car gnas pa'i srung thabs yin/ /thams cad skyed byed dam tshig dang / /rgyud drug sbyor byed dam tshig dang / /rtogs
pas tshim byed dam tshig dang / /khyab pa nam mkha'i dam tshig dang / /gzhan don shugs grub dam tshig ni/ /dam tshig che ba bstan pa yin/ /dmyal chen dmyal
ba phal pa dang / /yid dwags byol song srin po dang / /gnod sbyin mngal srin kha 'bar lce/ /lha dang lha min ru tra dang / /rtsangs pa la sogs 'khor ba ste/ /chad
pa'i skye gnas bstan pa yin/ /bsrung ba'i dam tshig chen po yin/ /gal te stong pa'i don rtogs na/ /bskang dang nyams pa'i tshul med de/ /chad pa'i yul
las 'das pa yin/ /gang zag 'ga' zhig spyod yul yin/ /gal te rtsa ba'i dam nyams na/ /bla ma grogs po brgya dag la/ /bshags pha stong phrag brgya ru bya/ /
bzlas pa bye ba phrag bdun bya/ /gtor ma 'bum phrag bdun du bya/ /sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bcu gcig bya/ /de nas slar yang blang ba 'am/ /bla mas gnang nas
gnas par bya/ /gal te yul de mi gnas sam/ /lo gsum phan chad 'das pa 'am/ /gal te bshags pa'i tshul mthong bas/ /ma dad 'dod pa'i sems
skyes nas/ /bskang ba'i tshang las 'das pa skye/ /bskal pa chen po brgyad khri'i bar/ /bshags kyang dag par mi 'gyur te/ /rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya bar/ /mi bzad sdug
bsngal myong nas ni/ /ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa'i bar/ /mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /zla ba bdun du smra bcad
bya| |sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad du bya/ /bzlas pa bye ba tshad 'bum gcig /gtor ma khri phrag gcig tu gtong / /de nas slar yang blang ba dang / /dag dang tshangs par
bsgrags par bya/ /dag pa'i snod dang mi ldan par/ /gsang ba ston cing 'chad pa dang / /dbang ma thob par bka' 'gom dang / /bder gshegs bka' las 'das
pa dang / /tshad dang ldan pa'i snod min la/ /gsang ba tshad du sgrog pa dang / /gsang ba nyams su mi len par/ /'phyar bas kun la spel ba ni/ /tshad las 'das
pa'i gang zag ste/ /sangs rgyas kun la brnyas byed pas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas khros pa yin/ /bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad/ /bla ma dang ni grogs rnams
dang / /pha ma gnyen bshes rgyal blon dang / /rgyal 'bangs nyes med sdang ba ni/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su bshad/ /zab mo dag la gegs 'byung dang / /bsgrub
pas 'dod pa mi 'byung zhing / /srung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang / /ma nyes yal ga 'byung ba dag /dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags
su bshad/ /dang por bla ma'i lung thob nas/ /rang gis nyams pa ma tshor zhing / /bde legs bsam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing / /bdag gzhan bsam pa'i khyad
par dag /sngon du yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ /'grub cing sngags pas thob pa ni/ /ma nyams don dang ldan pa'i rtags/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po yin//
gal te ma nyams rtags byung na/ /bskang gso'i cho ga myur du brtsam/ /gal te nyams la rtags med cing / /legs par snang na mi rung ste/ /bdag gi sa
bon tshig pa ste/ /bde ba zad byas gtan du sdug /ma nyams rtags byung myur bskangs na/ /sngon gyi bag chags zad par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyu 'phrul
dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las/ /dam tshig ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /mchog dang
thun mong la sogs pa/ /sgrub pa'i khyad par ji snyed pa'i/ /rtog pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus bshad/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po ma lus las/ /thun mong dag la mos
zhugs pas/ /thun mong yo byad ting 'dzin dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya bral goms pas/ /rtags dang nus pa mthar phyin pas/ /gang ltar dmigs pa 'grub 'gyur
te| |zag bcas thun mong dngos grub yin/ /de las gzhan pa bshad par bya/ /gang du mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/ /dbang dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dag /phyi nang gsang
ba'i rim thob nas/ /mi ldog brtan pa'i rnal 'byor thob/ /mthong nas sgom lam ma nges rigs/ /ting 'dzin gang sgom par chad med/ /tshe 'dis dbang bsgyur
'jigs bral te/ /de nas sku mnga'i bdag nyid thob/ /mchog ldan mchog gi mchog thob pas/ /mchog gi dngos grub thun mong min/ /dang dang dam tshig shes
rab dang / /brtson 'grus brtul zhugs bzod pa thob/ /brtan cing snying brtse dbang rdzogs shing / /sgrub dang lam gyi sbyor ba shes/ /yig thub mi ldog brtan pa can/ /
nyams thob dang du len pa ni/ /gcig dang lnga gsum gang zag gis/ /ri bo ri sul gsang bar dang / /chu gling ngam grog brag rdzong dang / /dur khrod ri phug chu mdo
dang / /yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga' bar/ /cho ga byin rlabs rdzogs pa nyid/ /las kyi cho ga gang yin pa/ /bdag gam gzhan gyis byas pa ni/ /bdag dbang
bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /dam tshig dbang dang lta ba dag /sngon du bya ba rdzogs pa yis/ /sngon du rnal 'byor gsum thob bam/ /
dang po yid brtan gang yin kyang / /gang la yid kyis dmigs pa de/ /cho ga ting 'dzin 'brel ba nyid/ /rang rang rtogs pa ji bzhin du/ /tha mal ba dang le
lo dang / /the tshom dang pa'i stobs kyis te/ /gal te de dag mi ldan na/ /sa thob kyis kyang ma yin na/ /gang zag skye bos smos ci dgos/ /gal te dgug pa'i
las bya na/ /bdag nyid dbang drag khro bo'i ste/ /dmar thag dud ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /gang ltar gnas pa'i 'phro 'du ni/ /zhags pa lcags kyu sha stag ste/ /
dmigs pa brtan cing rtags thob nas/ /mngon du gyur gyi bar du ni/ /rang sngags brjod pa de yi mthar/ /che ge mo zhig dzaHhUM zhes/ /dgra dang bgegs dang lha
dang gzungs/ /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ldan yang rung / /tha ma la dbang med bzhin du dgug /gal te de yi dgos pa dag /myur du grub par ma gyur na/ /de dag legs
par grub kyi bar/ /gang yin mkhas pas bcing bar bya/ /dag dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /'grub par 'gyur par gdon mi za/ /bdag nyid dbang drag
gsal ba yis/ /lce la dbang gi 'khor lo bsam/ /yi ge gsum ldan dgu bkod nas/ /'od kyis nam mkha'i khams bkang zhing / /pad+ma rA ga zhu 'dra bas/ /gang
thim bdag gi dbang 'gyur zhing / /bden pa bdar zhing dag gis bcing / /yang na gang la gang chags pa'i/ /rdzas la ring du 'dod pa ltar/ /'dod pa grub na dam
bcas shing / /yid 'ong 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dga' ba'i thabs kyis brten byas na/ /gal te 'gro zhing 'phro 'dod na/ /dbang drag phyag rgyas bsdigs
bcing gzir/ /dga' ba'i thabs kyis yid 'phrog nas/ /rol mo sgyu mkhan dag de yis/ /'dus pa'i gang zag chags pa can/ /bya ba thabs kyis bral ba
ltar| |bral ba med par gnas par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin brtan pa'i nus pa yis/ /gang yang rung ba'i sems can de/ /sna tshogs khro bo khro mo yis/ /'od dang
phyag rgya 'bar ba yis/ /bcings nas mdun du gnas par blta/ /dga' dang bsdigs pa rdzas kyi mtha'/ /ting 'dzin brtan pas nges par 'grub/ /med las
dngos por nges grub cing / /mi mthun brgyad sogs nges 'grub na/ /yod dang snang ba'i 'gro ba dag /dbang pos bsgyur ba smos ci dgos/ /gal te gso ba'i
las byas na/ /las ni gnyis te brtsams pas 'grub/ /bdag nyid rtag par skyes nas ni/ /dbang bskur byin rlabs kun bstims
nas| |mdun du shel gyi bum pa ru/ /thugs las chu yi lha mo bskyed/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal pa der gyur nas/ /bum par lha mo 'od du zhu/ /nad dang sdug bsngal
byang bar bsam/ /dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang / /sman dang rin chen spos dang 'bru/ /bdud rtsi snying po cha rkyen la/ /mA ma kI yi sngags kyis gdab/ /oM mA ma kI
sarba pA pa du ru du ru swAhA/ nad dang sdug bsngal ldan pa'i lus/ /bkrus pas 'tsho bar the tshom med/ /bdag nyid brtul zhugs bde ldan pas/ /sngon du bya
ba sngon song bas/ /dgon pa bas mtha' rab dben par/ /ma smas ma rul tshad ldan pa'i/ /dur khrod zhing chen mtshon ldan la/ /khrus dang byug bdug kun
byas nas/ /pho mo la sogs yin pa yi/ /las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de dag maN+Dal gtsang ma yi/ /dbus su legs par bzhag nas ni/ /bdag
nyid khro bo gang yang rung / /gsal bar tshangs ba brgya byin rung / /rang sngags srog snying dza yis dgug /phyag rgya bzhi yis dbab par bya/ /gal te 'dar dang
rgod pa dang / /du dang 'jigs pa'i sgra byung na/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /dam chu byin la mnas bsgrags te/ /gang 'dod las la mngag par bya/ /gal te
'jig rten the tshom zos/ /de yis zos dang brgyal ba dang / /'phral du bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig ting 'dzin brtan pa yis/ /bar chad med par bsgrubs
pa'i tshe| |mdangs ldan yid 'ong dang po ste/ /dri zhim 'od chags gnyis pa yin/ /dga' ba'i sgra sgrog gsum pa yin/ /bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyams sod
yin| |zhing chen kha nas hri byung na/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje so yis bcad/ /ro langs brdabs na gser du 'gyur/ /lce yi ral gris de bcad na/ /cis kyang mi tshugs go
mtshon te/ /lha min g.yul yang pham byed na/ /dpa' bo stobs ldan smos ci dgos/ /de yi dbang po lnga dag la/ /mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub yod/ /rang
gi rtog pa ji bzhin du/ /mkhas pas bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te bcu bdun bco brgyad ma'i/ /zhing mdzes bkru zhing byugs byas te/ /rgyan dang
gos kyis legs par gdags/ /dri zhing dbang po dag pa la/ /bdag nyid dbang drag rnal 'byor gyis/ /ye shes 'jig rten gang rung pa'i/ /lha mo yid 'ong 'od
'bar ma/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bcings nas/ /rtags byung bar du bstim par bya/ /dri dang sgra dang 'od dag dang / /'dar dang 'gul
dang rgod pa dag /dang po'i rtags ni yin par bshad/ /lho dang gtam dang gnyis pa ste/ /dngos su langs pa tshad yin pas/ /dam bdar mnas bsgags dbang
du sdu| |gal te sbyar du sad pa na/ /cho 'phral chen zhing log ston na/ /dbang drag nga rgyal chen po yis/ /dbang du bsdu dang zil gyis mnan/ /de dag chags pas rol
spyad na| |skad cig cho 'phrul bzhi thob ste/ /skye shi med par gnas pa dang / /ma lus bde chen 'bar ba dang / /zhing khams kun tu bgrod pa dag /thogs pa med par
'grub par 'gyur/ /gtsang ma byis pa rma med pa/ /yid 'ong legs pa btsal blangs nas/ /dag cing bdud rtsis dri byugs la/ /'da' hUM ma tas legs byugs la/ /
kha dog lnga yi gzungs kyis gdags/ /tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /lha mo gang rung snying pos dgug /rtag tu phyag rgya bzhis bstim zhing / /bdag nyid ha ya
g+hi ba 'am/ /ya mAn+ta ka la sogs pa/ /gang rung khro bor gsal bsgoms la/ /drag tu dgug cing bstim par bya/ /rtags byung mthar thug mngon gyur nas/ /legs
nyes de yis smra bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'dar zhing mi brjod na/ /oM gyi 'od dang a mr-i tas/ /lce la thabs kyis dbang bskur zhing / /ha ya g+h+ri bas gad mos bsdigs/ /
legs par smra bar the tshom med/ /gal te gsad pa'i las byed na/ /gsal la brtan thob rnal 'byor bas/ /dur khrod shing gcig bzhi mdo 'am/ /lha 'dres
mngon du gnas pa'i sar/ /bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste/ /dud kha nag po 'od 'bar ba/ /spyan zlog mtshon cha me ltar 'bar/ /sprul pa'i char ltar 'khrug par bsam
bdun du hom khung khru gang tshad/ /gru gsum dur sol khrag chen byug /nang du ling ga bdud rtsi lnga/ /chags pa'i rgyu dang tsha ba dang / /shes pa chags pa'i rten la byas/ /
pho nyas ming rus bcas bkug la/ /bstims la phyag rgyas bcing bar bya/ /lcags sam nag po'i shing las byas/ /drag po'i phur bas gnas gsum gdab/ /hrIH
Sh+TIHdrag pos g.yas g.yon nas/ /khros pa'i sems kyis bsregs byas nas/ /de nang drag po tsher ma can/ /nam phyed gcer bus bsregs byas na/ /lha yang rung
ste brlag par 'gyur/ /gal te phye ba'i las byed na/ /bdag nyid ya mAn+ta ka ste/ /rngam zhing gdug gtum nga rgyal can/ /shin tu 'jigs shing bsdigs pa
bsgom| |nyi mas 'jigs pa'i dang rung dang / /mun pas 'jigs pa'i gung ru la/ /gang yin de nyid bris la blan/ /lha dang lha min
gnyis la gtad/ /rlung gi phyogs su de yis bskyod/ /sprul pa pho nyas g.yul 'gyed cing / /'thab cing rtsod par rnam par bsam/ /bar du khra dang bya rog
'thab| |me chu rlung gis 'bud bsams na/ /de ni gang yin su yang rung / /'bral zhing 'thab pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rgyal po bram ze blon po dag /gdug pa gnod
pa can gyi rigs/ /mi gnas bskrad par bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag nyid a par tsi ta ste/ /drag po khros pa'i tshul du bsgom/ /dgra bgegs gang yang rung ba yi/ /
'og tu rlung snying bcas pa bri/ /steng du ming rus bcas bskyon la/ /mdun na gnas pa'i gdul bya de/ /rlung lha rnga mo'i steng du zhon/ /pho nya sprul pa mtha' yas
kyis| |'khrig cing tshogs par rab bsams la/ /gshin rje'i drung du khrid par bsam/ /'dis ni dbugs med brgyal ba'ang / /gzhan du drag pos phyin 'gyur
na| |srog dang ldan pas smos ci dgos/ /gal te dgra dpung pham 'dod na/ /bdag nyid mi g.yo mgon po ste/ /ji ltar gnas par rab tu bsgom/ /de yi gzugs
brnyan bris nas kyang / /cho gas de ru byin brlabs la/ /sngags ni bdun 'bum la sogs pa/ /lcags sna bdun las bcu gnyis tshad/ /ral gri snying por bcas
pa la| |gsal bar de dag rtags byung bzlas/ /'od dang sgra dang sa g.yos dang / /ral gri skad ni 'don pa na/ /phyung bas g.yul las ldog par dang / /bskor bas
dmag dpung 'bros par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rgyal zhing che 'dod na/ /bdag nyid gsal zhing brtan gyur nas/ /zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal byas la/ /dur khrod ras la
ming rus bri/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bstims la/ /nges par bstan pa'i ltas byung nas/ /he ru ka yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /rta mgrin gad mo drag pos
bsdigs/ /khyung gshog phyag rgya zil gyis mnan/ /bdag dang khyi yi sgroms nas gdon/ /bdag nyid them pa'i 'og tu mnan/ /yang na bdag gi 'og tu mnan//
rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgya yis/ /steng nas mnan cing bden pa bdar/ /bdag nyid de yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /dbul po gter dang phrad 'dod na/ /bdag nyid las la
goms pa yis/ /rigs lnga lhag pa'i lhags la nas/ /so so'i phyag mtshan yungs 'bru tsam/ /dbang por mthong gi bar du ni/ /bsam zhing sngags bzlas
bden pa bdar/ /mtshan ma brtan po gsal ba na/ /gang na yod pa'i phyogs der dong / /bden pa ting 'dzin sngags bcas
mthus| |'dug gam smra'am mthong ba 'am/ /phra mo der ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas gter dang phrad gyur nas/ /dbul ba kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo
rje rnal 'byor pas/ /mngon shes mig dang ldan 'dod na/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pa/ /rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mig sna lnga dang bdun pa'i zhags/
de yi zhun mar 'dud par bcas/ /'phrul gyi 'o ma dag gis sbyar/ /rdo rje pra yis zhag bdun bsgrubs/ /nyams dang drod rtags thob pa na/ /mig la legs
par sngags kyis byugs/ /skad cig stong gsum bcas pa yi/ /phyogs bcu mngon par shes pas mthong / /gang zag rgyun ni brtag pa dang / /sdug bsngal
drag pos zhen bzlog cing / /so so dag pa'i zhing khams kyis/ /yid bde grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /mngon shes mtshan mas legs par bsgrub/ /rkang mgyogs
thob par 'dod pa yis/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas/ /brtan zhing bar chad med thob nas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/ /yaM las
rlung gi dkyil 'khor ste/ /skad cig dpag tshad brgyar 'gro ba/ /de la gnas bsam ma yengs pas/ /rlung gis khyab pa ji lta bar/ /dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yang / /skad
cig tsam gyis bgrod par 'gyur/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul bzhi dag gis/ /rig 'dzin go 'phang 'gro 'dod na/ /sngon du dag pa'i don thob nas/ /phyag rgya gsal
bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /nam mkha'i ling ga zla ba la/ /hUM las rdo rje cho ga gsum/ /rim par bstan pa'i dbang thob nas/ /dwangs ma'i phyag rgya la brten pas/ /rdo rje zlar
bcas rlung brten pas/ /gang 'thad zhing du bskyod pa'i sa/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ /zhing khams dag pa'i bya ba 'grub/ /mdun gyi nam mkhar zla ba la/ /oM
la cho ga'i tshul gyis bsgyur/ /brtan pa'i 'khor lo zla rlung gis/ /dwangs ma'i stobs kyis lus gnas pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin pa/ /zhing
khams so sor bskyod byas nas/ /rang gi bsam pa bsgrub par bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zla ba la/ /traM las skyes pa'i cho ga yis/ /rin chen rlung zlar bcas pa
yis| |ting 'dzin drag po bskyod pa'i shugs/ /dwangs ma lus yid bcas pa yis/ /dag pa'i zhing khams kun bskyod de/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa 'grub par
'gyur| |nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+mar bcas pa'i zla ba bsgom/ /hrIHlas sna tshogs chos mchog sems/ /
gsal brtan rlung gis stobs bstan pas/ /dwangs ma'i lus yid gang yin pa/ /zhing bskyod bsam pa grub par 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
gnas par/ /gsal byed sna tshogs bcas pa bsgom/ /a 'am ha las rang nyid kyi/ /las kyi phyag rgyar goms par bya/ /brtan nas dwangs ma rlung stobs
kyis| |zhing khams gang du mngon bsam pa'i/ /'dod pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dis ni 'byung zhing dbang med cing / /'chi med rlung la dbang thob
nas| |cho 'phrul bzhi yis zil mnan nas/ /mngon shes gdug pa 'dul ba yis/ /las rnams mi 'grub gcig kyang med/ /de nas gzhan yang chags ldan
rim| |skal ldan dman dang sbyor bas zad/ /bde ba'i don 'dod dka' thub can/ /'di dag don la thabs kyis dgod/ /thabs ldan lus kyi gong bu la/ /rang
rang cho ga'i thabs ldan na/ /bde chen gar thabs sna tshogs pa/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i ro yis phyed/ /bde chen longs spyod chos kyi gnas/ /sprul pa'i thig le
bde ba'i ro/ /ma lus mkha' lnga'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rang lus ma bcos gnas nyid bde/ /brtul zhugs thig le gsum thob nas/ /sgrol ma dang ni thig le
dang / /gnas dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i/ /thabs kyis mtshon pa las byung bas/ /dngos grub cho ga sna tshogs
'grub| |rang rten thig ler bcas pa yis/ /dwangs ma'i rang bzhin khyab gnas pa/ /skul ba thabs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ma lus bskyod cing 'gugs par
byed| |dwangs snyigs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/ /rlung gi thig les dbang bsgyur nas/ /'phro zhing 'dzag pa'i thig le nyid/ /rlung gis 'ching ba nyid yin te/ /thig le
snyigs mar nyams gyur pa/ /thabs dang rlung bcud stobs ldan pas/ /pad+ma la ni chu bzhin no/ /rang byung thig le'i rang bzhin las/ /rten dang zag pa snyigs
ma dang / /'khor ba'i rtsa dang sa bon dang / /lo tog thig le zhen bcas pa/ /rang byung nam mkha'i thig les 'jigs/ /rang lus bde chen snying po la/ /nam
mkha' sprin ltar mi phyed cing / /dwangs snyigs bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ /thig le chu dang 'o ma dang / /gnas pa rlung dang rten stobs kyis/ /dwangs snyigs phye la
dwangs ma bstim/ /rang snying lus la 'od snang ba'i/ /phyi nang dngos rtogs ma lus pa/ /rlung sogs 'khor lo'i 'phen stobs
kyis| |der mi gnas par goms par bya/ /gang dus bon snyigs bcas pa/ /nam mkha'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas/ /gang du rgyu bar bcas pa'i yid/ /
de ma thag par rnam par brlag /rlung dang rtsa dang thig ler bcas/ /thabs kyis bskul ba'i ro ldan pas/ /ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin pas/ /mi mthun
zhen pas rnam grol bas/ /rang sems rten bcas thig le ni/ /dwangs ma'i ye shes blo ldan pa/ /kun khyab bde 'byung snying po can/ /gsang ba'i rig pa'i
gter kha 'byed/ /phyi nang rgyu ba thig ler bcas/ /snying nang bde bar 'bar gyur nas/ /rang lus rtags su bde chen 'bar/ /mngon shes rin chen rtsal
phog /rig pa'i mngon shes lnga ru 'char/ /de nas mi 'gyur stong pa'i rtsa/ /'gyur med kun snang rlung la thim/ /dman pas mi 'grub khyad par thabs//
gsang ba'i thig le 'bab bzhon gyis/ /rtsa bcud ting 'dzin 'bral pa'i stobs/ /bskal ba du ma'i stobs 'gags te/ /dwangs ma'i ye shes rlung du
'grub| |phyin pa med par mthar song ba/ /bde chen goms pa'i stobs las gyur/ /bcud lnga 'dus pa'i thig le ni/ /ro lnga 'dres pa'i bde chen de/ /sgrom dang
mthar phyin khyad par gyis/ /bde ba chen po rigs mchog gnas/ pa'i rten can 'di nyid can/ /dbang po dar zhing
smin pa yi/ /chags can nyi zla 'dzin nus pas/ /spyi gtsug thig le'i 'khor lo dang / /gsang ba'i 'og min nus ldan pa/ /'byor pa'i rten can 'di nyid
gnas| |thabs dang rol pa'i khyad par dang / /ting 'dzin rlung gi dbang thob ste/ /'byung bzhi snyigs phye dwangs dus su/ /nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis/ /lha mo
rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /rol pa'i thabs kyis gang rtsen pa/ /bye brag brgyad bcu gnyis 'dus pa'i/ /pad+ma'i snying po kun bkug ste/ /thig le dpa' bo lnga yi
stobs| |mi sdod 'phro ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ /thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bcings la bzung zhing gnas par bya/ /de dang rtse phrad gnyis bzlog pas//
bde ba'i myu gu gso byas pas/ /tha ma la zhen pa kun bral nas/ /rtog dang lhan cig gang skyes pa/ /dwangs snyigs bye ma'i nyams dag gis/ /snyigs ma bag
chags zhen bcas pa/ /de yi stobs kyis gnas mi 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i thig le stobs ldan pas/ /rigs ngan tha mal zhen chags
