dang / /dran rtog ma lus pham byas te/ /phyi nad snod bcud ma lus pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du/ /ma lus dpung btsugs rgyal bar mdzad/ /rdo rje
pad+ma'i snying po la/ /dga' ba'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /thabs dang shes rab gsang ba'i ro/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 'dus pa'i ro/ /zag med yon
tan gter chen po/ /gsang ba thabs kyi stobs las grub/ /bde chen snying po thig le'i ro/ /dbab dang gzung bzlog 'byongs pa yis/ /rtsa gsum gang zhig
thim pa'i tshe/ /bar chad med pa'i bde ba dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon shes dang / /skye shi med pa'i tshe thob cing / /mi 'gyur chos sku thig le la/ /rgyu ba
spangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /bde chen cho 'phrul dpag med pas/ /gsang ba'i zhing khams dag byed cing / /gsang ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /bde
chen nyams dang dga' ba'i gar/ /chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs pas/ /ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug par/ /glu ni sna tshogs len byed cing / /mdzes dang ngo tsha
spangs pa'i tshul/ /mdog dmar rlan dang ldan pa yis/ /rol pa'i tshul ni sna tshogs kyis/ /rdo rje bcud chen zlar bcas pas/ /nyi ma chags pa dang bcas pa'i/ /
pad+ma'i snying po'i spong mdzad cing / /dga' ba'i 'od dang 'khyud pa'i gar/ /rlung gi snying po rjod byed cing / /srid pa'i myu gu 'gog par mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud chen po las/ /sgrub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad
bya ba| |rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa/ /bya ba las kyi rim pa dag /bzhir ni gsal bar gsungs pa yin/ /dang por zhi ba'i rang bzhin te/ /de 'og rgyas pas
rgyas phyir ro/ /rgyas pas dbang du bya ba dang / /dbang mi 'du ba bsgral phyir te/ /thun mong khyad par yon tan rdzogs/ /bya ba'i las la ma rmongs shing / /nus
pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rim pa ji bzhin brtsam par bya/ /gangs dkar 'dabs dang yid 'brang ba/ /zhi ba'i ljon shing me tog tshal/ /'bras ldan rgyas
pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sum mdo ngam grog gting zab pa/ /dbang du bsdu ba'i gnas su bshad/ /dur khrod mtshan gcig rgya gram gnas/ /'byung po 'du sar
drag po shis/ /zhi las gzhi dkar ldan pa/ /zlum po sum rim oM dang bcas/ /'khor lo 'od dkar dang bcas pa/ /zhi ba'i thab
kyi rang bzhin no/ /rgyas la ser po tsan+dan bcas/ /gru bzhi rim gsum traM dang bcas/ /rin chen 'od zer 'phro bcas pa/ /thab ni rgyas bar gsungs pa
yin| |dbang las dmar chags 'od can/ /zla gam gzhu 'dra pad+mas mtshan/ /rim gsum hrI dang bcas pa ni/ /dbang du bya ba'i thab yin no/ /drag po sa
nag dur sol can/ /gru gsum rdo rje rtse gsum gdeng / /thod phreng 'od nag rim gsum hUM/ /drag po'i thab kyi rim pa yin/ /'o ma can dang gser can dang //
chags pa can dang tsher ma can/ /'phrin las bzhi ni so so yi/ /yam shing bsreg shing nyid du bshad/ /ling ga kha dog so so ste/ /gnas kyang thab khung bzhi
dang mtshungs/ /mar dkar 'bras dkar til dkar dang / /nas dkar chan dang 'o ma zho/ /dngul phye gtor ma dkar por bcas/ /zhi ba'i bsreg gtor rdzas su
bshad| |mar snying bu ram sbrang rtsi dang / /'bras dang chan rnams ldong ros dang / /me tog gser dang tsan+dan bcas/ /gser phye gtor ma ser phor bcas/ /'di
dag rgyas pa'i rdzas nyid de/ /dpal dang gzi byin rgyas par 'gyur/ /tsha ba'i mar dang chang skyur dang / /ram bu pad+ma rak+ta dang / /'bras dmar tsan+dan zangs phye dang / /gtor
ma dmar po dbang rdzas yin/ /tshil chen mar dang tsha ba gsum/ /klung chen sha khrag sran chan dang / /dug gsum thal chen tsha ba'i mar/ /ske tshe phye gsum mi khrag dang //
ming rus sbel mar bcas gtor mas/ /bsgral ba drag po'i rdzas su bshad/ /dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum po/ /logs la
zhi ba'i lha bkod la/ /de bzhin gshegs par gsal bas gdab/ /gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo rtse rgya mdud gru bzhi bcas/ /logs la rgyas
pa'i lha bsgoms te/ /rin chen nga rgyal bcas pas gdab/ /zangs sam byi ru dmar shing rnams/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam/ /logs la dbang gi lha bkod la//
chags pa rdo rjer gsal bas gdab/ /lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum/ /logs la drag po'i lha bkod de/ /zhe sdang rdo
rjer gsal bas gdab/ /oM dang traM hrI hUM nyid las/ /'byung lnga'i rim pa gsal steng du/ /e baM ma ya bruM las bskyed/ /gzhal yas zlum po gru bzhi dang / /zla
gam gru gsum ji bzhin dbyibs/ /kha dog rang gi tshul bzhin bskyed/ /rang rang sa bon gdan steng la/ /'od bzhi 'phro 'du'i cho ga
yis| |las bzhi gtso bo'i las bzhin bskyed/ /'khor yang gtso bo'i cha 'dra ba/ /phyag mtshan rang rang thugs rtags la/ /las bzhi rtags kyi mtshan ma
ste| |kha dog las kyis dbye bar bshad/ /dbang bskur las bzhi rigs kyis brgyan/ /lus bzhi 'od kyi 'phro 'du can/ /cho gas gsal bar bskyed
byas la| |spyan drangs bstim sogs las rdzogs bya/ /las dang ting 'dzin bzhi nyid kyis/ /las bzhi rtse gcig ting 'dzin bya/ /gang du dmigs pa
rtse gcig pas/ /las bzhi bya ba'i cho ga dag /ma lus pa dag 'grub 'gyur na/ /phra mo'i las rnams smos ci dgongs/ /shar phyogs su ni kha bltas te//
dang ba'i yid ni mi g.yo bas/ /rdzogs pa'i skyil krung la gnas te/ /ma rungs gdug pa zhi bar byed/ /lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /dga' ba'i 'du shes
rtse gcig pas/ /rin chen skyil krung la gnas pas/ /dpal dang gzi byin 'phel bar bya/ /nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te/ /chags dang zhen pa rtse gcig pa//
pad+ma'i skyil krung la gnas te/ /ma lus dbang du bsdu bar bya/ /byang phyogs nyid du kha bltas te/ /khros pa'i sems kyis so bca' zhing / /rus sbal dang ni gyad
stabs kyis/ /gdug pa bsgral te lam du gzhug /so so'i sngags kyi rim pa dag /snga dro zhi ba'i las byas te/ /gung la rgyas pa nyid du bya/ /dgong ga dbang gi
dus nyid de/ /drag po nam gyi gung la bya/ /nam zla dus bzhir bsgrubs pas na/ /nges par las bzhi 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM che ge mo shin+taM ku ru swAhA/ swA che ge mo
puSh+Ti ku ru swAhA/ hrI che ge mo ba shaM ku ru swAhA/ hUM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ling ga'i gnas kyang las bzhi'i dbyibs/ /dgug dang phur bu bzhi btab la/ /ri lu'am
lhag ma gtubs pa ni/ /so so lha yi zhal du bstab/ /rtse mo zhi byed yal ga rgyas/ /sdong po dbang la rtsa ba drag /kha dang mngar skyur tsha ba'i shing / /ro yi mchod
pa de bzhin te/ /rgyud bzang rgyal po smad 'tshong ma/ /bshan pa'i khyim nas me blangs te/ /las dang mthun pa'i ra skyes mnan/ /sa bon bzhi las rim pa bzhin//
pa pa ka dang dbang chen dang / /gzi byin can dang 'joms byed bzhi/ /sku mdog las bzhis phye ba ste/ /guN+De sgrom dang zhags pa dang / /rtse gsum g.yon pa
bgrang phreng nyid/ /rigs bzhis las bzhi byin brlabs dbu/ /spyan drang mchod bstod las rdzogs nas/ /lto bar bruM las
gzhal yas su/ /las dang mthun pa'i lha bskyed la/ /rang rang rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /sreg dang bro gar las byas pas/ /gang yang 'grub par the tshom
med| |zhe sdang can dang nga rgyal can/ /sdug bsngal gdug sems nad gzir ba/ /de 'dra zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /zhi ba'i las ni rtsom pa yin/ /tshe thung nad
mang dpal longs spyod/ /phongs dang nyam nga 'jigs pa dang / /dwangs snyigs zad nas snying por thim/ /thig le mi shigs bcud 'dus pa/ /stong nyid thig
le'i ngang du 'gag /rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob cing / /mngon shes skye 'jig thob bral bas/ /bde chen nam mkha'i ye shes nyid/ /rdo rje thig le 'gyur 'jig
med| |steng dang 'og las gang sbyar bas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang dag /bde chen til 'bru bcud bzhin du/ /nyi zla gnas pa'i bar du 'bar/ /'bab pa
thig le zla ba'i gzugs/ /kha bcad rlung gis gzung bya zhing / /'og gis phul zhing steng gis drang / /ma lus bde chen khyab par gnas/ /mi rtog gsal
bar mthar phyin pa/ /seng phrug zla ba rdzogs pa ltar/ /thabs dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba'i ye shes chen po la/ /ma lus yon tan rdzogs par gnas//
chags can brtul zhugs bral ba yi/ /lus dang dran rtog bag chags bcas/ /rigs dang rigs min gang yang rung / /sgo gsum ma lus bcas pa
dag /steng sgo'i gdul bya des 'dul yin/ /dang por gsang ba'i rim thob pas/ /rlung dang thig le'i las goms nas/ /bde chen byang chub sems kyi ro/ /sems
lnga'i tshul gyis gang snang ba/ /g.yo thob brtan pa'i nyams nyid kyis/ /lus dang phyi nang dran rtog bcas/ /nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid du skye/ /lus dang snang
bar bcas pa yi/ /nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mi phyed pa/ /bde chen thig le a dang gnas/ /thig le stong pa'i ri mo can/ /gsal bar shes pa rgyu bas mngon/ /
'og nas bskul zhing steng nas mnan/ /dwangs snyigs bsre ba'i thabs la 'jug /bde ba'i rlung can yaM gyi sgo/ /bskyod pa'i sbyor bas gyen du phul/ /rgyu ba rlung gi
snying po can/ /dpa' bo lam nas thur du 'then/ /rig pa'i ye shes gnas pa'i rlung / /stong nyid nam mkha'i dbyings su thim/ /phyi nang rgyu ba chad pa dang / /rig pa thig
le'i ngang la gnas/ /bde ba'i rtags ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang / /sgra dang lus bde rgyug pa dang / /rgod dang
brgyal sogs gang byung ba/ /brtan dang sbyang ba'i cho ga bya/ /mi mthun log pa'i chos brtags na/ /thabs kyi rim pa'i cho ga yis/ /gdon dang spos dang
gnon pa dag /ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya/ /rang lus thig le'i nyams myong la/ /bar chad med par gsal 'jug pa'i/ /tha mal zhen pa bsgyur ba
dang / /bde ba'i dbang phyug smin pa dang / /dran rtog rgyud sogs zhi ba dang / /bde chen rgyas pas khyab pa dang / /rlung dang bde ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /thams
cad dbang du sdud pa dang / /dran rtog a yi ngang du gnas/ /'di ni nang gi rim pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las//
gsang ba'i 'phrin las bzhir 'byung ba/ /dka' thub can dang tha mal dang / /thun mong lam las zlog phyir ro/ /'dod chags zhen cing dbang po smin/ /tshad
ldan yum dang bcas pa yi/ /bde chen dgon pa thig le'i gnas/ /yon tan khyad par kun tu rdzogs/ /gnyis med 'khril pa'i ngo bo ni/ /bde ba chen po
'byung ba'i gnas/ /gsang ba'i b+ha ga rgyas pa dang / /zhi rgyas dbang drag tshul bzhin dang / /nus pa byin brlabs gang ldan pa/ /gsang ba'i thig le'i tshul la gnas//
pad+ma gsang ba'i thab khung du/ /gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gang phul ba/ /lo dang zla ba ma yin par/ /myur du bde chen lus su gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab las byung
ba'i| |dwangs snyigs bcud dang bag chags dang / /nyi zla khu bar bcas pa ni/ /bde chen gsang ba mchod pa'i rdzas/ /gdung dang bde ba bral ba dang / /zhen rtog de
nyid chags pa yi/ /rang gi ling ga de nyid la/ /gsang ba'i phur pa bzhi rdzogs pa/ /gsang ba'i yul la btab pa yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ting 'dzin la//
las bzhi ma btsal rdzogs par ldan/ /rol pa'i tshul dang thig le gnyis/ /pad+ma rdo rje snying po'i rtsa/ /nyams dang sbyor tshul gang yin pa/ /gsang ba'i sbyor
ba'i dus su blta/ /gnas pa rtsa yi tshul dag ni/ /kha dog dbyibs sogs tha dad pas/ /mchod rdzas nyi zlar bcas kun la/ /gzar bu gnyis bcas thabs
phul bas/ /thig le chen por 'bab par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i don la dga' ba dang / /rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa dang / /dbang po dar cing smin pa dang / /
thig le'i don la mos pa dang / /rlung dang bcud la goms pa yi/ /rnal 'byor pho mor bcas pa kun/ /dran rtog phyi ma bcas
pa'i yid/ /gdul bya'i don du de bshad do/ /gang dag thabs la mkhas pa dang / /dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis/ /thabs dang sbyor ba la brtson zhing / /
nyi zla rtse sbyor dbang thob nas/ /gzung zlog 'byangs ba'i gar thabs kyis/ /dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i don/ /sems lnga'i tshul gyis gsal bar skye/ /nyi
zla zhon pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / /rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas/ /khams bzhi 'dus pa'i snying po las/ /bde chen thig le mi rtog pa/ /thabs kyis da ltar mngon
du snang / /thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis/ /skal med las kyis dman pa la/ /dbang dang rgyud pa bral ba yis/ /tshig dang rigs pas ci bstan kyang //
rigs ngan rgyal sar bzhag pa ltar/ /bdag phung gzhan brlag 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang du gsang ba'i thig le nyid/ /gsang ba'i lam lngar nyams skyes
pas| |zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /mkha' 'gro gsum la gang brten pas/ /ye shes thig le rgya dpag med/ /rim par mthar thug gnas su 'gyur//
gang zhig 'di la 'dres goms pas/ /rgyu ba thig ler thim pa dang / /dran rtog nam mkha' gsal ba dang / /bde chen sngon du smin pa yis/ /'chi med
sangs rgyas sa la sbyor/ /'jigs pa kun las grol ba dang / /lha mo tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas/ /rol rtsed sna tshogs sgyur byed cing / /thabs dang
shes rab gnyis med cing / /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing / /rdo rje dbang gis mtshams sbyar nas/ /yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog mnyes/ /nam
mkha'i mthar thug bar du ni/ /bde chen ye shes zag pa med/ /ye shes rgya mtsho byin brlabs can/ /nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bor
'gyur| |rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las/ 'phrin las mtha' yas pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //
de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i lam la gang dga' bas/ /thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i lam/ /rim pa nyid du bshad par bya/ /dad dang brtul
zhugs che ba dang / /theg pa chen por rig nges shing / /snying rtse dbang dang dam tshig ldan/ /sgrub la brtson pa'i gang zag gis/ /lus dang longs spyod 'tsho
ba dang / /bu dang chung ma rgyal srid kyis/ /dang por bla ma mnyes byas la/ /thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa blang / /phyi nang snod bcud
ma lus pa/ /rang byung ye shes rang snang ba/ /gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis/ /bden pa gnyis med 'brel pa nyid/ /byin brlabs sgra dang gtan tshigs
kyi| |rang byung ye shes mngon du snang / /rang gnas 'khor lo bsam mi khyab/ /rtog ge'i spyod yul ma gyur pa/ /thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi/ /'phel dang
dga' bde longs spyod phyir/ /rgyas pa'i las la 'bad par bya/ /dbang chen gzi byin che ba dang / /rgyal rigs blon po bram ze dang / /gdug pa dbang du
bsdu ba'i phyir/ /rjes dgug dbang gi las brtsam mo/ /dgra dang bgegs sogs ma rungs pa/ /gang gis 'dul bar mi nus pa/ /gzir zhing 'du shes
bsgyur ba'i phyir/ /drag po bsgral ba'i 'phrin las brtsam/ /gang yang rung ba'i dngos po la/ /dang po mi mthun zhi bar bya/ /de nas yon tan rgyas par bya/ /de
nyid dbang bsdu las la sbyar/ /gal te dbang du ma gyur na/ /drag pos gzir te bsgral bar bya/ /gal te log par lhung srid pas/ /'og min gnas su phaT gyis
'phangs| |nges par 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za/ /dang por sngon bya'i las kyis ni/ /nus dang mi nus khyad par brtag /de nas nus pa thob pa ste/ /de nas bde ba'i rtsal thob nas//
thogs pa med pa'i 'phrin las 'grub/ /zag med lam la sogs sbyangs pas/ /cho 'phrul bzhi dang 'phrin las bzhi/ /gdul bya zhing dang nus mthu dang / /byin brlabs
rtsal gis khyad par 'phags/ /mthar phyin sku lnga'i zhing thob pas/ /ma rtsal chu dang rlabs bzhin du/ /dpag med yon tan ngo bo'i phyir/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las
yin| |las dang nyon mongs gdug pa dang / /sdug bsngal rtog pa ji snyed pa/ /cho ga thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /lhan ne lhang nger zhi bar 'gyur/ /nga rgyal rin chen gzi
brjid kyis/ /dpal dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang / /tshe dang lang tsho stobs ldan zhing / /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /'dod chags rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis//
bdud dang gdug pa rgyal po dang / /lha dbang srin po mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyag na rdo rje'ang dbang du 'gyur/ /zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis/ /cho ga rdzas dang sngags ldan pas/ /
chos sku rdo rje 'ang 'jig 'gyur na/ /gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /rang lus bde chen kun gyi dbyings/ /rang lus thig le'i thabs mkhas pas/ /sbyor ba rlung gi
goms stobs can/ /dkyil 'khor nang la gnas gyur pas/ /nyams kyis las bzhi gsal gyur te/ /rim pa ji bzhin 'gyur ba
dang / /rang gi mngon par gsal gyur pa/ /nus pa bstan pas mngon du 'gyur/ /gzhan min 'khor lo pho brang nyid/ /gnas dang 'jug dang gzung ba dang //
bstim zhing gnas pa gang yin pa/ /de dag nyid du bshad pa yin/ /d+harma tsakra gzhal yas khang / /rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dkyil na/ /e baM ma ya las
bzhi dbyibs/ /kha dog las kyis gtsor gyur pa/ /bag chags sa bon snyigs ma dang / /rtog dang tha mal zhen pa'i rdzas/ /nyams myong 'gyur med bzhir
gnas te/ /thig les de nyid zhi ba dang / /rang lus phyi nang thig les rgyas/ /rlung dang thig le rtog par bcas/ /nus pas dbang du 'dus pa dang / /thig les
ma bcos nam mkha'i ngang / /srog dang thig ler bcas bsdus pa/ /a yi ngang du thim 'gyur te/ /rgyu ba dwangs shing 'phar ba gnon/ /mi 'gyur dbyings la
gnas par bya/ /rang lus thabs kyi ngo bo las/ /'khor lo bzhi dang me rlung dang / /bskyod pa rlung gis las rung pas/ /nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal//
thig les rgyud dang lus rgyas pas/ /bde chen dbang thob zhen chags bral/ /ting 'dzin sbyor bas gang bskul na/ /rim pa'i rtags dang nus pa 'byung / /kha dog grangs
dang snying po dang / /dbyibs dang tshad dang thig le yi/ /khyab pa la sogs mtha' yas pa/ /bzhugs tshul de nyid de bzhin no/ /'khor lo bzhi yi thab khung du/ /gtum
mo byin za'i las bskul bas/ /dwangs snyigs rtog pa'i bag chags dag /mi shigs thig ler mchod pa phul/ /phyi nang rgyu ba ma lus pa/ /rang byung 'khor lo thig
le mchog /spyod yul thun mong ma lus pa/ /phyi yi rnam pa lam byed pas/ /thun mong phyi yi lam du bshad/ /de nyid nang du rtsa 'khor lo/ /thig les nang du nyams
bskyed pa/ /rim pa 'di ni nang du bshad/ /dbang thob sbyangs pa ma rtogs pa/ /skal ngan rigs chad yul min pa/ /gsang bas gsang ba zhes bshad do/ /dang por
blo ldan gang zag ni/ /ma lus bden pa dbyer med la/ /rang bzhin rig pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /phung po khams dang skye mched la/ /thabs dang shes gnyis med
pa'i don/ /ye nas sangs rgyas rdzogs pa nyid/ /de nyid dus gsum ma skyes pa/ /gang la brten nas rtogs pa la/ /lam gyi yan lag kun rdzogs te/ /sa bcu
rim par ma bkod rdzogs/ /ma lus yon tan rang shar bas/ /thams cad ma lus ma 'da' la/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras
bu nyid| |dbang po gcig car spyod yul yin/ /gang su blo dang mos pa dang / /rtogs chung mtshan ma dga' ba la/ /thun mong sgo mthun khyad par can/ /rim pa'i rnal
'byor brlab par bya/ /dang por phyi nang snod bcud kun/ /rangs nyid na mi dmigs pa/ /ma bcos ma bsal mi gnas pa/ /dngos po ci yang mi brtag cing / /de nyid
la yang mi rtog pa/ /'dzin rtog zhen pa mi gnas par/ /bsam dang bsam bya med tshul gyis/ /bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa/ /gang gi ngo bor ma grub pa/ /ci
la'ang mi gnas sbyor ba yis/ /rang sar mi rtog ngo bo nyid/ /bcos pa med pa'i tshul du bsgom/ /gal te mtshan ma'i rgyu ba dag /chu las rnyog pa'i tshul byung
na| |ma bcos rang bzhin bzhag pa yis/ /ma lus rtog med de bzhin nyid/ /rang bzhin bzhag pas dag par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' dag par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /
sprin kyang rang byung dag pa ltar/ /byung tshor dran rtog ma lus pa/ /chos nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no/ /gang du snang srid ma lus pa/ /phyi nang med pa'i sems nyid de//
da nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin du/ /goms shing nus pa brtan pa'i tshe/ /de nyid rnal 'byor de nyid ni/ /stong pa chen po rnal 'byor yin/ /sgo gsum byed spyod ma bcos pa//
ma brtags mi rtog cir mi gnas/ /'di ni rnal 'byor rtse gcig pas/ /bya ba spangs pa'i spyod pa yin/ /de nas de las langs pa'i tshe/ /sgyu ma chu zla smig rgyu dang //
'ja' tshon lbu ba chu bur ltar/ /snang yang dngos por gnas ma yin/ /rig pa phyi nang ma lus par/ /stong pa'i chu 'phrul snang du zad/ /ma lus rig pa'i ngo bo ste/ /de yang
sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar/ /zhen chags med pa'i tshul du bsgom/ /ye shes sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni/ /dpag med ngo bor rang snang yang / /byin rlabs cho 'phrul rang snang ba//
de ltar ma rtogs dman pa la/ /rang byung snying rje 'char ba'i phyir/ /snying rje chen po rnal 'byor yin/ /'gro ba gang dang gang dag las/ /snying rje chen po gang gzigs
pas| |sna tshogs mdzad pa'i tshul nyid kyis/ /de snyed spyod la mtha' yas te/ /don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston/ /tha mal pa dang thabs nyid dang / /lus ngag yid
kyis ci 'tsham par/ /don 'gyur spyod pa bsam mi khyab/ /gang du byams dang snying rje yis/ /mi khyab ming gi rnal 'byor te/ /theg pa chen po'i rigs chad cing / /dman
pa'i rigs su gyur pa yin/ /rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /nam mkha'i ris dang dbyer med ltar/ /ma
lus rang rgyud bral ba yis/ ngo bo de min rdzun pa min/ /chos rnams ming tsam dngos po med/ /sgo gsum 'di ltar brtan pa ni/ /thugs rje chen po spyod pa yin/ /de
nas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid/ /rang bzhin gnyis med rig pa yi/ /yi ge hUM du gsal bar bsgom/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/ /'phro 'dus hUM du gsal bar
bya| |rdul phran de snyed 'dus pa las/ /thig le mi dmigs stong par blta/ /ma dang a las nyi zla'i gdan/ /gang bsgril hUM bcas gsal bar bya/ /rang rang
gsung yang 'gal ba med/ /sgril ma'i snying po phyag mtshan te/ /'phro 'du phra mo'i rang bzhin sku/ /gsal la skyon dang bral bar bsgom/ /de nas rang rang tshad gyur
pa'i| |rigs pa'i phyag rgya chen po nyid/ /zhi dang khro bo skabs dag tu/ /ji ltar 'thad par bsgom par bya/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/ /yang na zhal gsum
phyag drug bsgom/ /gnas gcig gnas gsum gnas lngar yang / /yan lag lha ni tshang bar bsgom/ /goms nas bstims te spyod yul kun/ /de ltar gsal
bar brtag par bya/ /rtsa ba gcig pa'i lha bsgom pa/ /phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor yin/ /sgo gsum bsgom la rab 'byor pas/ /rnam par g.yeng ba'i chos
spyod 'das/ /ma lus rtsa ba'i spyod pa ste/ /phyogs gcig pa yi spyod par gsungs/ /de nas rtog pa'i yan lag dag /gnyis ka thabs dang shes rab tu/ /brtags
te de ltar bsgom par bya/ /'od zer 'phro ba 'bru gsum nyid/ /yang na ye shes lnga nyid de/ /gnas gcig snying por gnas par bya/ /de bzhin gtso bo gtso mo dang / /
sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang / /khro bo khro mo sprul pa dang / /yid chos dag la'ang shes par bya/ /zhal dang phyag dang lha grangs dang / /tshom bu spros pas spros
bcas yin/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/ /tshom bu lnga la khros bcas bsgom/ /yang na sku gsung thugs ldan pa'i/ /tshom bu gsum dang bcas pa yi/ /khro
bo khro mo 'khor du bsgom/ /rigs kyi gtso ste thugs kyi mchog /khro bo tshogs dang bcas pa yi/ /mos pa'i tshul dang sbyor ba yis/ /tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams
bsgom| |slob dpon mthar nye'i lam gnas pa'i/ /rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa/ /rdo rje thig tshad bor tsam gyis/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa/ /sna
tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs/ /dang po rgyang grags dkyil 'khor te/ /de nas dpag tshad dkyil 'khor nyid/ /nam
mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom/ /de nas yo byad lnga ldan pas/ /ting 'dzin mos pa spyod mthun pa'i/ /skye bo
tsam du grangs mthun pas/ /tshom bus 'dod pa'i don bsgrub bya/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi/ /pho mo 'dus pa'i grangs mnyam par/ /yo byad 'dus
pa'i tshogs ldan pas/ /dgon par 'khor khang bar brtsigs te/ /rang rang thabs dang shes rab tu/ /brtags te yo byad longs spyod cing / /rdo rje glu bro
gar thabs kyis/ /zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /tshe la dbang bsgyur zag med thob/ /de nas brgya phrag bcu drug
gis| |sku lnga lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /skye bo mdza' ba kun tshogs pa/ /rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs zhes bya/ /'byor pa'i longs spyod tshor ba ni/ /bde
ba'i longs spyod tshogs su bshad/ /lha dang dam can kun 'dus pa'i/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs su gsungs/ /thams cad spyod pa mi 'dzin pas/ /tshogs
gnyis rgyun du rdzogs byed pas/ /tshogs chen po ru nges par bshad/ /bar chad med pa'i lam rdzogs pas/ /rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa med/ /lha mi cha byad 'dzin
mod kyi| |'byung lnga cho 'phrul dbang sgyur thob/ /zhing dang longs spyod dag pa yis/ /gong nas gong du mnyam par sbyor/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku/ /zhing khams
kun la gnas par byed/ /gal te mtshan mar zhen dbang gis/ /rtogs pa'i stobs ni chung gyur na/ /byang chub phyag rgya rdo rje sku/ /mtshan dang dpa byad la sogs pa/ /
cha lugs mngon du byung ba yang / /zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min/ /gang du sbyar ba'i yum rnams kyang / /thun mong lam dang skabs gnyis su/ /nus pa'i khyad par che
chung gis/ /'phrin las bzhi ru bshad pa ni/ /dkar mo bong chung skad che la/ /bzhin lus gtsug phud g.yas su 'khyil/ /yan lag phra 'jam skad gsal zhing //
rlung khar ci bas zhi ba bya/ /zla dang yan lag mang ba dang / /phra zhing bshad la bzangs su ring / /bzhin lus ser zhing gru bzhir gnas/ /rnam 'phyang sha dang nu ma
rgyas| |'phel ba'i dus su 'di dag gzung / /bzhin mdog pad 'dra sogs ka la/ /smin dkyus ring la stod smad phyed/ /lus dang chu rlung dri zhim zhing / /bde ba
ldan zhing yan lag med/ /'di ni sdud pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /'di ni sdud pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /nag mo gru gsum rtsid mgo ma/ /khro gnyer byis pa'i lus ldan
zhing / /gtum zhing brlang tshig 'dzem pa med/ /gtsang sma'i rtog bral gsod par bshad/ /gang du nus pa brtan thob pa/ /de dag sa nas sar sbyong ba/ /rig
pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor rim pa'i lung ldan pa/ /ma skyes mnyam la dbang bsgyur zhing / /ma lus gsal bar mthar phyin pa'o/ /rang rig ye
shes rgyud don phyir/ /rang snang rig pa mngon byas pa/ /rig 'dzin mchog ste lhun grub pa'o/ /ting 'dzin nus pa'i mthu med kyang / /sa sbyong sems dpa'i
bskyed du med/ /bde gshegs nyid dang spyod yul gcig /rig pa'i skyes bu'i lung thob pa'i/ /gal te 'byung ba'i lus 'jig na/ /bdag nyid sgo gsum
lhar lta zhing / /'byung ba bsags pa'i lus las grol/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya chen por smin/ /khyung phrug sbubs dang bral ba ltar/ /ma lus phyag rgya sgyu ma'i
mchog /rnam par smin ces de la brjod/ /zag pa zad pa rdo rje lus/ /phyin chad 'gyur 'jig chos dang bral/ /bde ba chen po'i lung thob pas/ /zag bcas
bslab pa'i chos dang bral/ /zhing la dbang sgyur sprul pa'i lus/ /ting 'dzin longs spyod dpag tu med/ /sgrub pa'i nus pa gang brtan pa/ /rdo rje lus gyur 'jig
pa med| |'jigs pa lnga bral zag pa zad/ /dbang sgyur gsum la dbang thob pas/ /bde ba longs spyod dpag tu med/ /grangs med bskal par don byed cing / /mthong
bas de bzhin gnyis med rigs/ /rgyal tshab skyes bu sa skyong ba/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/ /nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing / /mtha' dbus bsam
pa'i rgyun las 'das/ /'jigs bral dbugs phyin mya ngan 'das/ /rang snang dpag med zhal mthong bas/ /gzhan du blta ba'i yul dang bral/ /ting 'dzin rig
pa goms pa'i mthu/ /mtshan ma sdug po yul las 'das/ /'jig rten stong phrag dbang sgyur zhing / /gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i rigs/ /nam mkha' mtha' thug
med pa ltar/ /bsgoms dang nus pa'i rtsal stobs kyis/ /bag chags mtshan ma'i tshang tshing la/ /ting 'dzin rig pa'i me 'byung bas/ /zhing khams rgya bral dpag
med du| |ting 'dzin rig pas gang sbyangs pa/ /bsgoms dang ting 'dzin rig pa yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung thob pa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin/ /de
nas rig pa'i rtsal rdzogs shing / /ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis/ /mthar phyin rig pa'i skyes bu ste/ /zhing khams bye ba'i dbang
thob cing / /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi sras/ /dbang dang cho 'phrul kun thob pa/ /nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dgongs pas khyab/ /mnyam gzhag rjes thob khyad par
gyis| |rgyal ba'i lung gnod bka' la gnas/ /zhing khams dag par kun spyod kyang / /rmad byung gsang ba'i rang bzhin la/ /spyod kyang lta ba'i rang bzhin
gyis| |phyogs bral nam mkha' mi mthong bas/ /dbang dang dgongs pas mthar phyin 'gyur/ /dbang dang dam tshig brtul zhugs te/ /dang po bslab pa
mthar phyin cing / /thig le rdzogs par 'dod pa yis/ /gsang ba nang gi don la sbyor/ /thun mong bya ba mthar phyin nas/ /lus dang spyod yul bcas pa
dang / /lha yi rnal 'byor ma lus pa/ /bde chen thig le nyid du blta/ /lha dang bde bar mnyam sbyor bas/ /thig le bde bar snang ba nub/ /sku bzhi dkyil
'khor khams thig le/ /dwangs ma lnga ru mnyam sbyor ba/ /ngo bo dang ni rkyen dag gis/ /thabs kyi rim pa bskul las shes/ /bde ba'i thig le nyams myong
ba| |mi rtog bde ba cha shas med/ /mi shigs thig le kun gyi bdag /stong nyid 'brel ba'i ri mo can/ /tha mal bya ba kun bral ba/ /spyod pa nyid du bstan pa yin/ /
thig le bzhu ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /'dzag 'bar thim gang bde ba ni/ /sa yang bcu gsum bde bas brgyan/ /lus kun khyab pa'i thig le shum/ /til 'bru
bcud kyis khyab pa ltar/ /ma lus khyab pa'i ros gang ba/ /ma lus 'od dang snying po ltar/ /snang srid thig le chen po nyid/ /bde ba chen pos khyab par gsal/ /
ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ni/ /khams lnga 'dres pa'i snying po ste/ /mi shi shigs thig le bde ba'i bcud/ /ma lus bde ba'i rgyas btab pas/ /nam mkha'i ye shes
cir yang gsal/ /dus gsum rgyal pa'i dgongs pa ste/ /thig le gcig gis kun khyab pas/ /bde chen snying rjes gcig tu 'khyil/ /de nyid bde chen phyag rgya
ste| |nang gi phyag rgya gcig par bshad/ /de nyid nges par las rung bas/ /thig le bde chen dang bcas pa'i/ /bye brag brgyad cu ma lus par/ /so so'i thig ler
su 'phros shing / /khams lnga ye shes ro dang bcas/ /sa bon thig le bde bas brgyan/ /mi rtog thig le thugs mchog sgra/ /rang lus smin nas snang bar spro/ /
gang nas gang la spros gyur pa/ /de srid thig le'i phyag rgya ste/ /bde ba'i thig le grangs las 'das/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsung
thugs| |mi phyed ro yis gang khyab pas/ /grangs 'das bde chen tshogs rdzogs nas/ /ma lus bde ba'i phyag rgyar snang / /gang de de yes rgyas btab pas/ /
de nyid bde chen thig ler smin/ /rnam pa phyi nang snyigs mar bcas/ /bde chen thig le'i ngo bor smin/ /snyigs ma 'byung ba'i lus las 'das/ /snying po
bar chad med pa'i lus/ /thig les tha mal snod gang bas/ /ma lus bde ba chen por smin/ /de nas thabs dang ting 'dzin dang / /rlung gi 'dres pa'i stobs
ldan pa| |rin chen lung gi thig ler zhugs/ /skad cig mngon shes gsum smin cing / /'gro ba ris dang thar par 'gyur/ /mi shig a la thig la thim/ /'byung
'jug med pa'i rlung 'thob cing / /'gyur 'jig med pa'i lus la gnas/ /'phel 'grib med pa'i bde ba nyid/ /snang ba thig le nyid du ste/ /thig le thung du a
ru thim| |gnyis med bde ba cha shas bral/ /'di ni zag med rang byung ba/ /rkyen dang bral ba'i bde chen nyid/ /dper na me dang tsha ba 'am/ /rgya mtsho dang ni rlan
bzhin no/ /rlung dang thig le rig pa dang / /tshe dang longs spyod 'byung ba dang / /'dod lnga kun la dbang sgyur thob/ /bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ /ma lus zag
med thig le ste/ /rgya bral rig pa'i thig le nyid/ /snyigs ma'i zag pa rlung zad pas/ /ting 'dzin bde chen thig ler gsal/ /rig pa bde chen por gsal
bas| |ci mthong bde chen phyag rgya nyid/ /'du bas sgyur ba'i spyod yul lam/ /mun gyur dug rtsi ji bzhin du/ /rgya dang bral ba'i zhing khams dag /bde chen phyag
rgya chen por 'gyur/ /gang dag sgom pa'i skyes bu ni/ /tha mal pa dang brkam chags pa/ /rnam pa'i spros pa ma lus pa/ /bsgoms dang tshad du ma byas par/ /bde
chen thig ler lhun gyi grub/ /dper na chu dang rlabs bzhin nam/ /rgya mtshor phyin pa'i 'du shes ltar/ /goms pas bde chen gsal mthar phyin/ /rkyen dang
gnod pa ma lus pa/ /reg dang mthong thos dran pas kyang / /bde chen thig le nyams su 'bar/ /bskal pa du mar gnas gyur cing / /'byung ba lnga dang spyod yul
kun| |rang lus bde bar bsre ba 'grub/ /gsang ba'i lam la goms byed na/ /mtshon byed rig pa'i bde ba yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rtogs/ /mthar
phyin lam gyi rim pa 'grub/ /dbang po dar zhing chags pa dang / /bde chen mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /e dang bam la gnas pa
yi| |byang chub rdo rje dril las 'byung / /dngos po lhan cig skyes pa yis/ /ma lus bde bar rtogs byas la/ /phyi nang sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /gang zhig rtags
dang ldan pa'i tshe/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas/ /bde chen mchog la rol par bya/ /ye shes nyi zla mnyam ldan pas/ /re dogs chad pa'i thig le 'byung / /
lhung med gnas dang thim pa dang / /bdag po gdung can phrad pa las/ /nyin mtshan bral ba'i snang ba ltar/ /dus gcig nyi zla shar ba'i tshe/ /ma lus bde
bas khyab gyur na/ /g.yo ba med pa'i thig le 'char/ /gal te nyams pa'i ltas byung na/ /thabs dang nyams dang rol pa yis/ /rim pa bzhin du bslab par bya//
thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /nyi zla 'dres pa'i thig le nyid/ /dngos bral lhan cig skyes pa nyid/ /rgyal ba kun gyi phyag rgya yin/ /lhan cig skyes
la gnas pa'i tshe/ /ma lus bde chen ro gcig pas/ /bde chen phyag rgya gcig tu gnas/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i thig le nyid/ /sa ya bcu gsum phrag gnyis rtsa//
nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis/ /so so bde ba'i pho brang du/ /thig les gang bar spros pa'i tshe/ /sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ /nyams myong ro yis rgyas
btab bo/ /lus kyi bde ba mthar phyin nas/ /rgyu rkyen rten 'brel las 'das pa'i/ /rig pa'i bde ba la gnas bya/ /gal te nyams na bsam pa 'am/ /blta dang
mnyan pa la sogs pas/ /bar chad med par bsgom par bya/ /rig pa bde bar gang smin pas/ /sgo gsum bde ba chen por smin/ /spyod yul rlung dang thig ler
bcas| |goms pa'i thabs la dbang bsgyur bas/ /rten dang brten par bcas pa yi/ /thig le rlung la dbang bsgyur zhing / /lha mo mi mo gnod sbyin mo/ /mkha'
'gro rnams la dbang byed nus/ /thig le dbab dang 'jig pa dang / /zlog dang sbyor la dbang bsgyur te/ /gal te mkha' la 'phros pa'i tshe/ /dngos grub lam dang
bral ba yin/ /phyin chad mchod dang nus pa sbyin/ /rang gi skabs ni ma gtogs pa/ /gzhan du thig le mi ltung zhing / /dbang sgyur lam la goms par bya/ /nyi zla
'dres pa'i bde ba nyid/ /zag med snying por thim pa'i tshe/ /sems kyi bde bar rang snang zhing / /sems kyi bde ba bar chad med/ /gsal byed stobs dang bral ba'i
tshe/ /ma lus bde chen phyag rgya ste/ /lus sems mnyam du gnas pa nyid/ /tshad dang rgya dbyings ro las 'das/ /dpag med bde ba'i
rol mo ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgyes chen te/ /thig le sa bon zag pa bral/ /bde chen nyams myong rgyun mi chad/ /rang nyid thig ler nyams myong bas/ /
snying po'i thig le bral ba med/ /phra zhing rdul bral dri ma med/ /rdo rje thig le dril bu nyid/ /'bad rtsol med par rang snang ba/ /bral thob med pa'i ngo bor gnas/ /
gang du yon tan tshogs kyis rab rgyas pa/ /bde chen chu rgyun lta bu'i rgyan las byung / /tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub/ /gzhan
na med de rang nyid snang bar zad/ /rang bzhin gnas phyir gzhan nas 'ong ba med/ /zhen pa bzlog pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong / /rdo rje sems dpa'
sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las/ lam gyi khyad par ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan
yang bshad bya ba/ /ma lus kun gyi bsgrub bya nyid/ /phyogs bcu ma lus rdul snyed kyi/ /che ba'i yon tan bshad par bya/ /mthar phyin lnga yi rang bzhin no/ /
rtogs dang 'bras bur gnas mod kyi/ /mthong dang goms dang grub pa nyid/ /thun mong 'bras bur yang dag bshad/ /yang dag mthar phyin 'bras bur ni/ /thabs chen
thabs las byung ba yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /dpag med yon tan lhun rdzogs pa/ /tshad dang dmigs pa las 'das pa/ /bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa
ste| |nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag med pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/ /ma lus mchog gi gter gyur pa/ /zad 'phel med pa'i nor bu ste/ /ma lus
kun la mnyam du gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /rgya dbyings tshod las 'das pa yi/ /dag dang ma dag ci snang yang / /blang dor phyogs ri sa yongs
kyis med/ /rang byung 'od gsal maN+Dal la/ /ma lus gcig gi rang bzhin te/ /thugs rje'i byin brlabs tshad med pas/ /ma lus bsam pa skong bar mdzad/ /
rang byung ye shes lhun grub ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo bas/ /ma lus phyogs med rang snang yang / /zhen dang ched du byas pa med/ /sa dang lam la sogs pa
yi| |theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu ni/ /rang rang ltos pa'i mthar thug kyang / /che mchog lhun grub mnyam dang bral/ /skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas
dpag med yon tan rnams/ /rigs bdag rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ /ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis/ /nyi zla'i bde ba sngon thob ste/ /rdo rje
'chang gis la bkod/ /dpag med rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /'gro ba'i gdul bya mtha' yas pas/ /sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te/ /bzhugs tshul dpag
med rnam par snang / /che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas drug pa'i rang bzhin te/ /nam mkha'i mthas gtugs mtshan pa yi/ /bde chen yi shes
rgyas par gnas/ /bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa ltar/ /ma lus rdzogs pa'i ye shes nyid/ /sa mtha'i nyes pa kun bral ba/ /kun gyi yon tan bdag nyid gnas//
sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas pa'i/ /nam mkha'i mtha' thug bar du ni/ /gdul bya'i rdul snyed gnas kyi bar/ /skad cig 'du 'bral med par gnas/ /bcud
'dus thig le chen po ni/ /bde ba'i zag med thig le ste/ /a dang bde bar 'brel pa yis/ /ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /thig le'i bye brag brgyad cu'i
rtsa| |bcud 'dus gsang ba'i thig le'i ro/ /ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing / /ma lus gang ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /zhing khams phyogs bcu mtha' yas
pa| |zag med thig ler ro gcig pas/ /nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid/ /sku bzhi 'dus pa'i khams thig le/ /dwangs ma lnga 'dus snying po can/ /gsum
'dus mi 'gyur snying po ste/ /bdes gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po/ /thig le ro yis gang phye ba/ /dpag med sku gsung yon tan thugs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab
yang snang ba/ /thig le phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/ /phyi nang dwangs snyigs ma lus pa/ /rang byung dwangs ma'i thig le nyid/ /gzhan med phyogs med rang snang ba/ /phyogs
med bde ba chen po nyid/ /gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni/ /yon tan rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste/ /bde ba chen po'i snying po las/ /dpag med yon tan rnam par 'phrul//
bde ba chen po'i thig le ni/ /'du 'phro brel bas zag pa med/ /phyogs ris 'das pas ma khyab med/ /thog mtha' med par mnyam pa yin/ /rgyal ba kun gyi rang
bzhin te/ /thig le ro la mnyam bzhugs pas/ /nam mkha'i mthas gtugs chos thams cad/ /bde ba chen por gsal bar myong / /mtshan dang dpe byad
tshad 'das pa/ /rang la rdzogs pa'i thig le nyid/ /ji snyed bde ba'i rol ba kun/ /rang la rdzogs pa nyid du gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni/ /rang byung
thig le chen po ste/ /A li kA li zhu ba las/ /rnam mkha' khyab pa'i bde ba 'byung / /gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi rgyu/ /nam mkha'i
thig le gsang ba'i ngang / /khyab pa chen po phyogs cha med/ /lus gnas rang bzhin ma skyes pa/ /bde ba'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/ /nam mkha'
lta bur dpag tu med/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /gsang ba'i thig le bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /dpag med til 'bru rdul snyed kyi/ /rgyal ba
kun dang ldan cig tu/ /ma lus bde ba chen po'i ro/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /ma gsungs rig pas nyams btang bas/ /mi 'dzin longs
spyod chen po'i gnas/ /rang byung nyi zla rten gyi ro/ /ma spangs 'dus pas 'du 'bral med/ /gsang ba'i thig le bcud 'dus pa/ /nam mkha' gang ba bde ba'i
ro| |gnyis med 'khril pa'i stobs las byung / /mkha' dbyings byang chub 'byor pa'i sems/ /ma btang ma spros thig le che/ /nam mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha'
bzhin du/ /bde ba'i tshad kyang dpag tu med/ /yab yum gnas pa'i grangs chad kyang / /nam mkha'i khams kyi rdul snyed de/ /re re'ang bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /
rdul snyed nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /yab yum gnyis med 'brel ba yi/ /thabs dang shes rab bcud 'dus pa/ /gang yang mi sgrib thig le'i ro/ /snang
gsum mtshan ma las 'das pa/ /sangs rgyas rin chen kun gyi bcud/ /bye ba rdul snyed grangs 'das pa'i/ /ma lus kun dang lhan cig tu/ /mos dang chags pa'i
khyad par gyis/ /cha lugs mtha' yas snang ba ni/ /la lar chags par lta ba'i tshul/ /de bzhin 'jam par smra ba dang / /la lar 'khyud cing lta ba ste/ /la
lar sen thabs zhal sbyor zhing / /la lar mnye dang rdeb dang 'dung / /'gyed dang 'dung dang 'gyed pa yi/ /dkar 'dzin ston dang lte ba ston/ /'o dang 'tshir dang
rgod pa dag /sna tshogs rol pa 'di dag gis/ /ma chags pa dag chags byed cing / /chags pa myur du nyams par byed/ /tha skam myur du bengs byed cing / /bde
chen lo thog skyed par byed/ /bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yi/ /lha dang lha mo 'khor bcas pas/ /steg cing 'dzum pas lhan cig tu/ /rol cing glu ni len par
byed| |e ma ho sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bde ba che/ /lhan cig skyes pa mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba ste/ /rdo rje pad+mar bcug bskyod pas ni brtags pa'i
snang ba nub/ /ma lus khyab pas mkha' ltar dga' bar byas kyang dbang po rlung gi rlabs/ /bde ba'i sa bon zag pa rnams ni slar yang ldang
bar byed/ /rgyu ba rnam par chad pa'i kha sbyor bde chen ni/ /nam mkha'i rgya mnyam yun yang de srid bar du gnas pa ste/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni lha mo khyod la tshang ba
ste| |bdag ni khyod la bsten cing dga' bas mig bteg ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing du blta/ /gang tshe 'gro ba'i tha mal bder spyod yul la chags par zhugs pa na//
dga' dang bde dang rtse gcig yid 'ong 'dod par rab zhugs pas/ /dbang po gnyis rol nyi zla phrad cing bde chen mchog skyes che/ /skye rga na 'chi'i re dogs ngo tsha mi
tsha grags pa'i chos brgyad tshod kyang byis pas mi shes so/ /gang zhig thabs dang shes rab bral bas gsang ba'i don 'jug pa/ /rgya mtsho la ni sa bon btab bzhin
'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ste/ /nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' tha skabs te/ /rgyal ba nyid kyang thabs dang shes rab bral bas byang chub myu gu gtan
nas bskams ho/ /'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis/ /rdul snyed bcas pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams/ /rang rang rgyan dang gos dor te/ /dpa' bo sgeg mo'i tshul 'dzin cing / /
dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du/ /glu dang gar ni sna tshogs kyis/ /tha mal yid rtog bcad nas ni/ /bde chen yid ni 'phrog par mdzad/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor
bsam yas dang / /zhing thabs bde ba rmad byung ba/ /'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa/ /dpag med mtha' yas cir snang yang / /rang byung ye shes byang chub sems/ /
thig le gcig gi ngo bo las/ /mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis/ /'dul ba'i dbang du ci yang spro/ /thabs la thabs kyis dbang bsgyur bas/ /thabs chen thabs
las byung ba yi/ /ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad po che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ /thabs chen sgyu ma rmad du byung / /sgyu ma skya 'gag med pa'i dbyings/ /sku gsung yon
tan 'phrin las thugs/ /ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /thams cad rang rig byang chub sems/ /kun nas 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor ste/ /kun gyi rang bzhin 'byung
gnas nyid/ /bya ba byed la byas pa med/ /zad dang 'phel ba med pa yi/ /dngos grub gter chen bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes thig le rang snang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab
mtha' yas mchog /mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes ni/ /gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med/ /nam mkha' rang byung rtag pa ltar/ /'pho 'gyur med pas de bzhin
no| |nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa bzhin/ /rang byung ye shes thog mtha' med/ /ma byung ma skyes byang chub sems/ /ye shes nyi ma'i
'od ltar gsal/ /sangs rgyas sems can grol thar kun/ /ma lus rang rig 'od gsal bas/ /rang byung ye shes rang snang phyir/ /mkhyen dang sgrib pa cung
zad med/ /mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyag gcig la/ /rang gi cha shas chos bral bas/ /nam mkha'i mtha' thug chos rnams kun/ /skad cig ma 'dres tshul du
mkhyen| |rang rig byang chub sems nyid las/ /mthon dman blang dor ma dmigs pas/ /'khor ba'i ngo bor rang snang yang / /ma chags skyon med pad+ma 'dra/ /
dpag med yon tan ngo bo rnams/ /rang byung rig pa rang snang bas/ /ma lus ngo mtshar rgya mtsho rnams/ /rang snang gzhan las thob bya med/ /byin rlabs cho
'phrul rmad kyi chos/ /rang byung nyid las rnam par spro/ /tshul ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/ /dag dang ma dag khyad par gyis/ /ngo bo gcig las ma g.yos kyang / /
mos pas mthong tshul de bzhin no/ /gsung ni nam mkhas khyab par ni/ /phyogs bcu khyab par sgra sgrog pa/ /mos pa bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i/ /bsam yas/ /
'dul thabs sna tshogs snang / /thugs ni ma lus mkhyen pa'i thugs/ /phan pa dang bcas brtser ldan pa'i/ /mngon shes mkhyen pa'i ye shes spro/ /ye shes thugs
la khyad par med/ /yon tan tshad khyad bral ba ste/ /nam mkha'i nor bu gter 'chang ba/ /dpag med bsam pa bskang ba'i phyir/ /byin rlabs yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul//
'phrin las byin rlabs rang snang ba/ /'gro 'ong med pa'i don tshul gyis/ /dpag bsam bum dang rin chen gyi/ /bya byed med par don rnams rdzogs/ /ma lus spros pa
rnam dag cing / /rang byung rig pa mtha' dbus med/ /ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas te/ /bde ba chen po chos kyi sku/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /gnyis
med dang la kun rdzogs pas/ /de nyid tshad bral mnga' brnyes pas/ /longs spyod yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku/ /sku gcig thig le'i ngo bo las/ /'jig rten khams
ni thams cad du/ /ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du/ /rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa'i sku/ /ma byung ma skyes don rtogs pas/ /ma lus dbyer med rdo rje nyid/ /mi 'jigs
gnyis po kun bral ba/ /rdo rje sku zhes rnam par bstan/ /gang du mngon par byang chub pa'i/ /'od gsal nam mkha' mtha' dbus med/ /sku bzhi mtha' yis ma reg pa/ /
dang po mngon par byang chub pa'o/ /ma lus dbye ba mtha' spangs shing / /de ltar kun dang mnyam par gnas/ /don gyis ma lus khyab 'gyur
ba| |brjod med don gyi gsung nyid do/ /sku dang phyag rgya gzigs tshul gyis/ /ting 'dzin dgongs pas 'dul ba la/ /brjod med tshul gyis gang ston pa/ /brda yi gsung
du rnam par bstan/ /gang yang rung ba mthong thos tshe/ /dpa' bos bltas pas g.yul sel ltar/ /dngos pos byang chub nam mkhar rtogs/ /byin rlabs rtogs
pa'i gsung zhes bya/ /gang gi don du gang snang ba/ /gnyen po bar chad mi gnas shing / /gzhan dag pham byed mi thub pa/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i gsung du
brjod| |tshig gcig brjod pas tshig mtha' yas/ /mos pa de snyed rnam grol cing / /yon tan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs/ /'di ni brjod pa tshig gi gsung / /
ji snyed mang por rnam spros kyang / /chos kyi dbyings la khyad par med/ /rtog la rnam rtog mtshan ma yang / /mi rtog ye shes grol ba'i thugs/ /gnyis med bde
ba chen po yis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga la rol/ /ma lus bde bar snang ba'i tshe/ /'di ni bde ba chen po'i thugs/ /bdag gzhan phyi nang mi mnga' yang //
rang byung gnyis kyi phyogs bral bas/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa kun mkhyen pas/ /'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i thugs/ /ji snyed rig pa'i don snang zhing / /ma lus
kun gyi ngo bo la/ /skye 'jig gnyen po gdod nas stong / /mi 'gyur rdo rje thugs rjes bya/ /dpag med nam mkha' zhing khams dang / /che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i
gdan| |zag pa med pa'i rgyan rnams dang / /ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi/ /'od zer tshogs ni rnam par snang / /gzhan
yang yon tan chen po ni/ /mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' ltar/ /dpag cing gzhal bar mi nus te/ /zag med che ba'i yon tan snang / /gzhan yang mdzad pa'i
'phrin las ni/ /gdul bya'i yul ni ji snyed pa/ /mdzad pa'i sgo ni bsam yas te/ /mtha' thug med par rnam par snang / /'di dag bsdus pas bshad bya na/ /zhi rgyas
dbang drag la sogs pas/ /mtha' yas bzhis ni rnam par bsdus/ /lhun gyis grub par kun kyang 'grub/ /mdor na 'bras bu'i rnam grangs ni/ /bsdus las nyi shu rtsa
lngar gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las/ /lhun gyis grub pa ma lus pa'i bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //
de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /dpag med rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/ /gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi mdzod/ /gter 'dzin
rgyal po stobs po che/ /rang gi lag gi rdo rje nyid/ /dga' zhing mgu bas gsor byas te/ /bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yis/ /rab tu bskor ba byas pa yis//
'jig rten drug tu bcas pa dag /'khrugs shing rnam par g.yo mdzad de/ /kun tu rab g.yo rnam par g.yo/ /stong gsum 'jig rten 'khor yug
bcas| |'od dang sgra yis gang mdzad de/ /rmad byung sku gsung thugs rnams kyi/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rnam par snang / /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad byung gi /phyi nang
gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / /'dod yon lnga yis khyab mdzad de/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs kun mnyes par byas/ /kun kyang dga' zhing mos pa yis/ /zhing
khams rdul dang mnyam pa yi/ /'khor tshogs rnams ni bstod pa 'di/ /sna tshogs sgras ni glu ru blangs/ /oM AHhUM a la la ho/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
thugs ni mi skye ye shes bde ba'i thugs/ /mi rtog gsal ba'i thugs ni kun la khyab par gnas/ /gang yang dbyer med 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma
byas min skye 'jig med/ /dam pa'i thugs la byung tshor g.yo 'gog ci yang med pas bde ho/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sku ni sna tshogs 'od 'bar bde ba'i sku/ /sna
tshogs mtha' yas ji ltar snang ba ngo bos dben/ /de nyid 'du ba'i thabs kyis de ltar yid 'phrog tshim pa'i sku/ /mtha' yas sna tshogs bye ba ji ltar gsal
yang nam mkha'i ngang du bye brag med ho/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo dpag med rgyas par snang / /'gro
ba rnams kyi yid 'phrog bltas pas chog shes med par mdzes/ /rgyal ba ma lus yon tan rdzogs par snang la de dag mtha' thug med ho/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
gsung ni zab cing rgya cher nam mkha' 'dra/ /ma lus go zhing tshim mdzad rdo rje'i sgra 'byin snyan sgrog pa/ /rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas mes dang 'thad pa de bzhin rnam par
snang ho/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i 'phrin las sna tshogs bya ba lhun gyis grub/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed 'gro ba ma lus kun 'dul ba/ /thabs dang shes rab 'du
'bral med pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'di ni rnam par rol ho/ /de nas rgyal mchog skyes bu yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa/ /bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa la/ /
gsang ba 'di ni gtad par mdzad/ /nga yi gsang ba'i snying po 'di/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bstan pa kun gyi rang bzhin
te| |ma lus kun gyi thabs su snang / /gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa ste/ /dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi rgyud/ /chos rnams ma lus kun snang ba/ /gsang ba'i me
long thabs kyi rgyud/ /rgyal ba rdul snyed kun 'dus nas/ /dam pa 'di la bsngags par mdzad/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po/ /zab mo'i lung gi nges don 'di//
rigs chad dman pa'i gang zag gis/ /thams cad la ni me long ltar/ /bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang bas/ /ston pa gnyis la rgyab phyogs shing //
brtags pas phyi rol chos la zhen/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang / /rdo rje spun la sdang sems che/ /zab mo'i don la skur byed cing / /gsang rgyud don la
'phya ba dang / /ser sna rang phyogs chags pa che/ /dad dang dam tshig mi ldan zhing / /rgyal srid rin chen mi gtong ba'i/ /phyi nang gnyis lta'i gang zag la/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /
lus sems bral bar byed gyur kyang / /gsang ba'i glegs bam mi bstan na/ /dbang dang dngos grub nam yang min/ /rmongs pas gal te byin na ni/ /de nyid
mnar med dmyal bar ltung / /dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun gtong zhing / /dam pa'i yo byad ldan gyur pas/ /lus dang srog la'ang
mi lta na/ /dman pa'i longs spyod nam yang min/ /theg pa che la mos pa dang / /brtul zhugs snying brtser gus par ldan/ /rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen bskur zhing / /skyon
dang spyo ba yongs su bzod/ /bskal par 'grogs kyang yid mi 'khrug /nyes dang legs pa ci la yang / /ngo mtshar skyo ba'i 'du shes med/ /rang bzhin bzang
dang tshul shis dang / /'grogs pas dug nang mi sdang ba'i/ /dam pa 'di la gsang ba gtad/ /slob dpon man ngag mi ldan cing / /gsang ba'i don la ma
goms pas/ /rang rtags log pa'i tshad ma yis/ /gsang ba'i sbas don gtan la 'bebs/ /blun po mun pas chod pa rnams/ /log par zhen pa'i rjes 'brangs
nas| |mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar smin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di/ /ma lus kun gyi gsang yin pas/ /
rtogs nas gsal bar gang byed pa/ /dbang dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste/ /bdag dang gzhan don lhun gyis grub/ /rdul snyed zhing la bsnyen bkur zhing / /
tshogs kyi bla ma bsten byas pa'i/ /'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te/ /de bas rgyal sras gcig gi yul/ /rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho
ba yis/ grags pa'i stobs ldan rnam par spangs/ /a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las/ mthar
phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po rdzogs
so|| ||rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / /ban+d+he dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slad nas ba mi la mi tra nyid la
ze mo dge slong mas yang dang yang du nan du zhus pa 'di gzhan la spel na dam tshig nyams so/ /bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha'
dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo khyab par stsal ba la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang rgya phyogs
bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes bo/ rtse mo
phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil pa/ ye shes
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs te/ rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad du gyur pa'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin
po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs
dang | reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la mi bsgribs par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas klubs pa/ rnam par thar
pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa'i phyi dang nang med par kun tu yang
nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng+ge'i khri dang / stobs kyi glang po'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rta'i khri dang / dbang gi rma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med
ba nam mkha' lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang
rgyab med pa thams cad du yang zhal thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du sku gsung thugs
sna tshogs par kun tu snang ba/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i sku gsung thugs chen po las thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs
kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag /ye shes rin po che'i phyag 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyi sa mi khyab pa'i dbu
gsum ngang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal
po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang //
de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / le brgan dang / ljang khu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa'i snang ba'i dbyings dang /
sra ba'i dbyings dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro ba'i dbyings dang / bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i chos
kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par khyab pa ni/ 'di lta sta/ dper na/ til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje
mthong ba dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang / btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang /mnyan
par bya ba dang / bsnom par bya ba dang / myong bar bya ba'i tshogs dang / byang chub chen po mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang / byang chub
chen po rdo rje snom pa dang / byang chub chen po myong ba dang / btsun mo 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i tshogs dang / 'joms pa
chen mo reg pa dang / 'joms pa chen po reg byed dang / 'joms pa chen po reg shes dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa
dang | chad par ma yin pa dang / bdag tu ma yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis
su med par bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshegs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku
dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / /e/ /e/ e ma ho/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang / dbang sgyur ye
shes dkyil 'khor thugs rang rang snang ba nyid ting nge 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba ni/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yon tan
'phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do/ /zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig
tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ glang gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid
kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes btsun mo chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /oM
chos kyi chos nyid shes bya'i dbyings/ /kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum/ /ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/ /bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul ba/ /phyag
rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal/ /nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu/ /ma chags pad+ma'i gdan bting ba/ /dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /
rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /dbang dang skal min gsal ba'i phyir/ /nang dang phyi rol lcags dang ldan/ /rgyal ba yongs
kyi sbas pa yi/ /sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de/ /kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzigs/ /zhes brjod pas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mo la
'jug par gyur to/ /zhugs nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod bde
pa la mnyam par gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod do/ /sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso/ /kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid/ /ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te/ /shar
phyogs mngon dga' bsam yas na/ /nI la lta bu'i gter 'byin pa/ /gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis/ /rnam par
thar pa'i sgo phye nas/ /byang chub mchog gis nang gdan dgrol/ /mnyam sbyor pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'gro don byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /'gro
lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus/ /sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to/ /zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gsal bar
gyur to/ /zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma ho rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/ /skye mched
khams rnams mang po kun/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI/ /me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste/ /nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing / /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin/ /sangs
rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do/ /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to/ /de nas btsun
mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma ho phyogs
bcu'i stong khams ye shes dben/ /srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing / /snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan nas/ /phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas/ /thams cad
mchog gi snying po bas/ /gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi 'tshal/ /nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos/ /btsal kyang rgyal pas mi rnyed do/ /zhes brjod pas thams
cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid des pa las/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o|| ||de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye shes sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so/ /e ma ho
ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /skyes pa nyid ni skye ba med/ /e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad
kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag /'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa
med| |e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /gnas pa med las thams cad gnas/ /gnas pa nyid na gnas
pa med/ /e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs/ /dmigs pa nyid na
dmigs pa med/ /e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong / /'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro
'ong med/ /ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad mnyes pas khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma ho ye nas gsang ba'i chos/ /sna tshogs snang ba rang
bzhin gsang / /ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang / /gzhan du min la shin tu gsang / /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye nas sangs
rgyas ba'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na/ /'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa la 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab
bar smin pa la thugs rje chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma ho bde gshegs snying po las/ /rang gi rnam
rtog las kyis sprul/ /sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang / /gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa/ /bdag dang bdag gis so sor 'dzin/ /sus kyang mi
'ching bcings med de/ /bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin/ /rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yin/ /nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor/ /bcings med rnam par
grol med pa'i/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/ /bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad/ /ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo / /gsang
ba'i snying po de kho na nyid des pa las/ don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug da bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung
dang thugs rdo rje las bton to/ /bton nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang / yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu
mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i re rer thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul pa rnam bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de
bltams pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka' thub mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / cho
'phrul chen po ston pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud
du kun tu mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho gas
kun tu don spyod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug dang / kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam
gyis mi khyab pa grangs med par yang phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar snang bar gyur nas ji snyed pa'i thub pa chen po snying rje'i go 'phang chen po thams cad
kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg
pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa
bzhi gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dzin pa
'khrul pa la dgongs pa dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / gos pa med
pa'i ston pa'i mthar thug go/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor ba'i skyon dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir de
bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma ho/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas par/ /snying po bla med ji snyed pa'i/ /gzhan gyis mi 'phrog
rang bzhin rgyal/ /mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//
e ma ho ji srid 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos/ /ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis/ /stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par/ /phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis
su 'khor/ /rtog pa'i bag chags stug po yin/ /mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur/ /de nyid ji bzhin dbyings nyid dang / /rang bzhin bdag med tshul
gcig ste/ /rang bzhin nyid la nyams pa med/ /yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su/ /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de/ /de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings
pas| |rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/ /log par rtog pa tsam nyid las/ /phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin//
log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de/ /gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/ /log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang / /gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma/ /rnam par dag
ba'i dbyings nyid tshul/ /nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun/ /rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog /theg pa bzhi
yis nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ /yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na/ /rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan
yod mi 'da'/ /chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/ /ma rig smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir/ /'byung gnas mya ngan 'da' bar ston/ /'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon
dang | |dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang / /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par/ /phyogs bcur kun tu rab grags pa/ /gsang
ba'i snying po las 'phros te/ /rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di/ /sde snod kun dang rgyud kun tu/ /ston pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa/ /'byung gnas gtan la
nges par 'bebs/ /chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam/ /ston pas don dang mthun phyogs su/ /ming nying tshig tu brtags nas bstan/ /ston cing tshig la
dngos po med/ /ces brjod pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis
grub pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / /a ho srid rtsa'i nyes
dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros/ /rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang / /gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs
pa| |log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med/ /stod nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs/ /dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang sgyur/ /ngo mtshar
sku gsung yon tan zhing khams la/ /gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin/ /zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /thub pa drug gis sprul pa grangs med pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ chos
thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes
pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang / rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad/ de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni/ thams
cad kun la yang yod do/ /nam mkha' yang kun la khyab par gnas so/ /de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkhas kun la khyab kyang rnam par thar pa'i don
ma rtog sa na/ me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste/ gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so/ /zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis
gsungs so/ /mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang / /rgya mtsho chen por chu klung 'bab pa ltar/ /bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu/ /rnam pa'i
theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus/ /a ho/ /bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa/ /sa bcu rim gyis bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas sar
'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam/ /bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa'i/ /dngos po gzugs la thogs
med rab tu 'jug /dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs/ /byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog /bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yis/ /ye
shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i/ /rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro/ /theg pa gang du bstan pa
ma nges pa'i/ /yang na kun la mthun nas 'jam par 'jug /yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu med/ /'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs/ /dge bcu
spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa/ /'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu/ /tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa/ /tshangs gnas la
sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis kun tu khyab gyur kyang / /rang rig rtogs pa'i skal dang mi ldan ni/ /ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog
bstan bzhin/ /'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis/ /bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang / /so so
rang rig blo la snang bar zad/ /ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang / /'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur
ba med/ /mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog /log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na/ /dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang
bar 'gyur/ /yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na/ /bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong / /theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs
pa ni/ /ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni de nyid bsam yas par/ /nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyur
dang | |'ja' tshon sprin mang sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang / /nam mkha'i dbyings la gyur cing nyams pa med/ /mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par/
sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las rmad byung dang / /'jig rtog gtso mchog ma lus thams cad dang / /'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam mang yang / /de
bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med/ /ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang / rigs
rgyud tshad pa dang / rigs rgyud so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig
tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du
gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /a/ rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las/ /shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro//
phyogs kun gang bar gsal gyur nas/ /bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan/ /de las ming chags gsal bar kun/ /spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no/ /'di
ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi/ /rten 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no/ /a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha
ma| ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ i I/ u U/ e A+ai/ o A+au/ 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/
rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos nas chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
do| |a ni stong dang mi stong gi /dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin/ /thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun/ /yi ge'i phreng ba nyid la gnas/ /a nyid sna tshogs
bar snang ba'i/ /ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis/ /sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus/ /mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges/ /e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan
gyi| |'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming / /tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /sna tshogs don kun smra zhing ston/ /dngos med yi ge rang bzhin sems/ /
bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang / /dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis/ /rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa
yi| |ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid/ /yi ge mgo nas k+Sha la rdzogs/ /sems ni rang bzhin yi ge ste/ /yi ge dngos
po yod ma yin/ /dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che/ /gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi/ /ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa/ /dbyings la dbyings kyis
bris pa ste| |yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod/ /mgo ni ma nor lam yin te/ /tsheg ni shes rab ming du smras/ /shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod/ /a ni skye med de
bzhin nyid/ /Tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid/ /Ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid/ /Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid/ /D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul rnam dag nyid/ /Na ni kun tu sgyu 'phrul
nyid| |tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid/ /ta ni dra bas brtan pa nyid/ /da ni dra bas lham me nyid/ /d+ha ni dra bas 'khyil ba nyid/ /na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur/ /ka
ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog /kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog /ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog /g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog /nga ni thugs kyang 'jig
byed pa'o/ /tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog /tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog /dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog /dz+ha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog /nya ni sku yang 'jig byed
pa'o| |pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog /pha ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste/ /ba ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin/ /b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung
gi mchog /ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed/ /ya ni skye ba rnam par dag /wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin/ /ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste/ /la ni stong pa dag pa'o/ /
sha ni rtag med dag pa ste/ /Sha ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin/ /sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa/ /ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid/ /k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs/ /i
ni rdul snyed lha rnams su/ /I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin/ /u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su/ /U ni rdul snyed byol song rnams/ /e ni rdul snyed yi dwags su/ /A+ai ni
rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams/ /o ni thams cad 'jig par byed/ /au ni thams cad 'jig pa yin/ /yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'dis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi
phreng ba bsdus/ /a ho/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung
thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo / /a ho/ /thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo/ /'bras bu rgyal ba'i
smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis/ /'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin ba'i dam/ 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i
mthu chen yin/ /a ho/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge'i 'khor lor gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
nges pa las/ /yi ge'i phreng ba 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ shin tu
gsang ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyi ba dang nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan las khams bco brgyad du bstan/ gtsug lag thams cad las kyang khams bco brgyad du
bstan pa yin/ /lung gi spyi 'di ni/ /shin tu zab ba'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te/ lung gi spyi yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas
yin| gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang ba'i yul gnyi ga yang skye mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs so/ /
dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/ /thams cad kun la rang
bzhin gnas/ /ngang gis dag mnyam ma rtogs pa/ /kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang / /gzhan du min la shin tu gsang / /
don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyu/ /mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /'di ni byang chub snying po mchog /a ho/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /dbang po yul du
snang ba'i rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga/ /rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor/ /skye mched khams rnams
bco brgyad pa/ /sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /thams cad byang chub sems ma yi/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus/ /rdo rje dbang po gsang
ba'i thabs/ /dbang po yul nyid shes rab dbyings/ /dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang / /thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas
nyid de| |de yis ma bskyed gang yang med/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu/ /de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung / /kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te/ /bde ba
byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas/ /de las bskyed cing de las spro/ /dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas/ /dbang po rdo rje pad+mor ldan/ /gnyis med byang chub sems
'phro na| |mi dmigs bde dang longs spyod 'phro/ /sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ /gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang / /mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi//
'jug dang ldang dang gnas dang smon pa'i byang chub sems/ /g.yo dang bskyod dang ldan dang gnas/ /'gugs dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te/ /bsdus dang 'khril ba'i
don bsgrub phyir/ /bsdams dang mi gtong dbang bsgyur te/ /bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrog /shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar/ /yid bzhin rin chen phreng
bar 'bar/ /dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar/ /gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo/ /kun tu tshim byed bro bsung thim/ /lha mdzes rin
chen phung po 'phro/ /'od gsal 'phro bas kun tu 'bar/ /bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings/ /a la la ho/ /gsang ba'i dbang po pad+mar ldan gyur nas/ /chags
pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs/ /sa bcu rim gyis bkod med rdzogs/ /kun tu 'od gsal pad+ma spyan yang rdzogs/ /yi ge'i phreng
ba 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan/ /thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs
par rol/ /a la la ho/ /de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las/ /khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/ /bco brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan
bzhin| |gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag /bco brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/ /byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin/ /bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin/ /
gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal/ /yul ni pad+ma bde mchog dbyings/ /sems ni byang chub 'byung ba'i gter/ /dbang po yul
sems ldan gyur nas/ /gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro/ /dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang / /phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams/ /gsang ba mchog
gis 'byin par byed/ /'di ni rtse gcig yin par gsungs/ /gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni/ /lta ba dman la bshad byas na/ /dus min par ni srog zad
nas| |mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur/ /khab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar/ /mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par/ /ngan song mi khom bskal par
brgyud par 'gyur/ /de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya/ /shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa yis/ /blo brtan snying rje che dang dad ldan ngang tshul bzang la
brten| |gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya/ /zhes nyid la yang nyid brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas
thams cad ma lus par dbyings su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spros
pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin/ /sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te/ /yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin/ /sgyu
'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur//
bdud rtsir 'byung zhing 'byung ba dang / /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing / /longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song sbyong / /ci yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'grub/ /nam mkha'
rdo rje sra 'byung zhing / /'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang / /chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te/ /'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang / /thams cad stong shing lhung
bar 'gyur/ /dgug dang gtang dang bcing dang dgrol/ /gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /de nyid ye shes rang
snang ba'i/ /ming tshig gzugs tshigs yid bzhin gyis/ /mun la snang byung ji bzhin du/ /'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul/ /
ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams/ /ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan/ /'grub 'gyur mi ldan don mod
brlag /dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni/ /zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod/ /'phel 'grib med par 'byung
ba ste| |dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin/ /sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur/ /dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par/ /rtogs pa'i dbang bsgyur ting
'dzin yin/ /gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa/ /de yis chos kyi dbyings ma yin/ /de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa/ /'jigs pas dmigs med shes
par gyis/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /pho mo ma yin ma ning min/ /mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min/ /kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin/ /gnas
su ma yin gang yang min/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/ /thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas/ /tha dad min
la tha dad pa'i/ /nang dang nang gi phyi rol pa/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol/ /'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya mchog /gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i
sems| |mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rab brtan na/ /dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur/ /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs
pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig phyung ngo / /e ma'o snying por lam bcas
pas| |'jigs med dbyings nyid kun bzang phyag rgya mchog /rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po/ /byang chub lhun grub bdal ba'i dang / /snying po nyid ni snying por kun
bcas kun tu gnas/ /de nyid rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub kun shar kun tu gnas/ /a ho/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
nges pa las/ sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor
las lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags 'chang rnams lha sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o ye nas rnam
dag pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i gnas/ /byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar/ /de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs/ /chos
rnams thams cad bdag med pa'i/ /dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal/ /gcig dang spros pa thams cad med/ /dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul//
ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos/ /ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor/ /thugs rje
byin rlabs 'phros pa yis/ /ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs/ /byin rlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab/ /rang snang ba
yi thabs las 'byung / /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i/ /thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang / /dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas/ /stong
smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug /de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad/ /der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan/ /rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir/ /nyi zla
brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar/ /ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /ma chags pad+mo 'bar ba'i gdan/ /zag med ye shes gter gyur pas/ /yid bzhin rin chen
'bar ba'i gdan/ /ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir/ /ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas/ /re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir/ /dpag bsam shing gi rin chen
'bar| |yid bzhin rin chen rgyan gyis bskor/ /thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir/ /'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor/ /gsang ba'i de nyid nges pa las//
'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor/ /thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog /'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang / /gzugs
brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum/ /ting 'dzin lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag /byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog brten/ /zhes nyid la nyid bshad do/ /gsang
