ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i
dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni/ /rdzogs
chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /gru chad bzhis
brgyan par khyams dang / /kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan/ /rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan/ /seng+ge glang chen rta
dang khyung / /nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la/ /nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/ /gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul/ /'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang / /g.yas nas
mthong thos snom pa dang / /myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/ /gru chad la ni mthong byed dang / /thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams/ /btsun mo dag dang
bcas par gnas/ /bar khyams la ni thub drug dang / /mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang / /bya ba dang ni gnas par bstan/ /sgo khyud bzhi la 'dzoms pa ni//
btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar/ /ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/ /mdzes tshul
mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin/ /mthing ga dkar po ser le brgyan/ /ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/ /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can/ /gsal
'tsher lhun stug gzi byin can/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khyil ba ste/ /dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam
pas lhun gyis grub/ /sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni/ /de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang / /yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang / /'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i
phyir| |mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston/ /stong nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul/ /tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med/ /ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs bzhin/ /de'i
tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la/ /so so 'dra bar snang ba ni/ /de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang / /las 'phro dbang gis so sor snang / /dper na me long chu zla bzhin/ /de tshe
'gro drug thams cad la/ /sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan/ /dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs/ /rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul/ /gzhan yang theg
mchog rim pa bzhin/ /'og min bla med gnas mchog tu/ /sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la/ /de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra
ste| |sku yis chos rnams mjal bar ston/ /me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du/ /dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel/ /'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na/ /byang
chub sgrib pa gting dpag med/ /me long bzhin du sku la snang / /de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byung / /bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob/ /chos sku
dpag med brjod du med/ /longs spyod zad med rin chen gter/ /sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /mtshon dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs/ /spyod yul kun rtsa maN+Da
la| |tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol/ /thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog /de la sogs te bsam yas mchog /skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku/ /
nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas/ /zad mi shes kyi gter du gyur/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku/ /thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i
ye shes sku/ /de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs/ /zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad dkyil 'khor brjod kyis
mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i yon tan chen po'i dkyil
'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / /a ho/ /dmigs bya dmigs med mi dmigs dpag
med bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang / /mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings/ /ye nas kun gsal
dkyil 'khor rnams spro spros pa med/ /ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /ye nas rnam spros snying po kun gnas gnas pa med/ /rdo rje
gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /a ho zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing / /kun tu
bzang po dgyes te phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas thams cad gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /tshad dpag
tu med pa rgyas pa/ /mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag
tshad med/ /kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i/ /srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te/ /mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung / /dbang
sgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang //
'jig rten 'khor gyi gtsos bkur dbang phyug dang / /gzhan dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams gnas pa/ /bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen 'grub/ /dug
gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar gcod pa'i/ /'das dang ma byon de bzhin nyid du sbyor/ /shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba/ /rig pa'i thabs chen
dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom/ /stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i/ /zag med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur/ /b+h+ruM/ rang byung nyid zla
pad+ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs/ /rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa yi/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol pa mdzad/ /bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin
nyid gnas pa/ /dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ubs/ /thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang
las byung / /spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i/ /dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon/ /thugs rje dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs/
nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa/ /mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can gyis bya/ /rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku/ /shes rab mchog gis
ma lus yongs bsdus pa/ /bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon/ /thabs chen ma 'dres rnam pa sbas pa yi/ /dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings
thugs chud pa/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog /phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa/ /shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i
ngang 'chang ba/ /thugs rje byin rlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba yi/ /bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan 'phro/ /
rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur/ /zhes nyid la nyid du brjod de rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ gzhal yas
khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / /b+h+ruM bi shwa bi shud+he/ hUM badzra d+h-i ka /oM dzA ni dzA ki /swA rat+na d+h-I ka /aM A ro lI ka /hUM pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka /muM d+hA trI shwa ri/ la dwe Sha ra ti/ maM mo
ha ra ti/ baM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badzra ra ti/ k+Shi hi rA dzA ya/ traM A ka gar+b+ha ya/ hrI ha hUM ba da ma/ dzri ku ru pA Na hrI/ hUM lA s+yai sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM

mA l+ye sa ma ya hoHhrI gI ti rA go nya haM/ a nr-i t+ya rA ga ya mI mai d+hA ra Ni swAhA/ th+liM ni sa ra ma bA swAhA/ hUM swa rA dzA ya swAhA/ muM shrAM a raM gA ya swAhA/ dzaHd+hU pa pra bi sha/ hUM puSh+pa a bi sha/

baM dA ba su khi ni/ ho gan+d+he tsit+te/ hUM ya mAn+ta krita phaT/ pra dz+nyAn+ta krita phaT/ hUM big+h+nAn+ta kriT phaT/ hUM pad+ma n+ta krita phaT/ oM mahA badzra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM mahA

rat+na d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM mahA pad+ma d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ oM mahA karma d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta hUM/ a a
a badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta a/ oM mu ne kriM swAhA/ oM mu ne trUM swAhA/ oM mu ne sruM swAhA/ oM mu ne braM swAhA/ oM mu ni k+Sha swAhA/ oM mu ni ye swAhA/ oM h+ye hi b+ha ga wA na mahA
ka ru NI ka/ tri sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /oM AHhUM swAhA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya
ya ya ya ya/ oM AHhUM swAhA/ oM| ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgya chen por
bdag gyur cig /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
bcu thams cad khyab par grags so/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang / bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do/ /de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
pa'i bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen po ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba

At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA A daR+sha shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA pra t+ya pa k+She na shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM mahA sa ma tA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba

At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM ma hA kri t+ya a nuSh+Tha na shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga mahA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA mahA wA ka badzra swa b+ha

ba at+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA mahA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA pU
dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85haM zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to/ /gsal bar gyur to/ /'bar bar gyur to/ /e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kun gyi gsang / /sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/ /sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung / /gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni/ /bsam
gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab/ /sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags/ /thams cad gsung gi phyag rgyas chog /rgyud mchog rgyud chen dra ba las/ /bde ldan gsung
gi don 'byung ba'ang / /thams cad pad+ma'i ngang gyur na/ /grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra/ /ji ltar brjod kyang gsung mchog ste/ /theg pa mtho dman
thams cad dang / /log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad/ /byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus/ /bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags/ /sgra nyid ma chags
ngang du gsungs/ /gsungs pa nyid na brjod du med/ /brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra/ /kun la grags shing so sor mjal/ /dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs
bzhin| |gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go /'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin/ /theg pa mthon dman bsam yas kyang / /de bzhin nyid las ma
gsungs te/ /gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos/ /ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang / /de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med/ /yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung / /ljags
kyi rtse mor ma byung yang / /thugs rje gsung gi byin rlabs kyis/ /'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal/ /gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog /de bzhin gsung gis
'gro don rnams/ /de bzhin ngang las ma g.yos kyang / /dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhin no/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang /
gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag rgya ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba

'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /oM hUM badzra satwa hUM/ badzra pra b+hA na hUM/ mUM badzra gan+d+ha hUM/ oM tsa kra maN+Da la hUM aM/ lAM badzra gan+d+ha b+ha Sha lAM/ swA rat+na pra b+hA na swaM/ oM badzra gan+d+ha

b+hA Sha AM/ oM pad+ma pra b+hA na AM/ paM badzra gan+d+ha pra b+hA na pAM/ hAM badzra ga tik+Sh+Na pra b+hA na haM/ taM badzra gaN+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na taM/ shI ran+ta pra b+hA na shI hUM/ badzra gan+d+ha pra b+hA na g+ho Sha hUM/ traM

khaD+ga pra b+hA na tAM/ trAM badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na tri/ hrIHpad+ma pra b+hA na hrIH/ badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hrIH/ ha badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na haM/ a badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na AHme kA la

pra b+hA na me/ hUM badzra gan+d+ha pra b+hA na b+hA Sha hUM/ thAM pra b+hA na maN+Da la thAM/ swAM badzra gan+d+ha b+ha Sha haM/ pra b+hA na swaM/ hUM rat+na swaM sA d+ha b+ha dra pra b+hA na swaM hriH/

badzra gan+d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hA na hrIH/ mu ut+pa la nI la pra b+hA na mu/ A badzra gan+d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hA na AH/ phaT badzra a maHmuta g+ha ra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ oM badzra gan+d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hA

na oM oM/ /phaT mahA badzra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ hUM mahA rat+na badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hUM hUM/ phaT hrIHpad+ma mata g+ha ra pra b+hA na hrIHhrIH/ oM mahA badzra pad+ma badzra gan+d+ha b+ha Sha
b+hA na hrIHhrIH/ a karma muta g+ha ra badzra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ a karma badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha bra b+hA na hUM/ a a a zhes brjod pas phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu
gsal bar gyur to/ /'bar bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung
gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las
chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /yang dag don gyi gsang mchog ni/ /bde ba thugs
kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /nges pa'i don tshan bcu bzhi gnyis/ /yid bzhin rin chen gsal bar thim/ /thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings/ /sku lnga'i 'od zer mang po
kun| |thams cad yum 'gyur dbyings su thim/ /gsal 'bar sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi thig le ni/ /kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/ /kha dog
gnas dang dbyibs ma yin/ /yon tan mchog gi snying po ni/ /rtog gi spyod yul yod ma yin/ /zab cing rgya chen rab sbyangs pa'i/ /gsal ldan brtan pa'i spyod
yul te| |gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu med/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang / /rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad
kun| |nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa/ /dus bzhi phyogs bcu gdan med de/ /dus gsum bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'/ /sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i//
nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad thim/ /thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de/ /dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor/ /shes rab dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis/ /
byang chub rdo rje thig le yin/ /dkyil 'khor gzhal yas lhun grub dang / /rgya dang bral ba'i bsam yas kyis/ /kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/ /yon tan
mchog gi gnas yin te/ /ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma/ /de yis ma zin gang yang med/ /rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa/ /yang
dag gshegs dang log rtog dang / /gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs/ /phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun/ /de la gsad cing gzung du med/ /kha dog
dbyibs dang gnas ma yin/ /skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas/ /de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis/ /de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni/ /rgyu 'bras med pa'i
dus gcig ste/ /thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du/ /yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par gyur/ /mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus/ /tshogs chen gnyis kyang
rtogs par rol/ /skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la zhugs/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun/ /rgyal
ba yum gyi dbyings su thim/ /thams cad ma lus chos skur 'du/ /ho/ /chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
las| |thams cad yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyis yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs
pas| |thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya/ /gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi/ /snying po phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'/ /mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil
yi ge /lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las/ /sbyar ba phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /oM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyar te/ /'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtser sprad pa/ /rgyal ba kun
dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /bde ba chen po'i sbyin pa'i rgya/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rjer 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil
zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /maM gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril//
btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil
zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /lam gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril
btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar dkan/ /swaM rtser 'bar ba rin po che/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas
dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /maM gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lngas
las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /aM gyi rtse mor pad+ma 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil
zhing / /'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /paM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril//
btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /haM gyi rtse mor ral gri 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la
brtan| |'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /taM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /ut+pal la sogs
klu shing mtshan/ /rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar/ /pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen te/ /gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang / /pi wang gar mkhan mchog nyid
de| |me tog phreng ba sbos mchod ma/ /mar me byug la sogs pa yis/ /las la 'khril cing chos la brtan/ /dbu rnams byon nas 'dud pa'i tshul/ /gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin/ /gnyis
med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /sgo bzhi phyag rgya chen po ni/ /nri mgo gdengs dang rdo rjes gnon/ /thod phreng chen pos gnon pa dang / /rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon/ /lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta
ho/ /sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang / /'dud tshul 'khril pa gong ma bzhin/ /thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no/ /sreg par dang ni pi wang dang / /go cha po te rin
chen sgrom/ /me dang chu ru rab tu bstan/ /yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings/ /kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro/ yum gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+mo'i dkyil/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te//

yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid de/ /yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid/ /phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ni/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na/ /mi bskyod ma bsgul thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du
gnas| |yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis suM 'phror 'bar/ /de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis/ /rgyal ba rgya mchog de bzhin du/ /bcu
gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar/ /de la sogs te bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su/ /'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston/ /theg pa mthon dman thams cad dang / /phyin ci log
rnams bsam yas dang / /zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la/ /so sor mthun byas kun tu snang / /dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba/ /lus las ma dgod sna tshogs ston/ /mdor na

phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med/ /gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro/ /bskyod dang spro ba de bzhin nyid/ /mdor na bskyod 'gul thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas//
gnas nyid mi gnas pa'ang min/ /de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad/ /mthe bo mdzub mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /mthe bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin/ /srin lag mthe bo chags pa che/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo legs pa
mchog /hUM hoH/ mdzub mo gnyis sbyar rin chen mchog /gung mo gnyis sbyar gzi brjid don/ /srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal ba'i tog /gzhad pa'i sgras ni mthe'u chung sprad/ /troM te ru ha/ mdzub
mo steng 'og chos kyi mchog /gung mo steng 'og 'jam dpal mchog /srin lag steng 'og 'khor lo mchog /mthe'u chung steng 'og smra gsung yin/ /hrIHb+haM T+roM hoM/ /mdzub mo rgya gram las kyi
mchog /gung mo rgya gram srung bar byos/ /srin lag rgya gram gnod sbyin mchog /mthe'u chung rgya gram gnas bar bshad/ /ha truM a b+haM/ phyag rgya brda tshig chen po 'dis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil
'khor mdzes par snang / /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs/ /glu gnyis phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs/ /phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni/ /gzung

dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis pa/ /dag par gsal bas phyag rgya yin/ /yi ge so so gsal ba yis/ /gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das/ /dza dang ho la sogs pa yis/ /gar du bsgyur bas rdo rjer 'ching / /gsang ba'i snying
po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos mtshon cha dam tshig ces bya ba'i glu 'di blangs so/ /hUM/ lus ngag yid

gsum rdo rje ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas/ /ye shes rdo rje gsor zhing spro/ /e ma'o rdo rje che mchog ni/ /nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba
ni/ /cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/ /bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdag /rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la/ /rdo rje 'chang rgyal

thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed rdo rje 'chang zhes bya/ /hUM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/ /rgyal po gtsigs la btab pa ltar/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus
la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /bdag nyid chen por mtshan ma'i gzugs/ /hUM/ phyag rgya zhes ni

bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /rdo rje rdo rje drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba
rdul phran bzhin/ /btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/ /thams cad rdo rje nyid pas na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las rdo rje gsang 'byung ba'o/ /oM badzraM dz+wa lA na lArka hUM
phaT/ /oM/ /lus ngag yid gsum 'khor lo ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/ /snang mdzad 'khor lo dpa' pa yin/ /snang mdzad 'khor lo rang gnas pas/ /ye shes 'khor lo gsor zhing
spro/ /e ma'o 'khor lo che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol pa ni/ /cis kyang ma shigs mi phyed pas/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/ /bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya

bzhi rgyas gdab/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las/ /'khor lo 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rtags su brtan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed 'khor lo 'chang zhes bya/ /hUM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/ /
rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /rgyal po
phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs/ /phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /oM/ /'khor lo 'khor lo drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i
bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing gzhig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ /hUM/ btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/ /thams cad
'khor lo nyid pas na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las 'khor lo gsung 'byung ba/ /oM tsakra dz+wa lA na lArka hUM phaT/ oM/ /lus ngag yid gsum pad ma ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye
shes te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /pad+ma sems dpa' dpa' bo yin/ /pad+ma sems dpa' rang gnas bas/ /pad+ma dgra sta gsor zhing spro/ /e ma ho pad+ma che mchog gi /nyid kyi mtshan du gsol

ba ni/ /cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/ /cis kyang mi g.yos ma 'dres pas/ /bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las/ /pad+ma 'chang rgyal

thams cad kyis/ /rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed pad+ma 'chang zhes bya/ /oM/ /ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/ /rgyal po gtsigs ni btab pa ltar/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus
la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'bebs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pa/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /hUM/ bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma gzugs/ /phyag rgya zhes ni
bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /pad+ma dgra sta drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs
shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ /btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/ /thams cad pad+ma nyid pas ni/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang pa yin/ /de las pad+ma'i gsung phyung ba/ /oM pad+ma dz+wa la na
lArka hUM phaT/ swAM/ lus ngag yid gsum rin chen ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /yon tan chen
po dpa' bo yin/ /rin chen sems dpa' rang gnas pas/ /ye shes dbyug pa gsor zhing spro/ /e ma ho/ /rdo rje rin chen che mchog gi /nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/ /cis kyang mi shigs
mi phyed la/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/ /bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab/ /swaM/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la/ /rin chen 'chang rgyal thams
cad kyi| |rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed rin chen 'chang zhes bya/ /swaM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/ /rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang
chen dus la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs//
phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /rin chen dbyig pa drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing bshig
dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba'i rdul phran bzhin/ /btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis/ /thams cad rin chen nyid pas na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las

rin chen gsung 'byung ba/ /swaM rat+na dz+wa lA na lArka swaM phaT/ haM/ lus ngag yid gsum 'phrin las ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/ sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /las kyi sems dpa' dpa' bo yin//

las kyi sems dpar nga gnas pas/ /ye shes ral gri 'debs shing spro/ /e ma ho las kyi che mchog gis/ /nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/ /cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/ /bde

chen mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab/ /haM/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las/ /ral gri 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed ral gri 'chang
zhes bya/ /haM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyal/ /rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa bzhin/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/ /'da' dka'
ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /bdag nyid chen po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs/ /phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /haM/ ral gri ral gri
drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ /btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro
'dis/ /thams cad ral gri nyid pas na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las 'phrin las gsung byung ba'o/ /haM karma dz+wa lA na lA rka hUM phaT/ muM/ lus ngag yid gsum dril bu las//
sku gsung thugs nyid gtum por 'gyur/ /bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul du/ /rdo rje lan gsum gsor ba yis/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /dam can rnal 'byor dbang du 'gyur/ /
rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i/ /thams cad gcig tu 'dus par ni/ /yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur/ /mi bskyod rdo rje thabs ldan pas/ /oM dang haM ni ma thal bar/ /lan gsum gsor chen gur
dkar bsgom/ /lhan ne'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur/ /oM dang haM ni thal tsam du/ kun tu gru bzhir bdag gnas te/ /lan gsum gsor la gang btsan pa/ /tshe dang skal pa 'phel bar 'gyur//
longs spyod ci 'dod grub par 'gyur/ /de nas zla gam mdog dmar sham/ /'brel ba mnyam par lan gsum gyis/ /khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas/ /yid la dmigs dang las thams
cad| |dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur/ /de las gtum pa'i mdog gnas te/ /drag tu phaT ces brjod pas ni/ /kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing / /bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas

pa| |khros te dgug pa nyid dag tu/ /rgyang ni ring du 'phangs pa dang / /ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par nges/ /oM badzra da ha dz+wa la ha na badzra pa tsa dz+wa la badzra hUM phaT/ chos la brtan pa phyag bsnams
pa| |sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te/ /shes rab yum gyi tshogs su brtag /skad ni gsung snyan bde ba mo/ /lce ni gar mkhan mya ngan 'das/ /chos sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las/ /rab tu
gsor la gang brtson pas/ /muM la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma 'bar/ /muM gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun tu dbang sgyur yid 'ong ba'i/ /'dod pa bzhin du mthun pas 'grub//

oM badzra g+han+Da pA sha d+harma d+ha ra hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ sgyu 'phrul chen po thabs dang shes rab tu 'byung
ba phyag mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du

brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog /phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de/ /sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya/ /'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga/ /snying po
lnga dang sman lnga dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis rab bsnyams la/ /rig pas thig ni gdab par bya/ /lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi/ /rtse bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas/ /gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi/ /bar
khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya/ /sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la/ /tsan 'bru tsam pad+mo gdan/ /yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge las/ /phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri/ /bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang / /rgyan
phreng dung dang bro bas bskor/ /glu tshig bro gar rol mo yis/ /sprin phung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod/ /yum dang 'jo ba sems ma dang / /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod/ /dbyibs
dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i/ /zhal tu gyur pa'i me pos la/ /bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /las bzhi mchod pa rab tu sbyin/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin
te/ /shin tu phra ba sbyangs pa yis/ /bsam yas dag la de bzhin bya/ /rigs pas dpag pa tsam du'o/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ /sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis/ /phyogs
bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing / /mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yis/ /sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi/ /mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang / /kun 'byung rin chen phung po 'bar/ /dbyibs
legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil/ /rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang / /rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal/ /glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra/ /bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs/
do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/ /bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang / /rang la mdzes pas brgyan pa yi/ /lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyi/ /bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis/ /phyogs bcu
nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/ /dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul/ /skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis/ /rim gyis yang na gcig car du/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
sbyor zhing / /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ /gsal ldan ma 'am byin rlabs la/ /stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du/ /dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
mched/ /mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/ /srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /dga' ba chen
pos khyab par gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang / /khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du gyur/ /lus
ngag sems dang chos thams cad/ /gang na mi gnas mi dmigs pa/ /rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la/ /mig yor tshur du sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom/ /goms pa'i
dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/ /bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab
tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul/ /dbang phyug la sogs lngas mchod na/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin/ /nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos/ /nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /
dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas/ /phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang / /rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya/ /snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung / /yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas/ /phyag
rgya chen po'i 'phang du ni/ /dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du bya/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya/ /yang nas gzhi mnyam pa la/ /dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya/ /yang na lus gang tshad du ste/ /
yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad/ /phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang / /gos rgyan mdzes ma yid 'ong grogs/ /thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims
te bya| |yang na khru ni bcu drug dang / /nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod/ /yang na rgyang grags dpag
tshad dam/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom/ /ma mthong rmongs pa ston phyir tshon/ /kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am/ /lnga yi tshon gyis bri
bar bya/ /'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye/ /ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge'am gdan nam snying po'am/ /phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par/ /byin rlabs ya mtshan
rmad po che/ /'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam/ /sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas/ /rnam grol rim par thob par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i ye shes kyis byas pa/ /smos ci dgos te de nyid
yin/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/ /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo / /rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /
'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /kun tu bzang mo mi bsnyengs yin/ /kun tu bzang mor de gnas par/ /ye
shes dril bu gsil zhing spro/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas yum chen gyis/ /nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/ /cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pa/ /bde chen yum du
gyur bas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya yum lngas btab/ /muM/ kun tu bzang mo'i thugs nyid las/ /rdo rje yum chen thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed dril bu 'chang
zhes bya/ /muM/ ji ltar rgyal po'i gnas bshams te/ /rgyal pos gtsigs chen 'gyed pa ltar/ /bde chen yum du gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar
'debs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /bdag nyid yum chen mtshan ma'i gzugs/ /phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir
ro/ /muM/ dril bu dril bu grags snyan dang / /yum nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal mo yis/ /phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin//
btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/ /thams cad dril bu nyid pas na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las chos sku gsung 'byung ba/ /muM g+ha dza lAn lA rka muM zhes brjod pas/ /
phyag rgya'i tshogs su snang bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ mtshon cha dam tshig phyag rgya glu'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
kun tu bzang pos thabs dang shes rab 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /de nas yid dang chos mthun par/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang / /shes rab
dril bu chos la brgyan/ /hUM dang muM gi snying po 'bar/ /de las rdo rje rtse bcur 'bar/ /oM dang muM gi mchog tu brtag /shes rab nyi zer zla rgyas thabs/ /'bar ba'i phung pos chos la brten/ /de
las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni/ /'bru lnga phyag rgya nyid du ste/ /de las rdo rje phyag bsnams gsor/ /de las 'khor lo phyag bsnams gsor/ /de las nor
bu phyag bsnams pa/ /de las pad+ma phyag bsnams 'dzin/ /de las ral gri phyag bsnams gcod/ /de nyid rdo rje phyag bsnams pa/ /thabs chen drug tu yang dag gsor/ /de las rdo rje gzung thabs
gnyis/ /oM dang muM gyi mtshon bzhin du/ /rdo rje rtse bcu thabs chen po/ /thugs kar bstan pa'i tshul du 'bar/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag na mi 'jigs thugs kar 'dzin/ /muM las phyag
rgya chen po ni/ /dril gsil 'bar bas sangs rgyas yum/ /mchod gnas chos la brtan par 'dzin/ /thams cad kun tu phyag rgya yi/ /thabs dang shes rab rdo rje 'chang / /sku gsung thugs ni thams
cad pa/ /yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang du dmigs/ /de las rdo rje mchog bsnams pa/ /de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi yon tan las/ /oM hUM swaM gyi rtser 'dzin pa/ /nyid yas yang dag bskyed tshul du/ /shes rab yum du shin du brtags/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rab brtan pa/ /thabs chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab/
gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med/ /de las 'gro don 'phrin las char/ /yid dang chos su rab brtags pa'i/ /rdo rje 'chang rgyal tshul chen las/ /rdo rje drag por lan gsum gsor/ /gtum pa'i sngags
brjod de bskyed pas/ /bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi/ /rin chen dbyig dang 'byung ba kun/ /de dag rdzas kyang ma
yin te| |rang sems bsod nams brten pa yin/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos/ /gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te/ /thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu yi ngang du 'byung / /shes rab dbyings

kyi de bzhin nyid/ /thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir/ /ye shes la ni ye shes rol/ /ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog /rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang / /byin rlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te/ /bya byed nus
mthu'i gzi byin gyi/ /sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing / /yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan/ /sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas/ /ma nyams 'jug pa rab brtson pa/ /zhag
ni sum cu phrag drug gam/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub/ /de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis/ /sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni/ /ye shes thig le de nyid la/ /
ye shes thig le nyid snang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang / /rgya dang bral
ba'i gzhal yas khang / /'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun/ /mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang / /rgya chen gsung las don byung ba/ /mthun pa'i ye
shes rang snang ngo / /gcig dang du mar bral ba yi/ /mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te/ /rang byung ye shes gnas med snang / /log par rtog brtags
rnam dag cing / /ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/ /thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na/ /'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang / /bde ba chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /stangs dpyal
gnyis sam yang na lnga/ /byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na/ /'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur/ /skal pa mnyam pa'i ye shes de/ /gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi/ /ya mtshan chen
po 'byung bar nges/ /dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur/ /zhes ched du brjod do/ /rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa rgyud kyi rgyal po rgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos grub blang pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so/ /ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la/ /thabs dang
shes rab ldan byas te/ /rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis/ /thams cad ma lus maN+Dal/ /de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la/ /rig pa rang byung gyur pa yis/ /mnyam par mnyam la mi gnas pa'i/ /chos sku'i
phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ /'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyi/ /gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis/ /rang rig bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings/ /kun
gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir/ /de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan/ /rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang / /yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don/ /rin chen sna tshogs la sogs dang / /'byung
ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun/ /thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ /gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag /ye shes chen po rab 'byams kyis/ /don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/ /de
bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis/ /thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni/ /nyid kyi thugs la bstims byas te/ /thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas
pas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis/ /thams cad chos sku phyag rgya che/ /yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis/ /ting 'dzin don rnams gsal
bsgoms te/ mA ma kI yi rgyun chags la/ /yang dag chos sku phyag rgya che/ /de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas/ /don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /mkha' la 'phro ba'i dkyil
'khor du/ /dri med chos sku phyag rgya gsal/ /dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med par/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas/ /kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur/ /sna
tshogs 'phrin las rnam par rol/ /don gyi snying po mchog rnams kyang / /byang chub phyogs rnams rab tu rdzogs/ /'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor/ /a hoH/ chos sku phyag rgya
de dag las/ /las lnga'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /drag po gtum po gdul ba'i phyir/ /bdag nyid drag
po bsgoms nas ni/ /chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis/ /bgegs kyi ling ga gnan par bya/ /gtum po rngam pa'ang brlag par 'gyur/ /mi mthun phyogs kyang rdul du rlog/ 'di dang 'gro ba
thams cad du/ /shin tu stobs drag che ldan 'gyur/ /thams cad gnyis med dbyings bsdu'i phyir/ /bdag nyid ha ya grI bar bsgom/ /dmar po'i chos sku gsal bsgoms te/ /mi
mthun phyogs rnams gdan du gding / /ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na/ /thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu/ /mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brang / /ci 'dod las rnams byed
par 'gyur/ /thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i phyir/ /bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste/ /gser gyi mdog 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom/ /gang 'phel chos sku gdan du gzhag /de ltar
dag pas byin brlabs na/ /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang / /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /gtum khro ma
lus zhi bya'i phyir/ /dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i chos sku bsgom/ /gang zhig gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan/ /de bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na/ /gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ji ltar
dmigs pa bzhin/ /zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rnam bzhi dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus/ /bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod/ /lhun 'grub
dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs/ /a hoH/chos sku phyag rgya chen po ni/ /dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges/ /nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa/ /phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na/ /gang bsgoms the tshom
med par 'grub/ /de ni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam/ /the tshom med de nges 'grub 'gyur/ /'jig rten pa yi lha bsgrubs na/ /lha yi snying po gang yang rung / /bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na/ /lha de nye
bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na/ /chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te/ /rang dang spyi yi don rtogs nas/ /skye rga na 'chi med par rtogs/ /phyag rgya chen po de dag la/ /nyon
mongs las rnams spyod byed pa'i/ /snying po ma nor don bris na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang / /dpag tshad med pa'i phyag rgya che/ /
sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad/ /zhing khams bye brdul dang mnyam/ /a hoH/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis dngos grub len
pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po rgyal po dbang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du

brjod pa 'di brjod de/ /shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las/ /bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun/ /rdo rje lam las pad+mor bskyil/ /rtse nas bstim shing dkyil 'khor sgyur/ /nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas
su| |gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /trang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim/ traM/ gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang mchog dang / /gsang ba kun la mnyan
par bya/ /gsang ba'i don nyid rtogs pa las/ /gzhan du smra bar bya ba min/ /gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las/ /
rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /oM/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen pe/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung / /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam
par sbyor/ /lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /hUM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /oM/ /khyod ni rdo rje

las yin pas/ /las rnams ma lus kun byos shig /pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun/ /khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin/ /smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsang ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /hrIHyi phyag rgya tshogs

mchog las/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim/ /oM/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis/ /dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la/ /mthun par gsang bsgrags gzhal du min/ /bskyod chen

'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /hUM/ oM swAM aM haM rnams las/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che/ /
dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod/ /slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing / /dbang rnams thob par ma byas par/ /nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams/ /'bras bu med cing brlag

par 'gyur/ /dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang / /go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang / /gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang / /snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na/ /dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras/ /ngan song
thams cad med ba dang / /gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bas/ /tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /kun tu bzang po la sogs mtshan/ /mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por 'gyur/ /lus dang phung por bcas
pa'i sa/ /rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa yin/ /rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i sa/ /bla med kun tu bzang por 'gyur/ /yum dang sgeg mo la sogs la/ /de nyid byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ /pho nya 'du
'phro mang po rnams/ /sangs rgyas bka' las mi 'da' zhing / /de yi dgos pa byed pa dang / /sgro dang skur pa la sogs pa/ /de ni myur du brlag par 'gyur/ /tshe ring bde ba phun
sum tshogs/ /mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /zhes ched du brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// //de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dngos grub myur bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid dang
mnyam sbyor phyir/ /dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya/ /byang chub phyogs la gzung bar gnas/ /mchog tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom zhing / /byang
chub sems su brtan par gzung / /bya ba med las bya byed bya/ /mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a/ /shin tu 'tsher zhing gsal bsgoms nas/ /'od 'phro
'bar bas thams cad khyab/ /dus gsum ngan song gnas bsregs nas/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim/ /thim gyur dbyings nas 'od 'phro 'bar/ /a ma las ni zla nyi 'bar/ /phyogs
bcur 'thoms pa'i mun sel zhing / /nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsil ba'i sman/ /thugs rje'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab/ /rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/ /mkha' la 'ja' tshon
sprin mang yang / /nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang / /chos kyi dbyings su thams cad 'dus/ /thams cad yi ge hUM du gyur/ /hUM nyid gsang ba'i
thugs rje'i dkyil/ /'od zer 'phros pas 'bru gsum ste/ /yang na 'od zer 'bru lnga yi/ /lnga pa'i don spros bzhi bcu lnga'i/ /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog/ ma bcos ngang gis
gnas pa la/ /ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /sen zlum zla ba gang ba yi/ /thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang ba yi/ /gzhal yas 'od zer 'bar
ba'i khang / /pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po che/ /de dkyil yi ge hUM gnas pa/ /shin tu phra zhing nyungs 'bru 'bar/ /gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum dang / /gnas lnga dag tu rab tu bsgom/ /shes
rab spyan la 'dris pa dang / /nri yi mig gis bltar yod par/ /shin tu phra zhing gsal bar bsgom/ /shin tu blo gsal 'dris gyur nas/ /phyogs bcu'i stong khams rdul snyed du/ /thugs
rje'i byin rlabs bsam yas spro/ /spros kyang hUM las nyams pa med/ /bsdus kyang phyogs bcu bri ba med/ /spro med bsdu med de bzhin las/ /yi ge muM du thim par gyur/ /thim gyur dbyings
nas phyag rgya 'bar/ /shin tu gsal zhing 'dris pa dang / /phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal bar bsgom/ /sku de tshon gang 'od 'bar nas/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rgya/ /'od 'phro
'bar zhing don byed bsgom/ /yang na phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom/ /gzhal yas khang
dang gdan khri rnams/ /phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin/ /mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan/ /rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar/ /rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar/ /phyag rgya chen po de dag las/ /phyogs
bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang / /nyi zla gza' skar dkyil 'khor gdan dang rgyan/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom/ /thugs rje byin rlabs 'gro don mdzad/ /zhi ba phyogs gcig
shes bya spro/ /se bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing / /bde gshegs 'khor yang dag par byed/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog de/ /'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang / /sdug bsngal thams cad
yong mi 'byung / /lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub/ /theg pa dman par yong mi skye/ /bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur/ /byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin/ /zhes
nyid la nyid gsungs so/ /rdo rje gsung ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /rgyu gcig dang ni yig 'bru tshul/ /byin gyi rlabs dang
mngon sum par/ /rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis/ /thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che/ /yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun/ /rnam smin oM du shes par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /yang na

khres pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs/ /rnam smin muM du shes par bya/ /yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig

bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung la/ /hUM du shes pas rab spyad na/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar/ /bsnyen
pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'i/ /sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po/ /yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus pa/ /dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin
pas bstim/ /grub pa'i nyi zla snying po de/ /'gro drug dus gnas de dag nyid/ /mchod pa chen por mnyes sbyar zhing / /dkyil 'khor rdo rje rtse yis blang / /mkha' 'gro gsal bar tshe la sogs/ /yid
bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams/ /nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas gzhag/ nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed bsgom/ /hUM du gyur pas rnam par dag /dbyings su

thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar/ /skur gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bsgom/ /ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs/ /ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid/ /sgyu ma snang ba mig yor tshul//
sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang / /rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med/ /snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing / /mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang
po'i zhing / /byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas/ /yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan/ /cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi/ /rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /nges par legs pa'i
dgos pa 'grub/ /lnga zhing lnga dang sbyor ba yi/ /tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la/ /khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu/ /'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom/ /de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje'i rigs/ /pad+mo'i
rigs dang sku gsung thugs/ /khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/ /rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso/ /thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i
tshogs dang ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu gcig gi lha rnams bsgom/ /khro bo khro mo tshogs chen dang / /pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs/ /ci bgyi la sogs pa rnams kyis/ /dngos grub las
rnams rdzogs par byed/ /rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni/ /mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas shing / /spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa'i/ /thams cad ye nas dbyer med
pa'i/ /rdo rje'i rigs su thams cad dkyil/ /'od 'phro 'bar ba rab tu bsgom/ /chags med tshul gyis bstim par bya/ /gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che/ /yang na sku gsung thugs nyid
do| |thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba
'grub/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ /rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa'i gnas/ /sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni/ /thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro
phreng bsgom/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /'od zer rnam pa mang po spro/ /gnyis su med par bstim par bya/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub/ /rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /
de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom/ /sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom/ /so so sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal/ /gnas dang long spyod ci bde dang / /ma
nyams blo ni rab ldan pas/ /dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya/ /le lo sgyid snyoms med pa yi/ /the tshom med par bsgrubs byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsang
mchog dam pa thob/ /sgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni/ /rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bya/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du
brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes
pa chen po rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil

'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /blo gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis/ /'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis/ /chos kyis dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rgyan dang bgo ba'i
phyag rgya yis/ /'bar ba'i rgyal po thogs med 'grub/ /bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni/ /yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis/ /sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan
pas| |thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs/ /'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen/ /nus mthu can du gang gyur pa/ /rig 'dzin rgyal po'i
zhing du grags/ /mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi/ /skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi/ /khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin/ /pha rol phyin ba kun tu rdzogs/ /thabs dang shes rab mchog gyur pa'i/ /
sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum/ /rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs/ /mkha' dbyings dang ba'i dbyings nyi zla/ /ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal bsgom/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
thams cad kun/ /ma lus bar ni bsgoms par 'gyur/ /dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas te| |sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na/ /skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med/ /ces
ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to/ /rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur ste sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /a hoHma mthong
rmongs la chags pa yis/ /chos rnams ming du brtags pa tsam/ /'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs khyad par rab snang ba'i/ /zab chen spyod yul log par rtog brtags ming tsam du/ /A li kA li
la sogs 'dod pa'i snying po nyid/ /phyag rgya glu tshig sku gsung thugs/ /thugs kyi thugs chen yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs su rab tu gsol/ /mnyam
nyid khyab pa'i stangs dpyal yon tan mchog ste sngags kyi 'phrin las rdzogs/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u
ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen
pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa
'di brjod do/ /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog/ /phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang / /rang bzhin gsang ba'i don
rnams ni/ /yi ge sgra btags ming tshogs la/ /brten pa'i tshog gis rab mchod te/ /'ong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/ /ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil
'khor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil
'khor dbyings/ /sku gsung thugs rig kun mnga' ba'i/ /bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs/ /'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /chen po shes rab de bzhin te/ /byang chub
sems ni rdo rje tshogs/ /dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi/ /thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing / /snying
po thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis/ /ye shes dgyes la mnyes par 'bul/ /zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba/ /rol mo'i
dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin
las thugs/ /ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba/ /dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rgyun du dkyil
'khor ma lus thob/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung / /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon/ /sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba
yis| |bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis/ /rab byung kun nam lhun gyis grub/ /'di ni sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis/ /'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis/ /phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du/ /dkyil
'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis/ /nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing / /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi/ /'bras
bu gsang chen 'di yin te/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /'das dang da ltar byung ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas/ /brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs/ /'byung dang ma
thongs thams cad kun/ /'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi/ /'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /'di yis
gsang ba'i nges don med/ /btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do/ /kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog /thos bsam sgom la rab sbyangs pa'i/ /shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis
gzung / /snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan/ /lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin/ /gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya/ /rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin/ /dus min par ni srog zad nas/ /
bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /
dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi snying po'i le'u
ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e
ma'o| |thams cad ma lus dus gsum bder gshegs mchog /gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems/ /rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing / /ye
nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin/ /'gro 'ong med par dus gsum gcig car rdzogs/ /dbye bsal med cing bzang ngan blang dor med/ /rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin
te| |rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod du med/ /bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon sbyangs pa/ /khril 'ga' tsam gal te 'byung 'gyur zhing / /snga rabs phyis 'byung dag dang dbyer med pa'i/ /
mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de dag la/ /bskal pa 'ga' nas shes rab blo sbyangs pa/ /dad ldan 'ga' yis 'tsham par ci thig gi/ bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa//
gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis/ /bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba/ /bdag cag gzhan du tshol bas sangs mi rgyas/ /de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing / /
bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te/ /shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing / /bya byed las 'phags gyin 'da' 'dug byed pa/ /gang zhig blo la dpyod pa byang chub thob/ /ma
spangs mtshan ma kun bral yong med pas/ /dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed de/ /ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la/ /blo yi rig pas dpyod cing nan tan dang / /mchong
cing brten pas byang chub thob mngon te/ /nam mkha' bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na/ /sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par
mi srid do/ /rnam par rtog pa'i g.yung drung sangs rgyas la/ /thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cing / /mi rtag sa ler gnas la rtog pa mdzad/ /snyad du med pas sna
tshogs 'byung ba yin/ /bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter/ /ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i/ /thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems zhes
gdags su med/ /ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing / /thob rgyu med pas ye nas bder gshegs yin/ /zhes brjod pas chos dang ye shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs
rgyas bar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /e ma'o ma bsgrubs grub chen po/ /grub pa chen po ye shes che/ /blang dor med pa'i sa chen po/ /mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs/ /rtog pa'i ye
shes yid bzhin gter/ /thams cad la yang me long bzhin/ /bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo / /gang na gsang chen 'di yod par/ /me ma mur gyi dong 'bogs la/ /sbu gri so ni gtams pa la/
'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos/ khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du/ /lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo/ /dbyings nyid la ni nyid spyod phyir/ /dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la spyod/ /de nyid mi
gnas mya ngan 'das/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid pa las/ gsang ba chen po man ngag gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// //
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma lus par ston te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs dang / /'byung
par ma nges dus 'di dag/ snga phyi med par mnyam yin par/ /nges pa med par yang dag gsungs/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang / /ji snyed brtan g.yo la
sogs pa/ /sgyu ma mig yor tshul yin te/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas/ /de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing / /sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa/ /de dag gnyis med dbyings su sbyor/ /thams
cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de/ /thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor/ /thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi/ /de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog/ ji snyed brjod pa'i kha rgyud kyang / /yang dag don gyi snying
po ni/ /gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de/ /rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin/ /de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni/ /bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te/ /de ni ma nor lam yin par/ /a yis bo
d+hi rab tu bsdus/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni/ /gcig gam 'di zhes brjod du med/ /gsum du sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro/ /byin rlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog/ don
bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis/ /de las lhag pa'i don smra ba/ /de ni rnam dag lam min te/ /rang blos bsam pa'i 'khrul pa yin/ /thams cad rang rig byang chub sems/ /de ni lung
gi tshad mar bshad/ /tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te/ /dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing / /'bru lngar bsdus pa thabs che te/ /'gro ba kun la rang rig gnas/ /bya ba
med la byas pa med/ /zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter/ /bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod/ /za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal/ /gzhan nas yong 'ong ma yin te/ /gsang ba'i snying
po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ bsnyen pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pas brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam dang
bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'tshal nas rgyu dang 'bras bur rmongs pas/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i
rab tu cha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so/ /de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang / 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shin tu grang mang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs
pa pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang / shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu 'jig
rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo / /de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dwags ltog pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i
dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur pa dang / yong med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing bskams pa dang / lus dang yan lag
dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang / bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so/ /de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bslabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi
dwags srin po chen po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo rgya ba dang /mgo sna tshogs pa dang / lus brgya mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag sna
tshogs dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa 'khor rab tu mang po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrog pa/ gzugs dang / nga ro dang / dri
dang | kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung grang ba dang tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs kun tu khams 'khrug par byed pa/ nad bzhi rgya rtsa bzhis 'debs
pa byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i ris dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / lha'i ris dang / tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man chad
dbang du bsdus so/ /de sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dus par gyur te thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa'i glu 'di
blangs so/ /e ma ho/ 'gro ba yongs ni bde gshegs lam yin te/ /sdug bsngal sreg mdzad sgyu ma'i sprul par snang / /yon tan rmad byung che ba'i rang bzhin 'di/ /sdug bsngal kun la
bshes gnyen mgon po yin/ /rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang 'joms/ /kun 'byung bde ba rdo rje sku mchog ste/ /rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i 'phrin las bsam yas pas/ /thugs rje chen
po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms/ /sku mdog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bsam yas la/ /rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing / /byang chub sems kyis lam la gnas par
mdzad/ /'gro ba kun las bde ba gcig pu pa/ /a hoH/ /dgyes pa'i mnyes pa nyid la gnas par mdzad/ /byin rlabs kun gyis bde ba nyid la snang / /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs
pa nyid la kun nas rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas mnyes par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i
srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa

chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas khro mo'i dbang phyug chen mo

mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas gnyis su med par 'khyil pa'i dgyes pas thim nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ /hUM hUM hUM bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la
na maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la ha hUM zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig
rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed thon par gyur pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/
kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /kun tu shig shig go /gtor gtor/ rab tu gtor gtor/
kun tu gtor gtor ro/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal/ /rab tu brgyal
bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa'i skyi bung zhes byed pa'i 'bar ba chen po khrag 'thung sku smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu
dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag khrig gi rgya mtsho'i
dkyil 'khor keng rus chen por ri rab kyi steng gi 'bar ba chen po'i klong gi 'khro lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa chen po khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang
bskum du bzhugs so/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin phung de dag kyang la la ni/ dpal khrag 'thung chen por gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni/ dpal khrag 'thung
chen po rin po cher gyur te lho phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni/ dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te nub phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni/ dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las su
gyur te byang phyogs su bzhugs so/ /de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang / rngam pa'i nga ro dang 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang /
gshin rje la sogs pa khyod shug gis gdan du byas pa la bzhugs so/ /btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so so'i sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /rigs lnga'i he ru
ka las gcig tu bstims te bsdus nas gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan
nas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros brlang po'i gtum tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer zhing shin tu gtum sems kyis rngam nas khros so/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos thams cad kyi bdag nyid des dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas rngam pa'i skad kyis thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas
hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi zhes brjod nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa dgug pa chen po 'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nad grol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcad
gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs/ rus pa kun 'chos so/ /de nas hUM hUM hUM e a ra li dzaHdzaHzhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas par nyungs 'bru gcig tsam

du chud par bsdus so/ /de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po 'ang rgyal po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma/ 'byung po thams cad kyi chung ma/ 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo srin mo

chen mo mo'i srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sreg mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo

dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos byed dang / gcig spyod mo dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byad mo dang /
sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum rna sngo nag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa bran
dang yang bran g.yog dang / yang g.yog 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed kyang bsdus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i
'jigs byed snang bar byas nas de dag kun dgyes pa rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di
dag phyung ngo / /oM hUM aM badzra pra be sha a la la hoHzhes brjod pas 'byung po'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas dper na/ khab
len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'i sku la srin mo mi srun mo dang / dmar mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / nag mo
chen mo dang / dmar ser chen mo dang / sngo nag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sku la tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang
mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo rnams 'khril to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / za ba mo dang / srin
mo rnams 'khril to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung pad+mo chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos pa dang / gcig pu spyod pa dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / gub mo dang / rlung mo rnams 'khril to/
bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i kun tu las kyi sku la me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byad mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo rnams 'khril to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa
chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis hUM hUM zhes brjod pas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu bcum par gyur to/ /de nas dgyes te zhes brjod pas byang chub sems
kyi sprin las dkar mo'i tshogs dang / rkun mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs dang / thal byed ma'i tshogs dang / spos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo'i tshogs dang / sme sha can gyi tshogs
dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar dang chas nas thon to/ /thon nas kyang 'bar pa chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor par 'jigs pa'i gzugs
dang rang gi lag chas chas nas 'khod do/ /de nas shin tu dgyes nas he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / wa gdong chen
mo'i tshogs dang / khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / kang+ka gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / dur bya gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / 'ug gdong
chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas thon par gyur to/ /thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor ba'i mtshan shar phyogs kyi phyi rol
nas 'khor ba'i rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do/ /de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing du ma lus par khyab nas phaT ces brjod pas rdo rje sring 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / /rdo rje
gdong mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas thon par gyur to/ /thon nas kyang 'bar ba'i dkyil
'khor gyi skor shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so/ /de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad
kyang rang rang gi gnas gsal bar yud tsam gyis bgye'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po'i bdud rtsi 'byung
ba zhas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM badzra mahA a mr-i ta mahA kro d+he aM aM aM zhes brjod pas dbang
phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi sna nas thon to/ /mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor btsud pa las gnas nas u ts+tshusma

kro d+has phyung bas 'dam kun 'thungs te dran pa slar rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/ phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i
dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo / /de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa kun tu dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang
bas dus gcig tu btul to/ /de nas de dag shin tu 'bar zhing bred pas rab tu zhum pa'i nga ros 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/ /mgo dang lus ni brgyar
'gas shing / /snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang / /dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog /ces 'bangs su mchi bar mna' bor nas dkyil
'khor gyi gdan la bzhag go/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyis mchis brang dang / /ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams/ /dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol/ /dpa' bo
lha rje bzhes su gsol/ /bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir/ /ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang / /gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar/ /g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan
pa'i/ /sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo yi/ /gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi/ /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub/ /gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir/ /smras pa
bzhin du ma bsgrubs na/ /bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying / /gas btubs dum bur rul bar mchi/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas de'i chung ma'i tshogs dang / /sring mo dang / bu mo'i tshogs
thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun/ /dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi/ /dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag
rnams| |las kyi dngos grub stsal du stsol/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gi dbang bskur te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bkod do/ /
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro bo'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen
pos dkyil 'khor tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo khrag 'thung chen mo btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung dang

thugs rdo rje rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM ta thA ga ta mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba du Sh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra mahA shrI he ru ka ma hA

tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka

ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma mahA shrI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ta thA ga ta mahA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ oM mahA badzra d+hA ra mahA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la

ni hUM phaT/ oM mahA sUR+Ya rat+na mahA kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha ma hUM phaT/ oM hriHmahA sa ra swa d+ha mahA pad+ma kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha mahA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa hUM phaT/ badzra gau ri haH/ badzra tsau

ri haH/ badzra pra mo he haH/ badzra be tA li haH/ badzra tseN+Da li haH/ badzra puk+ka si haH/ badzra g+hasma ri haH/ badzra sma sha ni haH/ badzra siM ha mu khI he/ badzra byA g+h+r-i mu khI he/ badzra sri gA mu khI he/ badzra shwa na mu khI he/

badzra g+h+r-i D+ha mu khI he/ badzra ka ka mu khI he/ badzra kha kha mu khI he/ badzra u lu ka mu khI he/ badzra A R+Ya te dza te rA dzaMH/ badzra a ma ka hUM/ badzra lo ka baM/ badzra ba sh+mi pa la ya ba to hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/

b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM/ e h+ye hi a na ya dza hUM/ baM hoHraM/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ oM/ khro la khros pas zhi

mdzad pa/ /thugs rjes khros dpal rnga ma pa'i tshogs/ /'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho/ /a li u li/
ta la ta pa ti/ daMSh+TaM/ go nA ro/ tri kha raM yo gi ni khA hi hoH/ /hUM ha he phaT ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig/ rab tu tshig /kun tu tshig go/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/
kun tu 'bar ro/ /thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang / rab tu gang / kun tu rab tu gang bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro
bo'i tshogs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /dbang po'i yul dus rig pa rnams/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing / /mnyam pa'i dang nyid rtogs gsal na/ /thams cad bde ba
chen po'i rgya/ /bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /khro bo khro mo thams cad kun/ /gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na/ /bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin/ /zla med chen pos de
skad gsungs/ /yan lag snying po rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu/ /las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs/ /rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ /thabs chen re re
bskyod na ni/ /pad+ma chags med re re 'byung / /rdo rje pad+ma de 'byor na/ /sems can thams cad bla na med/ /byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang / /khro bo'i
dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas te/ /dbu yi dkyil 'khor bskul bskyod na/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo/ /lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na/ /rig 'dzin zhing khams thams
cad g.yo/ /rkang pa'i stabs chen mnan mchongs na/ /sdug bsngal mi zad thams cad dang / /bdud dang log 'dren thams cad gnon/ /yan lag thams cad bsgul bsigs na/ /ba spu bu ga re re nas/ /
khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phro/ de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis/ /phyogs bcu khams mang rdul snyed du/ /khro bo'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ /thugs rjes 'dul zhing dbyings su bstim/ /thams
cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang / /khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus/ /thams cad rdo rje'i brag steng dang / /me ri dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar/ /'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin/ /steng gi bgegs rnams
