'bul ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'khor lo nri mgo gdengs/ /'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i/ /rdo rje thong gshol nri spar dang / /rdo rje gtul chen dril bu'o/ /shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul
ba ni/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang / /sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa 'o/ /lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ /rin chen mi mgo'i dbyug pa dang / /gshin rje chen po'i rkang bzung ba'o/ /nub kyi bgegs
rnams 'dul ba ni/ /sprul dang sti ra'i dbyug pa dang / /khyung chen gshog gis rab tu rdeb/ /rgya mtsho che rnams rked par gtubs/ /byang gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ /rin po che yi
byug to dang / /nri mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to can/ /gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o/ /mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag gis gdul bar
'gyur| |gal te de yis ma dul na/ /byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/ /rdo rje rtse gsum nri mgo gdengs/ /i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/ /'byung
po de kun rab tu btul/ /shar lho mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/ /rdo rje ye shes me lce 'bar/ /me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed/ /drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams/ /me lha gdon
'khor dbang du bsdus/ /lho nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/ /rdo rje dang ni srin po'i mgo/ rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar/ /bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/ /srin po'i tshogs rnams
dbang du bsdus/ /nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/ /rlung gi ba dan nri mgo gdengs/ /shin tu drag po'i glang po'i brjid/ /tshig srung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/ /g.yeng ba thams
cad dbang du bsdus/ /'og tu 'jig rten bgegs 'dul phyir/ /phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste/ /phag chen po ni phyag na bsnams/ /'og gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba 'o/ /gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil
'khor gyis/ /tsha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /me yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/ /thams cad ma lus sreg par byed/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/ /thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed/ /rlung
gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/ /thams cad ma lus gtor bar byed/ /gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lor bcas/ /mda' gzhu tho chen gri chen dang / /rdo rje mdung chen dgra star bcas/ /mche

gtsigs spu gri so dang ni/ /mda' dang mdung dang sti ra dang / /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so/ /dbus kyi he ru'i phyag rgya ni/ /sti ra dbyug to chen po dang / /'khor lo chen po rab tu 'bar/ /dung chen dmar
gyis gang ba las/ /rdo rjes dkrug cing rab tu gsol/ /shar gyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang / /rdo rje chen po rab tu 'bar/ /nri mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol/ /lho yi phyag
rgya chen po ni/ /sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang / /yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhal yas su/ /dmar gyi ar+g+haM rab tu gsol/ /nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang / /pad+ma
chags med rab tu 'bar/ /dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol/ /byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang / /rdo rje rgya gram rab tu 'bar/ /dung chen dmar gyi sa bkang ba
gsol/ /khro mo rnams kyang khro dang mthun/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni/ /rgyud gzhan ngag dang mthun par bshad/ /ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ /'jig rten 'das mdo che las bshad//
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil
'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa/ /gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams
gnyis kyis mdzes/ /thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid/ /'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa'i dom gyis spar bas ni/ /dbang
phyug lha chen la sogs bzur/ /smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang / /dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad/ /ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon/ /rngam
pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par bsgrags/ /sbrul dang thod 'phreng nyi zlar bcas/ /steng gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas/ /rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang / /ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs/ /
rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams/ /btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang 'khril/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / /sgo bzhi phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing / /slas dang byi mo tshogs kyi gtso//
bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes/ /rang gi stan dang lag cha dang / /ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas/ /zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil
'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /a ho/ bskal
par bcas shing dug tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /nyon mongs kun g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lo brjod dka' ba'i/ /ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan gyis rdul snyed bsam yas pa/ /ro tshogs khrag la
brkam pa dpung gnyen kun bkye nas/ /zhen pa'i gdug mo shin tu gsal dka' ba'i/ /mi mngon dbyings nas gzugs kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas kyis/ /snyigs mar bcas shing mtshams sbyor
kun dam zil gyis gnon/ /rab tu gnon pa'i 'jigs byed bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin de nyid gnyen por kun 'byung kun tu gsal// ho/ /chos rnams ji snyed 'gro drug smin byed brjod mi
lang / /dus mtha' rmongs la gnas pa brjod mi lang / /'dod pas zhen pa'i las kyang ji snyed ji srid par/ /drag po bdo ba'i rlung chen bsam mi khyab/ /bde bar bcas pa gzhan du med par
brjod mi lang / /bskal bar bsags pa'i dug chen rab rtog kun tu rtog/ de rnams zil gnon khrag 'thung sku gsung 'jigs byed par/ /rkyen du bcas nas sbu bus 'bras bu smin
pa rab smin ltar/ /dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ni mang po'i tshogs/ /dpag med bsam yas lhun grub pas/ /rab tu 'dul bar shin tu gsal/ /ho/ /khro bo'i rang
bzhin gdug par 'jigs pa ma yin zhing / /zhi ba mdzes pa kun gyi yid dang 'thad par gnas rgyud yod ma yin/ /de nyid gnyis su min pa'i cho 'phrul bsam yas thams cad kun tu
khyab| |rigs lnga khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i rol pa rdul snyed rab ston pa'i/ /rnam dag byang chub mchog gi dbyings te gsang ba'i snying por rab bstan nges pa nyid de shin tu gnas par gsal/ /ho//
rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu
gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos nyid kyi byin rlabs dang yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di
brjod do/ /oM sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ye shes snying po'i mchog nyid de/ /sangs rgyas kun tu bzang
po nyid| |'di yin gzhan na med pa ste/ /rol pa kun la mnga' brnyes shing / /srid pa 'jig rten thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas nyid de dus gsum du/ /
ma g.yos lhun gnas snying po ste/ /rang bzhin che ba'i yon tan las/ /ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa/ /snying rje
chags pa'i dam tshig gis/ /nga rgyal nyid kyi sku chen bstan/ /gdug cing gtum pa'i khams gsum na/ /'dul ba'i zhing du rab sbyong zhing / /'phrin las
rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad/ /ye shes ngo mtshar tsham ngam gyis/ /chos bzhi rnam dag che ba'i lha/ /ye shes sku ste khyad par che/ /chags pa'i tshogs kyis
mtshan ma ni/ /'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sku/ /gtum ngam gdug pas mtshan pas na/ /zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi sku/ /'dul bya zhing du rab sbyor zhing / /chos nyid
mnyam las bzhengs pas na/ /gti mug chen po nyid kyi sku/ /snod bcud dag pa'i spyod yul ba/ /thugs sku gsung las 'phros pa dang / /rgyal ba nga yis mtshan
pas na| |nga rgyal chen po nyid kyi sku/ /gsang ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis/ /thig le thugs su bsdus pa nyid/ /gzhan du mi gtong mtshan pas na/ /de nyid phrag
dog nyid sku rdzogs/ /stong gsum stong gi stong chen po/ /'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa/ /rdul dang bye ba la sogs pa'i/ /bgrang ba las ni rab 'das
mtshan| |de nyid snang zhing srid pa nyid/ /'jigs byed sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings/ /chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thig le mchog /snying
po thig le bsam yas nyid/ /'jigs byed dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag /sgyu mas mtshan pa'i dra ba yin/ /de nyid tshogs dang dkyil 'khor sngags/ /gcig la
gsum du mchog tu sngags/ /yul dang 'byung ba de nyid do/ /bdag rig gzhan don snying po nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab phyag mtshan pa/ /gnyis med rig pa'i ye
shes che| |ming dang gzugs dang dbur gyur pa/ /phyag dang zhabs su rnam par brtags/ /brtags pa las ni 'phros pa'i sku/ /ci
yang med las cir yang snang / /skal bzang mchog gi sgyu 'phrul pa/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /rtags pa zil gnon mos nyid spyan/ /spyan ni
chos nyid mnyam pa nyid/ /ji bzhin dbyings kyi yul la sbyor/ /rol ba'i rtsed mor sdang mig pa/ /gzhan du mi gzigs yul la gzigs/ /pad+ma 'khyil ba
nyid sku gsung / /mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig /ye shes chen po'i spyan bgrad las/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba yi/ /mi yi tshogs kyi gzhan
phug glog /bdud rtsi zhing du sbyor bas na/ /bdud rtsi mchog gi khro bo yin/ /sku nyid mnyam pa rdzogs pa las/ /sna tshogs 'char bar rab son pa/ /ye shes
sgyu 'phrul stobs chen po/ /mi g.yo mchog gi 'du 'phro las/ /gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa ni/ /shes rab tshogs la 'phrul pa dang / /thugs rje
dra ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'khor yug ji snyed mtha' klas pa/ /dbyings nyid bde la bskyod pa ste/ /'phros nas dbang du byed pa'i don/ /rta yi gar thabs rdzu
'phrul gyis/ /gcig kyang yal ba ma yin pa'o/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mthas klas par/ /rtsed mo mchog gi phyag
rgya ni| |brkyang dang bskum pa zhabs tshul te/ /thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don/ /rab dbang thabs chen rgyal po yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung ba/ /thig
le mchog gi gnas la rdzogs/ /dbang phyug lha chen la sogs la/ /zil gnon khros pa'i phyag mtshan pa/ /sna tshogs mtshon rnon mang po bsnams/ /nga
rgyal gdug pa'i zhe sdang gcod/ /gti mug chos sku sgyu 'phrul ba/ /dra ba'i thugs rje mtha' dag ni/ /khros pa'i dam tshig snying de yis/ /mnyam pa'i thig ler
dgod pa ni/ /gshin rje gshed por gdug pa'i rgyal/ /gdug pa'i tshogs rnams mchog sgrol bden/ /'gro la mgon du gyur pas na/ /dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med pa'i//
chos sku gdug pas brgyan pa'i sprul/ /dbang rtags ye shes rgyan du bzhag /dur khrod rdzas dang khrag 'thung ba'i/ /g.yang gzhi stag gi pags chen bgos/ /'jigs
byed snying rje'i dam tshig ni/ /skye shi rtsa ba gcod mdzad pa/ /mi g.yo mgon zhes mchog tu bsgrags/ /nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed pa/ /nga rgyal 'phrog pa'i dam tshig
ste| |kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la/ /sngags kyi snying po de nyid pa/ /hUM hUM hUM gis sdud za 'thung / /rdo rje thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /
hUM mdzad ches ni rnam par bsgrags/ /mi mched gti mug chen po ni/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho rdub pa'i phyir/ /ban+d+ha klong chen 'thung bar snang / /'jig rten 'bar ba'i sprin
chen po| |bskal pa las kyi zil gnan pa/ /rdo rje me yi 'bar ba 'byung / /nyon mongs rgya mtsho skem par byed/ /'jigs byed thams cad dam tshig gis/ /
bsam yas 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas/ /rang gi sku yi gzhal med bsdus/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes ni/ /zil gyis gnon pa dur khrod gling / /tshom
bu gnyis kyi lha chen po/ /rdo rje sku yi byin rlabs kyis/ /thig le mi g.yo bde ba las/ /rang bzhin rol pa chen pos ni/ /rdo rje phra men pho nya'i tshogs/ /
khams gsum 'dul bar yang dag mdzad/ /ha ni thig le zhi ba nyid/ /ha ni thig le zhi khro snyoms/ /ha ni thig le dbang chen yin/ /ha ni thig le
drag po nyid/ /ha ni thig le rol pa nyid/ /ha ni thig le 'phrin las nyid/ /ha ni thig les chags dbang 'dul/ /ha ni thig le las kun rdzogs/ /he ni thig
le ye shes thugs/ /he ni thig les gsung snyan pa/ /he ni thig les tsham rngam lce/ /he ni thig le rol pa nyid/ /he ni thig le dbang rtags yin/ /he ni thig les drag shul
ba| |he ni thig les thugs chen rdzogs/ /he ni thig les dkyil 'khor ba/ /'jigs byed mchog gi sgyu 'phrul te/ /dra bas zil gnon lam 'gog go/ /hUM ni ye
shes thugs kyi thugs/ /hUM ni ye shes thugs sku nyid/ /hUM ni ye shes thugs sku gsung / /hUM ni ye shes yid bzhin las/ /hUM ni thig le ye shes so/ /phaT ni
sku yi thugs kyi thugs/ /phaT ni gsung gi gsung gi thugs/ /phaT ni thugs kyi thugs kyi thugs/ /phaT ni chos sku'i thugs kyi thugs/ /phaT ni chos sku'i
gsung gi thugs/ /phaT ni chos thugs thugs kyi thugs/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas dgyes pa ho/ /dbang phyug chag spas dgyes pa ho/ /gar thabs rol pas dgyes
pa ho| |sku gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho/ /yon tan las kyi dgyes pa ho/ /pho nya 'du 'phros dgyes pa ho/ /kun la snang bas dgyes pa ho/ /byin gyi rlabs
kyis dgyes pa ho/ /chos kyi sku la dgyes pa ho/ /ye shes rol pa dgyes pa ho/ /ci yang min pas dgyes pa ho/ /gnod pa sdud las dgyes pa ho/ /chos kyi
dbyings nyid dgyes pa ho/ /des dgyes pa chen po nyid la nyid shin tu dgyes par gyur te/ chos thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin
tu gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ dgyes pa chen po'i byin rlabs dang / /yon tan mchog ston pa'i le'u ste sum
cu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'jigs byed kyi bsod nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/ /'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso/ /btsun mo'i
tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/ /zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/ /bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/ /'jigs byed rdo rje rigs kyi gtso/ /btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /
khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/ /zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/ /lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas/ /
bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/ /'jigs byed rin chen rigs kyi gtso/ /
btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/ /zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/ /lus dang
ngag gis byin brlabs nas/ /bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /yang na rigs dbang dkyil 'khor ro/ /'khor
lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/ /'jigs pa'i 'phrin las rigs kyi gtso/ /btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/ /zhi
dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ /las bzhi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/ /lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas/ /bdag
nyid drag por rab gnas nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga sku gsung thugs/ /yon
tan 'phrin las rdzogs par bsgom/ /rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs pa/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par/ /tsham ngam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom/ /glu
dang gar dang phyag rgya dang / /shes rab thabs su shes pa dang / /byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dang / /brda la sogs pa'i yon tan
dang / /bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyi/ /mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na
nyid nges pa las/ 'jigs byed chen po'i bsod nams sbyin pa dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan
'das dgyes pa chen pos cho ga dang dkyil 'khor yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /
chos dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro/ /gsang sngags spyi yi dkyil 'khor las/ /shes 'jug yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /rgyang phrag dpag
tshad la sogs dang / /lus gang lus do gsum gyi tshad/ /rang gi rigs pas ci nus par/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /gnod bsgrad sa
gnon byin gyis brlab/ /ljon pa lcug phran sdong gcig dang / /ma rig tshon gyis ji bzhin du/ /goms par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dbab/ /'jigs byed sku
gsung dkyil 'khor bzlas/ /gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni/ /tshogs kyi mchog tu dmigs pas gzhag /dang por mchod sbyin dam pas mchod/ /gzugs
dang lugs chen dung mchog ni/ /ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod/ /'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas/ /khro mo ji snyed 'khor du bya/ /bar chad ting 'dzin
mchog gis zlog /gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te/ /'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing / /thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas/ /bdag gi lus la
thugs tshul du/ /de yi gzugs gzung mchog tu bstim/ /dza zhes lan gsum brjod pas na/ /de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing / /ye shes lnga yi dngos
grub sbyin/ /pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams/ /de yi dgos pa byed par 'gyur/ /yang na sa gzhi rab mnyam la/ /phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams/ /lnga yi tshon
gyis bri bar bya/ /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen/ /rdo rje drung chen dmar rtsis dgang / /dung dang srog shing gsar rnying dang / /zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran dang / /
ji snyed pa yi rdzas rnams kun/ /'jigs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin dang / /nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /gdeng
dang bcas pa'i bsam pa yis/ /re ba med par rab tu bsgrub/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa/ /sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen pos/ /
zhag ni tshang zhing rtags byung na/ /dkyil 'khor mthun pa'i da du sbyar/ /zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam/ /drug cu dgu bcu rtsa drug tu/ /'jigs byed chen
po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /'jigs byed tshogs la bdag lus dbul/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid du brtag /'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig las/ /
nam yang 'da' bar mi mdzad do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ dgyes pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu
bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sngags kyi snying po 'di ched du brjod do/ /a ki du na dz+wa la maN+Dal la phaT
phaT phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA shrI he ru ka mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT/ ru lu mahA sa ma ya hUM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM mahA badzra shrI he ru ka badzra kro d+he shwa
ri sarba duSh+Tan hUM phaT/ ru lu mahA sa ma ya hUM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM rat+na mahA shrI he ru ka rat+na mahA kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha mu kha hUM phaT/ ru lu ru lu mahA
sa ma ya hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM hrIHpad+ma mahA shrI he ru ka pad+ma mahA kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hUM phaT/ ru lu mahA sa ma ya hUM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM karma mahA shrI he ru ka sarba
a ka mahA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa rU pe hUM phaT/ ru lu mahA sa ma ya hUM ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM mahA sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na pad+ma a mo g+ha mahA badzra shrI
he ru ka mahA sa ma ya ha he hUM phaT/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA pad+ma shrI he ru ka man+ta dz+wa la mahA maN+Dal la kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ oM oM
oM hUM hUM hUM/ swAM swAM swAM/ AM AM AM/ hAM hAM hAM/ badzra mahA ka pA la kharga daN+De na dz+wa la sid+d+ha mahA shrI he ru ka a me du me sid+d+hod b+hA be/ saM ha ra na hUM hUM hUM/
mahA yo ga ad+d+ha mahA sa ma ya ru lu ru a la la ho/ ho/ /sems nyid thig ler rab gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis nyid rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas
rdo rje he ru ka/ /tshom bu dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi/ /sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor cig /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM aM
hUM su ra s+t+waM/ ka ma la mahA su kha mA lai ma nu sa ma na dz+wa la ni d+ha na a ba yo ga khA hi a la a la hoH/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ 'jigs
byed chen po sngags kyi bzlas pa snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom
ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dam tshig chen pos phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched sbyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te 'dug pa'i tshogs byin
gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma sa ma yo gi ni dza zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
bcu thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po kun tu pad+mar gyur te/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa las dbu dang / phyag dang zhabs
stong khams kyi rdul snyed srid pa'i rtse mor thug par gnas par gyur to/ /de nas yang dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te/ ri rab chen po brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis 'dril zhing oM a b+hi tsa ra ba shI na zhes brjod pas lha'i tshogs dang / /klu'i tshogs dang / gnod
sbyin chen po dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad rang dbang med par zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to/ /de nas
yang ha ha a pi ra tsa tiSh+Tha zhes brjod pas la la ni/ lus shin tu brjes te ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to/ /la la ni/ mngon sum gcan mar ri rab
chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to/ /de nas yang sa 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang che ba dad pa med cing rdo rje theg pa smod pa zhig yongs kyi
'jig rten na gnas par mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas oM pad+ma sa ma yo gi ni ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM zhes brjod pas kun tu sku chags
pa'i bdag nyid dang / kun tu gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang / kun tu thugs chags par gyur pa dang / kun tu rin po che chags pa chen po dang / kun tu
'phrin las chags pa chen por gyur te shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / dbus chen por khrag gi dba' klong keng rus chen po'i ri rab chen po na dus
kun tu de nyid snang bar gyur to/ /de yang kun tu sku lnga 'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung lnga'i nga ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa
dang / 'jigs byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu thugs lnga'i rol pa dang / zhal bsam
gyis mi khyab pas 'jigs pa dang / rigs lnga tshom bu chen po'i steng du gnas par gyur to/ /de las mchog gi snying po chen po mahA rat+na ti la kha'i dbur gyur las rab tu sku gsung
thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na 'jigs byed chen pa'i theg le snying po nyid dbu gsum phyag drug tu gnas te gnyis su med par bzhugs so/ /de
nas de nyid du sku dang / phyag dang / zhabs dang / 'khor stong khams kyi rdul snyed du 'jigs byed chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par khebs par
mthong ngo / /de nas yang bdud chen po sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos skyes bu chen po sa 'dzin gyi bdag po thong thong ji lta bu byed dam zhes pa las de nas yang
dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis/ oM a b+hi tsa ra ba shI na hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas dam pa'i bstan pa rdo rje theg pa spyod cing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor pa la
gnod pa'i tshogs 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog tu bcas pa'i bdud chen po de dag nyid kyi yid kyis gdungs te
rab tu brgyal nas ma mthong bar rmongs pa'i gnas nas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par keng rus kyi ri rab chen po'i 'og zhabs kyi gnas su phyin par
gyur to| |de nas 'jigs byed chen pos tiSh+Tha badzra aM aM zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i blo dang phral/ mi mthun pa'i lus brjes te lha chen po'i tshogs 'dul ba'i
'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por gnas par gyur to/ /de nas dgyes pa chen po'i dpal 'jigs byed chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul chen
po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las las thugs
kyi dkyil 'khor thig le chen po zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi rdo rje thig le chen po'i dam tshig sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /oM/ /khrag mang dba' klong 'khyil
ba yi| |keng rus tshogs kyi ri rab 'bum/ /'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga yi ri/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar ba'i khang / /gru chad bzhis brgyan rab brjid pa'i/
gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes/ /thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid/ /sta na mang po lha chen brten/ /dgyes pa
chen po kun tu bzang / /phyag dang zhabs ni brgyad pa yi/ /thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid/ /'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung ba'i/ /rdo rje snying po thig le
thugs| |dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad/ /khro mo bzhis mchod ngos bzhir ni/ /dgyes pa chen po'i tshul 'chang ba/ /phyogs
bzhi gra dang bcas par ni/ /sprul pa'i rnal 'byor phra men rnams/ /ri rab zhing chen steng na gnas/ /'bar bas phyag bsnams chen po ni/ /rdo rje dug chen
gang ba dang / /pad+ma'i gzhal med rnge'u chung brdung / /zhing gi zhags pas 'ching ba dang / /kha T+wAM 'phen cing 'khril ba ste/ /btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang
bcas| |gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / /sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes par/ /bran mo'i tshogs chen mang po rnams/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas
par byed/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i
le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de
bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /byed pa rdo rje mchog nyid kyi/ /sgyu 'phrul lam gyi dkyil 'khor las/ /da ba'i dkyil 'khor ma'i
rdzogs par/ /'jug pa'i yid kyi dgongs pa yin/ /shin tu phra la sbyangs pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mdzes/ /tshom bu gnyis kyi bye brag tu/ /
spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir ni/ /rkang mthil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri/ /oM dang muM gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de las phra mo
rdo rjes dgang / /phra rab sa rdul mthil du gzung / /yum gyi tshogs su shes pas brtags/ /gang gi yul yang dbang du 'gyur/ /mi mthun gzugs su
brtags pa ni/ /dra ba'i 'du 'phros de lus bzhin/ /lugs ma bzhin du haM du brtag /de las 'od bzhin mthil du gzung / /gsang gnas ngag lam haM du
bya| |rlung zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag /drag po lce yi sbyor ba yis/ /gling khams gzhan du shin tu gtang / /bdag nyid hUM gi tshogs bcas pa/ /ma
skyes pa yi yi ge bsgom/ /bya ba chos khams de yi tshogs/ /muM du byin brlabs yi ger bstim/ /brtan pa a yi 'phro 'du yis/ /nam mkha' bzhin du shin
tu bsgom/ /brtan 'gyur a yi snying po bzlas/ /nyams su lon par ma gyur tshe/ /'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor/ /dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang /
rnam pa mang por mnyam du 'o/ /de las mi snang gzugs zhi ba/ /rab tu blo yi theg gnas ni/ /gzhan du nam yang mi bstan cing / /
gzhon dang spyad dang 'tshong la sogs/ /longs spyod rnam par sbyor ba dang / /rdzas kyi nor phyir ma yin no/ /rmongs pa 'phar dang brtson 'grus zhan/ /nam yang
sbyin par ma gsungs te/ /smad pa bam gyi gter bzhin du/ /sus kyang byin par ma gsungs la/ /srog chags khwa yi gtam bzhin du/ /nam yang smra bar mi
bya 'o| |byed pa rdo rje gsha' yi tshogs/ /bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gling bzhi'i lam/ /kun tu bzang po'i thabs tshul ba/ /tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/ /chos
khams bya ba a yi tshogs/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gleng slong ba/ /kun tu bzang mo shes rab tshul/ /gsha' la ye shes thugs kyi thugs/ /tshom bu gsum
gyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de ni chos khams a la bstim/ /chos kyi chos bya ba yi dbyings/ /kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum/ /de yi ngang du tshogs kun brtags/
sa chu me yi 'byung ba rnams/ /de yi dbyings nas 'byung bar ni/ /'dod pa'i bdag la shin tu brtag /mi gnas nam mkha'i mthas klas par/ /goms
par 'dod pa thod pa dang / /chu las sa bzhin 'gro ba dang / /bsreg bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang / /tsha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang / /phyogs bcu kun tu phyin
par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ rdo rje snying po las thams cad kyi le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan
'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i snying po 'di brtan par 'dzin pa'i don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /de nyid chos dbyings mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas
kun bdag byin gyis brlab/ /k+Sha laM a yi tshon bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs mi bzhin du ni/ /de nyid yid lam
mchog grub pa'o/ /de nyid gsal bar mnyam sbyor las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/ /oM laM a yi tshon bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil
'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/ /de nyid gzugs lam mchog grub pa'o/ /de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam sbyor las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag
byin gyis brlab/ /oM lAM a yi tshon bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/ /de nyid khyad par lam mchog go /
chos dbyings rtogs pa mnyam sbyor las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/ /oM lAM a yi tshon bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul
dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/ /de nyid gsum mchog grub pa'o/ /chos dbyings bya ba mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun
bdag byin gyis brlab/ /haM laM a yi tshogs bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/ /de ni 'phrin las ye
shes so/ /de las ting 'dzin sgyu 'phrul bsgom/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid ni/ /rtse bcu rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom/ /de nyid ha dang k+Sha nyid de/ /
muM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid las/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa/ /de nyid hUM laM phyag bsnams pa/ /rtse
bcu rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /yang na rtse lnga thugs kyi thugs/ /dbus nas hUM gi lo tsa na/ /lcags kyu 'dzin par rgya bcings shing / /hUM hUM hUM gis lan gsum
du| |rang lus ngag yid byin gyis brlab/ /muM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bskul/ /'bru lnga rgya bcings byin gyis brlab/ /bskyed pa rdzogs par gsor ba yis//
bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhi ba rgyas pa lan gsum gyis/ /de 'dod las rnams grub par 'gyur/ /bcu pa drag po mthing nag dbur/ /'gying ba'i gar gyis
gsor ba yis/ /gsung snyan sgra yi bro rdeb pa'i/ /phyag rgya brgyad du sbyor bas na/ /phaT phaT hUM gis gsod pa yin/ /snying po thugs brtags phyag bsnams pa/ /
sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po las/ /bsod nams lus 'jig dbang du 'gyur/ /ci 'dod re ba thob par mdzad/ /brgyan pa sgeg pa pho nya dang / /tshangs pa dbang po 'dod
dbang dang / /mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag /drag shul mthu yi dregs pa can/ /sngags shing brgyal te blo stor nas/ /bum pa bzang po 'bul bar gyur/ /lha mo klu
mo brgyan pa dang / /rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang / /gnas dang rten dang bgo ba dang / /gtsug na nor bu yod pa dang / /ci 'dod yid la bsam pa 'bul/ /de la bran
bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de yi dgos pa thams cad ni/ /ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ sgyu 'phrul
chen po brtan par gzung ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs
rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o/ /ye nas
rnam dag chos sku la/ /log rtog rnam pa gnyis su 'grub/ /thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes/ /thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las/ /rnam rtog mi mthun
so sor gyur/ /la la'i sman la la la'i dug /sman du ma gyur gang yang med/ /thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las/ /mi mthun khyab par so sor snang / /sus
kyang ma byas su byed yod/ /rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcings/ /sdug bsngal ma lus 'khrul 'khor dang / /khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang / /
dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang / /nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad sbyong / /rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed/ /sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa
yang rdzogs/ /de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya/ /kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas/ /de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin/ /gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog bor/ /thams
cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod/ /rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs/ /thabs kyis pha rol phyin la spyod/ /snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis/ /bdud rtsi mchog ni
mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /bdud rtsi'i don ni skye shi med/ /bdud rtsi gnas ni byang chub sems/ /bdud rtsi las ni rnam rtog sbyong / /bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don
mdzad| |sman gyi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab/ /ngan song sbyong zhing mtho ris 'grub/ /gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin/ /gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs
'grub| |rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang / /rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug /klu dug sbod gtong dug la sogs/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /dug
rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang par bsgom/ /gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim/ /oM hUM trAM hrIHa/ /yang na
yi ge oM gyis bya/ /yang na yi ge hrI las gtang / /dug rnams bdud rtsir 'asgyur bar bya/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya/ /a ho rdo rje gsang
ba'i chig tu'o/ /hUM/ bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste/ /thugs rjes rtog bdag 'dul bar byed/ /nga dang bdag med dbyings sbyor zhing / /byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa 'o//
oM/ /bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste/ /ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang / /thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi/ /trAM/ bdag nyid nga rgyal yon tan te/ /snying rjes
'gro don 'phel bar byed/ /zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor/ /yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o/ /hrIH/ bdag nyid 'dod chags
gsum mchog ste/ /nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal rnam par dag /chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o/ /A/ bdag
nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste/ /don rnams ma lus grub par byed/ /log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog /phyogs bcu dus bzhi 'phro ba 'o/ /muM/ bdag nyid
shes pa 'od gsal te/ /le lo g.yeng ba sel bar byed/ /thugs rje myur ba las byung ba/ /rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o/ /nyon mongs las rnams
dag byed cing / /dbugs chen dag kyang 'byin par byed/ /dug rnams sbyong ba sku gsung ste/ /lam lnga sbyong pa ye shes lnga/ /'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes
rab mtshon/ /hUM du bsdus shing hoHyis g.yeng / /raM gyis bsregs shing phaT kyis 'phangs/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi/ /thig le'i dbyings su
thim par bya/ /de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas/ /ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom/ /'bru gcig 'bru gsum 'bru lnga bsgom/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
ma lus dang / /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom/ /nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsal/ /de las longs spyod lnga kun dang / /ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga
dang / /lha mo lnga dang sman lngar bsgom/ /oM hUM trAM hrIHaH/ oM badzra a mr-i te kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM bi shud+d+he a mri te hUM phaT/ oM d+harma a mri te hUM phaT/ oM
AHhUM ces brjod pas thams cad dag par gyur/ bdud rtsir gyur/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams/ /rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /gcig la lnga lngar
dbye bya zhing / /muM gyi dbyings su bstim par bya/ /'byung ba che rnams de dag la/ /lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya/ /rig pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing / /'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de/ /yum lnga dag tu bsgom par bya/ /de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do/ /rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi
bcu gnyis/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid na/ /de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun/ /smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/ /a ho/ /e
ma'o lhag pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom/ /de nas lha dang gnyis med nas/ /bdag nyid yi ge oM dang muM/ /gnyis dang bdag dang
dbyings su thim/ /bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsgom/ /sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra/ /zla ba pad+ma gdan khri la/ /nyi ma stong
gi gdan khri ldan/ /lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes/ /slas dang byi mo'i tshogs kyis
bskor| |a ho/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/ /shar gyi rtse la rdo rje 'o/ /lho yi rtse la rin po che/ /nub kyi rtse la snang
mtha' yas/ /byang gi rtse la don yod grub/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar bsgom/ /snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar
bzlas| |de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni/ /bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar/ /re ba yid bzhin skong bar byed/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ /'dod lnga yon
tan ldan par byed/ /dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o/ /bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed/ /sgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan par byed/ /a mr-i ta yi rgyu nyid ni/ /byang chub
sems dang sha chen dang / /dri chu dri chen mAM sar bcas/ /pad+ma rak+ta la sogs dang / /gzhan yang don yod sna tshogs rnams/ /dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar/ /bdud
rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlab/ /rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir/ /gtsang sme med par dag par bya/ /dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya/ /phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom
bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing / /dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang / /bskal par yun ring gnas pa dang / /dngos grub chen po 'thob 'gyur te/ /tshogs gnyis
rdzogs par yang dag gsungs/ /bdag nyid yi ge hUM gyur nas/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la/ /oM AHhUM du gyur par bsgom/ /'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs
bcur spro/ /slar 'dus 'od 'phros bdud rtsir 'bar/ /shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig bsgom/ /gzhan yang yi ge'i tshogs pas gdab/ /'thung na ngan song sgrib pa byang /
trata/ rtag bsten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing / /lha la rtag tu mchod byas na/ /bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur/ /mi mthun
phyogs la gtor byas na/ /drag po gtum po'ang lhan nor 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang
'thob 'gyur na/ /lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/ /the tshom med par sgrub par gyis/ /rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o// //de nas dgyes pa
chen pos de dag byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni/ /'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga
nyid| |khams dang 'byung ba nyid la gnas/ /de gnyis sgyu 'phrul thabs mkhas pa/ /dra bas mngon rdzogs sku gsung thugs/ /thams cad ma lus phyag
rgya nyid| |chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /de nyid ngag lam kun khengs bar/ /hUM gis tshogs su rnam par
bsgom| |lus nyid ha yi tshogs la bstim/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung bas/ /kha dog nag po'i tshon phye yis/ /de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ /dza
zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/ /mgyogs su 'gro bar lcags kyis spang / /dri rno snga bas mgyogs pa dang / /gang du bya ba byin par byed/ /de yi lus
las 'byung 'dod na/ /zhi bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la/ /dal bus hUM zhes bsdus pa yis/ /bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/ /thams cad ma lus
phyag rgya nyid/ /chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par/ /oM gyi tshogs su shin tu
bsgom| |lus nyid a yi tshogs la bstim/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/ /kha dog dkar po'i tshon phye yis/ /de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ /
hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/ /mang pos bkur ba rgyal chen po/ /blo rno yid mdzangs bzhin bzang dang / /snga bas longs spyod 'du ba dang / /gnas
par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/ /zhi bas bdag gis gzugs bzung la/ /ngal bus oM zhes bsdus pa yis/ /bdag
gi lus la gzung bar 'gyur/ /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/ /chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa/ /phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /de nyid
ngag lam kun khengs par/ /swAM gyi tshogs su rab tu bsgom/ /lus nyid swAM gyi tshogs la bstim/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/ /kha dog ser
po'i tshon phye yis/ /de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ /swAM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/ /nor mang blon po yid mdzangs la/ /blo rno snga bas longs spyod 'du//
de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing / /gnas ni dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/ /rgyas pas bdag
gi gzugs bzung la/ /dal bus swAM zhes brjod pa yis/ /bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/ /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/ /chos sku mchog gi rten
gyur pa| |phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par/ /oM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom/ /lus nyid aM gyi tshogs
la bstim/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/ /kha dog dmar po'i tshon phye yis/ /de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ /aM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas
nas| |rgyal mo zhang blon dbang chen dang / /ci 'dod yid bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ /de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing / /gnas par dga' ba bzhin du
'gyur| |de yi gzugs las 'byung 'dod na/ /dbang gis bdag gi gzugs bzung la/ /dal bus aM zhes brjod pa yin/ /bdag gi lus la
chud par 'gyur/ /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/ /chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa/ /phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /de nyid ngag lam
lus khengs par/ /haM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom/ /lus nyid haM gyi tshogs la bstim/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/ /kha dog ljang khu'i tshon
phye yis| |de yi snyid nang bdag zhugs la/ /haM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas na/ /las kyi rigs chen gang 'dod gzugs/ /dmag mang mthu dpung go mtshon
bzang / /zhe sdang can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags can rnams 'dul ba dang / /nga rgyal chen po 'dud par 'gyur/ /de yis bstan pa 'dzin
par byed/ /de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing / /gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/ /snyoms pas khro yi gzugs
bzung la/ /dal bus haM zhes brjod pa yis/ /mi snang ba yi gzugs su 'char/ /bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/ /gling ngam dur khrod gnas rnams
su| |nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang gis/ /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mchog 'dzin la/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung / /gsang ba'i snying po de kho
na nyid nges pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings
'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum/ /dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga
mtshan| |'bru lngas byin rlabs mUM du brtags/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /mUM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs
las| |de bzla'i ngang tshul de bzung na/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /lam du zhugs la de lus dgang / /de goms
blo bde gsal spro thim/ /de bzhin rigs rnams aM du bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya
snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang mthun par rnam par bsam/ /brtan pa a yi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin rlabs ngang du brtag /gzhi rtsa
med ba'i sems nyid las/ /yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya shin tu gsal ba na/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags/ /'phro 'du rigs
dang mthun pa'i grangs/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /lcags kyu mchog gi phyag rgya bcing / /des na 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /rang bzhin sku gsung
'dus ma byas/ /gzhan dbang ma yin rdo rje rigs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sgyu 'phrul yum/ /shin tu chos kyi bsgrags pa la/ /gsal bar 'dod pa smra bya ba/ /spyi
gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngar byin brlabs lAM du brtags/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /lAM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /
sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba las/ /rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas/ /
sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /pad+ma gsang gnas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs nas zhugs
la de lus dgang / /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /rdo rje rigs rnams hUM du bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal
bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam/ /brtan pa ha yi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtag/
gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs
dang mthun pa'i grangs/ /bsgoms dang bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /lcags kyu'i stangs kyis bskul bar gsungs/ /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /rigs
dang mthun pa'i 'phro 'du bsgom/ /yon tan sku gsung yid bzhin gter/ /dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul mchog chen mo/ /chas shing sgreg pa'i gzugs brnyan
ni| |ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la/ /dbab pa mchog gi las bya ba/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs oM du brtags/ /de
nyid goms las gsang mtshan la/ /oM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /sangs rgyas me yi sbyor ba la/ /rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /de nyid
mtha' bral mi dgyes las/ /yon tan gter gyi gzugs bcas na/ /sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer
byin brlabs te/ /pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbu bas su zhugs la de lus dgang / /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /rin chen rigs rnams
swAM du bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying bo gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang mthun par shin
tu bsam/ /brtan pa swAM gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs
bsgom| |phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /dam tshig zhags pa mchog gis
bcing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi/ /rigs dang 'du 'phro mthun par bsgom/ /gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal/ /gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa
dang / /ci 'dod 'od dang smra yang rung / /mtshon dang 'jigs pa mang ba dang / /bcings pa'i las dang mtshon las thar/ /dpal ldan pad+ma mchog gi yum/ /
bde chen gar dbang gzugs 'dzin pa/ /dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /ljon pa'i lcug phran la sogs la/ /dang por gnas lnga byin gyis brlab/ /de
nas gnas lnga shes rab bsgom/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /las bzhi 'bru bzhi baM du brtags/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /baM gyi tshogs kyi
lha rnams bsgom/ /sangs rgyas chu yi sbyor ba la/ /rdo rje gsung rnams byin gyis rlob/ /de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs
las| |rdo rje gsung gi gzugs bcas nas/ /sangs rgyas gsung chen tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /
pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /ming dang snying po bcas pa dgug /rdo rje
gsung rnams oM du bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /
rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam/ /bstan pa oM gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /
chos dbang yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /
chags pa'i lcags sgrog mchog gis bcing / /chags pa chen po'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/ /zhi ba dbang dang drag po rgyas/ /ci
'dod par ni rab tu bsngags/ /dpal ldan 'grub pa sgyu 'phrul ba/ /dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /ljon pa mchog dang 'bring rnams la/ /spyi gtsug
kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs hUM du brtags/ /de ni me yi tshogs yin te/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /me yi tshogs kyi lha
rnams te/ /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /don yod ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /don med mchog gi tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de
las rgya gram byin brlabs te/ /pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /rgya gram tshon gyis khengs pa dang / /so so'i snying
pos ming yang dgug /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /rdo rje la la rnams haM bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar
gnas| |phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/ /brtan pa haM gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi
rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas
dang mngon sum ni/ /dgyes pa gar gyi gsung snyan cing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/ /
phyogs bcu 'gro dang dbrog pa dang / /cho bstang ba dang las rnams dang / /mngon sum ci 'dod smra ba'i mchog /rigs kyi yum dang rtsen par 'gyur/ /srid pa
las 'phags mya ngan 'das/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod pas rnam par smin pa'i tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan nyid du
mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /a ho/ /bsam bya bsam par zin
pa yi| |bsam pas mi zin bsam mi khyab/ /bsam yas lhun gnas mi g.yo dpag med bsam mi khyab/ /rgyu dang 'brel pa'i rkyen du shes pa'i dbyings nyid zad mi shes//
ngo mtshar srid la mtha' bral dmigs med pa/ /de nyid yon tan mchog gi 'khor lo lam mchog yin/ a ho/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
dpal kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom
ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba cho ga dang bcas pa 'di sku dang
gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dbab pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /kha dog grangs bcas ma brlabs pas/ /shes pa blo che khong yangs la/ /zab par spyod
la mi skyo bar/ /zas srung gos rjes dam zas sbyin/ /dung chen snod du chu yis bsing / /rten du rung bar ting 'dzin dang / /dbang dang sgrub pa mchog kyang bstan/ /mi smra gsang
ba'i dam tshig dbog /oM dang muM gyi blo bstan nas/ /gsang bas mtshan ma lnga nas sbyang / /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ /phung bo khams dang skye mched sbyar/ /longs

spyod lnga ldan mchod sbyin bya/ /rdo rje ngag lam gsung chen bzlas/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta dzI na oM/ /oM badzra ku la hUM badzra ku la hUM badzra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta swAM rat+ta swAM/ oM pad+ma ta thA hr-i da ya/
A ro l-ig /hA pra dz+nyA hAM/ d+hA twA shwa ri mUM/ dwe Sha ra ti lAM/ mo ha ra ti AM/ rA ga ra ti pAM/ badzra ra ti tAM/ mUM mUM mUM/ lAM lAM lAM/ AMHAMHAMHpAM pAM pAM/ tAM tAM tAM/ e baM ma ya/
ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ s+t+wa ho zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par dam tshig
thams cad kyi mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma
chen mo dang / spyan chen mo dang / mA ma kI chen mo dang / gos dkar mo chen mo dang / dam tshig 'phags ma sgrol ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid du kun tu snang
bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos sgyu 'phrul chen po'i byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig la snyoms par
par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /sgeg mo mchod pa byin bsdu ba/ /gzugs
ston dbab par bya ba ni/ /rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs ya nyid sbyin/ /de nyid
pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /ya yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de nyid hUM gi lha rnams dang / /bdag med mtha' bral mi
dmigs las/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje tsan ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs
yin| |spubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /rdo rje tshon gyis khengs pa dang / /so so'i snying bo ming yang 'bod/ /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /ming yang snying po bcas pa dgug
rdo rje lha rnams hUM du bsgom/ /snod gnas sgeg mo khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang mthun pa nyid du
bsam/ /brtan pa ha yi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba
nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum du/ /sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang mthun pa
nyid du bsgom/ /rin chen phreng ba'i byin bsdu ba/ /gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/ /rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin
brlabs e nyid sbyin/ /de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /de nyid goms nas gsang mtshan pa/ /e yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de nyid swAM gyi lha rnams te/ /bdag med mtha'
bral mi dmigs las/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/ /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de nas rdo rje
byin brlabs te/ /pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /rin chen tshon gyis khengs pa dang / /so so'i snying pos ming yang dgug /de goms blo bde
gsal spro thim/ /rin chen lha rnams swAM du bsgom/ /snod gnas phrang ba khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang
mthun pa nyid du bsam/ /brtan pa swAM gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /sangs rgyas rin chen sprin tshogs bsgom//
phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing / /rjes su chags pa'i
phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/ /pad+ma'i dbyings kyi byin bsdu ba/ /gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/ /rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug
kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs baM du brtags/ /de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /baM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de nyid
aM gyi lha rnams te/ /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de
las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /pad+ma'i tshogs kyis khengs pa dang / /so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug /de goms blo bde
gsal spro thim/ /pad+ma'i lha rnams a du bsgom/ /snod gnas dbyangs ma khengs 'gyur bar/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang mthun pa

nyid du bsgom/ /brtan pa haM gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/
'phro 'du rigs dang mthun bar ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni/ /sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/ /gar mkhan
las kyi byin bsdu ba/ /gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/ /ris dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs ma nyid sbyin/ /de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor
bsgom/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /ma yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de nyid haM gyi lha rnams te/ /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /
sangs rgyas las rnams tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs
su zhugs la de lus dgang / /las kyi tshogs kyis khengs pa dang / /so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /las kyi lha rnams haM du bsgom/ /snod gnas
gar mkhan khengs 'gyur bar/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/ /brtan pa haM gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes
byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /sangs rgyas las kyi sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/ /bsgoms
nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni/ /sgom bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /lha
rnams mngon du snang ba dang / /sgo ba sgom mang po dang / /dus bzhi'i lha mo mchog dbab dang / /lha dang klu yi tshogs bcas las/ /mngon du smra bar bya bar mthun/ /rgyal srid dang ni 'khor
'phrog dang / /bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang / /gsad dang bskrad pa'i tshogs bcas dang / /bdag 'gro myur du phyin pa dang / /nor 'dod pa dang ci bya ba/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /

dus med par ni mchod dang phrad/ /ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad byin bsdu ba'i mchod pa chen por gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ byin bsdu ba dang dam tshig
dbab pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas dgyes pa chen pos longs spyod chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dam tshig mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rnams kyis/ /
nges par bsgom par bya ba ni/ /rgyal po'i sa 'dzin mchog 'dod pas/ /gzugs su bri'am rten bcas la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom/ /de goms
gsang gnas khong bsdus te/ /rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin/ /spyi gtsug kha ngang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs baM du rtags/ /de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dzaHzhes rgya
bcings drang bya zhing / /goms par gsang nas zhugs tshul du/ /laM nas dag gi mchog du bsdu/ /oM las sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ /snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom/ /ming dang snying po goms
pas dgug /mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na/ /lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi/ /rjes su chags pa'i mchod par bsham/ /yid la goms pa gsal ba na/ /gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur/ /blon
po'i sa 'dzin mchod par bsham/ /yid la goms pa gsal ba na/ /gang la bya ba kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom/ /de goms gsang
nas khong bsdus te/ /rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs baM du brtags/ /de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dzaHzhes
rgya bcings drang bya zhing / /goms par gsang gnas zhugs tshul du/ /laM na ngag gi mchog tu bsdu/ /aMHnas sangs rgyas tsin ka/ /snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom/ /ming dang
snying po goms pas dgug /mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na/ /lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi/ /rjes su chags pa'i mchod par bsham/ /de la las su stsal ba na/ /gang la bya ba dbang du
gyur| |lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /yud tsam rtag par 'dod sgrub rnams/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /dbang phyug lha chen lha dbang po/ /rgyal chen phyogs skyong mang po la/ /
chung ma bu mo la sogs mtshan/ /'dod spyod dbang bar blo 'chang rnams/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /de yi dgos pa thams cad pa/ /ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /
ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad rab tu g.yos/ kun tu gsal bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod chen po kun tu snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ sgyu 'phrul chen po dam tshig gi mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
bzhi pa'o// //de nas thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid du snang bar gyur to/ /gdug pa'i
las klu'i tshogs 'dul bar gyur nas sgrub pa chen po la mos pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /klu'i tshogs rigs gnyis pa dang / rigs gsum pa dang / rigs tha dad pa dang / phyogs
gnyis pa las 'khor du byas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs pa'i gnas su nyid kyi bsnyen pa che chung la ma gtogs pa yid la dga' ba ci byas kyang mi 'grub cing bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir
gegs bsal ba lnga pa zhes bya ba 'di thon par gyur pa 'di ched du gsungs so/ /sgrub la 'dug pa mi gnas dang / /sa gzhi bdag tu dbang ba dang / /bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ci yod pa/ /gdug pa'i
sbrul rnams gsal ba dang / /'khor du gtogs pa mang nyung la/ /gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing / /ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la/ /gdug pas gnas par mi 'gyur phyir/ /lnga pa zhes
ni rab tu bsngags/ /bdag gis gdug par mchod pa'i phyir/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin las/ /bdag nyid gdug pa'i mthing nag mdog /lag na zhags pa ut+pal 'dzin/ /mgo la
gdengs ka sbrul chen bcu/ /nyi shu brgya'am stong dang khri/ /bsam yas dag gi sbrul chen po/ /kha dog nag po lce gsum 'bar/ /gdug pa klu yi tshogs mang bas//
'khor mang 'jigs brjod skyi bung bas/ /mchog tu phyag rgya 'di bca' bya/ /mi bskyod rin chen yig 'bru rnams/ /phral te go ran byas pa na/ /gdug pa sbrul gyis 'og tu gding / /nA ga
shug la nA ga phaT ces brjod/ /'di la goms par gang brtson pas/ /nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung na/ /me lce'i tshogs la phung po bzhin/ /rgyal po chen po'i rgyal chen por/ /kun la
snang bar gsal gyur nas/ /rang dbang med par 'bros pa dang / /de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /sa la bdag tu bya ba ni/ /thog mar sa gzhi rab mnyam ste/ /oM dang muM gyi tshogs
kyis dgang / /rin chen pho brang dkyil 'khor las/ /'jug pa'i lha tshogs dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de la gshog pa rab brkyang ste/ /rdo rje thal mo drag tu brdab/ /oM badzra kro d+ha du na mu ne
du nA gats+tsha/ /de nas yig 'bru shin tu bshig /de nas yig 'bru tha ma bsgreng / /de nas yig 'bru 'phrul skyed pa/ /nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung ste/ /sa gzhi mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/
de la shin tu sdangs gyur te/ /phyogs bcu kun du 'phros par 'gyur/ /de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /'khor du gtogs pa nga yi 'khor/ /'khor mang ji snyed mchog byed pa
gdug pa mang pos gnod bsgrub phyir/ /rdzas la mes ni rab sbar nas/ /nga yi snying pos brjod nas 'byung / /de la yig 'bru drug brjod na/ /de la gnod par mi nus shing / /gdug pas mchod
cing bkur bar 'gyur/ /de yi nad rnams sos par 'gyur/ /mngon sum snang ba'i gzugs brnyan dang / /mchog dang tha ma 'bring rnams la/ /gdug pa'i tshogs kyis zhen pa ni/ /snying gar aM
gyi 'bru rnams te/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar ba'i nang / /gzugs su snang ba kun bzhun te/ /thub pa'i ngang tshul de bsgoms nas/ /rin chen yig 'bru yi ge bsam/ /de las rab tu 'jigs par brkyang / /

yi ge dang po tha ma mig /aM gyi tshogs su 'bar ba gzhan/ /mi bskyod nyid mas be con 'chang / /thod pa'i dbyig bar chad nas ni/ /lce la sngags 'di dran pa yis/ /rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur zhing / /
gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'gyur te/ /phyogs bcu kun tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /de la mchod dang bran du 'gyur/ /oM mu ne pad+ma sa ma yo gi hUM hUM dza dza/ /'di la goms par gang brtson pas/ /
nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung nas/ /bkur gnas mchod par byed pa dang / /sgrub pa thams cad myur par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis
klu'i tshogs kyi gdug pa'i las 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos 'byung po'i tshogs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'di'i ched
du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ /tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /nga nyid sdug pa'i gnas bshams te/ /lo dang zla ba gsum
dang lngar/ /rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang / /rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la/ /sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen/ /rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin/ /rtags dang mngon du gyur bar
ro| |sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas/ /khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal/ /rang gi rang bzhin de bsgyur nas/ /spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig 'bar/ /brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing steng
bsgom/ |shig shig drag tu gyur pa na/ /de yi snying po bzlas nas ni/ /de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /de ltar 'grub pa'i rtags rnams ni/ /gang la dmigs pa'i mdun dag tu/ /bzhin
bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni/ /lce la drag tu phaT ces brjod/ /brgyal 'gyur aM nas dmar rtsi dbab/ /de las hUM zhes bya ba yin/ /dang po'i gnas su 'dus pa na/ /mchongs par 'dod na
langs par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ /tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te/ /lo dang zla ba gsum lnga bdun/ /de yi dung chen gang ba
dang / /rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la/ /sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen/ /rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin/ /rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas/ /
khro bo chen po gshin rje rgyal/ /gshin rje khros pa'i rgyal mor sbyor/ /rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas/ /spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par/ /brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing steng bsgom/ /
shig shig drag tu gyur pa na/ /de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang / /oM zhes pas ni rked par bcad/ /des na dbang du gyur bar bsgom/ /sa las gser dang chu las sa/ /yid dang 'thad pa nyid du ni/ /ji bzhin
ji bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ /de las 'dod pa bzhin du nges/ /de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni/ /ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na/ /dbu gsigs sdang mig drag
pos blta/ /oM gyi rtse mor phaT ces brjod/ /brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab/ /dag las aM zhes bya bas ni/ /bzlas brjod bcas de bdag nyid bstim/ /de nas 'dod pa bzhin du nges/ /de
bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni/ /ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum la/ /bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni/ /oM las drag tu phaT ces pas/ /brgyal 'gyur aM

las dmar rtsi dbab/ /de las hUM zhes bya ba yin/ /dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na/ /'tsho bar 'dod na langs par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa/ /byang chub mchog gi kun ngo bo/ /phyag rgya
bzhugs yul la sogs pa/ /gcig pu cha yi ting nge 'dzin/ /rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang / /rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la/ /sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen/ /rdzas la tshon gyis mdog
bsgyur bzhin/ /rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas/ /khro bo chen po rta mchog dpal/ /rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas/ /spyan
bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par/ /brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing steng bsgom/ /shig shig drag tu gyur pa na/ /de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang / /oM zhes bya ba'i rked par bcad/ /des ni dbang
du gyur par bsgom/ /sa las gser dang chu las sa/ /yid dang 'thad pa ji lta ba/ /ji bzhin ji bzhin grub par nges/ /de las 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /
de yi grub pa'i rtags rnams ni/ /ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na/ /dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos lta/ /aM las drag tu phaT ces pas/ /brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab/ /de las
hUM zhes bya ba yid/ /dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa ni/ /mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po de nyid las/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams pa/ /khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /
bdag nyid rang bzhin der bsgyur nas/ /spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig bar/ /brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing steng bsgom/ /shig shig drag tu gyur pa las/ /mgyogs par phyogs su song ba na/ /de
yi snying po mchog bzlas nas/ /hUM zhes pas ni bskul ba yis/ /dang po'i gnas su phyin par byed/ /des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom/ /de las sna tshogs ci 'dod par/ /thams cad thams cad grub
par 'gyur/ /de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /oM la drag tu phaT ces pas/ /gang la bya ba mngon bsams nas/ /se gol snol mar gtogs pa yis/ /brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar
rtsi dbab/ /yid la bsgoms pas langs par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po rab tu rgyal bar byed pa dam tshig bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi
bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong bar
gyur pa sde dpon dang chung mar bcas/ bran dang g.yog dang yang g.yog gi rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis gus par dam bcas shing / rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po
zhes bya ba 'di mgrin gcig tu yang smras so/ /dregs pa 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor dang / /lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni/ /'khor g.yog bye ba drug cu rnams/ /keng rus gsar rnying gnas

su gyur| |rlon pa sha khrag tshogs la spyod/ /thod par 'thung za med pa'i nang / /mdung thung ral gri dag sta dang / /zhags pa dbyig pa zor ba dang / /rnga dang lnga ldi khug 'thor zhing / /gdug pa'i tshogs
rnams kun gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la/ /ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis/ /zhabs kyi mthil bu 'di bsgoms te/ /rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/ /de bran bzhin du bdag
cag bgyid/ /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs bar bdag cag sgrub/ /'dug nas snying po 'di bzhin dbul/ /oM khaM d+hu ha swAhA/ dbang phyug lha chen dkyil
'khor dang / /lus dang ngag nyid dbul ba ni/ /'khor g.yog bye ba brgyad cu stong / /me tog sil ma bkram pa dang / /ras stan 'phar ma mang po dang / /rin chen btsal dang brdung ba dang / /rol mo
glu gar rab tu snyan/ /rin chen khang pa'i gnas su ni/ /lha mo mang por bdag spyod cing / /rin chen snod du bdag cag 'thung / /gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs/ /gzugs mdzes pas ni
gda' bar bgyid/ /rin chen me tog la sogs dang / /lha yi me tog phyogs su 'thor/ /lha yi tshogs mang kun gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la/ /ming tsam 'dzin
par byed pa yis/ /zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bris te/ /rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/ /de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/ /gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang / /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung //
ma lus rdzogs pa bdag cag sgrub/ /de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid/ /oM sarba de bA mA hA u pa ha/ /rgyal po rnam thos yul 'khor srung / /'khor tshogs stong phrag mang po yi/ /
lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni/ /'khor g.yog stong phrag bye ba brgya/ /me tog bsil ma bkram pa dang / /rgyan mang byug pa bcal bkram pa/ /sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams/ /
ci legs par ni rab tu smra/ /rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus/ /mchod par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i/ /bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags/ /rin chen bcal dang mthun pa dang //
rol mo glu gar snyan pas brgyan/ /rin chen khang bar bdag mchis shing / /bzhon pa dmag mang 'khor bar mchis/ /rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba/ /gdugs kyis brgyan par
steng nas g.yogs/ /gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid/ /rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thor/ /rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor/ /dri za med pa'i bdag po dang / /
dbang ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams/ /'di bzhin gus par bdag cag bgyid/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la/ /ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis/ /rang gi snying po 'di
brjod na/ /de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/ /gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang / /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub/ /de la gzugs
ston gda' bar bgyid/ /oM sid+d+ha d+hi d+hi d+hu ho swAhA/ rgyal po mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/ /'khor tshogs khri phrag mang po yis/ /lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni/ /'khor
tshogs khri phrag bye ba brgya/ /me tog sil ma bkram pa dang / /rgyan mang byug pa bcal bkram pa/ /sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams/ /ci legs par ni rab tu smra/ /rim pa chen po srid
zhu gus/ /mchod par byed cing lugs mchis par/ /bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags/ /rin chen bcal dang btung ba dang / /rol mo glu gar snyan
pas brgyan/ /rin chen khang bar bdag mchis shing / /bzhon pa dam pa mang 'khor bar mchis/ /rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba/ /gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs/ /gzugs
mdzes pa ni gda' bar bgyid/ /rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thor/ /rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams dang / /chu bdag gshin rje'i
'khor mang rnams/ /de bzhin gus pas bdag cag bgyid/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/ /ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis/ /zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang / /rang gi
snying po 'di brjod na/ /de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/ /gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang / /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bgyid/ /de la gzugs
ston gda' bar bgyid/ /oM d+ha ka b+hi du b+ha bi shu pA she oM hUM/ zhes mgrin gcig tu smras pas srid pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dis 'dul bar gyur nas bcom ldan
'das dgyes pa chen pos sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di byung ngo / /a ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas snying po bsam
yas bar/ /'bru gtor bsdu ba las ni 'das bzhin bsnyags dka' ba'i/ /ma nor las chen gcig gis rab tu 'dul 'gyur zhing / /de yi bsngags pa'i bka' las 'da' bar ngas mi
nus| |thugs kyi thugs rjes ji srid ma nor lam nyid la/ /gsang ba'i snying po nges ba sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid pa/ /nga nyid 'dod 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /de nyid thugs las
sprul pa'i thugs nyid do/ /ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /shin tu 'dul bar gyur pa gnas dang snying po dbul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa
bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs
pa 'jig rten pa'i tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen por gyur te ched du bstod pa'i glu 'di mgrin gcig tu smras so/ /e ma'o ya mtshan
'phrul chen gyi/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rang bzhin dpal/ /dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med pa/ /dag pa'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor thugs/ /kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i sku/ /ye shes lnga yi khro
rgyal gtso/ /khrag 'thung 'jigs byed he ru ka/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas 'gro ba rgya mtsho 'dul/ /thugs rje bsam yas khro rgyal kun gyi gtso/ /khrag 'thung kun las ches 'phags yid bzhi
mdzod/ /ser nag mthing nag ljang nag dmar nag dang / /sngo nag ri rab lta bur brjid pa'i sku/ /bskal bar bcas pa'i me ri'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /
ro tshogs mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rngam pa'i/ /bsod nams lus bsdus rdo rje mi bzad pa'i/ /skar tshogs mang la nyi zla'i 'od bzhin du/ /che btsan dregs pas 'jigs
pa'i tshogs kun 'joms/ /mtshungs med cho 'phrul khyad par rab ston cing / /'dod pa'i dbang phyug gar gyi tshul du bzhugs/ /za byed skam pas thugs sku gsung gi zhal/ /khrag
mtsho mtha' med skem shing sgal tshigs 'joms/ /khro gnyer snying 'dren 'jigs byed glog ltar 'gyur/ /ngur khrod 'bum gyi dbu smug 'jigs par brjid/ /'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jig mdzad
thod rlon phreng bas sge/ /rol phyir rtse mor snang bas a a ha las bzhad/ /rang nyid che bas dbang rdzogs rgyal bas dbu la brgyan/ /smin ris khro gnyer glog bzhin rab 'gyur sa/ /
phyogs dang mthun pa'i khrag 'thung 'gyed cing sdud/ /sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa/ /'jigs pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang / /sdang mig spyan ni nyi zla rgyas 'bar
bas| |'jigs pa'i tshogs phung sdug bsngal gtan nas sbyong / /khros pas zhal gdangs so chen gtsigs 'bar bas/ /srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal khams snyegs pa ltar/ /'jig rten
dus gcig mid mdzad lam drug gtan nas gcod/ /ye shes phyag bsnams phyag mtshan 'bar ba yis/ /srid gsum ma lus rdul phran stongs par mdzad/ /rkan sgras rol bas 'gro la pheg brdabs
bzhin/ /khams gsum kun la chos ston rgyas par mdzad/ /zas su khrag 'thung rdo rje che mchog gsol/ /'jigs tshogs bsad pa'i ko rlon g.yang gzhi bsnams/ /klu 'dul yon tan sbrul nag
stong gis klubs/ /'jigs bcas klu yi tshogs kyang zhabs 'og mnan/ /'dod chags 'dul ba 'dod chags kun gyi gtso/ /'dod chags chen po 'dod chags nyid kyi sku/ /mang po'i 'khor
bcas 'jigs pa'i 'khor du byas/ /zhe sdang 'dul ba zhe sdang kun gyi gtso/ /zhe sdang gdug pa zhe sdang kun gyi sku/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams zer gyis kun bzhu ba'i/ /rab tu brjid pa
'jigs pas 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /gti mug 'dul ba gti mug kun gyi gtso/ /gti mug blo sel gti mug chen po'i sku/ /mched lcam khrag 'thung sran chen ri rab brtan/ /nga
rgyal 'dul ba nga rgyal kun gyi gtso/ /'jigs tshogs bsad nas ro tshogs mang gi gnas/ /zhabs bgrad mche gtsigs cho ga pa'i dus mtha' med/ /'jigs pas phebs par dga'
zhing shin tu sdang / /phrag dog 'dul phrag dog kun gyi gtso/ /phrag dog che mchog phrag dog chen po'i sku/ /bud med kun bsdus dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing / /lam nor gdug par
bcas pa phaT kyis gsod/ /zhing gi sham thabs gdug pa 'dul bar bsnams/ /sku 'dra 'jigs tshogs gzugs kyis sku la brgyan/ /zhabs dang phyag tu gyur
pa bsam thag chad/ /zhabs chen g.yon mang brkyang pas lha gnon bdud la khyab/ /zhabs g.yas thabs chen mang pos dbang sdud 'dor zhing bskum/ /rdo rje se gol 'phyar brdabs
gnyis cher rab sel mdzad/ /'od chen dbus nas glog chen rab 'gyur ba'i/ /'jigs par gong na med pa'i dpa' bo khyod/ /zas ngan bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sman chen bdag /'jigs byed
khyod lta bu ni rab tu dkon/ /bskal par bkrus kyang slar skye dri ma la/ /ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi byin rlabs dang / /thugs rje dag pa'i char gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ /brda tsam yud la rmongs 'khrugs
las spyod zhing / /shi ba'i lam 'gog shes rab dkyil 'khor du/ /skye ba gtan nas sbyong ba'i thugs rje 'char/ /byams sdang mi mnga' bka' drin chen po'i gter/ /khrag 'thung sku gsung
thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /bka' drin dran pa'i glu zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba'i ched du 'byung po rnams kyi jo mo'i yang jo mo/ /
mi srin mo chen mo mi srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu ma dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang /
srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos dang / gcig pu spyod dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / klu mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / mi mo dang / phag mo dang /
rgan byad mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo dang / rgyal mo dang /
blon mo dang / sde dpon mo dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog dang / bran dang yang bran la sogs pa slas dang / byi mo dang / bran mo rnams la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po
nges pa 'di/ /gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po yin/ /thabs chen mtshon pa'i shes rab ni/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i snying po dang / /gsang ba rgyud ni mang po rnams/ /nga yi thugs las sprul pa
yin| |tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa/ /sde dpon 'phrog ma'i yul rnams dang / lus 'phags pa lang spyod pa dang / /sgra mi snyan dang 'dzam gling
du| |nga yi thugs kyi snying po 'di/ /phyogs bcu kun tu spel ba dang / /de yi gzugs la gtad pa ni/ /yid bzhin mdzod 'byor bka' yi gnas/ /phyi nang theg pa bstan bcos dang /
stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ /spyod dang sgom dang 'das pa dang / /sdom pa kun la mkhas pa yis/ /sgom pa sran dang chos phyogs dang / /bstan
pa 'dzin par nus pa yis/ /gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gtad/ /gzhan la bsnyad par ma yin no/ /mi 'khrug blo zab rkyen thub cing / /yid bzhin sbyor bar mos pa la/ /
rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bstan/ /zla dang bcas pas dam tshig che/ /sbyor ba gnyis ka mkhas pa dang / /lung dang tshad du ldan thub dang / /gzhan la bsnyad par mi byed
cing / /bstan pa mchod par byed pa'o/ /nye ba bsnyen pa dam tshig la/ /sgrub pa bsnyen pa nye bsnyen pa/ /ci nus par ni shin tu brtson/ /sems can ngang tshul kun bor nas/ /gang
gi yid kyang mi 'khrugs shing / /mchod pa tshogs la stobs la rub/ /bud med 'gugs pas gtso la dbul/ /zung thub gsang la mkhas pa yis/ /nges pa can la shin tu gtad/ /
gzhan du bstan par mi bya'o/ /thogs med phyal bar 'dod pa spyod/ /bud med yon tan kun yod cing / /'dod chags kun dang mthun spyod la/ /rtsa ba dang du blang pa dang / /'tshal bar bya yi
sku bstan te/ /nye bsnyen gsang ba'i man ngag rnams/ /nam yang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de la sbyor stangs de bstan nas/ /gzhan ni bstan par ma gsungs so/ /dad ldan srun cing blo rno ba/ dad pa

che zhing chos la gus/ /chags par ran pa bka' nyan cing / /gnas la dga' zhing lus nyan pa/ /rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig sgrub/ /mchod pa'i gnas shom sgom pa srung / /bsnyen pa la ni byin phab nas/ /gsang sngags
tshogs kyi mchod gnas su/ /nga yi gsang ba byin phab ste/ /thogs pa med par mngon sum la/ /sbyor ba'i thabs ldan mnyam sbyor ga /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /bdag nyid mnyes pa'i mnyam

sbyor zhing / /mnyam pa'i grub pas tshogs la mchod/ /dam tshig mi ldan spyod rtsing dang / /gting nas bstan pa mi 'dzin la/ /'dod chags spel bar mi byed cing / /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na/ /nges pa'i

don ni mi ston la/ /nga yi dbang dang bslab pa rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du rab tu sbyin/ /rigs ngan pho mo 'dod spyod ni/ /spro thung 'dod chags rab tu che/ /blo zhan phrag dog sgro skur can/ /gnyid che chang dang
brtson 'grus chung / /slob la mi gus nan tan med/ /slob dpon mi dran spun sems chung / /gal te dam la gnas na yang / /nga yi gsang ba 'dzin pa la/ /mngon du dga' bar mi nus te/ /lta zhan
bka' las 'das pa dang / /grol bar dka' zhing nus mthu zhan/ /mun dang lkog dang skye bo la/ /gar dpen phrad par 'dod spyod cing / /'dod chags 'ga' lam de dag la/ /tshig rnams gsang ba smra byed
pa/ /dngos po don dang mthun pa las/ /gsang ba'i snying po sbyin mi bya/ /bskal pa'i 'jig rten bar du yang / /thugs kyi bde ba mi spro zhing / /nam yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /'jig rten 'dod pa dga'
rnams phyir/ /gal te rmongs pas byin pa ni/ /rims dang nad kyis srog bcad de/ /rtsa ba yan lag spangs pa yin/ /bsregs dang sbrengs par yun ring gnas/ /zhes
brjod pas srid pa mtha' dag gi bud med kyi tshogs rnams dam tshig 'dis 'dul bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las
rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /e e ma/ e ma'o chos rnams sgyu ma yi/ /ngang nyid bud med gsang bsngags pa yi/ /lnga drug dus btab snang srid 'byung ba'i gter/ /yang dag lam rnyed
mngon par kun gnas kun tu gnas/ /chos mang chos nyid mnyam pa'i phyag rgya ji snyed las/ /las ngan dge ba'i cho 'phrul lam chen 'di/ /kun gyi khyad par nyid ni bud med bde ba gcig
pu yin/ /chos kun de nyid yin phyir dman pas mi smrad 'tsham par bstan/ /sgyu ma 'byor pa nyid ni bde bar gshegs nyid yin rab tu gsal/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i
snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ dam tshig chen pos bud med btul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa
'di brjod do/ /de la mchod sbyin chen po ni/ /thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral/ /de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/ /blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje/ /gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya/ /
'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya/ /mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul/ /bza' dang bca' dang btung dang
bgo/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi/ /bder gshegs yon tan rmad po che/ /gzhan na yod pa ma yin na/ /
lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/ /rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya chen po rdzogs gyur cing / /gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur/ /
zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po ched du brjod do/ /bla med theg par nges gyur pas/ /nyon mongs las rnams kun spyod kyang / /byas la mi
sogs tshogs gyur te/ /tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs/ /bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu/ /'dul ba'i dbang du tshul khrims dang / /ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa/ /ma lus kun 'dus
