rnam par dag /yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing / /sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul/ /srog med srog gcad gcad du med/ /srog dang skyes bu log rtog tsam/ /bden pa gnyis kar dbyer med
pas| |'phrul dga'i tshul de tha dad min/ /gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir/ /blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang / /
ming dang tshig tu btags pa rdzun/ /rdzun nyid la ni rdzun spyod pa/ /rdzun spyod btags tsam yod ma yin/ /ma chags pa la chags pa dang / /chags pa nyid na chags pa med/ /de ni tshangs
mchog rgyal po ste/ /shin tu chags pa chen po yin/ /bla med mi spang bla ma bkur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /yang dag lam du zhugs la byams/ /gsang ba'i
don phyir smra mi bya/ /'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te/ /bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog /gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo / /dkar rtsi dmar
rtsi dri sha chen/ /dag pa'i snod du mi dor ro/ /yan lag bcu yi dam tshig mchog /ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad/ /bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga/ /rtsa ba yin te rigs
med 'gyur/ /mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni/ /yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o/ /mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba ni/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po
thob par 'gyur/ /'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dag /gso la nye bar mi brtson dang / skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed/ /nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod
mi lang | |rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /sgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur/ /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i/ /'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na//
'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung / /dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni/ /gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum/ /
yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la/ /gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su dbye/ /dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa'i/ /rtog 'dul
dam tshig de snyed spro/ /gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/ /sgrub med dam pa ma lus 'grub/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /rgyal ba'i
rigs mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur/ /dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis/ /sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlobs/ /bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la
zhugs| |'jigs med kun tu bzang por spyor/ /ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs/ /ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa/ /ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis 'grub/ /nyams na bskangs pas
rdzogs pa dang / /de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog /ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho
na nyid nges pa las/ /dam tshig gi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra
ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig sum brgya pa'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas sngags 'chang rnams kyis don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /phyogs
bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ /log rtog mi bzad rdul phran snyed/ /rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab/ /'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang / /rdo rje theg mchog mang po
kun| |nyid las g.yog shing spros med kyang / /rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis/ /lta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab/ /de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan/ /yang dag nyid
dang log rtog gnyis/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur nas/ /de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/ /ye nas ngo bo nyid med na/ /nyon mongs spangs shing don bsgrub med/ /thams cad ma
lus ro gcig 'gyur/ /kun rdzob chu zla ltar yin pas/ /cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub/ /rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis/ /don dam skye 'gag med pa ste/ /kun rdzob
sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/ /ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /dam tshig sum brgya drug cu pa'i rtsa ba bco lnga pa mdor spyad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis
pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rdo rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /nam
mkha'i mkha' dkyil dang ba yi/ /yid bzhin sprin tshogs rnam par 'byung / /sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'od 'phro 'bar/ /raM/ srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te/ /yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar//
haM| dbang po dang pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni/ /lhan ne lhang nger 'od du zhi/ /a/ zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar/ /thugs rje byin rlabs rmad
po che| |hUM/ 'gro ba sna tshogs don byed pa/ /'di ni byang chub mchog tu gsungs/ /ho/ /bzhi po 'joms shing ngan song sbyong / /trAMta/ sman bcud len gyis dug sbyong bzhin/ /phyi dang nang
gi dri ma dag/ /bdag med gnyis kyis dag par byed/ /hri/ bsal zhing gzhag par bya ba med/ /nyi ma shar ba'i 'od bzhin du/ /snang dang mi snang gnyi ga med/ /de bzhin mnyam gnyis ye
shes kyis/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor/ /oM/ /rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis/ /phyogs bcu khams rnams dbang bsdus chos/ /thams cad mi dmigs dbyings su thim/ /thams
cad khro bo'i tshogs su 'gyur/ /rtog pa rnam bzhi mi dmigs dbyings gyur pa/ /shes rab yum gyi mtshan nyid dbyings su thim/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dbyings gyur pas/ /
chos rnams thams cad dbyings kyi khro bo khro mor 'gyur/ /a ho/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ chos thams
cad khro bo dang khro mo'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi me sbyong ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams
cad kyi rgyal po'i 'bar ba'i thugs rjes gtum 'khrugs ging tshogs chen por bsgyur nas thams cad 'od dpung 'phro zhing 'bar bar bstan pa ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra
ba bstan pa yis/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par/ /bruM dang tsakra'i 'khor lor sbrul/ /'od 'phro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen hUM/ /gtum chen dus mtha' me ltar 'bar/ /raM/
nyi ma'i thod sbrul mang po'i gzi/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/ /rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/ /phaT/ khros pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar/ /khros pa'i me dpung rdo rjer 'bar/ /
rdo rje 'khor lo brtsegs par 'bar/ /tsakra /khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya mdzes/ /ha he/ slas dang bran mo byi mo'i tshogs/ /rang gi stan dang mal cha dang //
ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas/ /sti ra rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang / nri yi tsi ta za zhing rgyug /shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs su gnas/ /ral pa mun dza cod pan 'bar/ /phyogs bcur khebs
pa'i gshog pa gdengs/ /rdo rje gtams pa'i brag ri 'bar/ /raM/ so so'i rig sngags skad gdangs dang / /skad dang nga ro drag tu 'don/ /hUM he he phaT b+h+yo ru lu/ /khro bo chen po tshogs pa yi/ /dkyil
'khor chen po'i zhal 'bar ba/ /bdag nyid gnyis su med par bsgom/ /so so'i rang sngags bzlas nas su/ /rgyud drug sems can thams cad las/ /ma rungs gdug pa thams cad du/ /dzaHhUM baM hos bkug
nas ni| |lan gsum lan bdun zhal du bstim/ /lha rang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/ /hoH/ gzhan yang mchod pa'i zhal zas ni/ /'byor pa rnam pa kun gyis mchod/ /ni yi tshil dang tsha ba'i mar/ /dmar
gyi ar+g+haM rgyun du dbul/ /a hoH/ yang na lan gsum brgya rtsa brgyad/ /stong dma' bum du dbul bar bgyi/ /nag po'i tsher ma dug shing ngam/ /gzhan yang bsreg rdzas bdug gsum dang / /gnon pa'i
chog kun gyis bya/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ thugs rje rol pa'i dkyil 'khor spyir bstan pa'i hoMH/ /oM hUM traM hri u/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ hoMH thams cad ma lus par
'dir 'dus pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khros pa'i rgyal pos rgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las khro bo rngam pa'i tshogs su bsgoms nas ched du
brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /byang chub mchog gi snying po ni/ /mtshan mas btsal ba ma yin gyi/ /dag pa rnams gsum ma nor zhing / /rang rig rgyal po goms pa ris/ /byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur//
drag po gtum po sgrub pa ni/ /b+ha ga la ni ling+ga gzhag /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /khro bo'i zhal ni gang yang rung / /lan gsum lan bdun rtag bsgoms
shing / /mngon du byung ba'i zhal 'bar te/ /bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ltar gyur nas/ /ling+ga yang nas yang bsdus te/ /dbyings kyi dkyil du bstim par bya/ /hUM gis bsdu zhing phaT kyis 'phangs/ /
zhal gyi rang sngags khri 'bum du/ /rnam gsum tshul gyis bzlas nas su/ /yang nas yang du gsol bar bya/ /'gro lnga sems can thams cad kun/ /dbang med zhal du thim par 'gyur/ /ya ma ya
yang lhag par mdzes/ /sku mdog dud kha la sogs dang / /mche gtsigs khro gnyer gtsigs pa dang / /zhal bgrad phyag rgya 'bar ba dang / /gang la sogs pa bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i
phyag rgya ste/ /mtshan ma bzung nas rang sngags don/ /mngon par dbang pos bltar yod par/ /ril bu bsdus nas dbyings su mchod/ /the tshom med par 'grub par nges/ /dam pa'i chos 'jig
ma rungs pa/ /dpa' bos dgongs pa yod pa'i phyir/ /kun la phan pa de gyis shig /hoHhUM dzA dang phaT dang spo la sogs/ /'dren pa'i mchog tu des gsungs so/ /mtshan ma ming du bsdus pa yang
ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin du/ /smon pa byang chub lam du gzhug /mtshan ma'i bag chags med par bya/ /dbyings nas spro zhing a la bstim/ /a ho thugs nyid la ni thugs brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul
dra ba las/ shin tu gsang ba'i khro bo nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po las thams cad rdo rjer bsdus nas ched du
brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgoms shing / /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan par gnas/ /thams cad hUM du bsdus nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar bar bsgom/ /me
dpung 'bar ba'i tshogs chen du/ /me lha ag+ne dzas bkug nas/ /raM zhes bya ba'i me sbar te/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/ /zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgom par bya/ /hUM/ gtum po'i tshogs chen
rab tu 'bar/ /dud ka nag po'i mdog 'dra la/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer mang por 'khrugs/ /nyi ma'i thod sprul mang pos brgyan/ /seng+ge glang chen stag rngam dang / /phyag rgya sna tshogs 'bar ba bsnams//
phaT dang hUM dang ha la sgra/ /skad drag phyogs bcur nam mkha' 'khrug /phaT/ khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /yul dang gnas kyi phyag rgyas mdzes/ /ha he/ slas dang byi mo bran mo dang / /

b+h+yo| |ci bgyi la sogs tshogs kyis bskor/ /so so'i stan dang lag cha dang / rngam pa'i nga ro rang sngags sgrog/ mi sdug gtum pa'i gzugs can dang / /shin tu khro bar bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid phaT kyis
ngang nyid du/ /gsal 'dris blo goms rtag tu bsgom/ /dzaHhUM baM hos bsdus nas su/ /rgyud drug sems can kun bsdus nas/ /khro bo'i tshogs la dbul bar bya/ /lha yang rung ste brlag par
'gyur| |yo byad gzhan ni spyi dang mthun/ /gzir ba'i thabs kyang gong ma bzhin/ /mchod ba'i grangs kyang spyi dang mthun/ /A/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi/ /
hUM| zhal gdangs spyan bgrad khro zhal bsgom/ /rdo rje gtan pa gdengs pa dang / /thod pa lcags kyu rnams kyis bskor/ /hUM sgra drag po'i tshogs kyis 'bar/ /'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas bkur nas
su| |zhal du bstims na lhag par 'grub/ /rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/ /'khor gyi tshogs kyis snga ma bzhin/ /bsad pa'i tshul du rbad stong bya/ /hUM/ gtum po dmar po mchu ring po/ /'bar ba rdo
rje phreng bas bskor/ /'od chen 'bar ba 'phro ba yis/ /'jig rten khams rnams dus gcig brdubs/ /hUM/ khro bo'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams dang / /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang //
slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /so so'i rang gnas rdzogs par 'don/ /ha he b+h+yo/ /gzhan yang bstod tshig 'di dag gis/ /hUM/ rdo rje thugs rje byin rlabs kyis/ /'jig rten khams ni kun
bkang ste/ /gtum 'khrugs ma lus thams cad kun/ /rdo rje mthu yis btul bar gyur/ /hUM/ rdo rje zhe sdang 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /skad cig yud la
brlag mdzad de/ /brlags par ma gyur gang yang med/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ drag po ho ma gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po
pad+ma sdud pa zhes bya bas 'gro ba mang po'i don gyi phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad ma lus dbyings su bsdus/ /dbyings nas ye shes 'od 'phro
'bar| |thams cad ma lus dbyings su sbyor/ /hrIHdkyil 'khor zla gam gdengs pa las/ /'od zer mang po rab 'bar dang / /rdo rje lcags sgrog bsdams pas bskor/ /gzhan yang rgyan gyi dam pa
mchog /kun gyis de la brgyan cing bskor/ /me lha spyan drangs snga ma bzhin/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/ /pad+ma rigs kyi khro bor bsgom/ /dmar smug drag po'i mdog dang ni/ /gzhan yang
sprul pa mang po yis/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bskor/ /rngam pa rang sngags drag tu sgrog /hrIHbdag nyid ma chags rdo rje ste/ /dkyil 'khor gong ma gsal bsgoms nas/ /phyogs
bcur 'gro ba thams cad dang / /gdug pa yid can ma lus kun/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHspo Tas bkug nas su/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya/ /dgongs pa grub cing ngan song sbyong / /hrIHgzhal
yas dkyil 'khor mang po'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i zhal 'dra la/ /tha ma pad+ma ljon shing dang / pad+ma rdo rje 'od 'bar bsgom/ /gzhan yang rgyan mchog mdzes pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor
kun la mdzes par brgyan/ /bdag nyid pad+ma'i lhar gyur pas/ /mchod pa lha rdzas sna tshogs dang / /zhal zas bza' btung mchog rnams dang / /dmar po'i shing dang dri zhim pa/ /lan grangs
gong du smos pa bzhin/ /rtag tu mchod pa byas na ni/ /'jig rten 'di dang 'das pa yi/ /ci 'dod las de 'grub par gyur/ /sngags ni yi ge raM dang hrIH/
mdog ni dmar smug 'od po che/ /phyogs bcu khyab cing hrI la bsdu/ /dgyes pa'i glu dang gar gyis mchod/ /hrIH/ rdo rje pad+ma 'bar ba yis/ /phyogs bcu mtha' klas rab 'byams kun/ /
dpal dang gzi byin tshe la sogs/ /pad+ma 'bar ba de bsdus nas/ /sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang / /gzhan yang longs spyod mchog la sogs/ /cing dod las rnams dbang du
'gyur| |lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/ /hrIH/ 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /skad cig yud la dpang du bsdus/ /dbang du ma gyur
gang yang med/ /hrIHsgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdus te dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i
rgyal po rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag nyid kyi dbyings nas phyung ste ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'bar/ /'od zer 'phro ba mang po
'khrug /bsod nams zhing gyur mchog tu 'bar/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha' gang bar bsgom/ /rdo rje rin po che yis bskor/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan mkha' dang mnyam/ /trAM/ ye shes
phyogs bzhi dbus 'od 'bar/ /dkyil 'khor zhags pa rin chen bskor/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs dang / /khro bo kun kyang dga' 'phro ste/ /'dod chen dkar po 'bar ba dang / /phyag rgya sna
tshogs cir yang sgyur/ /lha dang lha mo rnams kyis bskor/ /mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs dang / dkar la dri zhin shing rnams dang / /gzhan yang mchod yon thams cad kyis/ /dkyil
'khor la ni rgyas par dbul/ /bdag nyid rin chen rab 'bar nas/ /trAM/ dkar la yi ge 'od du 'bar/ /khro bo kun kyang de bzhin te/ /mngon du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /pA
sha ho dang dzaHhUM gis/ /phyogs bcu'i lam lnga kun bkug ste/ /dbyings su thim par 'od 'phro bsgom/ /thams cad sangs rgyas zhing dar mnyam/ /gzhan yang yod pa'ang ma yin te/ /
sgyu ma'i ye shes bstan pa yin/ /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas ni/ /rin chen dbyings la rdo rje 'bar/ /dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis 'khor bar bskor/ /gzhan yang lha dang lha mo
yis| |phyogs bcu khyab par mchod cing dbul/ /yon tan rgyal ba'i zhing dang mnyam/ /trAM/ glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus kun/ /mchod yon rin
chen dpal 'phel gyis/ /phyogs bcu gang bar rgyas phul nas/ /rdo rje dbyings kyis rgyas par rol/ /hoHtrAM/ nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams 'di rab 'byams
kun| |skad cig mud la rgyas mdzad de/ /rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /rgyal po rgyas mdzad kyi rgyas pa hom gyi le'u ste
lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad khro bo chen pos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen por bsgyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di
brjod do/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus mtha' med/ /bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/ /bder gshegs nyid la mi zhen shar/ /oM/
dkyil 'khor zlum por 'bar ba las/ /'khor lo 'bar bas rab bskor zhing / /'od ni ser por rab tu 'bar/ /rmad du byung ba'i sku la sogs/ /bdag nyid chen pos bsgom
par bya/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sa bon yi ge oM ser te/ /me lha spyan dang snga ma bzhin/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams/ /kun kyang gti
mug rdo rje ste/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba dang / /'khor lo phyag rgya 'bar ba dang / /lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis brgyan/ /gdan dang gnas dang dbyings nyid de/ /rgyal
ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu/ /phyogs bcu gnas pa de dag tu/ /tsakra lcags kyus bkug nas su/ /dkyil 'khor dbyings su bstims byas nas/ /gtum 'khrug gdug
pa ma rungs pa/ /lhan ne lhang nge zhi par 'gyur/ /oM|/gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas te/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'bar ba yi/ /oM dang seng+ge mgos bskor te/ /brgyan pa'i rdo rje phyag
rgya kun/ /rdzogs ldan zhi bas bskor bar bya/ /rgyal po lus mdzes 'khor lo 'bar/ /rgyan rnams zhi la dkar ba dang / /byang chub mchog 'bar lhan ner bsgom/ /mkha' la
rgyu dang bar snang 'phyo/ /gzhan yang 'gro drug ma lus kun/ /zhir 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /gar dang glu yis mchod byas te/ /phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa/ /gdug pa'i yid ni
rnam bor nas/ /lha dkar po yi 'od du 'gyur/ /bde ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'bar/ /gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /skad cig yud la zhi
mdzad de/ /zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ thams cad ma lus par zhi bar gyur nas zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /
e yi tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la/ /khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas
lnga 'am| |mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /bkug nas rdo rje phur bas btab/ /rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul/ /e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu
gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur g.yo/ /myos nas gal te tshig par 'gyur/ /baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba gzi brjid
lhun chen la/ /chags pa yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /rdo rje chags pa'i phur
bas gdab/ /chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul/ /baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams/ /'gugs 'gyur ci yang phyi bzhin 'brang / /
ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur/ /ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khro mchog /'bar ba 'du 'phro gzi chen la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /yon tan nam mkha'i
mtha' dang mnyam/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtags/ /nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab/ /rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar dbul/ /
ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams na/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro/ /yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur/ /ya yi tshogs kyi
dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /gtum chen rngam pa'ang lhan nger 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la/ /gtum
rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtags/ /lhan ner gsal ba'i phur bus gdab/ /'bar ba lhan ne'i tshogs la dbul/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas
bsdams/ /'bar ba lhan ner byin gyis brlab/ /thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /lhag ma'i mchong sbyin 'dod pa sbyin/ /gang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags
nas| |gang 'dod las de byed par bsgom/ /sngon che dpal chen he ru ka/ shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can/ /thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /dbang dang byin rlabs rmad po che/ /lha chen
la sogs dbang bsdus nas/ /'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas/ /so so'i las rnams bskos pa de/ /ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i/ /ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung / /
dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na/ /ji ltar rang gis mna' bor ba'i/ /sdom bcas de las 'da' ma byed/ /dam tshig de las 'das gyur na/ /mgo lus snying yang tshal ba bdun/ /yak+Sha khro bos
gtubs par 'gyur/ /de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis/ /ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos/ /las de mngon du ma byas na/ /rang gis mna' bor khas blangs bzhin/ /rul myags
tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro /rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i/ /las rnams yongs su bya ba dang / /'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs/ /phra men ma yang
dngos grub 'thob/ /bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /khro bo sgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo ni/ 'di yin no/ /khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig
chen pos ni/ /thams cad thams cad byed pa yin/ /mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed/ /'phel bar 'dod
na 'phel bar byed/ /sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /lhan ner 'dod na thim par byed/ /rmugs par 'dod na myos par byed/ /seng gdong
chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun tu za bar byed/ /rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/ /bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro
gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la za bar byed/ /kun la rab tu nyams par byed/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo yi/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /rbod cing gtong bar
byed pa ste/ /thams cad thams cad byed pa yin/ /ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal/ /sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu/ /dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang / /khros pas ka li rab
tu bya| |zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ lhun gyis grub pa'i
'phrin las byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las chos thams cad yid dang
chos su 'dus par bstan pa dang / shes rab thams cad ni/ yum bzhir 'dus/ yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus so/ /thabs thams cad ni/ rigs bzhir 'dus/ /rigs
bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus te/ thams cad dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes su 'dus par bstan nas tshig mgo mjug gi don bsdus nas yang 'di skad brjod de/ /don gyi rtsa ba'i
mchog yin no/ /thams cad ma lus mi lus mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid de/ /de bzhin dbyings nyid mang po sna tshogs thabs su snang / /thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yor chu zla
gzugs brnyan yin/ /de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang / /thabs dang shes rab ldan pas mchog gi gnas gyur pas/ /ji ltar spyad kyang zad med
gnyis med sgrib mi 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rol pa yin/ /de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste/ /rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma/
yin pas/ /'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam par sbyor/ /'di ni yid bzhin rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /thams cad 'du ba'i
gter dang yid bzhin mdzod/ /gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings/ /nga dang bdag med mtshan ma sna tshogs dbyer med pa/ /stong dang mi stong mi gnas
de bzhin nyid du 'dus/ /rang byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zad med dkyil 'khor spro/ /'das dang ma 'das dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang / /mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo
drug rdzogs pa/ /skye med dbyings kyi rang byung 'od gsal phreng ldan mchog /ye nas ma bcos ma byas rang rig dang gis gsal/ /thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen
dang du bsdus/ /phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus thams cad kun 'dus dang / /zhing khams gzhal yas bsam yas rin chen mchog chen kun/ /skye med dbyings dang rang gi gnyis
su yang dag 'ubs/ /mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa/ /ye nas 'od gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog gnas/ /ming tsam mchog
rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs/ /lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu 'bras spyod/ /mnyam nyid pa yi rdo rje thabs chen yang dag ldan/ /'gro
med 'ong med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad/ /a ho/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa bcu gnyis dang / thabs kyi mchog dang / sangs rgyas
kyi zhing ma lus pa yid dang chos su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par bzhugs
nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang / /'bru lnga gnas pa'i byang chub ste/ /oM dang mUM du 'brel ba yi/ /byang chub rdo rje nyid las byung / /spyir na
brjod pa thams cad kyang / /kun kyang ming tsam yi ge a/ /skye 'jig nyid kyang yi ge lnga/ /de ni byang chub sems nyid yin/ /dmigs med byang chub mchog 'byung ba/ /gsum
shar lnga 'bar bcu 'byor pa/ /zad med rin chen gter yin te/ /mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzang spags/ /e las 'phro zhing ar 'dus pa/ /gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi
dbyings/ /nam mkha'i dbyings nas sprin byung ba/ /kun la khyab cing sna tshogs sprin/ /bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i khong nas bsam mi khyab/ /byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che/ /yon tan mi
zad gter du gyur/ /ho/ /ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /dbyings las mi gzhan ye nas thig le dang / /ye shes dbyings nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul/ /
snang byed nyid na bya byed med par gnas/ /ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dam pa ni/ /thabs dang shes rab
gnyis med mnyam par gnas/ /dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgoms byas shing / /mnyam pa rnam bzhis don rtogs mchog gi gnas/ /rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum
tshogs bzhir 'dus/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs sku gsung thugs kyis bsdus/ /chags med zhi ba'i lam nas thig ler 'jug /ye shes lnga rdzogs spyod yul mi 'da' la/ /ma
chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan/ /thams cad ma lus rang rig rgyal po yis/ /dkyil 'khor dag mnyam khro bo khro mor sbyor/ /chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis
stong / /nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang / /dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma/ /de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam/ /phyin ci log nyi yang yang dag ste/ /ma rig pa
ni ye shes gsal/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog /thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas/ /a ho/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/ /nges pa'i
don dgrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus/ /bsdus pa'i don nyad yi ge 'bru lngar bsdus/ /lnga po'i don snying 'bru gsum nang du 'dus/ /gsum po de nyid yi ge ar 'dus te/ /a nyid ma
skyes mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thim/ /a ho/ /mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyang brjod mi lang / /mi dmigs de bzhin gshegs kyang bsam mi khyab/ /ma skyes mchog gi dbyings kyang bsam
mi khyab| |ma 'gags byang chub sems ni skye 'jig med/ /'gro med 'ong med mi gnas pa'i/ /thugs rje byin rlabs rnam par 'phro/ /zhes nyid la nyid gsung ngo / /dbyings las dbyings phyung
thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /dbyings su dbyings kyis ye shes 'byor pas na/ /byang chub sems tshogs dkyil 'khor brjod mi lang
de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don ma lus par gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog /lus ngag sems la thim par rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal
po mtha' yas su sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan bsdus te/ /bruM dang bi shwa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ma dang a yi dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rab bsgoms
nas| |bzhi pa bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te/ /de yis phyogs bcur gang bar bsgom/ /bruM dang dza| hUM baM hos dgug /sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog /lus ngag sems la thim par bya/ /nri
nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod/ /bum ba mchog ni bzang po yi/ /tshe gzhag gnas ni 'di yin te/ /yang nas yang du dgug bya ste/ /mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang / /dbyings su yang ni
sba bar bya/ /rdo rje go cha srung ba yis/ /brtan zhing 'khor los dgag par bya/ /snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus kun/ /rgyal ba tshe
dpag med pa bsgom/ /sku mchog gangs ri 'tsher ba la/ /rgyan phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang / /yid bzhin rin chen za ma tog /rin chen
rgyan dang bum pa bzang / /gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /bgegs kyis nri rnams mi ster na/ /tshe dpag med dang khro bo ste/ /phyogs
bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/ /sgra skad drag po bton nas ni/ /thams cad ma lus thul bar bya/ /dbang du tshe dpag med pa bskur/ /tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang / /tshe sgrub dang ni sgrub
chen dang / /thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis/ /ci 'dod las rnams grub par byed/ /tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel ma/ /dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro 'bar/ /phyag na rin chen gang ba yin//
phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la/ /phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin no/ /de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med/ /yi ge
bzlas pa 'phrul chen 'di/ /rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul par/ /sngags bzlas chog bar ma gcod/ /'dris gsal brtan pa mchog gis bya/ /oM oM oM oM oM/ /hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/

swAM swAM swAM swAM swAM/ AMHAMHAMHAMHAM/ hAM hAM hAM hAM hAM/ brUM brUM brUM brUM brUM/ bA bA bA bA bA/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ A A A A A/ yu yu yu yu yu/ sh+She sh+She sh+She sh+She sh+She/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ a a a a a/ o/ /
tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na/ /bder gshegs la yang tshe dpag med/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/ /phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis/ /
'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas/ /'gro lnga tshe rnams dbang du bsdu/ /phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis/ /'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas/ /gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug
ste| |snying po lnga la bstim par bya/ /phyag rgya 'khor lo chen po yis/ /steng gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs te/ /dbang phyug lha chen la sogs dang / /bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba las/ /nri tshe
rab tu dgug par bya/ /'khor lo'i 'bru la bstims nas ni/ /de nas yi ge 'bru lnga de/ /nr-i yi gnas lngar bstim par bya/ /oM oM badzra ka pa tsa badzra rak+Sha hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA badzra i d+hi
tiSh+Tha badzra swAhA/ phyag rgya srung ba'i cho ga ste/ /'bru lnga'i yi ge 'bru gcig ste/ /'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyings su thim/ /oM/ /yid bzhin bum pa'i rin po che/ /rgyan dang rin chen phreng bas
brgyan| |rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang / /'bru lnga spos lnga yungs kar lnga/ /sngags mkhan rab brtan blo ldan pas/ /yan lag mnyams sngags bzlas bsgom/ /rgyan chas lnga dang ldan byas
nas| |dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas rigs kyi bu de yis/ /yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas/ /mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mnyes mchod
dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ tshe'i cho ga dbang dam pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sdud pa
pos 'gro ba lnga dbang med par smra ba zhes bya bar yang bsdus nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings/ /kun tu bzang po thugs rje'i dang / /sku
gsung thugs ldan yon tan rdzogs/ /mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis/ /rdo rje rab tu kun sbyar te/ /oM dang mUM du 'byor par bsgom/ /thams cad dbyings
su thim par bsgom/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang / /thig le man+t+ra de dag tu/ /nr-i thal man+t+ra bzang po'i thig /rta babs sgo khyud bzang po dang / /rdo rje rtse gcig 'od 'bar dang / /'gugs
pa'i lcags kyu dam pa yis/ /rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum bri/ /dkyil 'khor rgyu dang ldan par bya/ /mchod yon sna tshogs mchod par 'bul/ /yaM/ dud ka'i ye shes 'od 'phros nas/ /
a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dza las lcags kyu grangs med pas/ /de yi snying du zhugs par bya/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dza las lcags kyu mang po yis/ /gang dgug
de yi snying gnas/ /drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dza las lcags kyu mang po yis/ /gang dgug de yi snying gnas/ /grangs te de yi khar gzhug bya/ /sngags 'di
rab tu brjod par bya/ /oM dzaHhUM baM hoH/ a nr-i pra du/ ming pra be sha /ci 'dod las de bzlas par bya/ /lag gnyis sor mo spyir bsnol te/ /khu tshur dam du bcangs nas ni/ /srin lag mthe'u
chung mthe bo gnyis/ /bar du mthe bo de drangs te/ /oM ming pra be sha A A/ /thal ba yungs kar drag tu rdeg /ming de khong du gzhug par bya/ /babs nas rdo rje lcags sgrog zhags pas bcing / /gang
yin zhes ni dris nas ni/ /lha 'dre la sogs gang yin pa/ /lha zhig na ni mchod par bya/ /gdon zhig na ni tsan+dan gur gum bsres nas ni/ /de blud sngags 'di rab tu brjod par bya/ /oM badzra d+ha
ka kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gal te smra ru mi btub na/ /lag gnyis sor mo phyir bsnol te/ /khu tshur bcangs nas mthe chung sbyar/ /gyen bsgreng dbab pa'i kha ru gtugs/ /sngags/ oM badzra b+hA Sha
bi dze pra be sha hUM hUM/ zhes lan mang du bzlas pas/ /ye shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga'/ /bden pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam/ /lce yi thor to a dkar po/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de
steng du| |oM/ dzaHd+hIHdmar po bsgoms byas na/ /gdon mi za bar smra bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid Tak+ki hUM bsgoms la/ /a dang nr-i la sogs pa yi/ /lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung / /
oM| |Tak+ki hUM dang rang sngags kyis/ /lan 'bum bzlas shing dgug par bya/ /pra be shas kyang bzlas par bya/ /gzhan yang dzaHhUM baM hoHste/ /gzhag cing dbab pa'i sa
de ni| |byis pa lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /gcig dang lnga la dbab par bya/ /thig le bum pa me long 'bar/ /gzhan yang gnas rnams thams cad ni/ /smra ba'i cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /
phyag rgya rdo rje spar mo sder/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya kun gyis dgug /dzaHhUM dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bsdu/ /bcol zhing bya ba de bzhin no/ /Tak+ki hUM dzas mi btub na/ /ha ya grI ba gnas dang
yul| |zur phyin mgo mjug mnan nas ni/ /drag tu bzlas shing lcags kyus dgug /srog gi snying po ma nor bar/ /gzir cing drag tu drang bar bya/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten
pa'i| |dgug pa'i thabs yong ci yang rung / /nem nur med par dgug par bya/ /bya ba sna tshogs las zin na/ /sngar byas bum pa lnga po la/ /sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga/ /rigs
kyi yum dang bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /ci 'dod las rnams thams cad dang / /gzhan yang dgos pa ci yang rung / /oM badzra a mr-i ta a a a/ oM mahA badzra a mr-i ta phaT/ dza gad dza gad tsa zhes
kyang brjod do/ /oM bud+d+ha lo tsa ni swAhA zhes bzlas/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa der/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs nyid la brjod/ /ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig /yang nas yang du
mngon gsal du/ /byang chub mchog gis rtag sgoms shig /de ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /brda phrad skad kyis dngos grub thob/ /ces rdo rje gsang
ba'i tshig tu'o/ /'gro ba'i don gyi phyir yang ched du brjod do/ /pra dbab pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //dpal shrI he ru kas yum kro d+hI shwA ri dang gnyis su med par 'du ba mdzad

nas byang chub sems kyi rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang po spros nas 'jig rten pa'i dbang mo chen po dang / dbang po dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i yang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / sde dpon dang /
'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te 'jigs byed chen po rnams da ltar dang / dus phyi ma'i dus su la la ni/ tshe 'phel ba'i las
su bskos/ la la ni/ longs spyod 'phel bar bskos/ la la ni/ 'byung ba chen mo la thogs pa med par 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni/ gzugs mi snang bar 'gro bar bskos/ la la
ni| gzugs sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur bar bskos/ la la ni/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs dbang du sdud par bskos/ la la ni/ nyams shing rmongs par bskos/ la la ni/ bskams shing
'phro bar bskos/ gzhan yang bya ba sna tshogs pa ci 'dod par bskos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis/ /'jig rten gtso mchog dbang du sdud/ /thugs
rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'gro ba'i don rnams sna tshogs bstan/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /'di ni rang byung
lha yi lha/ /byams dang snying rje lngan par rol/ /thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas/ /thams cad kun la sbyor 'gyur yang / /bag chags gsog par mi 'gyur te/ /bsod nams
ye shes tshogs 'gyur rdzogs/ /thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs par/ /gzung 'dzin 'khrul rtog rdul tsam med/ /de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir/ /rtag tu rang bzhin
'od gsal gnas/ /de nas bdag nyid rgyud don gong nas 'byung ba bzhin lha khro bo dang / zhi ba de dag gang la goms par bsgom/ ting 'dzin las su rung ba lha gsal bar gyur pa
dang / rang gi lha'i bzlas pa 'bum 'bum gdon to/ /lha chen po ni/ dgug pa'i phyir lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta baM/ mahA de bA hUM dzaH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /lha yi dbang po'i snying gnas/ /
yang nas yang du rnam par drang / /ma ma trag sha ma hA de bA gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM/ lha'i gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar/ /lus ni rin chen kun gyis brgyan/ /gcug na yid bzhin
rin chen 'bar/ /lag pa g.yas na thogs pa ni/ /yid bzhin rin chen bum chu gsol/ /yon tan rin chen sna lnga ste/ /lha rnams kun gyi re ba skong / /btsun mo ut+ma ta gnas
pa| |rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan/ /bdag nyid snang mdzad gzhal yas khang / /lha yi gzugs ni snga ma'i tshul/ /lha yis bon 'bum phrag tu/ /srog dang ldan par bzlas brjod bya/ /
mdun nas dzaHhUM baM hos drang / /rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/ /je nye je nye gnyis med par/ /lha chen po ni gsal gyur nas/ /ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug /lha chen 'khor bcas
thams cad kyang / /de grub dbang byed 'du bar 'gyur/ /gang 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po chen po sde bzhi sgrub pa'i las 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems
mchog ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyogs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun/ /rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub tu/ /rgyal chen bzhi yang dbang du bsdus/ /bdag nyid rigs bzhi'i he ru ka /gong
don byung ba bzhin du bsgom/ /lha nyid rtag tu gsal gyur cing / /lha yi gzugs tshul gsal bar bsgom/ /bdag nyid lha dang gnyis med par/ /yang dag don du gsal bar
bsgom| |de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung / /gzugs ni gangs ri nyi shar 'dra/ /mchod sbyin 'od zer brgya dang ldan/ /lag g.yas rdo rje tri shU la/ /lag g.yon bdud rtsi bum pa
gsol| |in+d+ra sA ya swAhA/ dzaHhUM baM hoHtra mi ta hUM hUM su ra ta bag+t+ra dzaH/ dzA dzA hUM hUM/ zhes lan 'bum bzlas nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje he ru ka /'dren pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis/ /
lha yi dbang po'i snying nas drangs/ /rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/ /de nyid lha yi dbang gyur nas/ /las gang 'dod pa byed du gzhug /thams cad
thams cad grub par byed/ /kun la 'byin cing kun la za/ /lha yi 'khor rnams thams cad kun/ /ma lus par ni yang dag 'du/ /bran bzhin du ni thams cad 'brang / /rgyal
po 'phags skyes sgrub pa ni/ /bdag nyid rin chen he ru ka /sku mdog rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /'od kyi 'phro 'du byin rlabs kyis/ /

'phags skyes po ni dbang du bsdus/ /d+h+r-i ta d+h+r-i ta swAhA/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na dur+thid swAhA/ haM haM haM/ rat+Na dzaHhUM baM ho/ /zhes snying po lan 'bum du bzlas te/ /srog dang ldan
par ting 'dzin bya/ /bdag nyid rat+Na he ru ka /'phags skyes po yi snying ga nas/ /dza yis rab tu bzung nas ni/ /bdag gi mdun du dgug par bya/ /rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis
phul| |de nas mngon sum gyur pa dang / /gang 'dod las de byed du gzhug /mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu 'bar/ /'khor rnams thams cad bdag la bsdu/ /yid bzhin rin chen
gzhal yas 'grub/ /rgyal po mig ngan sgrub pa ni/ /bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ga /sku mdog gong gi snga ma bzhin/ /phyag rgya'i tshul yang de bzhin te/ /snying po 'bum phrag gsal
bzlas nas/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bsgyur rung zhing / /lha nyid du ni gsal gyur nas/ /rgyal po de yi gzugs mdog ni/ /shin tu dmar zhing 'tsher ba ste/ /lag g.yas bdud rtsi bum pa gsol/
lag g.yon bdud rtsi lnga yi tshul/ /nub phyogs klu rnams re ba skong / /sbrul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can/ /de ni rab tu dbang bsdu phyir/ /bi rU D+ha ka swAhA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ nA ga shi ni bi ya phag
sha phag dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /'bum phrag du ma bzlas nas ni/ /de ni bdag gi dbang du bsdu/ /bdag nyid lha ru gsal bsgoms nas/ /mig mi bzang gi snying gnas/ /dza yis rab tu bzung nas drang /
rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/ /de nas bdag dang gnyis med pa'i/ /dbyer med par ni gyur pa dang / /ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug /mig ngan 'khor rnams ma lus par/ /dbang gi las
rnams 'grub par byed/ /rgyal po rnam thos sgrub pa ni/ /bdag nyid khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin/ /gsal zhing 'od 'phro rab bsgoms shing / /rang sngags
snying po 'bum phrag bzlas/ /ting 'dzin bsgyur du rung ba dang / /rnam thos dag ni rab tu 'grub/ /gzugs ni rin chen bai DUR+Ya/ /yang na mdog ni sngo zhing 'tsher/ /phyag g.yas rin chen
dbyig to thogs/ /g.yon na 'dod yon bum pa gsol/ /dbu la rin chen sna tshogs mdzes/ /bai shra ma Na ye swAhA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /ku be ra/ kaM kaM/ yaM yaM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /'bum du bzlas
shing srog yod bar/ /yang dang yang du bzlas par bya/ /bdag nyid bdud rtsi he ru ka /dza yis rnam thos snying nas drang / /dbang du yang dag bsdu bar bya/ /rgyab nas rdo
rje can gyis phul/ /yid bzhin rin chen dbang du 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin 'khor rnams bran bzhin bsdu/ /rin chen spro zhing las rnams sgrub/ /ci 'dod las rnams byed par
'gyur| |sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ lha chen po sgrub pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dkyil 'khor bkod cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
dgyes pa chen pos tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangs so/ /hUM/ gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/ /'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi//
khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/ /mche ba zangs yag za byed che ho/ /hUM/ rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/ /thug tshem ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad/ /a a ha la'i gad
rgyangs che/ /dbyug pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng pa che ho/ /hUM/ khros ba'i shes rab 'od po che/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal/ /'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms/ /sna
tshogs ye shes thig le che ho/ /hUM/ khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po/ /khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs/ /dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/ /sna tshogs
khros pa'i thig le che ho/ /hUM/ bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po/ /bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa/ /'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho/ /hUM

rdo rje brag chen sra ba po/ /rdo rje chu bo sdud pa po/ /rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che/ /rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che ho/ /zhes ched du blangs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ mnyes
pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bdag dang rdo rje sems dpar dbyer med par yang dag pa'i dbyings su 'dus shing bdag gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mngon sum du
mthong ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so/ /kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i/ /thams cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul/ /snang srid ma lus thams cad kun/ /chu
zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing / /yul dang rtog pa gnyis med par/ /gang gis de ltar rig pa de/ /gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma/ /snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid/ /cis kyang
mi tshugs rdo rje yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de la gnas/ /lta spyod mthun pas zhal mthong yin/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni/ /chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer med pa'i/ /mnyam
par sbyor zhing dag pa'o/ /thams cad byang chub lhun grub pa'i/ /de ltar gang gis rtogs 'gyur ba/ /de ni ye shes gnyis can te/ /de yis yang dag snying po
mthong / /de nyid cis kyang mi tshugs pa/ /shin tu sra zhing brtan pa yin/ /rang bzhin dbyings nas 'od gsal ba/ /sems dpa' mchog tu yang dag gsungs/ /de ltar rtogs na
zhal mthong yin/ /de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub yin/ /de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga/ /rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /rtog nyid bral ba'i thabs mkhas
kyis| |lhar gsal dngos po med bsgoms na/ /mthong thos la sogs med pa'i tshul/ /rang gi ye shes gsal bsgoms na/ /rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub/ /'grub
'gyur nyid na dngos po med/ /ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis/ /bdud dpung dkyil du ta la btsugs/ /thams cad byang chub shing bsdus te/ /gdug pa ngang gis mi dga'
nas| |ta la bcad bskams yongs mi gcod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin/ /bdag dang ting 'dzin mthong gyur pa/ /de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
nyid bsgoms te/ /ting 'dzin shin tu 'dris gsal na/ /thams cad rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ /kun la dbang sgyur cis mi tshugs/ /bdag dang sems dpa' dbyer med de/ /las
mthun ji ltar snang ba bzhin/ /bdag dang sems dpa' lta spyod cig /de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag yin/ /chen po rags pa thabs kyis
rtogs| |so so'i mtshan 'dzin shes rab rtog /gnyis med 'brel ba thabs chen yin/ /kun kyang shes rab ngang du gnas/ /snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid
las ma g.yos phyir/ /g.yo dang med pa gnyi ga med/ /gnas dang mi gnas dbye ru med/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus/ /'dus gnyis gnas su thebs pa yin/ /thams
cad de lta bu yi dang / /mnyam gnyis dbyer med sus mi tshugs/ /de nyid sems dpa' bzhugs gnas yin/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog de/ /sems dpa' nyid dang rigs
mthun pas/ /de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /rgyur byas phung po khams rnams la/ /gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du gcig /sgyu mar snang ba gzugs brnyan tshul/ /snang ba nyid ni dngos po
med| |dngos nyid de nyid sna tshogs ston/ /phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs/ /dbang po rnam sems byang chub sems/ /yul dus po de chen mo yin/ /bdag rtog rnam pa khro bo yin//
rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo yin/ /de sems rang rig nyid ces bya/ /thams cad dbyings 'gyur kun tu bzang / /de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /gang gis de ltar rtogs gyur na/ /sems
dpa' nyid dang dgongs mthun pas/ /de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang / /sgra yis mtshon nas don
bstan pa/ /kun kyang yi ge ming gcig bzhin/ /gang yang dngos po ma yin te/ /dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang / /snang ba nyid na gang yang med/ /bya byed sna tshogs kun byed kyang / /dngos po
med de yang dag nyid/ /de ni cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i/ /sa rdo dran med ma yin te/ /de nyid shin tu 'od gsal yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas/ /gang gis de ltar rtogs pa ni/ /rigs
mchog dam pa rgyu yin te/ /rdo rje'i rigs dang dbyer med phyir/ /de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas/ /kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te/ /'bras bu mngon du ma
gyur kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' la gnas pas/ /dper na mngal dang sgo nga yi/ /mngon du ma gyur bsgribs gyur kyang / /rtsal chen 'dus pa 'byung ba bzhin/ /rnam rtog gzugs ni
bor ma thag /thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhing / /rigs mchog dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dang mnyam pa yi/ /dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs/ /bde ba can gyi zhing
yang thob/ /byang chub mchog la rol par 'gyur/ /lha mi rnams kyi ston pa po/ /lus ngag sems la dbang thob nas/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /tshad med bzhi la dbang byed
'gyur| |bde ba'i ro mchog kun la spyod/ /tha mar skye rgan 'chi la sogs pa'i/ /sdug bsngal zad pa'i go 'phang thob/ /rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin 'gyur te/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//
'gro ba mi lus thams cad kun/ /rdo rje rigs su 'dren par byed/ /bdud sde tshar gcod nyon mongs 'dul/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bskor/ /'gro ba ma lus thams cad la/ /mi rtag pa yi tshul
yang ston/ /nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul/ /byang chub rnams la rang byung tshul/ /bla med theg pa sangs rgyas tshul/ /lhun grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings/ /kun la mthun pa'i tshul yang
ston| |rang bzhin dbyings las g.yos pa med/ /ma g.yos bzhin du kun tu ston/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /de lta bu yi ngang du gnas/ /zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /nyid la
nyid de skad ces brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ skyes bu dam pa blo rtsal rab gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mthong ba'i le'u sta drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig sum brgya'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas sngags 'chang rnams kyi don du ched du
brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ /log rtog mi bzad rdul phran snyed/ /rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab/ /'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang / /rdo rje theg
mchog mang po kun/ /nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang / /rang rig 'khrul ba'i rtog pa yis/ /lta ba mthon dman bsam mi khyab/ /de 'dul don phyir 'tsham
par bstan/ /yang dag nyid dang log rtog nyid/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na/ /de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/ /ye nas ngo bo yod min na/ /nyon mongs spangs shing byang chub med//
thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur/ /kun rdzob chu zla ltar yin pas/ /cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub/ /rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis/ /don dam skye 'gag med pa
ste| |kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/ /gnas ngan dus na log rtog nyid/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba nyid rtogs nas/ /bdag med ye shes rang bzhin nyid/ /snying rje thabs mkhas ting
'dzin gyis/ /cir yang dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /so so rang bzhin nges she na/ /yang dag lam nyid bcos su med/ /de bas yang dag blo chen gyis/ /thams cad dngos po med
par bshad/ /dper na dug gi rigs shes pas/ /dug gis mi tshugs bzhin du snang / /ha la ha la'i dug rnams kyang / /bsgrubs na ra sa ya na'i sman/ /bdud rtsir 'gyur
la tshe ring 'grub/ /nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa/ /mtshan nyid ma nor rtogs pas na/ /rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang / /gang na
med de de yin te/ /nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang / /rang dang spyi yi don brtags na/ /mtshan nyid med pas rnam par dag /so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas/ /thabs chen du ni rnam par spro/ /
mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas/ /shes rab dbyings su rnams par sbyor/ /gti mug ces ni brjod pa ni/ /ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te/ /gnyis med don gcig yin par bshad/ /
rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams/ /ngo bo nyid la sogs brtags pa/ /rtog nyid sgyu ma klung gyur te/ /log rtog pa yi rgyun yin la/ /thams cad chos
dbyings ro gcig ste/ /bzod pa'i chos nyid mig gcig yin/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /ma rig pa ni spang du med/ /rig pa yang dag bsgrub tu
med| |thams cad dbyings su ro gcig thim/ /sgyu ma dngos por rtog pa ni/ /sgyu ma rtog nyid mi dmigs pa/ /mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang / /skyes pa nyid na chos nyid gcig/ /
dbyings nyid mi dmigs de bzhin nyid/ /de nyid chos sku phyag rgya che/ /mi dmigs sgyu mar dngos po la/ /rtog pa'i yul gyi dngos nyid kyang / /chos nyid mi dmigs ye nas dag/ sgyu ma
mi dmigs dbyer med phyir/ /yod med gnyi ga dbyer med pas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /chos nyid dmigs su med pa ste/ /mi dmigs
bzhin du sgyu mar spros/ /gdul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab/ /gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o/ /de ltar gti mug spang du med/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin/ /zhe sdang
rang dang spyi bstan pa/ /kun nas mnar sems rtog pa yi/ /sgyu ma'i dngos po thams cad kun/ /'jig par mos pa'i rang bzhin can/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug
bsngal stong bdag med/ /zhe sdang snying rje spangs bsgrub med/ /chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir/ /sgyu ma rang bzhin mnar sems pa/ /dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs na/ /sgu mar
snang ba thams cad kyang / /chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan ste/ /mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin ni/ /bdag srog gso ba'i rang bzhin med/ /
snang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings/ /mnar sems sgyu ma chos nyid do/ /thams cad mi dmigs de bzhin yin/ /kun kyang dbyer med chos phyag rgya/ /mi dmigs sgyu ma kun nas mnar//
rtog pa kun nas mnar sems te/ /chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs te/ /chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs phyir/ /don dam kun rdzob ro gcig ste/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/ /thugs kyi phyag
rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs kun nas mnar sems pa/ /gdul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab/ /gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o/ /zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na
rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med/ /nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ /khong nas 'gying zhing khengs sems pa/ /pha rol zil gyis gnon par byed/ /spyi yi
mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /nga rgyal spangs nas zhi bsgrub med/ /chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas/ /kun rdzob sgyu mar khong 'gying zhing / /de bzhin
nyid las mi gzhan te/ /chos nyid mi dmigs 'gying par skyes/ /skye 'gying nyid na chos nyid de/ /'gying ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs dag /'gying dang mi 'gying dbyer med phyir/ /chos
sku phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu ma 'gying / /'gying bas zil gyis gnon pa nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te/ /sgyu ma chos nyid dbyer med phyir/ /don dam
kun rdzob gnyi ga gcig /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs sgyu mar 'gying ba ni/ /nga rgyal 'dul ba bsam mi khyab/ /gsung gi phyag
rgya chen po yin/ /nga rgyal rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /zhi sgrub ba nga rgyal spang du med/ /'dod chags rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sreg pa kun la zhen pa
ste| |spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /chags spang ma chags bsgrub tu med/ /chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
du| |'dod cing chags pa sgyu ma sred/ /mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan phyir/ /mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes/ /chos rnams bdag las mi gzhan phyir/ /mi
dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes/ /spyod pa sgyu ma ro gcig phyir/ /chos nyid chos can dmigs su med/ /rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i/ /chos kyi sku yi phyag rgya yin/ /mi dmigs sgyu
mar 'dod cing chags/ /'dod chags chos nyid mi dmigs te/ /sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir/ /bden pa gnyi gar dbyer med gcig /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/ /thugs
kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs dbyings nyid 'dod chags spros pa ni/ /'dul ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /'dod chags rang dang spyi yi mtshan/ /
rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /chags dang ma chags gnyis med pas/ /'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med/ /phrag dog kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa
la| |sems dog rtog pa sgyu ma gzhan/ /thabs kyis sbyor ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can/ /phrag dog spyi mtshan bshad pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /phrag dog spang zhing
yang bsgrub med/ /chos nyid du ni ro gcig phyir/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la/ /phrag dog rtog pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid/ /mi dmigs pa las mi bzhin te/ /mi dmigs
pa nyid sgyu mar skyes/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i lhag par sbyor ba yi/ /thabs kyi rtogs pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid de/ /dus gsum rgyal kun dbyer med pas/ /chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs
sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la/ /phrag dog rtog par 'dzin pa dang / /rtog dang phrag dog mi dmigs te/ /sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med pa'i/ /bden pa gnyi gar ro gcig pas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis
dbang bsgyur na/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs gzhan gyi phun sum la/ /phrag dog rnam par spros nas ni/ /gdul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab/ /gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /
phrag dog rang dang spyi bstan pa/ /rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /dog pa spang zhing yang bsgrub med/ /sems can rnam pa mang po kun/ /nang gi chen po lnga sogs bstan/ /rang spyi'i mtshan nyid
bshad par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas/ /ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin/ /de ltar nges par ci mthong na/ /sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i nad/ /kun la gnod par
byed mi nus/ /de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rtogs/ /dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur/ /thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na/ /lam gyi dge spyad stegs bcas kyang / /mtho
ris lha dang mi ru skyes/ /skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob/ /thabs mkhas snying rjes zin pa ni/ /mtshams med sems can ma lus kun/ /byang chub sems dpa'i snying rjes bsad/ /bsod
nams dpag tu med pa thob/ /ma bsad na yang sems can yal bor te/ /snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal phrag dog
chen po dag /gang phyir byang chub sems de ni/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par gsal/ /nyon mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs/ /ngo bo yin par gsal por gsungs/ /chos kun
rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la/ /nyon mongs thams cad byang chub rgyu/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas/ /de
phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/ /phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/ /mya ngan 'das pa yod ma
yin| |gsang sngags bla na med pa yi/ /thabs kyis ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub/ /bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med/ /don dam cir yang ma grub la/ /sgyu ma'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /
thabs chen dag gis zin pa ni/ /nyon mongs lam yang rnam par grol/ /thabs chen dag gis ma zin na/ /dge ba spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor don dam ldan pa yis/ /nyon
mongs 'ching ba'i chos spyad kyang / /rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gnyi ga yod pa ma yin pas/ /'khor ba yongs su shes pas na/ /de ni mya ngan
'das pa'i mtha'/ /nyon mongs phyin ci log rnams dag /thabs la mkhas pas zin gyur yang / /grol la thar par mi 'gyur na/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/ /'dul ba'i
dbang gis bya byed kun/ /rngon dang rmad 'tshong ston pa'ang ltung / /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul bzang / /phal la med pas mi rung na/ /sngags mchog shin tu zab pa yis/ /skye bo kun
gyis bya bar 'byung / /bdud rtsi dang du blangs par gsungs/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med na/ /sku gsung rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur/ /grub pa'i rjes su de phyir gsungs/ /shes rab mnyam pa ma
rtogs na/ /byol song la la chos dang ldan 'gyur yang / /drang srong 'tsho dang rtag mthun dang / /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du 'dod pa spong byed pa/ /de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/ /chos rnams thams cad
yongs su dag pa yi/ /rnam bzhi tshul gyis don rtogs mngon/ /rgyu rnams rang bzhin dag pa dang / /'bras bu yongs su dag 'gyur te/ /rgyu yi mtshan nyid rnam par dag /phyi rol chen po lnga rnams
te| |sems nyid gzung 'dzin gnyis snang ba/ /gzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba che/ /rgyud nyid rang gi sems yin pas/ /'byung ba chen po rgyu las dag /'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni/ /sems
na kun gyi rus pa ste/ /rdo rje byang chub sems yin te/ /sha ni pad+ma rak+ta yin/ /dri chen dri chu gur gum chu/ /so so'i lus la gnas pas dag /don dam dmigs med dag pas ni/ /phyi nang
chos rnams thams cad kyang / /gang gi ngo bo ma yin te/ /skye 'gag med pas ye nas dag /kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang / /chu zla'i
chul du mi dmigs gnas/ /mi dmigs pa nyid sna tshogs snang / /de bzhin gshegs par ye nas mnyam/ /de bas gtsang sme med par spyod/ /sems can rtog pa bzlog phyir sman/ /
gtso ru dang du blang bar bya/ /de bas sems can phyin ci log /chos rnams thams cad dag par ma shes te/ /thabs dang shes rab don ma rtogs/ /kha cig gis ni 'tsho ba'i bar du zos/ /
kha cig gis ni drang srong ji bzhin du/ /sha spangs rtswa dang chu la zos/ /zos kyang ma grub don ma rtogs/ /rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni/ /rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa'i phyir/ /
mnyam pa'i dbyings kyis rab rtogs pas/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /dngos dang dngos med rtogs pa mtshan/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang rtogs
pa mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam spangs te/ /mkhyen pas dbul la gnas mi 'gyur/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas su yang dag gsungs/ /byang chub sems dang sha chen dang / /dri chen dri chu rak+ta dag /sgrub
pa pos ni nan tan bya/ /dngos grub ya mtshan chen po 'grub/ /tshe la dbang dang rig pa 'dzin/ /mkha' la 'phyo dang thogs med 'grub/ /mthar ni skye med rdo rje yis/ /gzhan yang ji ltar
dmigs pa bzhin/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i snying po'i don nyid kyis/ /yi dam mi spang rtag bsgom zhing / /ye nas lha yi mtshan nyid ni/ /dus gsum gshegs pa thams
cad kyis/ /lha spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur/ /lha ni mi spang don nyid ni/ /lhun grub ye shes thams cad kyi/ /bdag dang gnyis med so so ma yin pa'i/ /dus gsum bde gshegs
dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi| |sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag po ste/ /yongs su rdzogs par bsgom pa'i don/ /dkon mchog gsum spangs tshangs par spyad pa don med 'gyur/ /
bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na/ /yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor nas su/ /lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom/ /bde gshegs kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /
sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs grub/ /rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya/ /byang chub stan pa 'dren pa po/ /long ba dmigs bu 'dren dang 'dra/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skem yin/ /slob dpon
de la smod pa ni/ /dper na mun khung sgron bsad na/ /mthong ba'i don ni mi rtogs bzhin/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag yun ring du/ /bskal pa mang por myong bar mngon/ /de bas de la gus
pa rtag tu gyis/ /lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po pas/ /shin tu gtso bor blang bar bya/ /drin chags bskyed pa'i pha ma bas/ /shin tu lhag pa'i ri mo bya/ /rdo rje mched dang lcam dral ni/ /bla med
byang chub zhing 'gro ba'i/ /chos nyid dam tshig smon lam mthus/ /byang chub rin chen sar nges pas/ /de la ldog cing 'khu ba ni/ /rang la rang gis mtshon btab na/ /rang
srog tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar/ /rang gis srog gcod phung bar 'gyur/ /tshe 'di mi bde sna tshogs pa/ /mi bde bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang / /ngan song gsum dang
mi khom pa'i/ /sdug bsngal kha brgyud myong bar 'gyur/ /yun ring rtag tu mi thar pa'i/ /shin tu nyam thag myong bar 'gyur/ /grub pa gcig bzhin lhan cig spyod/ /gnyis med dang bas rjes
spyod spun/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin/ /shes rab gsal bas rtag tu gdungs zhes gsungs/ /gsang ba gzhan la mi bsgrags shing / /sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig
rnams| |rnal 'byor mnyam pa rnam gnyis kyis/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtogs nas/ /mnyam pa'i spyod pas ma dor te/ /phul dang mi 'dra yang dag rtogs/ /ma rtogs pa yi phyogs
rnams dang / /skye bo kun la rab tu gsang / /gsang pa'i brda dag sna tshogs gsungs/ /thabs la mkhas pas byas pa yin/ /gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te/ /thugs rje chen po
thabs mkhas kyis/ /snod ma yin dang blo rtul rnams/ /las 'phro ngan pa'i don phyir gsang / /brgya la gang zhig gsang don 'di/ /las 'phro ngan la bsgrags gyur na/ /dper na
gtsubs shing mes gtsugs nas/ /gtsubs shing nyid kyang 'tshig par snang / /gzhan yang tshig par gyur pa bzhin/ /chos don bzang po me dang 'dra/ /skal pa chung zhing shes rab dman/
blo ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs pa rnams/ /mnyam pa nyid la skur 'debs pas/ /ngan song gsum du 'phangs par 'gyur/ /gsang don ma rtogs sdug bsngal myong gyur na/ /gsang ba 'phel bar
byed pa yang / /smra byed lce la zhing rmo zhing / /sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur/ /de phyir sems can don phyir gsang / /rlung phyogs tsam du brjod mi bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi
gcad| |sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags pa ni/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i/ /mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM/ /de la sogs pa
bzhi bcu gnyis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi/ /sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ /bdag dang dbyer med phyag rgya che/ /gsal la
brtson pa'i yon tan ldan/ /yid bzhin ma chags dbang bskur te/ /goms shing brtan par bya ba yin/ /de bas bar chad brtson med na/ /dper na sa bon tshig pa las/ /'bras bu
'dod pa dang 'dra ste/ /sgrub pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /mi khom 'khor bar gnas 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor chen po la zhugs pas/ /phyi nang chos rnams thams cad la/ /dmigs
med gcig dang du mar bral/ /mtha' dbus gang yang ma yin pa'i/ /ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med/ /mnyam pa'i phyag rgya chen po yis/ /phyogs bcu
dus bzhi thams cad dang / /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /yon tan skyon rnams skye 'gag med/ /gang gi ngo bor ma grub mnyam/ /kun rdzob chos rnams skye 'gag med
mi dmigs gang gi ngo bo yin/ /chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs par/ /snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen po'i phyogs bcu dang / /dus gsum khams gsum thams cad dang / /
'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ /yon tan skyon rnams thams cad dang / /sgyu mar mnyam par ye nas gnas/ /sngags 'chang rgyal po'i rtogs byas nas/ /bdag nyid chos
nyid skye 'gag med/ /dang las ma g.yos par gnas na/ /phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang / /rdzogs par phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung
thugs| |thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la/ /ma 'dres rgya yongs ma chad pa'i/ /gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla yi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi
yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings chen rdzogs par bsgom/ /de ltar dam tshig 'di gsum ste/ /de la gnas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /yan lag ma nyams sngags
bzlas shing / /'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya/ /lus dang ngag sems brtan 'gyur na/ /byang chub rab 'byams thob par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po las 'das nas/ /nyen ni shin tu che bar
gsungs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sngags kyi spyod pa don grub pa/ /rmongs pas gal te 'das byas na/ /de yi srog kyang der zad 'gyur/ /dam tshig bsrungs dang
sngags bzlas dang / /phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad pa bzhi/ /brtson 'grus che zhing brtan pas gzung / /rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung gyur na/ /mi 'grub nyen yang che bar gsungs/ /ji
ltar ral gri so la nan tan du/ /skyes bus myur du ma bzung na/ /lag pa nges par chod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nan tan med pa'i gsang sngags la/ /'chi'am yang na 'bras bu med par
'gyur| |rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni/ /sngags kyi yan lag mnyams gsal/ /don dam ma nyams dag byas shing / /brtson 'grus cher skyed myur bar 'grub/ /sngags bsgom ma
nyams phyag rgya gsal/ /cho ga yo byad gtsor ma gsungs/ /tshogs na yang na nyes pa med/ /ma tshogs na yang nyes pa med/ /ma tshogs na yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rang gis
lhar sbyor bas/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang / /'grub par gyur te nyes skyon med/ /ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /dam tshig sum brgya pa
rtsa ba bco lnga mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos bzhugs gnas dang / spyod lam dang /
lta stangs bstan pa/ theg pa chen po'i lhun grub don 'dod na/ /rgyal chen zab yangs shes rab myur/ /zab pa'i don rtogs mi ldog bde/ /nga dang bdag med yangs pa bde/ /gnas
su chos dbyings gnyis med bstan/ /thabs chen kun mdzad 'od gsal byams/ /thams cad dgyes mdzad dbyings ma gtum/ /che chung byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ /g.yog
'khor lha srin sde mang gtso/ /bdag gi mtshan gzugs shin tu spags/ /chos dbyings mkha' dkyil yangs pa la/ /shes rab myur du mngon 'gro ba/ /'gro med 'ong med
mi gnas pa/ /byang chub sems mchog a re bde/ /shes rab zad med dkyil 'khor la/ /thugs rje rol pa'i ye shes 'phyo/ /gnyis med dbyings sbyor a re bde/ /
ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyings su/ /ye shes sgron me'i mda' 'phangs nas/ /gti mug mun pa rnam bsal te/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal bde ba'i mchog /dge dang mi dge
gnyis su med/ /rnam rtog mtshan ma yongs mi 'dzin/ /rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i/ /dge sdig med pas shin tu bde/ /bde dang mi bde gnyis med pas/ /ye shes
chags med rnam par dag /thams cad dbyer med ye shes yin/ /sems nyid dang bas a re bde/ /rgyun du dkyil 'khor thams cad mdzes/ /ye shes rgyu las grub pa yi/ /phyi
nang sgrib med gsal ba'i ngang / /ye shes blo brtan shin tu bde/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la/ /gtsang dang sme ba'i blo mi 'dzin/ /thams cad chos nyid ro gcig pas/ /
gnyis med pas ni shin tu bde/ /shes rab chung chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /thams cad ma nor gzhung lugs bzhin/ /'khor ba ma spangs sdug bsngal med/ /gnyis med tshim
pas a re bde/ /thams cad ma lus gcig pa'i ngang / /lta dang lta ba gnyis ka med/ /ye shes sgron ma bsgreng bar ni/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong / /'di dang
pha rol gnyis med phyir/ /'gro dang 'gro bar bya ba min/ /yan lag stabs chen ma mchongs par/ /phyogs bcu stong khams thams cad na/ /thub mchog ston pa'i spyod yul ni/ /ji
ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /chos rnams thams cad dmigs su med/ /chos nyid sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/ /zag med zab pas don brtags na/ /dag par ma gyur gang yang
med| |ye shes ma bcos kun tu gsal/ /rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o/ /ye nas de ltar gnas mod kyang / /ma rig rmongs pa'i ling tog gis/ /gsal ba'i sgron ma bsgribs gyur
te| |khams gsum mun nag rgyun tu 'khor/ /rnam rtog mtshan mar 'dzin pa yis/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas dang ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong / /
de la su zhig byed pa yod/ /yang dag mthu chen sus ma byas/ /rang la rang gis bcings par zad/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /snying po yod pa ma yin te/ /sgyu ma mig yor
sprul pa dang / /smig rgyu 'ja' tshon chu zla'i tshul/ /de ltar gang gis rab rtogs pa/ /de nyid sangs rgyas yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas la gnas pa yin/ /skye med phun sum
tshogs yin te/ /byed med pa yi mchog kyang rdzogs/ /zhes nyid la nyid brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ bzhugs gnas khang pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mi 'chi ba'i rdo rje sgrub pa 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje zhing chen bsgrub 'dod pas/ /thams cad skye shi med pa'i tshul/ /mnyam
nyid dag pa nyid du bsgom/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yis/ /dzaHhUM baM hos dgug par bya/ /bdag dang khro bo gnyis med par/ /yang nas yang du bsgrub par bya/ /sku rnams
gsal bar gyur pa dang / /zhing chen 'og tu gzhug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus der bkod nas/ /khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /mngags pa'i pho nya phyogs
bcur gtang / /thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud/ /sgrub pa gcig gam yang na gnyis/ /gsum dang lnga ru bsgom par bya/ /pho nya mang pos nri bkug nas/ /zhing la yang nas yang du
gzhug /snar dang ser dang mdog snum 'byung / /de nas bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /lan grangs 'bum phrag mang por ni/ /bzlas pa'i tshul yang rnam gsum dag /rdo rje sngags
bzlas rtse mo gsum/ /de yi bar nas bzlas pa 'byung / /'od zer lnga dang ldan par bya/ /zhing de ldem ldem por gyur dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis bskul bar bya/ /de nas yi ge 'bru lnga
dgod| |gsal zhing 'tshe bar bsgom par bya/ /dbang po lnga dang dbang po'i tshul/ /yan lag lnga la rigs lnga'i tshul/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis bsgom/ /de nas zhing de 'gul 'gyur
nas| |zhing de drag tu 'gul ba dang / /shin tu zhags pas bsdam par bya/ /yan lag rnams kyang gzhum par bya/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu thod pa bstan/ /ha ya gri ba'i skur bsgoms
shing / /sngags ni 'bum phrag mang du bzlas/ /phyogs bcur spro zhing zhing la bstim/ /de nas zhing de drag 'gul nas/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis ni/ /brtan pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /de
nas par par byed pa dang / /a nri pre du gang yin pa/ /rdo rje drag tu brdeg cing dbab/ /thod pa'i kha nas nri phyung nas/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin so yis bcad/ /rdo rje sngags zos khong du bstim/ /gnyis
su med par bsgom par bya/ /de nas zhing de langs pa dang / /rdo rje dbyings nas dbang yang bskur/ /bdud rtsi chu yang blud par bya/ /las rnams thams cad byed du
gzhug /zhing des rab tu smras pa'i tshig /dpa' bo ci bgyi mi rgas skye med chos rnams dang / /las rnams ma lus kun bgyid do/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis/ /thal ba
thams cad sos par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa'i sa ni dur khrod dang / /ri brag gnyan po bgegs gnas dang / /nags khrod stong pa tsher ma can/ /ri bos bskor ba'i lcug ma can/ /rab tu rnam
par dben pa dang / /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung ba'i gnas/ /de dag tu ni bsgrub par bya/ /dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu gsum dang / /bcu drug man chad bsgrub par bya/ /the tshom med par
'grub par 'gyur/ /phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams/ /lam lnga'i zhing dang sman lngar bcas/ /'bru rnams thams cad bcang bar bya/ /rtag tu tshogs chen mchod par bya/ /gsum dang lnga ru
bar mi gcod/ /kha zas rnams kyang thod par bza'/ /btung ba dag kyang de bzhin te/ /mar me rtag par gtang bar bya/ /rgyu ni nri yi mar las bya/ /yan lag bsku ba yang de bzhin to/ /
sdong bu pad+ma'i rgyu las bya/ /gnod ni dung chen srubs med pa/ /lcang lo yod dang med kyang rung / /de byi pu tra ma byung ba/ /mdog ni ban lang can la yod/ /rdo rje sgrub pa bar gcod phyir//
rtag tu mtshams ni gcad par bya/ /nri yi rkang pa g.yas g.yon nas/ /sbom po ma yin phra ba nyid/ /de la ki la ya byas nas/ /phur bu'i sngags dang khro sngags kyis/ /lan 'bum du ni
bzlas pa bya/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon thal sor la/ /khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu/ /'od 'bar gzungs kyi sku ru bsgom/ /de nas gnyis med sbyor tshul du/ /sgrub po rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /
sgrub pa dngos la ma gtogs pa/ /phyogs bcu rnams su mtshams kyang gcad/ /dngos grub ma thob bar du ni/ /bsgom dang bzlas dang phyag rgya gsum/ /bag yod mgo la me
'bar bzhin/ /bar mtshams med par bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis/ /lha ma srin rnams bran bzhin 'khol/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dbang du sdud/ /
rdo rje rigs mchog 'khor rkyen rnams/ /yid bzhin du ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag ni/ /lus sbed nus nas mngon du dbyung / /de ma yin par shin tu gsang /
sku'i sgrub pa nges pa'i don du bka' stsal to/ /ro langs sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// //gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bro gar rtse 'jo bro gar gyi dam
tshig ces bya ba nges par ched du brjod do/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas dus bzhi yi/ /thams cad dbyer med maN+Dal la'i/ /nyi zla shar ba'i gzhal yas la/ /pad+ma chags med gdan
bting nas/ /rin chen zad med pho brang sa/ /che chung dpag tu med pa yi/ /byang chub bde ldan dkyil 'khor la/ /bde ldan byang chub rab bkod nas/ /ma
lus kun bsdus dbyings bsdus te/ /lus bskyod yan lag bskul bsigs dang / /dbang po lnga yi lta spyod kun/ /phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad/ /gong gi dkyil
'khor tshad nyi zla/ /mi 'khrugs pa yis gzhi la/ /pad+ma ma chags gdan bting nas/ /thabs dang shes rab chags med tshul/ /yan lag dbang po thams cad kun
rang bzhin yongs su dag pa dang / /ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs lnga'o/ /ye nas ma bcings yongs kyis te/ /lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dbu la de
bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor/ /yan lag bzhi la rigs bzhi 'khor/ /kha dog dbyibs dang phyag rgya dang / /thabs dang shes rab gsal bsgoms te/ /phyogs bcur spro zhing
ngan song sbyong / /gnas su bsdu zhing dkyil 'khor spro/ /'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/ /bder gshegs zhing du rnam par sbyor/ /yan lag chen po lnga bskyod na/ /
rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor ma lus g.yo/ /'gro lnga byang chub lam du mdzad/ /snyigs ma lnga yang rnam par dag /bzang mdzes legs pa'i gos bgos na/ /'od zer
sna tshogs 'phro bar 'gyur/ /de nas mthar thug med pa'i bar/ /ye shes lnga yis brgyan par 'gyur/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor de ltar bsgom/ /tshig
tsam ma yin blo gting du/ /bdag dang dbyer med nyid du'o/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur nas/ /shar gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/ /seng+ge'i stabs chen mchong bar bya/ /ljags kyi
yi ge traM bsgoms la/ /lce ni 'bum phrag bsam yas dang / /hrI yang bsam gyis mi khyab spro/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar ba/ /
gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu grags/ /sgra dang ming tshig so sor gsal/ /ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas gsungs/ /thar dang ma thar
gnyi ga brjod/ /nges pa kho na yang dag tu/ /de bzhin nyid kyis yong ma gsungs/ /sna yi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /traM gi yig 'bru gsal bsgoms nas/ /dkyil 'khor
phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi/ /mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /traM yang bsam pas 'od 'phro 'bar/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ma lus thos/ /'gro drug 'khor ba'i
gnas kyang thos/ /sgra yang thos pa gnyis med pa'o/ /de bzhin dri dang ro reg rnams/ /so so'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas/ /yig 'bru'i snying po de bzhin dgod/ /sangs
rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang / /'gro drug ma lus thams cad kun/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rol/ /dri la sogs pa bde mchog gis/ /kun la tshim par yang dag mchog /'gro drug ma
lus thams cad la/ /ji ltar 'tsham pa'i don yang byed/ /thabs mkhas thugs rjes de ltar ston/ /de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs/ /ma chags la sogs shes rab ldan/ /
gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms te/ /chom bu gcig gam yang na gsum/ /lnga yi dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te/ /thabs dang shes rab phan tshun
du| |lha gsal 'od 'phro bstims byas te/ /dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom/ /ting 'dzin shin tu gsal gyur nas/ /bdag dang phyogs bcu dbyer med par/ /gnyis
su med par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis/ /lta spyod ya char ma gyur par/ /dkyil 'khor dag la gsal bsgoms na/ /dbus nas shar phyogs kha
bstan nas/ /rkang pa'i stabs chen bskyod byas shing / /lag gi 'du byed kun bskyod nas/ /bro dang gar gyi phyag rgyar bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'od zer dkar 'phro ba/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rnam par dag /shin tu gsal dang 'od zer 'bar/ /thabs dang shes rab de grub shog /cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yis/ /bdud bzhi dag ni 'joms par byed/ /theg
mchog rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin pa/ /thabs dang shes rab de grub shog /bdag nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal med par shog /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /thabs
dang shes rab gsal gyur shog /nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas/ /ma rig mun pa med par byed/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer nyi shar bas/ /thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar
shog /shin tu sra zhing skye shi med/ /rdo rje'i thugs rje rol ston pa/ /'gro la thugs rje yongs kyis 'byung / /thabs dang shes rab byams ldan shog /thabs dang shes rab ldan
gyur pas/ /yon tan phyogs su kha bstan te/ /lus bskyod yan lag bsgul bsigs nas/ /stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung ba'i gter/ /zad
med nor bu rin po che/ /ma lus kun gyi re ba skong / /thabs dang shes rab de grub shog /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdog bstan pa/ /yang na thams cad gser btso ma/ /dkyil 'khor
bsam yas zad mi shes/ /thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ yon tan rin chen bsam yas kyang / /thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang gnas nas/ /de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes
te| |thabs dang shes rab mnyam gyur shog /bder gshegs yon tan rmad po che/ /ye nas chags med byang chub zhing / /yang dag nyid du thams cad gnas/ /thabs dang shes rab
myur grub shog /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/ /nub phyogs su ni kha bltas nas/ /yan lag dang po bskyod byas te/ /gar rnams shin tu gsal
byas nas/ /stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya/ /chos rnams ma lus kun spyod kyang / /pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /thabs dang shes
rab de grub shog /las dang nyon mongs nub gyur pa'i/ /bag chags mtshan ma rdul tsam med/ /thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog /byang chub chags med dkyil 'khor
ni| |gang nas ma 'ongs nyid kyi dbyings/ /mi gnas tshul gyis dbyings na bzhugs/ /thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/ /byang
phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /lus bskyod yan lag gar byed cing / /phyag rgya so sor gsal gyur nas/ /rkang pa'i stabs chen brdung bar bya/ /yang dag rtogs pa'i shes
rab kyis/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /sgrib pa thams cad byang byas nas/ /thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /
bdud bzhi bcom nas mi mthun bsal/ /bya byed med la don rnams grub/ /thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog /thams cad ma lus rdzogs byed pa/ /sna tshogs
kun tu 'gyur pa'o/ /ljang gu'i tshul du mdog bstan pa/ /thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog /thams cad ma lus don grub pa/ /las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed/ /nan
tan chen po bya ba rdzogs/ /thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ sdug bsngal dra ba tshar bcad de/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus kun byas kyang / /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/
thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog /bder gshegs ma lus thams cad kun/ /phyogs dus kun tu bdag nyid che/ /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /ma lus
kun 'dus rnam par dag /thabs chen dkyil 'khor yang dag pas/ /bder gshegs kun la rnam par 'phro/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /bde ba'i dkyil 'khor
mkhas pas bsdu/ /thams cad ma lus rigs bzhi yi/ /nang du ma lus gang yang med/ /de nyid bde gshegs dkyil 'khor nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab bde grub shog /
rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dbur bsdu zhing / /ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phro/ /phyogs bcu gsal bar gang gyur nas/ /thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog /de bzhin rigs
mchog 'dzin pa yi/ /thams cad ma lus dbyings bsdus te/ /thams cad kun tu bzang por ston/ /thabs dang shes rab gtsor grub shog /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//
phyogs dus gnas pa ma lus la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor/ /thabs dang shes rab mchog grub shog /'gro ba ma lus thams cad la/ /de
bzhin nyid kyi sku yod pas/ /ma mthong rmongs la nam mkha'i mdog /thabs dang shes rab dbyings grub shog /sku ni sna tshogs cir yang snang / /thabs chen rnams la
mnyam pa'i tshul/ /nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul/ /rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul/ /pha rol phyin rdzogs shAkya'i tshul/ /lha mi rnams la dge bcu tshul//
dud 'gro rnams la en ya/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la/ /ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du ston/ /de lta bu yi sku ston pa/ /thabs dang shes rab sku grub shog /
thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms nas/ /rgyan lnga yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /yan lag lnga la dkyil 'khor bkod/ /ye shes rgyan gyis pho brang brdung / /gnyis med
dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul/ /mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /lhun grub tshogs chen byang chub tu/ /thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog /chos dbyings
dam pa bdag med pa/ /mi dmigs dbyings su ma lus 'dus/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med pas/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyings grub shog /bde gshegs
dkyil 'khor dbu bskyod na/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus g.yo/ /lag gi 'du byed bskul bskyod na/ /rig 'dzin zhing khams dag bar byed/ /rkang chen dag gis stabs
'chongs na/ /'gro drug gnas rnams stongs par byed/ /spyan gyis phyogs bcu blta byas na/ /bdud bzhi dpung rnams pham par byed/ /thabs dang shes rab ma lus kun/ /de
lta bu yi don grub shog /thams cad ma lus de bzhin te/ /de ni gang yang mi dmigs la/ /skye dang 'gag dang gnas pa dang / /'ong dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med/ /rnal 'byor bro gar rtse 'jo
yis| |sna tshogs byed la byas pa med/ /de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /rnal 'byor las rnams grub par shog /thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis/ /de lta bu yis longs spyod na//
sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/ /srid gsum 'gro rnams thams cad las/ /dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/ /lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa/ /yun ring chos kyi
