bde spyad nas/ /bla med rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /dpe byad mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen/ /tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol//
sangs rgyas zhing la dbang sgyur te/ /spyod yul kun tu maN+Dal la/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ /'di lta bu yi las rnams bya/ /
'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang / /lus ngag yid la dbang thob nas/ /sangs rgyas 'byung dang dkar mi 'gyur/ /theg pa dman par yong mi byed/ /ngan song
gsum du yong mi ltung / /gnas ngan longs spyod mi bde ba'i/ /ngan pa'i sa ru yong mi ltung / /rdo rje theg mchog brjed mi 'gyur/ /tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /lus byad bzang
zhing yan lag rdzogs/ /dbang po tshang zhing lhag chad med/ /skad gdangs snyan zhing 'gro don byed/ /bdag gi longs spyod thams cad kun/ /gzhan la gnod pa med par 'grub/ /
tshan po che yi mthu stobs ldan/ /'gro ba'i don du yang dag byed/ /gzhan la gnod pa yongs mi byed/ /snying rje che zhing shes rab ldan/ /mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pa/ /bdag
dang gzhan don rdzogs par spyod/ /mthar ni skye shi med pa'i sa/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che/ /bkod pa'i gzhal yas thams cad la/ /dbang sgyur spyod pa'i dngos
grub thob/ /rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di 'dra'i don/ /ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni/ /gsang don nges pa'i don ston pa/ /bla med mchog tu grub par shog /dbyer med byang
chub thor tshugs can/ /shin tu bstan pa'i ri bo gnas/ /mu stegs rlung gis tshugs mi 'gyur/ /theg mchog rdo rje de lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor mi zad 'byung ba'i gter/ /yid
bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /byi dor ma byas shin tu gsal/ /bskal pa grangs med gnas bcas kyang / /sku ni shin tu gzhon pa'i tshul/ /skye shi med pa rdo rje yi/ /thams cad 'byung
ba'i gter yin te/ /yon tan phun sum tshogs dang ldan/ /bla med byang chub grub gyur nas/ /ye shes rdo rje lhun grub shog /tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs gyur cig /thams
cad kun gyi ston pa po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes/ /sangs rgyas zhing la dbang byed shog /de rtogs kun kyang rdo rje'i rigs/ /sku gsung thugs kyang grub par
shog /rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab ldan pa rnams kyis dus thams cad 'dod yon lnga spyod cing bro thabs bya'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ bro
gar rtse 'jo'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ste 'di skad
ces gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings ldan pas/ /sgyu dang dra ba 'brel gyur nas/ /sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang bas/ /mthun pa'i rdo rje rang snang ngo / /rgyud drug 'khor ba'i
lus snang ba/ /rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo / /de bzhin sku mchog dri bral dang / /bder gshegs sku lngar mdor bsdus te/ /bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub
gzugs/ /bla med gzugs dang rdo rje sku/ /de la sogs de sku bsam yas/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku ston pa/ /thabs kyis 'gro 'dul
sku ston te/ /byang chub mchog gi rdo rje sku/ /chags med zhing du sku ston cing / /dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du snang / /sku snang de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/ /rnam dag
sku ston ma yin te/ /log 'gro rtog pa thams cad la/ /so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston/ /de tshe skye shi med pa'i sku/ /las dang ma chags pad+ma'i sku/ /thar dang mthar
sna tshogs kyis/ /sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med/ /snang dang mi snang gnyi ga med/ /de ltar rtog pa'i rigs mchog ni/ /badzra zhes ni gdags pa yin/ /ji snyed sku ston
bsam yas pa/ /thams cad ma lus rdo rje bsdus/ /'khor lo zhes kyang brjod pa ni/ /de la sogs te sku bsam yas/ /byang chub thabs kyi dkyil nas byung / /sku ni sna
tshogs thams cad kyang / /'ja' tshon chu zla 'dra shes na/ /dbyings nyid las ni dbyings snang zad/ /thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor snang / /gsung nyid sku yi dkyil
'khor te/ /dbyer med de bzhin yong gis so/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'grub 'dod pas/ /rtag tu dus gsum thams cad du/ /bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med pas/ /ye nas
dkyil 'khor yin par brtag /'di ni dngos grub mchog yin par/ /kun tu rgyal gyis de skad bshad/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du
phyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u sku'i dkyil 'khor zab tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma las bshad de/ bod la ma 'gyur zhes 'byung ngo / /rang bzhin sku'i dkyil 'khor du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bdun
cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par sbyar zhing dngos grub myur du len pa'i thabs dra ba las
'di skad ces gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub ni/ /mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin te/ /ma bcos ji bzhin ngang bzhag dang / /lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil
'khor 'byung / /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na/ /ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub/ /spyod yul thams cad maN+Dal la/ /ye shes
dkyil 'khor thar byed skyong / /longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing / /ji ltar 'dod pa smon pas 'grub/ /yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni/ /phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag /dag rtogs
nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin/ /de nas rdo rje mnyam yin no/ /dngos grub myur du 'grub 'dod na/ /shin tu phra zhing zab par bsgom/ /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/ /shin tu mi
dmigs dbyings su bsgom/ /ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang / /thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang / /sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya/ /de bzhin yang nas yang
goms nas/ /de nas phra mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu/ /gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste/ /spyir ni gang bsgom kun tu 'dra/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du
'du| |yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid/ /yi ge hUM du shin tu bsdu/ /nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par/ /yang nas yang du 'dris pa dang / /'od zer mang po 'phro bar bya/ /
phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba dang / /slar yang hUM la bstim par bya/ /hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su thim/ /thim 'gyur dbyings nas a dkar 'bar/ /shin tu 'tsher bar gsal
bsgoms la/ /thams cad a ru gyur par bsgom/ /de bzhin nyid du 'dris 'gyur nas/ /a las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spro/ /e ma gsal bar 'byor gyur nas/ /nyi zla gang ba'i nyi zlar
bsgom| |hrI gsal pad+ma chags med bsgom/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom/ /nyi zla gdan dang gzhal yas khang / /thams cad bsdu zhing phra bar bsgom/ /de bzhin
yi ge hUM gnas pas/ /mthing ga 'tsher la gnas pa yi/ /'od zer 'phro ba rnam par bsgom/ /'od 'phro dbyings su slar bsdus nas/ /shin tu rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bar bsgom/ /
rdo rje 'od 'phro gsal 'bar nas/ /dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya/ /de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur nas/ /shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgom/ /de bzhin gnyis med gsal gyur nas/ /
sku gcig rdo rje dril bur bsgom/ /de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang / /dbu gsum phyag drug nyid du bsgom/ /gzhan yang khro 'dul sna tshogs bsgom/ /blo yi shes rab che chung las/ /rim
pa bzhin du bsgom par bya/ /yang na gcig car bsgom par bya/ /nyi zla gza' skar dus gcig tu/ /chu dkyil dwangs par gsal ba bzhin/ /de ltar goms rtogs rigs mchog des/ /ji
ltar dbang bsgyur bzhin du 'grub/ /mkha' la 'phyo dang rig 'dzin gnas/ /chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul/ /ri brag la sogs thogs med 'dzul/ /chu la mi 'bying mes mi chig /
dug dang mtshon gyis 'jig mi 'gyur/ /mi snang ba dang mang por sprul/ /gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /lha srin rnams la dbang ba sgyur zhing / /tshe dang dus la bsring bstung
dang / /stong gsum yungs 'brur bskyed pa dang / /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pa rnams/ /khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /bdud
dang gdug pa la sogs pas/ /tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur/ /lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa/ /ye shes bsod nams longs spyod kyis/ /yi ge 'khor
lo tshogs mchog brnyes/ /thugs rje sprul pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston/ /'gro ba ma lus don yang byed/ /las rnams thams cad
kun byas nas/ /skye 'chi med pa'i g.yung drung thob/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen lnga/ /mthar phyin bya ba med pa 'grub/ /bsgrub med
spang med chos kyi dbyings/ /'gro med 'ong med de bzhin nyid/ /de ltar bsgrubs te bsgoms byas nas/ /'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang / /tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du/ /las
ngan kun tu skye mi 'gyur/ /theg pa dman par yong mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra
ba las/ shin tu gsang bar bya ba rgyud dngos grub thob par bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
hom rnams kyi 'phrin las 'di gsungs so/ /dang por de bzhin nyid du gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom/ de nas bdag gi snying gar a gsal zhing 'tsher ba gcig bsgom mo/ /a
de shin tu gsal bar gyur pa dang phyogs bcur 'od du 'phros par bsgom/ 'od de slar a la bsdu zhing bstim/ ma dang a las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bstim zhing
'tsher la gsal bar bsgom/ /hrI las pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/ hUM shin tu 'od 'bar bar bsgom/ snying gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa' tshon gang ba gcig
phyag rgya dang bcas par bsgom/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang / yig 'bru dang / phyag rgya yang gsal bar bzlas/ 'bru gsum dang 'bru lnga yang bzlas/ 'dug 'bru bzhis
mtshams gcad/ rtag tu hom bya/ tshogs dang mchod pa yang bya/ mang po mi nus pa'i don tu hom gang bgyi yang rung / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtso bor spyi ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'

drag po yang rdo rje/ dbang pad+ma he ru ka /rgyas pa rat+na he ru ka /zhi ba bud+d+ha he ru ka /spyan drang ba ni/ e h+ye hi mahA kA ru Ni ka zhes hom gang byed pa'i lha gtso bo nas spyan drang / mchod
pa dang / ar+g+haM dbul ba ni/ drag po'i mgor ni sngags ril hUM/ zhi ba la mgor ril aM/ bar ma rnams la yang de bzhin sbyar/ spyan drang ba ni/ gang mdzad pa'i gtso bo nas zhi la
shAn+tiM bsnan/ spyi la so so rang sngags rdzogs/ drag po lho/ dbang nub/ rgyas pa byang / zhi ba shar/ spyi gang yang rung gru gsum dang thod pa kha gdangs so/ /zla gam dang / pad+ma dang / chags

med do| |phyag rgya rnam pa bdun la phyag rgya chen po dang / chos nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge
'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ ho ma rnam bzhi'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga mdo 'di ltar yang bshad de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/ /
thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang nyid du/ /dbyings su ro gcig de bsdus te/ /don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/ /yon tan mchog gi 'dod pa ni/ /snang srid ma lus thams
cad kun/ /mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyor bas na/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul du spyod/ /'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam/ /byang chub mchog tu 'gro ba'i gnas/ /bde chen mi
zad gter du 'gyur/ /cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'dod chags ni/ /lus dang zas kyis bsgribs 'gyur te/ /yi dwags gnas nas gnas
su 'gro/ /skom dang bkres pas nyon mongs 'gyur/ /rnag khrag ngan skyug rtag tu mthong / /bde ba spyod pa'i dbang yang med/ /rtsub cing gdug pas srung bar 'gyur/ /thugs rje
chen bo'i zhe sdang ni/ /'khor ba'i mya ngan sgo bcad cing / /bde gshegs lam du 'dzud par byed/ /yang dag don dang ldan par 'gyur/ /thugs rjes tshul gyis khro ston zhing / /shin
tu mnyam pa'i ngang du 'jug /rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba yis/ /yang dag mchog gi /bde ba 'grub/ /ye shes gsal ba'i bde ba ni/ /bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med de/ /rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings
su rol/ /thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngang / /kun tu khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /shin tu 'od gsal ba rnam dag lam/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa sbyong / /sems can nyon mongs dug sel
'gyur| |thams cad zhing sbyong nga rgyal ni/ /yon tan bskyed pa'i mdzod yin te/ /nga med bdag med mi dmigs la/ /su zhig de la nga rgyal bskyed/ /dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i/ /shin tu rgyal
ba'i khyu mchog 'grub/ /lha srin bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob/ /phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba/ /nga dang bdag med don rtogs na/ /dog dang yangs pa
gnyis med de/ /bde mchog dkyil 'khor yangs pa 'grub/ /phrag dog dngos po mi shes shing / /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin gyur na/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye/ /de nas yi dwags gnas
su 'gro/ /gal te yul sa rnyed gyur na/ /shin tu mi bde dog par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang longs spyod thams cad la/ /dbang byar med cing gzhan dbang 'gyur/ /mdor na nyon mongs sdug
bsngal 'grub/ /phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni/ /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / /phyin ci log la phrag dog ste/ /thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor/ /bde ba mchog kyang 'grub
par 'gyur/ /gnyis med don yang rtogs par 'grub/ /nga med bdag med dbyings su thim/ /lhun grub don mchog 'grub par 'gyur/ /yid la lha ni rtag
bsgoms na/ /rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa yi/ /bdag gis kun tu dbang bsgyur te/ /rig 'dzin gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs kyis bsgrub bya ba/ /sgrol dang sbyor bas
mthar phyin 'gyur/ /sbyor ba nyid ni sgrol ba yin/ /rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor sgrol dang / /sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba yin/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor sgrol dang / /dbang po'i yul dus
sbyor sgrol dang / /thabs chen dag gi sbyor sgrol dang / /mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo/ /yang na sbyor sgrol bdag la sogs/ /shes rab dbyings dang bdag tu sbyor/ /thabs
chen sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /dbyings dang dbyings su thams cad sgrol/ /rol pa'i 'phrin las bsam mi khyab/ /thugs rje sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /sbyor sgrol 'phrin
las bdag la rdzogs/ /byang chub sems sprul phyogs bcur 'phro/ /ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed/ /rig 'dzin bde ldan thob par byed/ /bla med zhing rnams dag
par byed/ /sku gsum lhun grub phyogs bcur 'dul/ /rdo rje zhes ni mtshan bsgrags te/ /theg dman rnams kyang rdo rjer dgod/ /zad mi shes pa'i gter yang 'grub/ /
rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku/ /thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog /thugs rje sprul pa dpag med kyis/ /'gro drug dus gnas ma lus
mkhyen| |'gro ba nyid na nyid kyi sku/ /nyon mongs byang chub lam du mkhyen/ /'khor ba nyid ni bde gnas so/ /chos kyi dbyings dang sems can mtha'/ /dbyer med yang dag nyid du'o/ /rgyud kyi
rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga 'di ltar yang bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu
'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa 'di nyid las ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /spros pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs rje'i dang / /dmyal ba'i gnas
rnams tshar gcod pa'i/ /brgyad gnyis bcu drug zhing du sbyor/ /tsha ba rnams la bsil ba'i sman/ /grang ba rnams la dro ba'i sman/ /bsil dro 'jam rtsub cha snyoms pa/ /thugs rje'i
byin rlabs de ltar ston/ /byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che/ /chags pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya/ /ji ltar
bde ba'i ro myong zhing / /myong tshor nyid na rang bzhin med/ /chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/ /yi dwags gnas rnams tshar gcod cing / /lus dang zas kyis bsgribs pa yi/ /nyon mongs
gnyi ga med par ston/ /gti mug ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nga dang bdag med gnyis med pa'i/ /shes rab chen po'i 'od gsal gyis/ /dran smra med pa'i
sdug bsngal bsal/ /rmongs med sgrib pa dag par byas/ /ye shes gsal ba'i thugs rje yis/ /bya byed med par nyon mongs sgrol/ /byol song gnas ni stongs byed cing / /thugs
rje'i sgron ma de ltar ston/ /phrag dog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yangs pa chen po'i ye shes kyis/ /nga dang bdag 'dzin rnams la ni/ /thugs rjes gnyis med mnyam sbyor zhing /
dog dang yangs pa gnyi ga med/ /rgya chen yangs pa'i blo ldan pas/ /'di la mi chud gang yang med/ /thams cad yangs pa nyid du sbyor/ /lha ma yin rnams stongs par byed//
nga rgyal bde mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye nas chos nyid mnyam pa la/ /nga dang khyod ces bya ba med/ /thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste/ /gnyis med mtshan nyid
bsnan du med/ /che chung med pa'i ngang yin pas/ /bya ba dag ni med par bstan/ /nga rgyal bdag med rtogs pa yis/ /drags pa'i gnas rnams stongs par byed/ /rang
bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa/ /ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag/ so so'i mtshan nyid gzhig byas na/ /rang bzhin med
de yang dag nyid/ /rang byung chen po'i ye shes kyis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor/ /ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal/ /ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing / /nyid kyi dkyil
'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang bzhin nyid la gnas pa yi/ /sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid du sbyor/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /rang byung
ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis/ /ma lus de bzhin nyid du sdud/ /sdud dang mi sdud gnyi ga med/ /yang dag kho na nyid du'o/ /bde ba'i ngang nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad ma
lus rnam par dag /nyid kyi dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/ /bde dang mi bde gnyi ga med/ /thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste/ /ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang btsan par/ /yang dag nyid
kyis de skad gsungs/ /bshad dang nyan pa'ang gnyi ga med/ /de bzhin nyid du gnyi ga 'du/ /dus bzhi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gong na med pa'i ye shes mchog
thams cad kun la dbang sgyur te/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor/ /'das dang ma 'das thams cad dang / /'byung dang 'byung bar ma nges pa'i/ /ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis//
dus bzhi snga phyi med pa yi/ /mnyam pa nyid du lhan ner sbyor/ /lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /thams cad dbyer med byang chub ste/ /ye
nas rnam par dag pa'i chos/ /ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa yi/ /byang chub lam chen 'di yen te/ /thams cad dbyer med nyid du 'dus/ /byang chub don grub ye nas
rdzogs| |mnyam pa'i zhing du thams cad thim/ /rdo rje skye gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ theg pa che mchog rigs su nges/ /rigs te byang chub bstan pas gzung / /thams cad
mnyam pa'i dbyings shes nas/ /rigs mchog kun gyi skye gnas yin/ /skyes pa nyid na skyes pa med/ /las dang las kyi bag chags med/ /cis kyang mgos thams cad
'joms| |skye shi med pa'i sa yang yin/ /byang chub kyi zhing bkod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i/ /snang grags bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//
phyi dang nang gi gnas pa dag /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su thim/ /mdor na zhing khams ma lus par/ /yon tan rin chen bkod pa yi/ /ye shes rgyan gyis spros pa rnams//
zhing de yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes bzhugs gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /gsang
sngags chen po grub 'dod pas/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes thob/ /chos kyi dbyings gnas sems can ni/ /gnyis med de bzhin nyid du gcig /de ltar rtogs pa'i
skyes bu ni/ /rdo rje bzhugs gnas yin par bshad/ /mi 'jigs pa'i rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rnam par byang dang nyon mongs gnyis/ /so so yod pa ma yin te/ /nyon
mongs gnyen pos bcos su med/ /thams cad dbyings su ro gcig pas/ /de la gnas pa'i gnyen po med/ /cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med/ /mchog tu bde ba'i zhing yang yin/ /nga med bdag
med rgyal ba'i mchog /gzhal yas khang brtan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kun/ /rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor ba ni/ /dog yangs tshad kyang dpag tu med/ /sangs
rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan/ /ye shes rgyu las grub pa'o/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /zag pa zad las grub pa yi/ /nam yang 'jigs med chos kyi dbyings/ /sna tshogs
kun sbyor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gdol pa can gyi chos min pas/ /ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du 'grub/ /rig pa rang dbang gyur pas na/ /stong par bya ba'am mi stong bya/ /thams
cad dbyer med dang yin pas/ /kha dog dbyings dang rin po che/ /thams cad khyab par yungs 'bru'i tshul/ /bsam yas mtha' dbus med pa'o/ /'dren byed gnas stobs zhes bya
ba'i dam tshig ni/ ma rig log rtog bsam yas kyis/ /'jig rten khams rnams bsam yas pa/ /'khor ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma/ /
yang dag byang chub sems rig na/ /ma rig rgyu 'bras rnam par dag /nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste/ /thams cad ma lus bde gnas so/ /lam lnga ston byed
ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgoms byas te/ /nyon mongs lam lnga'i sgo bkag nas/ /lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog yin/ /rtog dang mi rtog gnyi ga med/ /
gnyis med de ni yang dag lam/ /thabs dang shes rab dang nyid du/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag rtogs bya zhing / /bla na med pa ston par bya/ /yang dag don ston zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/
theg pa bsam yas ston pa yang / /de bzhin nyid kyis ma brjod kyang / /sems can blo yi rim pa bzhin/ /so sor 'tsham par kun la gsal/ /'di ni rdo rje theg mchog ste/ /
rgya mtsho klung du chu 'bab bzhin/ /thams cad chu yi ngo bo nyid/ /theg pa thams cad rdo rje'i sa rab tu rtogs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab blo chen rab ldan pas/ /
don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/ /srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su/ /thugs rje snyoms par bsam mi khyab/ /don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston/ /mi mthun zhags pa
'khor ba gcod/ /bder gshegs zhing rnams dag par byed/ /thams cad dbyings su dag par 'dus/ /sgyur byed byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang rig ye shes
dbang thob nas/ /dkar po tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin/ /dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang / /de bzhin byang chub dug gsum ste/ /'gro lnga byang chub lam du sbyor/ /nyon mongs sdug
bsngal thar byed lam/ /thar dang ma thar gnyis med na/ /thams cad ma lus byang chub rgyu/ /mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye shes sgyu mar snang ba dang / /log rtog
sgyu mar snang ba gnyis/ /sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin mnyam/ /mnyam pa nyid na mi gnas pa'i/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te/ /ye shes gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /
theg mchog rdo rje ma lus rdzogs/ /dpe byad bzang po dpag tu med/ /thams cad dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shin tu rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis/ /spyod yul thams cad
smon na mkhyen/ /de bzhin nyid dang kun rtog la/ /gnyis su med pas dbang bsgyur te/ /ma lus thams cad bde ldan zhing / /thams cad byang chub mchog tu 'gyur/ /ye nas dngos po med
pa la| |ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /rig 'dzin gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab rnam gsum goms byas nas/ /ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te/ /rtag tu
yangs pa chen po bsgom/ /rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs pa yi/ /rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste/ /tshe ni bcu dang drug pa yin/ /brgya brgya dag tu bsnur zhing gnas/ /lus ma bor
bar sangs rgyas pa'o/ /zad med gter ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab chen po rnam dag pas/ /spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /shes dang
spyod yul gnyis su med/ /de bzhin nyid du ro gcig ste/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing sbyor bas/ /zad med rin chen gter du 'gyur/ /mi zad par ldan dam tshig mchog /'og
min mtha' dbus bsam mi khyab/ /bsgrub med mnyam rdzogs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rang byung ye shes 'phyo ba yi/ /dbyings dang
rig pa gnyis med pa'i/ /de bzhin nyid de rdo rje'i rigs/ /thams cad gnyis su med pa la/ /bsgrub dang sgrub pa yod ma yin/ /ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la/ /de la lam gyis bcos
su med/ /thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ye dag gyur pa yang / /phyin ci log gi blo log nas/ /log rtog gnas na longs spyod pa/ /ma rig
'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab/ /'khrul rtog ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas/ /nyon mongs 'dren cing mtho ris gnas/ /byang chub lam chen
rtogs par ston/ /gsung mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /ming dang tshig tu btags nas ston/ /ji snyed mang po'i don brjod
kyang / /rdo rje gsung la spos pa med/ /spros med de ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /kun tu brda 'jal ye shes gsung / /sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/ /thams cad pad+ma chags med pa'o/ /bsgyur
ba zad med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/ /snang srid ma lus thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid kyis dbang bsgyur te/ /thams cad ye shes dbyings su bstim/ /
zad med ye shes gter ldan pas/ /thugs rje byin rlabs bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten 'das ngang 'jig rten pa'i/ /so sor don rtogs rnam par dag /thams cad skad 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig
ni| thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag dang / /'gro drug dus gnas ma lus la/ /gsung gcig tshig tu ma brjod kyang / /sngon gyi thugs rje byin rlabs kyis/ /thar dang ma thar gnyi ga la/ /
so so ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /chos kyi gsung mchog dam pa yis/ /thar pa bskul zhing ngan song sbyong / /rang rig dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs dus bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /de
na ji snyed yod pa yis/ /mtshan ma sna tshogs brtags pa yang / /rang rig rnam par rtogs pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /
sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang / /ye shes sprul par dag pa'i yul/ /yi ge med 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yi ge tshig dang sgra spangs pa'i/ /brjod med ngang du gnas pa ni/ /
gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi/ /chos rnams thams cad ye nas dag /thams cad thugs su gyur pas na/ /sgra dang tshig la gnas pa min/ /thugs
la thugs ni me gnas pa'o/ /bdud sde tshar gcod ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag /phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas/ /bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor
te| |skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gnas/ /bdud bzhi bcom pa'i skyes mchog gis/ /dregs pa chen po thams cad bcom/ /ma rig log 'dren 'dul bcad de/ /chos kyi
dbyangs su thams cad thim/ /stong gsum kun grags zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ /'gro ba'i 'phrin
las bsam mi khyab/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang / /lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi/ /thams cad gdul bya chud ma zos/ /ngan song sbyong zhing byang chub zhing / /ye shes
rdzogs chen kun tu ston/ /ye shes gsung mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/ /yang dag shes pas rab brtags na/ /rang bzhin med la cir
yang snang / /snang ba nyid na dbyings nyid de/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes ni/ /kun la dbang sgyur rang dbang can/ /thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar snang / /'di ni ye shes gsung mchog yin

bsam yas ye shes rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab/ /khyab dang khyab med rdo rje'i gsung / /sgra skad sna tshogs bsgrags pa
dang / /dngos po med la dngos po'i sgra/ /ji ltar pi wang lag thogs na/ /sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur yang / /dngos po med pa de bzhin nyid/ /phyogs dus dbyer med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs
bcu ma lus thams cad dang / /dus bzhir 'byung ba ma lus kun/ /phyogs dang snga phyi med pa yi/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /so sor snang ba thams
cad kun/ /rang rig rgyal por yang dag 'du/ /rang rig de nyid thams cad yin/ /'jigs med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas yin/ /'dus byas snang dang mi
snang gnyi ga min/ /yod dang med pa'ang dbyer med de/ /rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yi/ /ma bcos ma byas dang gis gsal/ /'jig dang gzhig par bya ba min/ /cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i
bdag /ces gsungs so/ /de bzhin sku nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ de bzhin zhing khams bsam yas dang / /'gro ba ma lus thams cad la/ /thar pa rnams la dag pa'i sku/ /rtog
pa can la 'khor ba lus/ /so sor 'tsham par don ston cing / /stong pa nyid la dngos po med/ /chu zla'i tshul du kun la snang / /kun la de ltar rtogs par byos/ /lhun grub bde
gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /byang chub snying po yod pa ltar/ /rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i//
byang chub snying por thams cad 'dus/ /phyi nang ma lus thams cad kun/ /bdag gi ngang du gnas pas na/ /bdag la bdag gis dbang bsgyur nas/ /spyod yul thams cad smon mi
dgos| |che mchog rnam dag ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rig pa'i rgyal po rang gyur pas/ /thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te/ /gong na med pa'i sa mnan pas/ /thams cad kun gyi
gtso bo yin/ /thams cad ma lus gnyis med pas/ /sgo dang bsgo bar bya ba min/ /de bzhin nyid la dbang bskur bas/ /thams cad dbyings su ro gcig go /chos thams cad kyi dkyil
'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang snod bcud bdag rnams la/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ye nas gnas/ /chen po'i gzugs snang thams cad ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil
'khor nyid/ /sgyu ma'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pa'i/ /de bzhin yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor te/ /thams cad kun las 'khyil bar gnas/ /zad med gter
chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ zag bcas gnod sbyin nor dang 'dra/ /sems can 'phel 'grib zad 'gyur gyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni/ /zad med 'phel 'grib med pa yi/ /
mang po spros pas 'phro mi 'gyur/ /nyung du bsdus pas sbom po min/ /zad med rin chen gter yin pas/ /thams cad kun la khyab pa 'o/ /rnam dag byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /chos rnams ma
lus thams cad kun/ /ye nas rnam par dag pa la/ /rnam rtog rkyen gyis glo bur du/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i btson rar gnas/ /rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor
pa gnyis/ /rang bzhin med pa'i don rtogs na/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par dag /gzung 'dzin dril byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyin ci log tu rnam brtags na/ /bdag dang bdag gir so
sor snang / /de la 'dzin pa gnyis zhugs nas/ /rang bzhin med bzhin so sor snang / /yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na/ /dngos po thams cad stong pa yin/ /dngos dang dngos nyid mi
gnas pa/ /de rtogs sdug bsngal bral byed yin/ /yum 'gyur dbyings phyug ma'i dam tshig ni/ 'byung ba lnga la brten gyur na/ /thams cad 'byung zhing ma lus gnas/ /skye 'khrungs ma
lus gzhi yang yin/ /thams cad kun gyi rgyu yang yin/ /de bzhin shes rab rnam gsum gyis/ /le lo med pa'i brtson pa 'bod/ /de bzhin dbyings nyid rtogs gyur na/ /bla med byang chub 'byung
ba'i gnas/ /chos la skyon med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun/ /rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyi ga dag /rang bzhin ye shes de
bzhin no/ /'bras bu rnam par dag pa yi/ /'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa/ /snang ba nyid na ngo bo med/ /de nyid chos sku chen po yin/ /sems can don
byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ byang chub sems su don gcig pas/ /rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung / /thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod/ /nyon mongs lam nas 'gro bar byed/ /nyon
mongs khams gsum gnas pa yang / /phyin ci log nyid snang ba yin/ /der rtogs mtho ris thar pa'o/ /rtogs nas don 'dzin ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang / /
sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa/ /gnyi ga rang rig nyid du 'dus/ /de nyid yang dag yin par bshad/ /sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni/ /yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin/ /ming tshig sgra la mi brten
par| |blo yi gting du go bar bya/ /sems la gnas bcas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sems nyid las ni gzhan na med/ /sems dang chos su
dbyer med pas/ /byang chub lam de ring ba min/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ /rtog med rang rig kho na tsam/ /sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas/ /brjod med spros med ces
bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /sna tshogs ji snyed brjod pa yang / /so so'i mtshan nyid ma rtogs pa/ /ba spu tsam yang brjod pa med/ /bsod nams
chen pos bstangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing nyid dag pa'o/ /las ngan dag gis khams gsum gnas/ /de nyid dbyings las spros pa med/ /mi 'gyur rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /rnam
dag sku gsung sprul pa dang / /che mchog sna tshogs bstan pa yang / /byang chub sems la snang 'gyur te/ /snang ba nyid na dbyings su 'ubs/ /phyin ci log g.yo bsam yas kyis/ /khams
gsum gnas dang lam lngar 'khor/ /de nyid log rtog sna tshogs snang / /de las ma gtogs gang yang med/ /ye nas ma bcos zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ blo med byang chub smon mi dgos//
'gro lnga ma lus thams cad kun/ /ye nas byang chub snying por gnas/ /de bzhin dbyings kyis kun tu khyab/ /ji lta ba yi ngang gnas la/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i blo 'jug pas/ /gnyis su med par
rtogs gyur na/ /su zhig bcos shing su yis rtogs/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /rang rig ye nas dag pa yi/ /sus kyang
ma bcos ngang gis gsal/ /ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba yi/ /ye shes can gyi spyod yul de/ /kun dang thun mong de ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis
rtogs| |thams cad dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ mi zad yon tan gter gyur pa/ /zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod/ /bdag dang bdag gi med pa yi/ /shin tu zab
pa'i blo las byung / /chos dbyings zab mo'i don rtogs na/ /sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /rang rig ye shes don rtogs na/ /skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob/ /
byang chub sdom byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes kyis/ /chags med dbyings la mnyam bzhag na/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi zhing / /nyon mongs
sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rang bzhin ji lta bur/ /bdag gis yang dag rdzogs byas te/ /theg pa dman dang phyin ci log /thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings su dgod/ /phyogs
dus gnyis med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyang / /rtogs pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang / /snang ba nyid na dbyer med de/ /mtha' dang dbus med zlum
po yi| |de bzhin rang gis rig pa yang / /mtha' dang dbus med du ma min/ /gang du mi 'gro kun tu khyab/ /kun la bde sbyin mi gnas pa'o/ /thams cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i dam
tshig ni| chos rnams so sor rtogs byas shing / /thams cad gnyis med dbyings shes na/ /mi zad par ldan rgyan thob ste/ /kun tu zad med rin chen gter/ /de bzhin nyid la
gnas bcas na/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste/ /rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan/ /thabs nyid shes rab ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /ji ltar
snang ba thams cad kun/ /thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin te/ /thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor/ /sbyor dang sbyor ba gnyi ga med/ /sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang / /snang ba nyid na rang bzhin
med| |de nyid shes rab yin par bshad/ /rtag tu thabs nyid mi dmigs pa'o/ /shes rab nyid la thabs su sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las/ /rol pa sna
tshogs cir yang 'byung / /'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med/ /med pa nyid na sna tshogs snang / /thabs dang shes rab dbyings las byung / /nyan bsam sgom pa'i shes rab kyis/ /
shes rab thabs su don rtogs byos/ /kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis/ /gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur na/ /gnyis med byang
chub sems 'phros na/ /kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa po/ /de yis ma byas gang yang min/ /kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min/ /shin tu brtag dka' sus mi rigs/ /bdag
gis bdag kyang mi mthong na/ /gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur/ /thams cad sbyor ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye nas lha dang lha mo yin/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang / /dbang
po yul du sbyor ba'o/ /phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs/ /'byung ba lnga nyid yum du sbyor/ /dus bzhi'i lha mo nyid du sbyor/ /rtag chad mu bzhi'i khro mo 'o/ /thams cad ma lus
'byung ba kun/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings dang rig par sbyor/ /yang na shes rab dbyings ma la/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod la/ /bdag nyid rig pa'i
lhar bsgoms ta/ /gnyis su med par ldan par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas/ /byang chub pad+ma shin tu spro/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dang / /'gro ba mang po bde thob nas/ /
slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim/ /thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar/ /bder gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs/ /phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag rdzogs/ /bsod nams
tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs/ /thams cad dbyings su 'byor pas na/ /ngan 'gro mi ltung yang dag 'grub/ /'di ni bsgral ba chen po yin/ /sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba yin/ /sbyor ba nyid
ni ma lus bsgral/ /thams cad ma lus par sgrol byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa/ /gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun/ /bdag nyid chen phor rtogs pa
yis| |dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya/ /shin tu khro bo chen po yis/ /thabs kyis lha chen bsgral ba ltar/ /chos nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gnyis su med par thabs
kyis bsgral/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas/ /thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya/ /ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la/ /gnas pa'i
sems can ma lus kun/ /thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs te/ /ye shes me chen bsgoms byas na/ /thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya/ /dbyings su yang ni bstims byas te/ /de bzhin
gshegs par byin gyis brlab/ /rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bskur/ /de ltar bsgral bar kun byas kyang / /bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med/ /phung po lnga po bshig pa la/ /bshig nas
'byung ba bag la zha/ /ma bshig na yang 'byung ba yin/ /rnam shes med pas bsad byas na/ /gnas pa nyid na dngos po med/ /sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas
dgrar langs kyang / /sus kyang mi zin sod pa med/ /'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral ba/ /rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun/ /phyin ci log las bzlog byas te/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /
shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te/ /byang chub zhing la dgod par bya/ /de tsam la ni bsgral zhes gdags/ /bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas/ /byang chub
gnas su bsgral bas na/ /gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin/ /thabs nyid shes rab nyid thabs te/ /gnyis su med pa nyid byang chub kyi sems so/ /sbyor ba ni/ lha dang lha mor sbyor
ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / /dbang po yul du sbyor ba dang / chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar sbyor ba dang / so so rtsal sgyu ma tsam du yod pa yum du sbyor ba dang / dbang po yul dus
lha dang lha mor sbyor ba dang / rtag chad mu bzhi khro bo khro mor sbyor ba dang / mngon sum du sbyor ba'o/ /sgrol ba ni/ thabs kyis sgrol
ba dang / 'pho bas bsgral ba dang / dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du bsgral ba dang / thams cad ma lus par dbyings su dus gcig bsgral ba dang / thams cad thugs rje
chen pos gnyis su med par sgrol ba'o/ /'di gnyis dus gcig tu mdzad de/ ya char ma gyur par bya'o/ /dngos grub mchog kyang der thob ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la
de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bshad do/ /ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /bdag dang
bdag gi gzhan na med/ /rang bzhin rang gis bdag med pa/ /kun la thogs med spyad gyur kyang / /spyad dang spyod pa gnyi ga med/ /thams cad ye nas stong pa la/ /gang gi len
cing gang la spyod/ /snang srid ma lus thams cad la/ /thogs pa med pa'i spyod 'gyur yang / /bcing bar mi 'gyur bsod nams tshogs/ /chags med ye shes chen po yin/ /
ma lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings/ /de ltar rang rig yin par bshad/ /gnyis su med par rtogs gyur na/ /blangs pa nyid na kun tu bzang / /brdzun du smra ba zhes bya
ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /ye nas dngos po yod ma yin/ /rang rig ngang gis 'od gsal la/ /ming tsam tshig gis mtshon mod kyi/ /ming dang tshig la dngos
po med/ /ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis/ /nga dang bdag tu med pa la/ /so so mtshan ma dngos por bzung / /'dzin pa'i dngos po yong med de/ /chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam/ /ji
snyed mang po brjod pa yang / /rjod par byed dang brjod pa med/ /chos rnams thams cad rdzun du snang / /rdzun nyid pa ni rdzun spyod de/ /rdzun zhes bya ba brtags pa cam/ /thams cad rdzun
gyi tshig yin no/ /rdo rje 'joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thog ma med nas phyin ci log /bdag dang bdag gi med pa la/ /rnam rtog mtshan ma so sor 'dzin/ /'dzin
pa'i dngos po yod ma yin/ /mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bdag rtog bag chags kun bcom nas/ /rdo rje dbyings su thim par
bya| |chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor ba rnams/ /gzhan gyis bcings te
'khor ba min/ /'dzin rtog chags pa nyid kyis 'khor/ /blo chen rab tu ldan pa yis/ /chos kyi don po mchog nyon la/ /'khor ba spangs med sangs rgyas zhing / /thams
cad ma lus chos nyid rtogs/ /rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nor gyi mchog ni dkor bdun yin/ /'dod pas btsal bas
mi rnyed de/ /sku gsung thugs 'das mi dmigs pa'i/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /gnyis su med par 'byor byas na/ /nor bdun chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs ldan/ /pad+ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /sgo dang
bsgo bar bya ba med/ /pad+ma 'dam nas skyes pa 'dra/ /ji ltar snang ba mtha' yas kun/ /bdag las gud na gcig kyang med/ /bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas/ /nyon
mongs nyid kyang byang chub zhing / /don rnams sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rdo rje rigs kyis thams cad bcom/ /rin chen rigs kyis yon tan 'byin/ /pad+ma rigs
kyis chags med 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ /thams cad don rnams rdzogs par byas/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs te/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings la
sems kyis blta/ /skye 'chi med par lhun gyis grub/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang / /'phrin las rmad byung kun grags pa/ /gzhan na yod 'ong ma yin te/ /
rang byung ye shes gnas med yin/ /mthong ba'i tshul gyis gzugs snang dang / /bla med byang chub skur snang ba/ /me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du/ /sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang / /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni/ sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/ /brjod med rang bzhin kun tu go /nyon mongs med cing bla med sgra/ /ma brjod stong gsum grags pa
yi| |gsung brjod bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /brjod pa nyid na stong gsum med/ /de nyid sna tshogs brjod pa 'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa/ /yang dag rtog pas rab brtags
pa| |gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma/ /mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med/ /de nyid sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /sus kyang ma bcos ma byas pa/ /bdag gis bdag kyang dmigs
mi 'gyur/ /dngos med kun la dbang sgyur ba/ /sku gsung yang dag ldan na/ /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /mi 'gyur sangs rgyas zhing du 'ubs/ /spyod yul ma lus thams
cad la/ |ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung / /mi zad pa yi gteng chen 'grub/ /gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yid/ /bo de'i dkor ni rin po che/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /
bya byed med par rnam zhi mdzad/ /mdzad dang mdzad par bya ba med/ /ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos/ /sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod/ /spyod med ngang gi dkyil 'khor
la| |chags med tshul du rnam par rol/ /bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / /byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /rtsa ba lnga zhes
brjod mod kyi/ /brjod pa nyid na yong med de/ /mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs snang / /de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid yin/ /kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/ /de ni rig pa rang dbang 'gyur/ /sam
gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab/ /nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /de bzhin nyid kyis kun tu khyab/ /snod bcud ma lus thams cad la/ /
snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' gzung du med pa ltar/ /snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra/ /chos rnams thams cad sems yin te/ /sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/ /
rten byed sa chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la/ /sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i/ /skye 'khrungs ma lus thams cad 'byung / /thams cad kun gyi gnas rten
te| |de bzhin theg chen bla med la/ /byang chub sangs rgyas kun gnas/ /theg pa mtho dman thams cad 'byung / /thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus/ /sreg byed ye shes
me zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bdag med ye shes rang rig gis/ /dngos dang dngos med bar phyogs bsregs/ /rang dang spyi yi chos rnams dang / /sems kyi phrag dog thams cad
kun| |dngos po med par rtogs byas na/ /'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag /mya ngan mi 'da' ye nas gnas/ /'gro dang gnas par bya ba min/ /rtog pa thams cad ye nas tshogs/ /thams
cad 'khru byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ma lus thams cad ni/ /sgrib gnyis dag gis 'khor bar 'gyur/ /nyan bsam sgom pa'i shes rab kyis/ /bdag med gnyis ni rtogs
byas na| |pha rol phyin rdzogs sa bcu bsgrubs/ /sa gsum yang dag rdzogs byas te/ /mnyam pa'i zhing la thams cad 'god/ /khrus kyi mchog ni 'di yin no/ /g.yeng byed chen
po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ye nas dag pa la/ /bdag 'dzin rdul snyed g.yogs par 'gyur/ /sems dang rdul rnams med rtogs pas/ /ye shes rlung gis bag
chags gtor/ /chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra/ /de la gzung du med pa ltar/ /kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis/ /ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas/ /thams cad kun la dbang sgyur
zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang rig phyin ci ma log pa'i/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis med rtogs pa yis/ /thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang gyur na/ /thams cad ma lus
bdag yin pas/ /thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /ji ltar spyad kyang bsod nams tshogs/ /mnyam rig ye shes chen po yin/ /chos thams cad gzugs brnya
ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/ /snang ba nyid ni 'ja' tshon bzhin/ /rang bzhin med par kun tu snang / /de nyid
chos sku yin par bshad/ /cis kyang ma gos ma spangs pa'o/ /so so snang zhing mthun pa'i gzugs/ /bdag dang bdag tu ma brtags pa/ /de lta bu yi ngang du snang / /chos rnams sgra ltar
shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa yang / /dngos po med las dngos po sgra/ /brjod dang sgra yi dngos po min/ /chos rnams sgra ltar shes par byos/ /
thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba/ /tshig gis mtshon las gud na med/ /sgra nyid don gyi dngos po min/ /don nyid sgra las gud na med/ /chos rnams dri'i mtshan nyid
du shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sna tshogs 'byung zhing rnam par 'phro/ /de bzhin dri yi dngos po yang / /yod pa ma yin kun tu
mnam| |the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis/ /chos kun de ltar shes par gyis/ /dri yis rab tu tshim gyur kyang / /dri dang dngos po gnyis su med/ /dngos grub thams cad de ltar ro/ /
chos thams cad ro ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung / /de bzhin dbang po dngos med dang / /rdzas
kyi dngos po med pa yi/ /rnam shes dbang po yul tshogs na/ /ro yi dbang po thams cad 'grub/ /ro dang ro ru rtogs pa yang / /rang bzhin med pa skad cig ma/ /chos rnams thams cad
reg bya ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzugs rnams dbu ba rdos pa 'dra/ /tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin/ /mtshan 'dzin smig rgyu bzhin du gnas/ /rnam shes sgyu mas dbang
bsgyur na/ /mtshan ma sna tshogs 'byung bar nges/ /bde ba'i ro mchog kun kyang myong / /de nyid bsod nams tshogs chen po/ /bde ba chags med ye shes yin/ /reg gi dngos
grub de ltar ro/ /'dus byas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yang dag nyid la gnas byas na/ /phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag /rags par snang ba de bzhin gshegs/ /sgyu mar 'dzin pa
yum gyi dbyings/ /gzugs ni mtshan ma dngos po med/ /gcig la lnga lngar bshig pa dang / /thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du gnas/ /nam mkha' de bzhin chos kyi dbyings/ /'dus byas nyid kyi dngos

grub bo| |'dus byas kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang / /log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis/ /gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong / /rigs dang rgyud du brtags tu med/ /
rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med pas/ /phyi nang snod bcud rnam par snang / /snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku/ /cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grub/ /kun 'byung dngos grub de ltar ro/ /glang po
brjid gnon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ma lus thams cad kun/ /rnam rtog 'du byed mang pos g.yengs/ /ji ltar bus pa shed ma byed/ /bya byed mang
pos g.yengs par gnas/ /bya byed mang po bdag med pas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/ /mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas/ /'du byed sna tshogs mi
g.yo brtan/ /dbang lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad skye med pas/ /shin tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur/ /rang rig ye shes 'od
gsal bas/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob/ /chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas/ /kun la spyod pa'i dbang thob ste/ /spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul/ /
kun kyang rang bzhin ye nas zlum/ /thams cad rgyas 'debs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu/ /rang bzhin chen pos kun tu khyab/ /rang
byung de nyid dngos med par/ /kun gyi phyag rgya sgyu yin te/ /chos dbyings de nyid zab pa yi/ /bdag la gnas shing brtag dka' ba'o/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad
'dus| |ye nas bde gnas zhing du'o/ /chos rnams dbyer med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye nas dbyings su ro gcig pas/ /de la nga dang bdag ma rtogs/ /rang
bzhin rnam par dag pa la/ /gtsang dang sme ba'i blo tsam med/ /thams cad bde gshegs snying po bas/ /rkyen gyi rdul gyis ga la 'go /shes rab mchog gis de ltar rtogs/ /ma
lus kun 'dus dbyings shes byos/ /thams cad 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab blo rtsal ldan pa yis/ /brtag rtog mtshan ma kun bshig pas/ /
mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya ru/ /thams cad 'dus par yang dag rtogs/ /rtog pa nyid kyang dngos med la/ /de nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i/ /snang ba nyid da
byang ba med/ /de nyid 'jig pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yung drung tshe 'phel zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas/ /gang du
'gro zhing gang du skye/ /'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med/ /dngos med de la su zhig gsod/ /gang zhig gnyis su 'dzin pa la/ /skye dang 'chi ba de la yod/ /ye shes
can gyis brtags pas na/ /skye 'jig nyid na dngos po med/ /thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ mchog gsum rdzogs pa man chad nas/ /ngan song gnas
rnams yan chad du/ /yang dag par ni dbyer med de/ /gang yang spang bar bya ba min/ /theg pa mtho dman bsam yas pa/ /don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/ /
ngan song gnas rnams thams cad kun/ /bla med byang chub rgyu yod pa'o/ /thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad kun tu bzang po yi/ /
'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la/ /thogs pa med par spyad byas te/ /bsod nams tshogs chen yin par brtag/ de bzhin gshegs pa lngar yang brtag /gzhan yang
stong khams thams cad ni/ /shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams/ /rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyod/ /thams cad mi chud pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /phyogs
dus mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje rigs mchog ma rtogs par/ /theg pa dman dang lta ba dman/ /des ni theg mchog rtogs mi 'gyur/ /mi mnyam pa yi don nyid
kun khyab kyang / /nyon mongs sdug bsngal nyid kyis bsgribs/ /de yis yang dag nyid mi mthong / /ma mthong ba la mi chud bya/ /thams cad bsrung du med ces bya
ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la/ /bsgrub cing bsrung bar bya ba med/ /dge dang mi dge gnyi ga med/ /nyon mongs spang zhing byang bsgrub med/ /
de bzhin nyid kyi klong gyur na/ /bde dang mi bde dbyer med de/ /ye nas dag mnyam nyid du gnas/ /de la bsrung bya rdul tsam med/ /thams cad bsrung ba med pa zhes bya
ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can khams gsum 'khor ba yi/ /thog ma med nas 'khor ba yi/ /phyin ci log la 'jog nyog spyod/ /gzung 'dzin don la shin tu chags/ /des na 'khor
bar rtag tu 'phyan/ /de bas rang sems rtogs byas te/ /le lo med par yongs spangs te/ /nga med bdag med mnyam par bsrung / /thams cad 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
dam tshig ni/ rdo rje sems dpas bkas bcad pa/ /sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun/ /don bzhin du ni ma bsrungs na/ /yak+Sha khro bo ma dpal gyis/ /snying nas drangs te khrag
'thungs nas/ /ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur/ /de yi sdug bsngal bzod glags chad/ /dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che/ /dam rdzas so sor spyod ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rigs
lnga so sor dbye ba yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' glang po'i sha/ /rin po che ni rta yi sha/ pad+ma rigs ni a ri ka yi sha/ /don yod nam mkha' lding gi sha/ /bder gshegs rigs
ni sha chen no/ /dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar/ /nges par ngang du blangs pa'o/ /yang na thams cad gcig tu bsdu/ /yang na mtshan nyid med par brtag/ ting nge
'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ni/ bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/ /ye nas rang bzhin gsal ba las/ /thams cad kun la yod par bshad/ /ye
shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /bla na med pa'i mchog yin te/ /rdo rje rigs mchog thams cad kyis/ /bar ma chad par rtag tu bsgrub/ /byang chub
shing drung skye bar 'gyur/ /bla med byang chub mchog kyang 'grub/ /skye 'chi med pa'i bde 'grub ste/ /sems la dbang yang thob par 'gyur/ /spyod yul thams cad smon na shes/ /rgyud
kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ dam tshig rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o// //gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di spangs na/ /nyon mongs ngan song gnas su skye/ /byang
chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /bla med 'gro ba'i rgyu yang chad/ /rigs chad nyid du skye bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub 'dod pas/ /rtag tu mnyam pa'i don rtogs la/ /sku ni
'ja' chon tshul 'dra bar/ /snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom/ /'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par/ /gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgom/ /lha yi sku rnams gsal bsgoms
na| |bsod nams tshogs chen thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na/ /ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/ /yi dam
lha de spangs byas na/ /ngan song mi bde rtag tu myong / /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad pa'i don ni/ sngags dang phyag rgya bar mi gcad/ /rnal 'byor 'grub pa'i lam yang
yin| |mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa'ang yin/ /don mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te/ /rtag tu mnyam gzhag phyag rgya yin/ /dug gsum gting 'byin sngags yin te/ /yang dag
don chen klung 'dod pas/ /dus mtshams med par phyag rgya sngags/ /yid brtan drag tu bzlas brjod bya/ /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /phyag rgya bskyod dang yi ge oM/ /rdo
rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/ bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa po/ /yon tan zad med sbyin pa yin/ /byang chub lam chen 'dren mdzad pa/ /chags med zhing du 'god pa
yin| |nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad gcod cing / /'khor ba'i lam rnams stong par byed/ /ma rig mun sel sgron me yin/ /long ba rnams kyi dmigs bu mkhan/ /de la rtag
tu mchod byas na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring / /rdo rje mched dang lcam dral gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/ rdo rje rigs kyi spun yin te/ /thog ma med nas las mthun pas/ /lta
spyod mthun pas 'dir skyes te/ /gcig la gcig ni mig dang 'dra/ /shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya/ /dam tshig ngan sems dbye byas nas/ /dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur/ /
de bas dam tshig 'da' mi byed/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /srid gsum ma lus kun la khyab/ /phyin ci log gis rab bsgribs
nas| |dbul bo gter dang gyad kyi nor bu 'dra/ /de bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'di/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis/ /chos la skyon yod ma yin te/ /sems
can don phyir shin tu gsang / /theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ de la gsang don bstan gyur na/ /rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par/ /'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la/ /shin tu nges
pa'i don bzung nas/ /gsang don de nyid log par 'khrid/ /ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'khor/ /de bas shin tu gsang bar bya/ /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ /thar lam kun
la mkhas par bya/ shes rab mchog dang ldan pas na/ /sems can snod kyi rim pa bzhin/ /theg pa mtho dman ngon nyid ni/ /so sor 'tsham par bstan dgos so/ /dang du blang
dang mi spang ba/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spyad/ /chags pa med par gyur pa dang / /dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni/ /dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung / /ma rtogs pa zhes
spyad gyur na/ /yi dwags srin po'i nang du skye/ /yang na dam tshig 'di lta bur/ /ji ltar spyad kyang sdom pa mi 'da' ste/ /byed gcod tshogs chen gnyis su 'gyur/ /'gro dang
nyal dang 'dug pa na/ /mnyam pa de yi dbyings na gnas/ /shes rab mchog gis rtag tu gyis/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /bya lam nam mkha' gcod bzhin gyis//
'dzin chags ma lus thams cad kun/ /mkha' la rlung chen 'phro ba bzhin/ /yid kyi rtog chags ma lus pa/ /chu la nya chen 'phro ba ltar/ /rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar ltos/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i
shes rab kyis/ /tshig tsam ma yin blo gting spos/ /rdo rje theg mchog khas 'ches la/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes par/ /gsang sngags dam tshig mnyam zer zhing / /thugs
thub dag gis spyad byas pa/ /dmyal khams dag tu brgyud par 'gyur/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/ /mnyam dang rtogs pa gang yang med/ /ji lta mi gnas yul la spyod/ /spyod
par byed dang spyod pa med/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin skye ba na/ /'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor/ /yon tan mi zad gnas pa yin/ /mnyam pa'i
don nyid mi shes shing / /kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la/ /chos dang gang zag gnyis med na/ /'di ni byang chub sa pa yin/ /las dang nyon mongs thams cad la/ /mnyam pa'i
don du mi shes shing / /rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yongs 'dzin na/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyis/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /bden bzhi'i dngos po yod lta zhing / /spang dang
mi spong byed 'gyur ba/ /'di ni nyan thos sa pa yin/ /dge bcu dag la gtsor len cing / /dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas/ /lha dang mi yi skye gnas te/ /'dod khams dag tu 'khor
pa'i sa| |mnyam pa'i don nyid mi rtogs shing / /tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi/ /rim par so sor bdag 'dzin cing / /gzugs tshogs dag la
bdag tu rtog/ /'di ni tshangs gnas rim par skye/ /mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs par/ /ming bzhi med par ma shes te/ /skye mched bzhi la gnas 'gyur bas/ /srid pa'i rtse
mo'i sa ru skye/ /thams cad mnyam par ma shes na/ /ma lus kun la zhe sdang zhing / /snying rje yang dag med gyur na/ /'di ni mi bzad chen po yi/ /dmyal khams bcu drug gnas pa
yin| |chags med dngos po mi shes nas/ /thams cad kun la 'dod chags shing / /lus kyis bsgribs dang zas kyis bsgribs/ /yi dwags chen po'i gnas su skye/ /nga dang
bdag med mi shes shing / /chos rnams kun la rmongs byas pas/ /shes rab mi gsal don med pas/ /dge sdig gnyis kyi don ma rtogs/ /'di ni byol song gnas su skye/
shin tu nga rgyal chen bskyed cing / /thams cad bdag gir bzung bas na/ /kun dang rtsod pa'i las byed pa/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye/ /theg mchog mtho dman thams cad
dang / /'jig rten lta ba thams cad kun/ /ye shes chen pos rab brtags na/ /rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub/ /rang bzhin dbyings las nyams pa med/ /shes rab chen
po mig ldan pas/ /mtho dman gnas dang lam drug dang / /rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub/ /so sor de bzhin 'khor bar gzigs/ /sngags mchog bla na med
pas ni| |mtshan ma kun dang mi brtag par/ /mtshan ma kun dang thams cad med/ /kun dang mnyam pa nyid yin pas/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /so sor lta ba brjod mi bya/ /spyi
ni log rtog bsam yas pa/ /ye nas yod pa ma yin te/ /so so'i rnam rtog bag chags kyis/ /gzung 'dzin dra bas bsgribs 'gyur te/ /ci yang med la cir yang snang / /snang ba nyid na rang
bzhin med/ /de ltar rtogs na bde 'gro'i gnas/ /rdo rje can gyis de ltar rtogs/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i lta spyod ni/ /cir yang spyod kyang rang bzhin med/ /mkha' la bya chen lding ba bzhin/ /
chu la skyar chen 'phyo ba bzhin/ /mkha' la rlung chen 'gro ba bzhin/ /rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar blta/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po ni/ /thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod/ /bde ba'i ro
mchog myong bar 'gyur/ /de la su zhig chags par byed/ /spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin/ /bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs/ /de lta bu yi ngang du spyod/ /'di ni
spyod pa rlabs chen yin/ /lta spyod ya char ma gyur par/ /sngags 'chang rnams kyis rtag tu spyad/ /kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang / /spyod pa dag dang yong mi mthun/ /kha cig spyod pa
rdzogs byed kyang / /mnyam pa'i lta ba yong mi shes/ /kha cig lta spyod gnyi ga med/ /yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pas/ /
yang dag nyid du rab tu rtogs/ /bla med theg chen ngang gnas ni/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de/ /kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la/ /dag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin/ /thabs kyi
theg pa chen po ni/ /rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob tu yang dbyer med de/ /lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo/ /thabs kyi lta spyod chen po ni/ /bla med theg pa las 'phags
pa| |don dam du ni nor bdun no/ /kun rdzob tu ni mnyam rdzogs so/ /mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos bzhin/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po ston/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag /thams
cad dag ces bya ba yang / /dngos po gsal dag ma yin te/ /snang spyod gnyis na rnam par dag /dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las/ /rigs lnga dag tu bstan pa ni/ /chos rnams
ma lus thams cad kun/ /rigs chen dag tu zad par 'dus/ /ma lus chos kun dbyer mi dmigs/ /cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin/ /rigs ngan 'joms pas rdo rje yin/ /mi dmigs dbyings
nas kun 'byung ba/ /yon tan chen po gnas yin te/ /zhing khams mi bzad gnas kyang yin/ /'di ni rin chen rigs su gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas/ /chags dang
chags par bya ba med/ /de bzhin nyid du gcig pa ste/ /nyes pas mi gos pad+ma bzhin/ /thams cad ma lus dbyings 'dus pas/ /'di la bya ba rdul tsam med/ /ma byas bzhin du don grub
pa| |skyon yon byang chub nyid du sbyor/ /'di ni las rnams grub pa yin/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /mtha' dang dbus med du mar bral/ /gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid/ /dbyer
med pa yi tshul rtogs te/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /snang srid ma lus thams cad la/ /gsal zhing dro ba'i gnas byed cing / /mtshan ma bag chags sreg byed pa/ /'di ni me yi
rigs su bshad/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /dngos por snang la gzung du med/ /bskyod na thams cad kun smra ste/ /'di ni rlung chen yin par bshad/ /dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams
las| |'byung ba lnga rnams bshad pa ni/ /thams cad ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas/ /thams cad kun gyi mdzod skyed yin/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /sra zhing brtan pa'i gnas
yod pas/ /dngos po med pa'i tshul rtogs te/ /'di ni sa chen yin par bshad/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /de bzhin nam mkha' chen po yis/ /phyi dang nang gi go 'byed
pa'o| |thams cad gsal ba'i ngang nyid de/ /'byung ba bzhi po thams cad kyang / /thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du thim/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su
'ubs| |nyon mongs lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur/ /phyin ci log ni yang dag ste/ /nyon mongs lnga po de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos
med rtogs na byang chub lam/ /ma rtogs ngan song gsum du 'gro/ /de bas thos bsam sgom pa yis/ /yang dag don nyid rtogs byas te/ /thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du sbyor/ /
'dod chags rang bzhin med pas na/ /yang dag don la chags byed de/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /ma chags pa la chags pa dang / /shin tu chags mchog
chen po yin/ /rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'byung 'gyur te/ /snang ba mtha' yas zhing dag yin/ /thams cad pad+ma rdzus skyes yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa ru skye/ /zhe sdang chen po'i
mtshan nyid ni/ /phyin ci log la zhe sdang zhing / /zhe sdang dngos po med shes na/ /sdang dang mi sdang mnyam shes te/ /cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin/ /mnyam pa chen po'i
dang nyid ni/ /thams cad kun la dbyer med de/ /de ltar ma rtogs kun la snang / /de bzhin phal gyis mnyam mi shes/ /des ni zhe sdang nyid du mthong / /yang dag rtogs
pas rab brtags na/ /zhe sdang thugs rje chen po yin/ /gti mug rmongs pa zhes brjod pas/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /don dam du ni dbyer med la/ /
kun rdzob sgyu ma mig yor tshul/ /snang ba nyid na dngos med pas/ /de la su zhig bdag tu 'dzin/ /thams cad dbyer med mi dmigs pa/ /shes rab can gyi gti mug yin/ /de rtogs
de bzhin gshegs pa 'o/ /nga rgyal mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /mnyam pa nyid la gnas byas nas/ /phyin ci log dang theg dman la/ /shin tu nga rgyal chen por snang / /nga rgyal zhi ba
so so min/ /rang bzhin med pas dbyings su 'dus/ /'di ni yon tan 'byung gnas yin/ /de bzhin dag par shes par byos/ /phrag dog mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /nga dang bdag tu
'dzin pa ste/ /'dzin nyid dngos po yod ma yin/ /mnyam mi shes la phrag dog cing / /thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'dus/ /mi mnyam pa la shin tu sdom/ /de bas phrag dog chen
po yin| |phyin ci log tu bdag tu bcings/ /gzung dang 'dzin pas shin tu dog /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /dog yangs med de thams cad mnyam/ /de nyid shes pas
las rab 'grub/ /phung po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /phung po lnga por snang ba yang / /kun rdzob bya ba sna tshogs byed/ /bde ba'i yul dang mi bde'i yul/ /so so'i ro rnams myong
byed cing / /lnga po'i mtshan nyid bshig byas nas/ /so so'i mtshan nyid dngos po med/ /gang gis de la dngos bzung na/ /ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur/ /de la gzugs kyi
mtshan nyid ni/ /snang ba nyid ni rang bzhin med/ /snang med de nyid sna tshogs ston/ /snang dang mi snang gnyis su med/ /de rtogs rnam par thar pa'i gnas/ /gzugs
nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /tshor ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /kun la rnam gsum 'byung mod kyi/ /bde dang mi bde dngos po med/ /gnyi ga ma yin lung ma bstan/ /sna tshogs
tshor ba 'byung 'gyur yang / /tshor dang 'byung ba gnyi ga stong / /stong nyid dngos po yod ma yin/ /de rtogs chos kyi go bgos yin/ /'du shes mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ /gsum
tshogs mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin/ /so so mtshan nyid bshig pa na/ /dngos po med de de bzhin nyid/ /dngos po de ni sna tshogs pa/ /bya byed med par kun tu 'jug /khams gsum
ma lus thams cad la/ /mtshan ma che chung bsam mi khyab/ /khyab med dngos po yod ma yin/ /de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan/ /'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar gnas/ /rtsa
ba brgyad pa'i grangs 'gyur te/ /lnga bcu rtsa gcig kun la 'pho/ /der rtogs rtsa ba yod ma yin/ /med bzhin log g.yo rnam par 'byung / /de la dngos por 'dzin pa ni/ /rtag tu
nyon mongs g.yengs gyur nas/ /khams gsum brtson ra kun tu 'khor/ /yang dag don phyir rig pas ni/ /'phro ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin de/ /de la rnam rig 'byung ba ni/ /dngos
po med de skad cig ma/ /ye shes dbyings la rol pa mdzad/ /sprul pa'i tshogs chen yin par bshad/ /kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes te/ /de yi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni/ /kha dog dbyibs
dang rig rgyun min/ /gang yang ma yin nyid mi dmigs/ /'di ni kun la dbang bsgyur te/ /mtho ris 'gro 'am ngan song 'gro/ /rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ro/ /bzhi po mnyam pa'i ngang
shes na| |'di ni ye shes chen po yin/ /kha dog lnga yi dam tshig ni/ /sems can ma lus thams cad la/ /ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang / /rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te/ /ye shes
lnga yi don ma mthong / /ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la/ /ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /ljang gu la sogs nag por bstan/ /chos rnams bdag
med rtogs byas nas/ /byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir/ /shin tu mdog ni dkar bstan pa/ /de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /pad+ma rA ga zhes
brjod do/ /chags dang chags par bya ba med/ /chags med phyir yang dmar po'o/ /yon tan gter chen zad mi she pa/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ma
lus la| |zad med rin chen gter 'gyur ba/ /mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu bstan/ /chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /dbyings su yang dag
bsdu dgos pas/ /las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed/ /kun tu las ni ljang gu'i mdog /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las/ /cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su
med| |kha dog nag po dngos po la/ /tshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med/ /de bzhin kun la shes par byos/ /phyogs lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin
du| |dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la/ /ye shes rtogs pa'i don bya phyir/ /phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya/ /sems can ma rig ldongs pa la/ /nyon mongs ma rig bsal bya'i
phyir| |ye shes sgron ma 'od 'bar bas/ /ma rig mun pa sel bar byed/ /de phyir de la shar zhes bya/ /sems can ma lus thams cad la/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi gnas shing / /
ma rig mun pa nub 'gyur bas/ /de la nub kyi phyogs zhes bya/ /sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun/ /ye shes chen po bdag med pas/ /sdug bsngal rab tu byang byas nas/ /de la byang
gi phyogs zhes brjod/ /de ltar ma lus thams cad la/ /thugs rje shar dang sgrib pa nub/ /rnam rtog mtshan nyid byang gyur na/ /de yi yon tan chen po rdzogs/ /de ltar chos rnams
ma lus kun/ /rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'dus/ /phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid du zlum pa'i tshul/ /phyogs rnams kun la de ltar blta/ /ma rig
phyin ci log rnams kyis/ /phyogs rnams so sor gzung gyur na/ /rtag tu nyon mongs 'khor bar 'gyur/ /dbang po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /yul lnga dag la dbang byed cing / /phyin ci log
ni dngos por 'dzin/ /dngos por bzung bas khams gsum 'khor/ /gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /snang zhing dngos po med pa dang / /lha dang lha mo'i dngos por brtags/ /bdag
dang lha nyid gnyis pa'o/ /sgra rnams sna tshogs grags pa yang / /sgra nyid dngos po med par shes/ /sgra brjod ma lus thams cad ni/ /chos kyi sgra chen sna tshogs yin/ /dri yi dngos por snang
ba yang | |dri nyid rang bzhin gang yang med/ /dri snom chos kyi dri yin te/ /shes rab chen pos de ltar rtogs/ /ro yi dngos po snang ba yang / /ro yi rang bzhin yod ma yin/ /ro bro de
bzhin nyid kyi ro/ /bde ba de yis tshim par byed/ /reg bya sna tshogs snang ba yang / /reg bya'i dngos po yod med de/ /reg byar snang ba longs spyod yin/ /bde ba chen po chos kyi sku/ /mi
shes phyin ci log rnams kyis/ /dbang po yul la chags gyur na/ /rtag tu 'dod dang mi 'bral zhing / /ngan song gsum dang mi khom brgyad/ /rtsa ba sog ma'i me bzhin du/ /khams gsum
dag tu 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de bas ye shes chags med rtogs/ /byas la mi gsog bsod nams byos/ /kun la spyod cing mi gos pas/ /ye shes chen po rtag tu sgoms/ /mnyam pa lnga
zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa dang / /kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang / don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dbyer med par mnyam pa
dang | chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa dang / rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o/ /de la don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa ni/ chos rnams ma lus
thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i mtha'/ /yang dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings/ /mtshan nyid med cing dmigs su med/ /gzung du med cing smon pa med/ /ye nas mya ngan
'das pa yin/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang / /'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni/ /sgyu ma'i tshul
du thams cad snang / /'phral gyi bya ba kun kyang byed/ /rtog pa kun gyi mtshan ma snang / /'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te/ /bya byed snang zhing dngos po med/ /chu zla'i tshul du thams
cad gnas/ /thams cad snang la rang bzhin med/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med na/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung / /yod dang med
pa gnyi ga min/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de/ /'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang / /snang ba nyid na dngos po med/ /dngos med de nyid sna tshogs te/ /de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul/ /
'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa ni/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las/ /ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba/ /gzhi rtsa yod pa ma yin te/ /rang bzhin ngang gis de ltar
'byung / /so so'i rigs tshogs snang ba ni/ /thabs chen dag tu rtag tu mnyam/ /mtshan nyid so sor gnas pa ni/ /shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam/ /rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar
mnyam pa ni/ rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa/ /rang bzhin med pa don gyi gzhi/ /'di ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /nga dang
bdag tu mi 'dzin cing / /kun kyang dbyer med pa yin pas/ /thams cad me long lta bu'i tshul/ /thams cad kun la yud rtog cing / /rtog dang brtag par bya ba med/ /dus gsum kun tu
mi dmigs pa/ /'di ni mnyam nyid ye shes yin/ /log rtog dbang po'i spyod yul spangs/ /dbang po'i yul rnams dngos med par/ /thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid/ /so sor rtog
pa'i ye shes yin/ /mnyam pa rnam lnga de ltar brtags/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang / /thabs chen lhun gyis grub par brtags/ /'di ni yang
dag rtogs pa yin/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te/ /rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil/ /ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor
lo'i tshul/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /rigs bzhi'i lha dang lha mo dang / /'khor gyi khro bo khro mo dang / /yang na 'das pa'i dkyil nyid de/ /'jig rten
tshogs kyi 'khor yin no/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing / /byang chub sems dang ma chags pa'i/ /gnyis su med par thim gyur na/ /
tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ldan/ /'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang / /sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /gzugs mdzes lha dang
lha mor brtags/ /thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni/ /chos kyi sgra chen yin pa dang / /ngan song sbyong zhing thar lam ston/ /stong gsum grags pa'i sgra chen dang / /thams cad 'jal
ba'i sgra yang yin/ /bde ba tshim byed bsod nams te/ /brjod med mi gnas ye shes yin/ /'di ni chags med pad+ma'i gsung / /chos nyid dngos po med pa la/ /dri yis mchog tu tshim byed
pa| |bsod nams tshogs chen yin par bshad/ /chags med ye shes tshul yin te/ /de bzhin dri yis mnyes mchod na/ /rig 'dzin sa rnams bskul bar 'gyur/ /ngan song gsum du
chos kyi de/ /kun tu bde gnas thob par byed/ /bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /bde ba'i ro yis mchod par 'gyur/ /tshim byed bsod nams tshogs chen 'gyur/ /dngos
por mi 'dzin bsod nams tshogs/ /de lta bu yi ro mchog gis/ /thams cad kun la tshim par 'gyur/ /yi dwags gnas su longs spyod ldan/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod pa yin/ /
bde ba chen po rdzogs pa'o/ /rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ /rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa dang / /sbyor mchod dag gis longs spyod na/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub 'gyur/
bde chen dkyil 'khor 'bar gyur nas/ /sdig pa'i mun nag sel bar byed/ /dpung gi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i/ /mthu chen dag kyang 'grub par byed/ /tshogs kyi 'phrin las zhes bya ba'i
dam tshig ni/ /byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /kun la thogs pa med par spyad/ /thams cad ma lus 'dul bar byed/ /mi mthun phyogs nas dbang du byed/ /yon tan chen po 'phel bar
byed| |khro bo gtum po'ang zhi bar byed/ /thams cad kun la spyad bde ba/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /dbyings su bsdus pas dkyil yin te/ /'phro 'du mang po'i 'khor
gyis bskor/ /mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni/ /de lta bu yi tshul du gnas/ /'khor gyi phra men tshim par byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu/ /rtag
tu mnyam ba zhag khro bo'i tshul/ /'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin te/ /mdog dang phyag rgya thams cad dang / /sngags mchog dam pa ma lus 'don/ /de nas phra men 'khor bsdus
nas| |so so'i las dang mthun byas te/ /so so'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /dbang du bsdu dang sgom pa'i thabs/ /ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya/ /ma lus thams
cad byos shig par/ /lhag ma byin nas dbang yang bskur/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la/ /'dod yon lnga yi sbyin ba gtang / /de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas/ /dbang phyug
chen po'i gnas brtan nas/ /rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /bdag la thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i ngang 'chang ba/ /ye shes
tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas/ /rig 'dzin rig pa'i sa la gnas/ /theg dman spyod par yong mi 'gyur/ /mi khom gnas su skye mi 'gyur/ /skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob/ /sangs rgyas
zhing yang sbyong bar byed/ /ngan song gnas rnams stong par byed/ /yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub/ /dbang po yul du snang ba kun/ /yul rnams yod pa ma yin te/ /kun gzhi rnam
par shes pa nyid/ /dngos po sna tshogs par snang ste/ /snang ba'i dngos po rnams shig na/ /so so'i mtshan nyid rnam bshig nas/ /gzhigs na nam mkha'i ngang du zhi/ /nam mkha'
de nyid lngas gzhigs na/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim/ /thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas so/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma/ /snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin te/ /rang bzhin
med pa shes rab nyid/ /nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni/ /kun gzhi nyid snang spyod yul la/ /de dang bdag tu rnam par rtog/ /bde sdug mtshan ma so sor 'dzin/ /kun gzhi dngos po med pa
la| |bag chags gsog pa'i gnas med de/ /snang ba'i dngos po med pa la/ /nyon mongs blo yis blang du med/ /sgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med/ /de ltar sgo byed dngos po med/ /med bzhin
sems kyis log brtags pa/ /khams gsum brtson rar rtag tu 'khor/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ /snang dang mi snang gnyi ga la/ /skad cig yud tsam rtog pa yin/ /rtog pa
nyid kyang ma grub na/ /yul gyi dngos po ga la 'grub/ /yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni/ /snga ma 'das shing mi dmigs pa/ /phyi ma ma byung brtag tu med/ /de ltar rang bzhin dmigs su
med| |rtsi shing kha na rlung 'phyo 'dra/ /rgyud ni yongs su ma chad pa/ /'di ni kun tu 'byung ba yin/ /de ltar don rnams dngos po med/ /chu dang rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba/ /de gsum gcig
dang so so min/ /de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs yid/ /gcig pa ma yin so so min/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /thams cad ye shes dbyer med cing / /gcig tu
yang ni brjod pa med| |de ltar ma rtogs sems can yin/ /rtogs na sangs rgyas gud na med/ /byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni/ /shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba/ /yangs la
rgya che gting zab pa/ /shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ /'ong dang 'gro bar bya ba min/ /shin tu brtag dka' mi dmigs
pa| |mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ngang nyid ni/ /dmigs med tshul du de ltar snang / /dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang / /rang rig kho na tsam du
zad| |sems can ma lus thams cad kyi/ /de ltar khong du chud par byos/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang / /bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /sems can ma lus thams
cad la/ /snying rje'i theg pa ma chags par/ /nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing / /byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la/ /snying rje'i zhags
pa cher brkyangs nas/ /nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed/ /snying rje chen po skye ma byed/ /de bzhin skye bo phal rnams la/ /las kyi sgrib pas mi gos shing / /thams cad mngon par
sangs rgyas par/ /dga' bdag la 'gyod pa med/ /sems can nga dang bdag med la/ /thugs rjes gnyis rtog mi 'byed de/ /bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya/ /thams cad dri
ma med par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa bas/ /de la dngos dang rtog pa med/ /nam mkha'i ngang du gnas pa la/ /de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/ /chos rnams thams
cad mtshan nyid med/ /snang ba thams cad dngos med pas/ /yod dang med pa thams cad kun/ /mtshan nyid med pas mi dmigs so/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/ /chos rnams sna
tshogs snang ba dang / /bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas/ /kun la smon cing chags su med/ /byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni/ /shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas/ /rtog ge'i spyod
yul de ma yin/ /ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med/ /sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu/ /byang chub de nyid sems yin no/ /sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas/ /sems can ma lus
thams cad dang / /dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ubs/ /bo d+hi chen pos de skad bshad/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab
ldan pas/ /ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyad/ /spyad pa nyid na chags pa med/ /dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas/ /'di ltar snang ba thams cad la/ /mngon sum tshad mas rtag
mthong yang / /snang ba nyid na dngos po med/ /de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs/ /gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces/ /med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de/ /ri bong rwa dang mo gsham bu/ /
tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi/ /thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med/ /thams cad ma lus stong zhes te/ dran med brdos pa ma yin pas/ /rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal
zhing / /'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun/ /brdos pa tsam gyi chos med do/ /shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o/ /thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na/ /de nyid
don dam dbyings yin te/ /gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med/ /yod las btsal na sgro btags 'gyur/ /med las btsal na skur btab ste/ /yod med gnyis las btsal
byas na/ /de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ /de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med/ /rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu/ /tshig gis snga phyi yod mod kyang / /don gyis
gcig car rdzogs par bsgom/ /de lta bu yi don rtogs kyang / /'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyad kyang / /theg chen sgom las nyams pa mid/ /gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i/ /
blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas/ /ma rtogs le lo snyom las byas/ /don ma grub par ngan song 'gro/ /sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na/ /tshig gis mnyam pas sangs
mi rgya| |de bas don tshig ldan par byos/ /'on tang the tshom med par 'grub/ /rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis/ /dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom/ /yon tan nam
mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du gcig /rtag tu bsod nams tshogs chen ldan/ /bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /des ni byang chub snying po
len| |zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa gsang pa'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag rgyar 'dus shing phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la 'di ltar brtags
shing phyag rgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang / dam tshig ni/ gnas yin no/ /phyag rgya bsdus shing spros pa yang 'di yin te/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /gsang ba de nyid kho na las/ /byang chub
mchog 'di bstan pa'o/ /mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus ba'i/ /'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/ /ye nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid/ /mnyam dang mi
mnyam bya ba min/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ngang du 'ubs/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun/ /chos nyid ngang las ma rtogs pa/ /log rtog nyon mongs rdul
tsam med/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs 'od 'bar yang / /de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te/ /bdag nyid dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/ /mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi/ /rnam gsum tshul
gyis bsgoms byas shing / /phyag rgya skyed cing log 'dul ba/ /bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed/ /de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog/ bdag nyi
phyag rgya kun gyi bdag /ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /byang chub skye 'khrungs rgyu yang yin/ /'bras bu yang dag nyid du 'o/ /rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo
rje'i sa| |bcu gsum don grub de gnas pa/ /mthar phyin gang la'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun/ /thams cad shes rab
ngang du gnas/ /rigs lnga bder gshegs yab yum du/ /ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas/ /thabs dang shes rab nyid la rol/ /bde min ma chags tshogs chen po/ /yang dag
