nyid la rab tu rdzogs/ /lhag pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ /nang gi rtags ni phyir byung ste/ /mdor bsdus phyag rgya chen po dang / /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa/ /lag gi 'du 'phro
bsam yas dang / /yan lag stabs chen bsgul bsigs kun/ /nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang / /rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar gnas/ /'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs
pa| |rang byung chen po lha yi lha/ /thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed/ /dpa' bo zhes kyang gdags par bya'o/ /las ngang las kyis mi gos pa/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi don
rtogs shing / /ma chags pa la chags pa dang / /shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'khor la/ /sku gsung thugs ldan zad mi shes/ /yon tan mi zang gter
du 'gyur/ /gzhi ni mi zad par ldan pa'o/ /sku gsung las rnams rdzogs byed pa'o/ /rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni/ /thams cad kun la chags med rol/ /'dul ba'i don lan bsam
mi khyab| |'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung dang / /thams cad dbang bsdus don 'grub pa/ /ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /kun nas zlum zhing 'od zer 'phro/ /rigs bzhi ma lus
thams cad kun/ /mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thams cad 'dus/ /rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste/ /lhun grub dkyil 'khor ngang nyid du/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni/ /
thugs kyi rtags su bstan pa yin/ /dper na rgyal pos rgyas btab na/ /sems can kun gyis yong mi 'da'/ /de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag rgya yin/ /kun la khyab cing thams cad snang / /
sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab na/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun/ /mi mthun phyogs kyis dbang byar med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs nges na/ /'di lta bu la rtag tu gnas/ /
de lta bu yi blo med na/ /rdo rje'i rigs su yong mi bshad/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi le'u ste bdun cu brgyad pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi rang bzhin
'di| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi/ /rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin/ /sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang / /gsang
ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam/ /ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams kyis/ /don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di/ /
rtogs nas smra bar byed pa gang / /de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'/ /sgro dang skur ba zhi ba yi/ /gsang
ba'i snying po de kho na/ /de nyid nges pa'i dbyings las phyung / /de ni nges par lung bstan te/ /sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin/ /sa rab rig pa 'dzin las gnas/ /zhes brjod pas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/ /gsang ba'i
snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o// //'phags pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan
nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor
lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu mchog /gsang ba chen po 'di yod par/ /me mar mur gyi dong 'bogs shing / /spu gri so ni gtams las kyang / /'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos/ /khong
na gnas pa'i yang khong na/ /lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo/ /thams cad la yang me long bzhin/ /bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo / /ye shes 'phrul gyi lde mig gis/ /rdo rje tha
ram sgrom phye nas/ /yid bzhin rin chen gter phyung ba/ /skal ldan mchog gis spyad du gsol/ /yi ge kun la mi snang zhing / /bla ma'i thugs la gnas pa ni/ /skal ldan mchog
gi spyod yul te/ /kun dang thun mong de ma yin/ /dper na seng+ge'i 'o ma ni/ /gser gyi phyis bus 'dzin 'gyur gyi/ /snod gzhan dag tu blugs pa ni/ /snod kyang 'chag la 'o ma yang
'bo| |yong gis gser gyi rang bzhin la/ /dbyibs kyi khyad par cir yang snang / /gser las gyur pa rdul tsam med/ /de bzhin chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang / /mtshan ma sna tshogs cir
snang yang / /nyid las gyur pa rdul tsam med/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ /chos nyid kun tu mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa rdzogs so// //
'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo'i phreng zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng gi don bsdus pa/ de nas bcom ldan
'das dpal kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas rig pa'i byin rlabs las byung ba'i mchod pa rgya yongs su mchad
pa'i gzhal yas khang dang / bla bres dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa bzhi dang / bdug spos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa
bzhis mchod de lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas so so ma yin pa'i rig pa'i 'dud pas phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum
du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul nyan thos dang thun mong ma lags pa thabs gang gis rtogs pa de tshe 'di
nyid la thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i don du bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / cang mi gsung bar 'dzum pa mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems
dpa' chen po nyon cig/ don 'di dang phyi nang gi chos thams cad 'dra ste/ bden pa gnyis su 'dus so/ /bden pa gnyis la yang tshul 'di ltar shes par bya'o/ /bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras
bu'i tshul/ /de bzhin nyid la gnas byas nas/ /phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag /byed spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa ste/ /sa bcu rim gyis bsgrod
pa la| |mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis/ /sa rnams mnyam pa nyid du sbyor/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /chos kun sgyu mar rig pa'i phyir/ /dngos dang dngos med bag chags bsregs/
yang na ye shes me zhes bya/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam smin ni/ /med min rgyu 'bras mthun par 'grub/ /de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyis/ /rig pas tshogs su 'gyur bas so/ /lam gyi
nang na nye lam bde rdzogs pa/ /thabs kyi nang na ma nor dam pa ste/ /bsgrubs na tshe 'dis sangs rgyas che ba yang / /blang dor med pa'i sku gsum rdo rjes 'thob/ /'phags pa thabs kyi
zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //sems dpa' chen po/ dam tshig 'di dag ni/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ngas bshad
do| |gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang / /'dod chags phrag dog chen po ni/ /bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa can/ /de ni dam tshig rdo rje yin/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/
dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //sems dpa' chen po/ dbang 'di dag ni/ rang rig pa'i rtsal gyis 'thob bo/ /thabs dang shes rab dbang chen te/ /rdo rje dril
bu rig bas 'dzin/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi/ /chos la 'dod bzhin dbang byed do/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //
sems dpa' chen po/ /mchod pa'i mchog ni/ 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'drongs/ /kun la phan pa'i sman yin te/ /
rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis/ /thams cad bza' zhing brgyan par bya/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //kun tu 'od
kyis las 'das/ /pad+ma'i spyan du gyur pa na/ /rig pa'i byin rlabs chen po las/ /rang 'byung dkyil 'du 'phro yi tshul/ /yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen te/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun las
grol| |rngam zhing gtum pa'i gzugs can dang / /mgyogs ma mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan/ /de ni thig le rdo rje yin/ /'di zhes gang zag bdag med par/ /rtogs par bya phyir
ngas bshad de/ /mkhas pas de la 'byor par gyis/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // sems dpa' chen
po/ /spyod yul thams cad ni/ 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /chen po lnga yang de bzhin gshegs/ /gcig la'ang lnga lngar rig par gyis/ /khams gsum bdag nyid yin pa ste/ /sku
gsung thugs kyang de la bya/ /ye shes lnga dang 'gro ba lnga/ /mnyam pas so so dbyer med de/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dbang bskur nas/ /spyod yul kun tu maN+Da la/ /'phags pa
pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //sems dpa' chen po zhes rdo rje sems dpa' bos nas bshad do/ /rgyal
ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sku/ /sna tshogs cir yang snang mod kyi/ /kun tu rin chen lta bu ste/ /don dang las yin bsgoms pas 'grub/ /dbu mig rna ba sna lce la/ /oM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste//
gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/ /sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la/ /hUM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/ /sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/ /sbyor ba'i tshul du
bsgom par bya/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo la/ /trAM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/ /sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/ /sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i sor mo la//
hrIHzhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/ /sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/ /sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la/ /AHzhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/ /sems dpa' lnga
dang sems ma lnga/ /sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ lha'i mtshan nyid dang dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun
pa'o|| ||sems dpa' chen po nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' bos nas bshad do/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/ /lnga zhing lnga dang 'byor pa yi/ /tshom bu lnga
yi lha bsgoms na/ /thams cad bdag nyid chen por 'gyur/ /rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyi/ /dgyes
pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas/ /byang chub sems sprin dbab par gsol/ /rdo rje gsor ba'i dga' mchog 'di/ /'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas su gsor/ /mi dmigs bde dang 'phro ba ni//
rdo rje 'dzin mar ldan las byung / /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/ /na bza' dang ni zhal zas rnams/ /grub pa'i rdzas su dbang bskur nas/ /gsol na dngos grub mchog tu
'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/ /glu dang tshig gi sgra rnams ni/ /gsung gi ngo bor byin brlabs te/ /bsgrags na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rig
'dzin mar ldan pas/ /bro dang gar gyis bskyod byas te/ /'od kyi 'du 'phro byin gyis brlab/ /dngos grub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo
phreng las/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /oM badzra bai ro tsa na oM/

oM satwa badzre hUM/ oM rat+na badzra trAM/ oM d+harma badzra hrIH/ oM karma badzra AH/ oM badzra ak+Sho b+h+yaHhUM/ oM badzra satwa hUM/ oM badzra rA dza hUM/ oM badzra rA ga hUM/ oM badzra sA d+hU hUM/ oM badzra rat+na

sa b+ha ba trAM/ oM badzra rat+na trAM/ oM badzra sUr+ya trAM/ oM badzra d+h+wa dza trAM/ oM badzra hA sa trAM/ oM badzra a mi tA b+ha hrIH/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na hrIH/ oM badzra tsakra hrIH/ oM badzra pA sha hrIH/ oM badzra a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hA/ oM badzra

karma hA/ oM badzra rak+Sha hA/ oM badzra yak+Sha hA/ oM badzra muSh+Ti hA/ hoHbadzro shwa ra d+hA tu oM/ /oM badzra bud+d+ha lo tsa na hUM/ oM badzra mA ma kI trAM/ oM badzra paN+Da rA pa si ni hA/ oM badzra sa ma ya tA rA hA/ oM

badzra lA s+yai hUM/ oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ oM badzra aM ku sha hUM/ oM badzra de shwa re b+h+yaHde hUM/ oM badzra mA le trAM/ oM badzra puSh+pe trAM/ oM badzra pA sha trAM/ oM badzra rat+na ra ti trAM/ oM badzra gI t+yai hrIH/ oM badzra

A lo ke hrIH/ oM badzra s+pho Ta hrIH/ oM badzra nr-i t+ye hA/ oM badzra gan+d+he hA/ oM badzra g+han+Da hA/ oM badzra ra ti hA/ oM badzra muSh+Ti hUM/ oM badzra muSh+Ti trAM/ oM badzra muSh+Ti hrI/ oM badzra muSh+Ti hA/ 'phags pa
thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ sngags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //sems dpa' chen po nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bos nas bshad do/ /lha dang lha mo'i ngang
nyid du| |yan lag lnga la 'byor bas na/ /bskyod pa thams cad phyag rgya yin/ /de skad dpa' bos bka' stsal to/ /de la phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /thabs dang shes rab dang nyid du/ /lag gi
'du byed bsgoms nas ni/ /thal mo dam sbyar rtse bsnol gshibs/ /rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal to/ /sor mo nang du bsnol nas bkan/ /gung mdzub mthe bo mthe chung rnams/ /so sor
rtse sprad phyir bkyed de/ /srin lag gshibs bsgreng dam tshig rgya/ /rkang sor g.yas kyis g.yon pa mnan/ /lag mthil g.yas kyis g.yon ba mnan/ /mtha
bo rtse sprad pang du blang / /rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yas kyi mdzub mo g.yon gyis bzung / /chogs pas gcig la gcig bzung ba/ /'di
ni sbyor ba'i rgya mchog go/ /mthe bo gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis/ /so sor rtse sprad zlum po ste/ /lhag ma 'od 'phro rting phye ba/ /mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya yin/ /rting sprad gung mo rtse
sbyar te| |mdzub mo tshigs bcag gung la sbyar/ /srin mtheb rtse sprad mthe chung sba/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /gung mdzub srin lag rtse sprad de/ /mthe chung ngos la sbyar
bar bya/ /mthe bo rtse sprad zlum po ste/ /snang ba mtha' yas phyag rgya yin/ /thal mo sbyar nas so sor sprad/ /bskyod nas 'khor lo ltar byas te/ /glog gi phreng bas 'khor bar bya/ /de na
yod grub pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal po 'di dag ni/ /thugs kar bcing zhing nyid du mos/ /'du 'phro sgrol zhing mkha' la dgrol/ /las dang thun mong nyid du bshad/ /rdo
rje dril bu bzung nas ni/ /thugs kar rang ni dkur brten nas/ /gcu thabs zur gyis lta ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya chen yin/ /lag pa bsnol nas khu tshur bcang / /gung mo
gnyis ni brkyang bar bya/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i rgya chen yin/ /lag pa khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yon gyi mtheb mdzub rtse sprad de/ /g.yas kyi gung mo brkyangs
nas gdeng / /rdo rje 'dod pa'i rgya chen yin/ /lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams/ /so so'i gung mo tshigs dang por/ /ngos bzhi nas ni rtse mo gzugs/ /rdo rje legs pa'i rgya chen yin/ /rting
sbyar gung mo'i rtse sprad de/ /mtheb mdzub srin lag tshigs bcag ste/ /drug car rtse sprad mthe chung sbas/ /rdo rje rin chen rgya chen yin/ /mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad nas/ /lu gu rgyud
du sbrel bar bya/ /lhag ma 'od ltar byas pa ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i rgya chen yin/ /lag ngar g.yon pa bsgrengs nas ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yas pa gru mor gzung bar
bya| |rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgya chen yin/ /g.yon gyi steng du g.yas bzhag nas/ /sor mo'i tshigs bcag sprad byas te/ /kha yi thad kar gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje bzhad pa'i rgya chen
yin| |g.yon gyi sor mo'i rtse rnams ni/ /ma phrad tsam du bsdus pa las/ /g.yas kyis 'byed pa ltar byas pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi rgya chen yin/ /g.yas kyi lag ngar bsgrengs ba la/ /
mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad de/ /lhag ma gsum yang bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa/ /rdo rje rnon po'i rgya chen yin/ /lag pa rgya gram rtse bsnol nas/ /mthe bo
gnyis kyi rtse sprad de/ /bskor ba lta bur byas pa ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgya chen yin/ /sor mo nang du bsnol ba las/ /gung mo rtse sprad mdzub sbyar te/ /mthe bos
gung mo mnan pa ni/ /rdo rje smra ba'i rgya chen yin/ /lag pa'i 'khrig ma bsnol pa las/ /gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang por/ /ngos bzhir sa yi sor mo brten/ /rdo rje las kyi
phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams/ /phan tshun thags su btags pa las/ /mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /rdo rje gsung ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur
bcangs pa las/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgrengs nas kyang / /kha 'gram gnyis su gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin rgya chen yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /bsnol te kha ni
sbyar nas kyang / /thugs kar dam du gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur rgya chen yin/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni/ /lag gi 'du shes 'di dag gis/ /'du 'phro mos
pa bskyed nas ni/ /bcing zhing mkha' la dgrol bar bya/ /mthe bo mthe chung nang du sprad/ /gung mo rtse sbyar bzhi yang bsgreng / /rdo rje 'dzin ltar rting sprad pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
phyag rgya yin/ /rting sbyar mtheb mdzub rtse sbyar te/ /mdzub mo'i mig tu mthe chung drang / /lhag ma rtse gsum ltar byas pa/ /rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag ngar g.yon
pa bsgrengs nas kyang / /sor mo ut+pal ltar byas pa/ /g.yas kyi sor mo gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin/ /rkang pa gnyis kyi pus mo dang / /lag pa gnyis kyi gru mo rnams//
sprad nas lag pa gdengs pa ni/ /kun tu bzang mo'i phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten nas/ /ldan pa g.yas su byo ba las/ /chags pa'i mig gis lta ba ni/ /rdo rje sgeg mo'i
phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon ba rkong rkong po byas te/ /g.yas pas gru mo bzung nas kyang / /bskor zhing sor mo 'phro ba ni/ /rdo rje bdug pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa gnyis ni rgyab sbyar nas/ /
rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /mthe chung sbrel nas mdzub mo bsgreng / /rdo rje lcags kyu ma yi rgya/ /mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel/ /sor mo rnams ni so sor bsgreng / /thal mo bkan te
lta ba ni| |rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bo gnyis/ /so sor rtse mo sprad pa las/ /dpral ba'i thad kar drangs pa ni/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /'phags pa
thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang lha mo rnams la phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems
dpa' brgyad dang 'khor phal po ches dbyangs mthun par bstod pa/ oM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams na/ /rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas/ /bla med lha dang lha mo yi//
grub pa'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab/ /sems dpa' bcu drug rigs kyi gtso/ /sems ma bcu drug rigs kyi yum/ /mthu chen khro bo khro mo dang / /pho
nyar 'jig rten skyong bar ldan/ /oM/ /sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni/ /'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun/ /rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /oM//
dpa' bo chen po mthu ldan rnams/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams/ /grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /oM/ /khams gsum
zhing du sbyor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmigs med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /cir yang sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
zhes bstod nas nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs te rol par khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khro bo'i rtog pa bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
dpa' la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gcer bu pa dang / kun tu rgyu la sogs pas so so'i rig sngags kyi
las kyis mahA de ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi lha dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che dang / phra men ma thams cad bskul nas sems can rnams kyi srog gi bar chad bgyid/ 'tshe
bar bgyid/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar bgyid na/ de la thabs gang gis bzlog par bgyi/ sbyor ba gcad par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig /'di ni /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos sngon chad bshad de/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod nyid kyis byas pa'i gsang sngags dang / srid pa zad par byas pa'i gsang
sngags thams cad kyang zlog par byed do/ /gnon par byed do/ /sbyor ba gcod pa byed na kun tu rgyu la sogs pa gzhan lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje mtshon cha'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung ngang thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags zlog cing gnon pa dang / sbyor ba gcod pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra dz+wa la badzra
hUM| man+t+ra sum+b+ha ni/ oM badzra dz+wa la hUM/ oM brUM hUM brUM trAM brUM hUM brUM hrIHbrUM A brUM/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu nas mtshon cha'i char chen po phab ste lag na rdo rje nyid
kyang kha bub tu 'gyel nas khrag skyug par gyur to/ /lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad kyang brgyal te lus dum bur chad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sbyor ba
chad par rig nas slar bslang ste/ oM badzra satwa rA dza dz+ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis kyang 'di las 'da' bar ma
byed cig /khyod kyi 'khor thams cad kyang 'di las 'da' bar byed na thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang
lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad la bsgo zhig /de nas lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di na srid pa thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa/ mthu bo che thams cad
'dul bar bgyid pa/ mthu bo che thams cad kyi nga rgyal gcog pa bdag lags te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i slad du bdag gi ming
yang lag na rdo rje zhes btags na/ 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'di smras pas/ bdag kyang khrag tu skyug cing 'gyel bar gyur na gzhan
lta ci smos/ 'di ni/ 'da' bar dka'o/ /de bzhin du lha dang gnod sbyin rnams la yang bsgo'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gsang sngags 'di
sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad de/ maM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan drang ngo / /sku ni dud ka chen po la/ /dbu skra kham nag ral pa can/ /dbu gsum
pa la phyag drug ste/ /dmar dang dud ka nag pa yin/ /g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni/ /sti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dang / /dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba la/ /rdo rjes
dkrug cing mthun par brtag /g.yon gyi gsum na thogs pa ni/ /sti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang / /khyud gi khrag chen thogs pa dang / sti ra phra mo'i gsus pa nas/ /glo snying nang grol
'dren cing za/ /gtsug tu rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ /oM phrag g.yas la ak+Sho b+h+yaHhUM/ g.yon rat+na sam+b+ha ba trAM/ rkang g.yas AHmo g+ha sid+d+hi AHg.yon na a mi tA b+ha ste hrIH/ bruM
las rdo rje 'khor lo la/ /rdo rje rnams ni rig sngags brtag /kau ri dang ni tsau ri dang / /pra mo ha dang bait+ta li/ /gzhan yang bya g+h+r-i mu khA dang / /sid+ha la sogs mgyogs ma rnams/ /
sti ra la ni 'bru tshugs su/ /lta zhing rtod pa'i tshul bzhin gnas/ /ha ha de nas skad cig la/ /rig sngags nyid dang rbod gtong bcas/ /dgug pa'i pho nyar brtag par bya/ /ras
sam gro ga'am rtsa rnams la/ /khro bo'i gzugs su bris pa 'am/ /yang na skud pa nag pos bcing / /ha ha gad mo chen po dang / /rdo rje skul ba'i glu blangs te/ /pho nya rnams la
mngag par bya/ /de nas rig sngags bzung nas kyang / /rtsa yi gzugs la gnas pa dang / /'khor lo la sogs mtshon cha yis/ /de dag phye mar brlag par bya/ /badzra tsakra hUM/
phye mar de dag gtubs nas ni/ /thod pa gzhu dang bcas pa yis/ /hom khung gru gsum sgo can du/ /raM zhes bya ba'i me sbar te/ /drang srong 'khor bcas g.yab mos 'bod/ /de
nas rig sngags bsreg par bya/ /de ltar lha dang bdag sbyar na/ /rnam lnga'i chas dang ldan par bya/ /ma mo chen mo sha la spyon/ /'byung po'i sha ni zan
bas zhim/ /'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim/ /ma mo chen mo khrag la spyon/ /glu dang gar dang gad rgyangs kyis/ /so sor mchod de bsgrub par bya/ /zin pa'i sems can gang
yang rung / /de dag skud pa nag pos bcing / /de yang dum bur gcad par bya/ /de nas mi de snga ma bzhin/ /tshe gnas bya phyir 'bru lnga yis/ /gnas lnga dag tu rnam bkod de/ /
zin pa'i sems can bsrung bar bya/ /tsha zhing rtsub pa'i shing dang ni/ /sha dang chang dang yo byad rnams/ /nag cing tsha bar rnam sbyar te/ /lha chen rnams la mchod par bya/ /de
nas las rnams grub pa dang / /ha ha la sogs gad mo dang / /glu dang rdo rje dbyug pa yis/ /lha rnams bdag la thim par bya/ /'di ni bdag nyid srung ba dang / /las
rnams thams cad grub par byed/ /shar phyogs na phra men ma kau ri kha dog sngon mo phyag gnyis pa ste/ g.yon b+han+d+ha tsan+dan dmar gyis bkang ba thogs pa/ g.yas na zhing
chung ngu'i dbyug ba thogs pa/ oM badzra gau rI dza dza hUM zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na/ sangs rgyas kyang dgug nus na gzhan lta ci smos/ che ge mo zhig khug cig
ces bcol nas gtor ma dang tsan+dan dmar chen ar+g+haM la oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo zhes brjod cing ar+g+haM lan gsum du bsgreng ngo / /lho phyogs na tsau ri kha dog ser mo phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs

pa| oM badzra tsau rI hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na/ phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang rdul tsam yang med par rku nus na gzhan lta ci smos/ nub phyogs na pra mo ha dmar mo phyag na chu srin gyi
rgyal mtshan thogs pa/ oM badzra pra mo hA hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na/ phyag na rdo rje yang rang gi mthu bzhag nas dbang du 'ong na gzhan lta ci smos/ byang phyogs na bait+ta
li kha dog nag mo phyag g.yon zhing chung du 'dzin cing za ba/ g.yas na rdo rje 'phyar ba/ oM badzra bait+ta lI hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub na 'jig rten gyi sgrub pa phran tshegs lta ci smos/ shar lho'i mtshams na puk+ka si kha dog dmar ser phyag gnyis zhing chung du'i ba su ta
'dren cing za ba oM badzra puk+ka sI hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na/ phyag na rdo rje yang 'ching zhing 'dren par nus na gzhan bcing zhing za ba lta ci smos/ lho nub kyi mtshams
na g+hasma ri kha dog ljang khu phyag g.yon na b+han+d+ha tsan+dan dmar pos bkang ba rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol pa/ oM badzra g+hasma rI hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na/ phyag na rdo
rje yang myos par nus na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ nub byang gi mtshams na badzra karma kha dog ljang khu zhing chung du lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste snying
ga nas za ba/ oM badzra karmA hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na/ las gang bya ba thams cad 'grub bo/ /byang shar gyi mtshams na tsaN+Da li kha dog ser skya phyag g.yas na zhing
chung ngu'i b+han+d+ha 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyis zhing dbyug 'dzin pa/ oM badzra tsaN+Da lI hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na/ za ma dang ma ning yang rgyud 'phel bar byed na dbang po
tshang zhing nyams pa med pa la rgyud 'phel zhing tshe dang dbang thang 'phel bar bya ba lta ci smos te/ phra men ma 'di rnams 'phrin las bskul ba'i tshe ar+g+haM dang gtor ma 'bul ba
ni| gong du smos pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ /khros na thams cad phyag na tri shU la 'bar ba/ g.yon rde'u chung bsnams pa/ gdan me smug nag /sku'i kha dog nag mo la khrag dang zhag
dang thal ba'i thig les tshom bur byas shing ba su tas rked pa bcings pa/ gser gyi pags pa go zur bgos pa srod ta a dza nas lus brgyan te gcer bu'i tshogs smug nag
'bar ba/ g.yon rde'u chung bsnams pa/ g.yas me smug kun ka kha dog nag mo la 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs shing zad par byas nas slar dpal chen po'i sku la
thim par bya'o/ /da ni/ phyi rim bshad par bya'o/ /shar phyogs su sid+ha mu khA kha dog ser mo zhing chung kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba/ seng+ge'i mgo can/
lho phyogs na byA g+h+r-i mu khA kha dog dmar mo lag pa gnyis bsnol te mdun na zhing gnas pa la lta ba/ stag gi mgo can/ nub phyogs su srin gla mu khA kha dog nag mo lag pa gnyis
zhing chung ngu 'dzin cing lces bldag pa/ wa mgo can/ byang phyogs na shwa na mu khA kha dog mthing ga zhing lag pa gnyis kyis khong dral te lta ba khyi mgo can/ shar lho'i
mtshams kr-i D+ha mu khA kha dog dmar nag zhing chung ngu'i ba su ta kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas b+han+d+ha/ g.yon gri thogs pa bya rgod kyi mgo can/ lho nub mtshams na kang+ka
mu khA kha dog dkar dmar phrag pa g.yon pa la zhing bkal zhing rkang pa nas bzung ba/ g.yas pa mgo 'dzin pa bya kang+ka'i mgo can/ mchu ring / thor to gug/ ze ba dmar mo/ /
nub byang mtshams na kA ka mu khA kha dog nag mo bya rog gi mgo can mchus zhing thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pas pad+ma ban+d+ha 'dzin pa/ byang shar mtshams su U lU ka mu
khA kha dog sna tshogs lag pa g.yon pa dung chen khrag gis bkang pa la 'thung ba/ lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa 'ug pa'i mgo can/ nang rim 'ug pa'i 'khor
gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim bya rog gi 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim bya kang+ka mchu ring gi 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim bya rgod kyi 'khor gyis bskor
de dag thams cad kyang zhing mang po gsar rnying spungs pa'i steng na zhing la rtod pa'i phyir 'thab pa'i tshul ston pa sha stag go /de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so/ /hUM ha he phaT hUM/
'di kun 'bru re re yang lan bzhi bzhi brjod do/ /hUM gis gtso bo bskyed/ has nang gi lha mo bskyed/ hes phyi'i lha mo bskyed/ phaT kyis thams cad khros par bskul/ hUM gis
thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer 'bar bas phyogs bcur khyab par bgyi'o/ /lha mo blo ldan tshogs kyi bdag /he ru dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas
byed dang / /rnal 'byor bar du gcod pa dang / /dam tshig gnyan po dral pa dang / /rdo rje spun la 'khu byed rnams/ /khyed kyis rdul du brlags nas ni/ /gnod sems
ma lus gtan nas phyung / /dpal chen po stan dang ga na'i gnas su tshogs chen po la gshegs pa'i tshe sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo'i gzi byin gyis gdug pa thams cad gtan
nas 'byin cing longs spyod chen po 'gying zhing 'gying ba'i glu blangs te thams cad dgyes par mdzad pa'i dbyangs 'dis dgyes par mdzad do/ /rdo rje pad+mo'i phyag rgya dpral bar
bcings te 'phyar nas mchong zhing 'khor thams cad gcer bur byung nas skra gshig cing brgyugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM e A ra li hoHhrIM hrIM hrIM hrIM/ de nas tshogs su gshegs nas
'khor thams cad la spyan bgrad pas gzigs shing 'dzum pa'i brda ha ha saM saM sgra phyung ste 'khor thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu dbyangs 'dis gtso bo la bstod do/ /e ma'o chos
kyi don byung ba/ /chos don dag pa bdag med pa/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod pas gtso bo mnyes nas 'khor thams cad la
gzigs shing dam stsal ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so/ /kha ga l+ya sha ta ba ka /a la la la hoH/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ kha raM yo gi ni/ kha raM TA ki ni/ a la la hoH/ b+ha ga wA na
kha kha kha/ lha mo rnams rnga rdung / dbyangs len/ rgyud gsum gyi tshig/ te g+heM te g+heM/ te g+heM / te g+heM/ ta g+hoM/ g+hoM g+hoM g+hoM/ 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/
rig sngags gcod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi/ /'od zer 'du 'phro'i klong dkyil na/ /khro
bo chen po rnams bzhugs pa/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis gnas pa ste/ /dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni/ /dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de/ /gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa gdengs/ /
zhabs kyang brgyad du rnam par bstan/ /de yi dkyil 'khor khro bo ni/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje'i brag steng na/ /'jig
rten skyong bas 'dud tshul lo/ /de yi pho nya bka' nyan ni/ /rdo rje phra men gtum bag can/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po ste/ /de dag cir yang 'grub par byed/ /'phags
pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //rdo rje srin mo chen mo ni/ /'jigs byed chen mor snang ba
ste| |phyag kyang srin po chen po ltar/ /mthun te zhabs kyang de dang 'dra/ /de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rin chen me tog bor nas ni/ /lcags la bab pa'i lha de ni/ /gnyer
na 'grub par the tshom med/ /dge dang mi dge'i chos rnams la/ /lhag par bsten par mi bya ste/ /mnyam nyid rig pa'i klong zhugs nas/ /ci la thogs pa med par spyod//
rdo rje dbyug ba blangs nas su/ /g.yab mo lnga yang g.yab par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bzhugs par brtag /mchod pa chen po dbul bar bya/ /se gol gtogs pa tsam
gyis kyang / /mgyogs mas phyogs bcu gar yang phyin/ /de la zhen nas 'gro byed pa/ /bya rog mgo can la sogs kun/ /sbed byed ma yis sbas pa ni/ /mthu chen lha srin
gang gis kyang / /de la mthong bar mi nus ni/ /gzhan gyis mthong bar ga la nus/ /skul byed las ni gzhen 'debs yin/ /mgyogs ma'i las ni phyin par 'gro/ /gsod ma'i lus
ni grub pa yin/ /so sor ma bsgrubs nyid 'gro ma/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ rdo rje srin mo'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma

ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wA na dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM/ a a a hUM phaT/ oM badzra

kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ gardza gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badzra ko d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/

pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa rA rdza ta hUM

tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la hUM/
s+pho Ta s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+ma phreng las/ khro bo bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang las kyi sngags ril 'dus pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //
oM badzra kro d+he hUM/ ha la ha la ha la ha la ha hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ ma ma ma ma ma hUM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo hUM/ dzaHdzaHdzaHhUM hUM hUM/
'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ rdo rje srin mo'i sngags kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //mnyam pa nyid du rtogs byas nas/ /bskul zhing gsigs pa
thams cad kyang / /phyag rgya yin zhes rgyal pos bshad/ /mdo tsam du ni 'di ltar brtag /lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng / /rkang pa mthil sbyar thur du gzugs/ /tshigs
chen bzhi yang gcag par bya/ /mgo dang mtshan yang snying por brtag /rdo rje rtse gcig rtse dgu dang / /bcu gcig tu yang rnam brtags te/ /'di ni khrag 'thung chen po yi//
phyag rgya yin par dpa' bos bshad/ /lag na thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng / /rkang pa phral nas brkyang bskum zhing / /gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa/ /'di ni hUM gi rgya chen
yin| |rkang pa phral mthil zur du gzugs/ /lag pa phral nas gar byed cing / /stabs su mchod par byed pa ni/ /'di ni stobs chen phyag rgya yin/ /rkang pa g.yon gyis
g.yas la 'khyud/ /lag pa gar thabs bskor nas kyang / /thal mo drag tu brdabs pa ni/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon mthe bo yis/ /mthe'u
chung sen mo'i mthil du gnon/ /gdengs pa'i thabs su bsgreng ba ni/ /dbyug sngon can gyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /rdeg pa'i thabs su gdengs pa dang / /
g.yon pa dku la brten pa ni/ /gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo yin/ /gdab pa'i thabs su gdengs pa dang / /g.yon gyis 'dzin pa ltar byas pa/ /
mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo rgyab tu bsnol bar bya/ /mthe bo gnyis kyang phral te bsgreng / /spyi bor bzhag pa gre ba'i rgya/ /rkang pa g.yas
pa thur du gzugs/ /lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng / /g.yon pa'i rkang pa lag 'phyar ba'i/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon dkur brten te/ /
rkang pa gshibs te mchod ba ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya zhes/ /dpa' bo chen pos yang du bshad/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba dang / /rkang pa brkyang bskum byas pa ni/ /khams
gsum rgyal ba'i phyag rgya zhes/ /mgon po dpa' bos yang du bshad/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon sprugs pa dang / /lus kyang drag tu gsigs pa ni/ /rdo rje phra men ma rnams kyi/ /phyag
rgya yin par 'dren pas bshad/ /phyag rgya 'di dag bcings nas ni/ /stabs chen drag tu mchongs byas na/ /khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang go 'phang thams
cad kun/ /'grub par gyur te the tshom med/ /rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos bshad/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu
drug ba'o// //'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad pa'i/ /dkyil du khrag 'thung spyan drangs te/ /mdun du hUM yang spyan drang ngo / /rgyab tu stobs chen spyan drangs nas/ /'khor
lo rtsibs kyi steng dag tu/ /bcu bo rnams kyang go rim bzhin/ /so so'i gnas su spyan drangs te/ /dmar gyi ar+g+haM gsol nas ni/ /mchod yon gzhan yang dbul bar bya/ /rdo
rje dbyings kyis bstod byas te/ /de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /khros pas yud tsam rlag
mdzad de/ /brlags par ma gyur gang yang med/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ las kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //rdo rje phra men sbyor ba
yis| |yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas/ /rtod pa'i tshul du rab bstabs na/ /lha yang rung ste bzlog par 'gyur/ /'ug pa'i mgo can la sogs pa'i/ /phra men ma rnams
rbad byas te/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /de yi sems 'phrog sgom nyams 'gyur/ /phra men rnams ni rbad byas te/ /de yi sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing / /gsang ste
'khrug par bsgoms byas na /sgrub pa nyams shing 'bye bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ drag po'i las kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //
hom khung zur gsum gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje mda' gzhu ldan byas te/ /thod pa dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan drangs bsregs na lha yang 'chi/ /phra men mngags te bkug nas ni/ /
thab kun bsregs na mod la 'chi/ /gsum dang bsres pa'i sha rnams kyis/ /lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya/ /rdo rje glu ni blangs nas su/ /'byung po'i sha ni shin tu zhim/ /'byung
po'i khrag ni shin tu zhim/ /'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste/ /gsol te thams cad dgyes par mdzod/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ drag po hom gyi le'u ste bcu
dgu pa'o// //lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum/ /khro bo khro mo rnams bsgoms te/ /btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur/ /'phags
ba thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ drag po phur pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //lcags phye dug dang rdo phye dang / /khrag las sprus te bsres pa dang / /mud ga'i tshan
dang sbyor ba dag /sbyor bas gtor na de brlag 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ drag po'i gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// //khro
mo'i dkyil 'khor gtun khung du/ /khro bo'i tho bas brdungs pa yi/ /rdo rje gtun phrugs bsgoms byas na/ /lha yang rung ste brdungs par 'gyur/
'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ drag po'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //drag po'i las kyis bsgrubs pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i lam lnga
sgo bcad nas/ /rnam shes hUM gis bsdus btums te/ /'og min bla med gnas mchog na/ /gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/ /sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang / /khro bo dang ni
khro mo rnams/ /sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang / /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ gnas bstabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //zla gam
dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa/ /khro bo khro mo spyan drangs te/ /mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod/ /de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /chags pa'i rdo rje 'khor bcas
pa| |'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /chags pas yud la dbang mdzad de/ /dbang du ma gyur gang yang med/ /rdo rje phra men mngags nas su/ /bkug nas khro bo
chen po yis/ /chags pa'i tshul gyis de lus las/ /dpa' dang gzi brjid bsdus nas 'grub/ /phra men rnams ni mngags nas su/ /de yi mig rna sna dang lce/ /lus dang
sems bsgyur rnams bsgoms na/ /kun la mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ dbang gi las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //
hom khung zla gam gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje zhags pas brgyan par bya/ /de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te/ /mi phan rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng
las| dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //zangs sam kha dog dmar po'i shing / /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam/ /mgo la khro bo'i 'khor bsgoms te/ /btab na
nges par de dbang bsgyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ dbang gi phur pa'i las bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// //zangs phye dang ni bu ram dang //
dmar po'i 'bras can la sogs pa/ /sbyar bas gtor ma gtang bar bya/ /mthong bas nges par de dbang 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ dbang gi gtor
ma'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas na/ /lha yang rung ste dbang du 'gyur/ /de ni bde ba chen
po yin/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ dbang gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //gru bzhi dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par/ /lha rnams
'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ /mchod pa klu la sogs pas mchod/ /de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten
khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /dpal dang gzi brjid chen po rnams/ /yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod/ /khro bo khro mo 'khor bcas dang / /rdo rje phra men 'khor bcas pas/ /
dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel bsgoms na/ /bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ rgyas pa'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //
hom khung gru bzhi gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje 'khor los brgyan par bya/ /de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te/ /bsregs pas mchod cing dpal 'phel bsgom/ /'phags pa thabs
kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ rgyas pa'i hom gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur bzhi/ /lha rnams
bsgoms te gdab par bya/ /'di ni rgyas pa'i las la shis/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ rgyas pa'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// /
gser phye 'bras chan ser po rnams/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi gtor ma ni/ /rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste/ /mkhas pas rgyas par bsgom zhing sbyin/ /'phags pa thabs
kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// //lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom/ /byang chub
sems ni 'phro bsgoms na/ /'di ni rgyas pa'i las 'grub bo/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ rgyas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o// //
zlum po'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par/ /lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ /dkar po'i yon gyis mchod par bya/ /de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /gti
mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /yud tsam nyid la zhi mdzad de/ /zhi bar grub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha rnams 'khor
bcas thams cad kyis/ /'khrug pa thams cad zhi mdzad par/ /bsgoms na thams cad yud tsam gyis/ /zhi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /'phags pa thabs kyi
zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ zhi ba'i las kyi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o// //hom khung zlum po gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje pad+mos brgyan par bya/ /
phur pa dkar po drug btab ste/ /spyan drangs rdul phye sogs pas mchod/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste sum cu
lnga pa'o// //phur pa kha dog dkar po la/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum por/ /lha rnams bsgoms la gdab
par bya| |'di ni zhi ba'i las la shis/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ zhi ba'i phur ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// //
dngul dang 'bras chan dkar po rnams/ /'o mar sbyar ba'i gtor ma ni/ /zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste/ /mkhas pas zhi bar bsgoms shing gtor/ /'phags
pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ zhi ba'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o// //lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lha yi grub pa bsgom
par bya/ /byin gyis thams cad zhi bsgoms na/ /lha rnams kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ zhi ba'i spyod pa las kyi le'u
ste sum cu brgyad pa'o// //mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang / /de las dngos 'byung phyag rgya rnams/ /nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad/ /
mkhas pas ci dag bsgyur na 'grub/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ las bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o// //drag
pos thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur/ /dbang gis 'byor pa mchog kyang 'grub/ /rgyas pas gzi brjid rnam par 'phel/ /zhi bas bde ba'i mchog kyang
'grub| |'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las/ las sgrub pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //dkyil 'khor
'di'i mtshan ni/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi zlum por bya ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i don no/ /
'khor lo rtsibs zur can du bya ba gzhi zlum po'i nang na gnas pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings spros pa med bzhin du byin gyi rlabs gyis lha dang / lha
mo dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / pho nya la sogs pa ngang nyid kyis 'phro ba'i don no/ /rnam pa gcig tu chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog pa med bzhin
du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ci yang mkhyen pa lhun gyis grub pa'i don no/ /mtha' gru bzhi bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i snod dang bcud kyi 'jig
rten thams cad la dbang bsgyur pas bde ba chen po rgyas pa'i don/ dkyil nas lha mo lnga phyir lta ba/ lha mo ni/ dbyings nyid nye ba'i byin rlabs te/
sems dpas dbyings nyid dang nye ba mthong ba'i don no/ /sems dpa' lnga nang du lta ba ni/ dbyings nyid nye ba la lta ba'i don no/ /sems
dpa' gzhan phyir lta ba ni/ dbyings nyid thams cad du sa rdo lta bu bem po ma yin gyi/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing sems dpa' nyid dbyings las
mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go /sems ma gzhan nang du lta ba ni/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes dngos po la sogs pa thams cad du rnam par rtog pa ma yin gyi/ dbyings
nyid dang ldan zhing dbyings nyid kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes las mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go /rnam pa gcig tu sems dpa' phyir lta ba ni/ snod dang bcud kyi 'jig
rten thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i don/ sems ma nang du lta ba ni/ snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/ sems
dpa' dang sems ma phyi nang du gcig la gcig gzigs pa ni/ mnyes par byed pa'i tha tshig go /khro bo dang / khro mo ril phyir lta ba ni/ phyi'i dngos po dang
rgol ba la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba'i don/ de la dbyings ni/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/ nyi ma'i
'od snang zhing gsal ba lta bu'o/ /de'i byin rlabs ni/ dro zhing 'jam pa lta bu'o/ /phyi'i dngos po la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba ni/ rtsi shing bskams pa dang tshig pa lta
bu ste| lha mo dang sems ma ni/ chos kyi dbyings rig pa'i don sems la snang ba'o/ /lha dang sems dpa' ni/ dbyings la snang ba'i don mthong
ba'o| |dbyings la snang ba dang mthong ba'i byin rlabs kyi ngang gis dngos po dang rgol ba'i rang bzhin lhun gyis 'joms shing dbyings su sbyor bar
'dul ba ni/ /khro bo deng khro mo las rnam bzhi rang bzhin du mdzad cing thugs rjes 'jig rten skyong ba'i don no/ /'jig rten skyong ba la sogs
pa ni| byin gyi rlabs las pho nya ltar gnas pa yin/ rnam pa gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lha mthu bo che 'khor du 'dus par bstan pa'i don no/ /
bkra shis brgyad ni/ thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing 'khor ba la spyod kyang nyon mongs pas 'ching par mi 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la
spyod kyang nyan thos kyi zhi ba phyogs gcig par mi 'gyur te/ gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir bkra shis so/ /de la dpal be'u ni/ mkhyen pa'i
ye shes dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/ /'khor lo ni/ thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i
bkra shis so/ /rin po che ni/ zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/ /pad+mo ni/ 'khor bas ma zin pa'i bkra shis so/ /gdugs ni/ nyon mongs
pas ma gdungs pa'i bkra shis so/ /bum pa ni/ bdud rtsi mchog dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/ /dung ni/ sgo thams cad spa bkong bar sgra sgrog pa'i bkra
shis so/ /nya ni/ lam rgyud lnga'i sems can gyi don mdzad kyang nyam nga ba med pa'o/ /klong bzhi ni/ rigs lnga'i byin rlabs yin pa'am/ lam rgyud
lnga'i sems can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yod par bstan pa'am/ thugs rjes de dag gi don mdzad pa'i tha tshig go /rnam pa gcig tu
thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/ de la gtso mo 'khor lnga lnga dang bcas pa ni/ ci yang mi mdzad do/ /sems dpa' sems ma nyi shu ni /
kun la bu gcig bzhin no/ /de ltar byas pa'i shugs kyi khro bo dang khro mo 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ phyin pa thams cad kyi dngos po la rngon
pas ri dwags mthong ba bzhin no/ /de ltar zhe sdang gi shugs kyis thams cad dbyings nyid la sbyar ro/ /'byor na 'khor ba'i chos la spyod kyang longs
spyod chen po ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas de ltar sgrub pa ni/ 'dod chags so/ /chos kyi dbyings ngang gis gsang ba phrag dog go /
chos nyid spros pa med pas gti mug go /chos nyid de lta bu khams gsum las rgyal bas nga rgyal lo/ /de la gtso bo ni/ 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni
thams cad la khyab mod kyi/ nye bar ni/ dbu dang mdun dang thong ga yan chad/ rgyab mjug yan chad do/ /mi 'khrugs pa'i 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs
ni| phyag g.yas pa dang rtsi bas logs g.yas so/ /rin chen 'byung ldan 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni/ phyag g.yon dang rtsibs logs g.yon no/ /
'od dpag med 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni/ zhabs g.yon nas rked pa g.yon man chad do/ /don yod grub pa 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni/ zhabs g.yas rked
pa g.yon man chad do/ /khro bo dang khro mo thams cad ni/ rigs so so'i byin rlabs bzhin no/ /de ltar 'khor lnga po gcig la yang lnga lngar 'gyur te/
sra ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni/ rdo rje'i rigs so/ /dro ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni/ rin po che'i rigs so/ /gsher ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni/
pad+ma'i rigs so/ /bskyod pa'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni/ las kyi rigs so/ /de rnams cha mnyam pa las spyir grub pa ni/ dngos su bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
so| |thams cad bdag nyid ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni/ dbus su gyur pa thams cad do/ /sra ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni/ yangs pa'i spyan 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs so/ /
dro ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni/ mA ma kI 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs so/ /gsher ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni/ gos dkar mo 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs so/ /bskyod pa'i rang bzhin med pa
ni| sgrol ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs so/ /don du bya ba byed nus pa sems dpa'o/ /de bzhin du rang bzhin med pa ni/ sems ma'o/ /de ltar rig pa ni/ khro bo dang / khro mo'o//
de la bsdu zhing spro ba yang thams cad de ltar bya'o/ /phyi nang gi chos thams cad la yang de ltar blta'o/ /de skad ces dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa la rdo rje gzhon nu sde
'bum phrag du ma yi rang ste 'di skad ces bstod do/ /hUM/ bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi/ /'od zer 'du 'phro klong dkyil na/ /khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa/ /skur
ni cir yang sgyur ba'i gzugs/ /hUM/ dbu skra kham nag ral pa can/ /gyen du 'khyil ba srid rtser 'bar/ /mi mnyam khro gnyer sdang mig ni/ /log par lta ba 'dul
ba'i mtshan/ /hUM/ mche ba zang yag gtsigs pas ni/ /skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul/ /sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs ni/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang snang / /
hUM/ thugs rje'i byin rlabs sprin ltar 'khrigs/ /byams pa'i 'od zer glog bzhin 'gyu/ /rngam pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrog /sprul pa'i thog thog char
bzhin 'babs/ /hUM/ sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni/ /klan ka chen po bdud la tshol/ /kyal ka chen po bgegs la mdzad/ /dam tshig can la dngos grub stsol/ /hUM/ thugs rje chen po'i byin
rlabs kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis rlabs mdzad cing / /bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams/ /'grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil ba la/ /sems
gyi chos pas sku mi mnga'/ /sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste/ /bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lags/ /hUM/ srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam nyid dang gis
khro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'du 'phro khro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod de nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur
to| |'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng rdzogs so// //
